name: Executive Luxury design Apartment
summary: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen
space: No84 is an executive serviced apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and laundry services. Located in the heart of Woollahra we are central to many cafes and some of Sydney's best known restaurants.   Should you tire of eating out the apartment is equipped with everything you need.   Relax and enjoy your meal on the full sized deck overlooking a leafy courtyard.   And if its BBQ you prefer feel free to cook away on the deck.     A sunroom can convert into a 2nd bedroom for those guests that just don't want to leave.      A full sized bath tub and separate shower are located in the nearly renovated marble bathroom.    Relax and enjoy the bath products supplied. A rare secured parking space is also included. For those that like their privacy No84 is located just behind Queen Street in a leafy laneway. The apartment comes stocked with fresh flowers and the aroma of a welcome loaf of bread along with boutique jams and milk for the supplied tea and coffee.   For those needing to work whils
description: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen No84 is an executive serviced apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and laundry services. Relax and enjoy your meal on the full sized deck overlooking a leafy courtyard.   And if its BBQ you prefer feel free to cook away on the deck. Relax and enjoy the bath products supplied. A rare secured parking space is also included. For those that like their privacy N
neighborhood_overview: A village atmosphere with great cafés, restaurants and bars.  Galleries and beauty salons all in walking distance.  A fantastic book shop and lots of clothing boutiques.
notes: Cenntenial park is walking distance away for your serenity moment - bike riding and horse rides available if you don't wish to sit at the cafe or take your own - and Bondi Junction for your shopping fix is a walk away.   Paddington Markets on the weekend is amazing. Cafe's abound.  Sydney Cricket Ground is a walk away.
transit: Buses along the street to various locations. Close to CBD and lots of shopping in local area and westfields bondi junction close by.  Sydney's largest park a 5 minute walk.
access: WELCOME PACKAGE :  includes: large fresh fruit platter, loaf of fresh bread, boutique jams (and yes vegimite) butter, milk, fresh flowers and sparkling water.  Assorted teas and Nespresso coffee machine and pods provided.  Juicer machine for your fresh juices.  Full kitchen, outdoor bbq, full laundry facilities, secure parking in leafy courtyard. Large bath tub - bath products by 'serenity' included.   Foxtel.  Safe.  Printer & scanner.
interaction: If you need more ... let me know.   Want a chef to cook an onsite meal for a special occasion - no problem.   Fully stocked fridge pre arrival - no problem.  Roses throughout for your special person - no problem.  Anything you want - dream it and we will create it.  (small print - yeah of course there is a charge - lets talk about what you need and go from there - happy to make your stay enjoyable!)
house_rules: Smoking and pets are not permitted.  We are a quite and friendly neighbourhood so please no large groups and noise.    Due to the stair access we are unfortunately not wheelchair or child friendly

reviews.comments: This apartment is absolutely exquisite. The fittings and furnishings are very high quality and comfortable.  The place is like a beautiful parisian retreat.  The location is close to great cafes, shops and Centennial Park, 10 mins from city and beaches.  It truly is a home away from home.  We are originally from Sydney so we know our areas which is why we chose to stay here.  We used to always stay in hotels but NOW we will endeavour to stay here whenever we come to Sydney.  Louise was wonderful, extremely helpful and timely with all our questions.

An amazing place situated in the heart of Woolahra, it was just perfect for the night of our wedding. Louise was unbelievably  accommodating, allowing us to drop off some things the day before our stay, setting up candles and flowers, leaving us a fruit platter and great provisions for breaky the next morning and responding to a 12am locked out call! She is a gem - thanks again Louise! The French provincial/art deco styled apartment was luxurious with a super comfy bed, relaxed atmosphere and situated 2 mins walk from Queen street's yummy cafes and delis! We would definitely recommend this place to anyone interested, it is worth every cent and we look forward to staying here again!

My daughter and I stayed at Louise's apartment. It is absolutely fantastic. Great location, nice little cafes and most of what you could need. Perfectly clean and comfortable. A beautiful shaded veranda great bathroom and kitchen. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.

In a word WOW! We loved it here. It had all the comforts of home and more as well as welcoming touches such as fruit and fresh bread.   The amenities were everything you could want and more. The quality of everything was outstanding. We could easily live here and not want for anything. 

Well done Louise on a fabulous abode! Stunning! We will definitely stay here whenever we are in Sydney.

Thank you!

Perfect! Perfect! Perfect! From the time you walk up the stairs to this beautiful, fully stocked terrace you feel right at home! The pictures can't even begin to describe the warmth and and comfort of this immaculately furnished, fully equipped 2 bedroom apartment! With on site parking, a laundry, the most comfortable bedding I have ever slept in, an amazingly sunlight filled kitchen and in one of Sydney cutest suburbs this place was perfect for anyone wanting to visit Sydney! Close to shops, cafés and restaurants and only minutes drive from the cbd staying here was one of the best decisions I have made when visiting Sydney! Louise is wonderful and caters to your every need and is easy to contact! I highly recommend staying here to anyone who is wanting to visit Sydney for any period of time!! :)

Louise's apartment is simply beautiful - the only hesitation I have about recommending it is that it will become so popular I won't be able to stay there again! My colleague and I stayed there for two nights whilst on business and it was so much nicer that the normal corporate apartment - but still had all the small touches you expect (bath robes, toiletries, hair dryer, etc...). It would also be a perfect place to stay for a pleasure. The location is great - right in the Woollahra village - and close to the city. Louise has exquisite taste and the apartment is decorated with a lot of style and panache.  She was an excellent host who communicated with me swiftly and effectively - our check-in was completely hassle free - and we were welcomed with fresh bread, fruit, and milk. We will definitely look to stay here again and highly recommend it to the airbnb community.

Louise's apartment exceeded all expectations!! Fantastic location, spacious and so tastefully decorated. The most comfortable bed in the world and the bathroom...where do I stop.The welcome bottles of wine, the fruit, movie pass, Louise you are so special. I will stay here every time I come to Sydney. Must agree with another reviewer though, this should be kept a secret as everyone will want to come! Thankyou Louise.

I love staying in this apartment, it really is the perfect position in Sydney, its always spotless and beautifully presented. 
I almost don't want to share a review, just in case its not available in the future..

Queen Street is a terrific location with a vibrant village atmosphere, cafes, specialty food stores, boutiques and more. The apartment is full of delightful surprises and charm. So much more than any hotel room. Louise's 5 star hospitality includes sharing her designer furnishings and collectibles with you, the immaculate presentation of the apartment, her warm communication style and her attention to detail to ensure you enjoy every moment of your stay.

Apartment exceeded our expectations. Spacious, clean and with every convenience you might need. Milk, bread and fruit on arrival was an amazing bonus as well as the offer to check out late. Perfect location, easy walk to shops, park, markets and transport. Communication was friendly and prompt. Will stay again when in Sydney.

What an amazing place! Highly recommend. Even nicer than the photos. We were left a welcome fruit bowl and so forth. Couldnt have asked for more. ! Would definitely stay here, (i'm glad we didnt book the Hughenden nearby, as for the same price this place was incredible) . The spare sunroom with its own bed for one was perfect for the 2rd person staying, and the fact there was wifi, a balcony, amazing location , what more could one ask for. Thanks Louise!

LOVED IT! Such an amazing apartment in a great location.
The host was great- we arrived to a fruit bowl and muesli. I could not recommend it more highly.
The listing was accurate, although the pictures were nice they don't reveal how lovely this place really is. Great location, friendly host, I would love to stay again.
Another lovely stay. Thanks Louise.

We loved our stay. The  apartment is super-stylish, quiet, relaxing and really well appointed with all the bits and pieces required to make it feel like a home from home (a superb bed AND fast wifi). The "welcome pack" of fruit, bread, milk and eggs with tea and coffee (Nespresso - thank you Louise!) were more than welcome for a couple of weary travellers. The apartment's location is perfect - smack-bang in the middle of Woollahra village with it's lovely shops, pubs and coffee places and a hop, skip and a jump into the CBD. It is perfectly located if you are planning to spend some time in the Eastern suburbs of Sydney.  To top it all off, Louise was very responsive and really helpful. Thanks a lot Louise, if you'll have us, we will be back the next time we are in Sydney.

We had a great stay in Woolahra. we enjoyed the beautifully designed flat and the convenience of living in walking distance of Queen Street and Centenial Park. Louise was a great host, meeting is on arrival, going through all the practicalities and popping by just when we left as well. The flat is well equipped, clean and comfortable.

Where do I start? The apartment was just lovely and the pictures really don't do it justice. Very spacious, plenty of luxurious little extras, spotlessly clean, comfy lounge and bed, great leafy secure courtyard with parking and a private sunny balcony. We had absolutely everything there that we could possibly want and really felt completely at home... which is saying a lot coming from a couple of fussy individuals like us. In addition, the thoughtful food items waiting for us was a pleasure and Louise's communication and consideration for us was really appreciated. It is just so nice to deal with someone that is so well organised and on top of things. Lastly, the location was just great. So surprisingly quiet... and we found some lovely restaurants and boutiques at our doorstep. I would love to come back sometime and stay a week to just relax and enjoy exploring the neighbourhood. Thanks Louise :)

It's been a lovely stay at Louise apartment. It is conveniently located with bus stops just a few blocks away, 20~30 mins to city centre and bondi beach. It's also very nice of Louise to offer the welcome pack full of fruits and bread and milk. The apartment is just as shown on the pictures, very spacious and stylish vintage furnitures. The area is quiet and safe, with very nice neighborhood. I already look forward to another stay at Louise apartment.

An incredible apartment. Imacculately presented, with stunning furniture and design throughout. A welcome pack including fridge essentials and fresh bread was provided, as well as bathroom shampoo, soap etc. Beautifully light-filled, my bridesmaids and I felt like royalty getting ready and the photos are sure to be amazing. Thanks for your hospitality, would recommend to any visitors to Sydney!!

I can not speak highly enough of Louise's apartment. If you are after the quintessential eastern suburbs stay and experience- this is it. Fabulous, roomy apartment in great location. Louise went out of her way to accomodate us at last minute and made us feel very welcome. Loved it. Robyn

Listing description if anything undersold how great this place was (it's a lot bigger than it appears in the photos, too).  Light, tasteful, airy and quiet, it was a great pleasure to stay here, and perfectly situated near Paddington/ Darlinghurst/ buses to Bondi beach etc. We loved our stay, and will stay again in the future.

I loved the apartment from the minute I parked the car in the car park. The entrance has been decorated beautifully and it takes your breath away. The apartment is upstairs and above a retail shop although you wouldn't know it. 
It is incredibly spacious, but cosy at the same time. 
The interior decoration is gorgeous and inviting plus it makes you feel like you are at home. The location is just fabulous and caters for everything. Local cafes for coffee in the morning, restaurants for dinner are walking distance, great retail shopping and local delicatessens. 
Centennial Park which is a great place to relax. 
and finally, when I arrived I found that Louise had left me fresh bread, a bottle of wine and some beautiful flowers. 
I would definitely recommend this property and would stay there again.

Our last minute stay at #84 was a delight, the experience was super easy from beginning to end and Sarah very responsive and welcoming. The very tasteful apartment was spotless and cosy at the same time, a real home from home. Woollahra we discovered is a neighbourhood filled with great shops, eateries and it also proved to be a super convenient part of town - for the CBD, the bays and also the beaches. Highly recommended!
The host canceled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We really loved the area and the apartment and would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone who is going to spend time in Sydney. The apartment was light and airy and had lots of space. Sarah was very helpful and her apartment is really well equipped and carefully prepared for guests.  Queen Street is full of lovely shops and restaurants and close to good buses to get you into the city centre or over to Bondi or other beaches.  Great location and beautifully turned out place.
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Spacious and clean, loved the kitchen and bathroom.    Sarah was kind enough to let us check in early, this is really a treat after flying for 17 hours!
Great place. Great location. Very clean.
A gorgeous, comfortable and spacious place. Our host was timely with all communication and quick to help. Thoroughly recommend and I will be back next time I’m in Sydney

Great apartment in great location. Woollahra is close to CBD, with great transport options; near Paddington with many fine restaurants and has great local stores for food, wine and other essentials.
Apartment is perfectly fitted out - new appliances, fully equipped kitchen, nice linens, quality functional furnishings and a nice tree surrounded balcony. In addition, it came set up with lovely toiletries, good basic food items and lovely flowers.
Sarah was an attentive, responsive host. She hand delivered an extra key, answered all our questions promptly and allowed us a late checkout when the apartment was free the day after we left. All good!

Sarah's apartment was fantastic and one of the best airbnb's we've stayed in. Beautiful apartment in a great location. Sarah was very communicative and our check-in/out was very easy. Breakfast groceries on a arrival was a really nice touch.

84 Queen is a gem of a property: well-located, well-decorated, well-lit, very spacious and very comfortable furnishings. We appreciated the thoughtful welcoming touches and Sarah's prompt replies when we reached out.
Everything was perfect and surpassed expectations... I can’t wait to stay there again!
This place is a knockout ... stylishly decorated really well located ... short walk to anything you need in upscale area ... just perfect no complaints will return
This is the 4th time I have stayed here and it never dissapoints.

name: Sugar Beach Resort 1BR Ground Floor Condo !
summary: The Sugar Beach Resort enjoys a beachfront setting fit for a postcard.
space: The property (including pool and hot tub) are steps from five miles of unobstructed white sand beach coastline. Guests love walking along the beach in the morning or at sunset to simply look for shells and gaze out over the ocean. Besides the close proximity to the ocean, the Sugar Beach Resort is also somewhat central on the island. You can drive to Lahaina/Kaanapali in about 25 minutes, the beaches of Wailea in 15 minutes, or to the north shore in 25 minutes. If you just want to hang around the property, you will have plenty of options for entertainment as well. Take a dip in the oceanfront pool or soothe the muscles in the hot tub. Practice your putting on the putting green. Grab some meat and grill up a lunch or dinner on the propane barbecue facilities and stop in to the Sandwitch Bar/Deli for a drink. Lastly stop in to the onsite activity desk to book an excursion around the island! This one bedroom/one bathroom ground floor condo is over 700 square feet with a sliding glass door

house_rules: Non Smoking Only Pets Not Allowed Wheelchair Inaccessible

host.host_about:
Aloha, 
We are Condominium Rentals Hawaii. We have been managing condo rentals in Hawaii for 35 years now and love welcoming our guests to the islands. We manage over 375 vacation rentals on Maui and Kauai and have been serving AirBNB guests for over 5 years now.

We encourage you to read our 300+ reviews left by AirBNB guests to learn more about our service and condos! 

If you have any questions about surf breaks, golf courses, restaurants, or tours on Maui, we can absolutely help you out. Maui no ka oi!

name: Amazing Upper West Side Loft-Studio
space: This is an Large Space - Loft Like (about 500 sqft) very Bright, updated and modern! There is a great Chef's Kitchen with Dinning area for the ones who love to cook! We have a queen size bed and a Folding Sofa - so we can accommodate up to 4 people! Only 1 flight up!  Very Quiet Street near to all the UWS attractions, Central Park and River side Park, all great groceries, restaurants and of course the Subways (1,2,3,B,C) are near by..
description: This is an Large Space - Loft Like (about 500 sqft) very Bright, updated and modern! There is a great Chef's Kitchen with Dinning area for the ones who love to cook! We have a queen size bed and a Folding Sofa - so we can accommodate up to 4 people! Only 1 flight up!  Very Quiet Street near to all the UWS attractions, Central Park and River side Park, all great groceries, restaurants and of course the Subways (1,2,3,B,C) are near by..
house_rules: No Pets or Smoking are allowed!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: My husband and I live here and love our apartment, you will find here all you need and we will be happy to provide you with everything that will create your stay perfect!

reviews.comments: We stayed for about a week in Karen's apartment and had a wonderful time. The place was bigger than anticipated and very clean which we highly valued. Karen and her husband were very helpful and easy to communicate with, both prior to our arrival and when we arrived. The apartment is located in a really nice place with shopping and dining oppurtunites close by and easy access to the metro. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice place on the Upper West Side.

My stay in Karen's studio was wonderful. The place was exactly as it appeared on photos. It was clean, well arranged and very quit. All what you need is available and is completely private. The Area outside is very quit and people are friendly. Restaurants, coffees, Cleaners, ATMs are on the Broadway that takes only 2 minutes walking to get there. Subway station is on 5 minutes walking distance that takes you everywhere you want. Ofer (Karen husband) was so kind cooperative and helpful and directly respond to my questions and inquiries. I had very beutiful stay in Karen studio and would definitely recommed it for you.

We had a wonderful 2 months! stay at Keren and Ofer's apartment. It's in a fantastic location in a really nice neighbourhood right next to the riverside park and very short walk from central park. Subway is 3 min walk as well as supermarkets, restaurants, shops, coffee shops and every thing else you can think about. The apt. is very comfortable, spacious and clean, it is exactly as described, and everything worked extremely well during the entire stay. It feels like home right away.The apartment's kitchen is very well equipped and you can make your own meals if you want easily. The street is very nice and quite all day long. Keren and her husband Ofer were great hosts! they are always easily contactable either by phone or face to face. They helped us a lot  with all we needed and  make our stay just perfect!
Would definitely recommend the apartment as well as  Keren and Ofer as great hosts. :)
It has been a real pleasure!
Thanks
Rani Dalit Tal and Yuval

Excellent host's. The accommodation was excellent and Karen and Ofer made sure my stay was perfect. They went out of their way to ensure everything I asked for was attended too. I will definitely stay with them again!

We had a great time at Karen and Ofer's appartment. (it is on the firts floor, so it's ot an attic.) Ofer was a very friendly and helpfull host. Because they have an appartment of their own we had the place to ourselves. We loved the neighbourhood, it is quiet and at the same time near Broadway and the subway. Everything we needed was there: clean towels, a nice bed, a  kitchen and a bathroom. Thanks!

Christina and I stayed in the apartment for all of April 2014.
It is very quiet, the neighbourhood very respectable with everything you need within 3 minutes walk.
We spent a lot of time at the Met Museum of Art.  The bus that goes there is 3 minutes walk away.  The subway is about the same; very convenient. 
The natural history museum is 10 minutes walk.
There is also the best cinema in town 6 minutes away.  We live in a rural town; a big superduper cinema is great.
The apartment is clean and light; plenty of cable TV; very usable kitchen.
The bed is just fine.
We would stay again.

Perfect stay.  Keren and Ofer were super helpful in accommodating my schedule to pick up the keys (as well as returning the keys after I accidentally took of with one set).  Their place was clean and exactly what I was hoping for.  As an Airbnb host it was great to see some of the things they do that I could do to make my home more comfortable in the future.  

In addition, it turns out Keren is a real estate broker and I was looking for an apartment.  Keren ended up helping me look for a place to stay so I got to know her even more.  I would certainly recommend staying at their place.

Thanks to Karen and this relaxing and cozy apartment, I really enjoyed my stay in a great Upper West Side Location. The apartment was well equipped for this cold winter, but I imagine its natural light in Spring must be sublime. I really appreciated Karen's hospitality and the included amenities.
Nice place, good host.

Apartment and service were great.  I stayed here from Aug 15 - Sep 19, while I was waiting for my permanent place I was moving into to be ready, and then when it got delayed, Karen and Ofer were extremely helpful and able to extend my stay from Sep 19 to Oct 6.  I am moving to the UES, so while in transition I decided to give the UWS side a try.  The apartment is on 89th between West End and Riverside, quiet and beautiful street, right down the block from Riverside Park and the Soldiers and Sailors Memorial.  Dog park and jogging path along the water right down the stairs.  86 Street 1 train is just a few blocks away, and plenty of good eating right down the block (Carmine's, Vino e Cibo, Little Mermaid).   Love the neighborhood, and after staying here I wish I had considered an apartment in this neighborhood...  Karen and Ofer were extremely responsive on AirBNB and text.  The studio faces the back courtyard of the building (no direct access) so it is very quiet, though a little shady during the day (not dark, but you can't quite tell if it is cloudy or not).  Despite being a studio, it is spacious, and is furnished with plenty of cooking tools, dishes, etc if you are cooking.  Overall highly recommend, whether you are looking for temporary housing like I needed, or just visiting the City for a vacation, and want to check out the Upper West Side this is a great place / location / hosts.

Karen was a great host!  Check-in was convenient and she worked with my schedule which I appreciated.  The studio is so spacious, I was very comfortable for the month I was there.  Everything was as described except it was larger than it looked in the pictures, a very nice surprise!   There was plenty of room to spread out, have meals, enjoy the TV, lounge and the bathroom was very nice.  There was a great closet with plenty of towels and linens.  Everything about the studio was clean and in good repair.
The studio is located in a wonderful walking neighborhood.  I was travelling at night to and from school and felt very secure coming and going.  There are also many great restaurants in the area that deliver!
I highly recommend Karen as a host and the studio as a great place to stay.

The apartment is just like the pictures.
Very spacious and has everything we needed for our 1 month stay.
We felt home.
Tv and wifi works perfectly.
Location couldn't be better. I would say that this is the best neighborhood in Manhattan. 
And the apartment is in the best block.
It is a family neighborhood I would say. Very quiet and super safe, even at night.
Central park was a short walk and riverside park was just one block away.
I didn't met Karen, but we had a person to walk us in and Ofer, her husband came when we had to leave.
He was super nice. 
And they even helped us with our luggage since we had a flight later on the same day. It helped a lot, so we didn't have to carry those heavy luggages through the city. It was great.
I definitely recommend it.

name: Huge bedroom in luxurious apartment
summary: Located on the Upper East Side/Spanish Harlem.  24/7 Doorman elevator building, located on a very quiet block.  Luxury amenities throughout, very comfy queen bed and a couch that could fit one.  Unit is 2 BR and 1 bath, your room is private.
description: Located on the Upper East Side/Spanish Harlem.  24/7 Doorman elevator building, located on a very quiet block.  Luxury amenities throughout, very comfy queen bed and a couch that could fit one.  Unit is 2 BR and 1 bath, your room is private.
house_rules: building is quiet by 11 pm.  Just be respectful.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: A typical food and spirit loving New York'r, enjoy working too many hours and exploring the greatest city in the land.

reviews.comments: Collin is a great guy. Easy going communication. Always on top of things. Makes you feel comfortable.
My experience at Collin's apartment was great! The bedroom is spacious and located near Harlem which is very cool! Highly recommend for anyone who comes to MYC

name: Furnished Nolita Studio
summary: This studio apartment in Nolita, Manhattan is in the heart of downtown -- close to the B/D/F/M/6/N/R trains. The apartment will be furnished with a queen-sized bed, a desk , a sofa, flat-screen television, and internet / Netflix.
description: This studio apartment in Nolita, Manhattan is in the heart of downtown -- close to the B/D/F/M/6/N/R trains. The apartment will be furnished with a queen-sized bed, a desk , a sofa, flat-screen television, and internet / Netflix. Located north of Little Italy, Nolita was originally considered part of Little Italy but has gradually lost most of its recognizable Italian character. As trendy restaurants, bars and boutiques popped up in Nolita’s winding streets, the area started developing a separate identity from the surrounding neighborhoods. Similar to SoHo, Nolita is known for its architecture and “hip” reputation. However, Nolita lacks the high density of tourists that flock to its neighbors, allowing for a more local feel. Known for its fashionable retail, young residents and expensive apartments, Nolita is slowly splitting from its association with SoHo and Little Italy, maturing into a full-fledged neighborhood. The B/D/F/M/6/N/R trains are within 5 mins walk.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am an avid traveller who understands how important it is to have a central, comfortable, and safe place to come home to after a day of adventure.

I'm interested in guests that are fun, respectful, and willing to explore the great restaurants, bars, and other attractions in NYC.

name: cozy house and garden in the heart of Montréal
summary: House at the heart of Montréal. Cosy apartment, 2 bedrooms, one living room, calme street, close to Downtown, the Plateau-Mt Royal and Hochelaga. Métro, café and stores 10m away. A HUGE garden. Cat present! :)
space: I would be happy to welcome you to my humble, yet cozy house. It has a huge big garden in the back. The bathroom is new and you can enjoy 1 queen bed and another double one, plus a couch ideal for "sièste". I also have a cat that would have to stay with you, but she's not demanding and really nice to people.  The neighbourhood is quiet and close to the more moving, artsy streets like Mont-Royal, Laurier, Ontario, Downtown, etc. Querky cafés, croissants (the best in Montréal) and bars are close by, together with "poutine-fries" places and Parc Lafontaine. Enjoy Montréal!
description: I would be happy to welcome you to my humble, yet cozy house. It has a huge big garden in the back. The bathroom is new and you can enjoy 1 queen bed and another double one, plus a couch ideal for "sièste". I also have a cat that would have to stay with you, but she's not demanding and really nice to people.  The neighbourhood is quiet and close to the more moving, artsy streets like Mont-Royal, Laurier, Ontario, Downtown, etc. Querky cafés, croissants (the best in Montréal) and bars are close by, together with "poutine-fries" places and Parc Lafontaine. Enjoy Montréal! I have placed a special written guide in order for you to feel at home. :)
interaction: I have placed a special written guide in order for you to feel at home. :)

host.host_about: Je suis originaire de Roumanie, maintenant à Montréal depuis 8 ans. Je suis infirmière, reconvertie après une mini-carrière dans les festivals de cinéma montréalais. J'aime partager et rencontrer de nouvelles personnes.

reviews.comments:
Teodora was a great host! She contacted me before we arrived to prepare us for the checking in process. She was very accommodating our rushed arrival (we had dinner res.!) and had a great printout regarding any questions we might have about her home. 

We really enjoyed her cat Tsitsou. I have a cat allergy but she was so friendly and hospitable that I even managed to give her a few good pats. Teodora's place is very clean, so my allergic reaction was minimal. 

The location is great. It's less than a 10 min walk to the Metro and very easy to find street parking. We enjoyed the garden space very much. We sat out there one late afternoon and felt as though we were truly Montreal residents!

One suggestion I make (which is NOT a deal breaker) is perhaps a small fan in the guest room. The windows are not very big, and we kept the door closed, to keep Tsitsou out, and it got stuffy pretty quickly. 

I will be giving Teodora a 10/10 and we hope to come back to visit soon!
On a eu un excellent séjour chez (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison est jolie et accueillante et elle a tout ce qu'on a besoin...en plus elle est proche de tout!

Teodora was very friendly and showed us around her home and garden. Her home was in the perfect spot and it was very easy to get around in her neighborhood. Her home was very clean and exceeded our expectations. It was the perfect place to stay for a few nights!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic place and host, Teodora was very helpful listing some great places for us to checkout. Would certainly come back again! Tsi-Tsu was also adorable and great company

name: HAPPY TO HELP YOU
summary: HUGE BEDROOMS WITH NICE BEDS,TV,INTERNET,WINDOWS AND SHARE BALCONY EXTREMELY CLEAN,VERY GAY FRIENDLY,BEST PLACE IN ISTANBULSAFE ALSO NISANTASI..CENTER OF ISTANBUL,U CAN WALK,METRO,BUS,VERY SIMPLE

name: Cottage on Kona Coffee Farm
summary: Imagine an free-standing hotel room shrouded in tropical foliage, Cottage and Bathroom epitomizes the Hawaiian experience loaded with everything you need for an peaceful recharge.. The Cottage featuring an comfy & plush KING sized bed.
