neighborhood_overview: Leblon is considered one of the best neighborhoods in Rio. The apartment is located in a set of buildings whose accesses are made by dead-end streets and monitored by private security. The neighborhood is served by vast commerce, besides the Shopping Leblon and Rio Design Center. Other attractions in the neighborhood are restaurants, theatres, cinemas and beach. The apartment is also close to Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas and the Botanical Garden. Nearby subway stations will be inaugurated in August 2016.
notes: We offer our guests the Personal Chef service, which consists of having a chef at your disposal to prepare a special dinner, without you having to do a thing. Just book with us!
transit: This neighborhood allows us to do everything by foot. There are taxis and buses just a few metres away. The building has private garage and external parking.
access: Guests can access all premises in the apartment.
interaction: Guests can contact me via email or (Hidden by Airbnb) anytime during your stay.
house_rules: Trata-se de prédio residencial familiar, de modo que não é permitido festas e barulho, especialmente no período noturno. Não é permitido fumar no interior do apartamento.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A Patrícia esteve sempre disponível para nos ajudar, com muito carinho. O apartamento tem localização excelente, perto de shoppings, teatro, ótimos restaurantes e supermercado. Tudo no apartamento estava muito limpo. Enfim, foi uma ótima estadia!

Já é a segunda vez que alugo apto para passar férias em julho com minha família e cada vez gosto mais. A localização é perfeita, o apto super bem conservado e limpo, além de muito bem equipado. Não poderia ser mais adequado às Minhas necessidades.

Very nice place to stay!!!!

Patrícia recebeu minha família de forma muito simpática!!!! O apartamento estava em plena ordem e limpo. Os quartos têm camas confortáveis, com armários. A região é muito tranquila, numa rua particular muito perto da Lagoa e da praia... Recomendo com certeza !!!
A Patrícia, anfitriã, foi muito gentil e atenciosa. Lugar excelente!! Localização maravilhosa! Voltaremos, com certeza!! Recomendo!!

A estadia foi ótima , o apartamento é exatamente como as fotos mostram . E limpo , arejado e muito bem localizado .
A Patrícia é muito gentil e atenciosa.
Excelente!

Agradecida por la hospitaludad, que nos brindo cumplio con todo lo esperado, el dpto esta completo para venir en familia , el lugar muy tranquilo, es amplio el espacio y cuenta con todo en cocina y lavadora, camas muy comodas, es como dice el anuncio tal cual , todo cerca playa, shoping , super , taxi y tranquilidad. 
Me retito muy contenta en mi estadia y regreso pronto a mi pais Chileno.

Apto em ótima localização, limpo e confortável para 6 pessoas.
Patricia é muito atenciosa.
Adoramos a estadia!

Great location near Shopping Leblon, Leblon beach, Ipanaema beach and Lagoa. Felt quite safe there day and night. Leafy streets well lit at night. Spacious apartment for 6 people. View of the Christ Redeemer out of one of the bedroom windows. Master bedroom bed very comforatble. Other double room bed rather old and not so comfortble. Aircons noisy in that room too but fan also available. Kitchen well equipped and good washing machine and drying racks. Lounge had good comfortable furniture and large dining table. Wi-fi worked well. Only issue we had was part of the tiling in the kitchen spontaneously cracked and broke leaving the doorway into the kitchen with a very uneven entrance. Host provided a tarpaulin and offered us two free extra nights which made up for the inconvenience, an offer we were able to take up. Communication with host was through (Hidden by Airbnb) .

A Patrícia é muito gentil, prestativa e carinhosa. Nós nos sentimos muito a vontade, o apartamento era exatamente como o anuncio, super bem localizado com tudo o que era necessário, limpeza impecável. Adoramos a nossa estadia!!!

Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa! Apto limpo, confortável, seguro e bem localizado, o que nos permitiu fazer a maioria das coisas a pé. 
Recomendo!

name: Midillis 202 (Double Room)
summary: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul.
space: The pleasantly decorated room has two single beds and satellite television. WiFi is complimentary. The room has air-conditioning and heating. All bed linen is supplied. The bathroom with a shower also has a hairdryer supplied.
description: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul. The pleasantly decorated room has two single beds and satellite television. WiFi is complimentary. The room has air-conditioning and heating. All bed linen is supplied. The bathroom with a shower also has a hairdryer supplied. In addition to your room you also have access to a common kitchen area and terrace on our top floor with stunning Bosphorus views. We run a travel agent from the same premises so can offer you the best advice for how to see the sights of Istanbul, suggest tours and trips in Istanbul and farther afield. We also run a coffee shop from the premises. We are ten minutes walk from the Sultanahmet tram station. From there you can reach all parts of Istanbul on public transport.
transit: We are ten minutes walk from the Sultanahmet tram station. From there you can reach all parts of Istanbul on public transport.
access: In addition to your room you also have access to a common kitchen area and terrace on our top floor with stunning Bosphorus views.
interaction: We run a travel agent from the same premises so can offer you the best advice for how to see the sights of Istanbul, suggest tours and trips in Istanbul and farther afield. We also run a coffee shop from the premises.

reviews.comments: The house is really near to the main sightseeings of istanbul old city, with a nice terrace. The hosts are confortable and polite. I had really good time and was glad choosing Kamuran's flat.

Kamuran is very kind host. She gave us full information and support us all the way from airport to the end of our trip. Apartment looks smaller than on photo but it's very clean and light. Looks like new shower installed in the room.  Absolutely unbelievable  view from terrace: one side is Blue Mosque, another is seaside. This apartment lefts only positive emotion for us. Just 2 min walk and you are in the heart of the Old sity. Very suitable for peoples who first time in Istanbul. 
P.S. Be ready for morning praying  in the Blue  Mosque )

Nice and simple room. Good central location in Sultanahmad. Just a short walk to the blue mosque and Hajia Sofia through a nice bazar. The rooms facing the street side are a bit noisy from the street traffic, so if you want a quite room, get the ones facing the garden. There is a washer and a small kitchen upstairs that you can use, and it connects to a terrace. Kamuran welcomed us when we got there and showed us our room. She's usually in the travel agency office downstairs so you can reach her easily if you need anything and get some recommendations on what to do or where to go. Word of advice, don't use their airport transfer car because it's more expensive then just getting a taxi from the airport (taxis run about 50 TL to Sultanahmed and their car transfer is 20$ which is about 72 TL ). We also had to wait 30 minutes outside the airport for the driver to pick us up.

Все было круто, расположение отличное, единственное что полотенца за 3 дня ни разу не поменяли и дверь тонкая, что если кто то ночью ходил- я просыпался. А так за эти деньги просто супер, уютно было очень, все очень чисто, в ванной все выбелено было. Женщина очень приятная, разрешила багаж оставить у нее, пока мы полдня гуляли по городу. Спасибо ей огромное!)
Molt correcte! Hem estat molt cómodes. I el servici per part dels anfitrions ha estat mol amable. Habitació recomanable 100%

We booked this room for 5 days because we wanted to split our visit to Istanbul between the Sultanahmet area and the Taksim area. But as soon as we got here, we knew that this is where we wanna be and so extended our stay. The emplacement of this place is just PERFECT. We have walked all over from here, the metro stop is also close. There is a small kitchen and laundry place on the roof, which was great. Also the view is beautiful. ONE small inconvenience would be the morning noises from the street, but that didn't keep us from having a great stay here. I recommend it, and would certainly stay here again if I ever visit Istanbul again!

We had an amazing time at one of the rooms rented by Kamuran , when we saw the place for the first time we were surprise by the view on the blue mosque and the sea from the roof terrace ,we were having our breakfasts here and enjoying a beer/ wine in the night. The room was very clean we had everything ,even a shower gels and hairdryer, iron,washing machine,we could stuck over food in the fridge that was very useful. During our stay it was very hot in Istanbul so air-conditioning was a life saviour. For all the questions we had about where to go and how to get we got the most detailed explanation,me and my boyfriend couldn't imagine best host then that. All the problems you might possibly have with the room will be solved in a blink of an eye! Location was more then just great, Sultanahmet is the best district to have all the points of interest around you, Hagia Sofia 10min,Blue mosque 7 min ,tram station 8min,lots of place to eat around, only be weary Turkish people(sellers/restaurants) cheat the whole time ,don't order a beer in the restaurant without asking the price ,don't pick up a brush from the shoe cleaning man when he dropped it,in Istanbul is a lot of scam is going on!

Location is just awesome, it's really 2 min walk to Blue Mosque. Many shops, cafes, markets are nearby, which is so much convenient. Approximately 7-10 min walk to tram stop, also so cool. And it's a magnificent atmosphere there. We already miss this place. Host are so nice people, which will be glad to help you with everything. The view from the top is amazing. The room is small, but very clean and cozy. There are candles in rooms which make chill and warm atmosphere. Highly recommend to my friends and will definitely cone back again!
Great location. Easy to walk to many areas of Istanbul

Es war einfach richtig schön und vor allem richtig sauber!! 
Ich würde immer wieder dahin gehen. 
Auch in der Straße, die Menschen sind sehr Freundlich und man wird immer begrüßt wenn man aus dem Haus geht.
Wir hatten alles in der Nähe und konnten auch zu der Bahn in dem wir nur 3 minuten gelaufen sind.

It‘s location is very good, nice view, near to shops and restaurants and Sultanahmet (with a great view of this beautiful mosque). It’s rooftop is great! We loved it. Ardal, the man in the small café downstairs was really nice and kind and trying to help. 
It could be a great place to stay only if it becomes a bit cleaner. The walls need painting and a small repair, and the linens need to be changed!

All in all AMAZING!!
Super nice people welcoming you! Super central, but still quite. Super view. Super service. Just great. I recommend this place to everybody!

La vista de la habitación es espectacular!... y la ubicación es cercana a la estación del metro. 
la estacia fue bastante buena

It was amazing week in great accommodation - clean, cozy, great view from rooftop and very convenient location in the center of Istanbul. We had a great Blue Mosque view from window and it was fantastic and authentic experience.

Lovely lovely stay @ Kamurans!!! The place was clean and well stocked with necessities (everything exactly like in photos).
Istanbul was amazing but I think staying here made it all that much better. Great location, safe, exciting.  Everything was perfect.
The terrace is amazing, I will never forget the view.
这个离清真寺很近,出行特别方便,开始我开始是靠马路的房间,有点吵,跟房东说了,房东很贴心的帮我换了,我行李很沉,帮我提上提下,真的很感谢
Thanks you for everything, it was a perfect week end in Istanbul!
Clean and very nice hospitable hosts
Great place to stay!
This was an amazing stay. Clean, comfortable, and very close to Hagia Sophia and Blue mosque. Perfect!
Прекрасне помешкання в самісінькому історичному центрі. Дуже чисто, затишно, гарний інтер'єр і гостинні хазяї.
有大件行李的朋友们就不建议住这了 因为楼梯不太好走 但房间的确很好看 风景也好 地点也好 赞!
Kamuran's place has an unbeatable location, is clean, private, and comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay.

The place is literally great! It’s located next to Blue Mosque and everything else very close to the apartment. Room looks exactly how it’s on the picture. I’d love to visit Istanbul and definitely will choose the same place to stay.

name: Lulapartment II
summary: Apartamento situado no centro histórico do Porto, paredes meias com a muralha Fernandina, em pleno bairro típico Portuense, com uma vista soberba!!! Recuperado e decorado com o objectivo de tornar confortável a estadia dos nossos hospedes.
space: Apartamento recuperado no centro histórico do Porto, detentor de uma vista soberba sobre o Jardim da Cordoaria, Palácio da justiça, Rio Douro,.. O apartamento foi decorado com o objectivo de trazer conforto a quem nos visita, o estilo que o caracteriza é jovem e fresco!  O apartamento tem uma varanda e uma marquise. O lulapartment II está a 2 minutos da emblemática Torre dos Clérigos, a 10 minutos a pé da Zona Ribeirinha e das Caves do Vinho do Porto, a 3 minutos das Galerias Paris (zona de bares e restaurantes). A zona onde está inserido o apartamento está muito bem servida de serviços desde transportes públicos (metro, autocarro, táxis, comboio), hospitais e farmácias, mercados e comércio de rua.
description: Apartamento situado no centro histórico do Porto, paredes meias com a muralha Fernandina, em pleno bairro típico Portuense, com uma vista soberba!!! Recuperado e decorado com o objectivo de tornar confortável a estadia dos nossos hospedes. Apartamento recuperado no centro histórico do Porto, detentor de uma vista soberba sobre o Jardim da Cordoaria, Palácio da justiça, Rio Douro,.. O apartamento foi decorado com o objectivo de trazer conforto a quem nos visita, o estilo que o caracteriza é jovem e fresco!  O apartamento tem uma varanda e uma marquise. O lulapartment II está a 2 minutos da emblemática Torre dos Clérigos, a 10 minutos a pé da Zona Ribeirinha e das Caves do Vinho do Porto, a 3 minutos das Galerias Paris (zona de bares e restaurantes). A zona onde está inserido o apartamento está muito bem servida de serviços desde transportes públicos (metro, autocarro, táxis, comboio), hospitais e farmácias, mercados e comércio de rua. Os nossos hospedes têm acesso ao apartamento por com
neighborhood_overview: O Lulapartment II está inserido num bairro típico do Porto, onde se vive e respira a vida da cidade e das suas gentes! Pode usufruir de todo o comércio local, deleitar-se com as iguarias gastronómicas, da história presente em todos os edifícios, de sentir o pulsar da cidade!
transit: A zona onde está inserido o Lulapartment II está muito bem servido de transportes públicos, estamos perto da estação de São Bento, da estação de metro, de paragens de táxis e de autocarros.
access: Os nossos hospedes têm acesso ao apartamento por completo!
interaction: Um dos nossos objectivos é receber bem, por conseguinte estamos disponíveis para qualquer necessidade ou eventualidade que possa surgir!
house_rules: Esperamos que os nossos hospedes respeitem a nossa casa! Que respeitem os nossos vizinhos, não fazendo ruído após as 22h. Que levem o lixo embora. Que não fumem dentro de casa (fumar nas varandas). Que deixem o apartamento como o encontraram!

host.host_about:
Olá!!! 
Somos um casal, pais de três crianças! Adoramos viajar!
Gostamos de viajar a dois, em família e com amigos.
Somos proprietários de dois apartamentos no centro do Porto, todos os requisitos que procuramos quando viajamos, temos nos nossos apartamentos, conforto, limpeza, baby friendly, e centralidade!
Esperemos que gostem!
Sejam bem-vindos!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Apartamento muy bien situado en el centro de Oporto. Excelente relación calidad-precio.

Cristina´s apartment is great, very well located. The apartment is even better than the photos, very new with excellent decoration, with lots of natural light. Cristina was waiting for us with his husband and children. They were so friendly.  She also left us some typical portuguese cakes. I strongly recommend Cristina´s place.

El apartamento está situado en pleno centro del casco histórico de Oporto. Cerca de la torre de los Clérigos. Lugar privilegiado. 
Dejamos el coche los 3 días aparcado en la misma calle y andando a todos los.sitios 
Las vistas desde varias ventanas estupendas 
Todo el apartamento equipado, cuidado, recogido. 
La única pega es que es un cuarto sin ascensor

Un bel appartement bien placé, cosy et fonctionnel à proximité de l'emblème de la ville - la tour des Clérigos.
Rénovation récente et décoration sympa.
Equipement adapté à une famille (nous étions 5 et n'avons pas manqué de couverts par exemple).
Petite épicerie à 2 pas, bien pratique. Restaurants au pied de l'immeuble.
Cristina aux petits soins pour nous.

Tout c'est bien passé , Cristina était disponible pour nous !
Appartement très beau , bien placé proche Metro sao Bento ... N'hésitez pas à y aller!

The apartment was exactly like the pictures show. It was clean and really lovely decorated. Cristina was very fast in her replies via email. The apartment is in a great location, you can walk everywhere.
Nice and well located appartment.was perfect with our three children.
A localização é excelente e o apartamento é super aconchegante e confortável. Cristina é uma excelente anfitriã. Sem dúvida recomendarei o apartamento para os meus amigos e familiares.

Très bon séjour à Porto.
Accueil chaleureux.
Appartement très propre, fraîchement refait et bien situé.
Un délicieux restaurant de cuisine traditionnelle juste à l'angle de la rue, à seulement 20 mètres.
Pour ceux qui ont le sommeil léger, rue bruyante le samedi soir.
Je recommande sans hésitation !

Bel accueil de la part de Cristina qui était là à notre arrivée pour nous aider à nous installer et à découvrir cette très jolie ville qu'est Porto ... merci beaucoup ...
l'appartement est merveilleusement bien situé, et très bien équipé, parfois un peu bruyant mais c'est sans doute le prix à payer vu sa situation en ville
le quatrième étage sans ascenseur complète bien les dénivelés importants lors des balades dans Porto !!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Christina. L'appartement est idéalement situé dans Porto, près de tout et de quartier sympas. Il est conforme aux images et à la description, lumineux, propre, et agréable. Christina et son mari nous ont très bien accueillis en dépit d'un petit raté sur l'horaire d'arrivée, on les remercie. Elle nous a offert tout ce qu'il fallait pour notre petit garçon: poussette, lit bébé, chaise haute, l'appartement est donc très bien équipé pour les enfants en bas âges (même si le notre à grandit vite entre la reservation et la venue, et n'a donc pas tout utilisé !).
Nous les remercions encore chaleureusement et conseillons ce pied à terre Porto.

Cristina's apartment was an oasis in the desert except the desert was the continuous rain in Porto. We were so grateful that there was space heaters so we'd be able to dry our clothes. 

The apartment location is exactly has advertised: close to everything. Another plus is the proximity of an underground parking garage (15€/day, ask the attendant for coupons). 

We were a family of 4 adults. We found the apartment very well equipped and very spacious. It was clean and everything was in good order. Showers were hot with plenty of pressure. There is a second WC and with 3 women in our group it's a bonus. 

Cristina was a joy to communicate with and she answered all of our questions very rapidly. She was waiting for us when we got there with a smile even though we were late getting there. 

We hope to return one day to Porto to experience it without the rain and we will be staying at Cristina's place again most certainly.

Thank you Cristina for welcoming us!

La gran ventaja del apartamento Lula II es su situación en pleno centro histórico. Es un apartamento luminoso acabado de reformar, las fotografías reflejan fielmente la realidad. Es un 4º piso sin ascensor, pero las escaleras se suben muy fácilmente y eso no fue ningún problema para nosotros. La entrega del piso fue cordial, un poco rápida porque nuestro avión llegó con más de 1 hora de retraso ...
 Es un apartamento muy práctico para pernoctar. 
Cristina contesta rápidamente a todas tus preguntas y cuestiones.
No horário marcado, fomos bem recebidos e tivemos ajuda para subir as escadas com as malas. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, organizado e bonito.

Accueillies à l'heure par le mari de Cristina, nous avons découvert un appartement tel qu'il était décrit : 2 chambres donnant sur la rue, une cuisine, un séjour.... Le tout avec une décoration actuelle ! Tout est propre, bien entretenu. Nous y avons bien dormi et étions ravies de retrouver "notre" appartement chaque fin de journée.
Le quartier est très sympa, à 2 pas de la Torre de los Clérigos et de nombreux petits restos traditionnels ! Nous vous conseillons le restaurant à tapas juste au pied de l'immeuble, en sortant à gauche.

The apartment was clean and comfortable. Housekeeping services were a great amenity providing fresh towels/sheets and cleaning weekly.Access to the trams and metro were nearby taking you to the beautiful sights all around Porto. We highly recommend this apartment!
Great location, the apartment was beyond adorable and spacious enough for 5-6 people.  Cristina was very friendly and welcoming and we had a fantastic time in Porto.
Everything went perfect, according to announcement. The apartment is very well located, very central but also quiet. Cristina is really really nice and easygoing. No complaints at all.
Muy amables y muchos detalles.
Very clean appartment, well located. Cristina is very welcoming and cares about all details to make her hosts feeling good ! I recommand this stay ! I hope to come back soon.

Cristina's place was beautiful and charming! The location was great and was right in the core of old Porto - Victoria Park. There are plenty of restaurants within a 5-10 min walking distance and a quick 20 minute walk to the Douro riverside where everything is hustling and bustling! Had the most amazing time and Cristina was very accommodating and gave many suggestions. Her place is clean, spacious and we felt right at home. Thanks for a great time!

Cristina arranged for her sister in law to meet us who was lovely and waited for an hour as we had got lost. It is comfortable, clean and in a good location, we even got parking in the street. Only thing you need to be prepared to walk up LOTS of stairs, as they are the top floor.

The apartment is very convenient for a family: well equipped and located near the heart of the historical center. The decor is modern and pleasant in each room. The only drawbacks we had were the noise from the town during the night (not so much) and the renovation of the facade of the building during the day. Obviously, it is a good choice to discover Porto. Cristina was very helpful and we really enjoy our stay in her apartment.

Casa pulita e molto accogliente, Cristina e Luís sono stati gentilissimi è sempre pronti a rispondere alle nostre richieste. La casa è in pieno centro, davvero comodissima per visitare Porto a piedi. Con un po' di fortuna (noi l'abbiamo avuta) potrete lasciare l'auto proprio fuori dal portone e dedicarvi alla visita di questa splendida città. Torneremmo senza alcun dubbio e ci sentiamo di sicuro di raccomandare la casa a una famiglia con figli.

Nous avons réservé cet appartement pour notre famille de 5, avec nos enfants de 2, 5 et 7 ans. Un imprévu nous a fait arriver 45 minutes en retard, quelques minutes avant le début de la finale de l'Euro à laquelle participait le Portugal; mais Christina nous attendait, avant d'aller rejoindre la foule de supporteurs au parc avoisinant.
L'appartement est tel que décrit dans les nombreuses photos. Très propre, bien aéré, bien éclairé.
Il nous a été très facile d'y dormir, l'endroit est habituellement très calme la nuit. La seule exception fut lors de la victoire du Portugal, où les gens klaxonnaient leur joie toute la nuit dans toute la ville. Cependant, il a suffit d'ouvrir le divan-lit dans la salle à manger et d'y déplacer quelques matelas pour dormir très paisiblement, une fois les portes des chambres fermées. Les rénovations en cours sur la façade ne nous ont pas incommodées.
Christina a été très accueillante, nous laissant un parc pour bébé et une poussette pour notre séjour, en plus de la chaise pour bébé.
Lits et oreillers sont confortables, tout fonctionne très bien.
Les nuits sont fraîches même en juillet, donc il n'y a pas besoin d'air climatisé.
L'appartement est très bien situé, quelques minutes à pied suffisent à rejoindre les restaurants et emplacements intéressants. Pour faire changement, il y a d'ailleurs un excellent restaurant mozambiquais sur la rue à l'arrière de l'appartement.
Il est au 4ième étage, alors il faut faire un petit exercice pour amener les valises, mais mieux vaut s'y habituer de toute façon pour explorer Porto! Par contre, il n'y a personne au dessus, et nous n'avons pas été gênés par les bruits des voisins, tout l'immeuble semble assez bien insonorisé.
La télévision et l'internet fonctionnent bien.
Il y a aussi une structure de jeux dans le parc avoisinant, un atout pour les jeunes enfants (et une rareté dans les centre-villes). Plusieurs autobus arrêtent à quelques minutes de marche, dont plusieurs circuits touristiques (mais pas de bruit de bus).
En bref, un très bon appartement, on s'y sent comme à la maison.
Muy bien situado y muy buena decoracion.
Cristina and her husband are really helpful and friendly. The apartment is clean, spacious and well located. We would be happy to stay in this apartment again.
Splendid place for a citytrip

Que dire sur cet appartement!!! Il est juste trop mignon très propre et très spacieux. Cerise sur le gâteau il est situé en plein centre ville on peut faire le tour de Porto à pied pas besoin de prendre les transports. Seule regret je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Cristina car c'est son mari qui nous a accueilli qui a été très gentil et serviable avec nous. Malgré ça Cristina a toujours été présente et nous envoyait tout le temps dès message. À notre arrive à l'appartement Cristina avait laissé pleins de petits mots de bienvenue trop mignons!!!  Je recommande vivement cet appartement.
Cristina estuvo siempre dispuesta para ayudarnos y muy flexible para entrar y salir.

Logement fidèle à la description , hôte très accueillant, endroit propre et bien entretenu. Idéal pour un petit séjour à Porto. Juste un petit peu de bruit pour dormir car il y a du simple vitrage. Sinon c'est parfait !

Cristina nos recibió en el apartamento, incluso estuvo pendiente de la llegada de la compra que habíamos hecho en el supermercado a través de internet. Fue muy amable con nosotros, nos hizo sentir como invitados y fue un gran placer conocerla. Antes del viaje nos facilitó toda la información que le pedimos y estuvo siempre atenta para ayudarnos en lo que pudiéramos necesitar, respondiendo a todas nuestras dudas o consultas.

Cristina a été une super hôtesse, que ce soit avant notre arrivée pour répondre à nos interrogations ou le jour même pour nous faciliter l'arrivée (elle nous a gentiment permis de déposer nos bagages bien avant l'heure de check-in, ce qui a changé notre journée!). Nous avons pu faire rapidement connaissance, et elle est aussi agréable et souriante que le laissaient espérer ses messages.
L'appartement est charmant, bien rénové, propre, et selon moi très bien placé, juste à côté de la Tour des Clérigos, à deux pas du quartier de Baixa, de la bibliothèque Lello, et à quelques minutes de tout le reste. C'est un très bon point de départ pour profiter de cette superbe ville. Merci beaucoup Cristina !!!

Fidèle à ce que nous retiendrons de l'accueil portugais durant toutes nos vacances, Cristina est une personne extrêmement sympathique et chaleureuse.  Nous sommes arrivés en retard car, par négligence, nous nous sommes fiés à l'adresse indiquée sur le site et non aux indications données par Cristina dans son message, Cristina a été d'une grande patience et nous a même trouvé une place de stationnement juste en face de l'immeuble. L'appartement tient toutes ses promesses et son emplacement est top. Nous avons tout fait à pieds... Durant notre séjour, le petit bar en face a été assez bruyant les vendredi et samedi jusqu'au petit matin mais nous avions prévu les boules Quies ce que je recommande, le reste du temps c'était calme. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cette magnifique ville de Porto. Une belle balade à vélo (à louer au pied du pont Luis - petite entreprise créée par un ancien de chez Decathlon) le long des plages côté Lavadores et Espinho restera un moment aussi inoubliable que tous les sublimes monuments historiques et la fameuse Ribeira. A noter une bonne pasteleria sur la place près de la torre clerigos ou un peu plus bas dans la rue mais fermée en cette fin août et une petite épicerie en descendant la rue gauche et encore gauche.
Really perfect flat with perfect position! And the flat is the same with pictures. We really enjoy the stay in Porto!

Um belíssimo apartamento em uma das melhores localizações da cidade, há apenas alguns metros da famosa Torre dos Clérigos. O apartamento é bem equipado, com ótimo wi-fi e camas bem confortáveis. Cristina também foi uma ótima anfitriã dando dicas preciosas na nossa chegada. Ideal para quem quer conhecer os locais turísticos do Porto.
thank you cristina.we had a great time in Porto and your lovely apartment. everything was perfect!!!

Nous avons réserver le Lulapartment pour 7 copines en City-Trip de trois jours à Porto. C'est le logement idéal si vous comptez visiter et beaucoup sortir de votre appartement, il est à proximité de tout (métro, magasins, musées, bâtiments historiques, endroits incontournables de Porto). 
De plus Christina et son mari nous ont réservé un accueil plus que chaleureux et ont répondu à nos demandes et questions avec une grande gentillesse. 
A recommander !

very nice apartment and well located, small inconveniant  noisy night 
Cristina and his husband were welcoming and warm
the apartment possesses everything to feel at home
very good stay :)

Cristina was very friendly and did everything to make us feel at home.
It is a cosy appartment, not really big, but it's good for five.

Nous avons été extrêmement bien reçues par Cristina qui est charmante et très disponible. L'appartement était très joli, très bien équipé et très bien placé ! Nous avons tout fait à pied. J'y retournerai avec grand plaisir. Thanks a lot Cristina !

Increible apartamento para 6 o 7 en el centro de Oporto. La decoracion de la casa no podia ser mejor, tampoco la limpieza, Cristina se hizo cargo de hacernos sentirnos como en casa. ¡Sin duda volvería!

L'appartement est décoré avec beaucoup de gôut, et la bienvenue est souhaitée par des clins d'œil agréables et pratiques. Avec Cristina les échanges par mails avant le séjour étaient faciles. Son ami nous a accueillies sans retard.
Cristina was a lovely host and the apartment was spacious and nice.

Nous avons passé deux jours très agréables à Porto. L'appartement est idéalement  situé,  au coeur de la vieille ville.  De là,  tout est possible à pied.
Cristina est très disponible pour faciliter le séjour. 
L'appartement,  simple mais bien équipé a répondu parfaitement à nos attentes. 

Je le recommande.

Avant notre arrivée nous avons eu une correspondance très suivie avec Cristina qui a répondu à nos questions avec précision...Très sécurisant!!!!
Cristina a été très arrangeante quant à notre heure d'arrivée.
Logement bien placé, parking souterrain a proximité, arrivée en  voiture facile... 
Une petite remarque : ne pas louer ce logement si vous n'aimez pas gravir les escaliers(4 ème étage sans ascenseur) : cela ne nous a pas gêné!!!!
Très agréable cadre, appartement très propre, très bien placé, hôtes très accueillant! Nous sommes très satisfaits de notre séjour!

Cristina fué extremadamente amable y atenta desde el primer momento que hice la reserva, la comunicaciòn fué excelente, resolviendo todas nuestras dudas y cuando nos recibiò fué  muy simpática y agradable. El apartamento está muy bien situado y es perfecto para unos dias en la maravillosa ciudad de Oporto. Muy limpio, amplio y con todas las comodidades necesarias. Sin duda volvería a alojarme con Cristina.

Nous avons passé un fabuleux séjour en famille (2 adultes et 3 ados) dans l'appartement de Cristina, qui est comme sur les photos, très fonctionnel et surtout bien placé. L'appartement est traversant Est/Ouest au 4 ème étage avec un petit balconnet à l'ouest  avec vue sur la grande place et également sur l'eau, à l'arrière une petite véranda à l'est. Merci à son ami Luis pour la visite des lieux et la remise des clefs. L'appartement a rempli à 100% à nos attentes et a tenu ses promesses. La literie était bonne. Nous avons également apprécié le linge de toilettes et les draps doux et propres. Merci à Cristina pour cet appartement et sa décoration de très bon goût!
Séjour très agréable

Superbe appartement comme décrit dans l'annonce très calme et propre. Accueil très chaleureux et convivial. 
Parfait pour profiter d'un très bon séjour à Porto.

Très bon séjour! L'appartement est parfaitement situé pour visiter la ville ... à pied! Une très belle ville, des habitants accueillants, des restaurants copieux pour vraiment pas cher et le porto... délicieux!!! :)

Cristina and her husband Luis are very nice people. The comunication with them was fantastic, they informed us properly about everything and they helped us with the parking. The flat is perfect, very close from the city center. The pictures of the flat are realistic, the flat is really the same :) I recomend the stay in the flat of Cristina. Cristina and Luis, thank you very much, it was a big pleasure to be in your flat during our stay in Porto :)

Cristina was a fabulous host! She was there waiting for us when we arrived, even though it was almost an hour after we first planned. She showed us around the apartment so we were comfortable with staying there. The home is exactly as pictured. It is quite spacious and our family of 5 felt very comfortable. Cristina provided us with a baby cot, high chair and a stroller for our littlest one- very much appreciated! She also provided us with two space heaters and a lot of extra blankets as it does get cold in the apartment in the winter, which made it that much better. We absolutely loved our stay and if the apartment itself wasn't already fabulous, the location is amazing! Directly downtown in the historic center.  We would absolutely recommend the home to stay!
Bellissimo appartemento, in centro, ma sopratutto ottima accoglienza!

En gardant le secret, Cristina m'a permis de faire une surprise à mon compagnon de l'arrivée de ses enfants pour son anniversaire ! 
Ce fût un week-end très chouette dans un appartement très sympa !
El apartamento está estupendo, con todos los detalles necesarios para hacerlo acogedor. Responde totalmente a la descripción y está en una zona muy céntrica.

Anfitriões extremamente atenciosos, que nos fizeram sentir à vontade mesmo quando acabámos por nos atrasar com o check-in.
Apartamento perfeito para passar uns dias a conhecer a cidade, uma vez que se encontra na zona turística do Porto.
Foi uma má experiência!
La ubicación del apartamento es ideal, súper céntrico, muy bonito. Es un cuarto sin ascensor en el que se escuchan mucho los vecinos.

When we booked the appartment we received a nice enthousiastic welcomming message as well as a accurate discription of how to get there. Once in the appartment Cristina was waiting for us, she was really kind and showed us around swiftly. The appartment has 3 big bedrooms. Or two big bedrooms and a living room (bed-couch). The bed-couch construction was really comfortable though. Also the appliances in the kitchen where really modern. Location is pretty good, 5 minute walk to the city centre but everything was doable very well by foot. Another great thing was that the kitchen had oil; pepper; salt; oregano, so when we were cooking we didnt have to buy stuff like that

A few downsides were: The shower hose was leaking a bit, but this will be fixed and the seat of the toilet wasn't attached properly which will be easily fixable as well. 

Taken everything into consideration, really good! 
enjoy your future stay@

Os anfitriões são bastantes simpáticos e acessíveis . o espaço é acolhedor, familiar e situado numa zona muito acolhedora. Tivemos uma estadia muito agradável, gostamos muito e fomos muito bem recebidos
Ayudando en todo y siento muy agradable para hacerte sentir como en casa

L'appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter Porto à pied. Le logement est fidèle aux photos, spacieux et agréable. Nous étions 5 et avons profité pleinement de l'espace.
Très bonne literie et appartement propre.

Petit + : 2 WC

Genial ubicación, en una calle tranquila en pleno centro de la ciudad desde donde se puede acceder a pie a todos los lugares de interés. Aparcamos el coche en la misma calle, no es zona azul, y no lo movimos en los días que estuvimos en Oporto. Piso limpio y acogedor, como se ve en las fotos, equipado con todo lo necesario. Creo que ofrece una excelente relación calidad-precio, y Cristina es muy rápida y amable a la hora de hacer todo el proceso de reserva y entrega de llaves. Sin duda para recomendar y repetir.
Just great: perfect location, clean house with a lot of facilities, nice beds, big kitchen, very kind host: PERFECT!

This apartment is in a perfect location, close to the city center, not to far from the river and 10 min walk from the subway. It was very clean and cosy, with lovely welcoming message for us ! 
Cristina and her husband were very nice and very flexible, defintley recommended!

Great place! The apartment is in the city centre, walkable distance from anywhere you want to go - sightseeing, nightlife, restaurants... Reeeeally nice host as well :) Cristina was very kind and helpfull :) The only small minus in the apartment is the heating, it's a big place, so it take time to make it warm, but still felt a bit cold. Nevertheless, I would definitely recommend it to everybody!
Perfeita localização. Fomos muito bem recepcionados por Cristina e seu marido. Cristina é uma ótima anfitriã, sempre que necessário nos respondeu imediatamente e nos acolheu muito bem.

L'appartamento è molto carino accogliente comodo pulito. L hoste gentile e disponibile. Posizione ottima. Molto pulito ed ordinato letti comodi. Nota stonata non c 'è l'ascensore....trolley leggeri mi raccomando!....lo consiglio a tutti.
Estupendo! La ubicación no puede ser mejor y los anfitriones muy atentos y amables.

Spent 48 hours in Porto. Apartment well located for restaurants and sights. Apartment is on 4th floor with no lift. Clean, modern and spacious enough for two adults and two teenagers.  Took us about an hour door to door using metro. Perfect for a short break

La casa de Cristina, está en el centro de Oporto. Al lado de Torre de los Clérigos. Se puede ir caminando a zona turística, restaurantes y zona de marcha. El piso es como se ve en las fotos, Nos facilitaron la llegada y entrega de llaves. Recomiendo este alojamiento. Repitiría si volviera a Oporto.

Bel appartement bien placé au centre de Porto, proche du Douvo.
Très bon accueil de Christina et Luis.

Nuestra estancia en el apartamento de Cristina ha sido muy buena. La localización es perfecta porque está cerca de todos los sitios de interés a pie y a la vez es un barrio tranquilo. Está muy bien equipado,es cómodo y agradable.

It's a place in the middle of the center of the historic centrum of Porto. A warm welcome of the owner. A posibility to park your car in front of the house for free. 
But you can also walk from the railway station.
Beds are very good and the kitchen complete.
When we come back tot Porto, we would book again.
Alles op loop afstand. Top locatie.

La casa está genial y muy bien ubicada. En pleno centro de Oporto. 
Los anfitriones súper amables.
Cristina fue muy amable y atenta, tiene un piso muy bonito con una ubicación excepcional! Recomendable 100%

The apartment is very nice, clean and thoughtfully decorated! Cristina and her husband were very helpful and nice hosts! The location is perfect. Parking in the street is possible and even free (even though you don't need a car to get around in the city!) We enjoyed staying there and would love to come back anytime!
Cristina is a great host. The apartment offered is clean, well equipped and great located in historical center of Porto. Really worth to choose!
Todo genial!
Very nice appartement on a very nice location! We had a great time!
Super appartement très fidèle à la description est idéalement placée au cœur de la vieille ville

Excellent accueil de la part de Cristina. Un appartement idéalement situé dans le vieux Porto, très bien équipé, très propre, une très bonne literie.
Nous y avons passé un très agréable séjour.
encore merci a Cristina :)
Tolle Lage und schöne Wohnung!

Excellent séjour à Portos grâce a l emplacement idéal de l appartement. 
Je recommande.
I can only recommend the flat from Cristina! Thank you!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Cristina. 
Elle a été très sympa de nous proposer de laisser nos bagages vu notre arrivée très tôt.
Le logement est idéalement situé, pour visiter les alentours et les restaurants sont nombreux.
Les lits sont confortables et aucun souci concernant la tranquillité. 
Je recommande fortement cet endroit. 
Encore merci pour ton accueil Cristina.


Abdel

Wir waren 2 Nächte in der Wohnung von Cristina und waren sehr zufrieden! Die Wohnung ist liebevoll eingerichtet und es war alles vorhanden, was man so benötigt. Die Lage ist super, mitten in der Altstadt, sodass man alles fußläufig erreichen kann. Straßenbahn und Busse fahren ganz in der Nähe, ein Bäcker und Supermarkt sind in der gleichen Straße und es gibt sehr sehr viele Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe! Wir kommen gern wieder :)

Obrigada, it has been a real pleasure to stay in this place. 
The house was clean, the pictures say the truth about it, it's a really good appartment and Cristina si really nice and gentle ! 
It'ld be a real pleasure to come again!

Christina et son mari sont très accueillants et disponibles. L'appartement est très bien : bon emplacement, proche du métro, du bus,  des restaurants... propre et fonctionnel. Nous avons passé un super séjour. Je recommande l'appartement et porto.

Cristina est très réactive et disponible  pour répondre à nos questions, l'appartement est très bien situé, en plein coeur du centre historique, vivant avec les pubs étudiants pas loin et petites supérettes en face. Très bien desservi par les transports (bus, tram, métro). Attention c'est au 4eme etage sans ascenseur pour les familles avec bébé ou personne âgée. Appartement propre, décoré avec goût et avec toutes les commodités, pratique quand on a qu'une valise cabine (sèche cheveux, fer à repasser, serviettes, torchons,...). Je recommande vivement !

Cristina is the best host ever! she made possible for my friend and I to arrive earlier in the apartment which was perfectly cleaned and so wellcoming! 
the position is perfect and great for visiting Porto! 
we had such a great time and we enjoyed so much the time there!
El departamento es tal cual se lo ve en las fotos. Muy agradable, limpio, bien decorado y con una excelente ubicación. Ideal para conecer y recorrer porto.

My friends and I loved staying in Cristina's apartment! Plenty of room for a group of 4. Cristina ensured we had a comfortable and very enjoyable stay in Porto. The city itself is amazing and is worth visiting. Would highly recommend Cristina as a host and her room to everyone.
El apartamento es tal cual muestran las fotos. La ubicación es perfecta para visutar Oporto y además esta muy cerca de la zona de ocio nocturno. Repetiría.
Cute, spacious, airy. Central to all tourist places and more.
The apartment was really cosy and perfectly located !  Cristina was really available to answer Our questions and give us advices. Porto was amazing.
the apartment is in the city centre, near all the best attractions of Porto.
L'appartement est parfaitement situé pour découvrir La magnifique ville de Porto. Nous le recommandons sans hésiter! Parfait pour les familles.

El apartamento está muy bien situado, cerca de los puntos más caraterísticos de la ciudad. Es un apartamento amplio, bonito y muy limpio. Cristina es una buena anfitriona y siempre está pendiente de los inquilinos. 
Una experiencia muy buena y, si alguna vez vuelvo a la ciudad, seguramente reservaría el mismo apartamento!
Great place and location!
Cristina's place is wonderful: perfectly located and beautifuly decorated with everything one might need, it is a perfect little haven.
Cristina is a great host, the communication with her was very easy and she reacted very quickly. We felt completely at home in her place.  I would completely recommend this place to anyone.

4° piso sin ascensor. Excelente ubicacion, cerquisima del centro. Con restaurantes y pequeña tienda de comida justo abajo. Preciosa decorada. Camas muy comodas. Cocina completisima. Lavabo nuevo. Tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Cristina muy amable y dispuesta a ayudar en todo

Very good location in the center of Porto. Very nice and clean apartment. The hosts are extremely open and friendly and accessible in case of questions. 

We can fully recommend this place.
Would recommend this apartment, we really enjoyed our stay. Fantastic host, clean apartment with comfy beds and the view from the balcony was very nice. Would return 100%.

Appartement idéalement situé pour visiter Porto, en plein centre historique. Parfaitement équipé, avec commerces et restaurants dans la rue. Cristina est particulièrement chaleureuse et attentive au bien être de ses locataires, très facile à joindre et arrangeante. Merci encore Cristina !!!

Dieses Appartement ist sehr empfehlenswert. Es liegt sehr zentral im historischen Zentrum von Porto. Bars und Restaurants sind fußläufig in weniger als 10 Minuten zu erreichen. Trotz der Nähe hört man davon in der Nacht nichts und ein erholsamer Schlaf ist gewährt. Unsere Gastgeberin Cristina hat uns sehr herzlich empfangen. Die Schlüsselübergabe klappte reibungslos und somit stand unserem Aufenthalt in Porto nichts mehr im Wege. Das Appartement ist sehr liebevoll und detailgetreu eingerichtet und alles nötige ist vorhanden.  Zusammenfassend kann ich sagen, dass es ein perfekter Aufenthalt war.

Cristina et son mari nous ont très bien accueillis et son très disponibles si nous avons des questions pendant le sejour.
L'appartement est très propre et très joliement agencé et décoré.
Super point de départ pour visiter Porto car une fois la voiture garée, nous pouvons tout faire à pieds.
Le Douro et La Ribeira sont très proches, ainsi que le centre-ville et sa multitude de boutiques et restaurants.
Merci pour votre accueil!
Je recommande!
This place is the perfect setting to explore Porto in the best way. It is very central with both Torre Clerigos and Ribeira nearby. Cristina and her husband are most friendly and helpful.

Cristina and her husband were very helpful and nice hosts! The apartment is very nice and clean and the location is perfect. We recommend this place 100%. 
Enjoy the breakfast right across the street at Vitor's Café.
Logement idéalement situé au centre de Porto, petits restaurants dans les environs à tester ! Accueil chaleureux, les lieux correspondent bien aux photos. je recommande sans hésiter !

La estancia con Cristina fue muy buena! El piso tiene una ubicación ideal, la llegada fue muy buena, el piso muy limpio y acogedor. Cualquier cosa mala fue simplemente un detalle! Cristina estuvo pendiente de nosotros y dispuesta a resolver nuestras dudas en todo momento
Estamos muy contentas con el piso de Cristina. Solo comentar que es un 4to piso sin ascensor y no hay fregona, a parte de eso, todo perfecto☺️
Lovely apartment, clean, good location. Bit small for 6 but ideal for a city trip!

Cristina and Luis' place is the perfect spot for experiencing Porto.  They are lovely people that make you feel at home and part of their family.  They made themselves available for anything we needed but everything about the apartment is just perfect-we did not have any problems.  My friends and I explored Porto and loved having this cozy home to come back to in the evenings.  I highly recommend!!!
Could not ask for a better location! Hosts are very nice and the appartement was really clean! Don't hesitate and book it! :-)
This is a great location for exploring Porto. Christina was a great host and was very accommodating with our flight delay which meant we showed up later than planned. Good value for money.

Super Stadt, tolle Wohnung, alles so wie beschrieben: geräumig (genug Platz auch für 2 Erwachsene und zwei Kinder), sauber, geschmackvoll eingerichtet und gut ausgestattet. Und das alles in einer sehr zentralen Lage. Cristina ist eine ausgesprochen nette Gastgeberin! Wir kommen gerne wieder!
Great location. Cristina is really helpful. The flat is on the fourth floor so a bit of a climb but means there is a great view from the balcony.

Wir (5 Personen) hatten 5 wundervolle Tage in Porto. Das Apartment liegt im 4. Stock eines Altbaus am Rande der Altstadt in der Nähe vom Torre de Clerigos und Univiertel. DIe zentrale Lage war für den Kurztrip optimal. Alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten waren gut zu erreichen und jede Menge nette Cafes, Lokale und Bars in der Nähe. Cristina und Luis waren sehr herzliche Gastgeber, der Kontakt 1a  und völlig unkompliziert. Sehr nett fande ich die persönlichen Begrüssungsnachrichten in der Wohnung. Das Apartment ist nett eingerichtet, einfach aber schön. Beu 5 Personen kann es schon mal eng werden, aber für den Kurztrip völlig ausreichend. Da wir die meiste Zeit auf Achse waren, haben wir es quasi nur zum Schlafen genutzt.

If you travel to Porto, especially with a small family, this is the place to stay. Cristina and Luis are really friendly and provide you with anything you'd need - be it a baby bed, a baby chair or a stroller. The apartment is really lovely, right in the center of the city and the ideal place to explore Porto from.

Deux nuits en famille dans cet appartement idéalement situé dans la vieille ville avec 5 vrais couchages. Trés bon acceuil et bons conseils de Cristina et son mari. Nous avons pu nous garer dans la rue (qui est en stationnement gratuit). Seul bémol, l'activité nocture est intense dans Porto le week end. Ceux qui ont le sommeil léger devront prévoir en conséquence :-)

Le logement de Cristina est idéalement situé, très proche du centre animé de la ville et des principales attractions touristiques. L'accueil de Cristina était parfait, très sympathique et serviable, l'appartement est propre et totalement conforme aux photos. Idéal pour une famille avec enfants. Nous recommandons vivement !! Un seul petit bémol, le samedi soir est un peu bruyant, il faut mieux dormir dans le salon...
Super Lage!

Ótima localização, perto de vários pontos turísticos, transporte público, restaurantes e bares. A Cristina e o Luis são pessoas agradabilíssimas, super atenciosos e simpáticos. Apenas levem malas pequenas porque são quatro lances de escadas, mas a vista é bonita.
El piso es cómodo, soleado y muy bonito, con todos los detalles. Además Cristina muy atenta, hemos estado muy a gusto, repetiriamos sin duda!
Big and nice apartment. Perfect location, but a cold apartment
Top Lage und sehr freundliche Vermieterin.

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado y la decoración es preciosa, como se aprecia en las fotos. Estaba todo muy limpio y los anfitriones son muy amables, te ayudan con todo lo que necesites, incluso nos guardaron las maletas.
El apartamento es frío, pero las habitaciones tienen calefacción y hay muchas mantas. El bar de en frente hace ruido los sábados por la noche.
Sehr nette Gastgeber und gemütliches, gut ausgestattetes Apartment in angenehmer Lage. Sehr gerne wieder
Świetna komunikacja z gospodarzami. Bardzo pomocni I serdeczni

La descripción del apartamento corresponde con la del anuncio. Cristina contesta rápido y siempre está a la escucha de lo que necesites.
La ubicación es perfecta. Recomiendo, sin ninguna duda este alojamiento.

You will not find a better location than Cristina's place. Everything is at a glance, you are in the heart of Porto! The place is as you see it in the pictures, with lots of positive messages and decorated with good taste which makes your stay very pleasant. Thanks Cristina. Looking forward to see you again
Os anfitriões são bastantes simpáticos e acessíveis. A casa fica num quarto andar sem elevador, mas prontamente nos ajudaram a levar as malas para cima. Definitivamente será para repetir.

Super bem localizado, perto de tudo e fora do agito demasiado, perfeito para conhecer o Porto.
Apartamento super limpo e bem cuidado, com grandes e espaços e conforto.
A notar a extrema gentileza e atenção de Cristina e Luis.

Lieu idéal à côté de TOUT. Réactivité parfaite de Christina!!
Merci pour tout

Accoglienza ottima, Cristina è stata molto sorridente e gentile, la casa pulita, spaziosa e confortevole. Unica pecca è stato il fatto che ad un certo punto è finita la bombola del gas e siamo stati costretti a cambiarla da soli senza averne esperienza.

Un appartement correspondant à nos attentes : très propre, conforme aux photos, décoration soignée et actuelle.
Il est très bien situé, à deux pas de la gare, de la librairie, de la rivière... L'emplacement est idéal.
Cristina est sympathique, arrangeante pour les horaires d'arrivée et de départ, bonne communication avant l'arrivée.
Un  très bon séjour !
Sehr schöne Wohnung in super Lage! Gut ausgestattete Küche, bequeme Betten. Alles ist fußläufig erreichbar. Für 5 Personen gut geeignet
The flat was very nice and very close to the city center! Thank you Cristina!
Localização 5 estrelas. Casa super fofa e em bom estado. Família super simpática :)

The location was great and Cristina and Louis were very friendly. They react very fast and we arrived too early, but that was no problem. I recommend everybody to stay here when they visit Porto. It is a really cute appartement.
Great place, close to the historic centre. Clean and comfortable, altough a bit small for 7 people. Very welcoming, no complaints.

Cristina's apartment is very well located. It has all the commodities and everything was very clean. The only thing i would like to highlight is that it has only one bathroom so when you are few people its a bit difficult to manage, but apart from that everything was as expected.

Bel appartement très bien situé pour découvrir Porto. On peut tout faire a pied. Nous avions une voiture et nous avons réussi à la garer dans la rue et nous ne l'avons reprise que pour repartir.
Les  2 chambres sont agréables. Mais le salon qui peut servir de 3eme chambre est un peu petit. Mais on reste peu de temps dans l'appartement. La cuisine manque un peu d' équipement. Mais pour de petit déjeuner c'est suffisant.

L'appartement de Cristina est très agréable, bien décoré, propre et bien équipé.
De plus, il est idéalement situé. Nous avons quasiment tout fait à pied.
Je le recommande.

Tout était parfait et conforme aux photos.
Un peu bruyant le weekend mais idéal pour tous les autres points
The appartment is well located and the beds are amazing.
Un petit appartement très bien situé. Cristina et Luis sont des gens très sympathiques et très réactifs. Je recommande cet appart.
So clean and spacious with a lot of beds! Exactly what we needed after a lot of tourism and walking.

Alles sehr gut! Freundlich, Sauber. Besser als ich es erwartet habe.
Danke
Todo ha estado perfecto, muy buena comunicación con Cristina, la ubicación del piso es ideal para turistear por Oporto, y muy cómodo también. Repetiría 100%

Cristina et son mari sont des personnes extrêmement attentives et très chaleureuses. Leur réactivité et leur sens de l'hospitalité sont à féliciter ! L'appartement est idéalement situé, très coquet et propre. Cette adresse est à recommander sans hésitation.

Cristina war eine hervorragende  Gastgeberin. Die Wohnung war gut ausgestattet, insbesondere die Küche bot viele Möglichkeiten. Die Wohnung überzeugt durch ihre zentrale Lage, was aber auch nächtliche Unruhe zur Folge hatte. Cristina war außerordentlich behilflich in jeder Hinsicht, besonders bei  der Parkplatzsuche. Würden jederzeit wiederkommen.
Cristina is a wonderful host. The apartment is in a perfect location and it’s cheerful and clean. We especially appreciated the three single beds for our kids.

Great location, close to the river and the city center by walking distance.
Lovely apartment, beautifully decorated and cozy and 150% clean.Totally suitable for families and groups of friends.Christina is a lovely host.Our stay in her place made our trip to Porto even more unforgettable!Definitely visit this beautiful city, and choose Christina’s place.5/5 stars without hesitation

Hôtes sympathiques. Luis vous accueille avec le sourire et vous met à l'aise. Appartement très agréable, bien équipé (il manquait  juste un miroir supplémentaire mais Cristina doit remédier à ce petit détail), bonne literie. Et surtout il est à proximité d'une majorité de monuments, vous pouvez aisément vous y rendre à pied. Très proche de la gare ferroviaire Sao Bento et de la Ribeira 6 à 8 minutes à pied.  Attention tout de même, dans la rue, il y a un peu de bruit en début de nuit mais c’est normal vous êtes en plein centre-ville, on ne peut pas tout avoir. Nous sommes parties entre amies et toutes nous vous recommandons cet appartement.
This is a very nice and well located apartment in Porto. Everything conformed to the description. We would like to come back to Porto!

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour dans l’appartement de Cristina ! 
Très bien centré près du Douro et d’une multitude de restaurants .
L’appartement est très propre et très joli exactement comme sur les photos .
Cristina et son mari sont très accueillants et prévenants ! Je séjournerai à nouveau sans hésitations dans leur appartement .
personne et appartement super, idéalement placé dans Porto.
Foi muito acolhedor para um grupo familiar de 6 pessoas. Ótima localização para conhecer o Porto a pé
Très bon emplacement pour visiter Porto ,  logement très confortable , accueil très sympathique de Luis , on recommande vivement cette adresse .  .. et on la communiquera

Vaste appartement très bien placé dans le centre historique pour découvrir la ville. 
Cristina a su y créer un ambiance chaleureuse que nous avons apprécié.
Christina welcomed us warmly and was a gracious host. Her appartment is clean, well equipped and ideally located. Thank you Christina for a great stay in Porto!

sehr zentral gelegene Wohnung. für fünf Personen optimal. essens-, shopping-, flaniermöglichkeiten und Altstadt in unmittelbarer Nähe. 4.Stock ohne Lift für einen städtetrip ohne viel Gepäck gut möglich. Christina war immer erreichbar und obwohl späte Anreise war es kein Problem einzuchecken. empfehlenswert

Cristina and her husband welcomed us with great hospitality. Apartment was super clean and in the heart of Porto. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice, clean and well located place in Porto!

Leuk appartement in het historisch centrum. Alles op loopafstand.
We zijn zeer gastvrij ontvangen door cristina en haar man.
We hadden een vroege vlucht en konden onze bagage tijdelijk in het kantoor van haar man kwijt.
De communicatie verliep heel goed. Cristina reageert snel op berichten.

The place was great : central, next to public transportation. Besides it was clean, spacious and very nice to be in. Cristina is really kind and thoughtful! If I come again in Porto I will definitely stay again in this place !

We had awesome stay at Cristina's place.  It's in great location, close to all attractions and places to visit.  Clean and spacious enough for our group of 5, especially that we didn't spend much time inside.  Cristina was a great host, responded to all our inquiries and helped with organizing departure of the last person in our group.  We would love to come back one day, with smaller and lighter luggage as climbing to the 4 floor with no elevator was a bit of challenge.
The location is great and the hosts are good people. I left a list of items that need improvement with the host for future consideration.
Great location,  close to many restaurants and coffee shops.  Thank you, Cristina and Luis.
Cristina is a great host and the apt is clean and cozy! Great location too! 100% recommended!

A hospedagem no apt da Cristina foi incrível.  Fiquei hospedando com amigos e tivemos uma ótima experiência.  A localização é excelente, próxima a vários pontos turísticos, limpeza e segurança foram itens a destacar. Voltando a Portugal já pretendo hospedar novamente. 
Obrigado Cristina e Luís pela recepção!
A proteção do chuveiro deixa sair água para o chão da WC, era ótimo ter havido uma esfregona para limpara o chão.
Location is great, right in old City, about 15-20 well from waterfront.
I recommend this apartment! :-)
Top emplacement pour visiter porto à pieds! Hôte super réactive et toujours prête à aider! N hésitez pas!

Yhteydenpito Cristinan kanssa oli helppoa. Pääsimme asuntoon heti, vaikka saavuimme Portoon jo aamupäivällä. Asunto sijaitsee erittäin hyvällä paikalla lähellä tärkeimpiä nähtävyyksiä ja ravintoloita. Se on neljännessä kerroksessa, jonne ei ole hissiä. Sängyt ovat hyvät ja kylpyhuone siisti. Cristinaa ja hänen asuntoansa voin suositella kaikille.
Personne charmante et appartement parfait.
Très bien situé, en plein centre, bel appartement propre

Appartement très bien situé dans la ville de Porto. 
centre historique a coté, accès au bus ouvert a moins de 100m
parc ombragé et jeux pour enfant à 100m aussi
on est sur les quai en 20 minutes a pied (retour plus long ... il faut remonter)
Cristina est une hote très sympa et au service de ces locataires.

L'appartement est très bien entretenu.
L'appartement de Christina est très bien situé pour découvrir Porto à pied. L'accueil de l'hôtesse est souriànt et professionnel. Le seul bémol est le bruit dans les chambres qui donnent sur la rue.
A real nice place to stay and discover Porto. Cristina is very nice and the place was clean and pleasant to stay. We enjoyed it very much.
Mooi appartement, fijne tips, routebeschrijving, super tijd gehad!!

Porto is a lovely city and Lulapartments an excellent place to stay and explore the city. You can walk most of the high lights. The apartment feels welcome (thanks to the owner!) and it is clean and with all you need. Worth it!

Estuvimos muy bien, el apartamento muy acogedor. Lo malo es que es un 4º sin ascensor, en una zona tan céntrica que no sabíamos que hacer con el coche.
El apartamento muy completo y bien equipado, tenían de todo

L'appartement est très bien situé dans le centre de Porto, les photos sont conformes à la réalité. Seul bémol, l'insonorisation, les fenêtres sont en simple vitrage, et durant le mois d'août la ville de Porto organise des concerts dans le jardin jouxtant l'immeuble donc si vous avez des enfants en bas age, il vaut mieux les faire dormir dans la chambre situé côté cour.

Cristina's ruimte zit naast een kerk (waarvan de restauratie net is afgerond) op een centrale plek (ca. 150 m van Clerigos Tower). Het appartement is volledig uitgerust. Alles wat je nodig hebt is er. Gratis parkeren kan in de straat (maar dat is overdag lastig). Rond 09:00 uur komt er meestal wel plaats in de straat. Toen we het appartement boekten hadden we niet in de gaten hoe centraal we zaten. Geweldige plek!

Sehr schönes gemütliches Appartement im Herzen von Porto. 
Perfekt für einen Städtetrip der kurzen Wege. 
Sehr nette herzliche Gastgeberin!
Für unsere Familie war es der perfekte Städteurlaub!
Appartement parfaitement situé et très agréable pour une famille.
Totalmente recomendable!
Very well located and nice appartment! Perfect for a pleasant stay in Porto! We certainly recommend this place!

Cristina is the best Airbnb host I have had yet. She is very accommodating and was a pleasure to be a guest to. She communicated so well and even helped with favors like printing and calling a taxi. Do be warned though because there are flights of stairs to climb to the top. But overall, the apartment was very clean, had many beds, and had great wifi. I would definitely recommend staying here at this central location. Our host was one of the highlights of our trip!

Cristina and Luis were so gracious and hospitable! We had an easy check in and check out and the location is great! The rooms were spacious and accommodating for multiple people. I had a great time in Porto and the apartment is so close to all the attractions and water. I highly recommend!
A Cristina foi muito simpática e adorámos o apartamento!

Cristinas apartment was very nice and on a good location. It’s near a park which is very beautiful to just relax and have some beers. 

Also all the good spots from Porto are just 10 minutes walking. Would stay here again!

I highly recommend this flat for groups of 5/6 friends! We were 6 girls going to Porto to celebrate a Bachelorette party and the appartment was perfectly located, only 5 mins from city center! Cristina was an amazing host! Great and fast communication! Upon my request, Cristina accepted to do some shopping for us before our arrival. It was clean and we found everything we needed!  Cristina, thank you for hosting us in your appartement!
Christina was a lovely host she was quick to respond and had great communication. The apartment is cosy with lots of lovely homey touches.  The location is great and we had a lovely stay.

Great location, clean and quiet with amazing view just around the corner of the apartment. Great bargain, we stayed with five without any problems. Two bathrooms is a big plus. Book and feel @ home....
L’appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter la ville. Il est proche du centre ville et c’est donc parfait pour aller déguster de bons petits plats ou boire un verre!!
Estancia muy agradable propietario serviciales y ayudan en todo momento una buena elección

Joli appartement, très bien placé. 
Cristina est très sympathique et arrangeante.
Una estancia estupenda
Ce séjour était parfait ! L'appartement est très très bien placé !!!
Cristina was a great host and left us some hen party treats! Her place is great and really central and convenient for all the sights. I would definitely stay here again.
Cristina is very fast in answering her messages. We had a really good stay in the nice apartment. The location is great, near nice restaurants and cafes, but a little out of the most touristic area.

This is a brilliant apartment in a fantastic location. There are so many things to see and do on the doorstep and also so easy to get to the beach using the bus or metro. The restaurants on the same street as the apartment are real gems and so welcoming. Thanks for being a great host and replying to messages so quickly. We loved our stay in Porto! Thank you.

This was a great apartment for me and my friends during our weekend break in Porto. There was plenty of room, it was all very clean and had everything we needed. The location was also great, within walking distance of everything. Cristina was very friendly and welcoming and easy to communicate with!
Great location, within walking distance to historic centre. Very comfortable beds and great communication with Cristina

Super schöne, liebevoll eingerichtete Wohnung in bester Lage.
Christina, die Gastgeberin und ihr Mann sind total freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Am Wochenende muss man nachts aufgrund der zentralen Lage mit Lärm rechnen. Wenn man selbst unterwegs ist, aber absolut okay :)
Die Ausstattung und Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis sind toll! Gerne wieder :)

The apartment is in a great location with lots to see and eat around. It is pretty spacious and had everything we needed during our stay. Cristina and Luis were also very helpful and responsive - would definitely recommend to anyone traveling to Porto!

We stayed in this AirBnb based on the location and the reviews and we were so happy that we did! Cristina was so quick and helpful with her communication before and during our stay. Check-in was a breeze with Luis meeting us right at the door as we arrived and helping our kids with their bags. We received a tour of the place and we were happy from the second we walked in. The apartment was a perfect fit for the five of us and the decorations gave it the feeling of a home. We had everything we needed for a great stay. The area was safe, conveniently located and clean. We didn't experience any problems with the apartment or with the area. We travel a ton and have stayed in a lot of AirBnb apartments all over Europe and this has been one of the best places we have stayed!
Clean and adorable apartment located in the center of everything! I stayed here with 5 people and Cristina always responded quickly to our questions and was beyond friendly. We would all recommend!

Nuestra estancia fue muy agradable!
Son muy amables y el apartamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos!
Muy buena ubicación y muy tranquilo! 
Todo perfecto!
Sin duda volveremos!

Cristina is really nice and she was always supportive and really fast in answering! 
The apartment was nice and clean, the beds comfortable and the position perfect to move in the city centre.
I will definetely raccomand her place! :-)

Cristina is extremely accommodating and replies instantly to any questions or concerns you might have. The location is amazing, right in the center of historic district. it's walkable to all attractions or sights within the city. Great host and great location!

Lo mejor es su ubicación, en pleno centro de la ciudad. Cómo ejemplo el tour gratis sale enfrente de la casa.
La casa es antigua, decorada con toques modernos, el portal también es viejo siendo un cuarto sin ascensor. Las habitaciones no tienen armarios. La casa es fría, salvo en los dormitorios y cuarto de estar, que tienen radiadores.
El agua caliente del baño se acaba en seguida. La cocina cuenta con todo en menaje, vasos y platos, se echa de menos sal, vinagre, servilletas. 
En coche puedes aparcar gratis en la misma calle.
La estancia ha sido agradable y el  contacto con el anfitrion ágil.

L'accueil était super, Cristina est très chaleureuse et répond très vite aux messages ! 
Le lieu est beau, propre et confortable, conforme aux photos. 
Il est très bien placé pour visiter la ville, et juste devant l'immeuble se trouve un petit restaurant qui propose des petits déjeuners pour une somme dérisoire pour ceux qui comme nous veulent profiter du séjour pour ne " rien faire ". 
Beaucoup de petits restaurants pas très loin pour les autres repas. 
La rue est un peu bruyante le week end comme c'est écrit dans les autres commentaires en effet, mais cela ne nous a pas vraiment dérangé finalement. 
Seul bémol, si une personne dort dans le salon sur le canapé, la cuisine devient petite pour 6 personnes. 
Je recommande vivement ce lieu !
Beautiful apartment in the center of Oporto. The location is great and the apartment is very well decorated and clean.

La estancia el el apartamento de Cristina ha sido buena. Era lo que esperaba aunque el mobiliario está más usado de lo que se ve en las fotos todo estaba correcto. Fue amable en lo que le pedimos, la casa estaba caliente y confortable cuando llegamos y fue flexible en la hora de salida . Pudimos disfrutar el lunes en Oporto sin tener que agobiarnos por la hora de salida del apartamento.

The flat is perfectly located, Cristina and her husband were very reactive and nice. The only negative point was, as we came in January, the difficulty we had to warm up the apartment. Thank you for a nice stay in Porto !

The apartment was great clean and in the very city center. Cristina was great in comunication, always very kind and quick to answer, her husband was also very kind when he came for the check-in. I highly recommend this host!

Cristina and Luis were so lovely and welcoming! The apartment was brilliantly located, just a short walk to the river and the town, with gorgeous views from the balcony. It was perfect for our needs, I would highly recommend this lovely place :)
It is nice location from porto main street. And host’s response was so fast.

Came with a group of 5 friends, and the apartments was perfect. Brilliant location, cheap and lovely hosts who were quick to respond to and questions. If you’re coming to porto with a group of friends - stay here, it’s great

The apartment is fine, but is located on a 4th floor, without elevator. I wouldn´t recommend it for elder people or persons with disabilities. Besides, during our stay (Feb 4- 6), the temperatures were pretty low at night (around 10C/50F), and there is only heating in the 2 rooms. The rest of the apt. really felt cold.
Last but not least, hot water in the shower only lasted 2 minutes. For some reason, the  heater didn´t work very well. This same behaviour occured every time we needed to take a shower.
Cristina and Luis were always very helpful, and did their best to make our stay very pleasant.

name: Loue 1 chambre privée
summary: Bonjour, je loue ma chambre du 5 au 12 mars dans mon appartement (4 1/2) sur la rue Amherst. Proche de la station Berri-UQAM et de toutes les proximités (restaurant, musée, bar, club) ou, j'échange ma chambre contre une location sur San Francisco.
description: Bonjour, je loue ma chambre du 5 au 12 mars dans mon appartement (4 1/2) sur la rue Amherst. Proche de la station Berri-UQAM et de toutes les proximités (restaurant, musée, bar, club) ou, j'échange ma chambre contre une location sur San Francisco.  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (english & fr version)

name: Harbourside Apartment - Water Views
summary: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus.
space: This apartment is quiet, neat and compact, with a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom and a great balcony for entertaining or just taking in the view. There is also a common grassed area just beneath the apartment with views of the Harbour Bridge as well which is excellent for picnics.  The apartment has a Queen Bed in the bedroom but also a Double Sofa Bed which would be fine for occasional guests or perhaps a child, though the apartment is ideal for 1-2 adults. There is a flat screen TV, DVD player, fully equipped kitchen, table and chairs (in the main room, plus an outdoor table and chairs on the balcony) ceiling fans, heaters and wireless internet access, as well as a common coin operated laundry one floor down from the apartment and an undercover carspace.
description: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus. This apartment is quiet, neat and compact, with a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom and a great balcony for entertaining or just taking in the view. There is also a common grassed area just beneath the apartment with views of the Harbour Bridge as well which is excellent for picnics.  The apartment has a Queen Bed in the bedroom but also a Double Sofa Bed which would be fine for occasional guests or perhaps a child, though the apartment is ideal for 1-2 adults. There is a flat screen TV, DVD player, fully equipped kitchen, table and chairs (in the main room, plus an outdoor table and chairs on the balcony) ceiling fans, heaters and wireless internet access, as well as a common coin opera
neighborhood_overview: This is unique part of Sydney to stay in - quiet and safe but with plenty to do, right by the Harbour and within minutes of the CBD. I lived in the apartment for four years, and I absolutely loved waking up to a beautiful Sydney sunrise and the Harbour Bridge, and then watching the sparkling harbour from the comfort of the couch.  There are a number of beautiful harbourside parks nearby with excellent views, and Kirribilli Village is just a 7 minute walk away. Here you will find a number of excellent restaurants, cafes, bars and shops (including an excellent boutique Choclatier), as well as the wonderful Kirribilli Markets (on every second weekend), Luna Park, and award winning restaurants such as Garfish (excellent seafood), The Botanist (great cocktails), Batch (fantastic burgers), Street Market (great Asian Tapas style restaurant) Cool Mac (great Japanese fusion cafe) and Ripples Milsons Point - perfect for a casual meal under the Harbour Bridge. There are a number of great cafes wi
notes: There will be basic provisions in the apartment for you upon your arrival, as well as instructions for the apartment and a guide of things to do/places to eat nearby/in Sydney. Obviously all linen, kitchen items, iron/ironing board and whatever else you need for your stay are provided - just make sure to let us know if you will require the sofa bed so we have all the linen ready. There are a number of unique artworks decorating the apartment of harbour scenes from the surrounding area by a local artist which are for sale - if you’re interested, let us know!
transit: You can get to the city by ferry, bus or train: North Sydney Ferry Wharf - 400 metres Milsons Point Train Station - 650 metres Bus to CBD (direct to York St, no stops) - 280 metres The Ferry Trip to Circular Quay from North Sydney Wharf is stunning - a 15 minute trip over and a 10 minute trip back. From Milsons Point Train Station (7 minute walk), you are one station (a 4 minute train ride across the bridge) from Wynyard Station, Town Hall (8 minutes) or Central (12 minutes).  From Kirribilli/Milsons Point you can also access the public stairs to walk across the Harbour Bridge to The Rocks. The trip to and from Sydney Airport by Train takes 30 minutes, or a Taxi is roughly 15 minutes.
access: You will have private access to the entire apartment and laundry, plus car space if needed.
interaction: Basic provisions, welcome manual and dining suggestions provided.
