If you have any problems during your stay I'm usually easily contactable by phone or email, and there is also a Building Manager who can help in emergencies. My husband and I used to live in the apartment but now live around the corner so we’re very nearby if there’s anything you need.
house_rules: Just common sense really - please leave the apartment as you found it, and not do anything that is likely to disturb the neighbours (no parties)!  The building is strictly no smoking, and unfortunately no pets are allowed due to Strata rules. There will be instructions in the apartment about where to dispose of rubbish and any other details like this you might need. Children are welcome though the apartment is not child proof, and there is a balcony (one level above ground). Please be careful on arrival and on returning to the apartment that you get the right building - the next one along is almost identical!

host.host_location: North Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I'm a born and bred Sydneysider, working as a Cellist and teacher full time. After living in the apartment myself for many years, I now live around the corner with my husband and daughter. I love living in Sydney and travelling, trying new places to eat and enjoying all the great things to do in our beautiful local area.

reviews.comments: Compact, well-appointed and equipped flat in top location, near public transport and shops. Eleanor is a very responsive and helpful host too.

Lovely compact apartment in a convenient location. Close to nice restaurants in Kirribilli and Milson's point train station. Also a two minute walk from the ferry. Everything we needed was in the apartment and Eleanor quickly sorted out any minor problems we had.

Why would you stay in a hotel when you could stay in this compact but all-you-need apartment in a perfect location just on the north side of the bridge in Sydney?  There are great eateries near by (our favourite - takeaway gourmet burgers overlooking the Opera House and harbour), and train and ferry only a few minutes away. Eleanor was very flexible and everything went very smoothly, and her provision of breakfast food and staples was very helpful.
Recommended.

I booked this for family staying in Sydney for my wedding.  My family members staying here thoroughly enjoyed their stay.  The apartment was comfortable and clean and within a great area for being central whilst also away from the hussle and bustle of the city!!  Eleanor communicated well and helped out with all our queries before and during the booking.  Thank you!

My wife and I stayed at Eleanor's apartment for a week - we were met by Eleanor's mum who showed us around and provided us with a welcome pack of food.  The apartment is perfectly located with bus & ferry 2 minutes walk and trains only 5 minutes away. Kirribilli village is great for local shopping and eating out. The communal laundry one floor down was very convenient. The view of the bridge from the balcony is a bonus. We would definitely recommend Eleanor's apartment to other visitors.

Fabulous location. close to ferry, train and every great eatery that North Sydney has to offer. Fabulous apartment. very quiet retreat with the hustle and bustle only a short ferry ride away or 15 mins walk over the Sydney Harbour Bridge and you're in The Rocks.

We had a wonderful time at Eleanor's harbourside apartment. You really do have a view of beautiful Sydney harbour and the Bridge from her balcony; a lovely spot to sit outside, have a glass of wine and relax. The location couldn't be better - a 2 minute walk to the ferry and within walking distance of the Ensemble theatre, Flying Squadron bar, the cafes of Kiribilli and we even walked past Luna Park round to the restaurants of Lavender Bay. The apartment is cosy and had everything we needed for our stay. Car parking was a bonus for this area.

Everything about this stay was perfect! While I did not meet Eleanor in person, she was very helpful prior to arrival and communicated in a timely manner. The home was great, it's an awesome location, and was well maintained. No surprises here--just a truly wonderful stay. I spent 30 days at Eleanor's home and would stay there again if I came back to Sydney for a long work assignment.

Eleanor's apartment is very well situated with great access to the city by train, bus, ferry or even by walking across the bridge. The apartment was bright and comfortable with a nice view. Eleanor is a conscientious and friendly host.

A beautiful, well presented place in a lovely location. Eleanor is a very welcoming host with a great appreciation of the area and provided plenty of suggestions for what to do/where to go. highly recommend.

Eleanor's place is lovely and both Eleanor and her mother were great to deal with and went out of their way to make me feel welcome and help me out. The flat is really great - it has everything you need, including an amazing view of the harbour bridge, and the obligatory Sydney fireworks!!

Eleanor's place was very clean, comfortable and in a great location, the apartment was well equipped with everything you would need for a stay, including a well stocked fridge, comfortable bed and lounge, and a beautiful little balcony with amazing city views! The fans in the bedroom and lounge were very effective and quiet, and the location was so convenient. It was magical taking the ferry from the city to the apartment on my last night. I would definitely recommend Eleanor's home to other travellers.
Great location, very easy to navigate and perfect for a couple. Thanks for a great stay.

Eleanor was kind to let us check in early.
House manual was comprehensive. Little disappointed with little fridge space for 6 nights stay.  Small area to prepare meals. About shower leakage was told on the day. Mould around screen from wet floor was unhygienic.
Eleanor was great!  Great neighborhood!
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Eleanor's apartment was very cosy and just a stone throw away from the ferries which allowed us to access the main tourist spots like the Opera House and Harbour Bridge easily. We were welcomed by Eleanor's mom who showed us how to access the property with ease. The apartment was perfect for couples and provided a homely feeling.

We had 3 nights at Eleanor's place and it was perfect. Location, communication, very warm welcome with a fabulous breakfast hamper.  The views from the windows and front balcony are stunning and the locality offers really handy restaurants, cafes, convenience stores. A 10/10 apartment/location.  Thanks so much Eleanor.

Fantastic location! Very easy access to both ferry and train. Shops 5min walk away.  Clean and tidy place,  perfect for a couple or single.  The breakfast basket was much appreciated! Thanks again for having us stay.
Great place. Quiet location. Generous breakfast and great place.
We loved our stay at Eleanor’s place! The apartment is cosy and clean. A home away from home! The location is amazing! Next time we are in sydney we will be staying here again.

We had a great stay here! The apartment is bright and had everything we needed, the folder full of local tips was really useful! Great location,close to the city and Kirribilli is a nice neighbourhood. Would recommend! Thank you
주택가여서 조용했어요. 너무 한가롭게 지냈어요. 페리 타는 곳과 가까워서 편했습니다. 친절하게 작성한 안내북이 있어서 많은 도움이 되었습니다.

Great week in Eleanor’s comfortable well furnished and welcoming apartment  (accurately presented ) - lots of wonderful little touches -including a generous and well thought out breakfast basket.  
Eleanor was a first class and friendly host  and her information book was a great help .Location was perfect -an easy 5 minute walk to North Sydney wharf - with easy access to Circular Quay and the rest of Sydney
The balcony with a view of Sydney Harbour Bridge, was a great and well used bonus for us 
All in all a great experience for us

We absolutely loved staying here. Fantastic bridge views. Amazing breakfast hamper.  Brilliant guide / tips book. Can walk, bus or catch ttain or ferry to the city. Quiet street. Fantastic apartment in great central location.  Good night life in Kirribilli.  LOVED IT.  Only slight glitch is that the bathroom is an en suite bathroom so if 2 people stay bear in mind you have to walk through bedroom to access shower & toilet and whether you are okay with that.
Great place , very central and clean. We had a great time at Eleanor’s place and she was prompt and a great communicator

A wonderful apartment with a spectacular view of the city. We felt very comfortable during our stay and had everything we needed and more. The apartment is close to shops and restaurants as well as the train and ferry. Enjoyed morning coffee on the balcony with a great view.
Eleanor and her family are great,friendly and thoughtful,everything is excellent.
Outstanding place and host!
Home away from home in Sydney with gorgeous views!
This was a great stay!  Eleanor was fantastic and always ready to answer questions. The view is wonderful and walking around North Sydney was easy. Definitely a great Airbnb!
Eleanor is a great host! Her place is nice and convenient! It's located in a lovely neighbourhood and close to public transport! Highly recommended!

Amazing location, great use of space, beautiful views.  Felt very much at home and fantastic to have a lift and parking.  I would definitely book Eleanor’s apartment in the future for my family visiting us.

The apartment is in a good location, only a very short walk from public transport and with a glimpse of the Harbour Bridge. 

Unfortunately the cleanliness and general  kit out of the place was below expectations. Basic things such as utensils were missing and the light in the main room wasn’t working, just to name a few issues.
Great place. Great location.
Great opportunity to stay in a special part of Sydney in comfortable accommodation within reasonable distance of public transport and eating places.
This apartment is amazing has everything you need and more. Fully equipped and close to restaurants. The hosts are amazing. Highly recommend.

The apartment was as described and Eleanor was a great, communicative host. We had everything we needed during our stay and were within walking distance to everything we needed, including the train stations. Would highly recommend staying here if you’re looking for places in North Sydney. Laundry on site was definitely a plus. Thanks again!

We loved Eleanor’s place! She provided excellent check-in instructions and even left us cookies on Christmas Day, as well as breakfast items. The neighborhoods of North Sydney and Kirribilli were excellent and close to transit. Highly recommended!
Easy access to Sydney city center, brilliant view of NYE fireworks!

I'm hoping the point of reviews are to help promote both good hosts & guests; helping others in the future. Please be assured this review isn't in spite of my husband's original booking/cancellation made via (Website hidden by Airbnb) which was cancelled days prior to our reservation due to owner (supposably) overbooking! With flights, baby/dog sitter & tours booked, this caused unnecessary stress. Desperately,  l searched airbnb for backup accommodation;  at peak time/short notice. I didn't think l would have much luck. Surprisingly & unknowingly, I had just booked the same unit my hubby was told was unavailable! It became even more apparent when Eleanor asked if I had used another I service as dates/surname were familiar. Through further messaging (address revealed) it was confirmed l had indeed rebooked the same unit! I was honest with Eleanor and expressed my disappointment and the unnecessary stressed she caused for no reason. Eleanor's excuse, in her words " (Website hidden by Airbnb) seemed dodgy and l 'was going' to contact your husband to book via airbnb but it has worked out well"...Really!? Everything aside, we decided to make the most of it; feeling relieved we had accommodation.  I wasn't going to mention this but after our stay, l feel compelled to continue to provide open & honest feedback. I hope others will do the same; not just about this property but others. I was upfront with Eleanor and will continue to do to so to the end. About our stay...good location - nearby restaurants/transport. 
When organising check in, Eleanor asked us to collect keys from her residence (which isn't just around the corner - it's over 1km away). We requested for cleaner to handover keys which was greatly appreciated. 
After cleaner left and our return, we struggled to open the front door with lock sticking and then to enter a hot box! There're only ceiling fans to move the air. In January temps; not ideal. Instructions were left on how to operate fan/lights but we couldn't get both working, but thankfully we only got the fans working. If you're thinking about staying here; make sure it's not during extreme hot/cold weather.
Every time the shower is used it leaks on the floor & remains wet 24 hrs!  Thankfully, info was left in book so we weren't alarmed. The view described was misleading.  Yes, you can see the harbour bridge if you 'stand' in the lounge. Windows are high & obscure the view. The balcony also overlooks a car park & derelict units. To see the bridge from here you also need to stand to the top end. The balcony door sticks; concerning with a full pane of glass. An accident waiting to happen. Upon departure,  we always empty bins, clean and strip beds. But I was horrified to find yellow stains on the bottom sheet at foot end of the bed..eeew! This really was the straw that broke the camels back! Believe me, we are not picky people, easy going, and all our reviews from other properties/ hosts have been positive. If you want true comfort, functional, a proper view; I definitely do not recommend this unit.

name: O'Porto Studio | Historic Center
space: Renovated apartment in a historic and classified building in the city center of Porto. The apartment is very cosy and with a nice decoration  Very well located in the heart of the city and only 40 minutes from the airport by Metro. Near bars, shopping, cafes, tascas restaurants and cultural places.  - 650 meters from the Avenue of the Aliados - 500 meters from Clérigos Tower - 800 meters from the metro station  - 750 meters from the famous Sao Bento train station known for its' beautiful tile murals Beds configuration: - 1 double bed (with 140*200cm) - 1 Sofá bed for 2  - 1 travel baby bed (by request) - 1 baby chair (by request) When you arrive I will provide maps and some suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. You will also find tourist information near the apartment. As a trading centre at the mouth of the Rio Douro it is the second largest city after Lisbon with ov(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) inhabitants. The city has a number of distinctive atmospheres and this is very evident
description: Renovated apartment in a historic and classified building in the city center of Porto. The apartment is very cosy and with a nice decoration  Very well located in the heart of the city and only 40 minutes from the airport by Metro. Near bars, shopping, cafes, tascas restaurants and cultural places.  - 650 meters from the Avenue of the Aliados - 500 meters from Clérigos Tower - 800 meters from the metro station  - 750 meters from the famous Sao Bento train station known for its' beautiful tile murals Beds configuration: - 1 double bed (with 140*200cm) - 1 Sofá bed for 2  - 1 travel baby bed (by request) - 1 baby chair (by request) When you arrive I will provide maps and some suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. You will also find tourist information near the apartment. As a trading centre at the mouth of the Rio Douro it is the second largest city after Lisbon with ov(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) inhabitants. The city has a number of distinctive atmospheres and this is very evident
neighborhood_overview: The people of Porto have a natural way to approach to others without any shyness. They simply just love to meet new people and have a way to do it absolutely natural, so do not be afraid of them, be kind and… be welcome!
notes: All linen and towels are included in the apartment. After one week stay (stays up to 7 nights), changing of linen/towels and general cleaning of the apartment, free of charge. The apartment includes a bath towel and a hand towel for each guest. Extra linen and towels possible (charged).
transit: If you come from the airport, you only need to take the metro from the airport to the city centre (Trindade). To explore the city centre, you don't need car or any public transport. You can always go everywhere by foot.
access: The apartment is all for you.
interaction: I'm always here for my guests!  You can contact me by phone, email, imessage, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), sms during your stay. It's always helpful to know at what time are you thinking arriving and leaving the apartment
house_rules: - Pets not allowed; - Smoking allowed only in the balcony; - The apartment will be cleaned before the arrival of each guest; - On leaving, the guest must leave the apartment without waste, all the lights turned off and windows closed; - Always maintain the front door of the building closed; - No cleaning fee. After one week stay - free cleaning changing linen and towels. Extra cleanness, linen and towels possible but will be charged; - Check-in 3p.m. and check-out before 11a.m. (other hours may be agreed where possible); - Report if some incident happens; - The furniture of the apartment should be left in the same places where you found them;

host.host_about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Good place, well situated and well equiped. The place is brand new and Tomas is a good host. I recommand the place, very good value!
Bon appartement bien situé et bien équipé. Le logement est neuf et Tomas vous accueillera très bien. Je recommande l'endroit qui a un très bon rapport qualité/prix.

My boyfriend and I stayed 2 nights in Tomas' apartment. It is a very fine apartment, well renovated and well situated in the historical center of Porto. Everything worked fine, including the wifi, and the place was very clean. Tomas was very helpful and gave us some useful tips about the city, where to go and where to eat etc. If I go to Porto again, I will certainly chose the same apartment to stay!

Highly recommended!!!
nice small apartment, very good located and well equipped! Thanks Tomas!

This apartment combines the classic architectural style of Porto with new and modern touches. The result is very tasteful. The apartment was recently renovated and it is in perfect condition. It is fully outfitted with everything you might need during your stay. The location is excellent.

The host, Tomás, is attentive, knowledgeable, and helpful.

Highly recommended!
Nice apartment, good host! A lot of nice bar and restaurant nearby.

Lovely, clean and fully furnished studio at an excellent location in porto. City centre, bars and restaurants are all at walking distance. We even walked to the beach twice, but that will take you about an hour along the river douro. Tomas and his friend Marta were very friendly and helped us around when needed. The only negative point, as mentioned by others, is some rumour at night. But we slept like a baby with earplugs!

The apartment is perfect ! Very beautiful and located in a wonderful and charming area of Porto, quite close to the river Duro (10 min walking).

Very good welcome, with a list of all the good places to visit in Porto, to eat or to have a drink.

The only (small) problem is that as it is quite noisy at night. But however, I really think that I would rent it again if I come back to Porto.

Thank you tomas !

thanks to tomas again! i had a great stay in porto. the studio is in a nice neighbourhood and it really looks like on the pictures. the studio is light and sunny also on rainy days ;)
so, when you like to visit porto then is this studio your best choice!

oh, also thanks to marta for give me so many good ideas to enjoy the city!
Tres bon sejour dans le studio. Tres bien situé, tres bon amenagement.

Even though there were some problems during my stays, Tomas helped me a lot to fix any problems caused immediately. And, his advice and note for tip was very useful.  Although I had only a few chance to see a room being filled with sunshine due to the weather, it made me feel that I made a good decision to stay here. 3 Words of cozy, clean, comfortable describes this place well.

The apartment is very centrally based and easy to reach by foot from the closest metro station (10-15 minutes). Tomás is a very kind person, willing to explain everything about Porto and places to visit. We have enjoyed our stay very much and would certainly recommend this place to stay for two persons.

Alojamento como descrito, Está muito bem pensado para a área e tipologia que tem. A comunicação com o Tomás, e não só,  não poderia ter sido melhor. Fomos muito bem recebidos e ainda foi de grande ajuda com o guardar as nossas malas após checkout. Boa escolha para desfrutar do Porto sem problemas

Perfect, clean, cozy studio!
Also a perfect location.
Tomas is very friendly and he gave us very good tips!

Titus & Lieselotte

We enjoyed our stay in this  nice appartment in the historic center of Porto. Tomàs was kind and helpful, and the appartment was very clean and well equiped. We would certainly recommend this appartment to others. The only thing that irritated us a bit was the noise in the street during the nights.

La estancia en el apartamento de Tomas no pudo ser más perfecta. Localizado en un sitio céntrico, a 5 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos. Mobiliario muy nuevo y moderno. Fue una pena no poder conocerlo en persona, aunque nos recibió un amigo suyo, que nos explicó todo lo relacionado con la ciudad. 
Si volvemos a Oporto, este será nuestro apartamento!

Tomas' appartement is very-well located in a dynamic area of Porto which is called Cedofeita. Plenty of shops, restaurants and scenic attractions at walking distance. The appartement is well-furnished, no nonsense.
Be prepared for some earplugs if you happen to be there during any festivity, such as we had with the end of the university season.
However, we would choose the same place if we come again.

Petit appartement charmant, lumineux, à la décoration simple mais soignée, situé dans une rue piétonne avec de nombreux commerces de proximité, et à 10 mn à pied du quartier "Ribeira" (au bord du fleuve).
Tomas was a great host, very helpfull. The apartment in near one of the most beautiful squares in Porto! It's clean and comfortable!

Tomas is very welcoming and the flat is very well located and agreable. It was a pleasure to listen to some jazzy music thanks to the radio while taking our breakfast during a sunny day! We strongly recommand this place :)

Tomás' flat is as stylish and comfortable as it looks in the pictures and is an ideal location from which to explore Porto. 
I would agree with the other reviews about noise from the street, so if you're a light sleeper bring some ear plugs. Tomás' friend Angelo met us when we arrived and was very helpful, showing us around and giving us tips on where to go for dinner. Tomás also called in the next day to make sure we'd settled in ok. He was really helpful and friendly too.

Tomàs has been very kind to us and took time to describe city, specialities, nice places to go, etc. He also has been very flexible on schedules to make our trip easier.
The appartement was perfectly clean and just as it looks on the pictures, very well located, closed to the center and to wathever you will need during your stay.
Tomàs is friendly and helpful ( he gives us some useful Information and tipps :-)). Good Location of the Flat, really sweet...

Hey Tomas. We loved saying at the appartment. It really has all somebody could need and even more. Its really lovely! And thank you for warm and welcoming character. We enjoyd meeting you.
Thanks a lot, Franzi+Benni
We enjoyed our stay in Porto. The apartment was nice with a great location within the city.

our stay in, porto was absolutely wonderfull. the appartement was situated verry well to explore the city! everything is on walking distance! The appartement was verry clean and had a warm athmosphere!
 thank you for a great stay in porto
We really enjoyed staying at the apartment in Porto. The location is great and it's in walking distance to a lot of cool sights, restaurants and areas. We recommend it!

We had a great time at Porto, and Tomas apartment was verry nice, clean comfortabel everything we needed and more, in the centrum of Porto, Tomas took time to explain a little about the city, and gave manny tips on restaurants, bar's.....wich was a great help...thank you Tomas hope to stay again at your place...Bart and Manuel
We had a nice time in Porto!!! Tomas place was really nice, good located, perfect for our needs!! Only one aspect, if you are a light sleeper, remember you ear plugs, can get noisy at night!!!
Appartement conforme à l'annonce : joli, lumineux, propre et très bien situé. Idéal pour un couple. Séjour parfait. Merci.

Die Wohnung ist nett eingerichtet und hat alles , was man für ein paar Tage braucht. Liegt zentral in einer Fußgängerzone, allerdings ist es auch abends/nachts besonders am Wochenende laut. Es ist viel los in der Gegend ( Ohrstöpsel helfen enorm ).
Empfangen wurden wir von Marta, die uns sehr engagiert mit allen möglichen Informationen / Kartenmaterial aufs freundlichste versorgt hat. Terminabsprache funktionierte über Handy / SMS bestens.
Tip: nicht mit dem Auto kommen. Parkplätze sind rar und nicht sicher, Parkhäuser teuer.
Porto hat uns sehr gut gefallen! Man kann es gut zu Fuß bzw. mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln gut erkunden.

This apartment is just perfect to enjoy a stay in the wonderful Porto. Conveniently located in a nice neighbourhood full of bars and restaurant, shops and art galleries. Tomás is a very nice host and makes one feel home

Marta and Tomas were great!  They did everything to make us feel welcome and went out of their way to let us store our luggage after we checked out.  The apartment was lovely and had everything we needed.  It was really centrally located and easy to get to by public transport.  There was some noise from the street at night time but the double shutters helped to keep it to a minimum.  I would totally recommend anyone to stay here.

Staying at Tomas's place was great! Great location, within walking distance to the main attractions. Although we didn't get to meet in person, we did meet Marianna who was very pleasant and helpful. We would definitely go back! :)

Tomas gave us a friendly welcome. The information to get to the apartment from the airport was very useful and the guest book offers nice information about the city.
The apartment was very clean and has a good atmosphere. It's located in the middle of the city. This is very convenient but also means you will hear quite some nightlife noise: so bring earplugs for good sleep!
We had a great weekend in Porto.

Tomas was zelf niet in de gelegenheid om on te verwelkomen, maar een vriendin van hem had ons opgevangen en de sleutel overhandigd. Ze hadden een gastenboek klaarliggen waar allemaal tips in stonden waar je zoal heen kon. Daarnaast had die vriendin zelf ook nog veel eigen tips waar we wat aan hadden. Het appartement was netjes en schoon. Het appartement ligt erg centraal waardoor je makkelijk overal heen kan. Ik zou zeker nog een keer gebruik willen maken van dit appartement als ik nog eens Porto zou bezoeken.

We have just had a fantastic week in the apartment. The apartment is immaculately presented as depicted in the pictures/ description. The size is nicely bigger than the pictures suggest; with plenty of space in the bedroom area and the living area. 
We were made to feel incredibly welcome by Marta and were provided with some excellent advise on places to eat, drink and see across the city. 
The apartment is very centrally located with cafes, bars and bakeries all within 1-2 minutes walk. 
The apartment does face onto a main pedestrian way and can get loud in the evening/ night; but this is a fair compromise for the fantastic internal quality,  central location and price of the apartment.

L'accueil a été très chaleureux puisque nous étions attendues au pieds de l'appartement. L'appartement nous a été présenté et nous avons même eu droit à un briefing sur la ville et tous ses bons plans (restaurants, visites à faire...).

Sehr schönes Apartment mitten in einem belebten Einkaufssträßchen mitten in Porto mit allem, was man braucht. Zur Partymeile sind es nur wenige Minuten zu Fuß, auch in den historischen Teil der Stadt ist es nicht weit. Wir wurden super freundlich empfangen, haben zahlreiche tolle Tipps erhalten und haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt. Einziges Manko: Die Straße, an der das Apartment liegt, ist kopfsteingepflastert. Wenn nachts Autos durchfahren, ist das durchaus etwas laut.

Everything was just amazing! The location is perfect for tourists, right in the city-centre, the main tourist spots are situated within 5-10min walk as well as plenty of nice bars, cafés and restaurants! The apartment was clean, equipped with everything you need, perfect for two: cosy and peaceful. The hosts gave us a lot of useful insider tipps and provided city maps.

Heerlijke uitvalsbasis in Porto. Het appartement is gunstig gelegen, schoon, gezellig ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. Fijne tips in het boekje dat klaar lag én van Marta, die ons welkom heette en haar hotspots met ons deelde. 

Het appartment ligt in een leuke buurt met kroegjes en restaurantjes, op ongeveer 15 minuten loopafstand van de rivier. De dunne muren en vloeren maken het pand wel enigszins gehorig. Tijdens ons verblijf viel de overlast reuze mee en hebben we Porto goed uitgerust kunnen verkennen.
Really lovely apartment, thanks a lot! We enjoyed the stay very much.

My boyfriend and I stayed for 2 nights at Tomás´s apartment and absolutely loved it! We would definitely come back. He sent us a package with detailed instructions for how to find the place, and his friend Marta let us in since he was out of town. Marta spent a while going over a map and their welcome guide, she was so friendly and helpful! 

The apartment looked exactly like the photos. The location was perfect and close to everything. Marta did warn us that the street is quite noisy at night, and since we stayed on a Saturday night it was very loud, lots of people singing and walking by all night. However, we knew this ahead of time and it did not bother us. It was very quiet on Sunday night. The internet connection was a bit slow but not slower than anywhere else in Porto and we did not need it much because of the map and welcome book Marta left us. 

Overall, we could not have asked for a better apartment! Wish we had stayed longer.

Tomas was a delightful host. Prior to arriving I communicated with Tomas via Viber on a number of occasions. Tomas always responded quickly. When we arrived in Porto Tomas was waiting for us at the apartment. He is very organised. There was a complete guide ready for us on where to eat and what to do in Porto; important numbers were listed as well. The apartment itself is clean and tidy and very functional. It is located above a shop on a pedestrian street that leads into a square. We walked everywhere from the apartment. If I am truthful the only downside of such a prime location was the noise late at night and early in the morning from people walking to and from bars; was not a significant issue. There are also plenty of restaurants/cafes within close proximity of the apartment. I would recommend Tomas' apartment if you wish to explore Porto and the surrounds.

El apartamento es genial, pequeño pero acogedor y muy bien decorado.
Una amiga suya nos acogió y nos contó un montón de cosas sobre Porto, nos dió mil recomendaciones que nos ayudaron a aprovechar al máximo nuestra estancia en Porto.

El apartamento es perfecto para conocer Porto. Está situado en una zona muy céntrica a unos 5 minutos a pie de la Torre de Clérigos. La zona está llena de bares y tiendas y es bastante animada.
El apartamento es exactamente como se ve en las fotos: luminoso, moderno, limpio, muy bien equipado y muy confortable.
Tomás no estaba cuando llegamos pero ha hecho los arreglos necesarios para que tuviéramos las llaves y pudiéramos instalarnos. Un rato después ha venido a saludarnos y a darnos indicaciones sobre el apartamento. Tomás me ha parecido muy amable y simpático, la comunicación con él ha sido muy fluída desde los primeros contactos y ha hecho que todo fuera muy fácil. Creo que es uno de los anfitriones más fiables que he conocido y se ha tomado un rato para marcarnos los principales monumentos y sitios de Porto en un mapa que tenía preparado para nosotros así como algunos restaurantes muy buenos, incluído el que prepara su francesinha favorita ;-)
Het waren mijn zus en mijn mama die hier verbleven zijn. Ze vonden het ronduit geweldig. Geweldige locatie, mooi appartement met alles wat je nodig hebt, heel goede ontvangst. Een echte aanrader!

El apartamento es precioso, hemos pasado unos días muy agradables allí. Es absolutamente céntrico, está a 5 minutos de todo y Tomás ha sido muy amable y nos ha ayudado en todo. Si vais a conocer Porto os recomiendo totalmente quedaros en este piso!

El piso de Tomás es maravilloso, súper bien ubicado y lindisímo. Nos recibió Martha y fue sensacional, nos explicó todo lo necesario para nuestra estadía en Oporto, hasta tiene un librito con todos los tips como restaurantes, puntos de interés, mapas, etc. Definitivamente, un lugar que recomiendo.

Lovely appartement accurate to what the site says. Nice welcome with good explanation, they really take the time for you. The location of the appartement is perfect for a citytrip in Porto. Restaurants, shops, sightseeing, bakery all close by. Next trip to Porto preferably at Tomas' place again.

Tomás and his friend Marta where great hosts. The had prepared for out visit with activities and nice things to see in Porto. The place is just as it looks like in the pictures and is very central. We walked all over the city and the street just outside have bars and cafés all over.

La casa es estupenda y Tomás es el mejor anfitrion que he tenido nunca probabblemente! 
La casa es exactamente igual que en las fotos o incluso mejor. Por ejemplo la tele es una de las nuevas plana y mucho más grande y no la que aparece en la foto (incluso tiene puerto USB y puedes ver pelis desde un pendrive!).

La localización es inmejorable, al lado de todo y con mucha vida por la zona, desde restaurantes a sitios de copas y por supuesto está a tiro de piedra de todo lo que hay que ver y hacer en Oporto.
 
Es verdad que la casa está en una zona muy animada en fin de semana y puede haber ruidos por la noche, pero vamos es totalmente soportable. 
Aunque la casa no tiene calefaccion y eso puede echar para atrás, no es un problema, Tomás nos proporcionó dos estufas estupendas y hay mantas más que de sobra.
El sofá cama es super cómodo (yo fui la que dormí allí) y ninguna queja.  
Lo demás de la casa una monada, el baño y la cocina son justo lo que necesitas para unos días en Oporto.

Por supuesto la Wifi que es imprescindible! Funciona a la perfección. De hecho hay un aparato en la misma casas así que no hay ningun problema de red. 

Como anfitrion Tomás estuvo todo el tiempo pendiente, incluso desde que hicimos la reserva. Para quedar a la llegada fue super flexible y atento. 

Tomás también tiene otras casas por si teneis otras necesidades. Desde luego cada vez que vuelva a Oporto repetiré con él sin duda y se lo voy a recomendar a todo el mundo.
We really enjoyed staying at Tomas apartment. The location is great and the apartment itself very nice. I can recommend it!

Muito bom, limpo e confortável o apartamento O'Porto Studio e Tomás nos recebeu de forma simpática e com muitas informações interessantes a respeito da cidade. Para aqueles de sono muito leve vale a ressalva de que, por tratar-se de um Centro Histórico com muitas opções de café e de bares, há movimento de pessoas dialogando com a madrugada fria. Mas somente para os de sono muito leve.

Marvellous flat, very well located in the centre of Porto. The photos really described the apartment. 

Tomás is a very kind host that gave us a lot of good recommendations about restaurants places to visit etc, and he welcomed us with a bottle of wine, cheese and Belen's pastries! really delicious!

I fully recommend this apartment if you are going to visit Porto and of course I will book again this flat in my future visits to Porto!

Très bien situé, propre, joliment décoré et bien équipé, l'appartement de Tomas est parfait pour un couple! De nombreux sites incontournables (tour des Clerigos...) comme les lieux de vie nocturne sont à proximité. Un excellent séjour!

We had the most pleasant stay, thanks to Tomas ! The flat is incredibly clean and comfortable, there is everything you may need. The neighbourhood is great :  it's really situated in the historic center : you can go everywhere by foot and even come back to the house for a little nap, there are lots of shops, bars, restaurants... 
We definitely recommend this flat and would love to come back there.

Tomas was very kind and he will do anything to make you have a wonderful stay !
The apartment is beautiful and very well situated to move around town. It has all the amenities one might need to have a comfortable stay in a new city on a budget.

Amazingly clean and comfortable apartment! It was the perfect location to come to after climbing the hilly city. We did not meet Tomás but his partner Marta was very helpful. She made sure we were completely comfortable before leaving us. We are planning on coming back in summer.

We couldn't have asked for a better place during our stay in Porto. The apartment is bright, clean, cute, and in a very convenient location. We also appreciated the time Tomas took to tell us about the city and give us recommendations.

Tomás stuurde ons voor het vertrek een zeer uitgebreide routebeschrijving.
Marta, de vriendin van Tomás verwelkomde ons hartelijk in  de studio, die volledig aan de beschrijving voldeed. Ze gaf ons tientallen tips gedocumenteerd met plannetjes en uitleg aangaande restaurantjes en bezienswaardigheden.
Het appartement is zeer centraal gelegen in een prachtige buurt van het oude stadscentrum, en is zeer comfortabel ingericht. 
Wij hadden een prachtweekend, en indien de kans zich voordoet zouden we zeker naar het zelfde adres terug keren.
Een aanrader!

Tomás
The apartment was perfect: clean, spacious, reflecting exactly what I had anticipared according to the description and pics showed.
Marta spent a good amount of time to present all the information related to the apartment, the places of interest in the city, and sound recommendations for restaurants, bakeries etc.
Your studio is very well located. 
I would not hesitate to highly recommend it to any traveler to visit Porto.
Thanks for everything and kind regards for Marta. She is a very nice person and agreable.

Tomas gave us good advice about restaurants and locations to visit. The flat was as described that is to say very nice and really tidy. We were just surprised by the noise at night :mainly drunk students singing or yelling in the street until 6 am.

We stayed at Tomás apartment for one week around Easter and had a great stay.

Even though we arrived at midnight and Tomás couldn't be there he arranged for a friend/colleague of his to give us the keys. She was very nice as well and gave us very valuable tips for our holiday even at this late hour.

The apartment is very new, well equipped and clean and conveniently located right in the centre of the old town. The only very minor downside was that at weekends the party crowd makes its way through the pedestrian zone right in front of the apartment so that it can get a bit noisy. But we knew that from previous comments and it was ok for us.

We would definitely stay in this apartment again. Thanks for everything!
One of the best experiences ever! Beautiful, sunny, spacious, clean and in perfect location. Thank you Thomas for having us!

Tomas and his friend Marta made Lucy and I very welcome. They were both very easy to get hold of and arrange a check in time. The apartment comes with a handy guide to local restaurants, night life and sights and Marta was more than happy to answer our questions about the city and give us great tips on where to eat, even giving us lovely vegetarian options for Lucy. The description of the flat was very accurate. The small apartment is bright and surprisingly spacious and we couldn't ask for a better location, walking distance from bars, shops and some amazing architecture. At night the area really came to life and although at times our sleep was disrupted by the buzzing streets outside we were more than happy with the area. We had an amazing time in Porto and would definitely stay at Tomas’s again.

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt in Porto und das Apartment von Thomás war einwandfrei. Allem voran war die Lage hervorragend - in Laufdistanz zu allen wesentlichen Sehenswürdigkeiten. Es war sauber und für zwei Personen absolut groß genug. 
Thomás selbst war zwar nicht da, aber eine Freundin von ihm hat uns empfangen und uns tolle Tipps gegeben, wo wir etwas essen können und was wir uns ansehen müssen. Im Apartment liegt auch eine kleine Mappe mit weiteren Tipps bereit. 
Es ist zwar tatsächlich nachts etwas laut, aber für uns war es auch ohne Ohropax durchaus möglich, zu schlafen. 
Alles in allem kann ich das Apartment ohne Einschränkungen weiterempfehlen!

Tomas was out of town but we were met by Marta who was a delight. She spent an hour explaining where, why and how, as a local. She also came back with linen for the sofa bed. With her help we found and saw the sights that are worth seeing with food and local bar recommendations. The studio was as described, clean, fresh, fully equipped, even washing machine and very tasteful. Even towel warmers, great heater and kitchen basics eg, olive oil etc..... The location is brilliant, close to everything at the top of porto. Short (5-10) walk up the hill from Sao Bento train station. If arriving at Campanhã train station, swap to take train to São Bento at no extra cost! Real world Porto in the mornings with street cleaners, pedestrians etc, but a great locale. Would definately stay again. Thank you!!
Erg fijn appartement op een ideale plek in het centrum. Een aanrader!!
Excellent we à Porto malgre la pluie! Tomas nous a très bien reçu et ses conseils étaient tous parfaits!

Tomas' studio was great, very roomy and sunny (when it wasn't gloomy outside). It was super easy to coordinate key pick up and Tomas went above and beyond to make sure our stay was comfortable. The apartment is located very close to most touristic attraction but just a bit noisy as it faces a fairly busy street.
Foi óptimo para revisitar a pé a zona histórica do Porto. Muito boa localização,  instalações simpáticas, agradáveis e equipadas, permitindo estadias curtas ou prolongadas com tido o conforto.

Studio charmant, bien tenu et tout équipé. Emplacement idéal. Rue un peu bruyante la nuit.

Lovely and tidy apartment, all equipped. Ideal emplacement. Street a little noisy at night.

Tómas was very helpful and flexible as our arrival time changed a couple times. His friend Marta welcomed us and had lots of good tips to explore the city. The apartment is bright and clean and in a great location near the sights, restaurants and a park. Would definitely recommend the place!

Tomas was really easy to deal with during the booking process and answering any questions we had. He was out of town when during our visit but Marta and Sofia made us really welcome. The apartment is exactly as it looks in the photos, it's absolutely lovely. It's also in a great location, surrounded by restaurants and bars and very central. It's a lively area so can get a little bit noisy at night but Tomas told us about this before we came so we were prepared! A pair of earplugs did the trick. I would definitely recommend the apartment.
整體來說~非常滿意~非常值得推薦~

Tomás was very proffesional and all the time available for questions etc. The appartment was new renovated, very well located, clean and perfect appointed. Because of the great location we were able to do all our excursion just by walking.  

I can recommend Tomás and his appartment without any doubt.
Thanks Tomás for hosting us!
Appartement très mignon, propre et bien situé. Seul bémol: un peu bruyant la nuit le week-end.

Location was good and the studio spacious. Our host gave really easy instructions about how to get there.  Tomas had a very helpful information booklet- with information about supermarkets, local restaurants etc..
Lovely place for holidays! The place was really central and great!
L'appartement est conforme à la présentation

Tomas jest bardzo miłym gospodarzem, jednak nie do końca fajnym było, że na spotkanie z nami spóźnił się prawie godzinę. Ponadto pomimo tego, iż nasz pobyt w Porto trwał jedynie dwa dni ciągle pisał do nas wypytujac o wszystko, przez co mieliśmy wrażenie, że nas sprawdza i martwi się o swój- wcale nie taki super- apartament, w którym było bardzo głośno.

Tomas sent us several email messages.  He was proactive in making sure we got the key to the apartment and his telephone number.  There was a book he had made with listings of useful information like restaurants, bakeries, etc.  There were also maps of the city, etc.  The location was great! The small street is pedestrian only which we found charming.   We were able to walk to everything, no car needed. The Apartment was just as described.  We really liked it and always felt comfortable, it is sunny and light.  The kitchen was fully stocked.  We just made coffee and got great bread from the bakery less than a block away.  The only downside was the party noise each night.  There were people in the street singing and having lots of fun all night up to 4 and even 5 am.
Perfect guidelines to reach the appartment, sent upfront. Cosy compact appartment, good location near the centre and at a car Free street. Might get noisy however on friday and saturday nights.

L'appartement est idéalement situé, c'est un plus incontestable. Il est joliment aménagé.
En revanche, le quartier (et l'appartement juste au-dessus) sont un peu bruyants.

Nous avons commencé le séjour par une expérience malheureuse : Tomas n'était pas là pour nous accueillir à cause d'un vol tardif ; la porte d'entrée ne s'est pas ouverte comme prévu et les clés de l'appartement, que nous devions trouver sur le palier, n'étaient pas non plus là. Evidemment, attendre une petite heure à minuit passée que tout cela se règle était un peu frustrant mais, sinon, rien à redire.

Nous avons voyagé en couple et cette réservation correspondait parfaitement à nos attentes. En effet le studio est fonctionel, bien situé, tres bien équipé, et décorré avec beaucoup de goût. En se qui concerne le bruit, mentionné dans les autres commentaires, celà ne nous a pas du tout dérangé. En effet la nuit il y a du passage ce qui est normal vu qu'il s'agit du centre et que la ville bouge beaucoup la nuit, néanmoin il est situé dans une rue piétonne donc pas de bruit de voiture seulement des gens qui passent. La collaboratrice de Tomás qui nous a accueillit était souriante et tres sympatique. Elle nous a indiqué les bons endroits pour manger, se ballader, sortir et ses conseil nous ont permis d'apprécier notre séjour ...

Julio 2015. Apartamento en perfecto estado, limpio, bien ubicado (céntrico), perfecto para 2 personas, baño y cocina impecables, toallas y sábanas también. Colchón cómodo. Es exactamente como en las fotografías. 

Anfitrión muy atento, amable y agradable, ofrece soluciones para todo. Balcón* con vistas a la calle y mucha luz.

*Viernes/Sábado noche tened en cuenta que hay un bar en la esquina muy animado, no es el mejor día para acostarse pronto! 

Volvería a este mismo apartamento sin dudarlo.

Notre séjour chez Tomas à été vraiment sympa !
L'appartement est tres bien situé pour rayonner tout autour. La ville est tres belle et est très agréable .
L'appartement est super mignon et plein de charme et lumineux. Il est très fonctionnel , nous nous y sommes sentis vraiment très bien !
Nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Tomas mais il a mis tout en oeuvre pour répondre à nos questions , de plus un livret d'informations et de bons plans avec plein des suggestions est à disposition dans l'appartement , cela nous a été bien utile! 
Le quartier est passagé la nuit , donc un peu bruyant...seul petit bémol.
I had a excellent time in the apartment in Porto. Tomas was very kind and took the time to give me lots of restaurant recommendations. I highly recommend this! Thank you' obrigada!
We love this appartement. Nice, clean and cosy! Lovely neighbourhood. Great service!

El piso es tal como se ve en las fotos, muy bonito y acogedor. Nos recibió Sofía, una amiga de Tomás, y nos indicó con un mapa todos los puntos de interés de la ciudad. También tienen preparada una guía de la ciudad con todos los sitios donde comer, visitar, etc. 
Es muy céntrico y está en una calle tranquila. Totalmente recomendable.

Die Wohnung ist wirklich sehr schön und toll gelegen. Wir haben uns hier drei Tage lang sehr wohlgefühlt. Tomas war außerdem gut zu erreichen auch mitten in der Nacht als es mit dem Wohnungsschlüssel nicht ganz so geklappt hat, wie vereinbart. Danke dafür!
Perfect stay, perfect organisation and perfect flat. Thank you Tómas !

Very nice apartment and very good situated in the city center of Porto.  We felt really comfortable during our days there. Tomas gave us  a lot of information before  the trip  and also when we arrive.  He prove us a bed for our baby.  If we come back to Porto we will chose again.

La casa está es una de las mejores zonas posibles del centro de Oporto; puedes ir andando a casi todos los sitios que una estancia breve en la ciudad puede permitir. Tal cual en las fotos, muy bien cuidada, limpia y cómoda. 
El único aviso es si estás durante el fin de semana, que cierres la ventana por los posibles ruidos de la calle durante la madrugada.
Tomás es un anfitrión muy agradable, lo deja todo muy bien explicado y si necesitas algo antes o durante el viaje, está pendiente. 
Sin duda alguna, cuando vuelva a Oporto contactaré con Tomás.

We spent three nights at Tomás' apartment and really enjoyed our stay there. The location is great - it's at the beginning of a shopping street, very central to explore the city and also close to the station Sao Bento or the metro. The apartment looks exactly like on the photos, really comfy, stylish and perfect for a couple.
Tomás wasn't there when we arrived but he provided us with all information and indications we needed, including a welcome book at the apartment with everything you need to know and see in Porto. The communication was always easy, fast and helpful. We would highly recommend Tomás' apartment for a stay in Porto!

Magnifique petit studio. Très bien situé. Bonnes informations pour notre arrivée. Suggestions de trucs à visiter. Je le recommande. Pour un séjour plus agréable, amenez vos bouchons car les portugais sont bruyants la nuit.

Great location, right on the center.
It's a great place to stay with a special friend, because is really cozy, clean and fresh.
Tomas is a great person too, able to try to realise your askes.
I would totally recomend this place.
Thank you

We had a lovely stay at Tomas' apartment. It was very clean upon arrival, had everything we needed and was in a great location. - within walking distance to everything we needed. Tomas was also very helpful during our stay! The only downside was it did get a little noisy at night time but we otherwise had a great stay :)

Les indications données par Tomas pour arriver à l'appartement étaient excellentes et le studio charmant. Tomas met également à notre disposition quelques indications sur Porto et quelques bonnes adresses, dans tous les domaines (restau, magasin...). L'appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter Porto, dans une rue piétonne charmante et très vivante, mais malheureusement très bruyante la nuit, surtout le samedi !

El apartamento esta como en las fotos e impecable. La tv es de plasma, cosa que no aparece en las (Website hidden by Airbnb) ubicación perfecta a 10' caminando del centro. Tal vez es un poco ruidoso en fin de semana pues esta en una calle peatonal y se oyen las voces si la gente habla un poco alto. Tomas facilito nuestra llegada aunque hubo un malentendido con las llaves y eso demoro nuestra entrada al apartamento, pero las señoras de la tienda de abajo lo solucionaron lo mejor que pudieron a pesar de su bajo nivel de ingles.Lo recomendaría sin ninguna duda!

Unfortunately Tomas was not in Porto during our visit but his communication with us was excellent and we had no trouble locating the apartment and letting ourselves in. He has an excellent visitors folder with heaps of great advice on getting the best out of a stay in Porto.  The apartment is very well equipped, comfortable and  spacious. The location is excellent being within easy walking distance of all major attractions. It is situated on an interesting,mostly pedestrian mall, which unfortunately was noisy at night.  We were there for the start of the University year and much of the frivolity at night may have been attributed to students enjoying themselves.

Everything was great, the appartment is clean the information are collected in a awesome book. Tomás was answering right away.
We had a really good time.

The apartment looks the same as on the pictures, very nice! When we arrived a girl gave us some information about the city and the things we have to do and see. There was also an information book on the table that was made by Tomas I think. This was very nice and handy. 
The equipment of the apartment is basic but I think there is everything that you need. There was almost no basic food. There was no coffee (now there is, because we bought it :) ), no thee. Just some olive oil and basic herbs. There was no little welcome drink in the fridge. Not that we need it but our previous air bnb owners did it. You can see the place is not a personal space. There is no personal stuff. It's only used for rental. You even have to pay if you break a glass. Or bring your own garbage away.
In the day the apartment is very nice with the large windows. But at night it's really very very noisy. A lot of students are screaming and singing at night. Not only in the weekend but really each night. We couldn’t sleep and it was very annoying. There is also much noise in the late evening because of traffic. I think for the delivery at the shops.

The days in Porto were perfect. We found in the studio everything we needed for us and our baby. The location is very central. The neighboorhoud is lively with a lot of cute shops and bars. At night it isn't extremely noisy. If you are used to live in a city centre, it's normal. We loved to stay there and would come back every time. Thanks to Thomás and Sofia for everything!

Très chouette apparemment dans le vieux porto, dans une rue piétonne animées avec des bars sympa, quartier étudiant et très sympa, pas eu besoin de prendre les transports pour visiter, très central. Appartement très joli et très propre, rien à dire. Guide de la ville et de petites adresses à disposition, très sympa. Merci Thomas ;)

Tomás made us feel very welcome. When we arrived, Sofia, his associate, greeted us and provided us with lots of information and tips for the area. The location was fantastic and as the apartment was exactly described as in the listing. When we come back to Porto, we will definitely book with Tomás again!

We had a great stay in porto. 
Our arrival went very smooth and we got nice recommandations for restaurants and places to visit. The studio is clean, spacious and just like in the pictures. 
The location is very close to torre dos clerigos and the lillo bookshop. Nearby the studio there are small streets with bars and restaurants.

La experiencia en casa de Tomás fue genial. La casa era exactamente como aparece en las fotos, superacogedora. La ubicación, mejor imposible. Es muy céntrica y desde allí se puede ir andando a todos lados. La zona es muy agradable.
Aunque desafortunadamente no pudimos conocer a Tomás porque no se encontraba ese fin de semana en Oporto, en todas las comunicaciones con él (previas al viaje y durante nuestra estancia) fue rápido, amable y detallista. No tuvimos ningún problema. Sin duda, repetiríamos en su casa y ya lo hemos recomendado a nuestros amigos.

The appartement was perfect! It had everything we needed! Everything was clean and looked beautiful. The appartement had a perfect location. A little bit up the street was a grocerystore and there were bakery shops at every corner. A very nice extra was the little welcomebook on the kitchentable. It had al the info we needed, places to see, places to eat... It was wonderful!
Tomas is an amazing host, informative, and fast responding.. The place was quaint and nice.

Super séjour passé à Porto dans le studio de Tomas. Le studio est exactement comme dans la description et les photos. Il est très agréable, donnant sur une rue piétonne et passante de Porto. Nous avons été très bien reçu pas Sofia qui a été de bon conseil pour le séjour! A louer sans hésiter!! :)

Tomás' studio is perfectly located in the historical city centre of Porto: practically all sights are at walking distance and the apartment is only a stone's throw away of the vibrant Rua Galeria de Paris. The studio apartment is tastefully decorated and quite spacious. Tomás left us a guest book in which he has written down all his favourite places for sightseeing, eating and drinking. We ended up having a superb Francesinha at Café Santiago, many thanks! Our stay at Tomás' place made our weekend in Porto truly unforgettable.

Óptimo espaço! 

Limpo, muito confortável, muito central, e sossegado.
Acrescento também que a cama é super confortável, e que se dorme super bem!

Recomendo!!
Wonderful location! Sophia who welcomed us was absolutely sweet and recommended wonderful places in Porto!

Piso precioso, Tomás no ha podido estar cuando llegamos pero su amiga ha sido muy muy amable y nos ha recomendado muchos sitios muy chulos! El piso es muy limpio y tiene todo lo que hace falta! Además, está en pleno centro de Oporto en una calle peatonal con tiendas, restaurantes, cafeterías , etc. Muy recomendable!

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour
Le lieu correspondait parfaitement à la description de l annonce. Tout tout tout était parfait ! 
L appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter Porto.
tomas nous a reçu comme des princes et a su se montrer arrangeant pour notre heure de départ

Tomás' place had a very charming feel with all the modern touches in the right places. It's close to public transit, within walking distance to all your needed shops and restaurants, and he was even kind enough to let us extend our check out time several hours. The flat is on a pretty active street so it's not for the noise sensitive, but if you don't mind- it's a great stay.

Nice little apartment. Very well located. The host Tomas was very nice, likable and very obliging. The apartment is a little bit noisy because the windows go out to a lively street( but no cars!). Good place to stay.

Appartement idéalement placé pour profiter au maximum de la ville, et correspondant parfaitement aux photos. L'appartement est très bien équipé et propre, et situé dans une rue piétonne.  Nous avons été très bien accueillies par Sophia, qui nous a donné des adresses dont nous n'avons pas été déçues !

Tomàs was a very friendly host who came to visit us after a few days because he was out of town the first days! This was no problem because we were warmly welcomed by his friend Sofia. The appartment was nice and clean. There even was a TV that was way bigger than the original fotos showed. Thanks for this amazing accomodation

Tomas is a very accommodating host, and his place is located in a perfect spot to explore the city. The appartment is located on a very lovely street with a lot of restaurants, bars and shopping. So, it was expected to hear some noise coming from people on the street until late in the night. Appartment has everything you need to stay for a short or long time. Thank you!

Tomás was a great host; he kept in good contact before our stay and when coordinating our arrival. He gave us fantastic tips for socialising (Aduela, up the road, very nice) and eating (Dom Peixe in Matosinhos).  We had an especially early check out, and Tomás recommended the Goin' Porto shuttle, which saved us a few euros. 

The apartment is on the first floor, immaculately clean, and has plenty of amenities (flat screen tv, washing machine, kitchen).  It's located a very short walk from the Clerigos Tower and university, so you are very well located if you chose to stay here. My only advice is that this apartment is on a pedestrian street, and the partying can continue until the early morning in Porto! So if you are a light sleeper, bring ear plugs :) All in all, this is a great apartment and Tomás was a great host.

Très sympa et l'appartement propre. notre venue était très bien organisée. Tomas était disponible.
Le chauffe eaux pour l'eau de la douche n'est pas adapté pour plus de 2 personnes, nous nous sommes douchées à l'eau froide tout le week end. La rue est très calme la journée mais la nuit assez bruyante.
l'appartement est très très bien placé!
Ce qui est un peu dommage c'est que ce ne soit pas chez un particulier mais une agence.
Had a swell time in Porto! Thanks to Tomás and Sofia. Loved the apartment and everything was nice & neat!! Wish to go back soon.

Nous avons passé trois nuits dans l'appartement de Tomas. Cet appartement est très confortable, fonctionnel et très cosy, situé idéalement par rapport aux différents centres d' intérêts de Porto dans un quartier très animé.  Remerciements à Sofia qui nous a très bien accueillis et qui a été très accommodante notamment pour les bagages et pour ses recommandations pour la visite de Porto.
Merci à vous deux, nous avons passé un delicieux séjour dans votre ville!

Très cordialement,
Philippe.
Really nice flat as described :) i had a great time in Porto
The apartment is amazing! Very clean and pretty! We had a great time in Porto!

Adorámos a estadia na casa do Tomás, muitissimo central, tanto que visitámos tudo a pé. Bons restaurantes e bares na redondeza. O Tomás foi muito atencioso, o apartamento é ótimo e limpo. Obrigado Tomás, adorámos a sua cidade. Sítio a voltar.

Great apartment, with all the basics you need. Very clean and perfect location, very close to the train station. During the weekend it could be a bit noisy at night, but nothing some earplugs won't fix. We didn't get to meet Tomás, but he was very helpful in providing us with all the information we needed.

Erg mooi en schoon appartement op de 1e verdieping, van alle gemakken voorzien. Alle bezienswaardigheden liggen op loopafstand, we hebben geen gebruik hoeven maken van een metro of tram. Wel ligt het appartement aan een (autovrije) straat waar 's avonds en 's nachts redelijk wat mensen voorbij komen. Het contact met Tomás voorafgaande ons bezoek verliep erg plezierig. Bij aankomst kon Tomás ons niet verwelkomen, maar met duidelijke instructies konden wij onszelf binnen laten in het appartement. De volgende dag werden wij alsnog welkom geheten en heeft Tomás ons de bijzondere plekjes en leuke restaurantjes gewezen. 
Kortom een prima appartement voor een weekendje Porto.

The apartment and its location were great! 
Amazing experience and extremely nice and helpful host! 
I definitely recommend it!
tomas is a great host. He gave us a lot of informations about the city ! the appartement is in the center of porto (perfect !). It was a perfect trip for the three of us :)

This apartment was great, it's exactly how it is shown in the photos. The location of the apartment is on a side street with lots of lovely shops, cafés and there's a restaurant/bar a minutes walk away which had a live show and lots of dancing in the evening. You're also within a few minutes walk of more great restaurants and a bar.

Tomás was very helpful throughout our stay, he replied quickly and with all of the information we needed. We realised we didn't have an iron and he brought one over to us, they go out of their way to help, himself and Sofia were both very accommodating.  The amenities and WiFi are all excellent, everything is clean and well decorated. 

Other guests mentioned that the noise from the street below can be a bit much, but we didn't really get much noise at all. 
However, other people who were staying in the apartment building, on leaving, would slam the downstairs door which would rattle ours. Which wasn't a problem as you don't notice the first time, but as a reoccurring thing it can take its toll. That was our only negative comment about the apartment.

Other than one negative point, we really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay there again

A nossa estadia foi espetacular . Estivemos 3 dias no Porto e a casa estava muito bem localizado . Agradecemos muito ao Tomás e á Sofia pela hospitalidade  e disponibilidade . Tencionamos voltar ao porto e voltaríamos a ficar na casa .

We were welcomed at the apartment despite being a little late. It was as described and very centrally located. Restaurants, bars and shops were all within close proximity as was the port and local attractions as well as the railway station. We found the unit very clean,neatly set out and modern and containing all that we required for a stay in Porto including washing machine. The apartment block is very quiet however there is late night street noise which while not unexpected, went into the early hours of the morning despite our stay being during the week. Tomas was extremely helpful to deal with.
Les instructions pour arriver à l'appartement étaient très claires et nous avons  trouvé très facilement. La petite ardoise sur la porte était très accueillante.

One of the best air bnb I've stayed. 
Tomas and Sophia are both super helpful.

Tomas est très serviable et arrangeant pour l'horaire d'arrivée. Le studio est bien équipé, décoré avec goût et le livret d'accueil est très bien conçu. L'emplacement est pratique pour la visite de la ville et bien desservi par les transports en commun. Le quartier est très animé et pour les personnes au sommeil léger, prévoir des boules Quiès.

the apartment is well located , close to all major tours (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a passantevdu street downtown so noisy pelu .
Tomas we have provided all relevant information to our arrival , and the information provided to visit the city .
pleasant stay in porto.

Tomas nous a réservé un accueil chaleureux et nous a bien conseillé pour la visite de Porto et sur les restaurants. l'appartement est magnifique, d'une grande clarté et très bien équipé, il ne manque rien. Il est très bien situé à près de la gare et du métro.

Tomás is very friendly and helpful. He provided directions and gave us tips on what to visit. We were travelling with a baby and baby chair and bed were nicely provided. The apartment is neat, nicely decorated and clean and has all basics. However, the kitchen is a bit small if you want to cook and also the bath room is small. The location is very central, which is great. However, the apartment is also very noisy, you can hear the other people in the building and we were troubled by partying people in the street at night. Also during a sunny day the apartment can become quite warm.

Le studio proposé par Tomás est complètement conforme à la description. Très bien situé dans le centre de Porto, très propre et beaucoup de charme. Nous n'y avons passé qu'une nuit, le seul bémol est le bruit dans la rue mais c'est le prix à payer pour la situation du studio.
The studio was very sunny and nice, full of light. Tomas is a great host, communication was easy and quick!

Tomás' apartment is lovely inside - all up to date with almost everything you could need. The bathroom and kitchen are both  spacious enough for a city apartment. He left towels out, and was really good at responding to any questions we had. You're about in the heart of Porto, from which you can get to just about anywhere with an easy connection. It's a short walk into the centre to see the charming old part of town, or if you walk a bit further, you get to the pubs and bars. There are supermarkets, bakeries, and pizza/doner kebab takeaway places nearby. All in all, we had a great time staying here.

Tomás is a friendly and attentive host. Everything in the apartment is organized and just as pictured/described in the profile. He gave great recommendations of places to visit and restaurants to try.
Nice apartment, great location, uncomplicated host. Any time again!

Tomas a vraiment facilité notre arrivée et notre voyage à Porto grâce aux échanges de emails et au book présent dans le studio. Logement très bien situé, avec beaucoup de charme, dans le centre historique de Porto. Les photos correspondent tout à fait à l'appartement.
Un excellent séjour à Porto. Merci Tomas et ravis de vous avoir rencontré. Un appartement, conforme aux photos et au descriptif. Très agréable. Porto, nous reviendrons :).

Apartment just as nice as it looks in the pictures; light, airy and very clean. The location is fantastic and ideal for exploring the old town, with tons of good cafés, restaurants and shops nearby. Communication with Tomás was easy and quick both before and throughout the trip (including when we had to change meeting plans at the last minute due to our flight being delayed). He met us in person, made us feel really welcome and gave us some useful tips. Highly recommended!

We had a great time in Porto! Tomás was very welcoming and helpful! Although we arrived early, he allowed us to leave our luggage at his office and provided us with great tips regarding where to go, what to do and where to eat in Porto!! The apartment was just like in the photos, very clean and new! It is a very comfortable place to stay!! 
Thanks again Tomas! :)

The apartment is in a nice central location. It is clean, bright, and well-kept. Tomas was extremely helpful and professional. When we asked about parking he was nice enough to send us a full guide to the various parking options. So in general, highly recommended! Only minor issue we has was with noise. We had to keep the windows open a crack to let in some colder air at night, but this is a very central location, so there tended to be loud crowds outside at various times throughout the night.

Delicious time spent in Porto. 
The appartment is very clean, cute et well localised. Tomas and Sofia are amazing people very kind and helpful.
Goede tips in het welkomboek en vriendelijke ontvangst van tomas

Pasamos una semana estupenda en Oporto. El apartamento es bastante céntrico y desde allí recorrimos toda la ciudad a pie. La única pega es que por la noche es una zona un poco ruidosa, pero para nosotros no supuso un problema "degustar" también el ambiente nocturno portense. La ciudad bien merece una buena caminata. Los anfitriones nos informaron desde el día de la llegada acerca de los principales lugares para visitar así como de restaurantes cercanos donde podíamos degustar comida tradicional .
Tomas always quickly responded to my questions. He was really nice.
Bel appartement, fonctionnel. Dommage que le quartier soit si bruyant la nuit.

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans cet appartement au cœur de la très jolie ville de Porto. L'appartement est de qualité, fidèle aux photographies du site Airbnb et très bien équipé. Nous avons reçu de nombreuses explications et conseils sur la ville à notre arrivée et Tomas est resté disponible  pour toutes demandes (parking...). Le seul petit défaut de ce bien est que la rue devant l'appartement est un peu bruyante la nuit. Nous recommandons cette adresse !
Super séjour à Porto! L'appartement est calme et idéalement situé pour visiter la ville.

The appartment is great and really looks like the picture. 
The location is very convenient for a touristic trip in Porto. Tomas and his friend did every thing to welcome us the best possible, giving us good places where we could eat...
The major inconvenient of the place is that it is very noisy at night, with people partying until 4 in the morning.
It may be quieter on week days (we were there on a Friday, a Saturday and a Sunday night)

Tomas is a great host and the studio is a beautiful place to enjoy Porto. It is very centrally located and you can basically walk to any touristic attraction by feet. There are some nice (and not touristic) bars and restaurants just around the corner and (even it s a bit loud at night during the weekend) it is a great area. 
We love to come back and recommend the studio to other travellers who want to enjoy the city!
El apartamento es bonito, muy limpio y está situado en un lugar inmejorable de la ciudad. Totalmente recomendable.

De location of the appartment is perfect. It's in the middle of the center, so during the night you hear a lot.
The facilities in the appartment are good.
We received some good tips (restaurants and places to see). Also the welcomebook is very helpfull.

The apartment is incredibly centrally located off a major pedestrian street. We loved that there was a grocery store within a 5-10 minute walk straight down that walkway, where we could grab snacks and drinks etc. one thing to note: we stayed on a weekend and found a lot(!) of very loud people passing by, right up till the early hours of morning. If you're a light sleeper, definitely bring noise-canceling earplugs or consider a weeknight stay. Otherwise the sofa bed was comfortable, the in-suite laundry handy, and the washrooms were clean with a good pressure shower. Nice spot for a great price!
La recepción de Tomás fue excepcional. El apartamento muy bonito y agradable en una calle con mucho encanto.
tomas arrived on time to give me the keys and was very nice. thanks for having me.

Très bel appartement, chaleureux et cosy. Idéal pour couples. Situé idéalement dans une rue piétonne typique. Tomás est très gentil et disponible. Nous le recommandons sans hésiter.
Merci encore Tomás !

The Oporto Studio was just perfect. Ideal location, clean, comfortable and equipped with everything we needed (washing machine, hair dryer, coffee maker, cork screw, wifi…).

There's a choice of two supermarkets within 500 meters walking distance. The apartment is really surrounded by shops, restaurants, and bars – it's just a five-minute walk to the Lello Bookstore and Clérigos. Being centrally located goes hand in hand with hearing the night life throughout the night, so maybe pack some earplugs if you're a light sleeper.

Tomás was great at communicating with us and sent us detailed information on how to reach the apartment well in advance. He wasn't there to check us in (we arrived late in the evening), but made sure that everything went smoothly and we felt very welcome.

To sum it up: we loved the apartment, would recommend it to anyone and definitely plan on staying there for our next trip.
Appartement très bien situé pour visiter Porto. Attention toutefois, il est très bruyant et nous avons été réveillés à de nombreuses reprises par les bruits de la rue.

We stayed 4 nights in Tomás Studio and really liked it. Communication was great and fast, the apartement clean, well equipped and perfectly located. Everything is within walking distance which was great. Due to the bar area really close it however got quite loud at night. You either have to bring some whine and earplugs or go outside and join the party crew.

J'ai beaucoup apprécié l'appartement . Il est bien pensé et bien équipé. L'emplacement est idéal. On a tout à notre portée . De plus il est très propre et correspond vraiment aux photos. Je n' ai pas vu Thomas mais j'ai été reçue par Andrea qui m'a bien renseigné sur l'appartement et l'environnement. Il y avait aussi un cahier de renseignements qui m'a été utile. 
Pour ce qui est du bruit, il y en a eu un soir seulement. Somme toute je retournerais volontiers au même appartement.

We had a great time in Porto. Tomas´s apartment is small but very nice and perfectly located. You can reach almost everything by foot. Because of arriving in Porto very early we could leave our luggage at his office which is only a few minutes (by foot) away from the aparment before moving in. Just like everyone else in Porto Tomas is very friendly and helpful. He gave us some very useful infomation of how to explore the city. 

We can just recommend this apartment and we'll certainly come back some time.

Die Unterkunft liegt direkt in einer Shoppingstraße und somit Fußgängerzone. Sehr schnell erreicht man Einkaufsläden, auch für Lebensmittel, und kann von dort aus perfekt die Stadt erkunden. Wir haben uns sehr sicher gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist sehr hell und geräumig geschnitten. Alles war sehr sauber und exakt wie auf den Fotos. Das Bett war bequem, die Küche gut ausgestattet und die Dusche war sehr angenehm. Insgesamt war alles echt top. Tomas selbst haben wir nicht kennengelernt, er war dennoch jederzeit  erreichbar übers Handy und stand uns stets zur Hilfe bei Fragen. :-)

The apartment was clean and tidy. It looked exactly like on the pictures. Tomas was very friendly. The checkin and checkout procedure was easy and convenient.
If you have a very light sleep this apartment may be a little bit too noisy for you since the windows are not well isolated.
We had a great stay and enjoyed the central location of the apartment.

Good sized apartment that came clean and well equipped. Located in a great area with restaurants, bars and grocery stores within a 5 minute walk. Be aware that the apartment is close to street level and the University so there was some noise at night.
Very Beautil And Cozy Flat, clean And all new.  We had a great experience in Porto! Thanks to Tomàs And hope to be Back soon

Die Wohnung von Tomás ist wunderschön eingerichtet. Es war alles da, was man braucht, um sich an einem Wochenende in Porto wohl zu fühlen. Plus ein paar Extras: Es gab eine Mappe, in der Tipps für Aktivitäten, kulinarische Genüsse etc. drin standen inklusive  Wegbeschreibung, Bildern usw. Auf dem Tisch lag ein Flyer für ein breakfast delivery service, Tomás hat wirklich an alles gedacht. Super!
Auch war er während unseres Aufenthaltes gut erreichbar, z.B. als wir Schwierigkeiten mit dem Fotoapparat hatten oder fragten, ob wir zwei Stunden später auschecken können. Klasse!  
Die Wohnung liegt in der Fußgängerzone in einem wunderschönen Viertel, man hat alles vor der Tür, was man braucht. Sensible Schläfer könnten sich eventuell an nächtlichen Heimkehrern aus den umliegenden Kneipen stören. 
Wir hatten ein super Wochenende und würden immer wieder in dieser schönen Wohnung unterkommen! Danke Tomás!
