Nous avons passé 2 nuits chez Tomàs. L'appartement était très propre et conforme aux photos.
De plus, il est proche de toutes les commodités.
Le guide laissé à l'appartement est pratique si on ne sait pas comment organiser son planning.
Le soir c'est un peu bruyant  (balcon donnant sur une rue piétonne ) mais ce n'est pas dérangeant.
Si vous voulez passer quelques jours à Porto, arrêtez vous chez Tomàs, vous ne serez pas déçu !

Great apartment in a fantastic location, very central and close to lots of activities. Only downside was the noise from the street and other occupants in the building until about 4am each night but we had expected this from reading other reviews.   Overall, an awesome place to stay!

Verdaderamente Tomas es un anfrition excelente, todo lo que concretamos estaba. 
La habitación excelente, recomendada totalmente.
Y la ubicación inmejorable.
Gracias por todo.

Un super appartement très bien aménagé et bien placé dans Porto! Tomas et Andreia ont été très arrangeant malgré nos horaires d'arrivée et de départ. Nous avons pu laisser nos affaires en lieu sûr même quand nous n'avions pas l'appartement. Très bons conseils de visite et de restaurants! VERY GOOD!! Je recommande

l emplacement est idéal c est son point fort mais aussi un point faible car du coup le quartier est tres vivant donc un peu bruyant
mais tomas est tres arrangeant et il  fait tout pour faciliter le sejour 
a refaire
Tivemos uma ótima experiência no apartamento de Tomás. A localização é ótima, estava tudo limpinho e Tomás nos recebeu muito bem. Recomendamos!

Tomas was a great host although we had unfortunately no chance to meet in person. The apartment was as pretty as described and perfectly located. Whenever we needed something Tomas was there for us and provided a solution. We were four girls on a trip and the apartment was perfect for us. We would definitely come back. Thanks for making our stay so convenient. :)
Perfect place to stay in porto!

Tomas has been super nice and incredibly helpful! me and my friends arrived at different times in Porto and he made sure my friends could leave the luggage and not having to carry them around while they were waiting for me to arrive/to do the check in.

The position alone is amazing - right in the centre and allows you to walk around without having to take bus/metro.
And the studio itself is clean, nice and very comfortable!
100% recommend it

숙소 정말정말 예쁘고 편안해요! 이 가격에 이런 숙소라니 너무 기분 좋았어요. 언덕에 있긴 하지만 포르투 도시 자체가 전체적으로 그런 편이에요. wifi 속도도 빨라서 정말 편리했구요. 침대도 크고 좋아요. 길가에 있긴 하지만 시끄럽지 않구요. 다만 휴지가 구비되어 있지 않다는게 유일한 아쉬운 점이었던 것 같아요. 강력추천하고 다시 포르투 온다면 여기 다시 묵고 싶어요ㅋㅋ

Tomas, hat mich sofort nach der Buchung kontaktiert und hat mir eine Wegbeschreibung zukommen lassen. Die Unterkunft ist super gelegen, direkt in einer Einkaufsstraße und alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar. Die Wohnung hat die kleinen süßen Balkone, die zur Einkaufsstraße zeigen (super toll für einen Wein am Abend). Preisleistungsverhältnis, super !

La estancia en el apartamento de Tomás fue genial. La ubicación es perfecta para moverse por la ciudad. Está en una zona peatonal bastante transitada. La casa está muy bien equipada, tiene todo lo que puedas necesitar. Tomás fue muy amable desde el primer momento. Nos explicó todo al detalle y aunque no tuvimos la ocasión de conocerle, nos sentimos muy acogidos.  Si volvemos a Oporto (espero que pronto) volveríamos a repetir sin duda.

A great place to stay to discover Porto. The flat is lovely and bright, spacious, and very clean. Tomas wasn't there to meet us, but he had a plan in place for us to get in! He was extremely helpful throughout, going out of his way to help us get tickets for the football and solving a problem with the shower temperature straight away! One slight problem with the location is that you get quite a lot of street noise and one night in particular we were kept awake. All in all, though, a really great apartment and a really helpful host!

Super nice flat, clean, cozy and close to everything you may like to visit in Porto. Tomas is very precise, the only matter is that since the flat face a lively raid you may have problem with noise at nightime. Earplug and it is ok

Although we did not get to meet Tomas because of our late check-in time, he made sure our check-in went smoothly by sending us in advance detailed instructions. The apartment was clean and exactly as described. Neighborhood seemed safe, but got loud at night, which was expected because people in Porto know how to party. One issue we had was with hot water in the shower. The hot water tank has limited capacity, so once it runs out you need to wait ~45min or so for it to refill. Other than that everything was great and would recommend others to stay here.
Apartment very nice, perfect location, thanks for all the suggestions, highly recommended, 5 stars.

My fiance and I absolutely loved this place! It's in a fantastic location, really in the  heart of everything and definitely in walking distance to all of the main attractions. 

While it is a studio apartment, it is still quite spacious which meant we never felt cramped. And despite it being located in a very central area, it was lovely and quiet at night as soon as we shut the big shutters/blinds.  The apartment was lovely and clean and had all the usual cooking equipment to cook meals.

While we didn't meet Tomas, we met his friend who checked us in and was lovely. Communication with Tomas was great, he always replied immediately. He even had his friend drop around a bottle of champagne for New Year's Eve, which was incredibly sweet.

This is one of my favourite airbnbs that I've stayed in and would most definitely stay here again!
Great place at a great spot!! Nicely decorated hipster place. We really liked it. Tomas is super kind and relaxed. Everything is arranged perfect. Will come back again!!

We had a great time in the apartment of Tomás. Everything worked out perfekt. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. The location is very central, so we could walk to all the main spots. Communication with Tomás  was easy and we could leave our luggage in his office until we had to leave for the airport! Thank you Tomás!
Very good journey in Porto thanks to Tomàs. Beautiful appartement and next to all comodities.

Good location, walkable to sights and the metro which also goes to the airport and the futbol stadium.

The kitchen was stocked with plates and pots etc but no basic food items for cooking, you have to purchase everything.

The drains were all slow to drain, but the water was warm and the clothes washer worked.
Excellent place and service. Very clean and located centrally. The experience was unique.
Céntrico, agradable y acogedor

Tomás was extremely accomodating as to make our stay pleasant. The appartment is so nice that we wanted to move in (wooden floors, tons of natural light, clean and comfortable), and its location is perfect to go touristing as it is very well located. Will definitely stop by when retourning to Porto next time!
Senti-me em casa, excelente localização, com tudo o que se pode precisar numa casa.

We enjoyed our stay at Porto. Despite being too early to check-in, we were welcomed in his office to drop off our luggage for the time being. The apartement is spacious and well-centered, looking even better than we were expecting already. Tomas gave us a lot of information and tips for exploring this beautiful city. I definitely recommend staying there!

The apartment is at least as nice as shown at the pictures. We loved it! We didn't meet Tomas in person, but his friend Andrea, she was really friendly and helpful. We got advices for restaurants, bar and Cafés. Communications with Tomas was more than perfect. Highly recommended! We loved our stay in Porto and will come back :)
Nice appartement in the centre of Porto!

Great host, very accommodating--worked with us to keep our bags at their office after check-out until our flight.  Much appreciated! 

The apartment itself is great and centrally located.  The street can be noisy at times at night with the local students, but it's part of the charm of the city!

I was staying at Tomas place for 4 night and it was super accommodation! in the center of Porto, on walking street, so there was no car and noise, the location is very good and close to metro and buses! 
The apartment is bigger than I expected, with nice kitchen and big bed. I was there in cold period and was very happy to find a heater there. 
Thank you Tomas and Andreia for hosting us.
Very well situated ! Perfect for discovering the city of PORTO ! Tomàs is very nice and helpful ! The apartment is clean and spacious. I recommend it !
Tomás is very forthcoming and accommodating to our needs. The flat is lovely, well-located, but not so big.

Notre séjour à Porto c'est très bien passé ! Tomas a été très arrangeant et sympathique avec nous. L'appartement est parfaitement situé, on trouve tout à proximité. Nous recommandons grandement cet appartement et Tomas ! Nous gardons un super souvenir de ce séjour.

Really enjoyed staying at Tomas' place for our trip to Porto. One thing that was a bit of a shame was that on Saturday night, there was a party in the city with all the university students so it was a bit loud and I struggled to sleep, but that's no way Tomas' fault at all. The walls are quite thin, but nothing that was too bothersome for myself and my friend. Extremely central and amazing if you want to walk around the streets; loads of amazing food/drink places nearby which was a bonus!

We loved our stay at Tomas' apartment. It was beautiful and a perfect location to walk to everything! The restaurants down stairs are amazing. Tomas and Andrea are so nice they answered all my silly questions. The orientation at check in was so helpful, the book was filled with great tips of sights, restaurants, markets, etc. They had a crib set up with the cutest sheets and baby pillow, which the crib helped a lot. This apartment might not be good for light sleepers, luckily my baby and my family can sleep through a lot and at night the streets can get pretty loud with night life. The apartment itself is so adorable and has everything you could need, the laundry works perfectly. Thanks for a great stay.

El apartamento de Tomàs está en una excelente ubicación, céntrico y próximo a todos los lugares que se tienen que visitar en Oporto. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar un fin de semana en él. A la llegada te da información práctica muy útil de todo lo que hay que ver, sitios para comer, etc... La única pega, como otros usuarios han comentado, es el ruido que hay por la noche que entre desde la calle. Como ya lo sabíamos, nos llevamos unos tapones para dormir y solucionado. El trato con Tomás fue excelente y siempre estuvo atento para que todo fuera bien. Recomendable!

Cozy, cute apartment in Middle of the city. While the apartment is small, it packs everything that you might need -Washing machine, microwave, living area, dining table, you name it.

Given the price we paid for the apartment, we found it great value for money. Also, for us as tourists, the location was a big plus. 

Overall, I recommend the apartment.
This place is best suited for young people. Street noise is loud in the evening. Parking can be a problem or expensive.

Ideale Lage als Ausgangspunkt zu sämtlichen Zielen. Coole Kneipen, Cafés und Restaurants...alles um die Ecke. Besonders zu erwähnen ist die unkomplizierte Schlüsselübergabe trotz nächtlicher Ankunft und die freundliche und hilfsbereite Art von Tomás.

Die Wohnung von Tomás ist wirklich super! Die Lage ist perfekt, da man ein bisschen weiter entfernt vom Tourismus-Viertel ist und schon eher in einer einheimischeren Gegend wohnt. Trotzdem ist man innerhalb von 5-10 Minuten zu Fuß im Zentrum. 
Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und hat alles, was man für ein paar Tage oder mehr benötigt. Nachts hört man immer wieder Studenten in den Straßen, bei einem festen Schlaf ist das allerdings kaum ein Problem.
In der Nähe gibt es die beste Bäckerei Portos (Tomás empfiehlt sie auch) und ansonsten bekommt man auch in den umliegenden Supermärkten alles, was man braucht.
Für mich und meine Freundin war also alles perfekt für 4 wunderschöne Tage im hübschen Porto! :)

This flat was perfect for what we needed on our weekend escape. It was clean, very central, Tomas and his colleagues were super helpful and was a lovely looking flat. 
Top tip: bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper. There seemed to be some celebrations the Friday night that went on until a very grumpy sounding neighbor shouted at them. Lots of close by bars that are open till the early hours, I highly recommend vising some. Had lots of fun in this neighborhood.

We loved that place. It's really close to the center, the sun is shining at the breakfast table and everything in the flat was really nice prepared and also available :) - we would love to come again.

Perfect location! Tomas was so helpful when we checked in. He gave us a map and some tips on the city. We stayed over the weekend and the location is near many bars, it didn't quite down until 4am each night. If you don't mind the noise, this is a great place to stay.
Todo excelente!

Very nice and clean studio in the center of Porto. Tomas was very helpful with information about the city. Because there are a few bars close to the appartement it gets quite noisy at night. So it's perfect if you want to check out Porto's nightlife but it's not made for a quiet getaway.

While we enjoyed our stay I'm glad we didn't stay over a weekend as it was a little noisy. 
Welcome book was really helpful and the apartment had everything we needed.

Our trip to Porto was just great thanks to Tomas. The apartment is perfectly situated and has everything for a comfortable stay in Porto. 
The guest book is perfect for people who didn't have time to plan their trip. We definitely stay again at Tomas's apartment.
Great apartment, great host. Excellent location

We stayed in Tomás flat for 2 nights and everything was perfect. Tomás was a very nice host and gave us very usefull information regarding our arrival. Additionally there is a book in the appartment, where you can find all the information you need for your stay in Porto. The appartment is located optimally to explore Porto by foot. As well many bars and restaurants as a supermarket can be reached by foot in less than 5 minutes. 
Furthermore the Apartment is equipped with everything you need for example for cooking or also with a hairdryer.
All in all we really enjoyed our stay and would definetly recommend to stay at this appartment.

The apartment is exactly as it looks like, perfect for two, has everything you might need. Great location. Everything went on very smoothly, we were met by Mariana, she showed us everything and gave all the instructions! On Friday night it was a little but noisy outside there probably was some Friday night party gathering:)))) but it's ok! We enjoyed our stay in Porto very much. Thanks to Tomas and Mariana

L'appartement de Tomás est cosy et typique! Les photos reflètent bien la réalité. La salle de bain est mignonne avec une grande douche. 
De plus, il est vraiment bien situé, près des métros São Bento ou Aliados. Mais Porto est vraiment une petite ville pleine de charme où tout se fait à pied. Nous avons très peu utilisé le métro pour nos déplacements.

Nous sommes tombés le week-end de la fête des étudiants : ils sont vêtus de l'uniforme traditionnel et font la fête avec la présence de leur famille pour célébrer la fin de leur cursus universitaire. C'est aussi la fête pour les étudiants de première année qui passent en 2ème année. Il y avait du monde partout et c'était très vivant. 

Ce fût une super expérience !

Mon ami et moi avons passé 3 nuits dans l'appartement de Tomas qui a été très arrangeant pour notre arrivée et notre départ. La localisation est idéale, l'appartement est parfaitement équipé et le "Welcome book" très utile! Le seul point faible, comme beaucoup l'ont signalé, est le bruit de la rue à la nuit tombée et les nombreux noctambules qui y manifestent leur joie ;) Nous recommandons vivement ce logement pour découvrir Porto!
Great spot, really helpful host booking our airport transfer for us, nice appartment perfect for a few days looking round Porto.
We had a very nice stay at Tomás place.
Everything perfect (as you can see in other comments)

We had an excellent stay at Tomás apartment! The apartment was nice and exactly what we expected. It provided a great base to explore Porto. Check in and check out were super easy and we were even allowed to leave suitcases at the office to continue exploring after check out. Tomás and his team were extremely helpful and gave recommendations to help get the best out of the city, would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy and relatively central location. Thanks again!
Excellent séjour à Porto. Tomas est un hôte sympathique et très arrangeant. Son appartement est propre et très bien situé. Ne conviendra pas aux personnes qui recherchent le calme. Rue bruyante.

This place was fantastic - super clean and easy to get to. The location is awesome, it's walking distance to both the downtown area & the waterfront areas. We were traveling with a baby and were easily able to walk all over from the apartment. As a heads-up, because it is such a great location, it's right in the heart of things & can be noisy at night. Additionally, the hosts were fantastic - they were even thoughtful enough to furnish a small crib for our baby. They were also very responsive and left great advice for things to see & places to eat.

Die Unterkunft von Tomas ist wie in der Beschreibung, gemütlich und sehr schön. Die Lage ist perfekt. Sehr zentral, dafür kann es in der Nacht schonmal etwas lauter werden. Wir waren mit unserem Aufenthalt sehr zufrieden und würden jeder Zeit wieder kommen!

Very nice and big apartment. Andrea and Mariann were very helpful and caring trying to acomodate us with everything. The street is a very lively at all times and close has stores and restaurants on it. It is close to anything a perfect place for a tourist to choose.

The apartment is beautiful and the location is amazing. Our host gave us a really thorough and personalized list of suggestions for what to do/see. The bed was really hard and uncomfortable for both my husband and I, and it was really loud at night. We are both generally easy sleepers, but the beautiful balcony doors don't block out any sound at all. Overall our experience was great.

Very nice cosy studio in the heart of Porto. Fully equipped. Perfect communication before arrival, check in without any problems. Easy to find. Only negative point: Wifi could be a bit better, doing research on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps was very slow. Otherwise: thank you very much for everything!

Check in was easy and lots of information was given about the sights of Porto. The studio was in a very central location, which made it walkable to many places. However, due to the great location, you might expect some late night people noise from the street below as they walk home. It's not too bad if you close the terrace doors. The studio was very clean, bright and simple. It was a good value for the price and location.

L'appartement est équipé d'un lave-linge, appréciable. Seul gros inconvénient, le bruit la nuit et le matin très tôt, les portugais sont très festifs surtout en cette saison.
Merci Tomas pour votre accueil.

So happy I found this apartment on Airbnb, I recommend anyone visiting Porto to stay at this apartment. Fantastic location! The apartment is very clean. Best part of the apartment is the balcony, it was so nice to be able to open the doors and look out and see people walking around and the beautiful plaza right down the street. Mariana met us at the apartment and took the time to show us on map all there is to see in Porto, she also gave a fantastic restaurant recommendations. There's a very helpful guide book as well available in the apartment. Would love to visit Porto again stay at the apartment!

Close to city centre and really comfy.
Tomás is also very friendly and helpful, the check in and out processes are simply and easy!
Tomas est très bien organisé et très efficace. Et l'appartement est vraiment agréable.
Located in a pedestrian street, we were pleased to realise that the night was less noisy than we expected. Fully equiped, we fully recommend this lovely appartement for couples or groups of 2 people!

This appartment is a really cool place. It is very convenient and cosy. Kitchen and bathroom are fully equipped. We were really happy to stay. The only downside is very active and noisy nightlife outside. I had to use earplugs. But that's the only minus.
Todo fue genial

Tómas is clearly an experienced host who knows what he's doing. Communication from the time of booking was excellent. Check in was very easy. The space is very accurately represented by the posted pictures with great natural light and decoration. The balconies were very pleasant to sit on and enjoy a glass of wine in the evening. The neighborhood is fantastic—centrally located in a lively area, walking distance from many great sights. The bed was very comfortable. Kitchen is well equipped. Would highly recommend staying here.
Très bel appartement, bien situé, proche des commerces et de la vie nocturne.
Really good flat centrally located - good price and really helpful

The apartment is very nice and central, good for visiting and exploring Porto. But there are a lot of bars nearby and so it is loud in the night until 5am.
Thomas was a very nice and helpful host.

Fantastic 5 days in a lovely apartment. Very brightly and clean. Perfect location for walking to anywhere in Porto. Tomas was a great host although we did't meet him. Highly recommended! Thank you, Joanna&Rafael
This is a perfect spot, centrally located, lively & bags of character.
If you like a tidy, beautiful apartment with a balcony and if you're not a light sleeper, this is the perfect place for you! My sister and I had a wonderful stay.

Nous sommes restés qu'une nuit. L'appartement est très agréable et très bien décoré. Nous n'avons eu aucun problème. La rue piétonne est un peu bruyante (principalement l'été sans doute), mais l'appartement est au 1er étage et facile d'accès. c'est la seule réserve. A recommander +++ !

What a lovely apartment in a heart of Porto! It was just what we needed for our short stay in this wonderful city. The apartment was well equipped, clean, very modern and cosy.
The host(s) were easy to communicate, incredibly polite and helpful, leaving us a small booklet with recommended places to go, which we absolutely loved. 
Highly recommended host!

Studio agréable, bien agencé et vraiment bien situé dans le centre historique de Porto, ce qui explique pourquoi de nuit il est un peu bruyant. 
Mis à part ce petit inconvénient, Tomás est un hôte agréable et sérieux, qui fait en sorte que votre séjour à Porto se passe le mieux possible. Je recommande vivement ce studio !
Todo perfecto, el piso muy nuevo y todo muy limpio, la ubicación perfecta y céntrica y cerca de la zona de marcha para quien quiera salir de fiesta.

The apartment of Tomás is in the heart of the city and very nice. It is a beautiful place to stay. It is close to good restaurants, amazing night life and tourist attractions. The flat is exactly like on the photos. At the check in we got helpful tips and recommendations. Only little negative point (to some people) is that there was a bit noisy at night, because of the people on the street. We enjoyed our holiday and had an unforgettable time in Porto.

Nice and clean, a little noisy.
Make sure you use the fan while sleeping to cover up all the noise.
Good location.

Great hosts and a really nice apartment. 

Our only problem was the noise from the restaurants downstairs during the night. I guess it depends on how lucky you are - we had both good nights and "long" nights.

We were very happy with the location and apartment in general. Super cute. Loved having the balcony overlooking a great street. Perfect for our one night stay. I definitely recommend it. Regarding the noise once you close the shutters it's totally fine. Tomas was very communicative and even though he wasn't able to meet us he answered all questions quickly and Mariana who greeted us was lovely and super helpful and gave awesome suggestions. We were really happy with our stay.

L'appartement est propre et très bien situé. Idéal pour visiter Porto. Un peu bruyant le samedi soir, mais en étant en plein centre ville c'est assez logique ! 
Accueil de tomas et de son équipe parfait !
Great location, a bit noisy but the apartment is perfect for a couple!
Very nice apartment with all the necessary info about Porto and all the things that you may need. Pleasant location and cosy place.
Très bien situé et très propre! L'appartement est super bien équipé et décoré! Je recommande à tous! Tomas est très accommodant

The flat was in excellent condition and the location was perfect for travelers to visit the many attractions Porto has to offer. The host gave excellent recommendations for restaurants and suggested routes to optimize the trip experience. Highly recommend!

Fantastic studio for my boyfriend and I to base ourselves in Porto! Tomas and his team were fantastic - looked after our bags during the morning before check in and gave us some great recommendations.  The studio was clean, well equipped for our 3 days in Porto and comfortable bed. The location was perfect - Candelabra is a GREAT wine bar just around the corner where we spent most nights. We stayed during orientation week for the university - a wonderful vibe and we partook in some festivities with the students at the popular bar 77 down the road. A bit loud at night due to the partying but it didn't bother us at all (if you're sensitive to noise I would bring earplugs).  Easy walk down to the river and great location for all the sights (and Sao Bento station).  We would definitely return to Tomas' studio on our next trip to Porto!
Great apartment in the heart of Porto, we were able to reach all beautiful sights of porto by foot. The check in was easy and we had a great time here.

The apartment was exactly as needed - perfect location, close to delicious places to eat and walking distance to all the beautiful sights of Porto. First night, Sunday, was calm and peaceful. Second night, Monday, was shockingly loud and we were unable to sleep between 1-4 am due to the nightlife out in the street. Overall, highly recommend this beautiful stay if you can handle the noise!
Super schönes Apartment in bester Lage um schnell zu den zahlreichen Bars und Restaurants zu gelangen. Dementsprechend die ganze Nacht etwas lauter aber auszuhalten ;)

El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos, incluso es más amplio de lo que esperaba. Bonita decoración y confortable. Con todos los utensilios necesarios. Ubicación muy buena, fácil acceso andando a todas partes. 
La única pega el ruido. Se oye todo el ruido de la calle y es una calle bastante bulliciosa. Estuvimos de jueves a domingo y los 3 días se oía a la gente de fiesta durante toda la noche. Ya lo habíamos leído en otras críticas, así que llevamos tapones y con esto no hubo mayor problema. 
La comunicación con Tomás y Andrea estupenda en todo momento. Son muy amables y contestan rápidamente. 
En relación calidad/precio me parece una opción recomendable.

O apartamento é estiloso, bem localizado, estava limpo e fomos super bem recebidos pelas Mariana e pela Andreia, pois o Tomás não pode nos receber no check in. Elas nos deram várias dicas, foram bastante atenciosas e simpáticas, e o apartamento superou nossas expectativas. Foi tudo ótimo, nota 10, recomendo!

The apartment of Tomas and Mariana was very cosy, clean and comfortable. All sightseeings are just some minutes away from the apartment. The main street is a little bit loud, but for two nights it was absolutely ok. Communication with Tomas and his friend Mariana was perfect and we got really great advices. Thank you Tomas and Mariana.
Lovely and central place! Restaurants, bars and shops are very close! Lovely furniture, just the bathroom is a bit too small. Andreia was very friendly and have had lots of tips for us!

I adore this place! Easy access to center of the city, historical spots, and good restaurants! The only problem is.. you expect noise all thorugh nights from outside. This is because of two restaurants down there. I recommend this place when u visit Porto, but don't forget to bring ear plugs with u for deep sleep!

Wonderful stay! Great location and beautiful lighting in the apartment. The best part was our host greeting us and giving us a spectacular run down of the city and where to go. We had less than 24 hours, but lucky for us, the tips we got for our host allowed us to venture to the best spots. Great experience all around!

The apartement is perfect for two guests. We were suprised how central it is, you can reach all of the city centre easily by foot. The communication with Tomas was very good and we were able to check in without any problems. We definitely recommend it!
Very clean and beautiful apartment in the center of the city.
Wonderful place...nice contact....ever time again.

The flat is well maintained, clean, and with all that you need to enjoy your stay in Porto.
Thomas provide very useful information to enjoy your stay in the city. We will go back as soon as we have the opportunity.
Great apartment but very close to the street therefore very noisy at night. However, still pretty cool.

We had a great stay at Tomas’s place. It was perfectly located as we were close (walking distance) to almost everything. The apartment was equipped with all the necessities and was true to the online descriptions and pictures. Check-in was seamless with good communication. It should be noted that with close proximity to everything comes a much higher noise lever at night - not a place for light sleepers. We would definitely recommend Tomas’s place.

Das Appartement ist sehr sauber und alles war super organisiert. Es waren sogar Regenschirme vorhanden die wir zum Glück nicht gebraucht haben. 
Tomas hat uns einen Shuttleservice vermittelt, der uns am Flughafen abgeholt und direkt vor das Haus gefahren hat. Das hat super geklappt und wir können es nur empfehlen!  
Die Lage des Appartements fanden wir sehr gut.  Man kann alles zu Fuß erreichen und es liegen einige Sehenswürdigkeiten direkt in der Nähe. Auch der Weg an den Fluss ist nicht allzu weit und führt durch schöne Gassen und an vielen kleinen Geschäften vorbei. 
Samstag Nacht war es etwas laut weil es einige Bars und Restaurants in der Nähe gibt aber die restlichen Abende waren ruhig und wir haben sehr gut geschlafen. 
Wer zur kühleren Jahreszeit kommt muss nicht frieren, die Heizung im Bad und der Elektro-Ofen haben tadellos funktioniert und es wurde schnell warm. 
Alles in allem hätten wir ein paar wunderschöne Tage und sind begeistert von Porto.  Wir kommen wieder.

Tomas’s place is a lovely little gem in a great location - we walked all around Porto and found it to be very central and convenient to all the best spots. We didn’t get to meet Tomas, but his colleague Marianna met us at the apartment and provided us with really thoughtful suggestions and tips to navigating the city. Just one thing to note, as some previous reviews have - it can tend to get noisy at night, which wasn’t an issue for us, but could be if you’re looking for total peace and quiet. Thanks to Tomas and Marianna for a great stay!

L’appartement est beau et bien aménagé, d’une propreté impeccable et sa localisation centrale est parfaite! Nous avions des instructions pour récupérer les clefs ce qui est pratique pour une arrivée tardive. 
En revanche l’inconvénient est que le quartier est très bruyant jusque tard dans la nuit, en tous cas le week end, et l’appartement n’étant pas équipé en double vitrage donc les nuits ont été très entrecoupées et courtes puisque le matin ce sont les travaux dans l’immeuble voisin qui nous ont réveillé. 
Mais pour un court we nous avons vraiment apprécié sa localisation très proche du centre

Everything was perfect. Tomás even provided a local telephone which made using the map and calling a taxi Super helpful. 
The place was clean and they were very accommodating. Highly recommended.
Great apartment in Porto!
Overall, a wonderful place to stay in Porto! Excellent location, and the hosts provide wonderful tips (definitely would follow their recommendations). Would certainly come back!

Everything was perfekt. The apartment was in the middle of the city. It was clean and you had everything you needed. 
Perfekt apartment, nice host. 
Thanks for the good time in Porto.

Great welcome, Andreia took the time to tell us about the best sites to visit. The appartement is really well located and really pretty. Not far from everything in the center 10 to 15 minutes by feet not more. I highly recommend.

Eu recomendo o apartamento. Tanto o Tomás quanto a Mariana sempre responderam brevemente no (Hidden by Airbnb) . A localização é muito boa e o apartamento tem todas as comodidades para se passar alguns dias com conforto e praticidade.

The apartment was spacious and light with everything as described in the ad. It is located walking distance from everything you’ll want to do in Porto and very close to Pinga Duce, a big supermarket. 

The kitchen and bathroom are modern and we used the kitchen daily to prepare breakfasts. One very minor issue is that the tap in the bathroom doesn’t have much pressure, it wasn’t too much of an problem but I think could be serviced quite easily. The balcony was a nice addition although it was a bit too cold for us to use it but I can imagine in the summer it would be a great asset. 

Our hosts were helpful and provided a good guide book to help our way around the city. All-in-all we had a terrific stay and would certainly recommend O'Porto Studio Historic Center.
Great apartment central to everything.  The avenue can be a bit noisy at night with folks enjoying themselves but the location was worth the noise.

Alles war einfach perfekt! Das Apartment liegt super zentral und nah am Nachtleben und die Stadt lässt sich von hier aus einfach zu Fuß erkunden. Wir haben zusätzlich noch eine Stadtkarte und ausführliche Tipps bekommen, welche uns sehr geholfen haben. Wer hier bucht, macht alles richtig! Wir waren rundum zufrieden.

Our experience was great. The house was perfect and in a very good location!! You can visit all the city on foot from this position. The house offers every kind of comforts. The hosts were very kind and they gave us precious informations to enjoy our journey. Check-in and checkout are flexible and easy. We definitely loved Porto and this beautiful house and strongly recommend it!

We had a really nice and warm welcome at the clean, cozy and stylish apartment. The location could not have been better. EVERYTHING is in walking distance. 
You could have asked for more nice or flexible hosts. 
It was a bit noisy at times, but the apartment is in the middle of town, so that´s to be expected.
All in all I can really recommend a stay here.
Excelente. Acomodação. Receptividade. Localização e infra estrutura. Ideal para QQ tipo de hóspede.
Nice place with well equipped kitchen and good location. Its very central so don't complain when it gets loud outside on weekends. The wifi was slow, everything was clean and the hosts are friendly.

This apartment was lovely, and Tomas was great about keeping in touch. It is in a good location, central to everything in Porto. Tomas provides a booklet with recommendations on where to go and what to see, and he had a cell phone loaded with information that we got to use free of charge! This was incredibly helpful as we didn't have cell phone service on our phones. It got a little loud at night as it's close to several bars and they apparently stayed open quite late. Other than that, we enjoyed our stay in Porto and would stay here again!

Everything is right downstairs, the apartment is spotless clean and very new. Shower is good and you have all the basics in the kitchen. The only thing is the tap water in the toilet is really weak, not a big issue though since you can always use the kitchen sink. It gets a bit noisy even at 2am but if you close all the windows it’s fine. Beware that you need to move your luggage up one stair. Would definitely stay here again!

Really nice place for visiting this beautiful city, Porto. 
Stylish house and all those thoughtful things are quite impressed me.

Wunderschöne Unterkunft im Herzen von Porto. Die Wohnung von Thomás ist wie in der Beschreibung angegeben. die Ausstattung ist perfekt für einen Kurzurlaub in Porto. Alles ist fußläufig erreichbar und direkt vor der Tür liegen eine Menge Geschäfte und Bars. Wir fanden insbesondere die Flexibilität beim Check-In und Check-Out sehr angenehm. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.

Das Appartement liegt super zentral in der Innenstadt, sodass alles fußläufig erreichbar ist. Die Ausstattung ist top, man hat alles was man braucht! Der Empfang war sehr herzlich und sogar ein früherer Check-In möglich. Tomás und seine Kollegen sind alle sehr offen und haben uns sehr viele Restaurants, Cafés und Aktivitäten in Porto empfohlen. Vieles davon haben wir tatsächlich gemacht und waren sehr zufrieden mit den Empfehlungen. Wir können wirklich nur Positives berichten! :)

El alojamiento es tal y como aparece en las fotografías. Hemos recibido un trato muy bueno por parte de Tomás, quién contesta rápido a los mensajes y nos permitió dejar las maletas en su oficina después del check out del día de salida. Recomendable. Repetiría de nuevo.

Lovely space near to the local bars restaurants .. short walk to the metro stops and the 10 mins to the river .. Tomás was in contact Prior to the trip and his friends provided a great overview of the area .. I would recommend

We stayed in the apartment for a long weekend. The location is central and we were able to to everything by foot. The apartment is cozy and very beautiful.

We were provided with a map and a lot of very helpful advice on where to go and what to see. 

It is indeed a bit loud during the night on the weekend, but this is something we knew from the beginning so we didn‘t bother at all!

In total we had a lovely stay and I would definitely recommend the place!

Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen & haben viele nützliche Tipps bekommen (vielen lieben Dank dafür!!).
Die Wohnung liegt super zentral in der Nähe von netten Restaurants & Bars. Von daher kann es am We aber auch recht laut werden, aber das wussten wir vorab. Das Apartment liegt direkt in einer Einkaufsstraße & viele der Hauptsehenswürdigkeiten sind fußläufig zu erreichen. Gute Ausstattung!
Für uns hat alles gepasst - gerne wieder!
Nuestra estancia ha sido genial, la ciudad, las recomendaciones de lugares, el apartamento buen ubicado y limpio. La comunicación rápida. Gracias.

Tomás’s place in Porto was exactly as described! It’s central to the city center, yet not where all the tourists are. Tomás was excellent in communicating with me before and during my stay, and was quick to respond. When I first got to the apartment, his colleague Mariana was there to meet me and spent a good amount of time giving recommendations and showing me spots to go on a map. They also provided a free guest phone with unlimited data to use during my stay so that I could find my way around— it was such a great touch!

There was one slight issue with the shower when I got there, but as soon as I told Tomás, he fixed it right away with no problems. The response was quick and he left some treats for me for the trouble (it was very thoughtful!).

If I’m ever in Porto again, I would definitely stay here!
L’appartement est très mal insonorisé. La propreté est à revoir. L’appertement est géré par une compagnie professionnelle, on peut s’attendre à mieux pour le prix comparé aux autres offres à Porto.

Wir waren im März 2017 in Porto. Das Apartment ist sehr schön eingerichtet, hell, gut ausgestattet und sehr sauber. Die Schlüsselübergabe klappte sehr gut und die Tipps und Informationen waren sehr hilfreich. Andreia war sehr nett. Die Lage war auch super. Wir wollten möglichst viel zu Fuß unternehmen und das war von dort aus auch sehr gut möglich. Ich würde das Apartment sofort wieder buchen, wenn es nicht die ganze Nacht bis 5 Uhr morgens auf der Straße sehr laut gewesen wäre. Andere Nachtschwärmer grölten, sangen und stritten sich lautstark. Schade! Wer also selbst bis morgens unterwegs ist, dem kann ich das Apartment zu 100% empfehlen.
Had a lovely stay in Porto. Flat is conveniently located, clean, stylish and with lots of light. Can get a bit noisy during the night. Thanks again for letting us stay :)

Der Aufenthalt bei Tomas war super! Die Lage des Apartments ist klasse und die Kommunikation mit Tomas verlief ohne Probleme. Wir hatten ebenfalls die Möglichkeit nach unserem Check out unser Gepäck bei ihm im Büro unterzustellen. Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit in Porto!

Die Wohnung ist sehr schön. Vor allem die Lage ist super. Man erreicht zu Fuß alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten. Der Kontakt war sehr freundlich und wir haben direkt nach der Ankunft viele Tipps erhalten.

Dit appartement dicht bij het oude centrum was erg fijn. Alles is op loopafstand. Dichtbij restaurantjes en de bezienswaardigheden.
Wij hebben er niet echt last van gehad, of tenminste, er geen probleem van gemaakt. Maar het appartement ligt aan een zeer levendige straat. Tot in de late uurtjes komt er luidruchtig publiek voorbij, zeker in de weekenden. Het geluid heeft ons zeker een aantal keren wakker gemaakt.
Iets om rekening mee te houden als je denkt hier niet tegen te kunnen.
Wij hebben iig een heel prettig verblijf gehad in porto.

We had a great stay at Tomas’s place. The place is as shown in the pics, only the bathroom is a little small but the space is managed well. The location is fantastic & within 10-20 mins walk from all main attractions. If you’re driving there’s an underground parking right near the house. Wonderful stay on the whole
Muchísimo ruido por la noche

Die Unterkunft war sehr sauber und Tomás war sehr hilfsbereit. Die Lage ist perfekt für Shopping und die "Partymeile" ist auch nicht weit entfernt.
Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet und für einen guten Kaffee steht eine Nespresso-Kaffeemaschine zur Verfügung.
Wir können die Unterkunft sehr empfehlen und kommen gerne wieder.

L'appartement est très bien situé, c'est un véritable cocon où l'on se sent parfaitement bien.
La propreté est irréprochable et l'accueil a été très chaleureux.
Les conseils de restauration ont été suivis et approuvés
La ville de Porto est très vivante (jour et nuit) et très agréable à visiter.
De très bons souvenirs
A recommander
Cute space. Very central. Easy check in with great tips!
Estudio muy céntrico, ideal para dos personas.
Very good location, Wonderful city. in hindsight we should have stayed longer here. definitely much nicer than Lisbon.
This apartment is a fantastic location. We were greeted with a very helpful welcome including lots of great tips. Highly recommend to others x
Great location, lively neighbourhood and walking distance to main attractions in Porto. Close to supermarket and coffee shops for breakfast. Great recommendations for dinner
Very nice
Geweldige locatie. Prima hosts. In de nacht wat lawaaierig. Heerlijk geborreld en gegeten
We enjoyed staying at Tomas' place.  We liked the neighborhood.  What stood out was being given a map and a thorough orientation to the city by Luis.
Really great stay. My hosts were so kind and helpful. The apartment is really nice,  and every detail was thought out to make a great stay. I hope to return soon.

Porto is such a gorgeous town!! Tomas’ place is located in a fantastic location. He offers great advice for the area and has an awesome guidebook as well. The apartment is beautiful and very easy to find. It can be a bit loud at night but Tomas’ shutters and fan certainly help. We highly recommend!

This apartment looked exactly as it did online, was clean, and was in a perfect location just minutes from a popular strip of bars. Thomas was prepared and made out check in and check out as smooth as possible. I would definitely recommend staying here.
We had a great stay! Great location, great price. Thank you

As described. Tomás’s place was big, bright and centrally located.
The attention to detail was a pleasant surprise: the place had wifi, TV and a portable cell phone that you can borrow if you don’t have a data plan and need to use internet or make calls while out and about.
My only comment is that the neighbourhood, being as central as it is, is very noisy at night, with partiers out and about until 4am. If you want peace and quiet, it might be wise to stay in another neighbourhood.
Thanks Tomás!
Great location with everything you need to take full advantage of this beautiful city.
Sehr nettes Appartment in ausgezeichneter Lage, lebhafte Umgebung und alles zu Fuß leicht zu erreichen!

Appartamento molto carino, pulitissimo e in posizione centrale.
Thomas è stato molto efficiente e sempre disponibile.
Appartamento perfetto per un week-end in coppia!!

Good central location  easy to get to from the airport by tram and then short walk, clean apartment . Street outside can be noisy at night but can’t really be helped because the location is so central. Overall good apartment and location for a city break

Tomas’s place is centrally located-an easy walk to the “must sees” in Porto. 
Metro stations are close, restaurants abound.

It's almost impossible to ask for a better location for an apartment. Located on a beautiful, commercial yet relatively quiet street, this apartment is a short walk away from the heart of this beautiful city. Tomás answered very quickly and very thoroughly to our questions (even though we didn't get to meet him). Otherwise, the apartment itself was nice and clean and contained everything necessary.

This apartment is a great value and ideally located - close to tourist areas, but secluded enough that you can pretend you're a local. Tomás is an excellent communicator and host: when the internet wasn't working, he came within a few hours and replaced the router. 

Be aware that because of the ideal location (directly on a cool pedestrian street 1 floor above bars and restaurants) that it can be extraordinarily loud at night. Bring your earplugs and use the 2 provided fans for white noise.  At one point, there was a crowd of people yelling, smoking, and smashing beer bottles under our windows at 2am. We turned the fans up to high and closed our windows, and it was fine. Would happily stay here again! Try Capela Incomum, a wine bar in an old chapel, which is just around the corner.

Appartement intéressant  pour sa localisation situé sur une rue piétonnière commerciale . Resto , boutiques , épicerie à proximité....quoique un peu bruyant le samedi soir mais le petit inconvénient pour demeurer dans un endroit offrant tout cela.
Appartement offrant un bon rapport qualité prix  mais l'offre de ce type d'appartement pour 2 personnes dans la même gamme de prix est forte et il y a intérêt a bien comparer surtout si vous réserver longtemps à l'avance car il y a assurément des appartements offrant  un meilleur rapport qualité-prix plus  ...avec de la climatisation!

Très bien situé, à proximité de plusieurs bons restaurants et bars, près de toutes les attractions touristiques. Appartement propre et conforme aux images. Nous avons pu déposer nos bagages à l’avance au bureau de Tomás afin de découvrir la ville en attendant que notre appartement soit prêt. Et nous avons été accompagnés jusqu’à l’appartement et très bien accueillis avec plusieurs excellentes recommandations pour profiter de notre séjour. Nous recommandons sans hésiter!
Great little apartment ideal for a mini break in Porto.

Great location in the center of Porto, everything is 5-10min walking distance. The apartment is located in a pedestrian zone with shops and bars, so it could get a little loud during the night. 
Tomas is a great host, responsive and left a map and lost of things to see and do in Porto.
Great appartement! We didn‘t have any complains.

Really a nice apartment, very clean and silent, near the city center. 
Tomás is a good host.

Tomás and his friend Luis are very polite and helpful. Tomás answered to our messages within a short time. Luis welcomed us for the uncomplicated check-in and gave as useful tips for a nice stay in Porto. The apartment offers enough space for a comfortable stay. It is very cozy, well decorated, clean and well equipped with useful household utensils. We are very grateful for the beautiful stay and recommend the apartment.
Apartamento céntrico, con encanto, luminoso. Los anfitriones muy amables tienes pequeños detalles  de bienvenida, aceite, sal, servilletas. La verdad nos encantó, todo cuidado.

The apartment is just perfect for Porto. We had an amazing time there. The apartment was nice, well decorated and very central. You can reach everything by foot. The historic center is filled with restaurants and cafés. Some of them are just right next to house. If you are looking for a nice place to stay you should stay at Tomas’s place. You will have a great time in Porto!!
Nice apartment within easy reach to major atractions. However it is really noisy almost till 5:00 am with crowds leaving the neighbouring bars. Other than that Thomas was a good host.

The flat is very nice and spacious, as it is in the pictures. The check in and check out was very smooth and Tomas was helpful. The only thing is that we didn’t sleep so well as the bed isn’t too comfortable and the street is very noisy. Anyways we had a great stay in Porto, thanks !

The apartment was absolutely perfect! We really enjoyed staying there. Best location to explore Porto.
Would come back anytime!
Great apartment!
A beautiful modern bachelor apartment in the perfect location, close to all amenities and a short walk to historical district. The hosts were always accessible for questions and tips!
Perfect place for a couple. Great location and very clean! Strongly recommend it.
Very energetic atmosphere. Excellent  food everywhere. This place let's you walk into the night life that starts at your front door. Location is excellent.

Lovely place and everything was pretty fine :) you can walk everywhere by foot which is awesome. The only negative is that its a little bit loud at night but its worth the noise! Would totally recommend this place :) Just perfect.

Beautiful and spacious apartment in the happening part of Porto. Tomás provided so much information to make sure exploring Porto was easy plus the little things, like coffee capsules and an ironing board, that make a difference! It's a part of Porto with popular bars so the noise level can be high late at night, but if you love the atmosphere then this apartment is a great option.

Location is perfect and Tomas answering very fast at your email. 
Cell phone for free in the appartement which is very useful !
Very comfortable, a little noise, but it was student rush week.
Excelente localização e hospitalidade!
We really enjoyed our stay here - it is a very nice, clean apartment in a great location. We were given many local tips which were very useful, especially when finding great food! thank you!

Very nice apartment, which is located in a nice part of the city from where you can walk everywhere within a few minutes. Unfortunately, the street nearby is very crowded at night, so it was always very loud.
Great location, easy checkin, quick response time, amazing local tips.. overall a great experience. Would definitely recommend!
Really nice place, in a great central location

C’est un appartement fonctionnel très bien placé mais bruyant car en pleine rue piétonne et près des bars. On y est bien ! Bonne literie et vraiment très propre. Le propriétaire est très très sympathique
Prachtige B&B en ruim appartement. Lekker centraal bij het centrum

This apartment is awesome and right at the heart of the city!  Tomás had excellent communication with us the entire time.  It was our first time in Porto and we loved Porto and this apartment!  We were greeted by Andreia.  Upon arrival, she went above and beyond in giving us awesome tips for local attractions, good restaurants, wineries, supermarket, pharmacy and all!  Tomás also had a booklet with all the information there so we could refer to it at any time!  Sitting in the balcony has the perfect view of a gorgeous street with cafes and shops!  The apartment was very well maintained, everything was sparkling clean (minus the bottom tiles of shower, but I think that is more due to the age of the shower and not because it wasn’t cleaned so no fault of the cleaning person).  I think the cleaner cleaned it the best it can be).  However, the rest of the apartment, and the bathroom are sparkling clean and awesome!  I am a germaphobe and I would definitely stay here again because the rest of the house was so clean so don’t let my tile comment deter you, this is an awesome place and at the center is everything and very well maintained!  It is walking distance to all the attractions.  The hosts did an awesome job of putting nice touches throughout the apartment.  It is bright with lots of nice light, which I love!  Also, the managing company allowed us to keep our luggage in their office (which is walking distance from the apartment) after our checkout time while we went sight seeing some more around the city.  Luis and other staff members also helped my parent with carrying the luggage down the stairs.  The hospitality was above and beyond and we loved our stay here.  I highly recommend this apartment and will definitely stay here again!  Also, lots of great restaurants right downstairs and a super market! Washing machine was awesome to have!   Don’t hesitate to book it, it is worth it!
Accueil très bon appartement propre bien décoré et fonctionnel plus adapté à ceux qui vivent la nuit
The apartment was in the perfect location and Tomás and his colleague Joanna were extremely helpful and friendly. We highly recommend this place!

Tomás's place was perfect for our stay in Porto. It's in a great neighborhood, a short walk to just about everything. The space was clean and exactly as it appeared in the photos. Tomàs was also incredibly helpful and responsive.
Great location and lovely apartment. Tomas was very helpful and gave plenty of good recommendations for food and things to do in Porto.
Thomas was a great host. Give us really good tips for the town. I will recomandcThomas flat.

El apartamento es muy bonito y la ubicacion muy buena pero no pudimos dormir bien ningún día por el exceso de ruido del exterior hasta la 4 de la madrugada , una faena cuando la intención es disfrutar de la ciudad de dia y poder descansar de noche , nstrs hija no lo llevo muy bien .Ciertas indicaciones de los responsables sobre el parking y donde desayunar están antiguas ya q el parking cuesta 33€ al día y no 20 como me indicaron y el local del desayuno lleva unos cuantos meses cerrado . 
Es lo que pasa cuando los apartamentos están gestionados por empresas y no por propietarios reales como pasaba antes .
The location of the apartment is prefect for exploring o Porto. Tomás responds quickly and clearly to any question one may ask. I would definitely recommend this place!

Logement parfaitement adapté à un weekend à Porto, agréable, propre et bien placé. Je recommande tout à  fait. La rue est toute et l’immeuble sont en revanche assez bruyant. Ne pas s’attendre à un environnement calme!
En general estaba todo bastante bien. Nos hubiera gustado un poco más de menaje. Y no nos supimos hacer con el horno. Pero la atención y la situación muy buena.
Amazing place, highly recommended!

멋진 공간이라 너무 좋았어요
위치는 언덕이라 짐이 많아서 좀 힘들긴 했는데 관광지가 가까이 있고 밖에 보이는 풍경도 좋고 층수가 2층이라 좋았어요. 그리고 역도 걸어서 10분거리에 있어 위치도 나쁘지 않아요. 너무 번잡한곳도 아니고 시가지에서 너무 떨어진 느낌도 아닌 생활하기 딱 좋은공간
그리고 Tomas가 친절하고 응답 잘해줍니다.

Nice appartment, super clean and perfect position! Tomas and his friend are nice and welcoming. they thought of everything! I would definitely stay there again. But good to know, that it may noisy at weekends. or we nust had bad luck. but we had a lovley stay anyways!
Um studio espaçoso com um muito bom equipamento, não faltou de nada para nos sentir bem. Unica coisa que impactou o nosso descanso foi o rua ruidosa durante a noite.

name: 1 sunny bedroom in large St-Henri appartment
summary: The apartment  is located in the  up and coming neighbourhood St. Henri. Close to new hip cafés and restaurants, as well as Canal Lachine and metro station. The apartment is very spacious, with two closed bedrooms and a shared backyard.
space: The apartment is very spacious, it includes two closed bedrooms, one living room, one dinning room, one kitchen, one bathroom and one shared backyard. There's also a washing machine and a dryer that you can use for free. Your room is very big and sunny. There's a double bed, a desk and a closet.  It is veery quiet at night. We often take care of our neighboor's dog, so not a good place for people with allergies...
description: The apartment  is located in the  up and coming neighbourhood St. Henri. Close to new hip cafés and restaurants, as well as Canal Lachine and metro station. The apartment is very spacious, with two closed bedrooms and a shared backyard. The apartment is very spacious, it includes two closed bedrooms, one living room, one dinning room, one kitchen, one bathroom and one shared backyard. There's also a washing machine and a dryer that you can use for free. Your room is very big and sunny. There's a double bed, a desk and a closet.  It is veery quiet at night. We often take care of our neighboor's dog, so not a good place for people with allergies... Guests can use the entire apartment We would like to welcome our guests when they arrive.  As people who love travelling, we'd be very happy to have dinner together and share tips about Montreal! We value friendly and respectful relationship with airbnb guests. Please let us know if you have any question. The apartment is located in the up and
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the up and coming neighbourhood St. Henri. Lots of new hip restaurant springing up such as Tuck shop, Grumman 78, Sumac along with the infamous staple coffee shops St. Henri Cafe and Campanelli. Also, a great wine bar Loic is just around the corner. Our place is also a block away from the beautiful the Lachine Canal, an 8 min walk to the atwater market and only 3 min walk to the subway (metro Place Saint Henri - orange line).
transit: 3 min walk to the subway, metro place saint henri - orange line. A lot of free parking spots on the street, we never have problems parking our own car!
access: Guests can use the entire apartment
interaction: We would like to welcome our guests when they arrive.  As people who love travelling, we'd be very happy to have dinner together and share tips about Montreal! We value friendly and respectful relationship with airbnb guests. Please let us know if you have any question.
house_rules: We'd like to have friendly and respectful guests.

reviews.comments:
Nous avons passer un excellent séjour chez Kim! Son appartement est genial, propre et très proche du centre ville. La rue est tout de même calme le soir pour bien se reposer! Merci encore Kim, tu es quelqu'un d'adorable!

N'hesitez pas à faire affaire avec Kim, vous serez pas déçu.:)

el apartamento era justo como ella lo describió y nos gusto mucho. 
el barrio fue seguro y conveniente para los restaurantes y el transporte. Kim fue muy amable y comunicativa. Kim tiene una colección de discos y escuche mucho a los strokes. Les recomiendo este apartamento si se van a quedar en montreal.

name: Twin Room With Window
summary: (2 sigle bed inside,n have bathroom inside,24h hot water,free wifi,Free luggage) All our rooms tidy n clean,free wifi,air-condition,shower room.
space: 本店為家庭民宿旅店,2樓有密碼鐵門,安全放心!24小時熱水供應及免費WIFI.免費寄存行/特價主題門票/機票/機票出售,歡迎查詢!Amigo inn is a very saft hostel for traveller n backpacker to stay.We provide free wifi,air condition n shower (URL HIDDEN) also provide free hk guide map and discounted theme parks tickets.
description: (2 sigle bed inside,n have bathroom inside,24h hot water,free wifi,Free luggage) All our rooms tidy n clean,free wifi,air-condition,shower room. 本店為家庭民宿旅店,2樓有密碼鐵門,安全放心!24小時熱水供應及免費WIFI.免費寄存行/特價主題門票/機票/機票出售,歡迎查詢!Amigo inn is a very saft hostel for traveller n backpacker to stay.We provide free wifi,air condition n shower (URL HIDDEN) also provide free hk guide map and discounted theme parks tickets. 公用冰箱 本公司代訂各機票,澳門船票;出售機場巴士車票,八達通租借,主題公園門票(海洋公園,迪士尼樂園),山頂纜車+摩天塔,杜莎夫人,昂坪360觀光纜車,｡歡迎查詢! 本店在花園街(波鞋街),附近街道通菜街(女人街),西洋菜南街,彌敦道,兩個大型商場(朗豪坊/新世紀廣場),標誌超市(惠康/百佳) 乘坐機場巴士A21方便,臨近旺角地鐵站E2出口(乘坐迪士尼樂園),彌敦道乘坐171號海洋公園巴士以及乘坐昂坪360專車｡ 為了響應環保,旅客可自備牙刷用品或者向前臺索取,出門時請將所有電源關上,多謝合作!(As for the protection of the Earth resources,we will provide towel n teeth brush upon your request,n we urged all of our customers,and we will switch off all the power when you leave the room. )
neighborhood_overview: 本店在花園街(波鞋街),附近街道通菜街(女人街),西洋菜南街,彌敦道,兩個大型商場(朗豪坊/新世紀廣場),標誌超市(惠康/百佳)

host.host_about:
我是一個熱情好客的人,歡迎與來自世界各地的人交流｡這個賓館是我用心裝修整理的,地理位置優越,臨近旺角地鐵站,購物方便,還有專門巴士去各處的主題公園｡藉助這個機會,更能為客人介紹香港的文化與人情味｡ 
I am the manager of Amigo Inn , my name is Jim, we have 23 rooms , so I guess  one of my rooms can fit your budget
Our inn located  in city center , MONGKOK where is most busiest area n transportation center to any where in hk, as u may know
  Subway/Mtr ---MONGKOK mtr n find the exit E2 which is the nearest exit to my hostel
We also provide discounted theme park  ticket like Disney park , ocean park n peak tram

reviews.comments: 房东人很好,住这非常方便,从地铁口出来5分钟就到,附近餐馆很多,小店也多,吃饭逛街太便利了｡房间虽小但是很干净卫生,性价比高,值得推荐
距离地铁站特别近,出行非常方便,宾馆的阿姨跟前台都特别的友好,给我们讲解路线还推荐美食,我们两个女生买了好多东西在要走的时候有一位宾馆的叔叔还特意帮我们把箱子给抬下去了,真的特别感谢!房间也很好我们特别满意!下次来香港还会订这里!很棒的一次旅行!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

老板人真的很好｡
去香港大部分需要买的东西都可以在老板那里低价买到｡巴士票,迪士尼门票,手机卡,换港币都可以找老板搞定,而且老板也很乐意给大家很好的建议｡
老板很热心,位置也很好
我们在Jim的inn里住了3个晚上,头一个晚上因为房间空调有气味以及漏水睡得不是很好,不过次日Jim遍给我们提供了一个最好的双人套房,并且为我们免费提供水｡ 总体感觉不错｡
We had a great time here, thank you for your instruction about interesting place and food
Jim is always ready to answer your inquiries. Place is nice and comfy. Would definitely recommend this place
房東非常友善我離開嘅時候佢仲送我哋去車站非常感激下次再嚟我會選擇這裏
Jim's place is very convenience for everythings. Jim and his staffs are really helpful and friendly. I'm really sastified with the place.

located right smack in sneakers Street so it was super convenient, within 5mins walk to mongkok mtr as well. 

note that the elevator starts on the 2nd floor so you'll still have to climb up about 4 flights of stairs! 

overall decent room
地理位置优越,老板热情,走的时候还帮忙把箱子提下楼｡
谢谢前台热情的叔叔阿姨,还帮我们寄存行李｡房间虽然小但是打理得干净,五脏俱全,水壶洗漱用品拖鞋什么的问前台都有,还有公用冰箱｡位于旺角,交通购物吃饭超级方便｡不过晚上外面有时候会有飞车党有点吵,这也没事,戴耳塞就可以入睡了｡性价比很高,值得推荐｡

Jim and his staff were friendly and checking in and out was very easy.  Very well located in Mong Kok, close to the subway and lots of shops and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can be a bit loud if you're not used to sleeping with city sounds. A great place to stay in Hong Kong for the value and location

숙소는 몽콕 레이디스마켓에 위치해 있습니다. 다른 후기와는 다르게 시끄럽지 않았으며, 바퀴벌레도 나오지 않았습니다. 
2층부터 엘레베이터가 있기때문에 1층에서 올라가기엔 조금 힘들긴 합니다.
주인은 매우 친절하고, 짐도 잘 맡아주십니다.

Jim's place is great for traveling around, it is very near the MTR (about 5 mins away). There's also the ladies market and sneakers street nearby. The toilet has a bit of odour but overall, great stay and value for money. It was a pleasant stay for two girls. Thank you Jim and the rest like Margaret for your help and kind hospitality!
前台的叔叔阿姨人非常好 很乐于解答游客的问题 住的位置很好 方便购物和旅游吃饭 下次还会来香港还会选择这里的 赞!
好房东,值得信任,推荐住宿!^_^
老板人非常好非常热心 有什么问题就会很快的帮我们解决 房间虽然很小但是很干净
很满意
Everything was great.

Jim's room was spacey enough for two people to stay, considering the high house price and small average space in HK. The beds and the bathroom were clean, and Jim was easily contactable through phone calls. The room is in the central of Mong Kok, just two small streets away from the tube station. Shopping malls, Sasa and Bonjour are all around. Highly recommend this place for anyone wanting to visit HK.
The location is great. And also thank you so much Jim. Hope to see you again nexttime.
helpful host , explain us any detail that we need .. nice service
Nice place

Perfect place to stay in Hong Kong specially for back packing travelers.. Strategic location in the heart of Mongkok! Right in the center of sneaker shops, 1 minute walk to Ladies Market, about 4 minutes walk to MTR station and 5 minutes walk to nearest Supermarket (Wellcome)..

Jim and others were very friendly..

Overall I liked this place way better than staying at a hotel where it is far from bus stops and MTR stations..

The property is located along the Fa Yuen Street (the Sneaker Street where there are many sneaker shops opening until late night). Very convenient as it is near the MTR Mong Kok Station and there are many restaurants and even grocery shops nearby.
The room is small but definitely enough if you don't have too much luggage. Generally clean, wifi was strong in my room, accessible, was a 3 minute walk from the nearest MRT exit. Thanks Jim!
The hotel was in a great location. A couple blocks away from Mong Kok station.

Good location (MTR and buses are very accessible). Walking distance from Chinese restaurants and fast food chains, sneaker street and ladies market. Very accommodating staff!! They even helped us carry our luggages to the bus stop. Also has spacious room compared to other rooms in HKG. Offers free drinking water.

If you have heavy baggage, there’s no elevator from ground to second floor (about 4 flights of stairs) BUT the staff were willing to help carrying the luggage.

Would recommend 10/10!!!!!
Great location,  clean and helpful host....
房间不错 jim更好 欢迎大家入住 是一个值得回头的地方
Great service. Really outstanding. Jim is super kind and extremely available. Location is extremely convenient and functional. Rooms are clean and very comfortable. Highly reccomended.

I really enjoyed my first trip to HK, thanks in a large part to my stay with Jim.  On the first day, Jim gave me great advice on where to go to capitalize on my short visit. His place is very close to the MTR station and after two days I felt very comfortable getting around. Kowloon in general and Mongkok in particular are very interesting to explore. For someone who enjoys food experiences above all else while traveling, like me, there is no shortage of truly amazing local food stalls and restaurants within walking distance of the place.  

Jim and the other staff were very polite and friendly, the room was very clean when I arrived, and Jim was flexible with my arrival/departure schedule so I was never stuck walking around with my bags and no place to go. The room itself is fairly basic and straightforward (desk, bed, bathroom), but you won't spend much time in a place as exciting as Hong Kong. I highly recommend Jim's place to other travelers.
Jim’s place was just as advertised. Clean and close to everything. Great food and public transit near by.

Jim is an amazing host. He helped me out with a temporary sim, gave me a ton of tips about things to do and places to eat. The place was as advertised for the most part. The location is great - probably the best you'll find in hong kong if you're on a budget.

The room is exceptionally small (the one I stayed in was slightly smaller than what was pictured), but it's clean, comfortable and has really fast wifi.  It's also right in the heart of the city, with a ton of shops and restaurants (not to mention a subway station) just steps away.  Perfect for a short trip to Hong Kong.

Jim's (Amigo Inn) Hotel located on Sneakers Street, one of the crowded place in HK. The amenities is good, room and bathroom quite big for 2 people for HK standard. Easy to find, and around <500m from MTR station mongkok. 

for tenant please notice that there are no elevator on Mongkok station Exit E (nearest to Jim Place)

name: Apartamento São Bento da Vitória 2 - Amazing view
summary: This is an independent apartment on 2nd floor of the building where I live along with other locals with a great view over the Douro river and D. Luis bridge. It has one bedroom, a living room a generous balcony with an amazing river view.
space: For every reservations made from 1st of March 2018 it'll be charged upon arrival the Porto City Tax of 2€ per day and per person (up to a maximum of 7 nights).

reviews.comments: Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral an einer kleineren Strasse sehr ruhig. Die Wohnung ist sehr nett eingerichtet. Es hat uns gut gefallen.

Apartamento cómodo e ben equipado. Moi ben situado. Pudemos aparcar o coche diante da casa. Vista preciosa da catedral e a ribeira. 
A calefacción son dous radiadores polo que o primeiro dia pasamos un pouco de frio pero despois a temperatura era agradable.
Rosa foi moi amable.

El apartamento de Rosa es magnífico para conocer Oporto. Amplio, bonito, limpio y bien cuidado. Incluso mejor de lo que aparece en las fotos. Desde la terraza se puede ver toda la ciudad. La ubicación es muy centrica, al lado de la Torre de los Clérigos y muy cerca del barrio de Ribiera.
Además Rosa estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos guardó un sitio para aparcar justo enfrente del apartamento.
Muy recomendable.
Gostámos muito da estadia na casa da D Rosa, que é uma simpatia. a casa é muito boa, muito limpa e com tudo o que (Website hidden by Airbnb) uma vista maravilhosa.

We loved to stay in Rosa's apartment. Beautiful, clean, well equipped and great location! Big balcony with a beautiful view of the city! 
Rosa and her family are kind and welcoming people who have good advice on good restaurants in the neighborhood!

I totally recommend this amazing apartment !!!!!

I felt warmly welcome by Rosa and Joseph from the first day. The Location was just perfect: very clean, located in the historic Center of Porto with a wonderful view over the roofs of the old City. I recommend highly this location.  Thanks again !
A casa é maior do que parece nas fotos e está em óptimo estado. Também está muito bem situada para visitar a cidade.
The flat was really well located, in the center of Porto. The vue is amazing - as the picture shows. The place was clean, and Rosa available and welcoming.
Un sitio muy agradable, limpio y cerca de la zona turística. El trato por parte de Rosa es inmejorable. Nos encantaría repetir, recomendable 100%.

Nous avons été très bien reçu chez Rosa. L appartement est situé tout prêt de la torre de clerigos, la vue est très sympa. L appartement est propre et spacieux. Rosa ne parle pas anglais, mais il y a tjs quelq un avec elle qui le parle, donc aucun prblm de communication.

Super séjour sur Porto ! Très bon rapport qualité prix ! L'appartement est spacieux, la vue à couper le souffle... de l'aéroport très bien desservi et le must tout les visites se font à pied ! l'accueil est chaleureux et convivial ! 

Je le recommande !
Very good location with an incredible view on Porto. Rosa is very friendly and helped us with all our requests.
Very enjoyable,  Rosa has an amazing comfortable and well located apt.

El piso era exactamente como aparece en las fotos (incluso más grande de lo que nos imaginábamos). Todo estaba limpio y bien cuidado. Rosa fue muy amable en todo momento, nos estaba esperando cuando llegamos y se ofreció a guardar nuestras maletas por si queríamos seguir haciendo turismo el día que dejamos el piso. Las vistas desde el balcón son impresionantes (sobre todo al amanecer). ¡Una experiencia totalmente recomendable!

The flat was exactly as shown in the pictures (even bigger than we expected). Everything was clean and in a perfect state. Rosa was very kind and she offered to keep our luggage the day we left the flat so we could keep visiting the city without worries. The views are amazing (mostly when the sun rises). A great experience for us!

Le logement est conforme à l'annonce et à nos attentes . Une coupe de fruit , quelques chocolats et du vin de porto était mis a notre disposition a notre arrivée . Tous les équipements sont en excellent état et la literie très confortables  . Le quartier est  calme . L'appartement est idéalement situé pour ceux qui veulent découvrir le centre de Porto .  Nous avons passé un magnifique  séjour. :-)

Wir sind gegen 19:00Uhr - nach kurzer Fahrt mit der Metro vom Flughafen und einem schönen Spaziergang von ca 15 Minuten von Bahnhof Bento - sehr herzlich von Rosa und Ihrem Enkelsohn empfangen worden. Ihr Enkel spricht Englisch, somit gab es keine Verständigungsprobleme. Er zeigte uns auch die sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtete große Wohnung, die wirklich keine Wünsche offen ließ. Ein gefüllter Obstteller hätte uns satt gemacht. Die Wohnung liegt jedoch so zentral, dass es nur ein paar Schritte zu mehreren  Restaurants bedurfte. Begeistert waren wir vom herrlichen Ausblick auf die Stadt Porto, die wir sofort lieb gewannen.  Alles in Allem waren es schöne 10 Tage die wir im Haus von Rosa verbringen durften. Obrigada !

It was great experience. The road way to apartment was quite steep. However, it was totally worthy. The view was perfect and every equipment and supply were brand new. 

Also, the location was good. It's just next to torre de clerigos and quite close from Sao Bento station.

Completely suggested.

Amazing apartment in the heart of Porto! The room was exceptionally clean and comfortable and near all the activities we wanted to do but still secluded enough to feel like a home. Highly recommend this apartment for a stay in Porto.

Our hosts were also extremely helpful and gracious, responding quickly and efficiently to our inquiries. 5 stars.

Rosa's place is beautiful!!! Very well cared for, and clean, this was one of the nicest places I stayed at in Portugal. It also has a quite incredible view!! Communication can take a little longer, but it's not a problem at all if you're expecting it.
Fantastic view from the balcony. Close to the center and all the tourist attractions. Good choice for our two days stay in wonderful Porto. Thanx Rosa )

Séjour parfait chez rosa.

Appartement impeccable, très bien équipé et idéalement situé. La vue du balcon est splendide.

Accueil charmant de Rosa et très bonne organisation de la location.

Je conseille vivement pour un séjour à porto !
een geweldige plek om Porto te beleven. Schoon, ruim en met een prachtig uitzicht vanaf het balkon. We hebben genoten gedurende 3 dagen. Goed in het centrum, we hebben alles kunnen lopen.

Gentillesse, ponctualité, Rosa est très prévenante. L'appartement est d'une propreté rare. La vue a des effets thérapeutiques, tant c'est somptueux. J'ai passé un week-end hyper relax, car j'étais comme à la maison, avec ce soupçon d'exceptionnel qu'offre la terrasse. La situation est idéale. Merci, à bientôt, je l'espère.

We had a lovely time in Rosa's apartment. It was completely as described. The balcony is the main selling point.  Centrally located, easy to walk around to places. Rosa was very flexible with our late checking in and out times, for which we are grateful.

Exactly as pictured but the photo's don't do it justice.  Fabulous view of the old town rooftops, River, cathedral, train station, Clerigo tower.  Close to nightlife, Lello bookstore, shopping.  Perfect location!  The apartment is wonderful!  Although Rosa doesn't speak English we communicated with a bit of sign language and her Son and grandson (both named Paulo spoke perfect English). Her grandson even helped carry up my heavy bags.  The apartment was spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated.  Comfortable beds, fluffy towels, coffee, tea, a full bowl of fruit, bottles of water and even small bottles of port greeted us upon arrival.  Wow!  We were treated like royalty!  Their suggestion for dinner our first night at Arvore restaurant 5 doors up the street for traditional Portuguese food was fantastic.  Probably the best meal we had in Portugal.  The food was fantastic!  Thanks to our waiter Angelo's suggestions.  Wow!  I would stay here again in a heartbeat!  Highly recommend!  Thank you so much Rosa and family!  I hope to someday return to Porto and Casa Rosa is the only place I would want to stay!  Perfect!

Had a wonderful time in Porto would highly recommend it.   The accommodation was excellent lovely and spacious with high ceilings and very clean,  ideal location and Rosa was very welcoming.  would recommend this apartment and would happily stay there again.

This was my favorite Airbnb I have stayed in so far. The apartment is spacious and the terrace views are amazing. The apartment was very clean and near the Livraria Lello.  Porto is a beautiful and friendly city and this apartment was a gem to stay in while we were there.

Rosa is a wonderful host and her apartment is highly recommended for a stay in Porto.

The house is in an excellent location. It's easy to go down to the riverside and eat at some good restaurants. The apartment was beautiful and very clean. It has a special balcony with an amazing panoramic view of the terracotta  roves and cathedrals along with the river. 
Rosa met us at the door and is extremely friendly and kind. We didn't speak the same language but she definitely went out of her way to make us feel at home. We would definitely recommend this place. And would go back and stay there again.

The appartment is situated in the city center and has a very nice view over the old part. All of the expectations based on the pictures on airbnb were met. The welcome by rosa (and family) and communication was good.

Um grande prazer conhecer vōce, Paulo e Eloi...
Lindo alojamento, e vista deslumbrante!
Muito obrigado Rosa por sua hospitalidade graciosa!
Michel

Rosa was a wonderful host who patiently and happily waited for us late into the evening. Her apartment is gorgeous and very comfortable. The balcony views are so lovely. We felt right at home and cannot wait to stay again. Beautiful part of Porto. Thank you, Rosa!

Rosa and her grandson were very welcoming and he kindly helped us up the stairs with our suitcases. She is a very friendly lady and Rosa's son was able to interpret her recommendations for beaches and places to visit. The apartment is beautiful and has everything you need for cooking although we didn't cook much while we were there.  The view from the terrace is absolutely gorgeous and it's the perfect place for breakfast and drinks in the evening.  The bed is very comfortable as is the couch.  There is another beautiful viewpoint at the end of the street and a small cafe with a friendly owner to buy water and snacks.  Less than a 5 minute walk away you have cafes, restaurants and bakeries.  The river front is only ten minutes away and you are very well located for all the tourist sites.  The only disadvantage of this location is there isn't somewhere closer to buy fresh food and ingredients if you want to cook- there is a shop for basic goods about 5 minutes away but it's about a 15minute walk to the nearest supermarket (there may be one closer though we did check the internet).  However our experience of the apartment was extremely positive and we would recommend to others.  Thank you Rosa for a lovely stay! :)
