Super séjour chez Rosa. Rosa est adorable et très disponible pour ses voyageurs. La vue est magnifique et l'appartement est très bien situé dans le centre de Porto. L'appartement est propre et très bien entretenu. Nous espérons que le parasol servira aux futurs voyageurs ! Merci Rosa

We had a great stay at Rosa's place, which is a beautiful mix of modern furnishings in a traditional setting (with high ceilings and huge windows), in addition to being absolutely spotless. Not to mention the view from the balcony, which is gorgeous! Everything was as described or better (such as the numerous TV channels and the super-comfortable bed). The fruit, water, coffee and small bottles of Porto were also greatly appreciated! Rosa is a great (and very available) host, who welcomed us and kept our suitcases on the last day until we left for the airport. We had no difficulties whatsoever, even if we do not speak Portuguese, as her son and Joana, who promptly answered our emails and met us to discuss restaurants and things to do/see in Porto, were available and very helpful. A great place and highly recommended!

Un séjour parfait avec une hôte très sympathique.
La vue de la terrasse est tout simplement extraordinaire pour prendre son petit déjeuner ou boire une bière.
La position de l'appartement est parfaite pour visiter porto, situé à proximité de la plupart des monuments historiques à voir ainsi que des restaurants.
L'appartement est bien équipé avec tout ce qu'il fait pour se faire à manger, étant resté une semaine nous avons même eu droit à une femme de ménage au milieu du séjour. 
On ne peut que recommander chaudement cet appartement pour passer un bon sejour ☺

Great place in Oporto

Well located place close to everything you want to see. Excellent communication and easy checkin and check out. Very close to some non-touristy areas. If you arrive with large luggage, take a cab from the metro station - it's a long walk up hill.
We had a really nice stay in Rosa's appartment! Eveything was clean and the balcony view was amazing!
magnifique,propreté exemplaire ,superbe vue,merci rosa.

Nice and spacious appartment, very central in Porto and with a great view!!!!

Everything was clean and Rosa and here son were very helpfull.
Rosa oli äärimmäisen lämmin ja ystävällinen heti ensi näkemällä, kieli ongelmia ei ollut koska muu perhe puhui englantia.Sijainti keskellä historiallista kaupunkia oli loistava..suosittelen.

Man muss mit Rosa beginnen: Ihre Freundlichkeit, ihr Lachen und ihr Lächeln sind ein wunderbarer Willkommensgruss. Man fühlt sich sofort zu Hause und wohl. Das durchgehend.
Die Wohnung ist supersauber und angenehm gemütlich( es gibt auch deutsches Fernsehen auf einem komfortablen LG ,wenn man will). Und da sie nur von Gästen bewohnt wird, ist sie auf angenehmste Weise neutral.
Der Blick vom Balkon erfreut bei Tag und Nacht( Illumination der Kathedrale und....). Dazu das unablässige Konzert der Möven, an das man sich schnell gewöhnt.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist perfekt, um in Porto in alle Richtungen zu Fuss auszuschwärmen.
Man muss natürlich immer ein wenig die Steigungen bezwingen, zumal die erste vom Bahnhof  mit Gepäck (hier hätte ich mir ein Taxi gewünscht, aber die Fahrt mit der Metro vom Flughafen ist recht einfach und kostet 2.45 Euro) .
Aber das ist Porto und -wie ich jetzt weiss- auch in Lissabon noch mehr.
Ich hoffe, ich komme wieder nach Porto.
Noch mehr hoffe ich, dass dann Rosas Wohnung frei sein wird.
Danke, Rosa!

Rosa nous a bien accueilli. Bien qu'il y ait le défi de langue ( Rosa parle juste Portuguais ) elle nous a offert le soutien de ces garçons qui parlent Anglais .
L 'appartement est splendide et très bien situé. La vue arrière est époustouflante.
Nous vous reccomandons vivement ce logement pour un séjour réussi à Porto

Nous avons reçu un excellent accueil ; Rosa est très gentille et dévouée. L'appartement, magnifique, est idéalement situé, calme, agréable, spacieux,  et confortable ; la vue du balcon est sublime. Nous sommes enchantées de notre séjour !

We had an absolute wonderful experience with Rosa. She was in constant contact until we knew where/when to arrive. We were very appreciative of that. She was a very sweet lady and incredibly welcoming. 
The apartment is the perfect place for a long or short stay in Porto. Perfect location, very up to date apartment and a magnificent balcony view. 
We were more than pleased with our stay with Rosa.

Everything was clean&perpect
We slept wonderfully night.
It had a lounge area with a fantastic view of the Porto.

If I decide to visit Porto,
I will come here:-)

Rosa & Paulo welcomed me extremely friendly. Paulo carried my suitcase up the stairs (what a gentleman!). The place could not have been cleaner. Shiny tiles everywhere, typical Portugese decorations and a very inviting bed. Fresh fruits on the table, as well as chocolates and two tiny bottles of Port, bottles of water and even a dish with different kinds of tea and Nespresso coffee. And then I opened the door to the balcony and saw this amazing view on the old city centre. WOUH! 
During my stay (5 days) I spent several hours at the balcony just wondering how every I time I watched, the scenery had changed. Sunrise, sunset, fog, flocks of seagull, cats hunting birds, all accompanied by distant trumpet music from the trumpenist at the cathedral. The nearby living typical Portuguese rooster announcing sunrise added extra charm to my stay at Rosa's.
sehr gut gelegen und fantastische Aussicht. Ideal für einen Kurzaufenthalt in Porto.

Rosa's apartment was immaculate! Located in a historic building with tons of charm. Her son was there to greet us and he was very friendly. The apartment was within walking distance of everything. Porto has lots of hills so you can't avoid that. And this apartment has some stairs, so overall you get a great workout! Also the view from here is a-ma-zing!
Appartement conforme à l'annonce et très bien situé! La vue du balcon est très belle et l'appartement très propre.

La señora Rosa y su hijo se portaron fenomenalmente con nosotros. Estuvimos como en casa. El apartamento muy amplio, muy limpio y muy cómodo. No se necesita el coche para nada. Una maravilla.

Gracias por todo!

Check in was very smooth- a member of Rosa`s family even carried my bag up the stairs. The apartment was extremely clean and spacious. The view was sensational. Bottles of water, coffee, fruit, chocolates and port were an added bonus. After exploring Porto everyday it was fantastic to sit on the balcony eat tapas and drink Sangrias! Totally recommended

Je recommande !! L'appartement est très bien situé, dans un quartier vivant et en plein cœur de Porto, il est aussi très propre et bien décoré, lumineux et une vue magnifique. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Un grand merci à Rosa.

Rosa was on the doorstep waiting to meet us - smiling and welcoming.  She couldn't speak english, we couldn't speak portuguese but it didn't matter!  Her son Paula took us to the apartment which was just lovely.  Overlooking Porto. Gorgeous views day and night and in the perfect location for all the sights, cafes and restaurants.  Added bonus was being in an old style house with character.  Thank you Rosa and all the best to you and your family.

Rosa and her son were there to meet us and show us around the lovely apartment briefly, even though we had a late arrival, after 12pm. She was very friendly and accommodating, and the place was as lovely as the photos and description show it to be.

It was a pleasure to meet Rosa (and Joana and Paulo). We had a very warm welcome in a beautiful apartment with a spectacular view on Porto! It was appreciate to share their precise information about the places to visit or the places where to eat local dishes! ;) I strongly recommend to visit Rosa's place!

A class! We had such a good stay, thanks to rosa and the family, wich provided everything we needed and more! 
the app is big and even better then the photos, really felt like a 5 star hotel! the view was amazing! the location is fantastic! we where so close to everything which was very importent because of the rainy weather.
they where so wellcoming! even saved us a parking spot! 
thanks so much! Muito obrigado!

Die Lage war toll und die Aussicht einmalig! Wir könnten alle Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichen. Rosa und ihr Sohn haben uns sehr freundlich empfangen obwohl wir erst nach Mitternacht da waren. Alles war sehr sauber und die Wohnung war ruhig.

El apartamento está muy buen situado, las vistas como dice el resto de gente que ha estado son geniales. Tema aparcamientos en la calle es complicado aunque por la mañana es más fácil. Nos se os ocurra aparcar si no queréis crujidita en el parking al lado De la Torre de los clérigos. La taberna que está unos metros por encima del apartamento genial por si vais mal de tiempo. Rosa estupenda y su apartamento cumple con las expectativas ampliamente. Para repetir en próximas ocasiones.

Perfect Location 
Great Host 
Amazing view's from apartment  
Good communication 
Recommend  ......Absolutely :-)
Rosa es un verdadero encanto. Muy amable para ayudarnos en todo lo que necesitamos. La casa nos sorprendió gratamente. Las vistas espectaculares!!
Spacious comfortable apartment with a lovely view. Rosa and her son were very helpful, lovely hosts.
Good place to stay!

Rosa is so lovely and her home is extremely accomodating. Amazing location, we walked everywhere this trip. The place was clean and well equipped with even a few lovely touches such as port wine, fruit, water and chocolate. Communication and check in was great, Rosa's son greeted us and carried our bags up the stairs where we were welcomed with the amazing view on the balcony. Overall our stay here was perfect. Thank you Rosa!
Lovely place, comfortable and perfect location! Great view and balcony, even when the weather is capricious it's enjoyable.
Una vista incantevole, un alloggio ospitale e molto curato. Pulizia impeccabile, comodissimo.
Appartement idéalement situé. Très propre, des petites attentions à notre arrivée. Il ne nous manquait que le portugais pour communiquer avec Rosa

Such a well-appointed apartment. Everything is so close by, so you can walk everywhere. The 601/602 bus from the airport stops at the top of the road. The apartment is really well equipped with lots of space in the living room for those moments when you've done just too much walking. Nice extra touches - pods for the Nespresso, a bowl of fruit, little chocs and two minds Ports on arrival.
And to top it all, a brilliant view over to the Sè and the river.
We'd book here again if going to Porto.

Rosa vraiment adorable 
Appartement magnifiquement propre   très belle vue sur Porto et cathédrale  et idéalement situé pour visiter   Merci Rosa
Die Unterkunft war sauber, es gab zum Start Wasser, Früchte, Tee und Kaffee bereits in der Wohnung. Die Kommunikation lief problemlos über Rosas Kinder.
It's a nice apartment with a great view. Rosa and her family was very friendly and helpful. They prepared a fruit basket, port vine, water, coffee and tea for us.
Great place.  Central to everything. Easy check-in. Highly recommended. Great value for money.

Rosa encantadora, servicial y muy amable.
El piso es como en las fotos.
La situación es inmejorable ya que está muy céntrico.
Limpieza excelente.

My partner and I had a fantastic time in Porto and loved staying at Rosa's place. The apartment was just like we had expected from the pictures, except the rooms were bigger in real life than they looked in the pictures. Rosa and her son were helpful and friendly. The location is AMAZING. It's very central but also quiet, and easy walking distance to everything. The only slight disappointment we had was that there was no shampoo or shower gel provided.  We'd interpreted 'Essentials' with the towel symbol to imply that bathroom essentials would be provided. But obviously that's no big deal - there are lots of local shops. I'd definitely recommend this place to a friend.
Rosa is a delightful lady and a real pleasure to speak to. The view from the flat beautiful and I loved being able to have breakfast outside.

Le logement de Rosa est parfait pour visiter Porto à pied comme nous l'avons fait pendant 3j. Il est central,  calme, grand et très grand.
Avec de gentilles attentions à l'arrivée : 2 petites bouteilles de Porto, une corbeille de fruits. ..

Great location!
Great host!
Great apartment!
Great view from balcony with sun in the morning.
Everything was perfect!
Thank you Rosa

Rosa was a very gracious host, making sure that a small problem was fixed immediately and to our satisfaction. The apartment was immaculately clean. The view was great. Public transportation was close. Beautiful apartment in a great location!

This is a great accomodation in the heart of Porto!
Very central near Sao Bento train station, Lello's, Clerigos Tower and Praca Liberdade. And with a direct view to the cathedral (Se). 
The flat itself is very clean and well looked after. There's everything you'd need, a living room, two bedrooms, two baths, a kitchen and a balcony. We felt very much at home.
Rosa and her son Paolo welcomed us, even though it was well past midnight when we arrived and Rosa even cooked some portugese snacks for us. Paolo was always ready to help when we had questions or needed tips.

My sister, friend, and I had a great stay at Rosa's! The location could not have better, and waking up to that view was amazing. We arrived late at night and Rosa and her grandson were there to let us in. Rosa is very sweet and lives on the bottom floor of the beautiful apartment building if you ever need anything. The apartment itself was as pictured. The sofa pulls out into a sofa bed. Rosa provided coffee, tea, port, and fruit. Bring your own shampoo and soap (there is a farmacy very close by to get these things as well). Overall, we had a fabulous stay and would highly recommend!
Très bien situé, très propre, sécuritaire et on pouvait visiter presque tout à pied.

We found ourselves literally at home just as we crossed the threshold. The flight was a late one, we were very tired when we reached the flat after midnight. And we were greeted with hot tasty pies and wine on the table in the living room. The fridge was filled with products enough for a reach breakfast and water to drink.
The flat is clean and cozy, with a marvelous view of Porto. It contains everything that may be necessary. And even if you lack something you just go down to donna Rosa and she gladly helps you. These were two remarkable weeks in the finest city. Cause when you live at donna Rosa’s – you live in a home where you’re taken care of, where they are happy to receive you.

Мы почувствовали себя дома прямо с порога. Рейс был поздний, перелёт утомительный, мы добрались до квартиры после полуночи. А на столе в гостиной нас ожидали горячие вкусные пирожки и вино. В холодильнике – продукты для плотного завтрака и вода. Квартира чистая и уютная, с великолепным видом на Порту, укомплектованная всем необходимым. А если вдруг чего-то не хватает, достаточно спуститься к донне Розе, и она с радостью поможет.  Это были две замечательные недели в красивейшем городе. Потому что жить у донны Розы – значит жить в доме, где тебе рады, где заботятся.
We loved staying here. The place was spotless, so clean. They were friendly, helpful and check in/out was super easy. Thank you!!

Appartement spacieux, très bien situé, tout près de la tour des Clérigos.  On peut visiter tout à pied.
Petit balcon très agréable avec vue sur tous les monuments de la ville et le Douro. Accueil attentionné  mais discret de Rosa.

Rosa's apartment was lovely and clean and had a beautiful view over the city. Rosa was very sweet with a warm smile and left us some port, fruit and waters, which was very welcoming and she had no issue with minding our bags after checkout. Rosa's grandson was also very helpful in translating and assisting us with luggage.

Would happily stay again and would recommend to friends!

Rosa's apartment is a wonderful choice from which to experience Porto.  The first thing we noticed is how immaculately clean the apartment was. The location was perfect to enjoy the heart of the downtown area of Porto without being in too much of a "touristy" spot. Rosa adds nice personal touches by having chocolates and small bottles of Port awaiting your arrival.

Be prepared for lots of walking and a ton of stairs while exploring Porto!

Gran estadía en Porto, en el apartamento de Rosa. 
La llegada fue perfecta, ella nos estaba esperando con los brazos abiertos. 
El departamento impecable! Vista espectacular, instalaciones en perfecto estado, baño nuevo. Gran plus: smart tv conectada al wifi de la casa 
Rosa muy servicial y siempre a disposición para cualquier inquietud.
Super recomendable!
Great location, nice building excellent view.  Rosa was waiting for us at the door as our taxi arrived.  Great stay.
Spotless, this has got to be the cleanest apartment I have ever stayed in. Great view, lovely accommodation would recommend to family and friends.

Rosa & her family are very friendly & welcoming & if you have any questions or need anything they will help sort it out for you. The apartment is perfect & full of character. It is spotlessly clean, comfortable bed & the view from the apartment is amazing. The bathroom has a shower over the bath but you are unable to put paper down the toilet. There is another conventional flushing toilet off the balcony. The apartment is in a good location in a quiet side street off the tourist trail. Easy access to good restaurants, a lovely bakery, mini supermarket & approx 7 mins walk to Sao Bento station. We were able to store our luggage with Rosa once we had checked out & she organised a taxi for us to the airport. We would definitely recommend this apartment. Thank you Rosa

Stop looking around and just book this place. Centrally located with Clerigos on one side and an overlook and stairs down towards the river on the other. Great balcony. Clean and spacious and everything worked. On top of all this, Rosa is a sweetheart.

The apartment is lovely, with everything we needed and more. The location is fantastic.  The apartment is super clean and well presented, the whole building is the same.  Rosa and Paolo greeted us and were so friendly.  We would definitely recommend this apartment to a couple. With the sofa bed and second bathroom it could easily accomodate 4 people. The apartment is up hill from the town, in a lovely area with lots of restaurants etc. It's on the second floor with no lift so it wouldn't suit everyone. But we thought it was great.

We had such a great time staying at Rosa's apartment. The location is very central; you can easily walk anywhere in the city from there, but it was also nice and quiet. It's easy to get to the apartment from the airport using the metro (or a cheap uber ride) and there is a supermarket 5 minutes walk away. Rosa was a delightful host and Joana and Eloi always communicated very promptly with us and helped us out when needed during our trip. The facilities in the apartment were good - a great shower, comfy bed, wifi and a well equipped kitchen (the balcony has a lovely view over the city, so we enjoyed eating in on a couple of evenings) and it was immaculately clean. We would thoroughly recommend staying here if you visit Porto!
Rosa's place is very central to all shops & restaurants in the lively old part of Porto. For value and location its a fantastic apartment.

Rosa's place was excellent! We had arrived in Porto at 9am and they were able to let us check in early so we didn't have to carry our bags around the city. The apartment is beautiful, super clean, and has amazing views. She even left us wine, chocolate, and fruit. I'd highly recommend staying here!
Der Blick und die Lage der Wohnung sind ideal, um Porto zu erkunden. Rosa kümmert sich rührend um Alles.

Warm house,everything is good!
Beautiful view, great location!!!

Ross's place was really great. Spotless  clean, plenty of space, great location and super views from the balcony. Communication before and during the stay was great. I would certainly recommend Ross's place when planning a trip to Porto.
Rosa fue muy atenta y amable, la casa está muy bien situada y tiene unas preciosas vistas de la ciudad. ¡Una estancia muy agradable!

Rosa's apartment is absolutely perfect for exploring Porto. Centrally located but quiet, beautiful view and balcony, clean and spacious. Rosa welcomed us with some fruit, port and coffee in the apartment. The communication was perfect throughout our entire stay, and we will definitely stay here again next time we're in Porto!
Lovely flat in a great location. Rosa left fresh fruit, port, chocolates, coffee and water for us - lovely touches. Thank you Rosa

Great apartment and great view as advertised. Location is very close to the tower and most other must-see spots in the city. Incredibly beautiful and well-renovated old building with character. We managed fine without AC in late August (there was a big fan).

Beautiful apartment with a sensational view from the balcony.  Sun on balcony for breakfast.  Inside toilet is "paper free" which is not a problem because of an additional bathroom on the balcony. No air con but apartment is really cool and has a fan provided.Chocolates, fruit and port waiting on arrival. Generally quiet but occasional noise from upstairs.  Loved it and sad to leave.

Wonderful location and flat. It had everything we needed and was in close proximity to all the places we wanted to go.  Rosa and her family were fantastic and went above and beyond when they helped us locate our car that had been towed because we were careless.  Can't thank them enough.  I was a little concerned about the lack of air conditioning in the apartment, but we opened the balcony windows in the evening and that kept it cool.  It was perfect and we will definitely be returning.
Very nice apartment in a great area with an amazing view. Highly recommended!

We stayed at Rosa's for a weekend and had a fantastic time. The apartment met, and surpassed, our expectations (the view is amazing) and really couldn't be situated in a better place for access to all areas of the city. Check in was seamless even though I arrived a bit earlier than expected. Porto is a brilliant place to visit and I'm sure we'll be back - probably to Rosa's again! x

Absolutely stunning apartment and even more stunning view. It was tempting to sit on the balcony all day, rather than see the sights of Porto. It was a wonderful way to start and end each day with coffee and wine, respectively. Love the little park around the corner and it's very close to Livraria Lello. Rosa was very sweet and accommodating.

Rosa's place exceeded our expectations. I think we had one of the best views in the city and were close to the local sites. The bed was very comfortable and the space was quiet so after a busy day we were guaranteed a great night sleep. We appreciated the spaciousness of the flat and it was well appointed and spotlessly clean. We would definitely come back!

Wow, what a find. So central, with remarkable vistas across Porto from the balcony and reasonable to boot. Then there were the delightful little touches like mini bottles of port and a stocked fruit basket. I'm not sure I've ever stayed at an AirBnB so spotlessly clean. Highly recommended.

Rosa's apartment was large, light filled, centrally located and yet very quiet. The view was fabulous and we enjoyed morning coffee on the balcony overlooking the city. Everything was nearby and the dinner recommendation from her son was much appreciated.

Rosa's apartment was amazing in every way!  It was beautiful, spotless and really well located.  On top of that was the quick response to any questions we had, a fruit basket and port when we arrived, help ordering a taxi for our departure...and her grandsons help taking our suitcases down when we left!  A perfect place to stay.

Staying at Rosa’s was one of the best decisions we made during our recent trip to Portugal! The apartment is fantastic, a gorgeous and spacious flat with tiled floors and filled with thoughtful amenities (coffee, fresh fruit, chocolates). The small balcony affords lots of light and a phenomenal view over the city - a great place to enjoy morning coffee or a nightcap. The convenience of the location was key, being situated on a quaint and quiet side street, while still very close to the active waterfront area as well as many great restaurants and bars. We felt so comfortable and at home here and wish we could have stayed longer! Check in and check out were very easy and Rosa and her family were kind and helpful. We definitely highly recommend the accommodations. Thanks again, Rosa!
Do not hesitate to book this beautiful (Website hidden by Airbnb) is good enough for royalty,nothing but the best.Beautifully restored and although difficult to find well worth the effort.
A beautiful space in a lovely part of Porto. The view on a clear day from the apartment is wonderful and Rosa and her family are very communicative and non-intrusive.
Great location within walking or metro distance of all the sights. Beautifully clean appartment nicely equipped with a fab balcony and view. I would recommend to anyone wanting a place to stay.
A very nice apartment with a great view.

This was our second time staying in Rosa's apartment and it was as perfect as before. Exceptionally clean and comfortable bedroom, kitchen, living area and bathroom. Comfy bed. And of course the stellar balcony view that one cannot get enough of. Communication was perfect.

Rosa was an amazing host and the space was gorgeous! I stayed with a friend and from the moment we walked in we were in love. It is spacious and modern with a great view of the river and in a great location for moving around Porto. The neighborhood was quiet and peaceful. I will definitely book here again on my next trip!

Rosa est d'un accueil super chaleureux et son sourire continuel naturel est remarquablement agréable. Elle regrette beaucoup de ne pas pouvoir parler français ou anglais mais son fils ou petit-fils sont à sa rescousse pour assurer une bonne communication. Son superbe apartement d'une propreté remarquable et est très bien situé dans la principale place historique qu'on rejoint en 3 minutes de marche. Nous recommandons hautement et sans hésitation.
Logements central parfaitement équipé et très bien tenu. Rosa et son fils sont délicieux

We had a great time at Rosa's place during our 3 days in Porto and would highly recommend to everyone! The apartment is centrally located and walking distance from all the major attractions. Joana & Eloi's were in contact with everything we needed to know and Rosa was so lovely to hold onto our bags for our whole final day while we went around sampling port. The apartment was immaculately clean with an outstanding view over the city and Rosa was also very kind in providing us coffee, chocolates and some miniature bottles of port. We'll definitely be back to Porto and would love to stay at Rosa's place again!

Had a lovely stay at Rosa's apartment in a central location. Unfortunately she doesn't speak English so communication was minimal but we messaged beforehand about logistics through a property manager. Only minor nitpicks were lack of shampoo and a slightly odd smell from the kitchen but otherwise it was a great stay.
We recommend! Very nice, large, picobello clean apartment on the second  floor of the house with stunning views of Porto. Quiet but still centrally located. Very nice hosts!

Lovely clean and well maintained building, sparkling clean apartment, really airy and light, fabulous view. Very well equipped and in a brilliant location.  A five minute walk from the train station.  Add to that the warmest welcome when you arrive, miniature Port bottles and chocolates and a bowl of fruit - five star treatment at half the price! Thoroughly recommended.

Nos fuimos muy contentos de allí, el piso esta tal cual se ve en las fotos, todo muy limpio y agradable. Las vistas son estupendas y la terraza aunque es pequeña invita a sentarte y pasar un rato admirando la ciudad.
Cuando llegamos hacia un poco de frio, las habitaciones son grandes y solo tiene dos radiadores pero con una manta mas para dormir no hay mayor problema. La ducha funcionó perfectamente así como el resto de electrodomésticos de la casa.

Lo único a destacar es el tema del aparcamiento, es difícil encontrar un sitio libre y ademas puedes tener problemas de robos por la noche, lo mejor es dejar el coche en el parking cercano(20€/dia) y evitar disgustos.
Amazing place in a great location. The view from the balcony is incredible!
Great apartament and a beautiful view over the city.
The apartment lives up to the reviews and ratings! Great location, very spacious for two people, and clean! A must in my book. The view from the balcony is the best part. Would absolutely stay again.

Rosa's place is perfectly located in the heart of the old town where there is lots to see and do.
Rosa is a lovely welcoming and helpful lady, she does not speak English but will go the extra mile to ensure that despite the language barrier you are provided with the information you need.
The property would be difficult for anyone who has difficulty climbing stairs.
But the view at the rear from the apartment balcony is lovely, especially at night when the town is illuminated. 
The apartment had everything we could need with lots of space, a nice cosy bed room, fully equipped kitchen, bath and shower over. 
Large lounge and dining room offers plenty of space.
Despite the location we found the apartment to also be private and quiet until the morning when the local Cockerel crows. 
We would highly recommend for anyone staying in Porto, we will return.

We had a wonderfull stay! Apartment is very quite, we had everything we needed. Great location, in the heart of the old town where there is lots to see and do. Communication was great and the flexibillity of check in/check out was also very kind. I certainly recommend this place to the others!
Tolle Wohnung, Superlage, sehr nette Wirtin. Im Februar ist das Wetter ab und zu in Porto sehr kalt, die Heizung war knapp.
Very nice apartment, central location, close to public line and in the very heart of the old city.
Superbe emplacement!

This place is truly magical! The view of Porto is stunning! The neighborhood, quaint and quiet- and we loved it! A quiet retreat away from the bustling streets of large city life! 

It was a walk to the city center and a very easy one! It was also a short walk down to the riverfront. Our stay was perfect. 

The place was immaculately clean, comfortable, and spacious! 

Rosa was the sweetest woman! So welcoming upon our arrival! If i return to Porto, i will be staying here again!

All was perfect. Quick reply, nice view from the balcony, clean. Good location and peaceful. Plenty of really nice restaurants around. Worth it !! 
Thanks Rosa
Superb accommodation right in the heart of everything, amazing communication and directions - would recommend Rosa's to anyone wishing to stay in Porto

Een erg schone en fijne woning op een geweldige locatie. Alles wat we nodig hadden was aanwezig. Er stond een grote volle fruitschaal, lekkere chocolade en kleine flesjes port. Deze woning is een aanrader voor mensen die Porto willen bezoeken, alles is op loopafstand. Het geweldige uitzicht is ook een meerwaarde.
Perfect place - perfect host !
Der Ausblick ist einfach super, der Rest einfach nur gut.

Wonderful location, close to amenities and calm apartment.
Rosa was very nice and his grandson, Paulo, helped us with the luggage.

Communication was very good before the check-in and the apartment was in perfect state. We even had fresh fruits and two little bottles of Porto as a welcome pack.

The apartment comes equipped with a Dolce Gusto Coffee Machine and tea is provided. All the necessary for cooking is provided as well.
Fantastic stay here. Lots of space, great location and lovely view. Nice little restaurant a couple of doors up the road too which was a good find. Would definitely recommend.

This apartment is the perfect place to explore Porto from. Everything is as described, including the incredible view, and Rosa is lovely! Also loved the welcoming gift of port wine and chocolates. Definitely coming back.

The apartment was beautifully facilitated and our favourite part was the outstanding view from the balcony. There were lovely little touches such as mini bottles of port, chocolates and even a fruit bowl! The location is absolutely perfect for exploring Porto and allowed us to get out and see everything we wanted to. Great stuff!
Great views of the city!

This is a great place. Excellent location for many of the key places to visit. Accommodation is lovely and clean with lots of nice touches to make your stay easy and comfortable. Porto itself is v affordable and we found everything we did really good value. Great place for a weekend break.

Superbe appartement au centre de porto. 
Le logement est spacieux, propre et bien équipé. 
Il est situé à deux pas d’un arrêt de métro et des lieux d’intérêts. 
Rosa est adorable et disponible. 
Nous avons apprécié ses attentions toutes particulières: Porto, corbeille de fruit, chocolat ainsi que des plans de la ville. 
Je recommande très vivement ce logement, il a contribué à rendre notre séjour magnifique.
Par dessus tout, la chaleur et l’accueil de Rosa, l’emplacement dans la ville qui permet de sillonner le quartier historique à pieds, la propreté de l’appartement.
I would stay here again when I return to Porto, which I plan on.  Very clean very comfortable and kind people.

Apartment is very clean and great location for exploring the city. Rosa also had bottled water, fruit and coffee available to us in the flat. Hosts provided recommendations for restaurants upon our request and also helped us with figuring out the best transport options. We had a great stay here and would consider staying here again if we visit Porto in the future!

Great views of the old town, from the balcony.  Across the road from the monastery which is worth a visit. The cleanest place I've stayed in. Port, chocolates, fruit bowl and Dolce gusto coffee pods all appreciated.

Great location, amazing views.  Great for couples and very close to all the action.  We stayed 3 days which was perfect.  The apartment itself was very clean.  Red wine on the balcony is a great way to spend a late afternoon before heading out.  Highly recommend.

The apartment is just like the pictures. Beautiful furnishings and an amazing view. Easy to get to all the sights and transport. Communication was always fast and Rosa is there to meet you!  We would gladly stay here again on our next trip to Oporto.

Rosa's place is a very great value, location, and space. It has an AMAZING view, very clean, and everything is in walking distance to this beautiful destination. Rosa  and her family greet you, make you feel welcome, and personally bid you farewell. We had ultimate privacy and everything we needed from parking to the view and all the amenities that are posted in Rosa's listing. Porto, Portugal has the best people, food, wine, and of course Port! Obrigado!

This apartment is in a super location! The apartment was very clean, well appointed, and secure. Rosa greeted us upon arrival and check in was a very easy process. I’d stay here again if we are fortunate enough to return.

Perfect location! Just up the hill from the riverfront and all the tourist fun there, so it’s not noisy at night but just a quick stroll down some steps to many restaurants and the bridge where you can cross and stroll further for port wine tastings at all Porto’s historic port houses. Good communication, comfortable space with no complaints - there is everything you might need provided here including an espresso maker, hot water kettle, and microwave. - We loved sipping port on the balcony at night and watching the birds.

A beautiful apartment - spotlessly clean, spacious and comfortable. Great location for exploring Porto, close to the Torre dos Clerigos and the top of Rua das Flores. The view from the apartment is simply stunning - across the old town and down to the river.

The apartment was perfect for our stay in Porto. Very central and close to bars and restaurants though at the same time in a quiet residential street. We ate in the restaurant just yards from the apartment, avoiding a walk in an unfortunate rain shower, and it was lovely. Easy access down to the river or a short 2 min walk to Clerigos Tower and all the attractions round there. Location ideal. Apartment was spotlessly clean and the port wine on arrival a nice touch. The balcony giving a view of Clerigos, the Cathedral, the monastery and the river was a real bonus both at day and night. Would recommend a stay here when visiting Porto. Communication with host very good from booking onwards.

Fabulous location in the heart of the Old City; beautifully decorated; spotlessly clean; wonderful balcony views; morning sunshine; outside clothes line for dying towels and light washing; good kitchen; comfortable bed; good shower; cafes and restaurants within a few minutes; close to metro; in other words: perfect!
Rosa was a great host. The apartment had breathtaking views of the city and the apartment was spotless and very clean. Highly recommend anyone going to Porto to stay at Rosa's place.

This is a fabulous base for exploring Porto. It is clean and very comfortable, the view from the balcony is wonderful, all the main sights are in easy walking distance (I particularly recommend Jardins do Palácio de Cristal, a 10  minute walk away with superb views) but it is lovely and quiet at night. There are fabulous bakeries and a mini supermarket very nearby. We loved the welcome gifts of port, chocolate and fruit. It is even easy to get to (an airport bus stops at the top of the road). Access and communication was excellent. We hope to return!

This Airbnb is amazing in every way. It is located close to everything and the views are beautiful. Rosa’s warm hospitality is unmatched and she made our trip to Porto unforgettable. We were in town for the St. John’s festival and Rosa invited my husband and I for a traditional meal with her family. It was delicious ! I can’t say enough good things about this Airbnb. Don’t hesitate ! Book it now!
Great view from the balcony, great location, spotlessly clean, some coffee availible. Couldn't have asked for more!

Wunderschöne, modern eingerichtete Altbauwohnung inmitten des historischen Ortskerns Portos mit beeindruckender Aussicht!
Sensationell.
Comfortable, spacious apartment in private home near city center and main attractions. Great view. Check in was a breeze.  Highly recommend.

Good communication beforehand offering advice on how to get to the apartment (and where to watch the World Cup!). Apartment was very clean, and located very centrally. View from the balcony was fantastic
Being from the USA for the first we had an amazing experience at Rosa's place. The apt. is just what we needed and close to everything walkable. Definitely recommend.
Everything is great at Rosa place:)
Great location close to lots of sight seeing and an amazing view of the city from a private balcony. Very easy check in process and the place was clean.

Rosa's apartment was better than described. The balcony was perfect! The space was larger than expected and the location was excellent. great views, easy to get anywhere in the city and right next to the station.
A great location and wonderful host!

This apartment is exactly where you need to be in Porto. The place is beautiful, clean, and has the most amazing view. Rosa and her grandson were very helpful, and very accommodating as we had arrived to the airBnB earlier than scheduled. Everything was walking distance, there is a free parking very close, a supermarket, a coffeeshop, a small dep... anything you need is just a few steps away. The walk to the port is a short and beautiful one too ! We had a great time and absolutely no complaints - would definitely recommend this place to anyone who likes to live in the heart of a city, without having to worry about any noise at night.

Rosa is a wonderful hostess, and the apartment was really beautiful.  It's located in a very well-kept building, in a fantastic location for exploring Porto.  From the moment we arrived, we felt welcomed.  Rosa's grandson even carried one of our suitcases up the stairs.  The apartment was spotless, with gorgeous views from the large windows that open to a balcony.  Nice touches included complementary bottles of port wine, chocolates, and water.  Rosa also lives in the building, and let us store her luggage at her place on the last day so we could extend our stay a bit.  She doesn't speak English, but she was really warm and friendly, and we loved chatting with her in our very bad Portuguese.  Highly recommend this place!

We had a great time staying at Rosa’s apartment. It was in a great location, very spacious and had a great view - just as advertised. We really appreciated that Rosa left out bottles of water, fruit, chocolates, and coffee & tea for us. It was also very nice of her to let us leave our suitcases in her apartment for a few hours after check-out, since our flight home wasn’t until the evening. Overall we highly recommend staying at Rosa’s!

Alles war super und hat unsere Erwartungen Übertroffen. Es war Sehr sauber und es hat an nichts gefehlt. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder denn es gibt keinen schöneren Ort um den Sonnenuntergang über der Altstadt Portos zu genießen.

We had a great stay in Rosa's appartment. It is located in a very lovely neighborhood, the view is just unbelievable, the space is very clean, organized and calm. We highly recommend this beautiful appartment.
Rosas place is the place to stay. Excellent facilities,position and views along with privacy. You really couldn’t ask for better.

Emplacement idéal...tout se fait à pieds..Propreté exceptionnelle...
Nous recommandons fortement!
Rosa’s place was much better than expected. An amazing place with a great view. After hanging out in Port, we would just watch the city on the porch. Highly recommended.
My friend and I had a great stay at Rosa’s apartment. They even carried our luggage up the steps for us! The location was great, easily walkable to many places. Would definitely stay again!!

Rosa ist eine sympathische, freundliche und hilfsbereite Frau. Ihe Wohnung hat eine Superlage in der Altstadt, von wo aus man
 alles erkunden kann. Es ist sehr
 sauber, Bad und Fenster neu. Unser Lieblingsplatz war die Terrasse!

We loved our time at Rosa's spacious apartment!  The bed was comfortable with freshly ironed sheets, we loved the large comfortable couch for resting up after a day out and we enjoyed throwing open the doors onto the terrace to take in the sights.  Rosa left us a little port, water and coffee capsules to enjoy.  Her apartment is in an interesting area of Oporto and we highly recommend our favourite breakfast haunt a couple of minutes away (we got takeaways) called Muralhas.

Amazing place to stay close to the center of it all. Everything from Livraria Lello bookstore to the Riberia and all of the great places to eat in between were less than a 10 minute walk. The views though from the balcony were outstanding - better than anything you can find in the rest of the city. Go to this place you won’t regret it.
really great stay at the apartment. great location and balcony was lovely. would recommend :)

An amazing, amazing, amazing apartment.

Feels like home in Porto. Sitting in your airy, bright, spacious living room, eating some fruit, sipping port, hearing seagulls outside your window, looking at the city from above. Perfection.

Super recommended. Great location easy communication, perfect space, and everything you need.
This is a wonderful apartment that is furnished with everything you could possibly need.  Great location for exploring Porto and  I highly recommend this apartment.

Rosa’s place was amazing. Such a large space, comfy bed and pillows, very clean and the location is perfect. We had such a lovely time in Porto and staying at Rosa’s made it worth while. I highly recommend this apartment.

Great location in UNESCO heritage part of Porto, close to everything but quiet in the evening.  Large spacious apartment with fantastic view of the city and the MOST comfortable bed of our Portugal trip.  Definitely recommend a stay in Rosa’s home.

This apartment is in a fantastic position in Porto, what an amazing view from the balcony! Our communication with Rosa and her grandson Joana was brilliant all the way from booking to leaving. The apartment is absolutely spotless and it was a real pleasure to stay there. We had a very comfy bed and  excellent wifi. The apartment is very quiet and no problems with noise at nights. Its in a great situation, on a side road but right in the heart of the city. The national photography museum is on the corner and well worth visiting. Porto is a great place and this is a great place to stay.
Simply put, this is an amazing apartment with an even better view. Rosa is sweet and accommodating. We had a very short stay, but it was easy to find and very close to some amazing sights.

Rosa is lovely and the apartment is very clean and spacious. The view from the balcony is great. The second bathroom is off the balcony. There is noise from the apartment above but this is to be expected. Location is perfect.
Lovely apartment...great location & space! Comfortable (Website hidden by Airbnb) prepared for the many hills of Porto and stairs in this building

Rosa’s apartment was sparkling clean with nice little touches and her grandson even helped us with the luggage up the stairs. The view from the terrace is amazing, you woke up to the sound of seagulls and the sunrise in front. The place is amazingly located, half a block away there is an overlook and it’s 10 minutes to the river and many other attractions. The bedroom was comfy and dark so you sleep really well. Rosa is very nice, she helped us with luggage at the end too. Overall good experience, we recommend it.

You can expect a cleanliness that's beyond any standards! A balcony for your breakfast with Porto and the Douro-river at your feet! Quiet nights of sleep (everything double glazed, and no street in front of the bedroom). And all of that at the midst of the centre of Porto

This is a special apartment. Beautiful inside and out with a stunning balcony view. Plenty of amenities provided and a very comfortable bed. Close to downtown Porto, everything is in walking distance. Parking is nearby as well and Rosa will provide lots of helpful details for checking-in and discovering the city. Muito obrigado and hope to come back soon!
Отличное расположение, отличная квартира, отличный хозяин! Все понравилось, безумный красочный колорит Порто продолжался и у нас в квартире!
Amazing views! Great apartment, Rosa was very accommodating. Highly recommend for any stay in beautiful Porto!

A comfortable, quiet, clean and conveniently located apartment which caters to all one's needs for a stay in Porto. Its proximity to restaurants and the river makes it an excellent location for enjoying the pleasures of the city.
This apartment is a great space.  It is roomy and had all the amenities.  The location was perfect for sightseeing, restaurants, safe and walkable.  We recommend a stay with Rosa in Porto.

This apartment is BEAUTIFUL! Rosa was great at giving us recommendations and supplying coffee/wine. Be prepared to pull your luggage up massive hills if you aren’t unerring to the apt. I HIGHLY recommend this apartment! :)
The apartment is spacious and full of light. The view is stunning. The location is central and convenient.
Fantastic location, full of character, stunning views and original features. Would definitely recommend.

Rosa's place is outstanding! The location is great with amazing views of the city, and just walking distance to just about everything you probably want to see.

Pros: great location, clean, full kitchen (Oven, stove, toaster, pots, pans, etc), inside and outside the bathroom, great views.

Cons: A couple of steep hills to walk up to get there if taking the Metro.
Mooi appartement op een toplocatie, met prachtig uitzicht over porto!

We had a lovely stay at Rosa's apartment.  It was clean, spacious and very centrally located.  We enjoyed the port and chocolates which were left for us upon arrival.  The view was spectacular. We loved Rosa's place.

Rosa's place is the perfect place to stay if you want to visit Porto! I've never stayed in an AIRBNB before that was this clean. The entire building is immaculate and so full of charm. The view from the balcony was even more amazing than expected. Rosa's place is perfect if you are wanting to explore an old European town on foot without all the trappings of a tourist destination like Rome or Barcelona. There are so many historic sites hidden around corners and alleyways plus a good amount of places to eat and shop. You go one direction and  you are already in the historic Jewish district district where you can virtually walk in any direction and happen upon historic churches, squares or walk across the bridge to look out at both sides of river. Go a block or so in the other direction and you have the retail district filled with shops, restaurants etc. 
As for the apartment itself, the master bedroom was private and a pretty good size even with multiple suitcases in various spots. We could hear the occasional footsteps upstairs but nothing too much to interrupt sleep or privacy. The leather sofa seemed new and had a sofa bed that our children voted to be the best they've ever slept on. The kitchen had everything we needed and everything was in working order. 
We were only in Porto for two days which was terribly short for a city with so much to see and do. Rosa's place was a great place for a family of four to stay in while on vacation in Porto.

The landlord Rosa is very kind. And the apartment located in super center area but quiet, and of course with super view of Porto. It is definitely worth it to live there. The living expierence is better than the pictures.

Rosa's apartment is clean, very conveniently placed, and has an amazing view from the balcony. It does get pretty cold in the apartment, but the space heater heated up the bedroom very well. I would highly suggest staying with Rosa!
Fantastic location. Amazing view. Great value

Wir haben uns trotz schlechtem Wetter sehr wohl gefühlt bei Rosa. Kommen bestimmt noch mal wieder nach Porto und würde das nochmal buchen. Super zentral gelegen mit einem genialen Ausblick vom Balkon. Sehr sauber!
Great view, great location. Very clean kept in touch with clear directions and a warm welcome.
Nice location once you figure out your bearings. Close enough to everything. Fully equipped kitchen which we did use. The view is nice but currently full of construction cranes. Still nice though.

Rosa ist super freundlich und sehr sympathisch. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und hat eine tolle Aussicht auf die Altstadt von Porto. Die Lage ist natürlich unschlagbar. Wir werden definitiv nochmal kommen. Vielen Dank! ;-)

name: ROOM + ENSUITE INNER CITY MOD HOUSE
summary: Large room with en-suite full personal bathroom plus own TV  in modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. Set in a quiet friendly back street with parking.
space: New to the market. A large private room with a double bed, en-suite bathroom  and city views in my newly renovated and completely refitted house, just 10 minutes by bus from the centre of Sydney. Located in a quiet corner of the Balmain/Rozelle area, the house is just a short distance from the heart of Balmain and its famous cafes, markets, pubs, shops and restaurants. You are welcome to use the kitchen and living room facilities and the wireless internet connection. Victoria Road is also just a 3 minute walk away with frequent bus services to the city, Circular Quay and also west to adjoining suburbs. This is a non smoking house however there is a small courtyard at the front for those who like to sneak one or two. As my house is always kept clean and tidy I would appreciate it if my guests followed suit, and I have a dishwasher for those who like to cook so easy cleaning up. Other than that I am very relaxed so make yourself at home.
description: Large room with en-suite full personal bathroom plus own TV  in modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. Set in a quiet friendly back street with parking. New to the market. A large private room with a double bed, en-suite bathroom  and city views in my newly renovated and completely refitted house, just 10 minutes by bus from the centre of Sydney. Located in a quiet corner of the Balmain/Rozelle area, the house is just a short distance from the heart of Balmain and its famous cafes, markets, pubs, shops and restaurants. You are welcome to use the kitchen and living room facilities and the wireless internet connection. Victoria Road is also just a 3 minute walk away with frequent bus services to the city, Circular Quay and also west to adjoining suburbs. This is a non smoking house however there is a small courtyard at the front for those who like to sneak one or two. As my house is always kept
neighborhood_overview: Village type area with many restaurants, cafes and pubs although we are off the main street so it is a quiet house. Less than 10 mins by bus to Sydney city.
transit: 2 minute walk to bust stop and a 10 minute walk to ferries.
access: Guests have access to kitchen, living room own personal en-suite bathroom,  laundry plus unlimited internet. TV is provided in own bedroom.
interaction: Guest's choice.
house_rules: no smoking inside and keep place tidy as you found it.

host.host_about: Hi, What can I say other than I am 39 years old, professional female in a relationship. Very easy going. I just recently renovated my whole house, pretty much a knock down job so new everything. I heard about air B&B and thought what a great idea. I have a clean house including a great kitchen so feel free to make yourself at home when you stay with me. Just let me know if there is anything in particular you may need. This is also the perfect room to shut yourself away in if that is what you'd prefer.

reviews.comments: I didn't meet Alison as she was away, but Adam let me in and explained everything to me. The house is beautifully (and very newly) renovated, the bed was wonderfully comfortable, and I had my own huge bathroom which was very luxurious. The street is quiet but very convenient to everything. All in all, a great bargain and a lovely place to stay - I'll be back!

Although I did not meet Alison, Adam showed me around.
He is very relaxed and this place was realy nice to stay.
Great bathroom and friendly quiet neighbourhood.  Easy to go to from this place to go to the centre as well.
Great stay in Rozelle in Alison's house. I needed a quiet and peaceful place to put my head each night while visiting friends in Sydney and it lived up to expectations!

Staying with Allison and Adam was wonderful. The place is centrally located and easy to walk to downtown Sydney or even take a bus. I was able to get in a game of cricket with Adam I had a blast coming from America this was my first experience in Australia. The place is very clean and modern love the bathroom and the kitchen is great too. The bedroom was at the top of flat very quiet, clean the bed was very comfortable slept well. I would highly recommend this place for anyone in the future it was wonderful place to stay Adam and Allison are great!
Easy stay with excellent bus connection to the city. Shower was my favourite at this place, besides of that I had a good sleep in the comfy bed.
Adam has been very helpful. House is modern and very quiet. My first time using AIRbnb and am impressed
The house was in an ideal spot for the party I was attending.  Warm comfy bed and lovely hot shower.

Alison and Adam were my saviours in Sydney. our logistics officer booked us an hotel in the middle of nowhere in Ryde, claiming that it was the nearest point to Sydney Olympic Park as i had to attend the WPC14 with my colleagues. When i check the location, had to cancel and rushed to my ultimate accommodation portal, broadcasting generic message to nearby hosts to secure an accommodation the soonest.

Alison was among the first to reply, and to pre-confirm...
By the time i got there, Adam was already waiting for me and even kind enough to give me all the directions at 8am and off course waited for me outside to make sure that i'm paying the right cab fee. 

What can i say Adam, made feel at home from very first moment, kind, genuine and warm welcoming host. The house is is really nice fully refurbished, in a quite and well connected neighbourhood. My room was upstairs, a nice sunny room with  a queen bed and a bathroom attached. After i dropped in my luggage, Adam gave me guided orientation tour to the house, with access to all amenities. 

Felt like a VIP 5 star treatment as Adam even gave me a pre-paid bus ticket, which made my first(s) bus rides easier as some stations are pre-paid only.  So now that you that i have been at a great apartment, with great hosts, that's all, Rozelle is a really nice neighbourhood. walking distance from my hosts' place, you can make it to the main street packed, with cafe, bars and restaurant, a vibrant market and lot of attractions. if you happen to stay over a weekend don't miss Rozelle Market (Sat & Sun). 

Now the funny part, Adam was so happy to receive me as he's a all star backgammon player and he knows that Lebanese people are really good at that and he was so eager for round. One night we decided to play a round and Adam's expectations went all down the drain, i think i was the first Lebanese ever to be clumsy backgammon player. We agree that we will play another time via (Hidden by Airbnb) and i will have support from fellow Lebanese players :)

All in all, i great time, the house is warm, clean, and comfortable and the hosts are simply AWESOME

Alison immediately replied to my booking request and organised for her hubby to meet me as I was checking in late.

They were very helpful and gave me a bus card to use. The room was very spacious and the house was close to transport and restaurants.

Excellent hosts in an excellent location.

I had a great stay! Alison was very efficient with my booking and advised me Adam would look after me on arrival. Adam was a great host, carried my case upstairs and even invited me to the pub. The room comfortable and had a great view. The bus around the corner was very convenient for me to get into the city. Thanks for having me!

It is lovely neighborhood, very easy access to all the buses to the city center. The host adam has been helpful and was generous to let me use his living room for my work. The first night the room floor was dusty but was happy it was thoroughly cleaned on the second day. The only concern I had was the room has no lock, given I was the only female guest in the house and did not know any of other (male) guests on the first day of arrival, I was slightly nervous in the first night until I met other guests who were very kind and friendly.

Thanks for a great stay, I have stayed here on three occasions, and have been welcomed by a very considerate host each time. The property is located close to shops restaurants and the gym. I would highly recommend this property and am looking forward to my next visit
Cheers
Elise

name: Beautiful in Ipanema for your Family
summary: Just family.
space: Apartamento muito agradável em predio familiar.
description: Just family.
neighborhood_overview: Ipanema, posto 9 um pulo da praia!
notes: •REGLAS  El no cumplimiento de qualquer una de las reglas, listadas abajo, implica el cobro de una multa de un valor de R$800,00 (quinientos reales) • No está permitida la permanencia (a excepción de visitas), de personas que no estén en la lista presentada en la reserva; • No es permitido realizar fiestas; •Queda expresamente prohibido cualquier actividad ilícita o ilegal; •Respetar la Ley Estatal 126 -77 - Ley del Silencio, la cual prohíbe ruidos después de las 22:00 horas (diez de la noche). Eviten reclamos de los vecinos y estén conscientes de que la policía podrá ser llamada y actuar en caso esta ley no sea cumplida; • Lavar los pies o cualquier objeto que esté sucio de arena, antes de entrar en el apartamento. En el garaje, usted encontrará un lava-pies para tal fin; •Mantener la puerta del apartamento cerrada con llave; •No es permitido dejar la llave del apartamento en la portería; •Al salir, apagar los electrodomésticos, luces y aire acondicionado; •Antes del check out, retira
transit: Metrô General Osorio muito proximo, acesso para Centro, Zona Norte, Leblon ou Barra da Tijuca
access: Somente terá acesso ao apartamento os hospedes cadastrados conforme a locação. Todos os nomes constarão na portaria. Não é permitido a entrada de outras pessoas.
house_rules: REGRAS  O não cumprimento das regras, listadas abaixo, implica em cobrança de multa no valor de R$ 500,00: •Não é permitida a permanência, salvo visita, de pessoas que não estejam na lista apresentada no ato da reserva; •Não é permitida a realização de festas; •É expressamente proibida qualquer atividade ilícita ou ilegal; •Respeitar a Lei Estadual 126 -77 - Lei do Silêncio, na qual proíbe barulho após às 22:00 horas. Evitem reclamação dos vizinhos e estejam cientes que a polícia poderá ser acionada caso esta lei não seja cumprida; •Lavar os pés ou qualquer objeto que esteja sujo de areia, antes de entrar no apartamento.  Na garagem você encontrará um lava-pés para tal finalidade; •Manter a porta do apartamento trancada; •Não é permitido deixar a chave do apartamento na portaria; •Ao sair, desligar os eletrodomésticos, luzes e ar condicionado; •Antes do check out, retirar o lixo, deixar a cozinha e louça limpas; • Ao término da locação o imóvel deverá estar no mesmo estado de conservaç

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou carioca, publicitaria, host do Airbnb desde 2011 .
Trabalho com administração de apartamentos por temporada e ajudo alguns anfitriões como cohost. 
Adoro fotografia e sou apaixonada por fotos de ambientes internos, sou fotógrafa também. 

Adoro viajar e uma vez por ano tiro alguns dias de férias para conhecer algum lugar do mundo afinal, é preciso saber viver e aproveitar a vida pra manter a alma em equilibro.  

Gosto muito desta atividade e você pode contar  comigo pra te ajudar a hospedar ou até mesmo para te hospedar :) 

Estamos aí! 


I'm from Rio de Janeiro, an advertising company, host of Airbnb since 2011.
I work with apartment management by season and I help some hosts like cohost.

I love photography and I'm in love with indoor photography, I'm a photographer too.

I love to travel and once a year I take a few days of vacation to know some place in the world after all, it is necessary to know how to live and enjoy life to keep the soul in balance.

I really like this activity and you can count on me to help you host or even to host you :)

See you soon!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: La estadía fue hermosa. Viajamos con toda la familia y nos hospedamos en el departamento de Fabi. Todo fue tal cual a lo que estaba indicado. Los dueños estuvieron a nuestra disposición en cada detalle que necesitamos, una tranquilidad. El departamento está ubicado a metros de la playa en el puesto nueve de ipanema, es muy amplio, limpio y cómodo sobre todo para venir en familia, ideal. Volveríamos a este departamento sin lugar a dudas.

Excelente experiencia. 
Fantástico servicio de Fabi. 
Excelente departamento. 
100% recomendable.

Sensacional, quartos arrumador, camas arrumadas, toalhas para todos!
Melhor apto que ja fiquei!

Excelente departamento y ubicación, seguro, tranquilo, a una cuadra de la playa, cerca de todo. El departamento es amplio, cómodo, para vivir las vacaciones que quieres. Fabi excelente, muy agradecidos.

name: The Sassy Lilac Megan Love Room
summary: This is a beautiful bedroom perfect for two located in the Megan Love in Hawaii House. The house has four bedrooms and four bathrooms and is located in a gated community in Hawaii right off of Ali'i drive close to beaches and town. Come stay with us! Aloha
space: This room is super cozy and comfy and the house is so beautiful. I have painted the whole House bright Happy colors and it really feels amazing. The room has hard wood floors and air conditioning
description: This is a beautiful bedroom perfect for two located in the Megan Love in Hawaii House. The house has four bedrooms and four bathrooms and is located in a gated community in Hawaii right off of Ali'i drive close to beaches and town. Come stay with us! Aloha This room is super cozy and comfy and the house is so beautiful. I have painted the whole House bright Happy colors and it really feels amazing. The room has hard wood floors and air conditioning You will have access to he whole house pretty much. There is a big living room, lanai, kitchen, creation station, big yard, and many places to sit and relax. I live in the downstairs bedroom and I am around to host and clean and to Meg sure you are having an amazing experience :) My house is 2 1/2 miles from town and about a five minute walk to the beach A rental car would be ideal since the island is so big. We also have uber, taxis, and buses. I also have a few bikes that I share and I live right on Alii drive so u can easily walk or bike
neighborhood_overview: My house is 2 1/2 miles from town and about a five minute walk to the beach
notes: This bedroom shares a bathroom with another bedroom in the house but there is also another half bath downstairs. This is normally not an issue since everyone is on different schedules and doing different things. I clean the bathroom every day knowing that people are sharing :)
transit: A rental car would be ideal since the island is so big. We also have uber, taxis, and buses. I also have a few bikes that I share and I live right on Alii drive so u can easily walk or bike to some of the Beaches :)
access: You will have access to he whole house pretty much. There is a big living room, lanai, kitchen, creation station, big yard, and many places to sit and relax.
interaction: I live in the downstairs bedroom and I am around to host and clean and to Meg sure you are having an amazing experience :)

host.host_about: Aloha! I’m Megan Love and I own a bed and breakfast in Kona, HI called The Megan Love House! It’s awesome and you should definitely come stay with us!  It’s a four bedroom four bathroom house in a beautiful gated community right by the beach. I live in the downstairs bedroom with my boyfriend Jacob and we are expecting a baby in May :) Our house is quite big and we have a lot of spaces to relax and unwind. I have the option of renting just one room or all three rooms either way we are always here and We love hosting and meeting new people. We are both great chefs and love impressing guests with our delicious healthy breakfasts. Jake and I don’t go on Vacays that often due to always (thankfully) being super busy with the bed and breakfast but we definitely want to travel more and see more of the islands and the world! In the mean time we will be here in Hawaii so come visit us and enjoy our home in paradise :) Aloha

reviews.comments: I highly recommend staying at Megan's place. Megan is a great host. She creates a warm, inviting environment. You can tell she genuinely enjoys having guests in her home. The house is on a private, gated street, close to the beach. The listing description is accurate.

Megan's home is so welcoming and colorful! The hosts are friendly and will include you in anything going on while you're there - dinner, yoga, paddle boarding. There's cocktails and coffee upon arrival, and plenty to do nearby. I only wish I could stay longer than one day!

Megan's place is a great, fun beach house. Just walking or biking distance from several beaches, and town. Megan gave me the tour, and the room was all ready with sheets and towels. She's very generous with everything in the house, made me a drink (!) and the garage has everything you could want for the beach: surf and body boards, chairs, snorkel gear, yoga mats. She knows people around town and can make suggestions and even hook you up with activities. A lovely host and fun experience to stay here.

What a stay! Megan was very welcoming, creative and generous. Our room was nice and clean. The house offers lots of space to relax. Nearby is a beach where we saw lots of turtles. If you are an open-minded person, I definitely recommend staying at Megan's place. Thank you, Megan!
Great Location and exiting stay!

Megan was great! She greeted us and explained the amenities of the house - loved her energy! Our schedule was pretty jam packed and we weren't at the house much. I highly recommend staying here - can't wait to come back to the Big Island!

Megan's place is big, beautiful and clean. The host herself is a ray of sunshine and put in a lot of effort to make sure I had a good stay. 
I always felt comfortable and like I was in my own home. 
I will miss Megan very much and would recommend a stay with her.

Spent one amazing day and night with Megan at her "Bed & Best Friend". Within an hour of knowing her we were chillin like we've known each other for years. If she asks you to go to yoga, do it. It's a blast and a great way to meet a ton of people in town. Megan and her friends are welcoming to people from all walks of life. She has a heart bigger than ocean and a smile brighter than the sun. You get so much more than a place to sleep when you stay with Megan. As far as the house goes, it is incredible. Very new, extremely clean, and most importantly it is close to the beaches and to town. The bed specifically in the lilac room is exceptionally comfortable.

She is so welcoming and warm. She let us use her bicycles, snorkeling gears and whatever we needed. She is so sharing.
She even shared her art materials with us. She made me feel home.
Oh BTW she has a good taste! She painted and decorated the place nicely! 
The neighborhood was great. walking distance to the beach. 
Thanks Megan for being an incredible host!

An open air house of peace, harmony, and positive energy.  Megan was an amazing host providing delicious food and beverage upon arrival.  She pointed me to the good restaurants, wonderful yoga, and sweet beaches.  Thank you so much Megan!  Can't wait to return.  :)
It was an amazing stay in a truly great place. The design and location make this place a real paradise for a couple. Lonely beaches and calm neighborhood is what you really need to relax.

Megan is beautiful inside and out! She welcomed us with open arms and took us to happy hour and the beach to swim with turtles. She truly made us feel at home and we loved her spirit and energy. We are going to her yoga class tomorrow even though we're not staying with her anymore because she already seems like a friend we've known forever. Hope to come back soon!
Megan is the perfect host, and this is the perfect place to stay when visiting Kailua-Kona. I'm glad to say that I have friends in Hawaii now :) NB! Be prepared to do some hula hooping ;)
The most amazing day! Megan is a sweetheart. We became instant friends. She was so welcoming the place was so nice. She showed us around and we had no choice but to extend our stay.

Megan was such a bubbly, happy and welcoming host. When we arrived she greater us and showed us around the house and to our room. Everything was tidy and clean yet still decorated and fun just as described. We stayed for a week and it was the best vacation I have ever had. We took videos and pictures, went to the beach. Megan provided us with everything we needed to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. I can't wait to come back.

Megan and the sassy lilac room were far away the best experience I've had through airbnb. Megan is such an outstanding host giving me breakfast on the one day she was able and doing everything in her power to be attentive to anything I needed. She created such a family atmosphere in the house with the other guests that we all went to see the lava together. The room is impeccable and the bed was super comfortable. All the love in the universe to Megan!

This was the best Airbnb experience I've had. Megan is a special soul who does everything she can to make you feel welcome, comfortable, and enjoy the stay. The house is gorgeous and has a peaceful feel about it, as well as being clean and comfortable. The location is just amazing with "turtle beach" at the end of the street (with actual turtles!!).

During my stay Megan helped me out so many times by giving me lifts to different places or letting me use her phone to make arrangements. 
She also has snorkelling gear and bikes to borrow which made this trip the perfect vacation. Megan also teaches yoga, and the other guests and I went along with Megan to free yoga overlooking the sea. 

Megan has a way of making people feel comfortable and being able to connect with each other. In my 3 short days here, I felt like I got to know Megan and the other guests and will be staying in touch. I will definitely be back one day soon.

What an amazing experience at megan's love house! Surely the best host i had on my air bnb experience. She loves her job, she is very attentive and fun, she cooked for us and did our fresh smoothie every morning!
she gave u a lot of good advices to visit and have good time in big island.
If i go back to kona i will be happy to be her gest again :-)
Megan was amazing and so was her house. I didn't have a car but I got around just fine by Megan's bicycle and she was also so sweet to give me a lift a few times. Thanks again Megan!
It was just a beautiful experience, she was lovely and welcoming since our arrival. She just wants the best for every human being. She even gave a birthday balloon to my wife for her birthday

Meghan lives in a gated community which means it was totally safe and quiet.  As a host she was extremely welcoming and anxious to get to meet us.  She not only was cordial, she really opened up her home to us by sharing food and making us feel like long time friends.
Perfect stay, couldn't have asked for more. Megan was super friendly and helpful, felt like staying with a friend. Place is lovely and relaxed, wish we could've stayed for longer :)

Megan has a wonderful house 3mn drive to downtown Kona with 3 rooms upstairs, 1ba, and the open garage is turned into a coach sitting area. Our room was clean and freshly painted. Megan was a very welcoming host. We recommend this rental.

Beautiful house with a comfortable room - really comfortable bed and pillows. We slept better than our own home. We were only there for 1 night but Megan was helpful and fun! Had a nice quiet night in.

Our quick stay in Kona was a blast. Megan is so warm and friendly, made us feel totally at home in her groovy house full of beauty paintings her guests have done. Our room was lovely, bed comfy, just like being at home. Megan quickly felt like a friend and made us feel so welcome. She makes a delicious smoothie bowl and great coffee. I would really love to stay here again :)
Megan is a wonderful host...loved all the art, jewelry, hula hoops, and relaxing spaces in her house!

Megan is a fantastic host. Her beautiful home has everything from beautiful garden areas to a nifty arts and crafts nook. The room we stayed in was comfy and quiet. It also had an AC which was fantastic. She was very professional and sweet and we would not hesitate to stay with her again. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the big island!

Love...still impressed by this wonderful house and a heartwarming host.
Megan is a very lovely person and really takes care for you if you need something...
We loved the spiritual feeling and felt the very special megan love house magic.
Happy to be there next time.

Eine wunderbare Gastgeberin mit einem sehr schönen Haus.
Waren sehr begeistert von dem problemlosen Ablauf und wenn man etwas benötigte, kümmerte sich Megan sehr liebevoll um einen...
Freuen uns schon auf den nächsten Aufenthalt bei ihr...hoffentlich bald

We had a wonderful stay at Megan Love's place! The room was very nice and clean and was beautifully decorated with art and paintings. Megan was an excellent host. She greeted us with ice waters and made us delicious smoothie breakfast the next morning. She made us feel very welcome, and at home. We brought our 4 month old baby with us and Megan was wonderful with him.  I highly recommend staying at this place when you visit Kona. Very convenient location. Close to the beach and restaurants in town. We would love to stay here again.
Wow, Megan really puts herself out for her guests.  Her home is very comfy, and she shares her spaces.  I would stay again in a minute!
We had a great time at Megan..She is such a wonderful person and her place is so unique filled with all the creativity..She makes great healthy smoothies and really takes care of her guests..
Megan非常熱情親切,屋子的佈置非常溫馨,我很喜歡她房子的顏色和她自己的畫作,周圍的環境很安靜,我很希望再回到這裡｡
Megan is nice people. Her house is so beautiful and comfortable.
Megan is full of life and a great host.  She seems to love everyone and everything. It was an awesome experience to stay with her.

Megan is awesome. I would recommend to anyone that wants a gracious and lovely host in addition to a very cozy home, come stay here. Megan is such a sweetheart and is always welcoming. She is very considerate and attentive to anything she can do to help. She is the definition of hospitable with a big heart. I would definitely come and stay at her abode again. 

-D

Everything was wonderful.  Megan created a beautiful B&B.  It was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable.  Megan went out of her way to make all of her guests feel welcome and ensured they experienced the genuine big island aloha spirit.

Megan hosted the most unique airbnb experience we have had. It was an absolute pleasure staying with her. She makes you feel welcome the minute you are there, gives great recommendations and makes excellent healthy breakfast! I would recommend staying at the Megan love house to anyone.
It s a pleasure being with and at Megan's place.
Megan is the most positive and kind person EVER! I've never felt more immediately at home! Such a beautiful house in a wonderful location right by a perfect little beach called Turtle Cove!

If I could give a rating higher than 5 stars, I would. Megan is an AMAZING host. You can feel her genuine love and caring from the second you meet her. (There's a reason this is called the Megan Love House!) We could not have asked for a better place to stay while in Kona. Our room was comfortable, clean, and beautiful. The lanai and outdoor eating are were so nice, and we were thankful for the wide array of beach gear that we could use. My favorite part, though, was the delicious coffee and smoothies that awaited us each morning. If you are looking for a place to truly relax and recharge, stay with Megan! Mahalo and much love!
