Megan is a great host and her place is superb, everything was way better than expected. The room is spacey, bright, well equipped and looks nice with a lot of artwork and nice colors. Megan is really friendly and helpful, she made a delicious breakfast for us and made us to smile every time, eg by singing about Budapest :) She is a real modern hippy, but you don't have to be one to enjoy her company and place. 
Riding around with her bikes was a real fun, even when we had a breakdown and kind-of-ruined one of them she wasn't upset. She can also give nice hints, eg. where to eat - don't miss Pokeshack.
One of our best airbnb experience.
It located in good area, and the house was very unique. I was fully relaxed and enjoyed the exploration around. Strongly recommended!
Megan is s fabulous and energetic host.  She shows great care of her guests. Great house with great spaces.  Appreciate the breakfast smoothie she made me before I rushed out for work.
Nice place in a quite location. Megan is super friendly and her breakfast smoothies are really good! We only stayed one night but would have loved to stay another night or two.
Come for the great vibe. Stay for the awesome smoothies. Wish we didn't have to leave. Megan was a great host.
I think you should stay here because...Megan is a great host and will add memorable experiences to your stay on this illustrious island.
Megan was a very nice host. The house is colorful, creatively decorated, and clean.  No private bathroom.

Megan is the quintessential AirBnB host, akin to visiting a long-lost friend who lives by the mantra "my home is your home." Megan is a true "Super Host" in every way, going above and beyond in her hospitality. For example, we arrived to a rainstorm, and rather than have to go out to find a place to eat dinner with my daughter, Megan donned a hat, went out to her garden to pick fresh basil and proceeded to prepare a pasta dinner for all of her guests! It was so heartwarming to “break bread” and commune with Megan, her friends and guests from around the globe. So cool and unexpected! That was only the beginning. Again, totally unexpected, the next morning was the same as Megan and a friend whipped up breakfast for us all — Megan is clearly in her glory hosting guests, and her genuine passion was evident throughout our stay. She has an outdoor/indoor “Creation Station” for painting, making jewelry or designing to your heart’s delight, and the walls of her home are all adorned with artwork from guests. Magical. The room and bed were super comfy; we slept like babies. The location is divine, and once again, Megan served up two fabulous bikes to ride to the beach and along the coastline through Kona to the pier — where Megan was chilling with friends and even invited us to use her paddle boards. It just doesn’t end, and we were only there for less than 24 hours! Upon departure, Megan left us each with one of her handmade rings as a token of her creative artistry and a fond memory of her very big heart!

All the reviews are accurate. Megan became a friend by the time we left. She lives near a secluded beach - 15 min walk around and across black rock to get to it. She cooked us meals. Offered yoga. Gave us great restaurant options. She was most of all a great host and she loves what she does. Tons of water and beach gear made it an easy win for us. We loaded our bags up with snorkel gear and road off into town on two of her bikes-- about a 15 min bike ride. She has locks for the bikes so we locked them up and enjoyed the town!

Megan was really great during our stay. Her place is really nice and a very good location. She even waited for us to arrive in evening even though she had evening plans. I would definitely recommend her place to anyone visiting kona. She is very friendly and was really homely experience for us during our stay

Megan's place is a great Kona experience! The house is in a quiet neighborhood within walking distance of the water and an easy bike (she has many available to borrow) or drive, very slowly - biking is faster- into Kona Kailua. I love to open water swim so I biked into town a couple of mornings to swim out along the Ironman swim course from the pier. A GREAT way to start the day! House-wise, the bed is very comfortable, bathroom is adequate and the common areas downstairs are spacious, inside and out, and very accommodating. If you are lucky and the timing works out, you can join Megan for a morning yoga session outside. She's an inspiring teacher and is very experienced and knowledgeable. Megan will do everything she can to make your stay comfortable and very interesting!

Megan's home is very lovely. It's located in a safe neighborhood and is close to all the good places in Kona. We stayed four nights at Megan's home and we really enjoyed staying there. Megan is very nice and friendly and accommodating. I strongly recommend staying with her!

Great hostess and great place. Megan was very flexible on our arrival and departure time. Added bonus was the other guests and beautiful Summer (Megan knows).  Morning smoothly and fresh brewed coffee was an unexpected but much appreciated treat.

Meganは素敵なﾎｽﾄであり､快適に過ごせる家です｡滞在中は彼女や彼女の友人､一緒に泊まっていた人とのｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝを楽しみました｡朝ご飯やｺｰﾋｰを入れてくれるのですが､彼女の家の素敵なｶﾞｰﾃﾞﾝをみながら食べるのが楽しみでした｡台所やﾄｲﾚ､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑやﾎｽﾄや他の客と共有ですが､お互いに気を遣いすぎることなく使うことができます｡家はｺﾅ中心からは少し離れてますのでﾚﾝﾀｶｰがあるとよいです｡閑静でｹﾞｰﾄ付きの安全な住宅街にある家なので安心して過ごすことができます｡観光だけでなく地元の人とのｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝを楽しみたい人にはお勧めです｡ぜひまた利用したいと思います｡

Megan offered everything and anything you could possibly think of to make the experience of the big island unforgettable and amazing. From snorkeling gear to bikes and boogie boards, yoga, hula hoop thereby and a creation station. An artists home full of love and wonderful energy. I wouldn't stay anywhere else, ever!

Our stay with Megan was fantastic. Location was great, but best of all was Megan's hospitality! She invited us into her home and made us some delicious smoothies. Also loved that she had lots of snorkeling and beach gear that we could borrow during our stay. We got good  advice on places to eat and beaches to visit. We would definitely come back for another stay when we visit the big island again. :)
A must stay for price, location and hospitality !

Megan est une hôtesse exceptionnelle, super chaleureuse, Belle accueille, invitante. J'ai vraiment apprécier le temps en sa compagnie et sa maison aussi. Situer dans un secteur très calme et à proximité de tout en voiture 7-10min max. Près de l'eau, piste cyclable et endroit pour marcher sur le bord de l'eau. Elle a même des vélo à disposition. Nous sommes arriver tard le soir et elle nous a fait un petit repas. Merci beaucoup pour tout Megan. J'y retournerais Les yeux fermer. 

Xxx

die vier tage bei megan waren ein höhepunkt meiner ferien. ich fühlte mich willkommen, gut aufgehoben und zuhause. megan ist eine herausragende gastgeberin. sie schafft eine angenehme, sehr persönliche atmosphäre, hat mir die schönsten orte der insel gezeigt und mich mit ihren freunden bekannt gemacht. ich fühlte mich extrem wohl und gut aufgehoben. vielen herzlichen dank an megan, ich kann ihr haus und ihre gastfreundschaft herzlich empfehlen

5 star review for a 5 star girl and house:
Star #1: Lovely Megan
Star #2: Nice clean house
Star #3: Yum breakfast
Star #4: She has all the stuff you forgot to take with you (umbrellas, beach stuff, sun lotion, bikes, happy-go-lucky-attitude,...)
Star #5: The best activities to have a relaxing day at Megans: painting, drinking, making jewellery, group hoops, breathing incense :P

We stayed for a week and were happy with our choice, Megan opens up her house and heart for her guests. 
Thanks for the week, girlfriend, we already miss you, the other guests and your place :*

I stayed at Megan's place for one night with my boyfriend. It was a bit hard to find when arriving late at night, but once we were inside, it was great. Her place is eclectic but  also very clean and comfortable. The bed and A/C unit in our room were both great. Everything felt updated and cozy. Megan's place is also in a gated community that felt very safe.

Megan herself was friendly and funny, and she gave us the warmest welcome we've had from any host. She even made us coffee and smoothies before she left for work in the morning. I wish we'd stayed here for more than one night, and I would definitely return in the future!
Megan is a very nice/friendly host. As a foreign guest, I will recommend my friends to reside Megan's house. They will have a delightful lodging experience.

Let me first start by saying Megan is an amazing and generous host. She greeted me with love and made me feel like her home was mine as well. I was only there for a night but wish my entire trip had been with her. She made myself and her other guests breakfast and coffee which wasn't only kind but delicious!! There's a ton of space for relaxing and art making, meditating, book reading.. you name it. Beach towels and bikes were also available. Ali'i drive is a great location for beaches and restaurants. Megan's house is in a safe, gated neighborhood and the bed I slept in felt like a giant marshmallow. I can't wait to go back!!!

Megan Love was the most amazing host and made my trip so comfortable.  She was so happy and welcoming and I was never uncomfortable. I stayed for three weeks and she still got up everyday and made coffee and smoothies and healthy breakfast. Let me come to yoga in the mornings, and when I celebrated my birthday she even made me a cake!! She had everything to make your stay wonderful, and you get to leave with a long time friend. I would never stay anywhere else. Thank you for everything!! We were so lucky to find such a wonderful, playful, fun, happy host as well as house. The house completely reflect Megan's personality and I will promise you will never be disappointed. Highly recommend to anyone and will send all my friends to stay there in the future. We will be back again!! Thank you!!

We had a lovely stay, Megan was super inviting and let us check in early. The place had heaps of beach gear available to borrow and the bed was super comfortable! Avocado on toast for breakfast was a welcome treat

Aloha Megan, 
I had such a wonderful time staying at Megan Love House. Megan made me feel so welcome, making delicious breakfasts, inspiring my creative side with her art space and fun hula hoop session and chats. It was clean and colourful, the bed was super comfy. Close enough to town but also private and plenty of space. 
I loved that there were fresh flowers all around the house
I'd definitely recommend anyone stay here. Hope to be back some day.

Megan love house is amazing. We do yoga with Megan every morning and share different stuff in the night! We even do painting here and they're on th wall now:)
If you visit Kona you must come here! Highly recommend!

I absolutely loved staying at the Megan Love House! The house itself is beautiful, colorful and clean. Megan was the best host my friend and I could have hoped for on our trip. She is very kind and welcoming and a great cook! She made as feel right at home and even taught us some yoga! I would love to stay with her again and would recommend her to all my friends on their visit to Hawaii.

We had a really nice 3 night stay at Megan's home. If you're looking for a laid back easygoing vibe it's a great place. We really enjoyed using her bikes to go to the beach (about 10-15 min to a nice one) and also borrowing snorkel gear and body boards. And, we agree that her smoothies are awesome. Thanks for making us feel at home in Hawaii!

Das Haus ist ruhig gelegen am Rande von Kona. Das Zimmer und das gemeinschaftliche Bad war sehr klein, aber sauber. Weniger sauber war es in der Küche und ausserhalb des Hauses. Das Frühstück war minimal aber okay. Parkplatz vor dem Haus. Die Gastgeberin Megan war sehr nett und lustig. Für den für Hawaii günstigen Preis darf man auch nicht viel erwarten.

Wir füllten uns bei Megan von Anfang an richtig wohl und willkommen. Megan war eine super Gasthgeberin, gab und Yogastunden und verwöhnte uns mit leckeren Smothies. Wir würden gleich wieder ins Megan Love House gehen.

Communication with Megan before booking was very easy and it was important for me as I need to organized all my trip in Hawaii with stops in several islands. I did a journey of 6 nights in the cosy and girly Lilac Room of Megan Love House. I really felt like Home. The House is nice and the Garden is beautiful. Hula hoop therapy at Megan place is guaranteed! Megan is a lovely woman and a super host! She also do delicious smoothies for breakfast! Yummmeee!! She is always available to give you tips (shopping, beaches spots, food, visits...) and she is very easygoing. I'm gonna miss Her and her house. Already thinking about my next trip in Kona to come back to Megan Love House! Highly Recommended!!

Megan's home is truly unique. She added so many personal touches to my stay, such as getting a bike ready for me to ride into town and making me a smoothie in the morning. She is available to provide recommendations and help in any way. 
The house is located on a beautiful, quiet residential street in a gated community.
The room was great and the bed was super comfortable. 
I would just add that it's the absolute perfect type of place to stay if you're looking to meet people to hang out with during your time in Kona, but not necessarily if you are interested in a quiet space for an early night's sleep. There were several guests staying at the same time as me and it was a bit louder in the evening than I was hoping for.
Aside from that, it was a hidden gem of a place and a great start to my Kona vacation.

Great stay for the price. The room was VERY comfy and clean. A/C was a nice feature for the evenings. Bathroom was clean and really nice shampoo and soap were provided. Megan was super chill and gave clear communication. She even cut up pineapple and passionfruit (fresh from the yard!) for breakfast. For the price and what we needed, happy with our stay. I will say if you are looking for a quiet spot, or lounging in the living room in peace - maybe not the spot for you. There were always people in and out, they stay up late, but were nice. Couldn't hear it from the room. Just something to be aware of if that'd bother you. Megan was very pleasant and has an infectious love of life.

Nice quite place. Megan was a very gracious host and provided smoothies  for breakfast both days that we where there.  Room was nice and clean along with the bathroom that was shared with another room in the house.  AC was provide in the room but the house was not cooled while we where there. She provide many things for the beach, and bicycles if wanted. Should have stayed here my entire visit.
Fun place. Very central

Megan is the hostess with the mostest. Very generously cooked us breakfast and we even had a yoga session in the backyard. 
The place has loads of character and is a great place to chill and enjoy Hawaii. Loved staying there.
Megan is a great host with lots of energy to share! Her house is full of lovely details and a oasis to relax. On top of that you can join her yoga classes and a great cup of coffee! Loved the stay!

Megan's place was perfect for our 5 night stay at Kona. The place is located close to White Sands Beach, Kahaluu Beach (great place for beginner snorkeling), coconut grove market place, shopping and restaurants. 

The place has 3 bed rooms up-stairs. Two of those share a bathroom while the master bedroom has its own bathroom. You have access to pretty much most of the house. Our bedroom had A/C which was very nice.

Megan is one of the best hosts that we've ever come across. She made us smoothies for breakfast and provided recommendations on places and things to do. She also has a lot of snorkeling and beach gear which she let us borrow.

Overall, an awesome experience :)

Megan is a very entertaining person. She made us feel so at home and received us with her arms open. Her house is gorgeous and clean and the location is close to everything  (when you have a car) yet so quiet and reserved; and with heaps of fruits and plants. We wish Megan all the very best and highly recommend her to everyone.

This house is in a great location, walkable to the beach and a short bike or car ride to many other beaches and in to town. Megan is an extremely friendly and fun host- we could tell that she loves to entertain guests and make people staying here feel like part of her family. She also has beach gear and bikes you can use and gave us directions to a walkable hidden beach just down the street.

Staying at Megan's home is a one-of-a-kind experience that is truly special.  When people go on a vacation to Hawaii what they really hope for is a chance to totally relax, play, laugh, and smile and feel re-energized by a comfortable reminder that life is good.  Megan truly enjoys having guests in her home, and she will treat you like you are friends and family and not a mere "customer."  She radiates an inner happiness that is pretty well in tune with the joy of life, and she just naturally enjoys sharing that feeling with everyone that she meets.  

When I stayed there with my son, right after we walked in the door after a long car ride from the other side of the island, Megan shared some jumbo shrimp off her stove that she had cooked for herself, and then handed me a cold beer, which is her way of making friends very quickly and make me instantly feel pretty comfortable and right at home.  After a comfortable night sleeping there, I woke up the next morning and went for a nice bike ride on the beach with a beach cruiser bike that Megan will lend you.  Then I tried some of Megan's home-made ice coffee and her super-healthy and delicious home-made breakfast juice which had kale, carrot juice, and apple juice that she made in her juicer, and she also took the time to cook my son and I a pretty fantastic hot breakfast that was gourmet quality, nutritious and delicious.  Megan also enjoys arts & crafts and she handed me one of her custom home-made hula hoops, and says "give this a try," which was something that I hadn't tried since I was about 12 years old.  She also gave my son and I our own private yoga lesson on the yoga mats in her back yard, and that was a pretty good way to start out the day.  

Megan is a spiritual person, and all around her house are reminders of her mantra's that she wants to always remind herself of each day, as well as sharing a positive energy with those she meets.  It is like staying at the house of Norman Vincent Peale, the author of "The Power of Positive Thinking" books.  

Staying in a hotel room seems a little dull in comparison because a room is really just a room.  Staying at Megan's house is more than that... it is a pretty high level of extra attention to Megan People Happy and creating an overall experience that is fun, relaxing, and healthy.

Megan's lilac room was a lovely space with very much appreciated air-conditioning. The sheets were lovely and comfortable. She greeted us with a hug, and explanation that we could use all beach stuff- towels, snorkelling equipment, bags etc, and her creative outdoor studio- which we didn't have time to use :(
We shared a bathroom with another couple which wasn't a problem. Megan made all of her guests a breakfast smoothie which was full of local products. The gated community is very safe and quiet, but just down or up the road are restaurants. You will need a car around Kona....or you could borrow one of Megan's bikes to get around the local area. Megan's place is very chilled and relaxing.
Megan was the best Airbnb host I have ever met! She is so welcoming and hospitable. Clean, comfy house, great location. Highly recommend!

The stay with Megan Love was absolutely amazing. I felt like a local guy from Kona from the very first day. Her place is lovely, save, well located; and you are free to do whatever you want. Or you choose to hang out with the Host and local people. I did the latter, the priceless local experience, for the most part (minus some exploring on the island). I joined the yoga sessions everyday - It felt great and I felt connected instantly and it was one of the great things I have done so far. Megan and everyone I have met are super nice, easy going and fun. The House is lovely, it's actually bigger than it looks like on the photos, it's clean and Megan makes the stay even better with her great personality and hospitality. She would always have something to eat or drink for you to try, it is really more of an experience you are getting, not just a place to stay. The gated community is kind of hidden and super safe. Highly recommendend - Magical place to stay.

I stayed with Megan during the Ironman week - town was really busy and it was nice not to be in the middle of it! Megan is extremely entertaining; she communicated well, was very welcoming and has plenty of suggestions of what to do around town. She also has equipment for surfing / snorkelling and bikes which you can just borrow! Accom is perfect for individuals or couples travelling.

Megan's home is colourful, full of art, and feels super cozy. Our room was very well sized, the bed was super comfortable and the house was kept nice and clean. Megan is well stocked with beach gear including towels, snorkels, flippers and bodyboards which we were able to use during our stay. Her house is only a 5 minute walk to the beach and about a 8-16 minute drive to Kailua-Kona main town (depending on traffic). Megan is lovely and she even surprised us with smoothies one morning. We definitely recommend staying here! Thanks again Megan for hosting us. We'll see you again soon

The Megan Love House is great for any and everyone. This retreat has me feeling inspired with all the creativity flowing from every detail of this property. Come with an open heart, you will surely leave blessed and filled with love.
Megan was a wonderful host! I has a great time. The house is big, clean, and close to the beach.

Megan was very welcoming and kept the house clean. She gave us some great recommendations for places to visit and eat, also inviting us to hang out with her if we didn't have any plans. She made coffee and smoothies in the morning for us.
Follow the exact directions she gives to the house or you will have a hard time finding it.

Megan was a very nice host and we got the chance to talk for a while even if we only spent one night there. I enjoyed very much the evening!
The place is lovely and in an amazing area, very close to Kona. Would recommend it but if you can stay longer the better!!
The stay was phenomenal, what a great host and great place to stay, if I go back to Kona, I would stay at the MegLove shack again for sure.

Megan was amazing.  Warm and welcoming.  From the moment we walked in the door we were treated as friends.  I couldn't imagine a more gracious host.  The space is also very convenient for your exploration of the Kona coast.

Our experience at Megan's place was one of the highlights of our entire Hawaii trip, so hopefully that gives some insight on how awesome Megan, her place, and her friends are!  Beautiful house, quick drive to downtown Kona, and great company.  We ended up at some unique places due to the recommendations of Megan and her crew. Keep up the positive energy, friends!
Megan's place is tucked away in an oasis off of Royal Poinciana street.  The street is quiet and it is a fun place to hang out at.

Megan's place was very clean and her neighborhood felt very safe (especially as it's within a gated community). There wasn't a lock for the room we were staying in, but there were absolutely no issues or concerns about the safety of the area. As a host, Megan is awesome - super friendly, outgoing, and very easy to communicate with. She gave us fruits grown from her backyard and even offered us smoothies and coffee in the mornings. We hope to be back soon!

Megan was an awesome host! There is a beach walking distance from her place. She recommended many places to visit and we also borrowed her snorkeling gear. Her house is clean and fun and is conveniently located. Highly recommend it.
Nice friendly place to stay..
Centrally located close to all the cool spots.
Megan is great! Cool vibe, very easy and very responsive
Fun host
Wonderful host, great place to crash, minutes from downtown Kona! Definitely recommend staying here!
Megan’s house is super comfortable and has everything for having a good time. Megan was  friendly and very nice! Thanks

Megan has a wonderful Airbnb right down the street from the beach. She is a great host and really embodies the Airbnb community and the purpose of this platform. For a great experience with the authentic Hawaii vibe, do check out her space! We'll definitely return.

Megan is an awesome host with a relaxing, beautiful home. She literally made us feel like family, as her mom was in town and they prepared dinner and cocktails for us. The room was cozy, there are multiple spots to hang out in her yard, and there is artwork from past guests all over the place. It was the best stay of our trip and one we would certainly return to...

Megan was an amazing host! She and her family and friends were so friendly. She was so welcoming and truly opened her home to us like close friends. Her home was what really made this a memorable stay. It was so unique, yet homey, and had an island feel that I loved. Would recommend to everybody!

On est directement projeter dans l’ambiance peace and love qui y réside :) la maison est grande, tournée vers l’extérieur, on s’y sent bien! Mieux vaut avoir une voiture pour découvrir les environs mais megan prete velo, body board et serviettes de plage. Nous avons essayé le yogga et le hoolahoop avec elle :)

一泊だけでしたが､おもてなしが本当に良かった*\(^o^)/*ここのお家に泊まれて本当に良かった｡心が温かくなりました｡
温かく迎えて下さり､果物やｺｰﾋｰも出して下さり､そして､朝のｽﾑｰｼﾞｰは本当に美味しかった*\(^o^)/*
有難うございました｡
また､泊まりたいです｡

Megan was friendly, but we didn't get to meet her. My wife and I are kind of private people and we had long days and got in late, and slept in, so we didn't really have a chance to meet her. The location is quite a ways from the ocean if you are planning on carrying chairs. One morning we woke to loud music and listened to an argument, from our room upstairs, between Megan and someone that she didn't want there. I feel it is a little over-priced, although it met our needs.

As it has already been said many times by everyone's reviews, Megan is a fantastic host with an amazing home. The decor, chill vibe and awesome location are all just as accurate as everyone has stated a hundred times over. I will definitely stay here again the next time I'm back on the big island. Mahalo!
Great place to kick back. Very clean and the hospitality is something you won't find at other bnb's.

메간은 매우 친절하며 숙소는 깨끗하고 좋았습니다.
메간은 아침으로 요거트, 신선한 과일, 커피를 주방에 준비해 놓고 메모를 남겨주었습니다.
숙소에는 바다에서 필요한 각종 물놀이 기구와 바다에서 해를 가릴 수 있는 파라솔, 바다를 보며 쉴 수 있는 이동 접의식 의자, 슬리퍼, 등등 모든것이 완벽히 준비되어 있습니다. 
숙소 주변에는 풍경을 보며 쉴 수 있는 공간이 여러군데 있습니다.

빅아일랜드 대부분의 집은 나무로 되어 있으며 그로 인하여 방음이 다소 취약합니다. 어느 에어비앤비든 그 부분은 동일할 것으로 예상됩니다.
옆방 게스트와 욕실을 함께 사용하긴 하지만 마주친 일이 없어 불편한 점은 없었습니다.

We had an amazing time staying at Megan’s for 2 weeks in February, 2018.  Megan and Jacob were terrific hosts.  They prepared delicious and healthy breakfasts for us including smoothies, papaya boats and various egg and vegetarian combo plates.  As well, Megan let us have full use of her kitchen.  She was so helpful informing us re: what to see and do on the Big Island.  She invited us to her Yoga classes and even taught us how to make jewelry.

Megan’s home is beautifully laid out, super comfortable and in a very convenient location, close to the beach, restaurants etc. Her yard is lush with both garden and tropical plants such as papaya and passion fruit. Staying with her in Kailua Kona was like living in a tropical paradise!

Stay here.....Megan is awesome she is a very welcoming. I only wish we would of got there earlier to be able to use some of the stuff she offers- bikes, boards etc....Her place is prefect location close to town....Her hospitality is outstanding she offered us chili right when we checked in and fresh squeezed juice....she definitely goes above and beyond what you would expect

Megan's house was really amazing. Very clean, confortable and has a great location. Megan was incredible person. She is very carefull with her guests, giving attention and very good local tips. Very good breakfest and also yoga classes..kkk (Website hidden by Airbnb) definitely recommend her house. If i visit again Kona, for sure it will be her house.

Megan provides the whole package- art, food and fun! Along with a richly decorated environment, a yummy 
organic breakfast, she includes art supplies, bicycles and snorkeling gear for her guests to use (no extra 
charge!) The eve of our last day on the island, we found the bed & room to be cozy & comfortable, while 
Megan’s neighbors & friends were super chill and fun to hang out with. 

The next morning, after we all did yoga (led by another guest who has been teaching yoga for 10 yrs) Megan 
actually COOKED a very tasty breakfast for us. With a few hours to spare before heading to the airport, we 
borrowed her bikes and scuba gear and went to a couple of nearby beaches.

Megan is a great host, funny, sweet and creative. Next time we come to Kona with our kids, her home will be 
on the top of our list!

Megan’s house feels so welcoming as soon as you walk in, which makes sense when you meet her. 5 minute after I did, she offered me free range of her closet (after I told her the airline lost my baggage) and our smoothies were amazing. There’s great snorkeling gear to use (use it!) and we walked to the magic beach from her place in ~25 minutes. Great stay, just wish it was longer!

This place is full of fun! Relaxing and colorful, the space is just beautiful and lively. Quiet lush grounds. However, Megan  is what/who makes this place so special. Morning yoga, amazing meals... Hospitality as good as it gets. I felt very welcome from the second I arrived. VERY good location to the quaint town of Kona and beach access within walking distance  I would definitely recommend this place and not hesitate to stay here again
It’s a magical place I tell ya. Filled with love and more love. Couldn’t ask for a better place and people to stay with. Welcoming hearts.. with lovely food!

Megans Haus ist sehr freundlich eingerichtet mit vielen sehr persönlichen Details. Sehr sauber.
Die Lage ist relativ zentral ( mit Fahrzeug 4 min). Eignet sich als Ausgangspunkt für jedes Ziel auf der Insel.
Megan und ihr Freund sind sehr herzliche, großzügige Gastgeber, für jede Frage zu haben. Sie kochen auch abends, man kann sich ev. einklinken. Frühstück ist supergut. Kaffee, Smoothie, frische Früchte. 
Kann das Haus sehr empfehlen.

Excellente adresse, accueil chaleureux, propreté, jardin paisible pour les déjeuners et près des points d'intérêts de Kona. 
Very nice place, excellent atmosphere, hearty reception, near the main points of interest.

家は想像以上にｵｼｬﾚで､とてもｺﾞｰｼﾞｬｽな住宅街｡
彼女は､私達の到着時間に合わせて夕食を準備していてくれました｡
みんなで食べるﾃﾞｨﾅｰは格別で､とても美味しかった｡
ﾋﾟﾝｸﾚﾓﾈｰﾄﾞのお酒も美味しかった｡
彼女はとても素敵な女性です｡
彼女も家族も､素敵です｡
手作りの指輪をﾌﾟﾚｾﾞﾝﾄしてくれたり､最高のおもてなしをしてくれて非常に感謝しています｡
ﾌﾗﾌｰﾌﾟをみんなでしたり､最高の思い出を共有出来ます｡
朝はみんなでﾋﾞｰﾁ沿いのｽﾀｼﾞｵに行き､彼女はﾖｶﾞを教えてくれました｡
彼女のおもてなしには感動します｡
また必ず泊まります｡

Megan is really living the megan love house atmosphere! Super friendly and welcomed! We even got a massage, a painting class and a smothie breakfast for free! This is how a real super host should be! Good luck with all your upcoming projects! And feel free to come over to berlin and test the hippie houlahup happy life in Berlin! You are more then welcome ❤️

Staying at Megan's place was the perfect start of our journey in the Big Island. Megan is a lovely and attentive host and we immediately felt welcome in the relaxed and friendly atmosphere of her house. The room is clean and cosy and the bed incredibly comfortable. Bathroom is shared with another room, which was never a problem, clean and well equipped. The house is located in a quiet neighborhood, has a nice garden and lots of amenities. We really enjoyed the tasty breakfast that Megan and Jake prepared and that we shared with the other guests of the house. Only pity,our stay was too short!Would come back without any doubt and definetly recommend it!
Really enjoyed my stay in Megans home.  She was helpful, easygoing & welcoming.

Megan welcomed us with an incredibly friendly greeting and tour of the house.  Our room had everything we needed and offered enough private space in this really fun, wonderful house shared by Megan and other guests. We enjoyed sleeping with the windows open, which provided a nice breeze.and allowed the songbirds to wake us up in the morning. The walls of the home are filled with eclectic and home made art that set the vibe for a warm and friendly atmosphere.  We were also impressed by the outdoor eating area off the kitchen, yard, and the carport that Megan has transformed into a “creation station” for crafts and projects. Megan was a gracious hostess who helped us to feel at home, offered travel recommendations and invited us to join her for coffee, fresh-made juice and a delicious breakfast. We highly recommend this rental to anyone who is looking for comfortable place to stay and a friendly host!
Perfect place to stay. Very convenient for Kona. Close to everything.
Such a wonderful place to stay. Made us feel right at home.  I would highly recommend Megan’s place.

Bright happy colors, warm & friendly hospitality, sparkling clean bathroom, & a serene lilac room - we enjoyed our stay at Megan’s and appreciate the thoughtfulness that goes into this space. The vegan treats were an added bonus & yummy surprise. The location is also clutch - a great hopping off point to the beach. Thank you!

집이 예쁘고, 방과 화장실이 청결하며, 호스트는 친절합니다. 안전한 동네여서 집을 완전히 오픈해 놓는 방식이고 (따로 열쇠 사용 안함), 옆집 고양이가 자유롭게 들락날락 합니다. (저는 고양이를 좋아해서 괜찮았지만, 혹시 털 알레르기가 있는 분은 주의하셔야 할것 같습니다. 고양이가 사람을 좋아해서 가끔 방에 따라올라오더군요) 위치가 좋아서 해변이나 식당가기에 좋습니다.

Megan is an amazing being and our stay was a lot of fun because of her. She has fresh fruits, other yummy foods, a super cool semi private turtle beach near her place, a creative spot for us to paint and bikes! Us dutchies love to bike so the biking was definitely +++ thanks for everything Megan!
It was a really nice place to stay not far from really good restaurants and beaches. Would always come back

We highly recommend a stay @ Megan's place. It has everything you'll need, from a great location, comfy room, and great host. It was a quiet, laid back, and quite groovy time. Come met Megan, she's fun!

Lee & Ines
Stuart Florida
May 22-24

太喜歡房東Megan了!她完全是個美麗､才華洋溢又溫暖的女人,抵達的當晚受到熱情的招待,與其他一起住宿的房客共進晚餐,很放鬆地融入就像和朋友聚餐,非常棒的一夜!噢,還有隔天一早的瑜珈體驗非常酷｡還有提供完美可口的早餐｡
社區入口有著柵欄管制人車出入,是個安全靜謐的地方,距離美麗的海邊也很近,期待我們很快再回來這裡!
Megan’s place is lovely and she is a great host!!

I would recommend Megan and her amazing Megan Love house to everyone and anyone. Meeting her and staying in such an amazing environment was one of the highlights of our trip! It really is beyond amazing and she is an excellent host. I felt I had known her my entire life!
The only place to go in Kona

Megan's place was amazing!!! It was so much more than I expected it to be. The whole house has a spiritual & artistic asthetic to it. There was delicious & healthy breakfast meals made every morning. There were a lot of supplies to use, such as beach gear, bikes, and bug spray. The coolest part was the creation station (you will need to stay here if you want to find out what that is). Both Megan & Jake were very open and inviting, as well as the neighbors. I highly reccomend staying at the Megan Love House.
You can both stay in your room or get in touch with Megan & Jacob, it is up to you. If you decide to get in touch, you will be most welcome. I had a very good time!

Megan has put a ton of care and attention into her home and is a fabulous hostess. The breakfasts are great, the rooms are lovely and well-supplied. She has a great outdoor dining area and law. The location is also superb - close the beach and Kona town! You won't regret staying with her.

Megan has a beautiful and artsy house close to Ali'i Drive, beaches, restaurants  and lots of other activities that we did during our stay. She and Jake were super cool and amazing in their hospitality during our visit. There are numerous perks of staying at her house.  She made amazing smoothies for us while we were there, has a creation room that tempts you to pick up the brush and even offered her had made jewelry to me to keep which I thot was super touching.

won't give second thots before booking my stay here again.

何から書いていいか分からないほど､たくさんのおもてなしをしてくれました｡初日はﾒｰｶﾞﾝとﾎﾞｰｲﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞが温かく出迎えてくれ､家の案内をしてくれました｡2人とも誰に対してもｵｰﾌﾟﾝでとてもとても優しいです｡家中がｱｰﾃｨｽﾃｨｯｸで､ｽﾋﾟﾘﾁｭｱﾙな空間がとても素敵です｡自転車が数台あり､自由に使わせてくれます｡閑静な住宅街にあり､10軒ほど建ち並ぶｴﾘｱに出入り口のｹﾞｰﾄが付いていて安全です｡朝晩ｼﾞｪｲｺﾌﾞが作ってくれるご飯が最高でした｡隣の家のﾈｺと遊んだりﾊｲﾋﾞｽｶｽを見たりのんびり過ごしました｡彼女たちと過ごす時間は､ﾊﾜｲ島をまた訪れたいと思う理由の一つです｡Megan Love Houseにｽﾃｲすることを120%おｽｽﾒします｡

Megan is such a warm-hearted person! The welcome was so lovely and the accommodation was as described with a lot of nice details and very colorful so we felt very comfortable there. We were also allowed to take some of Megan's bicycles to ride along the coast. We had an amazing time and we would definitely stay there again!

If you're looking for a relaxed, friendly, and artsy Hawaii experience, Megan's place is for you. Megan is a fun and talented host, and I feel lucky to have met her. She pays careful attention to details to make everyone's experience special. I was able to borrow bikes and beach equipment during my stay, and she offers to make breakfast every morning. Apart from the place itself, the location near the beach and local town was perfect. I recommend Megan and her house to everyone traveling to Kona!
Megan is lovely. Her home is comfortable. Having an air conditioned room was fabulous.

Megan is the most chilled, down to earth person imaginable. The house was super clean, there were clean towels and lots of bathroom supplies for the guests to use. The breakfast smoothies were amazing! I really enjoyed just hanging out with Megan and the other guests in the house in the evenings at the art corner. Additionally they have plenty of good recommendations for restaurants and activities. We also made use of the surfboard and snorkeling gear in the house. 

In short, I wish we would have stayed here for the duration of the trip as it was definitely the highlight of the trip!

PS! If you're here on a Friday be sure to ask about the bootie yoga, it was super fun!
Comfortable room, nice bird singing in the morning

Megan and Jake are great hosts. They take it very serious to make every guest feel welcome and at home. They did so much more for us than we would have ever expected. (Yoga lessons and great smoothies and breakfast!) Also, they had great tips for us on where to go and where to eat! Their house is so cozy and lovely. We highly recommend everyone to book a stay at the Megan Love House! We would always stay here again!

Our stay was absolutely fabulous! We loved the house. So cozy and clean and it’s overall so cute! Bikes to ride, air conditioning and a super friendly and warm welcoming host. Also so close to all the fun and beach in kona. We will be back for sure!!!!
You can expect amazing hospitality, with a beach house vibe. Our host Megan was super friendly and her bed and breakfast expresses her bright personality so well!

Megan will Meg sure you have an absolutely fantastic time at her place. The house is set on a quiet little street and filled with all the most wonderful touches to make you feel right at home. Megan and Jake are definitely the best hosts I've ever had the pleasure of staying with. Thanks again for the fabulous breakfasts and all the recommendations on things to do guys, you guys rock!
Megan and Jake are superstar hosts and I highly recommend this place to anyone staying in Kona. The house is vibrant and stocked with all the necessities. Would stay again in a heartbeat ✌

This is a house of love! Megan has thought of everything for her guests comfort. Fluffy fresh towels, clean soft sheets, flowers on the nightstand, smoothies in a martini class with a cherry on top for breakfast. Mmm. She also has several bikes, boards, hooks hoops, and a machine to hang upside down for her guests. Oh and a creation station with supplies to paint should you feel so inspired by the amazing island vibe. Overall this was a great stay at a great value. The best thing being here hospitable and loving nature. I felt more like I was visiting a friend which is nice when you’ve been traveling for a while. Happy journeying!
Megan house is pretty cool. We enjoy our stay and she make us feel at home. Thanks a lot Megan.

Megan is very lovely Host :)
Comfortable bed, Fantastic morning (Birds singing!), Delicious breakfast! 
She have beach towel. When you go to beach, request her, If you want. 
I hope that go to again.

Megan has seriously thought of everything you might need! Her space is so well decorated that it’s easy to get lost just strolling through her home. She’s thought of all of the small things you wouldn’t think about — like extra big towels (no tiny hotel towels at Megan’s) to robes in the closet. We bought groceries & she immediately offered us space to store our small amount of items. I truly felt welcomed, so welcomed that it wasn’t awkward using her kitchen to make small meals while she was in the next room. She offered local tips & locations to visit. She was a true pleasure to speak with too!

We cannot imagine any better place to stay on Big Island. Megan's hospitality and her beautiful and peaceful house were outstanding. 
Quiet rooms, clean bathroom, well-equiped kitchen, a wonderful garden to enjoy breakfast or just relax, a cosy bed and wake-up with birdsong :-)
Thanks you very much.

Megan's place was perfect for our short stay on the big island. It was close to the airport and had some great food choices near by too. She has a selection of bikes and beach gear that you can borrow too. We would have loved to stay longer as it was a charming house with a great host!

Megan's place was spotless and very comfortable.
The house is fun and covered in really beautiful art done by her.

The room has a/c, but we found it very comfortable
with just the windows and fan on.

The yard is very lush and safe. Megan has set up a cool "Creation station in the carport.

Megan and her boyfriend were great! the accommodated a very late check in due to an issue with another host and also made us a delicious breakfast before we went out for the day!

we will 100% be staying at the Megan love house again!

I couldn't have imagined a better stay.  It was my first stay in a shared airbnb home and I can say I would definitely stay again.  The hosts are great and made us feel very welcome.    The energy and decor in the house is also very loving and welcoming.  The entire stay felt like we were visiting with close friends.

夫婦で宿泊しました｡
結論から言うと､airbnbでの宿泊で求めているであろう体験が得られると思います｡

安く宿泊できるのは勿論､他の宿泊者との交流､ﾎｽﾄのおもてなし､全て満足のいくものでした｡

最終日の夜は､皆でお酒を飲みながら庭で星空の下談笑し､翌朝は皆でﾖｶﾞをやってからﾌﾗﾌｰﾌﾟで遊びました｡
私達夫婦は英語ができませんが､なんとかなるものだなと思いました｡

他の宿泊者の方と交流できるような施設に宿泊するのは初めてでしたが､とても楽しかったです｡部屋自体はﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄが守られていますので安心です｡

普段､外国人と接する機会が無い日本人の方にこそ､是非利用していただきたいです｡
強くお勧めします!
Good food, Hospitality, very convenient and more

Megan and Jake are amazing people they are so friendly and couldn’t do kore to help you. They are so generous and will go out of their way to help you. Not to mention the breakfasts are amazing so healthy and so professionally served on the plate! Thanks so much hope to see you soon

Der Aufenthalt bei Megan und ihrem Freund war einfach nur super. Sie sind beide sehr gastfreundlich und hilfsbereit. Uns hat auch der Style vom Haus gefallen, dass alles so unkompliziert, freundlich und farbenfroh gestalten ist.
Das Früstück war jeweils einfach aber super lecker. Und es gibt so vieles was sie zur Verfügung stellt (Fahrräder, Strandutensilien usw.).... Toller Aufenthalt und wir würden sofort wiederkommen. Danke für alles ;-)

Megan Love's home is a true Hawaiian experience. Delicious breakfasts and French press coffee is what greets you in the morning. She is extremely welcoming and I felt very comfortable in her home. She has a lot of gear on hand to borrow for your stay. The location is excellent and just a few blocks to the ocean and main ocean road. We even had the chance to take one of her yoga sessions in the front yard! I am already planning my trip back!

I would recommend Megan’s house of love to anyone & everyone! Megan & Jake were so warm & welcoming it felt like staying at an old friend’s house. They made us an array of seriously delicious juices and breakfasts, gave us great local tips and even took us along to a ‘booty yoga’ class. The place was really clean & stocked with everything you’d need, including after sun cream, snorkel gear, bikes, art supplies & hula hoops. Again, I highly, highly recommend ❤️✨

Megan's place was great! We needed a spot to crash for a night after a late arrival to the airport since our resort check in wasn't until the day after. Megan was very responsive and accommodating. The place is super zen, quiet, and unique. Hospitality was top notch, including the amazing breakfast made by her boyfriend Jake. We plan to stay here again!

Cute place with a very island eclectic style. Megan was a super host with a warm welcome and great communication. She definitely put hard work into putting her personal style into the house. 

The thoughtful details are what we will remember most. Things like the creation station, the hammock and the beautiful Instagram worthy smoothies in the morning.

Bedroom could of been cleaner as it had dust bunnies camping out on the shelves and floors. The shared bathroom shower had low pressure and barely any hot water with high pitch squeel that I feared would wake the other guests. 

But all in all it was a great stay and in a very convenient location.
Nice stylish place, beautiful rooms and area..

I had a great time at Megans place. She is a super kind host, very helpful and has lots of recommendations for things to check out. The room was perfect and their smoothies are indeed quite yummy. Definitely my go-to place if I happen to come back to Hawaii!

Magen’ boyfriend guided us into their love home because we are so late to check in. But Megan is so responsive to answer all of our questions. The code box is out side of the gate when you wanna drive in. It took our like five minutes to figure out where is the box. (In the right side in front of the outside gate ). The home is far more beautiful than the picture. Everything is same. We spend two days with Megan, including the Halloween. Megan fed us unexpected breakfast, like Benedict brunch. Highly recommend the worthy Airbnb.
Megan’s place was uplifting, comfortable, great location, and exhumed positive/fun creative and caring energy. We hope to re visit!!
Megan is amazing!! Excellent at communication and was great to work with!

Megan is very open and responsive. Her home has lots of character and is comfortable. She has lots of gear for guests to use. The spot is well located near some good beaches and snorkeling locations. Would definitely come back.
Nice place close to all main areas!! Decent price, Megan and her boyfriend super nice!!!
Loved Megan's place.  Great location, comfortable bed, and really friendly host. I will definitely stay here again.
Amazing place to stay!

Absolutely loved our stay here! The house is super fun and colorful and Megan is so hospitable. Close to the beach near the city but nice and quiet. Bed was amazingly comfy. Definitely would stay here again.

This was a very laid-back place to stay, which will suit many people. Megan was friendly and a "make yourself at home" kind of host. It was like staying at the home of a friend, and kind of just doing what you need to do. That was fine with us.

Megan’s house is a cool welcoming space, and she and her boyfriend were friendly, gracious hosts. I stayed in the Sassy Lilac room, which gets beautiful morning sunshine and has an amazingly luxurious bed. The shared bathroom was very clean and well stocked with amenities. The breakfast they made was gourmet, WiFi was fast, lots of snorkel gear to borrow, close the beach and amenities...perfect place to stay while in Kona. Mahalo!!:)

Our stay with Megan was great! The room was clean and cozy. Megan’s house is a short walk from a turtle beach and is an easy bike ride to town. Megan had bikes and snorkeling gear for her guests. Megan exudes hospitality. I loved her breakfast and being able to do a yoga class with her. All in all, we got more than what we bargained for. Thank you, Megan!
Can’t say anything that hasn’t been said before. GREAT spot, close to town. Megan is very outgoing, nice, and helpful. Would definitely stay again, the next time I’m on the island.

Megan’s place is extraordinary! She goes the extra mile to make sure all the little things are available to make your stay feel like you’re right at home.  Cozy bed, soft sheets and towels, all the extra amenities you could need.  Breakfast in the morning if you’re not already out adventuring on the island.  Yoga M-F to keep you in shape after all the extra yummies.  Knowledge on all the best places to go and extras to experience.  You can’t go wrong and I look forward to returning for another stay.

Megan’s place was great!! She is an amazing host, makes you feel right at home. The room I was in was very comfy and spacious!! She maintains the place very well. Everything about staying with her is just great. Whenever I make it back to the big island I would want to stay with her again. 10/10 would recommend!!
Expect a small slice of paradise!

Megan Love was such a wonderful hostess and her place was extremely clean. Her house is very welcoming and she adds cute little touches. We woke up the night after arriving to a beautifully prepared and delicious breakfast!

You have to stay at Megan’s if you are visiting Kona. She’s the loveliest person you’ll ever meet, the house is awesome and she and her boyfriend make mean breakfasts. Truly the most wonderful experience I’ve had at an Airbnb.
Wonderful host, great place, conveniently located to the main street of Kailua-Kona, all-around great place to stay. The host cooks awesome breakfast as well!

We stayed at Megan’s house for 4 nights and were surprised by a different delicious breakfast every morning. We even had the chance to join one of Megan’s yoga classes in the morning. The house has a lovely Hawaiian vibe with great artwork. It is close to the beach and just a short bike ride away from downtown Kona. We could even borrow bikes and swimming/snorkeling gear from the house.
Megan and her boyfriend are outstanding hosts that make everybody feel welcome. We would definitely stay there again!
Very lovely place and lovely hostes. Loved the house - so cosy with lots of details. Would defintely recommend and come back.
Great house. Great energy !
Warm home and friendly host.

What a wonderful stay! We really enjoyed our time at Megans place. You feel like home from the first second and that is what Airbnb makes it so special! We got a very tasty smoothie in the morning and went together to Megans Yoga lesson. We would love to stay at Megans place again soon,
Thanks

We had a wonderful stay at Megan's place! 
Our stay at Megan was great! The room was very comfy and we got a very tasty breakfast!! The place is well located near some good beaches and snorkeling locations. 
We highly recommend a stay at Megan's place.
I felt more welcome in this Airbnb than any other I’ve stayed in!

Very welcoming people. The house is lovely, the vibe is perfect. We feel totally confortable the minute we arrive.
The position of the house is nice as well, Megan let us used the bikes everyday so we could go on every beaches on Alli's road.
They made us breakfast and let us used the washing machine. I would really recommand Megan's Love House for everyone!!!
구글지도가 잘못 알려줘서 뒷편으로 가게되어 헤매게 되었지만, 밤이라서 더 헷갈렸던 것 같습니다. 아침도 직접 만들어주셨는데 정말 맛있었습니다. 그리고 공항에 짐이 늦게 도착해서 배달하게 되었는데 잘 받아서 방까지 미리 가져다 주셔서 감사했어요.
Megan and her family are super friendly and we had such a great time!
I don’t think I can describe it better than all of the previous reviews. This place is the best! Wouldn’t stay anywhere else next time we’re in Kona. Thanks again Megan and Jacob!
Megan is great! The house is absolutely the best we stayed in whole Hawai’i in :) we will come back!

This is the first bnb I ever choose. Love the decoration and all kinds of paintings on the walls. The community is nice and very close to a beautiful beach. This area is also convenient for little wandering to Kona town. The bathroom is shared with another room but kept very clean and lovely. The garden is so good for breakfast, yoga and party. Megan made delicious breakfast for us. I borrowed her yoga mat for some yoga in garden. Wonderful experience. A place I definitely want to come back.

Perfect stay. Megan and Jake were kind, fun, generous and gracious hosts. The place has a fun and inviting new age vibe. Lots of little extras abound. You could just stay the whole time at their house and enjoy what’s in walking distance (but don’t- there’s so much to see and do!). Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend or stay there again!

name: Luxury 1 Bedroom Central Park Views
summary: DETAILS:  Designer-decorated luxury one bedroom features queen-sized bed with premium mattress, feather-filled pillows and modern furniture and lighting. Sofa, located in the living room, sleeps one person. This is a quiet Upper West Side apartment.
space: LUXURY ONE BEDROOM WITH CENTRAL PARK-FACING VIEW (750 sq. ft) DETAILS:  Designer-decorated luxury one bedroom features queen-sized bed with premium mattress, feather-filled pillows and modern furniture and lighting. Sofa, located in the living room, sleeps one person. This quiet Upper West Side apartment is located on a high floor overlooking Central Park with floor to ceiling windows and 11' ceilings. LOCATION: The Upper West Side is an upscale, primarily residential area home to New YorK City's cultural (Metropolitan opera, Juilliard school of dance, drama & music), intellectual hub (Columbia university) and artistic workers (Lincoln center). Great atmosphere and so many great restaurants, wine bars and coffee shops. Not to mention the night life...The UWS is a hip yet mature place to be. It is really changing with the addition of all the new development condos going up, this place is a meca of ultra luxury super high end condos. UWS is also known for landmark buildings and brownston
description: DETAILS:  Designer-decorated luxury one bedroom features queen-sized bed with premium mattress, feather-filled pillows and modern furniture and lighting. host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Henry prides himself on offering superb accommodations. Over the years he has cultivated a keen talent for creating elegant, luxurious environments and assembled an impeccable collection of luxury rental properties.

Found in prestigious locations around the world, each home is an expression of Henry's meticulous approach to hosting and entertaining. Elegant, lavish, sophisticated and comfortable; these properties were originally intended for Henry's closest friends and relatives to utilize and he now extends that privilege to his private clients.
Henry was chef legal officer for NYC Law Department before his departure to focus on a more creative role in Architecture and Design.

reviews.comments: Johno is a great host. The apartment was beautiful. It was well equipped and clean. We will be recommending this apartment to all of our friends!  It is one the best rental experiences we have had. Mary Hull

I was in town for a quick trip and needed a place that was spacious and nice. I was familar with Johno and his property from another visit to New York a few years ago, so I felt that even though this was a different place it would be good. I was right! This apartment makes me want to stay here forever, it is full of beautiful furniture, with serious attention to detail. I love the Whole Foods across the street and the fact that I am so close to the subway makes it perfect. I was only here for a short time this visit but I would rather stay here then any hotel room. Thanks Johno!

Johno and Dan were great hosts. Their apartment is just wonderful and comfortable to stay in. if you like late New York nights, you would find it very comforting to come back to their apartment and see the sun-filled morning sky in the east. Its a great location, away from the madness of downtown and midtown.

This was a FANTASTIC experience. The apartment is beautiful, comfortable, fully stocked with a stunning view of the tree tops of Central Park. Johno is a great host who met us and greeted us when we arrived. He was absolutely available for any problems, although we had none. We hope to go back. BRAVO and thanks so much Johno

And yet again, superb stay at one of Johnos apartments!
Amazing view of Central Park in very modern apartment in new building.

Johno is a very attendive host, who really cares for his guests. He helped us, when we asked for something, but unostrusive when he felt we need privatcy.
The appartment is wounderful, modern and we coulf find everything we needet for a pleasant stay. After 3 weeks of hotel breakfast we enjoied to prepare our own, the  food-marked very close to the appartment is one of the best I saw during our whole trip. 
It is very close to Metro (A;C) and therefore perfectly connectet to all parts of NYC. 
We highly can recommend Johnos appartments (I think all of them are in the same quality), we surely will stay again  there when we come back to NY.

All in all, it was a perfect stay.  Our greeter, Kerry, as well as the host Johno were friendly and professional.  I was a little concerned about being on 99th but found that it was absolutely no problem.  On the contrary, it was close to public transportation, there were always taxis, there are loads of restaurants in the neighbourhood and Whole Foods is across the street. Continued success.

We loved staying at Johno's apartment. The place was spotless clean, really nice furnished and it had everything we needed. Loved the Central Park view and the Whole Foods supermarket across the street. Everything was perfect and we'd definitely stay there again. Thank you Johno!

This is our second stay at Johno's beautiful apartment. He is an impeccable host. The apartment is a perfect oasis in NYC. The furnishings and amenities could not be better. The neighbor is wonderful. We feel like this is our NYC home. Johno sent us a text after we reconnected for this most recent visit and he said, Welcome Home. We could not be happier. We are grateful to have such a warm and welcoming host and home to come to when we travel to Manhattan. Looking forward to our next stay.

Alan and Katherine

And yet again amazing stay at Johno's apartment
Best in the city!

This apartment was such a great place to stay in New York. It is located in a really save area, in the street there is a bus stop with 2 lines, that takes you directly into the city. There are also several subways nereby, which we took most of the time.
In front of the house there is a super elemantary store and also a 24h store, which we used, when we arrived light at night.

Wonderful view on Central Park.

The apartment is furnished very modern, we found it very clean. There was everything we needed. Wonderful.

Contact by mail and SMS was very nice with Johno.

Only thing to consider is, that the bed itself is only queen-size.
Some people might prefer larger bed. For us it worked fine though

We would always choose this place again, coming back to New York.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a fantastic stay at Johno's appartment! The appartment is incredible beautiful, even better as on the pictures. The interior is extraordinary stylish and cosy. The appartment was very clean and with very modern equipment - from Internet TV, Nespresso coffee machine to a state-of-the-art kitchen. 
The location is perfect, very close to Central Park, Whole Foods supermarket across the street, nice restaurants in walking distance and subway stations close by.
He was very kind, extremely helpful and the best host we could imagine!!
We will definitely come back!
Great apartment, even better than described on the website! Service and communication first class. Thank you Johno you are a legend!
Johno met us at the apartment and was very friendly and helpful. Provided us with all information about apartment and neighborhood.

We had a truly wonderful stay in Johno's apartment and are sad to leave. The photos don't do this place justice. It's spacious, spotlessly-clean, quiet by NYC standards and equipped with everything you need to make this a home away from home! Johno was hospitable without being intrusive and kind enough to ensure the place was stocked with the basics like laundry detergent and paper towel, etc. Loved it and would highly recommend!

Quiet, comfortable, cool, clean, view, spacious, convenient.
We really enjoyed this apartment. Very clean and everything was very comfortable. The view and proximity to the park are great. Tons of places to eat in the neighborhood and close to subways. There are also always plenty of taxis right our front. Very nice place to stay. 
Johno was nice and seems like he really cares about his property.

Best trip to New York ever. The appartment was perfect, and kept every promise in the prospect on airbandb. Groceries across the road, subway around the corner and plenty of good restaurants in walking distance. We had a great time, and will love go back.

Johno made us feel very welcome. We got to the house and everything was clear and arranged. All the essentials were there. The apartment was marvelous. Johno response time was great. He made checking in so easy. He was so accessible and was ready to answer all questions and inquiries.

This apartment is fantastic.   Very well kept and great interior design.  Everyone in the building is incredibly friendly.   Johno was very responsive and helpful at every step along the way.  I would come back in a heartbeat.

My wife and I visit New York frequently, and tend to stay in hotels (usually The Wythe, but also Soho House, The Viceroy etc.) I mention this because recently, we decided to give airbnb a try, and Johno's apartment combines all the convenience of a home stay, with the luxury and design aesthetics of a boutique hotel.

The Upper West Side location is fantastic, one block from Central Park (with views from the apartment.) You don't need to worry about the photos being misleading - it looks even better in real life. The design is in impeccable taste, the entertainment system/TV/broadband is fast and up to date, the bedding/towels etc were pristine. Johno is incredibly efficient at replying to enquiries, and the whole stay was a joy. Highly recommended.
房子很整洁､比较新,内部设施完善,周边超市买食材和物品也方便｡地理位置方便,但离中央公园其实还隔离一个街区,当然走路还是很近的｡中央公园最美的位置应该是在靠近60-70街的地方,而这个房子的位置已接近100街了｡
The apartment is comfortable and is very clean. The location is really good. There are a lot of food shops near by. We even cooked our own dinner and enjoy the view.
Lovely apartment, excellent location and wonderful host. Definitely will come back to stay at Johno's cozy, clean and stylish apartment.

name: Brooklyn Bushwhick Private Room
summary: I am leaving the apartment at the beginning of March as you could probably tell from the pictures :) Very clean room with all the facilities you will possibly need. You will have two lovely roommates to chat. Two blocks from Dekab Ave L train stop.
description: I am leaving the apartment at the beginning of March as you could probably tell from the pictures :) Very clean room with all the facilities you will possibly need. You will have two lovely roommates to chat. Two blocks from Dekab Ave L train stop.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Parsons The New School for Design MFA

name: Cosy flat,walking distance tocenter
summary: Cosy flat with a lovely, sunny balcony. You can walk to the center of anatolian side of İstanbul, Kadıköy in 10 min. Bus, metrobus, and metro station are within walking distance. You'll have every detail of sightseeing, and Turkish cuisine. You will definitely enjoy your visit in İstanbul..

You'll have every detail of sightseeing, and Turkish cuisine. You will definitely enjoy your visit in İstanbul..

reviews.comments:
Aylin is a very special person, she is kind, caring, loves to listen, is willing to share and has a wonderfull taste for music and haute cuisine. Her cat creates a very cosy, housy feeling which I liked a lot. She"s always laughing and makes you feel comfortable when you"re around. Wish I could stay longer in this beautifull,  heartwarming place. I would defenitly recommend her lovely house for a visit. 

Aylin, I had a great time in Istanbul, thanks for everything.
She is one of the best hospitable person that I have ever seen. Thank you for everything!
Aylin is helpful and hospitable person. The home was clean and it has very good location. I strongly recommend her house.
Her konuda basarili; ev sahibi, evin konumu ve ulasim imkanlari. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim....

Since it was my first time to use Airbnb, being Aylin's guest was a great first experience.

Aylin has her own way to make you feel in her home like it's yours. The sense of hospitality she has is very smooth and makes you feel so comfortable in the first few hours of your stay.

I'd recommend Aylin as a host for everyone wants to stay in the anatolian side of Istanbul, and wants  to explore the great non-touristic destinations in the city there.

name: 1 BR 1/2 block to A/B/C/D trains
summary: 1BR in a 2BR apt -Ideal for tourists. Easy access to the city with the express trains (A,D)  -15 min. to Times Square -10 min. to Central Park -3 min. walk to 24 hs Supermarket, Starbucks, Duane reade and Banks
space: It is a bigger apartment than the standard NYC size. It is also a very quite one.
description: 1BR in a 2BR apt -Ideal for tourists. Easy access to the city with the express trains (A,D)  -15 min. to Times Square -10 min. to Central Park -3 min. walk to 24 hs Supermarket, Starbucks, Duane reade and Banks    It is a bigger apartment than the standard NYC size. It is also a very quite one. You will have their own keys and access the apartment and all of its areas of the but my room 24hrs. The Neighbourhood is nice and safe day and night. The police station is around the corner (Inside the metro station). I never had a problem. A, B, C and D trains are around the corner. A and D are Express. 1 Train is 3 blocks away and M3 Bus is on the other side of the street. You would be sharing the apartment with me. I am a musician, very respectful, clean, and easy going.  You will have access to all the areas, kitchenware, oven and spices to cook. There is turbo speed Wi-fi in the Apartment.
