host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a professional musician. Originally from Buenos Aires, Argentina, I moved to the US to study at Berklee College of Music in Boston. I have lived in the US for 10 years, so I can speak fluent English and Spanish. I am clean, responsible, respectful and a very good host. I won't get on your way. I love music, Food, Theater and Movies, traveling, and meeting travelers. So if you are passing by NY I would love to meet you!

reviews.comments: Marcelo has a nice apartment!   Even though it is a basement apartment I was surprised it had so much sunlight - which was nice!   The room is a good size and has closet space.  He is very nice and if you are lucky you will get to hear his band have a rehearsal.   They are good.

My boyfriend and I spent 10 days in New York.
We had the chance to stay at Marcelo's, our very kind host from Argentina! He speaks both English and Spanish, and he is very helpful with all he can.
Very quiet flat in a safe neighbour, and really close to the subway and to the stores you may need.
Good location for a very interesting price, don't think twice!

Marcelo's place is one meant for seasoned travellers who just need a simple place to call home while in NYC. It is very simple and located in the basement of an apartment complex. The kitchen is great if you planon cooking your own meals and a supermarket is only a few blocks away. It is also really close to the subway to get you to all the major hubs of NYC. Marcelo is new to hosting. He does his best with helping you find things around NYC, and will improve as he hosts more.

My boyfriend and I were looking for a place to stay for 10 days in NYC, we found Marcelo's by airbnb and was the best thing that could happen! Marcelo was great the apt is less than a block from 145th metro station, the room was super clean! we was really nice the hole time we were at the apt. 

If you are looking for a place to stay, Marcelo is a great host! the best option :)


Mi novio y yo estabamos buscando un cuarto donde quedarnos en nyc, por airbnb encontramos a Marcelo, desde el principio fue muy respetuoso y atento via mail. Desde el momento que llegamos al apt nos recibio de la mejor forma, el cuarto estaba impecable, tenia toallas, mapa de nyc y de la zona para que nos ubicaramos perfectamente.   

El apt queda a menos de una cuadra de la estacion 145 linea naranja o azul, parece lejos pero enrealidad no se demora mas de 20 minutos hasta la parte mas baja de la isla. 

La pasamos increible con marcelo, el mejor anfitrion que pudimos haber encontrado.

Marcelo is an awesome host! His home was VERY clean and inviting. The apartment was centrally located with easy access to the main subway trains routed to the city. We explored everything! I would recommend staying with Marcelo if you plan to visit NYC. He is an amazing character, full of personality. You'll enjoy his array of instruments from all over the world. I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay and enjoy our week long vacation.

Muy buena experiencia. Perfecta casa para visitar la ciudad con buena comunicación de transporte público. 
Marcelo se mostró muy atento en todo momento. La habitación es bastante amplia y el resto de la casa muy acogedora. Recomendable.

We had lots of fun staying with Marcelo.
He is a passionate musician and a really really happy and friendly person. He also always helped us out if we had any questions, and gave us some good tipps.

The location was great, because the Subway-Station is right around the corner (took us about 20 minutes to Downtown Manhattan).

All together it was great get to know, and staying with Marcello :)

Nos hospedamos 10 dias en lo de Marcelo y lo pasamos increible! Marcelo es muy amable y simpatico. Siempre se mostro muy amigable y dispuesto a ayudarnos en todo lo que estaba a su alcance. El departamente es muy comodo y luminoso. No hay ruidos molestos y se puede dormir muy bien por las noches. Esta muy bien ubicado, a media cuadra de 4 subtes, de los cuales 2 son express, por lo que llegas a cualquier parte de la ciudad muy rapido. Y desde el JFK es directo y facil de llegar. Si tienen suerte y tiempo, vayan a ver cualquiera de las bandas de Marcelo que son geniales!! Cuando volvamos a NYC, sin duda elegimos a Marcelo para que nos hospede!

L'appartement est très bien situé à 100 mètres du métro (4 lignes), ce qui permet d'être très rapidement dans les différents quartiers de la ville.
L'accueil de Marcelo est très chaleureux et très attentionné.
Grâce à lui, nous avons passé un séjour formidable à New York.
Nous recommandons cette adresse.

We stayed 4 days in Marcello’s apartment. 
Marcello was on vacation. 

Good points of the apartment : 
- Good price for NYC
- Location (very close to the subway) 

Bad points : 
- The apartment was not very clean
- The apartment is a basement. The elevator didn’t work in the building. You have to go through the garbage to access the basement. I hope you're not afraid of rats!

Viajamos a Nueva York con mi novia desde Colombia, y nos quedamos en el sitio de Marcelo por 10 días en año nuevo! El apartamento estaba exactamente como aparece en las fotos; estaba ubicado en el basement del edificio, a pesar del frío y de estar ubicado allí, no era para nada oscuro, no se sintió frío a pesar de estar en las épocas mas frías  del año! 

No nos encontramos con Marcelo, lo cual fue una pena,  pero sin embargo el estuvo muy pendiente de nosotros, nos comunicábamos frecuentemente por mail, siempre estuvo muy atento, nos ayudo con concejos para el viaje y de como disfrutar  la ciudad, definitivamente un excelente anfitrión!  Todo salió perfecto!  

La ubicación es excelente!! queda a media cuadra del subway de donde puedes tomar los trenes mas rápidos que te llevan a Manhattan en un santiamén, o si prefieres tomar el bus también lo puedes hacer! Para llegar allí desde el JFK solo tienes que tomar el sky tren y luego tomar el tren A  y listo! te toma aproximadamente 1 hora y media ! 

El resto del apartamento es genial, si lo que necesitas es un lugar donde llegar y dormir en una ciudad que no te da tiempo para nada mas!  

La cocina es muy amplia, puedes cocinar si quieres  y el baño  es amplio y muy limpio! Definitivamente me quedaría a allí de nuevo sin lugar a dudas!

Estuvimos en el departamento de Marcelo por un mes y fue una experiencia mas que satisfactoria. El apartamente es tal cual figura en las fotos, es amplio y espacioso. Marcelo fue un buen anfitrion siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos. Nos sentimos como en casa. Usamos la cocina libremente. En la misma dispone de todo lo necesario para hacer lo que sea. Nos llevamos de New York los mejores recuerdos y un nuevo amigo!!! Gracias Marcelo!!

Love the place! The apartment is exactly like the photos he put on the website (and clean!). My friend and I were staying for 4 nights, even though we didn't have much chance to have a conversation with Marcelo (because we were out pretty much all the time), he's a great host! Marcelo was being thoughtful and helpful during our stay.  It was easy to get around and you don't have to worry because you can find pretty much everything in the neighborhood! We definitely will go back to Marcelo's for our next trip to NYC!

We stayed at Marcelo's apartment for 8 days, first of all the location is unbelievably close to the subway (40sec. walk) and also grocery shop, starbucks, supermarket and takeways are all within less than 5 minutes walk. The area is very safe(day and night) police station just inside the subway. 
The apartment is quite big, large kitchen, good size bedroom and lovely living room. 
Very comfortable bed and plenty of room for luggage and clothes. 
Now the most important part: Marcelo! What a nice person! We couldn't have been more lucky to find not just a host but a mate! 
We had a lovely time together, chatting and cooking whenever we were home at the same time, very respectful and generous and available for any requests! 
We'll be back for sure on our next trip to NY.
Ciao Lorenzo & Nicole

Marcelo es un gran Anfitrión, muy atento y siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos.
El departamento es tal cual las fotos, la cocina muy completa y la ubicación es muy cómoda!

My boyfriend and I stayed for 10 days at Marcelo's place.
What a wonderful trip we had in NYC !
Marcelo is a great host, really respectful, quiet and funny ! He'll help you if you need anything. His place is very good with a very comfortable bed. Besides, you are very very close to the subway. 
We had the chance to share a meal with Marcelo in an excellent restaurant full of chocolate ahah ! 
We will, for sure, come back to Marcelo's for our next trip to New York !

Thank you again, we had such a great time.
Axel & Madlyn

Host: Marcelo was AMAZING. Very friendly and we talked over tea the first day or two.

Expectations: The bed was extremely comfortable. The unit is located by the laundry room and the brief walk from the elevator to the room is almost unbearable due to the smell. 

Neighborhood: Not in the best area of town, but I think you'd be ok.

Marcelo is a nice host and he is friendly and funny. His apartment is spacious, clean and convenient. He has provided us very clear instruction to get to his place. We often went home late but his place is very safe. Would definitely recommend his place who want to travel in New York.

Nos alojamos en el hogar de una gran persona, muy cordial, siempre dispuesto y con un muy buen animo. Conocimos no solo a un gran anfitrion, sino a un amigo q estamos seguros volveremos a visitar!
El lugar es muy amplio, comodo y funcional. La cama es muy comoda!!
La cocina tiene todo lo que necesitas!
En cuanto al barrio, muy tranquilo y pintoresco. Tienes supermercado y tiendas a pocos metros y lo mejor....el subte en la esquina!
Definitivamente volveriamos a alojarnos en la casa de Marcelo!
Recomendable a toda la comunidad de air bnb!

I spent nearly 12 days in house of Marcelo and was a very good experience.
Positives: the department has everything as it appears in the photography, is spacious and fairly clean. Marcelo is a very polite and friendly person.
Negatives: is that the department is a little bit far to downtown, can take a bit of time travel to the tourist areas, however, is well connected to the subway is steps from the apartment. In general was a very good experience! Thanks Marcelo for your hospitality.

Pasamos una semana, con mi novio, en el departamento de Marcelo, y no encuentro nada negativo sobre nuestra estadía. Todo fue perfecto. El departamento es como se ve en las fotos, limpio, ordenado, cómodo, la cocina y el baño están perfectos. El subte a 40 metros, en 20 min te deja en el centro, y funciona 24 hs. El barrio es seguro, hasta para caminar por la noche. Lo mejor de todo, Marcelo, buena onda, atento, se preocupa por todo, te ayuda en lo que necesites, y te aconseja lo que sea que le preguntes.

Our stay in NYC was great! Marcelo is very communicative and hospitable. He was really helpful and gave us some advice about the city. Location of the apt is great, just 2 minutes to the subway. We felt safe and we did not have any unpleasantness, even though it is Harlem. We spent 28 wonderful days in Marcelo's place and we can not wait to come back to NYC. It is the best city in the world!

Marcelo was a great host. He made us feel very welcome and was in even though we arrived during the afternoon. He told us some top things to do in NYC and gave us plenty of advice and directions which was very helpful. We were then left to our own devices which suited us fine as we had lots of things to do during our stay. 

The location was great, very close to the subway with express trains to downtown running often. There is a great deli across the on the street which do decent breakfast sandwiches. 

All in all a great air bnb stay in New York, would highly recommend.

Marcelo was an amazing host. He made us feel like at home and gave us really good advice to visit local music and food venues. 
The room is exactly who it looks in the website. Clean, spacious, and very comfortable bed. The apartment is super clean, organized, and has plenty of day light.
The neighborhood was safe at any time of the day and it is perfectly located half block from four lines of the train. You are in Manhattan and can get anywhere in the island in less than 30 minutes.

Marcelo was an amazing host, one of our best experience using airbnb! The apartment is big. Great kitchen, wifi and shower! Very close to the subway station (half block) (Website hidden by Airbnb) trains, A and D are express, so from the apartment to times square takes 15 minutes.  The neighbourhood is ok, supermarket 2 blocks away, donkin donuts on the corner. Everything was excellent!!

Marcelo un fenómeno, muy buena onda, el departamento muy grande, perfecto wifi y baño, muy cerca del subte, a 15 minutos en tren expreso a times square. El barrio es seguro, supermercado a dos cuadras. Varios lugares para comer alrededor. Muchas gracias por todo!

Estuvimos 9 días en el apartamento de Marcelo, y la experiencia fue genial. Es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, incluso la habitación dispone de aire acondicionado propio. Marcelo se mostró muy atento en cada momento ayudando en todo lo que le fue posible.  
El barrio nos pareció seguro y tranquilo, además de contar con todo tipo de servicios muy cerca.
- lo mejor: Marcelo por supuesto, wifi gratuito y una ducha genial. La parada de metro express a 2 minutos
-lo peor: estancias como la habitación y el baño podrían estar más limpias

Staying with Marcelo was wonderful! The neighborhood is nice, with food, a bank and VERY close to the A train. Marcelo was very accommodating on the arrival time for us. We arrived in town and immediately went to a show. He allowed us to check in later in the evening, even though it was sort of late on a week night. Marcelo's apartment is very comfortable and welcoming. We loved staying with him. I will definitely be coming back soon!

Had a great trip to NY, Marcelos place is awesome. Great price and great access to all of NY. It's less than a block from the A,B,C and D trains so u can b almost anywhere in the city in abt half an hour for just one metro fare. The place itself is nice too, really clean and comfortable, and it has everything you need. It's like staying at home because you're able to use anything and everything in the apt. Marcelo was really helpful and answered every question we had immediately. Very good source of info, really friendly, outgoing guy. You should definitely stay here, highly recommended

Tuvimos una gran viaje, el depto es perfecto. El precio es bajo y la ubicacion es perfecta, a menos de una cuadra de la subte, ofrece acceso a toda la ciudad en solo 30-40 minutos. El barrio es muy seguro, y el depto es limpio, brillante y comodo. Es como quedarse en su propia casa, porque tienes todo lo que necesitas. Marcelo es muy servicial, definitivamente de buen onda.  Puede contestar cualquier predunta que tengas, tan pronto como tu le preguntes, es muy disponible. Quedete aqui, no encontraras nada mejor

An excellent choice in New York. Near the metro, safe place and with options to eat next. Marcelo is a great host, in spite of being little, was always very kind and left us pretty comfortable. I do recommend.

Apartment is very close to metro (A/B/C/D lines), everything is exactly like on photos. Room is very quiet, bed is comfortable.
Marcelo is a great host, easy for communication, very helpful.

Marcelo ha sido un gran anfitrión! El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos (muy cómodo), el subte está muy cerca y con eso te movés a todos lados: Hasta Times Square sólo tenés 15 o 20 minutos si tomás el express train. Pizza, Subway, Dunkin' Donuts, verdulería, burguers y kioscos (abiertos las 24hs) a metros. Marcelo es muy amable. Los días que estuvimos allí llovió y él nos brindó paraguas y un mapa de todo NY (yo tenía solo de Manhattan). 
PD: Muy bueno el Chelsea market, Marce!

We spent 10 days at Marcelo's place and had such a great time! The neighborhood is the best in Manthattan you can still afford, with access to Midtown within 15 minutes and lots of nice bars/diners nearby. The room was as described on the pictures. Marcelo is the perfect host: kind, helpful and always available for any requests. We will definitely come back.

Thank you for welcoming us in your apartment!
The room is very comfortable, and Marcelo is really nice and easy to communicate. First time on AirBnb for my girlfriend and I, and we have spent a beautiful month. I recommend this room for any couple hesitating to share an apartment!

Marcelo is super kind, welcoming and warm. He didn't get in our way but was also very open and happy to offer his help. It was super interesting to get to know him and his love for music! If we ever go back we will for sure stay with Marcelo again! The apartment was located 2 minutes from the A train so it was easy to get downtown in no time. The apartment was big and it was easy to feel like we had some privacy. The kitchen had everything we needed and with a supermarkedet two blocks away we enjoyed that we were able to cook. Thank you Marcelo, staying with you was definitely one of the highlights of our visit in New York

Es un apartamento grande, la habitación tiene suficiente espacio para dos personas, el anfitrión es excelente. Hay privacidad. Buena limpieza. Está muy cerca al metro para desplazarse con facilidad. Queda aprox. A 20 minutos de los sitios turísticos. Recomendado!
Best New York Airbnb experience I've had. Marcelo was a great communicator and I had no issues whatsoever. Will definitely be booking his place again.

We stayed 1 week at Marcelo's place. 
The location is very good. (5 minutes to the subway, 20 min to Times Square ...) the neighborhood is safe. Marcelo is very nice, and he replies quickly to the text messages.  
The room is big enough for a couple. There are shops close to the appartment (café, donuts ...)

I recommend his place :) !

Estar no apartamento do Marcelo com certeza foi um dos pontos altos da viagem pra mim. Ele foi super solícito e prestativo, me ajudou em tudo que precisei, mas também foi muito discreto e respeitou bastante minha privacidade. Se você é mulher e está viajando sozinha tenha certeza que se sentirá muito tranquila e segura aqui. A localização é excelente, ao lado do metrô e pontos de ônibus. O bairro é super tranquilo e familiar. Super indico! Adorei a estadia!
Great place to rest and feel as home, location is great , and Marcelo is a great host !

El apartamento está muy bien situado, a cien metros de una boca de metro .Justo al lado hay una cafetería,  un banco, varios supermercados , tiendas locales, sitios para comer y cenar. En cuanto al apartamento,está bien,cama cómoda y la cocina muy grande.El baño un poco lejos de la habitación pero no es un problema.Marcelo es muy agradable y te ayuda en todo lo que pueda.Calidad,precio totalmente recomendable.

We spent a week in Marcelo's appartment and we had an amazing time! Marcelo was very responsive and so nice to us. Location is great, so close to the metro and this place has everything. Would definitely come back if I stay in NYC again

Marcelo´s apartment is beautiful, so many musical instruments that if you are a musician, you´ll feel at home. Other than that i felt very good while there. The location is the best and the people in the building are great. I felt great and did not want to leave. I´m going back!
Loved the instruments; made me feel at home!
If you're looking for somewhere to stay with a wonderful host and a great location, don't look any future. This is the place!

summary: LightHouse is located near the beach in one of the best neighbourhoods of Porto: Foz do Douro. This apartment is equipped with one double room and one sofa bed with private bathroom. Has a fully-equipped kitchen, a cozy living room and a balcony.
description: LightHouse is located near the beach in one of the best neighbourhoods of Porto: Foz do Douro. This apartment is equipped with one double room and one sofa bed with private bathroom. reviews.comments: David is an excellent host, very welcoming and friendly. He also helped with navigation in Porto and gave suggestions what to do and see in Porto. The appartment is located near the ocean - it is very nice, well equipped and organized with a great attention to detail. We enjoyed our stay very much and we will be happy to return one day ...

name: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay) Sunny Aprt'
summary: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment.
space: A bright and cosy Hong Kong apartment with two separate bedrooms: a double bed in one room and a single bed in the second room. This listing is only active when the host is away on holiday as the host usually lives in the apartment. As is usual in Hong Kong, the apartment is small, and bedrooms compact, but outfitted comfortably. The only downside is that it is on the 4th floor - with no elevator, however this has not caused problems as yet and the price is set to reflect this (please refer to the many positive reviews on this listing, as well as my 'room only' listing). It can be counted as 5th floor (though the letterbox is 4th floor) There is a double & a single bedroom. The kitchen & living areas flow into the open space. The bathroom & kitchen are both renovated in western style. There will be one drawer available for clothing storage in each bedroom, as well as space in the wardrobe for hanging clothes. Remaining drawer spaces are for my personal use and I ask that these remain p
description: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment. A bright and cosy Hong Kong apartment with two separate bedrooms: a double bed in one room and a single bed in the second room. This listing is only active when the host is away on holiday as the host usually lives in the apartment. As is usual in Hong Kong, the apartment is small, and bedrooms compact, but outfitted comfortably. The only downside is that it is on the 4th floor - with no elevator, however this has not caused problems as yet and the price is set to reflect this (please refer to the many positive reviews on this listing, as well as my 'room only' listing).
neighborhood_overview: Tai Hang is an older area where the 'village' houses have been renovated while still keeping the low-rise open feel of the original area. Many of the apartment blocks are only 5-6 floors high, not common in Hong Kong these days. The area is unique and renowned for the eateries at street level. There is a walkway at the end of the street to Victoria Park and to Tin Hau, another popular eating area. Causeway Bay shopping Centre is within walking distance.
notes: I am happy to chat via email prior to your stay to help you plan and prepare for your time in Hong Kong Regarding the floor levels: The apartment is officially named as 4/26 Wun Sha. This means it is on the 4th floor (as per British numbering of floors) but the Chinese character outside the apartment door shows it as 5th floor (as per Chinese way of numbering floors). It is 26 as it is on the left of the stairwell - 28 is to the right. You'll know it by the plants by the door as well.
transit: The MTR in Hong Kong is excellent, providing regular and easy access around the city. The Tin Hau station is a 6-7 minute walk. Buses are available at the end of the street, at a nearby terminus and on several surrounding streets, making travel around Hong Kong very easy. Taxis are also available and cheap.
access: This is the entire apartment. Guests staying have full access to all amenities As this is my private home, and only hosted when I am away, I ask that the space is respected and cared for as a home. Check in & out is often flexible - bur needs coordination with a friend who takes care of my home while I'm away.
interaction: I am happy to advise and chat with guests about the many options of things to do in Hong Kong. Hong Kong is a vibrant and busy city and guests will find they have easy access to areas of Hong Kong. I am happy to help to make your stay as comfortable as possible - to either share my 'local' knowledge of the city or to let you explore with maps and a sense of adventure.
house_rules: Appreciate no smoking inside the building. I've never had a problem in my 8 years of hosting this apartment - all guests have been extrememly respectful of the space and items in it. Few details to help maintain the 'pest free' and comfort of my home: 1. Please keep the 3 sink holes covered & closed when not in use.  I have no cockroaches etc and ask that drains remain covered to ensure my home remains this way. 2. Walter filter. Water is drinkable from the tap. If you choose to use the filter - please ensure it is only filtered with COLD water. The hot water ruins the filter. 3. Hot water: please leave OFF when not in use - prevents high power costs. It is electric so it'll need 3-5 minutes to hear prior to a shower  4: When going out for the day, or leaving, please ensure the following is turned off: water heater, air-conditioners, lights & coffee machine. (& sink holes closed/covered) 5. When leaving, please ensure the door is locked (seems crazy, but many forget this!)

host.host_about:
I'm a Kiwi now living in NZ
I have spent time living, working and travelling in Hong Kong - experiences that have built my love of travel.
I work as a counsellor in a school and in an agency.
I enjoy walking, biking, going to the theatre or movies, enjoying a good coffee and spending time with my family (whom I actually like) and my friends (whom I also like!).

address.street: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay), Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Very comfortable apartment, perfect for what we needed.  Lots of good local amenities, good location, easy for buses, taxis and 5 mins to Tin Hau MTR (Metro).  Causway Bay is only 10 mins walk for lots and lots of shopping. We had both rooms, everything was as you need it, a home from home.  Su gave us lots of information and was always available during the booking process.  Thank you Su!
2nd time booking. Everything is perfect!
Clean ! Good!
It was a great time living here. The loction is convenient. Close to the subway and bus station. Householder was patient to answer  and explain questions.
지하철역에서 가깝고, 집앞바로 슈퍼가 있어 좋았습니다.

Su's appartement was a very nice choice for us.
The neighbourhood is plenty of small shops and food stalls or fancy restaurants and bars... you will find whatever you want.
Not to far from an important bus hub and metro station, but incredibly quiet.
We three slept like babies.
The house was super super clean and tidy.

Happy to have discovered such a nice place in HK.

We will definitly come back
Lovely flat in a hip neighbourhood. Recommended
Lovely place in a fantastic location . Host very friendly

Su’s apartment is in a great local neighbourhood close to lots of shops, restaurants and the MTR. The apartment itself is bright and clean with enough space for a comfortable stay. Su is very well organised and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended.
值得推荐

The place is well equipped and very compact and in a good location. Metro is close by and the bus to and from the airport stop a few minutes walk from the house.
Su is an amazing host, extremely helpful and very responsive to all sorts of questions. 
I can highly recommend her to anyone who wishes to spend some days in Hong Kong.

Well connected metro line L-4 Joanic and several buses.

Every time you leave the apartment, make sure the lights are off. When you leave the door closed. Take the keys with you. In case of loss of keys € 35 is payable in respect of new copies. To enter the apartment's personal documentation is required. We ask for your identity card or passport and all the people who will stay in it (photocopy).

host.host_about: Amable anfitrión conocedor del lugar y amigo.

reviews.comments: All logistik gick bra. Lourdes var väldigt snabb att svara på våra frågor om diverse saker. Från flygplatsen tog vi en taxi och vi möttes upp utanför lägenheten och fick nyckeln.
Merci pour se séjour très bon moment à barcelona et merci à notre hôte bien agréable
All good, everything as expected
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Never go to this flat if you do not want to waste your money. I stayed here for 44 nights and she cleaned maybe one time before we arrived there. And the host got 50EUR for cleaning fee. In Barcelona, average fee for one-hour-full-cleaning is 10EUR. That means, with that money, actually I could call the cleaning lady for 5 hours. And was it clean? Not at all. She just pretend she cleaned (or maybe just organized a bit) but actually every corner I could find dust everywhere. And AMAZINGLY, she asked us 7EUR for each person for linen service. She said it includes sheets, pillow cover, table sheet, and serviettes. What kind of tourists is bringing their own sheets and table covers?? Don't you think of course it has to be included on the huge money I already paid? More than 1700Euros for 44nights? I think it is ridiculous and she knows that we are tourists and we don't know how it is going on exactly and tried to steal our money with any ways she can try. When we were looking for the flats, there were barely left the places and we didn't have choices and we were desperate so paid 14EUR for that. (One more thing here, this place was left until the last moment . Hope you know what it means) But there was even no serviettes and only blanket and pillow cover. And the facility. INCREDIBLY old and it looks that she doesn't live there so she doesn't care at all. The washing machine never closes the door maybe you need to try 1000 times. And I sent her a message for help and her answer was 'try gently again'. If she got money then she needs to serve proper services with that money. The facility is not only old but also not working. The host only thinks about money without helps for the money. This is the chat about paying the rest money when I did not know the cash paying is not allowed. Finally we asked Airbnb to explain her about the money.
Last but not least, The house has Wifi.
But, most of time it doesn't work. And only one small tiny place works very seldomly. That's why we coudln't do anything in the house, we should find somewhere else for Wifi. It was terrible.....

name: * Lani Beach House
summary: "Lani Beach House" Aloha - Please do not reserve until reading about the State Tax in "Other Things to Note" section. Please do not reserve unless you agree to pay taxes to Hawaii Beach Homes directly. If you have questions, please inquire before booking.   The home has been completely redecorated in a luxurious island style: vaulted ceilings, skylights, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and a gourmet kitchen are just some of the the features. All bedrooms have ocean views
space: Beautiful upscale home located on a pristine beach, just outside of Historic Haleiwa Town and a few miles from Waimea Bay. The home has been completely renovated and redecorated in a luxurious island style: vaulted ceilings, skylights, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a gourmet kitchen are just some of the the features. All bedrooms and common rooms have ocean views. Enjoy the serenity of this unique location from the expansive deck, and watch the breathtaking Hawaiian sunsets from the large jacuzzi . Surf the famous surfspot, Laniakea, swim with the turtles right out front of the house, or paddle to Waimea Bay, an awe-inspiring ride away. Wonderful long beach walks are also available just outside the back door, stroll to the farmers market on Sundays or into town for shave ice.

The home has been completely renovated and redecorated in a luxurious island style: vaulted ceilings, skylights, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a gourmet kitchen are just some of the the features. All bedrooms and common rooms have ocean views. Enjoy the serenity of this unique location from the expansive deck, and watch the breathtaking Hawaiian sunsets from t
neighborhood_overview: Located about 5 minutes outside of historic Haleiwa Town, with its charming surf shops, art galleries, restaurants and shave ice stands, this property sits just in front of one of the North Shores premier surfing spots. A peaceful retreat where your surroundings invite you to let it all go and succumb to the calm and peace of the ocean.
notes: The state of Hawaii requires both the GET (General Excise Tax 4.712%) and TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %) be applied to rent and fees, a total of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %. The Airbnb platform does not currently give us the ability to itemize and charge these taxes accurately. We are in contact with Airbnb regarding this, and hope to have the issue fixed soon. In the meantime, after making a reservation all guests will be sent a separate e-contract with house rules, and will be required to pay the taxes using a major credit card. We will not ask for or accept checks/cash. We collect tax only, Airbnb collects all other rent and fees. # W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Local Contact: Hawaii Beach Homes
transit: Public Transportation is possible and a bus stop is located just up the block, but we highly recommend a car as there are many spots you will want to see on the island that aren't accessible by bus.  Taxis are available in this area if you call ahead, and Uber is also now available on Oahu.
access: The entire property is all yours! The house is a private, detached, single family, fenced in, beach front home with no other tenants on site.
interaction: We provide guests with a free app that includes driving directions, move in instructions, information about the house and loads of info about our island. We love to share our favorite recommendations with guests, and are available in the office 7 days a week to answer your questions. After hours we use an answering service in case you need reach us about anything urgent.
house_rules: All guests will be required to sign a house rules contract and pay required State of Hawaii taxes prior to arrival.   If you do not feel comfortable signing the house rules or paying the taxes outside of the Airbnb website please do not book online. The house rules are standard, such as no smoking and no pets.  One very strictly enforced rule is that we do not permit outside guests; all people on property must be registered.  Our homes are intended for the enjoyment of our resident guests and not as a gathering spot for parties or events. This is in order to honor and respect the neighbors - we take pride in being great neighbors! If you would like more information about the rules please request a copy of our full contract before making a reservation. The state of Hawaii requires both the GET (General Excise Tax 4.712%) and TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax 9.25%) be applied to rent and fees, a total of 13.962%. The Airbnb platform does not currently give us the ability to itemize and c

host.host_about:
Hawaii Beach Homes is a boutique agency that offers reservations for a small selection of beach front rentals on the beautiful island of Oahu.  

Hawaii Beach Homes is a travel agency licensed in the state of Hawaii. We specialize in booking beach homes for visitors, and are not a property management company. We carefully select each property we reserve for our clients. Our staff is familiar with every house, beach, and neighborhood on Oahu, and we love nothing more than helping you choose the perfect spot. We understand that a trip to Hawaii is an experience of a life time for many of our guests.  Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.
