Any damage done to any property or items missing, will be your responsibility  and deducted from your deposi

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I have a love of travel and people and am excited when I get to meet good people and explore the world.  I have lived on 3 different continents and am eager to spend time on the other 4.  Thankfully, Bnb allows me to continue to travel the world through the people I have the pleasure of hosting.

reviews.comments: Exactly as pictured. If you're gonna be in Brooklyn with a loved one, this is the place.

Aswad our host was very professional and friendly, he met with us when we arrived at check-in and gave us a tour of not only the apartment we booked, but of all the other apartments at the building. 

The apartment is EXACTLY as pictured, its such a wonderful space. I would recommend any of Aswad's apartments as places to stay while visiting New York.

Thanks again Aswad.

Literally a home away from home!  Very spacious and accommodating. Definitely comfortable. The neighborhood was fairly quiet and nice. In a great location that is close to the nearest shops and restaurants. The host was awesome!  He was very polite and very knowledgeable of the area.  I will be back!

The place was not as it appeared in the picture and my guests had to move out the next morning into a hotel. The location was not good either and it wasn't clean. There was no drinking water in the apartment. I have always stayed in air b and b's and never had a problem. This was a first time issue which was quite shocking for me.

Fabulous! If I could give this place 6 stars, I would. Super clean, very close to trains. Aswad is an excellent host. I'm a repeat guest here and am never disappointed. This is my go-to spot whenever I'm in NYC. If you're looking for a clean, comfortable place that's conveniently located with a super friendly host - this is the place!
Hermoso y cálido, buen anfitrión, muy claro y amable. Todo salió muy bien.

I can't say enough good things about this place. Aswad's home was beautiful, clean, spacious and comfortable. He was such an accommodating host, allowed me to check in and out based on my flight times. The neighborhood is a wonderful breath of fresh air. It's perfect for those who are trying to get a taste of real life as a New Yorker. I will definitely be returning!

Aswad is friendly and professional guy good with communication. and helped us check out late , flat was clean and like the pictures ... it had good local spots to check out connections to trains very near a real Brooklyn experience
Aswad's place is awesome! It has character, is clean and in a very nice neighborhood. Would def come back!
Clean, great location, cozy.
Great location in Brooklyn. Nice and very clean apartment. Close to public transport to get anywhere you need to go! Bed was very comfortable!

I loved my staying in aswad’s House
It was clean and very big space and the public transport was very close to the house .

Aswad seems to be a very nice guy. The apartment is as pictured.  Check in and checkout were very easy. However, his bed was the only warm and cozy place in the apartment. If you're staying In the winter go to the store and get you at least 2 additional space heaters because the basement/garden apartment is definitely not warm and cozy. If you are afraid of waterbugs  or cockroaches than don't even bother booking.

Aswad is a kind and polite person you can ask him everything you need and he will help you for sure ❤️ beautiful place confortable clean with everything that you need and near the subway i highly recomended i really want to come back again in this beatiful place
Great space in general and Aswad is a gracious host. One piece of advice is to make sure you don’t need much privacy because everything (including the shower) is in one large room.
Goede uitvalsbasis voor de ontdekking van greater New York !
Aswad is a very nice and welcoming person !

Our stay at Aswad’a was amazing!! Great location in Brooklyn, close to transit, stores & not far from the city at all. Check in & out was a breeze! The place looks just as pictured! Very clean & cozy! We really enjoyed our stay! Wouldn’t change a thing!

Je ne recommande ce lieu a personne. Il fait froid, les serviettes et le lit sentent mauvais. Tout l’appart sent le moisi. J’ai dû le lit entier, couvre lit etc. C’est très bruyant, on dirait que les voisins du haut sont dans votre chambre. Aswad est très aimable et répond vite mais le lieu ne m’a pas plu du tout!
Great place! Thanks for accepting us with a very short notice.

Aswad’s apartment is top notch! It’s in a great location, very close to several train stations and walkable to great spots to eat with a park just across the street. We loved watching kids play basketball and families walking dogs. :)  It’s also just a short train ride away from the heart of NYC.  It’s amazingly clean with soft towels and fresh, crisp sheets.  The bed is outrageously comfortable, we slept like babies. The apartment has everything you need and is super stylish. It felt like our own private oasis in the city. Aswad answered our every question promptly and was super friendly; he’s a fabulous host. If you’re staying in NY, this is the place! I highly recommend! We’ll definitely be back!

I throughly enjoyed my stay at Aswad’s place! The space was unique but felt very much like home. Aswad was communicative and very helpful. Checking in was easy and I would def stay there in the future.
Great, big spot for a reasonable rate in Eastern Bed-Stuy.
Man Aswad Places was amazing beyond great Hospitality and amazing location anything i needed he was on call and answer right away best Airbnb I had so far

I was visiting family in Brooklyn for a long weekend with my girlfriend and we needed a place to stay last minute. We came across Aswad's Airbnb on the list. The pictures were accurate but it certainly looked even better in person. Don't let the rules in the description intimidate you , his place is certainly worth it with the price and value. You can absolutely tell Aswad  takes his business seriously and cares for his property. Aswad was super friendly and responsive. As someone who frequents NYC often to visit family and friends, I'm certainly going to keep his listing as a favorite. Best endeavors to you, Aswad!

Aswad's place is located at a residential area in Brooklyn. We always felt safe there. The place looks exactly as presented by the pictures. We loved the interior design. Everything we needed was there. Aswad responded immidiatley to every question we had. We would definitely stay there again.
Everything you could ask for and more. Great amount of space and not to far from transportation
VERY nice place. A hidden gem. Walking distance to train stations and the apartment is one of the most beautiful places I’ve seen.
Awesome stay!! Highly recommended!!
Very cool place, very nice and spacious. King sized bed is the glamorous life!

Aswad has been a great host! Hope to get to meet you next time I book. 

I originally booked on his other locations and say that I’d have a discrepancy either dates so he amended the reservation perfectly for my stay. Super flexible! 

Aswads property is newly renovated and sharp. Very spacious once you’ve settled in. Great amenities and accessories. If your able to Uber or Train to Manhattan I’d suggest that from this location because it’s on the Lower Side of Bed-Stuy.
Very beautiful space. Close to the train. And Aswad was super easy to communicate with.
This place is really bohemian. Kind of a Bus Boys and Poets kind of feel. Really dope.

Aswad place was great, exactly like the pictures, super clean and just a few minutes from the subway. We had some problems with the internet, it was a little slow, but otherwise, I highly recommend his place and would stay with him again.
Great place and great location
Aswad is a very attentive host. The place is well done, spacious, safe and quiet. Loved it. Thanks.

Our stay in Aswads place was great. The appartment supplied everything we needed and is located in a quiet neigbourhood close to the Subway station. For us at first the neighbourhood looked a bit dodgy but the People were polite and helpfull.  Many stores in the neighbourhood and for dinner the arena of Bushwick nearby had plenty of options.

name: Big, glamorous, 4BR, 3-story house
summary: Our 4-bedroom, 3-story beautiful Brooklyn townhouse is a great place to stay for your NYC trip.   Located in Fort Greene, right in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn's Arts District and only 10 minutes by Subway to Manhattan.
space: Our Home  Our home is a classic Brooklyn brownstone with traditional detail but a modern renovation to give it a light and open feeling. An open living room, dining room and very modern kitchen makes up the 1st floor. Out the back door and down a stairway from the ground floor, you will find our beautiful back garden filled with herbs, flowers, and vegetables. The master bedroom, study/guest bedroom, walk-in closet, and master bathroom make up the second floor. The master bedroom has a king-sized bed and nice views to the backyard. The master bathroom has a beautiful pebble-floored, two-headed shower, and matching modern sinks.   The study/guest bedroom has a queen bed.   There is a heavy curtain separating the two bedrooms on this floor rather than a door so there is visual privacy but less sound separation.  On the top floor, you will have access to two more bedrooms, a laundry room, and a second, more basic, bathroom with a tub, great for kids.   The front bedroom on this floor has
description: Our 4-bedroom, 3-story beautiful Brooklyn townhouse is a great place to stay for your NYC trip.   Located in Fort Greene, right in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn's Arts District and only 10 minutes by Subway to Manhattan. Our Home  Our home is a classic Brooklyn brownstone with traditional detail but a modern renovation to give it a light and open feeling. An open living room, dining room and very modern kitchen makes up the 1st floor. Out the back door and down a stairway from the ground floor, you will find our beautiful back garden filled with herbs, flowers, and vegetables. The master bedroom, study/guest bedroom, walk-in closet, and master bathroom make up the second floor. The master bedroom has a king-sized bed and nice views to the backyard. The master bathroom has a beautiful pebble-floored, two-headed shower, and matching modern sinks.   The study/guest bedroom has a queen bed.   There is a heavy curtain separating the two bedrooms on this floor rather than a door so there
neighborhood_overview: Fort Greene is one of the classic brownstone neighborhoods of Brooklyn, brimming with the energy of New York City.  Our house is one block from the world famous performance space Brooklyn Academy of Music and two blocks from the Frederick Law Olmsted-designed Fort Greene Park where you'll find a weekly farmer's market, a regular pickup soccer match, outdoor musical performances, tennis courts, playgrounds, and families picnicking. Along Fulton and DeKalb streets, you'll find restaurants with Manhattan-quality food but Brooklyn prices. Only 1 stop from Chinatown and 2 stops from Union Square on the Q train, you can easily spend your days touring busy Manhattan and retreat to our quiet, lovely house and garden for a more relaxed experience.  We love our house and our neighborhood and know that you will too.
notes: Downstairs Tenants – We have a rental apartment on the bottom floor underneath our house with a  long-term tenant who also serves as our house manager. As of July 1st, after surveying our guests, we no longer offer cable television.  We do have great Wi-Fi (see instructions for network and password) so you can still stream your favorite media.
transit: The great thing about Fort Greene is it has amazing subway access.  We are a 5-minute walk to the following lines:  Q,B,G,A,C, 2,3,5,6 which means you can get to any part of Manhattan easily.
access: There is a lockbox with keys outside the house.  If I accept your reservation, I will e-mail you the code for the lockbox before you move in.
interaction: Contacts – Next door neighbors (to the right if you are facing our front door) are Martin (pronounced Mar-teen) and Pam.

host.host_about: We are a family of five with three grade school age children.   We are living out of the US for a couple of years and are happy to rent out our house when we are gone.   Fort Greene is an incredible neighborhood and we always love being able to give our guests a taste of "real life" in NYC.

reviews.comments:
We stayed here for 14 days in August 2013. When we arrived we immediately felt at home. The house is very spacious and cosy, with all modern comfort.
It is located in a quiet street in a very nice and lively neighbourhood with plenty of good restaurants. It is very conveniently situated close to the most important subway lines.
In short, we were very happy to have booked this place !

We enjoyed our stay in Jon's home for 10 days during August 2013.  It was a very clean, well kept, spacious, and beautiful 3 floor townhouse.  It was definitely worth staying there given that sometimes we needed to accomodate more people, and have a nice space for visitors to come over.  Jon was out of town, but he was quite responsive to my emails.

Jons und Lisas sehr schönes und gemütliches Brownstonehouse liegt in Fort Greene in Brooklyn. Wir mochten die Umgebung sehr und haben die vielen kleinen Cafes und die tollen Restaurants sehr genossen. Vor allem WALTERS in der Dekalb Ave.
Im Haus in der St Felix Street haben wir uns von der ersten Sekunde an wohl gefühlt und haben unsere Wahl in den neun Tagen unseres Aufenthalts kein einziges mal bereut. Jon hat uns im Vorfeld sehr viele gute Tips die Gegend betreffend gegeben und hat uns den Schlüssel sogar per FedEx nach Berlin geschickt.
Im Haus selber ist genug Platz, wenn man zu viert anreist hat jeder ein eigenes Schlafzimmer, es ist aufgeräumt und sauber, das Internet funktioniert einwandfrei und in der Küche macht es großen Spaß zu kochen...
all thumbs up!!!

We had a really nice stay in Jon and Lisa's house in Ft Greene (Brooklyn) during the Spring holidays, April 2014  The house is spacious (we were 7 adults) and nicely decorated. You feel as if you were staying in a friend's  house, that's really enjoyable While being a bit away from the busiest and noisiest places in New York, the house is well located as the numerous subway lines can take you to any place in Manhattan or other places in New York quite fast. We  just had a short chat with Lisa as we were leaving and she was just arriving, she is a really nice person.  I can recommend the place quite warmly.  Pierre B , from Belgium

We needed a house for the summer while we renovated our nearby house. Jon's house was perfect. Jon was a great host, very helpful and great communicator. The house was perfect for our family, lots of toys and kids books. 

Everything in the house is exactly as the listing, all the rooms are good size, lots of light and with A/C.  We had a great time and would definitely recommend the house to anyone else.

The neighborhood is truly amazing! The restaurants and parks in Fort Greene are really great. Jon is super-helpful, very friendly, and always available to answer a question. The house is perfect for a family with kids. They have an amazing collection of books, games, and toys. Great living room/dining area. There is a little bit of construction nearby, but it didn't really bother us. We loved our stay here and would definitely return in a heartbeat!

Our family stayed in Jon and Lisa's house for our son's wedding. They have a lovely, comfortable, clean home. It accommodated our family of 8 very nicely. The location is wonderful, near restaurants, subways, and shopping. We will cherish the memories we made while 
staying there. We would definitely stay there again.  
We thank Jon and Lisa for sharing their home with us. 
Linda

We secured the property way before the arrival date as we thought it was a perfect match to our needs - a large group of adults and three kids - , and the property stayed to our expectations, in fact I would say exceed them probably a bit. The pictures were very accurate, so they were no surprises there. This part of Brooklyn is what New York is all about, a real mix, I would recommend it to anyone that is deciding between staying in  Manhattan or elsewhere outside the big apple. Jon has been very responsive throughout the period we secure the property. Even when his oven stopped working - which was a big deal for us - he told us in advance and managed to secure an alternative, which we finally decided not to use (hope that's ok Jon). My only comment that I think could improve anyone's stay in the future is a mini map of the house pointing to where the basics are, what to use and what not to. It is almost self intuitive, but for someone that was using the service for the first time, I had lots of questions at the very beginning. Can I use this?, do you mind if we eat that?, in any case as I said Jon was always very responsive despite being away in the busiest annual holiday of the year.

Overall a terrific experience.  House is very nice and spacious and conveniently located to Ft. Greene shops/park, downtown Brooklyn and transportation.  Jon was  a terrific host -- very responsive and attentive throughout.
Jon was great and very accommodating and a very nice guy.  He went out of his way to make our check in easy and the place was great!

Wonderful hosts and amazing home! The location is perfect for anyone who wants to get to know Brooklyn like a local. Communication and coordination with Jon was smooth and easy. Definitely looking forward to staying again!

We had a wonderful stay at Jon and Lisa's house.  It's a perfect family home, in a fantastic neighbourhood with very easy links to Manhattan.  We travelled with our young son, and loved being able to enjoy Jon and Lisa's very spacious, well equipped and clean home, which also has a great garden.  There are plenty of shops, restaurants and green spaces all within walking distance.  Jon and Lisa were great hosts and provided all the information we needed.  Check-in and out was very easy.  We would definitely recommend staying here.

Perfect house for our family and friends. We stayed there for Labor Day weekend and couldn't have made a better choice. 
The backyard is great for barbecues and the house is not only charming but also completely set up for anything you might need.
Rooms are spacious and the bathrooms look brand new!
The neighborhood is awesome, too. Fort Greene Park is really close and you can find great food on a walking distance. 
Would definitely come back.

I stayed at Jon's house with three colleagues for 5 days on a work trip. The house is very comfortable and clean, and being able to use the outside space as well is a real luxury. We all felt at home and had a much more enjoyable stay than we would have had in a Manhattan hotel!

A fabulous house that was perfect for our family of 4 (2 young kids) and babysit. Close to everything yet quiet, and wonderful character while being clean and well appointed. Jon was very responsive, helpful and easy to deal this. We'd love to stay here again on our next NYC visit!
We had an amazing time!  The location was perfect & Jon was a fantastic host.  His instructions are easy to understand and the house is exactly what you think of when you think NYC.

Everything was as presented and as expected.  We found the subways to be very close, affordable, and quick method of transportation.  Neat delis and restaurants nearby.  We had three adults, two teenagers and two children and found the home to be very roomy and adequate for our group.  Having the washer and dryer available proved to be a welcomed item.  We will definitely consider staying there again when in New York.

Jon is an excellent host. My family stayed here for my wedding weekend. I informed Jon that my 95-year-old grandmother would be staying here and he answered all of my questions without delay. His home is stunning, and perfect to share with family and friends.

Jon's house was the perfect place to stay for myself and my colleagues. The house itself is spacious, clean, comfortable and conveniently set out. It is positioned perfectly for local amenities - shops, subway, food options, the park. Jon himself was a fantastic communicator and a great host. We'd all come back to the house again!

We had a great stay in this house. Jon communicated very well and made us feel welcome. The house is very spaceous and everything is in place. We can definitely recommand this house when you visit New York. It's location is a good starting point to get te know Brooklyn en the subway is nearby so you can get easy to Manhattan.
Jon was a great host.  There were great restaurants nearby, Fort Green Park steps away, and the proximity to the subway was perfect.  We had no issues and would stay again.
The home is beautiful and very conveniently located. We felt very secure and well-taken care of in the home. Plenty of space, beds, and hot water for 5 adults.
Superbe séjour à NYC ! La maison est grande et bien située. Impeccablement entretenue, elle permet de rayonner sans difficulté vers le reste de Brooklyn ou de Manhattan. Un vrai coup de coeur.

Jon's home was extremely spacious, in a great location, and had some really cool stairs. The space was great for our group of six. I would recommend this space to anyone traveling with four or more people.

Jon was a welcoming, communicative host who reached out to us ahead of time and offered info about the neighborhood. Check-in was easy and as described. We love the neighborhood. The home is cozy, bright, and spacious by city standards. We enjoyed our stay.

The place is really great: location, comfort, services, transportation. 
Everything was made easy by Jon. 
Highly recommendable

Jon's house was a great spot to stay with our family.  More than enough room and the comforts of home.  It is very centrally located and convenient to the subways and a short walk to shops and restaurants of Fort Greene.  It is close to downtown Brooklyn where there is a lot of construction activity and less quiet that the blocks further from Flatbush.  The arrangements were easy and the access simple.  Jon was quick to respond to questions and the house clearly has been very thoughtfully prepared for guests with everything you will need.  Highly recommend this for exploring multiple great Brooklyn neighborhoods or Manhattan.

Jon's brownstone was very good for our large family gathering.  The kitchen is well-equipped, and lots of room to spread out. Food and entertainment were just around the corner.  Altogether a good trip.

Jon was an excellent host and helped make our stay in NYC very enjoyable. The place was exactly as advertised and even exceeded expectations. The house was also very clean. The neighborhood was great and the house is close to just about everything that you would need. If you're looking for an excellent house in a great location for a reasonable cost, Jon has the perfect house for you and your family or friends!
Great house for a bunch of 6 girls ... very spacious and comfortable.

I stayed at Jon's house for a business trip and it was a perfectly pleasant Brooklyn/Ft. Greene experience.  Great location to food, drink and transportation.  I commuted into Manhattan with ease every day.  Communication and check-in with Jon couldn't have been any more mellow and convenient.  The house itself had every amenity possible with comfort and ease.  Looking forward to the possibility of staying again.

Super well located. It was an excellent experience for us to "live" in Brooklyn for 10 days! The house is close to metro stations and you can basically go everywhere from there! The house had everything for a family to spend 10 day-vacation: from kitchen supplies to hair drier, closets, washing machine, etc. Just perfect. Although it is located almost on the corner of a big avenue, it is a very quiet place. The garden on the back made our breakfast very special during our stay! John was super friendly and answered promptly to all my emails. We had no issues with the house. Everything worked properly. The photos are super "faithful" to the reality. You will really like the house! Just for information, we were a family of four and there was even a room that we did not need to use. Plenty of room in the house. Ah, internet Wi-Fi was super good!

I lived in Fort Greene for 2 years, so I already knew it was a great area with all the train access you could possibly need.

I stayed at Jon's place for 3 nights with 4 friends as we were attending a wedding in Park Slope.

I was pleasantly surprised by the spacious house that Jon provided with a huge back garden for New York standards. Having lived in New York, I can safely say that this house was great value for money.  

The inside was clean and i loved the decor. It is clearly a well loved house. No complaints at all.
Linda casa bien equipada, limpia, cómoda.
Great place. Great location

Jon ist ein sehr bemühter Gastgeber, bei Fragen steht er sofort zur Stelle.
Die Unterkunft reicht locker für 6 Personen und man fühlt sich sofort wie zu Hause. Die Klimaanlagen , die überall sind, funktionieren hervorragent, sowie das Wifi . Alles war sauber und funktionell. Preis , Leistung hat zu 100% gestimmt. Wir würden Jon's Haus wieder jederzeit beanspruchen.
Beautiful, centrally located, comfortable brownstone. Enjoyed our stay!

The apartment is nearby and within walking distance to the New York Marriott at the Brooklyn Bridge and the excellent new Alamo Drafthouse on Albee Square. It's three floors and beautifully decked out, with Air conditioning if you need it and a large kitchen and dining room. The owners are kind and flexible and let us check-in early when we arrived earlier than planned in the city. Definitely recommended for business trips or trips for conferences/events.
This house is fantastic; very clean and well stocked, and great wifi for the kids!  It's in a great location giving easy access to all the sights of New York. Definitely recommend it to families.

We loved our stay!! Near everything in Fort Green.  Is so close to the park and walking distance from many cool restaurants.  Fun to see modern city buildings and turn around and see tree lined street with gorgeous Brownstones.   Just the right flavor of New York.  Thanks Jon.

This home is in a brilliant location and the house is comfortable, spacious and with quirky, interesting works of art on display. The main bathroom had a great shower and there was lots of closet space. Our family of five found great places to eat locally and getting around was straightforward. We enjoyed staying 'off' Manhattan and would return to this area again.
My mom and her friends loved the place. Very clean and spacious. Jon was very responsive. Would definitely recommend this place.

Really lovely apartment in a brilliant location. Convenient for Brooklyn and Manhattan. Really friendly helpful host and great neighbourhood. I would definitely stay here again and definitely recommend.

This home is in the perfect place for access to Brooklyn and New York.  The home is stylish with lots of room for everyone.  The kitchen and bathrooms have everything you will need for your stay.  One helpful hint is that the home does not have cable so make sure to bring your device for Netflix, Hulu, etc. Overall, the stay was great and I would recommend it.

We had a great time here.  It was perfect for my family, the top floor bedrooms were incredibly kid friendly and even equipped with an electric piano which my son loved playing.  We enjoyed the master suite and the double shower was awesome.  The master bedroom was quiet and not much city noise got through the windows.  The place was nicely decorated and colorful.  The location was spot on and very close to the subway.
Very nice spacious house in a nice neighborhood of Brooklyn. Well connected. Jon answered all our questions instantly.

This turned out to be a great location for myself and my family travelling from the UK. Once we got to grips with the Metro and the location we soon relaxed into our stay. Jon's is a great host and very responsive to emails with some top tips.
Great local restaurants and roof top bars mean there is no need to go back into Manhattan after a long day sight seeing. Recommend it.
Maison agréable, très bien située et quartier reposant.

I may repeat what some others have already mentioned, but it's worth mentioning again! 
We arrived a couple hours early and were able to check-in. This was helpful since we had our bags with us. It might not always be an option due to cleaning, but it worked out well for us. The place was clean upon arrival. The photos and directions were just as they were in the listing. It was very easy to find once we exited the subway. 
Several subway stops nearby was very helpful since we were visiting different areas of the city. We were here for the NYC marathon. 3 of us were running and 3 were cheering. It's right near the 8 mile mark, so that was easy for the fans. It was also easy for us to take 1 subway to the Staten Island Ferry in Manhattan to get to the start of the marathon. 
There were 6 of us and there was plenty of room. Kitchen was fully stocked with dishes, pans etc. There was also plenty of towels and soap for the bathrooms. 
We didn't use the backyard, but it is a nice space to have. There were all adults in our group, but it would accommodate families with children as well. 
The area has plenty of nice restaurants and shops nearby. 
Communication with Jon was easy and he always responded quickly.
I would recommend his place to anyone!
Great working with Jon. Gorgeous home in cool location.
Jons place is simply amazing and he is a fantastic host.

We had a great experience staying at Jon's place. The home was both pretty and spacious enough for our larger group. It's also in a perfect location and afforded us with a great home base to use as we visited friends, restaurants, and other sites around Brooklyn and Manhattan.

I stayed with Jon during a Christmas reunion with my family (one couple from Seattle, one from Texas, and my wife and I visiting from Amsterdam). First, Jon's house is in an excellent location- there is plenty to do within walking distance (grocery stores, restaurants, and even the Barclay's center), plus the connection to public transport is outstanding- there are a few stops within a 5-10min walk, leaving you with tons of local / express train options. We traveled to Manhattan every day and never spent more than 30min on the train. Additionally, the house is huge and never felt small with six of us there. The kitchen is big enouch to cook a modest meal, and the dining / living rooms are perfect places for larger groups to reconnect after a day of activities. There's also two full bathrooms, so just a tiny bit of planning prevents any bathroom scheduling conflics.

The main thing that keeps this from being a perfect rental is the sleeping arrangements- there is really only one real bed suitable for two people. There's a second queen bed in the listing that can accommodate two people, but it's only a sofa-bed in the 2nd floor study (separated from the main bedroom by a curtain). The 3rd and 4th bedrooms on the 3rd floor have twin beds which, though more comfortable than the sofa-bed, will always feel like two separate beds even when pushed together. Families or groups with people desiring individual beds will be fine here (the top two bedrooms would be perfect for a few kids or friends bunking together to save money), but you if your party has more than one couple, you might consider other options.

All things considered, this property is a pretty good value- it's a huge place that can accommodate many people, and it's in a perfect location. However, if I were to return for a similar trip, I'd only consider a return visit if at least one more queen+ bed was added.
Impeccable home in a great location, really accessible to all areas of Manhattan and Long Island. Amazing value, highly recommend staying here for any NYC visits sort- or long-term c:
Hhh

The house is SPACIOUS and PERFECTLY LOCATED (walking distance to the B and 4-5 lines which take you all over Manhattan in a few minutes... and more lines). Fort Greene is a also a great neighborhood itself with lots of shopping options, the park and the BAM. The house itself is very nice, arranged over three floors with a large yard on a quite street. Check in was completely painless and Jon was super responsive when we had an issue with internet.
Overall it's a great house and a unique experience to pretend to live in such a coveted neighborhood. However, I ended up paying about 800 per nigh because it was the holiday season and I am going to write a review based on this price. 
There are a few things that COULD BE IMPROVED though. First, I somehow convinced that this would be a house in which Jon lives but this is not his primary residence. As a result, the house feels like a rental with older furniture and rather empty (plates and most cups are made of plastic for example, and I doubt anyone would live like that). 
Apart from salt and a few spices, it was hard to find something to cook with so we had to buy pretty much everything to make French Toasts in the morning for the kids. It would have even nice to find sugar or syrup for example. Other than that, the kitchen is rather well equipped with pans and a nice gas range.
Finally, my main sore point is about comfort. Were were two adult couples and two young kids. Kids slept very well and had basically all of the third floor for themselves, including a private bath with a tub. This was great!! The master bedroom was spacious and quiet and the bed was ok. However, the second bedroom was not so comfortable and rather small. Two nights were probably the most we could take in it. The bathroom is great though: excellent water pressure, hot water for everyone.
Also, as we were about to check in, Jon let us know that the washer was broken. This was of course not a problem but I believe that it had prevented the cleaning person to wash the linens, which smelled like someone else had slept in them. The towels also smelled moldy. It's pretty clear that all were thrown in the dryer without a wash and I would have preferred if we were told about this.

Jon is an outstanding host. Check in/out is very easy and the place is just as described. Communication with Jon is also very fast and smooth. I would highly recommend this place for its great value in this neighborhood.
Great place right in the hub of Brooklyn

We came as a group of co-workers because we had weekend business in the city, and this was the perfect place.  Really well located, plenty of beds for sleeping, nice neighborhood.  Highly recommended!
Great place! Highly recommended
The house is very nice. It’s spacious and clean. The location is great. We were a big group and it suited our needs well.

We had a look at a number of places in Brooklyn and are glad we chose Jon's place.  It's in a great location, is very spacious, warm and has plenty of brownstone character.
We really got the sense that we were experiencing Brooklyn from the inside.
Communication with Jon was first class.  He gave us plenty of information and assistance and was very accommodating and flexible.
Jon's place is great - just as advertised.  He was quick to respond to communication and made our stay work well for a small work retreat we had planned in Brooklyn.

Location is fab at this 3 story brownstone in fort green. So so convienient to subway and walking distance to adorable neighborhoods w charm, BAM, Barclays, fort greene park, etc etc. 

Jon is so on top of communication, getting in and enjoying right away was easy.

Biggest downside is that there is no privacy for the master bedroom. As the head of household and presumably the one paying the bill, you will need to cozy up in a twin bed on the third floor w no lock. 

This may not be an issue for some, but for a pricey 5 night stay, I was dissapointed.

Other than that, highly recommended.

Jon’s space is a great size and was perfect for me and my 4 friends. Jon was great at getting back to us quickly with any issues we encountered, and the house is in a great location with lots around the area and great transport links. Thanks!
Jon's place was perfect for what we were looking for! Great location and amazing home!

I stayed at Jon’s beautiful house with my family of 7 people plus an 8 month old baby, for just under a week and we had the best time! It was my mum and dad’s first Airbnb experience and they absolutely loved it.

It’s a lovely and very family friendly house in a great neighbourhood, close to lots of subway stations so it’s very easy to get around town. 

Jon was a perfect host - when we had an issue checking in/accessing the house, Jon was very quick to respond and we were sorted and inside in no time. He also arranged for us to have a pack n play for the baby to sleep in, which meant we didn’t have to bring a fold up crib with us from the UK. The house is stocked with all the basics you need, and is close to some great local shops as well as a big Wholefoods.

We would love to stay here again and would recommend Jon’s house to families and groups of people any time.

Thanks for everything!

Amazing location in a very cool area. The space itself is comfortable and very unique. Jon is a great host - very responsive and considerate. Would absolutely stay here again when I return to Brooklyn.

Nous avons passés un très bon séjour dans cette maison !!!
La maison: elle est spacieuse et fonctionnelle.
Disposant de deux vastes chambres avec lits doubles au premier étage et de deux chambres supplémentaires plus petites au second étage, avec deux lits simple chacune.
Les salles de bains sont pratiques.
La cuisine est bien équipée.
La terrasse, bien que non éclairée, est fort agréable pour profiter d'un moment au frais lors du petit déjeuner ou en fin de journée.

La localisation: la maison est située à proximité de plusieurs stations de métro proposant une multitude de lignes disponibles - que ce soit pour se déplacer dans Brooklyn, ou aller sur Manathan.
Les commerces sont nombreux: Whole Food Market, petites commerces type épiceries à deux pas, un magasin de vins et spiritueux au coin de la rue pour découvrir quelques vins locaux, de nombreux restaurant proposant toute sorte de cuisine avec possibilité de plats à emporter.... Et le quartier ayant de nombreuses écoles, l'ambiance et jeune et sûre.

Great place! Huge and awesome for groups. Jon uses a digital app system for keys which was a bit tricky at first but easy to use once we got the hang of it. There is no A/C upstairs in the bedrooms but it was cool enough for us!

This is just a great place.  Lots of room, lots of beds, nice and very communicative hosts.  Close to subway stops and some really fun neighborhoods for eating and drinking - went to Park Slope are on foot a few times.  Getting into Manhattan is also a breeze.  Highly recommend.
This is a beautiful home, definitely worth its price. Home is extremely cute and spacious, and the hosts were very helpful and responsive. Would love to stay again.
The house was perfect for 7 people spending a weekend in NYC. It was both spacious and cozy.  I would recommend staying here if your group is larger and want an awesome home base.
La maison est extrêmement bien tenue, et correspond en tous points à la description. Jon a été très rapide dans chacune de nos communications et est très à l’écoute. Je recommande vivement.
Plenty of comfortable space for big groups. Lovely!

Very nice and authentic townhouse in Brooklyn. Clean and charming. Wooden floors and high ceiling. It was nice to have coffee and tea and other basics already in the fridge upon arrival. Conveniently located nearby subway stations and grocery's. 10 minutes to Manhattan. We were a family of 5 (3 grown up teenagers) and very comfortable there.

Jon's place was the perfect spot for our group. It looked just like the pictures and was very clean. We enjoyed spending time and grilling in the backyard and it was so quiet that we almost forgot that we were in the city. We loved the location as well. The only complaint we had was in regards to the beds and pillows. A couple of the mattresses were extremely firm, almost to the point of being rock hard. Also, every pillow in the house was flat as a pancake. Overall, we would recommend Jon's place, but the mattresses need to be upgraded and pillows replaced.

Fabulous house in a perfect location.  Every amenity needed is taken care of, you walk in to the house and immediately relax.  Deli’s, bars, restaurants and several subway lines within a few steps of the front door.

We were traveling to Brooklyn for an event at the Barclay Center and couldn't have had a better location.  We could walk there in 5 minutes. The place was spacious and decorated in a lovely mid-century modern style.  What we appreciated most was that Jon was very flexible and accomodating with us through a bad airline experience that got us into Brooklyn in the middle of the night (luckily you can let yourself into the apartment).   Our delayed luggage wasn't arriving until after we were scheduled to leave, and Jon allowed us to stay a little longer to receive our luggage. He answered texts promptly and was very courteous at every step.

Jon’s place was the perfect size for our big family. It was close to all the places we wanted to go and the close subway station took us everywhere we wanted. The extra details were greatly appreciated and we would recommend this place for big parties looking for a nice space in Brooklyn.
Loved it, location was amazing and close to trains and everything in Downtown Brooklyn.

My brother, his wife and 4 kids stayed at Jon's great house!
It's a huge house and was able to fit everyone comfortably!
It was clean, beautiful and spacious and in a great area. 
This is the kind of house and location that I would feel comfortable putting any of my friends and family. 
Thank you so much for a great stay!
Can't beat the location and comfort; we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Jon's spacious place!
Beautiful home in a great location. Easy access to site-seeing, transit, groceries, restaurants.

Fab and funky house in great location in Brooklyn. Felt like a really safe area, super close to lots of subway stations making it really easy to get into Manhattan and around Brooklyn.  Very close, 3 minute walk, to a fab Wholefoods 365, love that shop ! and also some really fab local restaurants, great brunch at Cafe Paulette round the corner.
House is a great space for a big group, with 4 bedrooms, so worked really well for our 2 families who were in Brooklyn for a wedding. Main bedroom at back of house is lovely and master shower good too. Lots of closet space and great to have laundry room. Felt very safe in the house, very secure locks etc. Some bits of house could do with a bit of TLC, but it is a great space for a big group to all be together on a trip to NYC.
La maison est dans son ensemble agréable , bien  aménagée et la vue sur les arbres coté cours est très jolie.

Would stay again in Jon’s family home in a heartbeat! We loved living life in Brooklyn. Great street in a great location for local shops/ restaurants/ takeout and only minutes walk to Subway stations (Atlantic Station being the main one)
The B line subway takes you directly into Manhattan in under 20 minutes and services are frequent. We navigated the subway with our 4 children and managed! 
The 4 bedroom/ 3 level brownstone home is stylish, spacious and very comfortable. We never felt cramped as a family of 6 even once. The local  area felt safe and friendly. Jon provides a pack and play porta cot and even went out and purchased a stroller for us to use during our stay so we had a spare one for our 3 year old who wouldn’t cope with all the walking in NY. This was incredibly thoughtful and generous of the host so we could avoid expensive hire charges and having to wait in for a hire stroller to be delivered. 
Highly recommend Jon’s house for families looking to live like a local
for a few days. Brooklyn is a great place and I’d stay there again in future and use it as a base to explore both Brooklyn and all the tourist attractions in Manhattan - beats a hotel room any day. Thanks for having our family stay Jon!

We stayed there with two children under 10 and 4 adults. It was absolutely perfect. Lots of room. Very relaxing and quiet place all over the house. Our favorite was hanging out in the living room and chatting while our youngest son played with a big box of magnet tiles that is left at the house. Enjoyed being able to walk to Whole Foods. Park and playground walking distance. The kitchen has all the basics for cooking. We mostly made breakfast and found everything we needed including sugar, tea and coffee. There are plates and cups for little kids to use. We would definitely come back again!

We had a really good time in Jon’s appartment. The door lock system is really practical, the location is closed to subway lines in a nice area of Brooklyn, photos are conformed to reality, kitchen is well equipped, rooms are big and bathrooms are in order and clean. We happily recommend this appartment to anyone.

This home is absolutely amazing.  The location was excellent.  The local stores are very close abd had everything we needed.  After a long day of site seeing, this home was an oasis.  The neighbors were friendly and warm.   We will definitely choose this place again.
Great location and Jon was very fast at responding anytime I had a question.
Good house with great location. Everything like described...
Beautiful house with lots of room to spread out. Jon was very quick in responding to calls/emails. He was a great host and we enjoyed our stay.

This is a fabulous apartment! It’s huge and beautifully appointed. It’s also comfortable and the bathrooms are fantastic! The location is great too. There are many wonderful restaurants and bars very close. The beautiful Ft. Greene Park is a block away. We hope to stay here again and recommend it wholeheartedly.
Truly an amazing stay! It’s the perfect location in Brooklyn. This home is charming and so many things to do nearby. Thank you Jon for making us feel welcome.
Great trip, location, convenient, great response times.
Great place. Great location. Next time in NY, it would be our house of choice.
Beautiful brownstone in a great location of Brooklyn. Has all the amenities you need- very spacious and host did a great job communicating and making everything seamless. Would definitely return!
Great stay, good for a big family visit. Provided a nice pack and play for the baby :) Everything clean, lots of space, easy to use the lock system.
Awesome place. Location is perfect for heading into the city or getting anywhere in Brooklyn. Highly recommended.

Jon’s house was perfect. Exactly what is advertised. The space is huge and feels like a home. So many great shops nearby and a whole foods. Easy to get in and out of Manhattan. Parking is a bit of a pain, but it’s a city! We drove around for a bit and found a spot up the block. Not bad at all! There are also tons of parking garages if you don’t mind paying. 

The beds were comfy. Jon supplied all of the linens, toilet paper, shower supplies, and even items in the kitchen. I would highly recommend staying in this house. It’s a clean and safe neighborhood and the space is HUGE for the price. Would definitely stay with Jon again!
Beautiful love it
Very spacious, clean and perfect location for amenities, walking to the promenade and bridge, fort green, etc ...

A beautiful quirky house, great location, all the amenities you will need, Jon was a great host flexible and responded to questions and queries quickly offering recommendations. I woudl highly recommend this property

name: Wellyet Guest House@Room 2
summary: Located at the heart of city Tsim Sha Tsui area, MTR, Bus Stop at door front; minutes walking distance to Star Ferry. All amenities near by, includes 7-Eleven, Bakery, Starbucks, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs etc.
space: Cozy little space which located at the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, where you could taste the oriental beauty with the most convenient transportation.

notes: 入住时间为下午2点,退房时间为早上11点,预订时烦请提供大概到达时间｡若早到或早退房,行李可以寄存｡
transit: 1. If you are travelling from Hong Kong International Airport, you could take the Airport Bus Route A21, take the stop [K11, HSBC Bank], walk along Nathan Road for 250 meters, you will find Mirador Mansion 2. If you are travelling from ShenZhen Luo Hu/Fu Tian, take the MTR to Hong Hum, change line to Tsim Tung Station, find Exit N5, Mirador Mansion just next to it. 3. If you are travelling with MTR, we are located right next to Tsim Sha Tsui Station Exit D

We also provide Towels, tooth brush, toothpaste,  shower gel and all-in-one shampoo for your convenient (free of charge, but one request per day for environment).
house_rules: 1､住客入住,應到服務台辦理手續,請出示護照､身份證或有關证件｡ 2､住客辦理入住時,請依據您預訂的天數及房間數預付全數入住房費,及房卡鑰匙按金港元HKD$100元｡如住客遺失房卡鑰匙,按金將不予退還,作爲賠償金｡ 3､旅客外出,請關閉所有用電設備,鎖好房門及大門｡ 4､請保管好自已的财物,若有遺失本旅館概不負責｡ 5､住客請於晚上十一時至竪日八時保持室內安靜以免影響他人休息｡若有朋友前來探訪,請於晚上十一時離開,若帶來不便,敬請原諒｡ 6､旅館退房時間在中午十二時前,十二時後退房加半天房租,晚上五時退房按全日計收房租｡ 7､若住客在退房後需行李保管服務,請將行李搬至前臺辦理寄存｡只提供退房當天的免費寄存服務,若逾期,賓館將收取費用｡ 8､請住客保護房內各項設備及床上用品,如有損壞或遺失,照價賠償｡ 9､請住客保持房內整潔衛生,請勿隨地吐痰､亂丟煙頭､果皮､雜物等｡ 10､嚴禁住客在房內賭博､酗酒､鬧事等,如有違者將移交警方處理｡ 11､若住客提前退房或取消訂房,預付的當天及竪日房費將不予退還｡ 12､房間內嚴禁吸煙,違者案例罰款港幣HKD$1500 13､房間內不得烹煮食物

host.host_about: Taking life break after 15 years studying and working in Australia. Enjoy and love to travel around and meet people, share culture differences. Learn new recipes, try on different kind of delicious food.

address.street: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
The Host was cheerful and helpful on arrival and the room was clean and ready upon arrival. The Flats were quiet during the stay which was great as I really needed the rest after a long day of Business meeting. 
Highly recommended.
It was indeed a wonderful experience. Natalie was so accomodating and she helped us a lot, especially for us first timers! We highly recommend her. And the room was so clean! :)
虽然房间系比较细,但好在够干净,而且员工的服务好好,态度够热情｡两晚住得好开心(●°u°●) ｣房间里面有一个插座转换器,方便充电,梳洗用具全部都准备有,要热水同冻水可以出去装,随时都有噶,好方便的(✪▽✪)性价比算系比较高的!

Natalie's guest house was a really small room in the tourist-center of Hong Kong. The room and the guest house provided everything one needs for a short visit in Hong Kong: WiFi, Shower, bed, and a safe place to stow your stuff away.
The air-con is quite loud during the night, but turning it of will lead to quite a hot room!

Although I haven't seen Natalie, her "ladies" were extremely friendly and helpful, even there was a language-barrier. BUT the airbnb experience - talking to locals - was missing.

The only thing, which is offended me, were the watch/stuff-salesmen right out of the guest house.

Natalie is a welcoming host, friendly and helpful. Her place is located at a convenient location just a couple of minute's walk to the MTR station. The room is as it describes, clean and everything is handy to get. Would recommend travellers to have a short stay at Natalie's place.

I had a very pleasant stay at Natalies guesthouse. It's in a great location from where you can reach everything easily (the MTR station is right next to the building). One part of the guesthouse was under renovation but Natalie gave me a bigger better room without charging me extra. The room itself was super clean, comfortable and perfect for a short holiday in Hong Kong. It had everything I needed - AC, little bathroom with shower, fresh towel everyday, shampoo and a big comfortable bed. You also feel really safe as you can only get into the guesthouse and room with a special keycard. The staff was super helpful too and so was Natalie. I only met her in person once, but she is incredibly friendly and really makes sure you have a pleasant stay. I can recommend the guesthouse for those who travel by themselves and need a quiet room to come back to in the midst of bustling Hong Kong. Thanks a lot, Natalie! All the best, Juliana
The place is clear
房东姐姐很可爱,很耐心的给我指路,房间很干净!
1泊しました｡値段が安い｡その割には安全です｡女性の受付で親切でした｡ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙ1枚と歯ﾌﾞﾗｼがｻｰﾋﾞｽでありました｡
The place is clean and the crew is adorable! Very well situed in downtown HK. I stayed 5 nights in this tiny room without any problem. Recommended!
Natalie was super friendly and very helpful. Room was as described although the mattress was a little uncomfortable. Other than that, it was okay.
Fast response, the place is in the heart of the city, not difficult to find halal food nearby the hotel
Bed is comfortable. Good location. The lady boss, Natalie, is helpful and gives good suggestion. Will recommend for stay though the building looks old and black outside but inside the room is clean.

What a find! Location location location.  This super lovely spot was right in the center of everything including right on top of a train station.  Natalie was a perfect host and I felt completely taken care of.

처음 숙소를 찾을 때 힘들었지만 wellyet식구들과 위쳇으로 연락하며 숙소를 찾을 수 있었다.
처음 체크인을 할 때 키 보증금을 내는 줄 몰랐으나, 보증금을 내는게 당연하다고 생각했다.
처음 방을 보았을때 작다고 생각했었으나, 지내다보니 혼자 지내기에는 충분한 숙소였다!
다들 너무 친절하고 웃음이 많아서 행복한 여행을 보냈다!! 다음에 홍콩에 또 온다면 또 다시 묵고 싶은 숙소다!! 감사했어요~

The room is just as specified. Comfortable, clean and on a building located in the perfect spot if you want somewhere easily accessible to the main areas of HK. Victoria harbor is just 8 minutes away walking.

This place is great for short stays when visiting the city, it's more of a place to settle down after long days out. Check-in was smooth and helpful. Looks exactly like the pictures and it's clean, the hosts are mostly there to accommodate your requests.

Central down town area. Everything is at a walking distance. 
The room is ok. I felt very comfortable. 
I would pay a little more attention to the little details. I think that with little money and little effort it could look a lot better.  
In any case, i would repeat

Good location and good price. 
Stuff is nice too !

I will recommend

位置方便､價格便宜､服務親切
雖然隔音不好晚上很吵雜
但以價格來看是不錯的選擇
地方小,饮用水方便,三月份有点潮,窗户小｡房东人很热情,离地铁很近｡
The room was quite small but the location and price was just perfect.
prepare to accept the room size much smaller size as compare with any other  hotel room .

Expect a lot of people. Sometimes elevator crowded but mostly its fine. Money exchange rates are good beside the elevator( the one that says best rates) convenient store near, train station near. Good shops near also. expect the room to be very small tho, you relay get what you pay for. Natalie is a very lovely host. I would stay again.

This is a well priced, conveniently located room.  They were friendly and helpful.  The room and bathroom  are small compared with a typical western hotel. So, if I want a larger space I'll go elsewhere, otherwise I'll be here again. Thanks Natalie, Winnie and staff!
Basic room, just bed and private bathroom. Near MRT and buses. Many restaurants in the area. Busy urban area.
交通便利,坐地铁很方便,性价比高,非常贴心地准备了饮水机可以随时接热水

Natalie’s place is a super close walk from the subway station and is located in a very lively and active area. Although the building itself may appear sketchy on the outside, we felt very safe once we arrived at Natalie’s place. There is always someone guarding the place so safety was never really a concern for me. The staff are all really friendly and always greeted us when we came in or left for the day. I highly recommend this place to those who are traveling on a budget and want to be stay in a central area!

This is a small, clean, very well located place in Hong-Kong. There is no luxury, nor great space, but it's a very good place to rest, sleep and take a shower if you will spend your days around Hong-Kong. You have all you need in the neighborhood, and the metro station is just downstairs. The group of bedrooms are placed inside a big building where some other hotels take place in the big apartments. The attendants are very nice and do the best efforts to communicate with you, despite of not speaking good English. If you want to work in the bedroom is not a good place, as you do not have a table. But Hong-Kong Polytechnic University is a few minutes far, so you can use a library there if you need. It's what you get in a good neighborhood for a good price in a city where real estate market is very expensive.

In my experience Natalie answered me fast by (Hidden by Airbnb) when I needed her, and the attendants were nice, gave me some fruits and also an umbrella for the rain as presents. The only problem I had was, for my fault, I lost the bedroom key card on a beach. As the place has a reception and you have to do a 100 HK dollars deposit to have the key, I was expecting them to immediately have an extra one, even if I would lose my money. A lady who worked in the hotel but was in her bedroom (not in the reception) could open my bedroom with a master key when I arrived but I had to wait until the next morning to have another key. As the lady went back to her room to sleep and I had no more key I could not go out that night and the other day I got my new key only after leaving and arriving again. It was not that bed, but it's just an alert to be attent with your key and an improvement the place can do. 

For the rest, I was so glad to be hosted there that I came back to the same place the following week to take another night in HK. I think this is the best indicative I found it really worthwhile.

Hope to help you all with these comments.

You'll literally get what you pay for. It's located in an old building in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. It may seem unsafe and sketchy at first, but you will be fine. 

Natalie checked us in smoothly and smiled whenever we saw her :)
It's a very small room (not much more than a bed and a shower), but that was perfect for our needs. The location was absolutely phenomenal - you couldn't have a better one anywhere in Hong Kong!

very accessible and convenient to most tourist spots, restaurants, shopping in tsim sha tsui.

natalie is very responsive and nice. the space may be too cosy for two persons, but just nice for a solo traveller like myself.

尖沙咀の駅からすぐにｱｸｾｽでき､重慶大厦より入りやすく､部屋は狭いですが清潔です｡ｼｬﾜｰを浴びるとﾄｲﾚがﾋﾞｼｮﾋﾞｼｮに濡れますが､そこさえ割り切れば問題ありませんでした｡
ﾋﾞﾙの2階にはｼﾞｪﾆｰｸｯｷｰのお店があり､ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ後に寄ったら､さほど混んでおらずすぐに買えました｡
ちょっとした地元民感も味わえるし､尖沙咀を拠点にするならﾍﾞｽﾄな宿です｡
better than expected...
Very good, internet is super fast
Very good place in center TST, nevertheless quiet place, room exactly like on pictures, very friendly stuff.

name: Fresh and modern 1BR in Bed-Stuy
summary: A spacious, art-filled one-bedroom apartment near the express train (28 minutes to Times Square) and a Citibike station. Sample Bed-Stuy life at a nearby French restaurant,  a sunny Haitian cafe, a boutique grocery and more. We do NOT discriminate based on race, religion or sexual orientation.
space: Our sunny, newly renovated and furnished ground-floor apartment is located in the heart of Brooklyn, in the historic Stuyvesant Heights area of Bed-Stuy. We are close to the A train (express) and C train (local), getting you to lower Manhattan in 15 minutes and Midtown in under 30 minutes, and the J-train for lower Manhattan. For easy access to Fort Greene, Williamsburg and the rest of Brooklyn, try our new Citibike station, also nearby. Walk down treelined brownstone streets to neighborhood favorites like Saraghina, Lunatico, l'Antagoniste, Bed-Vyne Cocktail Bar, the Wilky craft beer bar and Manny's cafe (serving Bed-Stuy's famous Dough donuts!). It's also a quick ride or a long walk to Swell Dive's Tex-Mex/Filipino tacos, D.S. & Durga's cult perfumery, the nightclub C'mon Everybody, and Peace & Riot's eclectic home furnishings and gifts.  The spacious apartment  with one queen bed is perfect for a single person or couple, and while it's perhaps not the greatest for kids, we can easil
description: A spacious, art-filled one-bedroom apartment near the express train (28 minutes to Times Square) and a Citibike station. Sample Bed-Stuy life at a nearby French restaurant,  a sunny Haitian cafe, a boutique grocery and more. We do NOT discriminate based on race, religion or sexual orientation. Our sunny, newly renovated and furnished ground-floor apartment is located in the heart of Brooklyn, in the historic Stuyvesant Heights area of Bed-Stuy. We are close to the A train (express) and C train (local), getting you to lower Manhattan in 15 minutes and Midtown in under 30 minutes, and the J-train for lower Manhattan. For easy access to Fort Greene, Williamsburg and the rest of Brooklyn, try our new Citibike station, also nearby. Walk down treelined brownstone streets to neighborhood favorites like Saraghina, Lunatico, l'Antagoniste, Bed-Vyne Cocktail Bar, the Wilky craft beer bar and Manny's cafe (serving Bed-Stuy's famous Dough donuts!). It's also a quick ride or a long walk to Swell Di
transit: Less than a 10-minute walk to the Utica Ave.stop on the  (A)/(C) subway line and the Gates Ave. stop on (J)/(Z) line. Utica stop has a CitiBike station. A block away from two bus stops with multiples routes.
interaction: .  Guests stay in a separate,  private apartment and we make every effort to not disturb you unless absolutely necessary. We live above the apartment and will be happy to accommodate any reasonable requests
house_rules: A/C may be used only when you are at home.  Please respect our delicate old pipes (no grease down the drain, etc.).  No smoking on premises. Guests are expected to wash take out their trash and recycling as needed. Guests are expected to wash and put away dishes prior to check-out (apartment has a dishwasher, soap packets are under the sink) Longer term guests may wish to launder the sheets and towels during their stay. This service is not provided. (There are two sets of bed linens provided and two sets of towels for each adult guest.) Owners may occasionally need to go through the apartment to access the basement. We shall endeavor to give advance notice of this and find a mutually convenient time.  $50 fee if keys are lost or not returned.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a journalist from Texas and my husband is an artist from the Ukraine by way of Kansas City. We recently welcomed our son into the world. (Don't worry, he sleeps all night.)  We love exploring New York, especially Brooklyn, from the Brooklyn Flea to tiny taco joints to the Botanic Gardens to performance art in Bushwick storefronts (really). We've both spent a lot of time in the South, so hospitality is second nature to us.

reviews.comments: Shaila's place is amazing! It's new, it's clean and it's big! And Shaila is very accommodating, we found everything we needed (cooking, coffee) and more. Given that we were the first guests she hosted through airbnb I can say that she did an amazing job!
Great, quiet place to stay. It is great having Shaila just upstairs to answer any questions, and especially to give great tips on places to go.

Shaila and Alex are wonderful hosts really, they helped us every time we needed with directions, the internet, the supermarket, the post office !!! (thank you guys !!!).The place and the neighbord are great, 8 blocks far from the apartment you have the subway and 30 min. later you are in the island, we moved early in the morning, late at night (sometimes we came back at 2am) and everything turned out great.Definetly I would come back to their apartment, It's bigger than ours in Argentina !!! I look forward to stay there again and, next time, go out with you guys and have a beer or anything.
Bye !!! - Guido and Carla -

Shaila and Alex were incredibly accommodating and me and my girlfriend enjoyed our stay thoroughly. Highly recommended. The place was very private and homely. I didn't really know anything about New York and was nervous about staying in bed stuy but it was safe and friendly everywhere I went. Very easy to get to the airport and manhattan by train.

Great place to stay in Brooklyn! Alex gave us a really useful list of nice restaurants and coffee places near the place (We are very happy to have discovered, the restaurant "Saraghina", thanks to Alex's map!).  The apartment is vast, furnished with taste and very convenient. We highly recommend!

I can recommend to everyone to come to this beautiful apartment, Shaila and Alex are great hosts and the neighbourhood is very friendly everywhere we go.
It really felt like home.

My sister and I loved staying here! The apartment is very spacious and recently renovated so it looks amazing. The kitchen has everything you need with Alex and Shalia stocking it with a few basics. The neighbourhood is a little shabby, especially compared to the home we stayed in. We were told by some people in Manhattan that the neighbour of Bed-Stuy used to be very dangerous and just to be careful walking around at night. Walking from the subway after dark was a little daunting but we remained safe. We did catch a cab a few times from Manhattan as it was very late. Overall, it was a positive experience with Alex and Shalia being very helpful, even going out of their way to let us store our luggage at Shalia's work the day we were to fly out. They were great hosts.

We just met Alex when we checked in, but anyhow he had been a very friendly and helpful host. He was reachable anytime and answered my mails prompt.
The apartment was great! It was really beautiful and big. It has a perfectly equipped kitchen and there are also a few basics for breakfast and cooking. The bed is very comfortable. It is not that soundproofed as we are accustomed to (the steps from upstairs waked me every day - my son slept well, he did not hear it), but I think that is normal for american houses. But apart from this it is very quiet.
The neighbourhood is great! It is very authentic, people are friendly and helpful if required, no problems even late at night. We loved staying there!
In any case: apartment, host and neighbourhood are high recommended! If we are in New York again, we certainly return to this place!

Hello! 

We just spent 5 days in the big apple and we drove in to this Brooklyn location.  The host where incredibly attentive and just wonderful, the apartment spotless, hip & modern and really comfortable. 

Do not be intimidated by the transitioning neighborhood as we encountered that many residents are very friendly and helpful (directions) and this particular street has a real interest in making a real change hence empowering their community.

The subway is a little ways (12 to 15 min.) walk. We would use our vehicle to drive to the subway station (there are two corresponding)  and park nearby to facilitate the to and from.  If you need quick access to the subway at all hours of the day and night this may not be the place for you.

The apt. is an excellent value  for the money (as per  many  manhattan locations offer around  the same nightly  $$ rate but have to share their apt ).

We really had a wonderful time in NYC thanks to Alex’s house. It’s just as big, beautiful and clean as it seems in the pictures. Alex has an incredible apartment in the basement that makes you feel like home after being out all day knowing the big city. All the furniture and the kitchen appliances are new.

The location is perfect for visiting Brooklyn and Manhattan (only 15-20 to Brooklyn Bridge and South Manhattan or 25-30 min to Times Square in the underground).

Also, Alex gave us some good advices the first day for having all we needed in the neighbourhood. Don’t miss Saraghina’s brunch (10 minutes walking from the house)! He even let us to keep our luggage in the house until we left to the airport in the evening on our last day in the city.

The appartment was really clean, pretty spacious and kitchen was very well equipped! Its totally in line with all the information posted. 

Alex was very nice host, even allowed us to keep the luggage  after check out as we had a flight in the evening. Thank you once again for that! 

The neighboorhood itself was safe, we had no issues at all, however I`d prefer staying   in Brooklyn districts closer to Manhattan area next time as  we were travelling to Midtown up to 1h. Being a citizen of the huge city too (Moscow, Russia) , underground is not our favorite place to be  :) 

Overall , it was a great stay.

Communication with Alex was spot on.  He happily answered any questions and made it easy for me to arrive late at night and went above and beyond to help me have a good stay. 
The apartment has been tastefully refurbished.  Extremely clean, and with all you could need for cooking.  The bed is so comfy.  The apartment is peaceful at night and I slept so well.   Some noise travels from Alex' apartment upstairs but it is only a little during the day.
The area is a bit out of the main hub of Williamsburg and Bushwick but everything is easily accessible with a short walk or the subway about 8 mins walk away.
Alex left me a list of great stores, cafes and restaurants in the immediate area.  
Some people may be concerned about the area at face value as it is a white minority but I felt safe at all times.  People seemed friendly.
Was an amazing stay, we charm your apartment and were very friendly. Thank you for all your attentions.

Shaila and Alex are wonderful hosts - very accommodating, friendly, and easy to communicate with. We found it fairly easy to get around the city from Bed-Stuy, even with the weekend subway schedule. The apartment is lovely, bright, and very clean, and overall it was a pleasure to stay for a few nights. It's been recently renovated and thoughtfully decorated - we felt quite comfortable during our stay and appreciated the art and other nice touches throughout. I'd highly recommend staying with Shaila and Alex.

Great apartment, really spacious & has a lovely homely feel to it. Alex & Shaila were very helpful & welcoming, bed was really comfortable, good transport links, only a 20 min subway ride into manhattan, the area is really nice & quiet, unlike manhattan.

Thanks Alex & Shaila for having us ! Enjoy the Gin !!

The apartment is spacious and well furnished, the kitchen very well equipped and the bed very confortable. Sheila and alex were friendly and the comunication with them was easy.the neighborhood is very nice with typical town house, and very quite. Also the people Who lives there was very kind and helped us on many occasion. 
Definitely raccommend you to spend your holidays in NY in the lovely apartment of sheila&alex!

We had a great time staying with Alex & Shaila. The apartment is just as depicted in the photos. Lots of space and very comfortable.  The house is located really close to buses and subway which was very convenient. The neighbourhood is fine with a couple of nice places to eat nearby.

Shaila and alex were really friendly and easy to communicate with if needed.  

We stayed for 2 months and would recommend it to others who are looking for a place in Brooklyn.

Upon arriving, Alex was very helpful giving directions to the location. , he gave us a brief overview of everything, and let us settle in. It was a very cozy place to come back to after long days out exploring New York. The subways are very close. We preferred heading up to broadway to catch our trains (Depending where we were going) only because it was much more pleasant on sunny days to be above grounds if we could. It was great to have all amenities available, and at such a reasonable price.The only thing I will mention is that if you do plan on sleeping in- it might not happen as they do have a newborn who you can sometimes hear in the morning if you are a light sleeper.
Overall,  I would recommend you stay at Alex & Shailas airbnb! It was a great and pleasant environment.
We felt very happy those days at the home of Alex and Shaila. It is a very warm and comfortable place, it was like being at home.
Great host. Very clean, nice place and friendly people. Thanks again!

Wir waren begeistert von unserem Aufenthalt in der Wohnung von Shaila und Alex.
Sie sind sehr aufmerksame und gut organisierte Gastgeber. 
Die Wohnung ist/war sehr sauber und toll ausgestattet.
Die Lage ist super um schnell in die City zu gelangen.
Wir würden gerne wiederkommen.

The apartment was very clean and spacious. Alex was very friendly and helpful. The subway station was a ten minute walk, the ride to downtown Manhattan is only twenty minutes or so. 
The only downside is that the neighbourhood does not feel very safe, particularly at nights.

The stay at Alex and Shaila's was great. The apartment has plenty of space. It's also spotless and well decorated (I noticed something new everyday). We used street parking with no problems finding a spot. If your looking to stay in Brooklyn this is the place I'd suggest. 

The neighborhood is family oriented with a great block party mural on the street. There are several restaurants around but if your looking to go to the park slope or Williamsburg area, I suggest a cab. The subways are not too far away, if you prefer to take them. 

Lastly, I was concerned about bed-stuy's crime in the past. I'd say those days are behind it. Some areas still have problems but they are far from the apartment and nothing out of the ordinary for a large city. Use your head, and everything will be fine.

Le logement était parfait: quartier calme, accueillant.
Nos hôtes charmants et discrets.
Beaucoup d'attrait pour cet appartement avec de nombreuses facilités d'accès par métro et bus.

The apartment was wonderful! Everything was clean and stylish. The kitchen had everything we needed, the ac worked great, and the bed was comfy. The neighborhood was very charming and friendly; there is even a block party mural next to the house! The subway to Manhattan was nearby and am easy commute. The host host was friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this rental!

The apartment was fantastically clean, spacious and well furnished. The kitchen is great for people that like too cook at home. The bed was comfortable and spacious.  The apartment is in a nice, friendly neighbourhood, is a 10 minute walk from the subway and 30 minutes from central Manhattan.  We couldn't have wanted a better place to stay. Highly recommended.
Had a great time in Brooklyn. Alex was a great host and was very helpful

Very spacious and super clean appartment with tasteful furniture. 
The first two days we weren't sure if the area was safe (didn't feel very safe, especially after dawn) but after a couple of days we felt mor eand more comfortable. Nevertheless, the distance to the nearest subway station was pretty far which makes the appartment not very convenient for Manhatten visits.

The host was very helpful and friendly and the apartment was clean, accurately matching the description on the listing.
Thanks for the great stay.
The apartment was just as it looks on the pictures, very clean and nice. The Hosts Shaila & Alex are very friendly, gave us tips and offered us help, if we need it. I would recommend it!

Both Shaila and Alex were very welcoming and helpful. The apartment was as the pictures look liked, spacious and cool. We had to throw out some of the grocery's other people left as they were a bit fungy but were left with good intentions. 

When we arrived on a friday night we hoped we chose a good spot in Brooklyn. It was crowded and noisey and didn't feel safe. When we got up in the morning all things were different, everybody in the street was kind and greeted each other. But hey, you're in New York!

The restaurants in the neighborhood are great. Go for a meal to Peaches or Saraghina's, go for a delicious slice of pizza to Daddy Green's on Malcolm X and chill out with a glass of wine at Therapy. Definitely more laid back than in Manhattan. 

The only thing we would prefer is some carpet of a rug in the backside of their upper apartment. We are both medium sleepers and we woke up every morning when they and their son woke up, who is adorable though.

In the end we had a great stay for a reasonable price!!

We had a great stay at the apartment - it was clean and had everything we needed. Manhattan was easy to reach via public transportation and we always felt safe in the neighborhood. 
It was very easy to Communicator with Alex - all questions have been answered quickly and we got all the Information we needed and more. Highly recommended!

Really enjoyed our stay at Alex and Shaila's apartment. It was clean, spacious, well-equipped and situated in a pretty and quiet neighbourhood. Alex kindly gave us some recommendations for nearby establishments and the ones we went to were great, our faves were Saraghina and Peaches Hot House. 

The apartment is about a 10-15 walk to the subway and from there was about 20 mins on a train into Manhattan. 

The only small negative was a slightly creaky bed but overall we loved staying here and highly recommend it to others visiting NYC. 

Thanks Shaila and Alex!

The apartment was great. It looked exactly as on the pictures and it was very clean. They definitely made an effort in furnishing and decorating this place. Very cool. 

Shaila and Alex had been very pleasant and helpful to us. They prepared a little guide with handy tips for their neighborhood. It was easy to get the keys even as they were out of town when we arrived.   

In the apartment as well as in the neighborhood we felt safe all the time.

O apartamento é exatamente como mostrado nas fotos. Claro, acolhedor e a cama é super-confortável. Shaila e Alex são muito simpáticos e prestativos. O bairro é seguro, com vizinhança tranquila. O apartamento não é tão perto do metrô, mas isso só é problema em dias de chuva (mas nada que um quarda-chuva não resolva). Recomendo.

The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures. And of course, cozy and the bed is very comfortable. Shaila and Alex are very nice and helpful. The neighborhood is safe with neighbors quiet. The apartment is not too close to the subway, but it's just a problem in rainy days (it's not a big deal, an umbrella can help you). Higly recommend.

The flat is in a very nice neighborhood, Alex gave us a lot of helpful tipps to find our way around. A baggage storage and a streched out check out due to our late flight was no problem either. We will definitely come back next time!

We´ve had great days at Shaila & Alex flat. It was clean and comfortable, we did not miss anything. The location is about 30 mins. away from Manhattan and 15 min away from Brooklyn Bedford Ave. Thx again for the nice hosting! Thumbs up for this location to stay during holidays in NY!

We had a wonderful stay at Shaila & Alex's apartment! They were excellent to communicate with, most helpful and forthcoming with advice. The apartment is super clean, spacious and comfortable. It is incredibly well set up with everything you could need.  This is also a super location and gives you another sense of NY beyond the Manhattan experience. Highly recommend staying here and would love to come back!

Es war ein wahrhaft perfekter Urlaub in einer wunderschönen Stadt und besonders bei sehr, sehr guten Gastgebern! Shaila und Alex haben nichts zu wünschen übrig gelassen: es war alles sauber die Schlüsselübergabe hat problemlos geklappt, Alex hat uns alles erklärt, wir bekamen einen Neighborhood-Guide persönlich angefertigt von beiden!
