Small shops near by to stock up on groceries, bake goods, wine, etc. Jimbo's is an excellent Greek bar and grill one block away that has entertainment 6 nights a week. Paid short and long term parking available 2 blocks away. Excellent NYC stay!

We had a wonderful stay. Having the whole apartment was lovely and there was all the privacy we needed. The apartment was impeccably clean and in a great area! Adorable and even better in person. I would definitely recommend this apartment to all and would totally stay here again when in Astoria!

Sejour parfait , gabriel est un hote incroyablement gentil et comprehensif , il a tout fait pour faciliter notre sejour familiale. Le quartier d'astoria est incroyablement vivant , tout se trouve a proximité , metro, marché, supermarché, restaurants , magasins ...parfait.
Exactly as described, replies almost instantly and the place is only 2 minutes from the subway station. Very quiet and comfortable.
Place was clean, very well decorated and easy to get to.  I had a very nice stay.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I've stayed in probably 5-10 airbnbs in NYC, this was the best one in terms of single apartment. Really wonderful stay and honestly you are so close to the subway that its also a very well connected area (when MTA is running properly of course =P). Regarless of that, Gabriel is a super host, makes everything easy going. The flat is beautiful and comfy. I'd stay here again for sure.
Great location near subway and lots of great restaurants.  Sparkling clean!
Great neighborhood and great apartment! Very close to subway and amazing restaurants. Nice and clean space. Hosts were kind, communicative and accommodating. Would recommend.
Nice place to stay. Gabriel was a good host.

We had an amazing stay at Gabe's apartment. It was beautiful, bright and spacious. We felt relaxed and at ease the whole time. The location was ideal, steps away from the train and restaurants. An excellent find in a great neighborhood :)
Great location, host, and house. Highly recommend.

Great location right near the subway stop and main streets in Queens, which was ideal. Very clean apartment which we used as a home base for our trip. The host was very helpful and quick to respond to messages
Très bon air bnb
This is such an amazing spot! Super cool and chic. Great amenities and the host were amazing and very accommodating. Loved the neighborhood and the entire experience! Definitely highly recommend!

Gabriel and Mirta's place is so nice! It's a duplex apartment, so there is an upper and lower floor within one apartment. The upper floor contains the bathroom and the kitchen, which are spacious and clean. The bedroom is in the lower floor, with comfortable bed, a huge sofa, and TV. The place was sparkling clean and the location was great, short walk to the subway station and to amenities like Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts. Check in was smooth, and because the room was on the ground floor, we had no difficulty lugging our suitcases. Highly recommend!

name: The Local Nook // Cozy Kona Hale
summary: Our cozy and comfortable one bedroom Ohana is handcrafted from the walls itself to the artwork on them! Enjoy Kona coffee out on the patio or watch the sunset from our amazing view. Our cheery Ohana is located in the heart of Kona and five minutes drive away from the closest beach. - fast wifi - fresh clean towels and linens
space: Hello! We're Caleb + Cece. We are a husband and wife photography team that calls for a bit of traveling through out the year! We converted our parents garage into our comfy dwelling space back in 2013 when we got married. Our goal was to keep life simple and focus on our passion. This also allowed for us to travel for months on end at a time more conveniently.  Anyways, we have been heavily traveling for about three years and most years find ourselves gone just as much as we are home. We LOVE Airbnb and the experiences we've gained from staying at cute/quaint little homes all over the world. This inspired us to open up our personal home to welcome like minded travelers, adventurous couples, and business minded people like ourselves into our home. All that we ask is that you respect our little home and fully enjoy yourselves :) About the space : Our space is equipped with a full kitchen and dining area, simple living room, bedroom, full bathroom, outdoor half enclosed room, patio garden
description: Our cozy and comfortable one bedroom Ohana is handcrafted from the walls itself to the artwork on them! Enjoy Kona coffee out on the patio or watch the sunset from our amazing view. Our cheery Ohana is located in the heart of Kona and five minutes drive away from the closest beach. - fast wifi - fresh clean towels and linens Hello! We're Caleb + Cece. We are a husband and wife photography team that calls for a bit of traveling through out the year! We converted our parents garage into our comfy dwelling space back in 2013 when we got married. Our goal was to keep life simple and focus on our passion. This also allowed for us to travel for months on end at a time more conveniently.  Anyways, we have been heavily traveling for about three years and most years find ourselves gone just as much as we are home. We LOVE Airbnb and the experiences we've gained from staying at cute/quaint little homes all over the world. This inspired us to open up our personal home to welcome like minded trave
neighborhood_overview: Because we live in a local Hawaiian family neighborhood, we ask that our guests also treat our neighbors and other locals with respect. Thank you! :)
notes: Maid service is available on request! This involves towel/bedding laundry, kitchen, bathroom, and floors. Violet or Niki will be watering all indoor and outdoor plants on Tuesdays and Fridays at 3pm.
transit: Our space is conveniently located above two main highways. We are approximately 5 minutes away from Costco, 5 minutes away from other grocery stores, 10 minutes away from the airport, 10 minutes away from downtown, and 5 minutes away from the closest beach. We recommend renting a car during your stay as our island is vast and all of the best adventures call for driving.
access: The main entrance is to the right through the white gate in front of your parking stall. We ask that guest please enter this way to give our parents and yourselves some extra privacy, though there is another entry door to the left in front of the main house entrance.
interaction: If you are staying in our home then this usually means that we will be away traveling. We try to keep our phones on hand but may not be available at times due to work or being out of the country. You will always have a host/house manager to contact if we are unavailable :)
house_rules: Quiet hours are from 9pm - 7am. Please remove shoes before entering home. Only one vehicle allowed per booking. Must tolerate kitties as our kitties do roam the property + patio :) We regularly treat our home and property for bug/pest control. Our vendors use an organic material as we have a sustainable home. But please keep in mind that we do live in the tropics and bugs can be inevitable, especially certain times of year.  Here are some things we recommend to keep the critters away : - always clean up any food or cooking messes - do not leave any food out on counters  - we also suggest keeping your shoes inside as well - keep natural bug spray handy while in the outdoors   It was quite an adjustment for us moving to the tropics from the mainland so we always like for our guests to be prepared, especially when visiting the wet side of the island! :) Basic cleaning supplies are available for any unusual messes or accidents. Please wash dishes and take out trash prior to check out. All

host.host_about:
native hawaiian, native american, welsh, + spanish. 

traveling photographer based in Hawaii. lover of the outdoors, simplicity, travel, making music, creative art, and my love Caleb.

(URL HIDDEN)

reviews.comments: Cute little house!  Had a wonderful stay! Close to downtown Kona.  House was welcoming and homey. Would definitely stay there again.

My husband and I had an absolutely incredible stay at The Local Nook. Incredible interior decor, comfy bed, good location, great communication from hosts. 
Our stay was the highlight of Kona for us!
Sophie and Nick xxx
Very cute place- beautifully decorated. Good location!

We loved this place! Its incredible what can be done with a garage! The interior design is exactly how it looks on the pictures. You feel like living in a magazine. The only thing you have to know is that you need a car for everything. But you probably need that anyway. By car all the shops, beaches and restaurants are very close. We would love to come back!:)

Super nice interior decoration! You can have ideal days with adorable cats in this house! If you have a car you can reach everywhere. Very comfortable location in very quiet residential area. Ciara is super nice owner and very helpful for the people who come to Kona for the first time!

The Local Nook was the perfect getaway for us! It was so refreshing to check into a place that instantly felt like home. Cece was an incredible host and had the best recommendations when it came to activities and restaurants. And, we adore Kitty Girl! Thanks Caleb and Cece!
Wonderful stay!

The Nook is even more beautiful than the pictures show! It is absolutely gorgeous. Fully stocked kitchen, nice comfortable space to share some down time, and VERY comfortable bed and linens. Ciara had some spot-on recommendation for where to go for coffee, food and groceries, and her communication was 100% - even going so far as to ask her neighbors to be respectful of quiet time during 4th of July celebrations, with no expectation from us that she'd do so. VERY thoughtful. Highly recommend!!

The house is located only 5 minutes to town and we enjoyed both the quiet neighborhood and easy access to bustling shopping/ food and attraction sites. We love the tastefully decorated interior: everything is so homelike! We'd definitely recommend this place!

The Nook is as beautiful as in the pictures, and even cozier than it looks. The location is perfect, close to a grocery store, top restaurants, beaches, and most of the Kailua-Kona-Kohala activites, without the big touristy crowds of the Koahala coast. It's also an easy hour drive for farther activites such as exploring Hawi and the Pololu Valley, the Waipio Valley, Waimea or stargazing on the Mauna Kea. We found it very convenient :)
Ciara was very very responsive to any request or issues we had, and we appreciated it. We felt welcome, and it was a wonderful home away from home :) We highly recommend it!!

Choose Ciara‘s place if you want to feel at home during your stay. It not only provides everything one needs but also offers a great atmosphere. There are millions of warmly decorated details and ideas that will inspire you. And all animal lovers will be charmed by the two kitties living there. Located very close to Kona but nevertheless in a calm neighborhood, it is a perfect starting point for exploring the western but also northern and southern parts of the island. Supermarkets, restaurants etc. are less than a 10 minute drive away. It definitely was one of the best Airbnb’s we ever stayed at. Even though we could not meet Ciara, she always responded quickly and there were detailed and helpful instructions that explained everything. We would immediately stay there again!

The Little Nook was a wonderful place to stay in on the Big Island. The hosts made the space feel welcoming and very cozy. Like the hosts and any visitor would suggest, renting a car is the best choice for transportation. Access to restaurants, public facilities, and other places are all without much hassle. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Hawaii!
Cozy place, feels like being at home! Nice decoration, good comunication! Ar conditionar in the bedroom! All perfect!

Beautiful home. If felt like we were staying in a bohemian chic boutique.The air conditioning was sufficient for the bedroom, and everything was very bright and cheery. The outdoor shower and outdoor daybed were exceptional touches as well. This would be a lovely Bungalo to snuggle up in With the book. Cat lovers will adore the resident (though optional) felines. 

This side of the island is known for large and plentiful bugs however.  While very few are inside, you may want to leave your sneakers behind closed doors. Definitely recommend this Home.

Mahalo!
Great space, very beautiful and perfect for our stay

Ciara and Caleb’s home is just unreal. From the perfectly styled nooks, luxe day bed, to the view of gorgeous pastel sunsets, it is an extremely well thought out place to relax. The organic soaps, snorkelling gear and other thoughtful details were spot on, as were Ciara’s recommendations of food spots, beaches and must sees. Couldn’t get any better really.
Cozy, stylish, and conveniently located place in Kona. Highly recommended

Adorable little hidden gem right in a residential neighborhood. We had the awesome experience of feeling like a local while at the same time feeling cozy and on vacation. Close enough to town that we didn’t have any kind of lengthy drives, but close the gate and we suddenly escaped to our own private vacation getaway. “Local Nook” really is the perfect way to describe this charming place! 

Thank you for opening your home to us!

I love Ciara’s place. She has really nice touches and the pictures are beyond beautiful. I stayed for three nights. My first night was smooth, second night ran into some spiders but I can deal with them and then my third night my fear of roaches was upon me. I tried to wing it but then the roaches decided to have wings of their own. I had to leave my last night around 1 am to get a hotel. Otherwise this place was affordable and in a great location. Close to the restaurants and shops. Also near the airport.

My boyfriend and I came on a vacation and had the BEST time! The local nook is perfect. It’s like living in Pinterest. Hah. It’s a cozy space but with plenty of room! I lived on the outdoor bed and my bf loved the outdoor shower. It truly is a magical place. And so close to lots of shops and restaurants. We loved staying local rather than going to a blah hotel. The space is adorable and we enjoyed being able to do our own thing. We even found a small beach nearby with sooo many sea turtles! You will definitely need a car for this location but if you want to stay like a local- you can’t do better than the local nook. We would highly recommend- can’t beat the price either. Can’t say enough good things.
Clean place with easy access to Kailua. Knowledgeable and helpful host with good communication.

Had a great stay at Ciara’s place. Creative, cozy, and well-located space, which made exploring around the west side of the island very easy! Would come back and Airbnb and here again on a future trip!

Stylish beautiful quiet home. It’s close to the airport, beaches, and downtown. It also had air conditioning in the room, so it was amazing to have at night! They have some adorable kitties that loved to visit us in the mornings. Loved our stay and we hope to be back one day!
Nice and quiet place, approx 10 min ride away from Kona. Lovely cats :)
Cozy place away from the tourist area and a short drive to town and all the local acivities. We enjoyed our stay and hope to be back some tim ein the future.

name: Apartamento en casco antiguo
summary: Apartamento en el centro del casco antiguo de Barcelona, a 50 mts del mar, a 1 minuto de Las Ramblas, Borne, Plaza Real y Barceloneta.
space: Apartamento con gran salón, cocina-comedor, ideal para 3 o 4 huéspedes. Equipado con el ajuar completo de habitaciones y con los utensilios de cocina y baño.
description: Apartamento en el centro del casco antiguo de Barcelona, a 50 mts del mar, a 1 minuto de Las Ramblas, Borne, Plaza Real y Barceloneta. Apartamento con gran salón, cocina-comedor, ideal para 3 o 4 huéspedes. Equipado con el ajuar completo de habitaciones y con los utensilios de cocina y baño. Amplios armarios en las dos situaciones. Me podréis localizar a cualquier hora del día. Os podré ayudar para que vuestra estancia sea lo mas cómoda posible. Edificio típico del casco antiguo, calles estrechas llenas de bares y comercios dedicados exclusivamente a turistas. Bien comunicado con las estaciones de metro, autobuses y tren. Fácil de moverse por la ciudad. Entregamos la vivienda en perfecto estado, queremos que lo cuides como si fuera tuyo.
neighborhood_overview: Edificio típico del casco antiguo, calles estrechas llenas de bares y comercios dedicados exclusivamente a turistas.
notes: Entregamos la vivienda en perfecto estado, queremos que lo cuides como si fuera tuyo.
transit: Bien comunicado con las estaciones de metro, autobuses y tren. Fácil de moverse por la ciudad.
access: Amplios armarios en las dos situaciones.
interaction: Me podréis localizar a cualquier hora del día. Os podré ayudar para que vuestra estancia sea lo mas cómoda posible.
house_rules: - No hacer ruido a partir de la 10 pm. - La normativa del ayuntamiento de Barcelona obliga a formalizar contrato de alquiler - Contratación de limpieza obligatoria semanal de dos horas - Suministros (agua, luz y gas) se ha de pagar al anfitrión directamente y el coste es de     150€ mensuales - Pasadas las 22h se cobrara recargo de 35€ para hacer el check in

reviews.comments: Amazing condo, great host. The perfect air BnB experience

We had a phenomenal time and full experience at this apartment. Luis is a wonderful host, an excellent guy and was overly helpful whenever he could lend a recommendation or helpful hand. The apartment itself is spacious, clean, a great place to live in a perfect location. You're in the heart of the Gothic neighborhood close to culture, architecture, supermarkets and restaurants. We spent two months here and enjoyed every minute of it.

Muy buen piso, muy recomendable. El piso esta muy bien equipado y es muy acogedor. Bien situado. El dueño Luis es encantador, nos ha ayudado mucho y ha estado disponible todo el rato. Muy atento con nosotras.
Great friendly Host in a clean and very spacious apartment. Good location - great stay.

The Apartment is centrally located.  Its close to Las Ramblas and the beach.  The unit is updated and clean.  The bathroom and the kitchen have a small window opening to the outside.  The windows in the Living room open into the stairwell.  Two bedrooms have a small balcony opening up into the alleyway.  Mariatchi Bar is downstairs.  Its great to get a drink just downstairs but it can get a bit noisy at night on the weekends.  (Because the buildings are so close together, any normal conversation seems loud as the sound bounces off the buildings)  Overall, Luis has an awesome place and I would definitely come back next year when I visit Barcelona.

Sobre todo q hay mucho ruido de noche y los colchones (Website hidden by Airbnb) calle de noche está muy fea pero no se mete nadie contigo pero si da miedo y hay mucho escándalo y gente bebida en la calle
The host canceled this reservation 174 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Museum Mile 1 BR - Madison Ave
summary: Welcome to our Madison Ave apartment. You will find this listing so charming, and well located. The apartment has a queen bedroom, balcony off the living room, and a spacious living room with a sleep sofa, and desk.
space: This space will be the perfect home away from home for you. There's a spacious living room with a private balcony off the living area. The bedroom has a queen sized bed, night table, and dresser.
description: Welcome to our Madison Ave apartment. You will find this listing so charming, and well located. The apartment has a queen bedroom, balcony off the living room, and a spacious living room with a sleep sofa, and desk. This space will be the perfect home away from home for you. There's a spacious living room with a private balcony off the living area. The bedroom has a queen sized bed, night table, and dresser. We are here to help you throughout the booking process, and your stay. Whether you need a restaurant recommendation, or help with something during your stay, we've got you covered. The apartment is conveniently located on the Upper East Side, just one block from museum mile, and central park. Just a short stroll to famous museums like the Guggenheim, and the Met. There are also world famous shops, and restaurants nearby. The 4,5,6, Express trains are just a few blocks away, and there's also the crosstown bus in case you want to cross over the park.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is conveniently located on the Upper East Side, just one block from museum mile, and central park. Just a short stroll to famous museums like the Guggenheim, and the Met. There are also world famous shops, and restaurants nearby.
transit: The 4,5,6, Express trains are just a few blocks away, and there's also the crosstown bus in case you want to cross over the park.
interaction: We are here to help you throughout the booking process, and your stay. Whether you need a restaurant recommendation, or help with something during your stay, we've got you covered.
house_rules: 1) All reservations must be for full calendar month's (move-in date on the first of the month, and move-out date on the last day of the month). If the apartment vacancy is mid month, then the move in date should be on that date, and move out date on the last day of the month. WE CAN NOT ACCOMMODATE PARTIAL MONTH STAYS.  2) We reserve the right to show the unit to prospective renters during your stay. This will only be done on Monday-Friday between 12-5 pm. We will also give you one days advance notice.   3) The minimum stay is one month. This applies to all guests that may occupy the apartment.   4) Utilities are included in the rental rate. However, there is a $250 monthly utility cap. If your utilities exceed this amount, then the tenant must pay the difference.

reviews.comments:
I stayed at USA Stay's apartment for a little over 2 months while I was on a business trip in New York. Excellent location if you prefer a quiet neighborhood. There is quite a number of restaurants and shops close by and it is only two blocks away to Central Park. Public transportation is within walkable distance too. 
Please note that you will need to buy some necessities such as trash bags, shampoos and so on as this is not an apartment that someone currently lives in (more of a hotel style with an empty furnished room). Also the streets could be a little loud at night because it faces to Madison Avenue. The service calls were handled promptly. Check in and out were easy. 
Overall I enjoyed my stay at this apartment and would recommend it to anyone who prefers a convenient location but not right into midtown where the traffics are.

This apartment is perfect for one person or couples staying in NYC for a long period and looking to experience the real Upper East Side, with its beautiful residences, shops and restaurants. The location is prime, very easy to hop on a bus or subway and make it anywhere. Nightlife is not big around, it's actually quiet and nice at night. Dave from USA Stay was super nice and helped solving certain issues that came up. The communication was great. There's a little market and cleaners downstairs, which is super convenient, and a Duane Read/Walgreens a couple of blocks away. You'll be 1 block from Central Park and the apt itself is incredibly cozy. You'll feel at home. Thank you!

The location and service was outstanding. However, be aware that the apartment is old and therefore not well isolated. You hear traffic from Madison Avenue, your neighbours and noisy radiators. Sometimes the water will never get hot, forcing you to take cold showers. Radiators may not work on cold days.
We stayed for two months in a nice location but the apartment disappointed us, especially when we considered the high price of our 2 months stay.

The apartment is located at UES, one block from Central Park and within close proximity within several museums (The Met, Guggenheim, Copper Hewitt). Nearest subway station is on either 96th street (6 train) or 86th street (4,5,6 trains).

The apartment is on the third floor of the building. The neighbourhood is generally quiet with the exception of traffic noises and bus noises (there's a bus stop right below) but apart from that it's generally quiet at night. 

It's a cosy apartment, and has everything you would typically need. The small refrigerator works well, however do note that the freezer section doesn't work, so avoid purchasing items that require freezing. Wifi and cable TV works well too.

I had no problems with the hot water in the shower, but do note that it does take a few minutes for it to get hot. 

Communication was great and the host, he was always quick to respond to questions or any problems. I found them incredibly communicative and helpful. 

I stayed for a period of two months. I am seldom around during the day as I am at work, and am usually only around at night. 

Overall I am satisfied with the apartment and my stay. 

Thank you very much!

We do NOT recommend to stay in this apartment for several reasons. First, there are cockroaches. First thing we saw upon entering were cockroaches in the kitchen area - without even having any food around or cooking. This was not properly disclosed before arrival. Although they sent somebody over who laid out baits, the roaches did not disappear. Second, (at least) two times there were unannounced strangers entering the apartment in order to look at it or to even take pictures. We know because we were at the apartment at this time. Third, the apartment faces Madison Ave, so it is rather loud. In addition, the windows are not well sealed so it gets cold/hot easily. Overall, considering what you get, the apartment is overpriced. In addition to get the key, you have to travel across the city to pick it up - very inconveniently.

El sitio me pareció inmejorable, ni muy céntrico, ni muy alejado, y muy buenos transportes públicos, metro a 10 min. y autobus a piede casa.
El edificio es antiguo, escalera de madera y sin ascensor, pero muy bonito y con balconcillo, tipo Friends. Yo mismo vivo en un edificio antiguo.el apartamento estaba limpio excepto por la nevera, que tuvimos que limpiarla a fondo
Calefacción y aire acondicionado. Muy necesarios los dos porque las temperaturas son un poco extremas.
WiFi muy bueno, Potente (llegaba hasta la parada del autobús) y muy veloz. Televisión con múltiples canales
Los quince primeros días estuvimos cuatro personas (mis dos hijos) y estuvimos un poco justos (sofá-cama) pero después una pareja, y perfecto.
Le vendría bien al apartamento una mano de pintura.
Es tuvimos mes y medio y NYC es maravilloso, el sitio y el apartamento me encanto, salvo pequeñas cosas, y el anfitrion fue muy amable ya que nos dejó hacer el check out a la 1:00 pm.
La comunicación fue siempre por email
Good location & vintage interior

name: 1 bedroom in Astoria, Queens
summary: Newly renovated apartment in Astoria queens. Full sized bedroom with Queen bed. Apartment includes homely living room and full sized kitchen. Wifi and Cable. Heat and air conditioning in bedroom.
description: Newly renovated apartment in Astoria queens. Full sized bedroom with Queen bed. Apartment includes homely living room and full sized kitchen. Wifi and Cable. Heat and air conditioning in bedroom. You will have access to all areas of the apartment. Fell free too relax in the living room and enjoy cable tv and playstation. 10-12 minute walk from the N, Q subway and 15 minute walk to the F. Commute into midtown Manhattan is approx 25 minutes. You will be sharing the apartment with too young and outgoing Irish guys.
notes: You will be sharing the apartment with too young and outgoing Irish guys.
transit: 10-12 minute walk from the N, Q subway and 15 minute walk to the F. Commute into midtown Manhattan is approx 25 minutes.
access: You will have access to all areas of the apartment. Fell free too relax in the living room and enjoy cable tv and playstation.
house_rules: Please respect this area as your own.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: The Ohana at Volcanoes National Park!
summary: Ohana: noun, Hawaiian, 1) Extended Family, 2) Guesthouse. Explore the big island with your ohana at our ohana. No cleaning fee! More reviews than any other rental in Volcano! Free travel advice! The entire guesthouse is yours! A quiet, private base for exploring the park, Ka'u, Hilo, and Puna; just 4 minutes from the park gate! Great for couples! Space for families! With solar water heating we're green! All races, religions, colors, nationalities, orientations, and genders welcome!
space: Detached guest house with its own entry: one cozy bedroom with two queen beds, full bathroom, kitchen/living room with sofa-bed.
description: Ohana: noun, Hawaiian, 1) Extended Family, 2) Guesthouse. Explore the big island with your ohana at our ohana. No cleaning fee! More reviews than any other rental in Volcano! Free travel advice! The entire guesthouse is yours! A quiet, private base for exploring the park, Ka'u, Hilo, and Puna; just 4 minutes from the park gate! Great for couples! Space for families! With solar water heating we're green! All races, religions, colors, nationalities, orientations, and genders welcome! Detached guest house with its own entry: one cozy bedroom with two queen beds, full bathroom, kitchen/living room with sofa-bed. You get the whole guest house; called an "Ohana" in Hawaii. Someone is usually home at the main house, but if you need something give me a call, or better yet use the Airbnb app. The guest house is tucked away from the road behind the main house giving you serious privacy. It's quiet because there is almost no traffic. The neighborhood is literally a rain-forest, dominated by nativ
neighborhood_overview: The guest house is tucked away from the road behind the main house giving you serious privacy. It's quiet because there is almost no traffic. The neighborhood is literally a rain-forest, dominated by native ohia trees and giant tree ferns. Our skies are so dark that on clear nights the Milky Way is stunning. Four minutes from Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park on the Big Island, this is an ideal base for touring the park and is centrally located between Ka'u and Puna. The national park is currently closed except for the Kahuku Unit in Ka'u. In the village there are five restaurants, two general stores, and a post office - check out my Guidebook for the island at the bottom of this listing. A farmer's market is held in the village every Sunday where you can get food, local produce, coffee, honey, and crafts. Local food includes the Tuk Tuk Thai food truck, the Lava Rock Cafe, Thai Thai Bistro and Bar, Ohelo Cafe, Eagle's Lighthouse Cafe,  Ono cafe, and the upper scale Kilauea Lodge and Vol
notes: TRAVEL ADVICE: Due to Airbnb's new policy of allowing cancellations within two days of booking, I'm afraid I  cannot answer extensive planning questions until after 48 hours. MAP CENTER: The map center has maps and brochures, and a map of local restaurants including my own recommendations.  TV: There is a DVD player (no cable or broadcast TV) and toys and games for the kids. COFFEE and TEA: There is complementary coffee and tea by the coffee maker in the kitchen. GROCERIES: If you will be staying a while and doing any cooking, you should get groceries in Kona or Hilo before arriving. There are local general stores, but their selection is limited and the prices are higher. GRILL: If you would like to use the grill please ask. WATER and RAIN: The house is on a catchment water system, which is fine for bathing and washing dishes. Spring water is provided for drinking and cooking. There is cedar paneling throughout, so the house smells like cedar. Please understand that we get 9 FEET (2.7
transit: The only public transportation is an infrequent bus to Hilo. There is no Uber on the island. There are some taxi services in Hilo. Kona Airport (KOA) is 2.5 hours away. Hilo Airport (ITO) is 45 minutes away.
access: You get the whole guest house; called an "Ohana" in Hawaii.
interaction: Someone is usually home at the main house, but if you need something give me a call, or better yet use the Airbnb app.
house_rules: We value safety, so we will not tolerate illegal activity, and will call the police if necessary. We follow Airbnb's rules, so please do not try to book for other people, the person booking must be part of your group. Do not re-arrange furniture or take furniture outside. You make take the coat rack outside. Only plug the space heater into a wall outlet, do not plug the space heater into a lamp outlet. Do not use the space heater and hair dryer at the same time, that trips the circuit breaker. Guest must notify host by text that they are checking out.

host.host_about: I'm an ecologist for the National Park Service. I've studied and visited every national park in the central and west Pacific.

reviews.comments: Everything about this house was amazing. It was a great size, very clean and in a perfect location being just down the street from Volcanoes National Park. David was a fantastic host and extremely accommodating. I would recommend this location to anyone who visits Volcano.

Cozy studio tucked among greenery, and only 5-10 min from volcano national park. The best thing however, is that David is a trove of knowledge, and he has made a nice handy little booklet describing all the activities one can do in the area. It was supremely helpful. We had a great stay.

Nice, roomy living room.  Very clean!!  Appliances new and towels are soft.  Loved walking into the blue ray DVD showing of the Volcano.  Host gave excellent instructions to find house and easy checkout instructions.  The maps of the Volcano national park were also very helpful.  The location was excellent.  We made it to the ranger talk in the morning because we were so close.  Highly recommend this house.
The host canceled this reservation 89 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Needed to find some lodging for out-of-town family that were visiting.  When I explained to David that I needed to book a place for 2-3 people, mainly to sleep, he was very accommodating.  He was great at communicating  with directions and instructions, which made it easy for my family members to drive up the road from me and get to the place, even though it was late at night.  They said it was clean, spacious yet cozy and comfortable with a homey feeling and the beds were soft and relaxing.  They were grateful so mahalo, David!

David was full of good information. He took a lot of time to send me tips and recommendations before I even got there, which I really appreciated. The space was just as described and pictured, really easy to find and convenient to the National Park.  Loved being able to make coffee in the morning. Thank you David!

Nice space. Didn't actually meet David (he was working), but got to see the video he provided of the latest eruption of the volcano. Would have loved to spend more nights in the location... 1 night is not enough. 2-3 nights would be perfect to enjoy the Hilo side of the island.
Fantastic location to enjoy the volcano park and the house is great!

Fräscht, rymligt och trevligt boende nära parken. Kändes väldigt skönt att bo nära och slippa köra hela vägen i mörkret till kusten efter kvällsshowen vid vulkanen. David gav utmärkta tips anpassade för våra förutsättningar (två små barn) och tiden som vi hade tillgänglig. Han var för övrigt lätt att ha att göra med. Rekommenderar verkligen detta boende för ett par nätter vid vulkanen.

This was a perfect place for us (me, the wife, adult step son and two boys under seven). Located about four minutes from Volcano National Park. Two queen beds in a very comfortable bedroom that smells wonderful. Has a sleeper sofa in the living room/kitchen and great Wi-Fi. We booked online about 35 minutes before we showed up and startled Dave when we arrived but he had the place ready to go in no time. Texted me as soon as the room was ready. Honestly, I expected a total shack when we booked, but this place is amazing. Stay here, you'll love it.
David was great. Gave us great info on the lava veiwing and had a great time.
Great value for the space and location!
Great place just outside the park. Good value.
Great lava update emails and texts. Beautiful house, great location. We really appreciated the drinking water, coffee, and extra towels. This is a great place to stay. Thank you!

we had a very good jounrée volcano in David's apartment is really great, very clean with all you need to do is eat , we highly recommend this place to future travelers
Thank you again for your Home
This was a great place for us to spend the night after hiking out to see the lava! Great location and so much space.
The bnb was very clean and accommodating for our needs.  Very well kept up and had all of the necessities you would need on your trip

What an amazing accommodation! David was thorough with his instructions, and very thoughtful in all of the detail included in the house. We were so happy to have his expertise in how to plan our lava viewings. We had everything we needed and more! Thank you David!

Very convient to Volcanoes National Park.  Lovely setting and well landscaped yard.  David got back to us promptly.  We arrived late and he made it convenient for us to access the property.  For the price, a really great value.  Wonderful location to launch out into the area.

David was amazing. He gave us tons of information about volcanoes and current conditions out there. His place is impeccable. I would recommend it to anyone looking to stay close to the volcanoes. Super easy to go in and out. Just a great host and great place. One of the best Airbnb rentals yet! Would recommend to anybody looking for a short term rental.

We had a one night stay at David's guest house to visit the Volcano national Park and the Lava Flow.
Overall, I can highly recommend his place to everyone else. David is a great host, we received all relevant information in advance and also frequent updates in the currently Lava Flow, very helpful. 
The guest room is spacious, very clean, and very well equipped, e.g. trail maps, lava dvd, park information, drinking water, coffee, small flash light, etc was available for us to use. We slept very well as it got super quiet during the night.
Thank you David, hope we her a second chance to visit Volcana and to stay a bit longer next time.

Very cozy and comfortable. I just loved the house. Dave also gave us so much information about the volcano area and it was really useful to us. We will definitely choose Dave's place again if we have a chance to come back. Highly recommended!

I'm really glad we stayed here instead of one of the more expensive lodges or bed and breakfast places in Volcano. Dave's place is spacious and had everything we needed. Dave also gave great, up-to-date info about the park.

David à été très performant afin de nous informer sur les conditions climatiques exceptionnelles. L'appartement est situé très proche de l'entrée du park (15 minutes) ce qui rend l'accée très pratique lorsque l'on veut passer plusieurs jours dans le park. Nous conseillons ce logement pour un couple ou même une famille car il y a beaucoup d'espaces. Thanks David !!

Everything about this stay was great! David was totally available and helped us answer any and all questions we had. The space was clean and had everything we needed, plus maps! He kept us in the loop about storm progression and park closures. He even prepared a hurricane kit for us in the guest house with water and flashlights, etc. The location was ideal for going to the national park and only an hour to the lava viewing. Would totally stay here again.

David,
Provided several emails on reaching current lava flows and related Volcano National Park info.

When the two hurricanes threatened David provided links to weather info and park information.
He had flashlights, candles, and ice available.

The place was suitable for 3-5 quests and perfect for me. Located on a quiet residential street with easy access to national park.

One of my favorite things was David's guidebook to local attractions or all kinds--it was very useful.

I recommend David's place and I will stay again should my travels include the Big Island.
Amazing place to be your base of exploration!
The house is very clean and the location is very near the volcano national park. We stay there very comfortable and will choose it next time when we come again. Thanks David!
This was a great location for us, just outside Volcano National Park.  It met our needs and more.  My only regret is not booking an extra night!

We only spent one night in David's place but everything went great. We found the place clean and spacious for three people. Tea and drinkable water were provided in addition to all the good instructions that were given on what to visit and where to if you want to visit the Volcano national park.
David was very informative. Unit was as described. Very clean, well appointed. Easy to access. Great directions to get there. Great value. Thank you!
Great place, great location. Clean, easy communication with the host,

It was very nice place for staying for people who want to look around Volcano Park. 
David, the host, was very nice and he gave us good information. 
The house was very huge and independent so you are not going to be interrupted.
Accurate description; easy to locate from the volcanoes NP; great amenities and easy access to kalapana

We had a delightful time at this location.  The apartment is large and comfortable, set in a quiet location.  We really appreciated the little welcome touches, such as coffee, tea, and nice shampoo.  Also, David provides a terrific amount of personalized information to make your volcano experience as complete as possible.  He also responds quickly.  Thank you for a great stay.

David's guest house was perfect to relax after a day at the National Volcano Park. I would return here for a second stay without hesitation. Thank you David for all the valuable information made available to your guests to plan the day.

Wow, wow, wow - this stay was awesome. This Condo is unique, we like that style. Everything was clean, comfortable beds and everything that you need is available. We couldn't talk to David, but this condo is a real basis camp for the National Park and Lava Viewing (we did the hike to the ocean entry of the lava twice, because it's so beautiful!). David's maps, tour guide and little advices are very helpful.
We highly recommend this Condo!
David's place was exactly as described. It was easy to access and in a great location for volcano. The space was very clean and had everything we needed. Would definitely stay here again!
Great place!
Nice place, after a full day in the national park it was great to come back to a well-furnished place with all the necessary amenities.

离火山口很近,房东人好,房子大设施齐全,最喜欢的是房东提供了很多关于火山公园的地图和火山介绍,英语日语中文的宣传册｡房东耐心解答问题并推荐了好吃的餐馆,简直太方便了!
Away from the volcano is very near, the landlord is so nice, large house with full set of facilities, my favorite love is the landlord providing lots maps and brochures about the volcano national park in English, Japanese and Chinese. The landlord patiently answered the question and recommended a delicious restaurant to us, it is simply too convenient!
Great place and super convenient after a long day of lava viewing! Highly recommend!
Great quiet neighborhood, easy check in/out.

The listing as described was very low key; our host undersold the accommodation.  The location was very close to the park and to Volcano Village and while it was right off the highway, it was very quiet.  

Everything was better as described (and very clean) and we had all the privacy that we wanted in our getaway while having almost instant access to David through texts.  I would highly recommend staying here.
Best B&B I have ever lived. Big space, quiet, and the owner provides many information of volcano. Very nice! 超级棒!非常喜欢!
The accommodation was spacious, clean and excellent location for volcano park. Tip - try breakfast at the Volcano Hotel in the Park, great view of volcano while eating good food.

Our stay was perfect for our trip!  We needed a place for 4 people close to volcano national park to prepare for a backcountry hike.  David's place had everything we needed and we could not beat the fantastic value!  Perfectly located near the park in lush volcano, would be a great basecamp for all kinds of Big Island adventures.  Would definitely stay here again!

Dave is an excellent host! He's very knowledgeable of the whole area. Just read the guidebook that he posted. He spent the time to explain to us the best options to utilize our time to the fullest. We really enjoyed our stay!
Had a great stay on short notice. Very comfortable abs beautiful setting.
Great place for decent price. The place was clean, pretty big and contained plenty of detailed information  to visit volcano park and surroundings.

It was a perfect location to the park and the Volcano village. We wished we would of stay an extra night but this is our 1st time to the island so we had to split our time to different locations of the island. David was very helpful w/the park info and dining suggestions which we end up having a wonderful  dinner at the Rim w/a great view of the lava. We also had a great breakfast at the Kilauea Lodge. We love the scenic route that David suggested going back to Kona Kailua. Thanks again David!

Excellent place to stay, location great, clean, spacious, beds super comfy.  One of the best Airbnb I've stayed at, will definitely return.  Bonus were all the maps and info about the area.  Enjoyed having coffee and drinking water as well.
Clean, spacious, well-equipped, with excellent information provided on activities, restaurant options, etc, all conveniently placed in a binder and easy-to-read folders.
David's place is fabulous.  Clean, well equipped, superb location for volcano.  We will definitely come again if we visit the big island in the future.  Highly recommended.

The house was amazing and beautiful! David was very friendly and took time to give us more context about our visit. The info and maps he prepared about the volcano and park were really helpful and well-designed.

The location was awesome. My family and I were visiting volcanoes park and this house is less than 5 minutes away. Getting to the house was simple and easy. David really made things convenient with maps of the park displayed on the walls. He even printed out helpful sheets that told you how to navigate the park if you want to get up close to the volcano or see the lava. These sheets also told of nearby eateries  which saved us time in the evening and morning. We all enjoyed our stay very much.

David was an excellent host who gave a lot of great information via email and fast communication. The place was very clean and spacious with VERY comfortable beds! David also provided a lot of wonderful maps and information about the area in the room which made things like finding somewhere to eat a breeze! Also, location is very close to the main entrance of the park. Would absolutely stay there again!

David's place is spot on for location, space, and privacy. I was arriving early from a flight and he was gracious enough to allow me to drop my bags off early and basically check in before the 3pm time. 
Check out his suggestions and tips for the area and volcanoes national park - he really has gone out of his way to provide guests key information on hiking, sights, restaurants, etc.  Two thumbs up!!
I highly recommend staying at David's guest house and hope to have another opportunity in the future. 
Oh, and he has great coffee available that was a real treat!

Mahalo
We came off of a National Park trail and within 15 min of booking were unpacking our bags at Dave's. Great space, great value, very clean.  Would stay here again, thanks.
低点很好找,住宿很安静｡David会告诉哪些景点不错,并且会告诉如何去,非常棒

Its a big and clean appartment and we had everything we needed. We didnt see david, but we had good contact per mail. He gave us good information for visiting the kilauea- volcan and around. He had free coffee, tea and water. That was so nice. Thanks!

Great place if you are visiting Volcanoes National Park! David gave us excellent tips to plan our hikes and is very knowledgeable about the local area/ park. The place was very spacious and clean and had lot of relevant information related to the national park. I would definitely recommend this place and stay again if I get the opportunity.

This property is located just a couple minutes drive to the National Park. It is a very large space with 1 bedroom (2 Queens), one bathroom, and full kitchen w/very large dining/living area. Everything was clean and well stocked! I really appreciated the zip lock bags I found in the kitchen! This is a perfect property for your home-base while exploring Volcano National Park. I will stay here again!

Most convenient location to viewing the volcano.  Good basic accommodations with thoughtful touches such as Kona coffee and a selection of teas, maps and visitor information galore, down comforters on beds.  Nice large sleeping and living quarters for a family of 4-6.
Thanks David!

From start to finish Dave was an excellent host. The unit was perfect for our family and my young kids enjoyed the toys that were available. We really enjoyed our time in Volcano National Park and this was a great place to explore from. We would definitely consider staying here again in the future.
David is a wonderful host, very helpful and kind.

위치 좋음
물, 손전등, 그릇등 필요한 모든게 갖춰져있음
화산섬에 대한 정보도, 아이들이 가지고 놀수있는 장난감도 !
데이빗은 친절했고 비록 하루였지만
정말 편안하게 묵을수있었음

We only stayed one night here, just a quick trip from Kona over to the park, but everything was great! Super affordable, everything we needed, easy entry, David was really responsive, it couldn't have worked out better!

Davids place is a perfectly located little cottage very close to the Volcano National Park. Anything you need is available: towels, coffee, body wash, shampoo... the rooms are clean and there is nothing you can complain about. We only spent one night at their place and it was perfect. David and his wife are super nice and communication was easy during the entire time. I can totally recommend this place without restriction of any kind.

David was an awesome host and knew a ton about the Volcano National Park. The bed was super comfy and the location was fantastic. I would highly recommend David's place to any travelers coming through Volcano!

Location, location, location! Just a couple of miles from the park; we went in/out of the park 3 times one day! The unit was spacious, clean, and quiet. David had Park maps and hike guides in the unit - made it very convenient to plan how to explore the park before arriving there.
David's place is quiet, clean, spacious and comfort. My family had a great time. I would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Volcano area.

The place was absolutely lovely, and our host Dave was great! We came to the Big Island because my dad's a geology nerd and he HAD to see the volcanoes. Dave's place is the perfect base for volcano viewing! The wifi was a little slow at times, but we made do with the Netflix and with disconnecting and actually enjoying nature! The place is like a little "cabin in the woods", connected to the host's place. Dave was very accommodating, providing anything we asked for! If you're planning on seeing the volcanoes (or even just exploring the east side of Big Island), this is a wonderful place to stay.

David's place is a perfect base for visiting the volcanoes park, spacious, well equipped, and conveniently located.  And David himself is a wonderful host, responsive and enthusiastic in giving suggestions on visiting the volcanoes, can't thank him enough for his hospitality.

A great base for exploring Volcano NP with the added bonus of plenty of maps and brochures available in the unit to help plan our days. The unit had everything we needed and the tin of Christmas baking was a lovely surprise. Thank you.
周囲の案内などが丁寧に記載された冊子があり､滞在中とても役に立ちました｡

David's place is enormous. More than adequate for the 4 of us. It was spotless and fully equipped with kitchen and all amenities. Brochures and information for hiking and dining in the area was provided. David was always available to assist. Great location, close to The Volcano National Park yet private. A definite stay here again if we visit the area. Thanks David.

The location of David's studio is great for volcanoes lovers and very quiet. Beds are very comfortable, linen of good taste. We did not use the kitchen. David provides a bunch of leaflets about the volcano area very useful. I wish we would have met David personally as he lives next door. This is why we like AirBnB. He only communicates by texting... Maybe i am old school, i like to meet people.

As advertised, this is a fantastic place to stay if you plan on visiting Volcanoes National Park (it's only a 5 minute drive from the entrance) and/or the current lava flow. David has great info and is an incredibly helpful host. 10/10!

Great place, with a  great owner!!
David was very helpful from the moment we booked.  As soon as we booked he sent us helpful tips about the best way to enjoy the volcano.  He also provided us with the latest update on the lava flow and the best ways to see it.  I sent him several messages asking questions and he responded within a few hours.
The place was easy to find, very clean and lots of space.  There were 3 of us, but the place could sleep 6 easily.  Very close to the national park.
Overall everything was great, would come back there.

David's self-contained guest house is super clean, completely equipped (and i do mean completely), and is the perfect base for exploring the Volcano. Also there is every kind of information about the area. Quiet, spacious, convenient, clean and comfortable. Thanks David!

An absolute wonderful place to stay.   It was easy to get to, and a very pleasant place to stay.  The remarkable part about this place is the absolutely wonderful information provided about the area and the volcano tourist area.  Full menus on area restaurants and recommendations on family friendly locations was given and the first hand, up-to-date info on the volcano tourist areas was provided ahead of our stay.  We would stay here again.  A+

David has a fantastic guest house. Clean, cozy, and has all the amenities one might need when visiting Volcanoes National Park. 

While we only met David briefly, he was very cordial and seems like a seasoned pro when it comes to hosting. I highly recommend checking his place out if you're in the area.
Great place to stay, if you want to visit Volcanoes National Park for a whole day or two.
Really cool place to stay in the volcano village. Everything is very nearby. And David is the perfect host. The house is amazing

Great location in Volcano, just minutes from restaurants and park entrance.  Dave provides an abundance of maps and information on local restaurants and sights to see.  My husband also enjoyed Netflix while we stayed there.  I recommend staying here if you are visiting the volcano.

David was awesome! We only stayed one night, but his guest house was very comfortable to stay in and I'd absolutely stay there multiple nights if I was in the area. David also provides maps and extensive information about the Volcano National Park as well as food and other things to do in the area. It was extremely helpful to have all of that information right there when we walked in!
화산 국립공원 근처에 위치하여 관광하기에 너무 좋았으며.. 깨끗한 집이 너무 만족스러웠습니다. 전자레인지, 오븐 등 full kitchens 이 갖추어있어 요리해 먹기에도 충분한 곳이였습니다. 볼케이노 근처 숙소를 찾으신다면 강력 추천합니다.

An excellent base camp for Volcano National Park! David provided maps, hike suggestions and a binder with his recommendations across the island. He was prompt to respond to any questions or requests (he even came over to discuss where to find local food), the beds were comfortable and the kitchen had everything we could want (providing local coffee is a nice touch). Very large and comfortable for two, we felt spoiled by the space. Would stay again next time we are on the big island!
Very close to the park, clean rooms and a well equipped kitchen. We just stayed for 1 night but enjoyed our stay.
A great stay, great place, great accommodations, great location, and great trip.  Dave and his space was top notch!

I definitely recommend this place for everyone! Very quiet eariea and restaurants are plenty. Also many informations are prepared by owner. He gave us lots information to get lava viewing spot. It was really helped me out. Hope I can come back here some time in a future! Mahalo.

The location of David's place was perfect for our planned itinerary. It was really close to the park's entrance. David thought of everything, he included maps, menus and free bottled water! Communication with him was also clear and quick. Thank you, David!
It's clean, large space, good for family. Close to volcano park, located in quiet jungle. David provide very detail information about the lava flow viewing.

It was very clean, comfortable and convenient house!
He prepared a lot of information of these area for us.
It is realty help us too!
Parking lot is also big! it is easy to park.
I would stay again next time!!
Great place for location, privacy, quiet, comfortable bed, great shower, lots of park information, local attractions listings and lava flow updates. Highly recommended.

We stayed here 2 nights to spend time in Volcanoes Nat'l Park. The house is very conveniently located near the park and the museum with night-time viewing of the Kilauea crater with lava bubbling up. The house is spacious with a well-equipped kitchen, lots of extra blankets, and comfortable living room. A real bonus is all the park information provided to help plan the time in the park.

First of all we would like to thank David for excellent communication prior and also during our stay. He provided us with all information we needed (lava flow,restaurants,..etc)

The guesthouse is located in the rainforest near Volcano National Park, with proximity of restaurants, shops.
The quality of sleep was one of the best we experienced on Big Island. We hope to be back there again soon

David has a very comfortable and clean private home which we thoroughly enjoyed. He provided an abundance of information about not only Volcano National Park but also the whole island. Very smooth check in and check out. He also provided us with some very valuable personal tips about viewing the lava flow into the ocean.

Davids, Volcano home was perfect for our family stay right outside the National Park enterance. Our host was knowledgeable, a great communicator and provided a clean and comfortable space! We would love to stay again!

It was a very comfortable house.  Our kids loved the toys and Netflix videos.  We also enjoyed watching the dvd about volcano activity.  David was very kind and gave us a lot of advices on the tour around that area.  I would surely recommend the house especially for volcano watch.

Great place for families. Full kitchen. Good location yet secluded. Close to restaurants and to Volcanoes National Park. Provides detailed information about the area and was very helpful when we couldn't figure out the DVD. Highly recommend. Price was fair.

Easy to find, flexible, clean and there were trail maps and guides in the house and menus for local restaurants. Quiet neighborhood close to Volcanoes National Park. We also found the beds comfortable.

Our family of 4 stayed one night and used David's place as a base camp during our 2 day visit to Volcanoes National Park. David's home is ideally situated in a very quiet neighborhood a few minutes drive to local restaurants and the Park entrance. The apartment is separate from David's house and felt very private. The furnishings were attractive and comfortable. Perhaps best of all was all the information David provided about how to prepare for and what to see in the Park, which is a huge area with many options which we could not have optimized without David's input. He also provided menus of all the restaurants in town and a dynamite documentary on the local volcanoes. We had a thoroughly good time day and night!

Location is two miles from entrance to National Park (Volcanoes). David provided helpful maps of the park and a list of nearby breakfast, lunch and dinner choices with copies of the menus in a binder, as well as several brochures.  Good communication and very helpful tips when you book your stay.  Would recommend.  (Because of the very humid climate, David's place may smell musty, which he clearly states in his description).

I very much enjoyed my stay at David's place.  Perfect location for exploring Volcanoes National Park.  Unit was spacious, clean and comfortable.  David provided a lot of information about the National Park and accessing active lava flows.  I would definitely stay here again!
We loved our stay!! David was great and the house was too!
Great place to stay before watching Lava!!
Great location for visit to Volcanoes National Park!

We really enjoyed our two nights at David's place. It was very clean, organized, and everything we needed was provided. The best part was all of the information provided about the national park, lava viewing, nearby restaurants, and local attractions. A lot of time and effort was obviously spent compiling this info.  We would definitely recommend and stay again.
Short & sweet: Quite, clean, spacious, very peaceful place. Within minutes of good, gas, Volcanoes National Park and excellent recommendations for things to do.

This place is awesome! It has everything you need and even more. We felt directly at home. The house is really clean, the kitchen and bathroom as well. There are maps about all the different trails in the house and you can even watch some movies. I would definitely come to this place again!

Though we never met David personally, his communication was clear, descriptions of the area, restaurants, sites to visit were all helpful. He has kept all the materials relevant to our visit to the area clearly marked and organized well. He found the eye glass left out and be prompt to let us know and we picked up on time. Thank you David. We will recommend your place to everyone.

Even though we only stayed one night, we enjoyed staing at David's house very much! The accomodation was very clean and comfortable. What we appretiated the most was the great amount of up-to-date information materials available in the house about what to do in the area, where to go for dinner or breakfast, etc. We also met David in person for a while and he suggested to go and see the lava lake after sunset. It was only like a 10-minute drive from the house and an amazing experience!
i loved the location and the place. it's really close to the volcano national park.

David is a very responsive, thorough, and kind host.  The space he offers is very clean and well-equipped.  I stayed there with my mother and friend and we all were more than satisfied with our stay.  The beds in this space are especially comfortable.

David's place is awesome!  It's comfortable and close to the park.  He has compiled an great list of recommendations about the park, including hikes and restaurants.  There are also brochures you can take along with you.

The place is well stocked and the beds are great!  It was the perfect respite after backpacking in the park.  Mahalo David!
David was very prompt giving us great advice regarding activities in Volcano and in answering all our questions regarding  the Big Island. Thanks

Excellent location as a base for viewing Volcano activity. The self contained house was very clean, well appointed and David provided excellent advice for our trip, including free maps. Highly recommended!
My brother & I had a good stay at David's place. The check-in was easy, the instructions good, & the amenities as advertised. The lava information was very helpful. Overall a good stay.

What a great place to stay, quiet, comfortable and in a good location near the volcano park. Really liked how David included maps of the park and info about places to eat. Clear instructions on checking out and internet connection. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks David!

A very nice and comfortable cottage, perfect for a family of 4. A good location for exploring the volcano national park and the Hilo area. David is very friendly, answers very quickly when you write to him and gave good advice on what to see.
Wonderful place!

Très bonne adresse que l' on recommande. Emplacement juste à côté du parc. Des votre reservation, David donne plein dinformations utiles pour les visites et trails.
Au niveau du logement, propre, spacieux, on se sent bien accueilli( avec en prime des bières fraîches dans le frigidaire); et tout ce dont vous avez besoin ( infos des trails, cartes, lieu où dinner)! Très bonne adresse! N'hésitez pas !

Great location for exploring Volcanoes Nat'l Park; park gate is 5 mins drive away. Completely separate home behind the host's home in residential neighbourhood of Volcano townsite. Very helpful information provided on where to eat nearby, get groceries, and things to explore in the national park and beyond. We drove ~45 mins from here to also see Rainbow Falls near Hilo; worth it just for the banyan tree forest alone!  Appreciated the few toys for the kids to play with. Place can sleep up to 6 ppl, if each person shares a bed.

It's quite a long drive from the Kona airport. But it's great that it's so close to the national park.  David is very helpful and left us a lot of information! Thanks!!  The room does have some smell due to humidity and ceder.
음식을 준비해가면 지내는데 더욱 좋을 것 같습니다. 깨끗하고 1박 머무르는데 불편한 점 전혀 없었습니다. 가격대비 시설, 환경 모두 훌륭합니다.

David's place is really a good place for you if you want to go to the Volcano national park. And in the house, David provides all the information you need, like food, map, even restaurant menu with several languages.

It was very pleasant stay at david's place. It took only 10 mins from volcano park, so it was perfect place to visit volcano park. We could see many stars at yard. David gave a lot of information of lavas and surrounding restaurants.

This place is right outside of the Volcano National park, a good location if you want to stay a night close to the park to view the lava at night.  The house is next to the owner's main house, feels safe.  The place is neat, with cooking utensils and all the basic seasoning like salt, pepper, sugar, cooking oil, toaster ovens, full kitchen if you care to cook.  Also has distilled water for drinking, really nice of the owner to provide that.  There is detailed infos and pamphlets for the area (maps, restaurants).  Night lights everywhere. It's a little musky from the cedar of the house, but not bad.  David was very responsive to all my questions.
Very central, but also private.

We had a great stay! Incredibly convenient for visiting Volcano National Park. The lodgings themselves exceeded expectations - comfortable beds, a large kitchen, hot showers, and a huge amount of space for my fiance and I. David also provided a huge amount of recommendations and advice in a comprehensive binder about making the best of our time on the Big Island. Highly recommend!

I booked this accommodation for my sister and brother in law as they are not good with the internet. I have to say communication with David was excellent from the time I was choosing this accommodation right through to their checkout. Here is my brother in law's review of this great property 

My lovely wife and I found the accommodation clean, neat and tidy. It had a homely, welcoming atmosphere. The location is quite stunning and devoid of the unwanted noise associated with the usual tourist type hotels. The manager 'David' was more than happy to enlighten us with his vast knowledge of how best to enjoy the sights (at the same time making us aware of potential dangers regarding the volcano and it's surroundings). Our privacy was never encroached upon and the overall experience was awesome.

David is a great host. Very knowledgeable about surroundings of Volcano village. He explained us how and when to go visit Volcano park within 30 minutes for our whole day of trip to village. I highly recommend his location.
Great quiet spot. Amazing value!

David was an excellent host. The place was clean and very comfortable with all the amenities and comforts of home you need. David himself was extremely responsive and helped us with a wealth of information about the volcano park. Would recommend to everyone!

We had a great stay at David's house. It's big, with all ameneties necessary, very comfortable, clean, very quiet. Good for a family! Big thank you to David for the useful information prior our trip! Perfect location to visit the HawaiianVolcanos NP! Highly recommend David's house!

David is a perfect host.  He has a wealth of information about Volcano National Park and the surrounding area.  He emailed a lot of info prior to our arrival and he has an entire collection of printouts in several languages, neatly arranged upon your arrival.
His location is ideal for anyone going to visit the park.  It is easy to find, and within minutes of the park entrance.
The accommodations are very private, there are 2 beds in the bedroom, with additional pillows and blankets.  There is a pull out sofa for additional sleepers.  The table seats 8.  The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, tableware and utensils.  There is a coffee maker, coffee, creamer and sugar or sweetener available.
WIFI is available and there was a desk, both were appreciated by one of our group who needed to complete a work related project.
There was a very detailed manual that made checking out a breeze.
One of the kids left a t-shirt and David contacted us immediately.  We were still close enough to return for it, making for a happy child. 
I highly recommend David's place.
Great place! Close to the park and easy to find. They have everything you need!

This guest house is in a great location, and a very comfortable place to stay. Its a large place with all the basic amenitities you need when away from home. I would definitely stay here again if I ever make it out to that area again!

Our stay was short but sweet. We arrived late and couldn't open the lock box,but David quickly came out to help out. House is clean, comfy, and well equipped! We also experienced an earthquake in the morning, and David explained to use the magnitude and where it came from - very cool! Highly recommended.

We loved our stay in Volcano, and the rental was simply perfect! It was clean, well organized, roomy,  well stocked; and when we needed a needle and thread, it was there in 2 minutes! Plus there was no mosquitos, yay! Highly  recommended!

Great spot for family (spacious, clean, beautiful and calm area)

We recommend this place for a break and visit the volcano area

The place is clean and David is very accommodating, prompt in responding to questions and requests. I love that the car parking is just a step away from the doorway which is very convenient. I highly recommend this place.

Dave is very courteous and resourceful host who knows a lot about  the big island. In particular, he provided plenty of useful info about volcanoes national park. I'd highly recommend Dave to anyone without second thought.

It was wonderful accommodation for our family with clean space.  Moreover there are many information  for tourist about volcano. I was really enjoy the time with this house. 
Awesome house!!!  :D

We stayed at the guest house for one night in connection with a visit to Volcanoes National Park. It was easy to find, parking was a few steps from the door, and the place was perfect for our needs. It is a very short drive from the house to the Jaggar Museum observation area, so the night-time drive to see the  Kilauea Caldera was short and simple. The house itself was clean, comfortable, and cozy. It's easy to see why it has so many 5 star reviews. Highly recommended.

Davids place was quiet and close to the Volcano. Food supplies are limited in the area, recommend buying in Hilo or a large town if eating at the house.  Restaurant's  in the area are good but there are long lines at some.  The only complaint I had was not having warmer clothing.  The day we were at the Volcano the temperature was in the low sixties,  I expected the eighties
Great location, would recommend, info at the house was very helpful, house was as described. Great place for a couple day layover in volcano.

This place is super close to Volcano National Park.  If you're planning on spending at least two days exploring the park I would highly recommend it.  The sofa bed would be ok for children but maybe not for adults.  I enjoyed the large flatscreen tv with Netflix as an added bonus.  Overall a great place to rest your head and an awesome base camp for exploring the park.  David is a wonderful host.

It was very comfortable and clean, and David left out a lot of useful information in a binder about nearby eateries and things to see. He also provided everything we needed to know to see the lava flow. I didn't meet him myself but I had a great stay.
Nice quiet place near the park and volcano sights. Great info provided about the places to visit in the park and on the island. Would stay here again.

The lodging was ideal for our trip to Volcano National Park. My wife and two grandchildren ages 14 and 8 were able to get a good nights rest. Mattresses are firm, the place is clean and David provides lots of information about the lava viewing. I am 67 and highly recommend this place as family friendly.

Very well coordinated, stocked with all the information you need.  Very dark at night so will recommned checking in first thing when arriving (will also help you coordinate the food and rest of the trip), rather than arriving last thing at night like we did.  If you go from the Volcano, the directions to the home is on left side.  Great place and full Netflix!  Very easy and comfortable for my family.  David also responded right away to my texts and questions.

Highly recomended airbnb apartment. Location is great just 5 minutes from the Volcano park. The house can sleep 6 and super equiped. Maps to take with you. Everything needed to prepare meals.

Really great one night stay!  Easy check in and David was always available via text.  There were only two of us but the place is very spacious and comfortable.  Ideal for volcano visits!

This is a delightful place to stay.  The living area is spacious and comfortable.  Anything you want to know about Volcano is provided: park info (in more than one language!), restaurants, hiking. Wish we could have stayed longer to enjoy the accommodations and the national park.

We underestimated the length of time it would take at the lava flow so we didn't get in to his place until really late. He communicated with us even at that late hour. Witch I felt really bad about. We went directly to bed and woke up and the left. The apartment was a nice large space and he even sells snacks which we didn't know at the time but it is good to know because all of the restaurants and stores are closed by 9.  David has tons of info to share about the area in the apartment. I wish we would of had a little more time there!
Convenient location, clean, spacious, comfortable place.  Helpful host.

A spacious suite ideally for a family, David has prepared everything for the visitors, bath, Kitchen, maps, even menus of the nearby restaurants. Clean and tidy, quite place, 5 minutes drive to the volcano park. If come next time, we will consider to stay here again...

We loved out stay. This place is very clean and comfortable with everything you need. Great location near volcano. Also, full of information is provided about the park and nearby eateries. David is very kind and prompt in responding. Highly recommended.

David's place is five minutes from the Volcano Park entrance. The check in process was excellent- didn't have to use up valuable time meeting for the key exchange. He had information packets all over the place and even provides food for a discounted price! My best airbnb experience to date.

David's guest house is fantastic. My family and I had a great time there. It's only about 5 min drive to the entrance of the Volcano National Park. If you want to spend 1~2 days exploring the park and the surrounding area, this is the right place for you.

David's place is great for avid hikers as he has a lot of information about Volcano National Park. The place was clean, comfortable and very centrally located. Definitely recommend for those who want to spend some time exploring the area!

Very cute place located close to the Volcano National Park! David had so much helpful information hung on the walls--maps, brochures, restaurant menus, and a snack menu for purchase! Very thoughtful host. Great value for $130.
Great location when visiting Volcanoes National Park. Very close and full of information about the park.
Evertything was as described and better. Location is excellent.  And the accomidations were spacious and spotless with all the conveniences.

Anyone planning on visiting Volcanoes National Park should stay here! It's truly a gem. We couldn't have asked for a better location since it's right in the heart of Volcano, and it was spacious and clean with everything we needed. David has filled the place with all the information you could possibly need for your trip to Big Island, including National Park maps, recommendations, and even a binder full of local restaurants with details to help you decide where to eat. David was quick to respond and eager to help us with any questions. Fabulous!

The little house has plenty enough room and an adequate kitchen.  It is clean and the beds are comfortable.  The sofabed, not so much.  David leaves lots of information in the room for visitors to Volcanoes NP, and it is very helpful.  It is very peaceful and quiet.

The rental  was comfortable and very clean. We enjoyed our stay.

My wife and I enjoyed staying at David's place. His place is perfectly located for getting into and out of Volcano National Park with ease. Guest house was very cozy and could fit a whole family.  Very clean and convenient for Volcano National Park.  They are extremely helpful with providing a lot of information about the volcano. Will stay again!!
