David's place was a cozy cottage very close to Volcanoes National Park. If you plan to visit the Park, especially over multiple days, this is a perfect place to stay. David asks only for a value price, and you can find anything you expect to find in a bnb home. Great experience!

David's guest house is extremely convenient, clean and well-organized. Communication and check-in was very smooth, and he provides a wealth of resources to make your stay in Volcano as enjoyable as possible. Highly recommend!

This is THE place to stay when you visit Volcano. David gives amazing tips to see lava and the house is equipped with maps and information about the park. Extra brownie points for the binder that included restaurants nearby along with the menus. So awesome!
Great communication and directions! Good location near the national park! Fit 5 of us very comfortable. Appreciated David's attention to detail.
Fantastic tips and tricks for all things lava and Big Island
위치가 좋아서 화산국립공원 구경하기에는 최적이었음. 집전체 사용이라 편했고 깨끗했음. 다만 주변 자체가 비도 많이오고 하는 지역이라 이불이 약간 습한느낌이었지만 괜찮았음. 만족!!^^

We had a great time in David's Ohana house in Volcano. He was very easy to communicate with, gave great suggestions for things to do, left a binder full of ideas in the house for us and overall made our time in Volcano stress free! Highly recommended. Just be aware that the house has a catchment system for water and so you can't drink the tap water. This is well marked in the house and isn't a problem as David supplies you with as much spring water as you want for drinking. Just bring plenty of refillable water bottles for all the great hiking in the area!

You can tell a lot of thought was put into making this a comfortable stay for the guests.  Signs around the property, binder of menus for restaurants in the area, very clean (I mean very clean, not a spot or any mold noticed in the bathroom or kitchen areas where it would be expected), printouts of the trails for volcano park, beverages in the fridge.  Very impressed and overall just a good and clean experience.

Great place with quick access to the park. Easy to find. Couldn't ask for better.

Thoughtfully equipped with games, videos, and local area maps.  The family loved it.

David's apartment is great.
It's very clean and has a lot of details about trails in NVP, including maps and suggestions.
It's very close to the park as well.
I would definitely stay here again.

평소 에어비앤비를 많이 이용하는 편인데 이렇게 세심하게 안내하고 배려하는 호스트는 처음 만났습니다. 예약하자마자 숙소이용안내부터 화산국립공원 관람안내에 이르기까지 자세한 내용을 보내주었습니다. 숙소는 화산국립공원에서 단 5분거리에 위치해 있어 하루에도 여러차례 왔다갔다 할 수 있었고, 내부는 무척 깨끗하고 아늑했습니다. 풀키친이 갖추어져 있어 밥을 해먹을 수 있었고, 다양한 지도와 안내책자, 아이들 보드게임, 크레파스, 카드게임 등도 구비되어있어 가족여행으로 매우 추천하고 싶은 숙소입니다.
Our stay at Volcano was fantastic the house was open and comfortable. Enjoyed the information provided by our host about local attractions and the park. Wonderful hospitality, w

David was a great host and paid lots of attention to detail. When we first arrived, there were signs reassuring us we were at the right place, and a sign indicating exactly where to park. The unit itself was very clean and tidy, and even had pamphlets and maps everywhere of the park. David himself came over to give some tips about visiting the park. The location was great, with the park less than 10 minutes away. All in all, this was an excellent value.
David had so much information on the volcano, restaurants and even info on Hilo. Location was great, place was so clean and it was everything we needed and more. I highly recommend this airbnb.
Great place to stay if you want more than one day in Volcanoes National Park!  Super clean and just down the road.  Definitely recommend!

We sent there one night with our 3 years old daugther. It was just perfect and very clean. There is everthing you need. Would defenitly stay there again.

Waren eine Nacht mit unsere 3 jährigen Tochter dort. Alles perfekt und absolut sauber. Alles nötige ist vorhanden. Würden wieder dort einchecken.

Sommes reste ici pour une nuit avec notre pettite fille (3 ans). Tous perfect et très propre. Tous ce que vous avez besion est dissponible. Absolument une place à revenir.

Very close to volcano national park.  Great directions and maps available. The two regular beds were very comfortable.  The sofa bed was not very comfortable for my older children so I'd recommend this house to only be for four older children or adults. My 14 year old boy was having a hard time getting comfortable there.  Easy check in and very quick responses.  House was clean and well stocked.  Volcano area definitely needs 3 days to explore, in my opinion.

This place is THE place to stay if you're looking for a place close to Volcano National Park. My boyfriend and I took a quick weekend trip to the Big Island to explore Volcano. David's communication was too notch. As soon as I booked he sent an email full of tips! He checked in with me as our trip approached and had a very detailed list of instructions on how to find the place - it was super easy. We actually flew into Kona and when I texted David upon landing he even sent me tips of what to see along our drive over to Volcano. The house was easy to find and very accessible. It was super clean, and super spacious. The kitchen was fully stocked with kitchen equipment and David supplied plenty of other items such as cleaning items, towels, wash clothes, soap, shampoo, etc. One of my favorite parts was that David had maps and recommendations of everything in Volcano- from restaurant menus, activities, where to explore in the area, etc. By far the most prepared airbnb I've ever stayed in. I really wish we had more than 1.5 days there. Definitely recommend staying here if your agenda is focused on the Volcano National Park.
Great location to stay for treks and trails

David's  place was great. Amazing location minutes from the park, with tons of helpful information provided as well. The house has loads of nice extra family friendly touches, like board games and dvd's for kids. A fully equiped kitchen made eating in easy. All in all a great place to stay.

David's place was great. All of the hiking and general park info was invaluable. Great location- super close to the park. David was responsive and very helpful answering questions. Would definitely stay there again.
David was very accommodating for us and was very responsive as well even last minute. The maps were very helpful as well. Wish we had met him in person!

David has a great location for exploring the national park. His own homemade guide book notes are excellent and inside the guest house is a plethora of maps and more detailed information on making your stay in the park exceptional! Loved staying here!

화산공원 방문을 위해 2박 했습니다. 공원까지 2마일가량으로 매우 가까웠고 필요한 것이 대부분 갖추어져 있었어요. 동네가 수풀이 우거져 꼭 곰이 나올것 같 은 분위기였습니다. 지역이 습해서 제습기 가동은 필수입니다. 지대가 높다 보니 쌀쌀해서 아침 저녁에 긴팔옷을 챙겨야 합니다. 화산을 편리하게 즐기고 싶지만 공원 내 호텔이 부담스럽다면 이 마을이 딱입니다. 공원지도와 지역식당, 빅아일랜드 안내책자 등 여행자를 위한 세심한 배려가 돋보였습니다.

Great spot, check lava flows days before and plan hikes as Kalapana is good but access road is close to Hilo. The 1 mile hike on the closed crater loop road was very easy and nice, Pele's hair very visible all over the end of the road! No other hikers were there!

David is a great host. The property was in a perfect location and condition for hiking to see active lava. David had great suggestions for activities in the area and followed up to make sure everything went as planned. If you are looking to stay in the volcano area I highly recommend this Airbnb choice. 5 stars.

In addition to great location, value and a *very clean*, organized separate/private large apartmenet/home, David is an exceptional communicator. I found him very knowledgeable, concientous and willing to share salient, practical advice on maximizing our short time there. The location couldn't be more convenient and he couldn't have been more accommodating. Thanks again David!

very convenient to Volcanoes national park and there is a lot of helpful info about the activities to do at the park.

Amazing nights, chirping and stars!

If you’re looking for a comfy, clean, and convenient place to stay minutes from the National Park, this is it. David offers super helpful instructions and details on getting to and staying at the property. Everything is labeled and straightforward. There are maps and guidebooks to help you plan the best trip for you when exploring the park. Spacious digs with beautiful surroundings.

The unit is located within a couple of miles of the volcano park, which was very convenient, especially for evening viewing of the crater from Jagger Museum.  David also provided great information on hikes to do and best options for seeing lava flows.  there was also a very comprehensive guide for places to eat in a binder on the coffee table as well as area maps.  On the downside the beds were soft.  we were two couples, and my wife and I drew the sofa bed, even adding a mattress from one of the beds we still tended to roll into one another during the night.  Overall, however, based on location and the very helpful tips for things to do we thought this was a good option.  directions for how to find the unit and access to lockbox for entry were very clear.
Great location and space

If you're going to Volcanoes National Park, this is a great place to stay.  Perfect location right off a main highway going around the big island and super close to the Park.  Guest house is a good space and it's easy to tell David has thought of everything to make the stay perfectly accommodating.  Very comfortable place.
Great place to stay. I would recommend it and I would stay again. Host was great and gave awesome information about the area.

David's place was very clean and most comfortable with 2 large beds, fully equipped kitchen, large dining table set, big sofa-bed, clean space, and very well organized with plenty of maps, books, DVD, and information about the national park. You will find so much information in the living room which is way more than you can get at the visitor center, seriously. Also, David suggested places and things to do in the Big Island. Truly, I wished I started the first day of my week long vacation in the island at David's place first. I will definitely return back in the future and take full advantage of all the nice things of staying at David's.
After check out, I had trouble with my car and David helped to jump start, also brought breakfast which was so kind of him and totally appreciate that timely life saving help.

Love David’s place. It’s literally 5 mins away from volcano National Park. His tips were on the spot and the house is full of trail Maps and info around the area. lava eruption update dvd was very informative.

Perfect ohana! This is my favorite place I've stayed on any of the Hawaiian islands (and I lived on the Big Island for a year).

CLEAN:
So very clean throughout. Bathroom looked new it was so sparkling. Kitchen, bedroom, living room, sheets, towels, pillows, everything was amazingly clean.

HUGE SPACE:
Plenty of room for 6 people to sleep. Huge kitchen with extra large dining room that seats 8! Plus a desk, couch and lots of places to hang out inside and out.

AMAZINGLY THOUGHTFUL:
The house was filled with maps, local restaurant menus, hiking info, even a DVD of the volcano. It was great! David even has maps and info in tons of languages. He also has thoughtful signs, so the address is easy to spot, and you know where to park, which was especially great when arriving in the dark. Also the kitchen was stocked with coffee, tea, butter, condiments, microwave, toaster, clean utensils, etc. There were also games and things for kids to do, and there was wifi and David even provided Netflix. So thoughtful!

PRIVATE:
We arrived very late, and the lockbox was easy to use. I loved that I didn't have to disturb anyone that late and night, and we could let ourselves in at our convenience. The ohana is in the back of the property with lots of trees all around. It's extremely quiet. Zero coquis. Just peaceful silence. Also, the curtains kept the ohana dark in the morning, which was perfect for sleeping in.

GREAT COMMUNICATION:
David was a joy to communicate with. Quick responses every time, very friendly and welcoming. We didn't meet face to face, but he was incredibly available via text and Airbnb messaging.

Overall a great stay! I would love to bring my family back here, since it's a perfect home base to explore the Volcano National Park from. And so much more private and serene than a large hotel.

Mahalo nui loa for everything, David!

If you plan on visiting Volcano National Park this is the place to stay. Location is great, Dave provides tons of information and if your plan is to go for a few days the house is perfect for being on the go and having enough space for your gear. My friend and I had no real plan about the park other than we knew we wanted to go and a 5 minute chat with Dave really helped shape what type of experience we wanted and even things we didn't know about. Lots of great information!

My mother and I stayed here while we checked out Volcanoes National Park. David's place was super clean and cozy (he even had holiday decorations up!), and we appreciated being so close to the park to head back in the evening (to try and see the glow from the lava at the lookout from the Jagger Museum- unfortunately the weather didn't cooperate for us). We also had dinner at the Thai Thai Bistro & Bar in Volcano that hit the spot, and the staff was incredibly friendly. Overall- great place to stay!

The place was spotless and Dave took care of small small things like leaving notes about what food is available around and what hikes to do. Very comfortable space and direction to get there were very accurate.
Specious guest house, check-in was easy, location is convenient if travelling to Volcano National Park only, lots local tips provided.
Nice clean home. Great Volcano Park information!
Great cozy place and perfect location.
David's place was great! I would definitely stay again and recommend it to anyone seeking to explore the nearby volcano.

David's place was lovely. It was very close to the park and we were able to drive up to see the glow at night. There was a wide variety of information about the park and we could plan our hikes ahead of time and get there early to start. The house was very clean and had everything we needed for our stay. Thank you!
If you want to enjoy volcano tours, this is the best place for you to rest and prepare.
화산공원과 가까워 저녁 식사 후에도 재거뮤지엄에 다녀왔네요~~^^
Recommended

We stayed here for 2 nights and it was perfect for what we needed. We had to arrive late and ended up leaving very early morning but there was no trouble at all. We were out most of the days but David has maps and advice for different parts of the volcano to explore and the booklet with restaurants and places in the area were very nice touches. Thank you!

This place exceeded my expectations at every level. It was clean, convenient, well stocked and well maintained, just a couple of minutes from the park. The house has everything that you possibly need. The communication with the host was instant. My family and I simply called it a perfect home away from home. I can't  thank David enough for being so thoughtful with the house design and the amenities. The place has lots of the information about the park and it was a great help. Overall, the place is super nice and I would absolutely stay there again and again.

Nice experience. We were worried it would get cold but the space heater does fine. Plenty of info inside and everything is well organized and clearly labeled. Our first airbnb experience and a good one.
great place to stay

We stayed at David's place at it was perfect.  It was so close to the park that we went back and forth in just a few minutes.  David's place was very easy to find and was clean and had everything we needed.  David had lots of maps and guidebooks.  If we come back to Volcano, we will stay be David again.
Dave’s place was great! His thoughtful tips made our trip to Volcano wonderful! Thank you thank you thank you!

Wow! The home was clean and private with a kitchen, living room, bedroom and bathroom. In addition to the home being close to all Volcano had to offer David also provided the best information on traveling the Big Island! Must stay!

David's place is spacious and clean with very thoughtful touches all throughout the house. It's like an extension of the park visitor center with everything you need to know about the park! Great stay!
You can expect a good clean place in a great location and lots of help for directions and things to do from the owner David

Perfect location for volcano national park (i think!).  Unfortunately, did not get to go into the park due to government shutdown.  David provided personal recommendations and pointed out alternatives on a map.  He was kind and very helpful.  David had many personal touches - local food places and reviews, guide to big island, and lots of maps/brochures of the area.  Airbnb place is simple and clean.

Dave's place was as described and full of details/maps of local hikes and other things to do. Neat and tidy space which worked perfectly for our family of four.
Thanks for hosting us, Dave!
Mahalo!

David's home is in a prime location, right outside the national park. It's very clean and has lots of little extras, helpful information, maps, a few children's books and art box both of which my kids appreciated. Lots of attention to details! Would love to stay here again.
David's place is right outside of volcano national park. Made for quick access at night to see jaggar museum. David is super quick at responding as well.

David's place was very satisfied. We did not have any problem to find the place and to check-in at 10 PM. Room was warm with the help of heater, and hot water was fully provided. Especially, all the volcano travel information and local restaurants information (with menu) were very useful. I recommend future visitors to check-in at earliest so they can begin their volcano adventure journey with all the information. I will stay again at his place for my next visit, and recommend this place to my friends who plan to visit the volcano in future.
Great location , had plenty of tips for places to hike with maps and lots of great info.
It was a great location to explore Volcano  National Park from. We loved the maps and other info (like local restaurants) that were provided by the host!

David's place was perfect. It was just my girlfriend and myself but there was room for 2-4 more people (a second bed and a pullout couch) . The entire place was immaculate and he had plenty of information on the volcano and surrounding area.   I would definitely stay with him again.
We were looking for a place to situate near Volcano National park. David place was perfect and a great location. Additionally, the place was comfortable and clean. The Ohana was a great choice.
This place is perfect for exploring the park!  100% recommended.
Thanks for having us and thanks for all the clear instructions to your place.

David is a great host! He helped to answer every question I had prior to the trip and during our stay. His valuable guide helps us to plan a wonderful trip in Big Island. His house is right outside of the volcano national park which makes it very convenient to visit the park. I would definitely recommend staying in his house if you plan to visit big island.
晚上附近沒有路燈,要稍微找一下,其他部分都蠻好的
地點雖非市區,但離national park很近,如果要拜訪火山國家公園的朋友,這絕對是最佳的住宿選擇,David還貼心的分享local food,Thai food餐車上的餐點是大島上最美味的食物,我們念念不忘,非常感謝David推薦
David's place was very clean, accommodating and easy to get to. It is very kid friendly. The amenities were perfect and in full operational condition. We would definitely come back again.

Wonderful space, wonderful location. Also wonderful signage. In our entire trip on the Big Island, David's place had the clearest signage anywhere. Lovely carved wood signs with yellow lettering placed perfectly so our car headlights would hit them. We knew exactly where to drive, where to find the unit, and where to park. Given that we arrived well after dark with four tired teenagers, I cannot overstate how much I appreciated the signage.

The unit itself was also terrific. Two full beds in the bedroom, a queen sized sofa bed, and an air bed available by request. Bright and beautiful, with a DVD player and nice video library. Dave also had maps of Hawaii, guidebooks, suggested destinations, and local tips posted in the entryway.

Sadly, our schedule was such that we arrived late and left early. We only had one night on the Hilo side of the island. If I ever return to the Big Island, I would love to stay at David's place for a week. It would be the perfect base camp for exploring Volcano National Park and the Hilo side in general.

真的太喜欢David的房子了! 因为取得时候每天基本都在下雨阴天,客厅里是有点冷的,但是卧室却很贴心的方有电热扇,让我们可以在晚上暖和的入眠｡ David真的是很贴心的人,厨房调料用具应有尽有,还有专门准备了饮用水｡卫生间和厨房有贴有指示图,比那些别的房主只写一些文字提醒来的简单易懂｡最重要想要提的是,David准备了各种关于火山公园的各种地图和指示图在房间｡各种hiking看活火山的路线都画了出来｡在我们到达房子的前一天,David还特意给我发了详细的信息,帮我实时更新了活火山的情况｡总之是可以看出来David是个非常热爱生活和经营airbnb的｡
David’s place is great! He provided wonderful suggestions and info on hikes, lava viewing etc.  Excellent location. We recommend!

The Ohana was exactly as it was described. It was easy to locate and check-in was a breeze even late at night. It was even spacious enough for our family of 6. Its proximity to Volcano Park made it possible for our family to go back to the Museum Overlook even late at night for a view of the Caldera, as it was cloudy earlier in the day. The local tips provided by David was very helpful as well. I’d highly recommend staying at David’s place.

David's place was perfect for exploring the volcano! The proximity to the volcano allowed us to wake up early and see the lava from the Jaggar museum viewing spot. He provided many recommendations for volcano trails to explore as well as local food recommendations.
David’s place went above and beyond expectations! Stop searching for a place and book this ASAP!

David's guesthouse was in the perfect location for our excursion to see Kilauea and Volcanoes National Park.  There was plenty of space for the 6 of us to relax after a day of hiking and watching the glow of the lava.  He was a gracious host and a great communicator.  We look forward to our next trip to Volcano.
This place was a great spot for exploring everything Volcano.
Description is exactly what you get. Minutes away from Volcanos National Park. Great place for a family to stay.

My friends and I had a great stay! David gave us so many helpful tips for getting to the lava and what to see and expect when we got there. The place was comfortable and had everything we needed. Thanks again!
David’s place is an excellent location close to the national park. His hiking guides and tips are very helpful. Highly recommended!
Super convenient. David has great knowledge about the park and island. basically has everything you could want. Very helpful pictures on getting to the bnb. Mahalo!

Excellent stay as others have noted just a few minutes from Volcanoes National Park. Really appreciated all the helpful information available on the park and area restaurants as well as the extras provided like coffee. It's also very easy to find it as there are signs indicating exactly where it is and where to park. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place, all amenities anyone would need . Close to volcano. Host has lots of information for hiking, maps and more. I would stay here again.
This was a perfectly-located and well-priced base for our family excursions to Volcano NP and environs. David was very prompt in all his communications and the extra details about hikes were awesome
Great location, plenty of space and lots of good tips on nearby eateries and hiking trails.
Easy to check in and comfortable spot near National Park.

We stayed for one night to visit Hawaiʻi Volcanoes National Park. David's directions were spot-on! He provided great guides and maps for our hiking  adventures at Volcano. The place was serene and well-furnished with a fully-equipped kitchen for a family of 5. If you're an avid bird-watcher, the property is surrounded by a forest of ʻŌhiʻa trees so bring your binoculars!
Great quiet location, and packed full of Volcano National Park tips!  We loved the kona coffee!

Everything pictured is exactly as is. The signage getting to the house is very clear and direct. Communication with the host was very fluid. He is very responsive. Being able to check into our unit at anytime of day was very helpful to us as we were traveling around the island for a few days and needing to be very flexible with our schedule and the toddler that we had.We were able to arrive fairly late in the afternoon and make it to Volcano to rent bikes for the night bike adventure. We then made it in the morning to the top of the volcano and was able to see the park during the daylight as well. The price is spot on and the space that we had in the house was perfect. There was only three of us and we were able to spread out. Thank you for having us!

Excellent guest house enjoyed our stay - felt like a home away from home 
There were maps and the charts  for the places to eat they even had what was suitable for a child

Great place to stay with easy access to Volcanoes National Park.  The whole area is damp and cool which has some minor impact to the room but all in all comfortable accommodations with useful info/resources for local activities and food options.

I am satisfied with this stay at Davis’s cozy house. I am going to stay again.
Great location, great cookware, provided filtered water, big refrigerator. That is enough to us staying.

Thank you Davis .

Wonderful ohana! Spacious, very clean, super comfy beds, well-equipped kitchen. Short distance from Volcano town restaurants and stores, and the National Park.  Wifi had weak signal in much of the space but not a big deal unless you absolutely need to stream video while in the BR.

This is a very convenient spot to go to the volcano national park. 10 minutes to Jaggar Museum to watch the larva activity. The host was also very nice and experienced- he has a guide book for all the activities.
This guest house was just what we needed- convenient and sweet.
在火山公园旁边,离火山很近,如果参观火山公园超级推荐这一间民宿,房间内设施很齐全,非常方便!

Great place. Very private. Easy check-in and property access. Great proximity to Volcano National Park. Host provides good info on Park and current conditions (lava flows!). Lots of room, clean and comfortable. Highly recommendable and I would return without hesitation.

Dave was great and the space was excellent. Lots on information about visiting the park decorated the space. Check in was easy, the kitchen was handy. He recommended (and I would too) stopping at a grocery store in Hilo to pick up a few things so you can cook and have food for time at the park. Would stay agin!
David had everything we needed at his place. It’s located right next to the park and nearby restaurants. Perfect for what we were looking for!
Thank you for having me.
Great place to stay when visiting the Volcanoes National Park, has everything you need and David is very helpful with anything you need.

David's place is the perfect spot to stay when visiting the National Park. Unfortunately the park was closed when I stayed (May 2018) due to volcanic activity but it was only a five minute drive from the place. David also has a ton of information about the parks with an update board telling you about current happenings in the park. If you're looking to visit the park, then this is definately the place to stay.

We chose Dave’s place because he is clearly a local guru and he didn’t disappoint! He knows everything about the local area and that’s so valuable. Because if the current eruption we disappointingly couldn’t get into the National Park but he had plenty of other tips. It was a great place to stay. Good selection of board games that our 7yo loved too

Very easy check-in and great location to Volcanoes National Park.  David was Extremely knowledgeable about the volcano and all the issues surrounding the recent eruptions which obviously were beyond his control.   He was an excellent communicator and provided brochures, maps, and handouts with restaurant info.  Very organized!

Amazing, amazing, amazing! Unfortunately National Park is closed so we couldn’t go in and explore,  but we were excited to be near the action and safe. Volcano is gorgeous and we will definitely be back. Dave is awesome! Thank you!

David’s Ohana is in a great location. Just because the Volcanoes Park is closed does not mean you still can explore and see tons on the island. It’s in a great location. Very quiet, private, and calm. David was excellent with his communication and local tips/recommendations. We would absolutely book with David again if we are lucky enough to make it back to Volcano!

Great place to stay, you would especially like all the maps that’s put up in the house regarding the volcano national park and the big island.
Beautiful location, very close to the visitor center. And great value for money.
David pretty knows everything about Big Island and you can get really valuable suggestions regarding big island tourist spots.

Wonderfully thought out space and helpful host!! We had absolutely everything we could ever need and more. Dave sent us lots of great information about things to do and was very responsive to the one question we  had. We loved going back every night!! Thanks!!

All great. David has excellent knowledge of the Big Island, especially the Hilo area. We saw many amazing sights. It's 45 minutes away from Hilo so plan accordingly knowing Volcanoes National Park is closed. Still much to see, Green and Black beaches, Akaka and Rainbow falls, many great experiences. Right now, his price can't be beat.

This is by far one of the best Airbnb that I stayed at . Close to Volcano National park. And only 30 min from Hilo. Don't believe all the hype about the Volcano and the Lava. There is still alot to do here on the big island and all of Hawaii. Hope that this place is available next time I come back. I may have shot myself in the foot by saying that. 
SEMPER FI.

Have kids?  This is your place.  (Just left as the VOLCANO WAS ERUPTING, THIS PLACE IS SAFE!    The volcano is ONLY affecting 5% of the island, you are fine)!    We took our 7 and 3yo to Dave's place, and the place is beyond kid friendly.   Board games, kid books, and kid art bin!   My little found the plastic spider in the play bin and was ecstatic to scare older brother the whole time.   David responded within 10 minutes each time I sent a message, and when he asked if 7yo had found Lava Rock souvenir, I replied no.. in 3 minutes I saw him OUTSIDE hunting rocks for him!  We went outside and got a 45 min rock/lava seminar from him.  He is a BIOLOGIST!    My nerd kid was excited to find rocks and ask Dave "what is this"?    His wife went and captured a lizard for the 3yo to see.   The space:  is perfect for 4-5 people.    Toddler highchair in the kitchen!   Soap, shampoo/cond in the bath, fridge was stocked with some necessities (plus a nice bonus),  desk with outlets to charge and work on a computer, TV has no cable, but movies & DVD player there.  ABUNDANT island info, maps everywhere, maps on the wall with notes, and books to read about the island on the desk!    Do you like earthquakes?   Over 100 a day right now, we felt everything OVER a 3.0, and apparently slept thru the 5.8.  They are rolling, not jerky!  My7yo LOVED to experience this!    Dave found us an outlook to see the eruption on Fissure 8- at night it was gorgeous!   WIFI available for my kids tablets.   NOTE: Head to the grocery store BEFORE you head up!  There is a Foodland on the way up Highway 11- food prices up in Volcano are EXPENSIVE!  Stock up then head up the hill.   This place is 2 miles to the CLOSED Volcano park, and 40 minutes down to Hilo.    We drove more south to the amazing bakery and Black Sand Beach.  Sadly we could not enjoy the hikes in the closed park, but can't wait to come back one day!   We then left and went onto Kona for 7 days.   Thanks DAVE!

This is by far one of the best places we have stayed! Only downside is the Volcanos national park is closed due to a current eruption, but there is SO much more to see! We were close enough to be able to drive a short distance to see the red sky lit up from the lava at night, yet far enough away to be VERY safe. Seeing the lava light up the night sky was breathtaking and a once in a lifetime experience. Also close to Hilo including the amazing farmers market, Akaka falls, and a great little free zoo, highly recommended!

The house is SO clean. No bugs or dirt! Great info including maps and points of interest available for you. This place is warm and welcoming and has everything you need.

We were disappointed that after we booked Volcanoes National Park closed because it's really awesome to go at night and see the dome glow.  We ended up going staying anyway to visit some other local sites (Punalu'u Beach) and experience the frequent earthquakes (so very cool).  It was an unforgettable experience.  Where else can you go and spend the night on an active, erupting volcano???  There were NO gasses, NO ash, NO air quality issues.  Thanks David for encouraging us to come.  The local economy relies on tourism and we were happy to support both Pahoa and Volcano Village with our visits.

We stayed a couple nights with our two kids and found this rental to be clean, beds comfortable, and overall very family friendly.  Little details were appreciated like great board games and family movie selection, informative books on the big island, and information on places nearby to eat.  And as other reviewers stated, David was quick to respond and very knowledgeable.  Thank you for a comfortable stay!

Worth every penny! Come and enjoy the stay! You will experience earthquakes like a local! 

David has a nice place to share, great instruction, easy to communicate! The place is close to check out Lower Puna, winery and green sand beach.

It was nice and quiet. It was a bit far from Hilo, but a good distance to be from places like the black sand beach, Punaluu, and Puna. I’m sure if the volcano park had been open this would be the best place to stay.  There was still a lot to see though even with the park closed. 

I thought the coqui frogs would be an issue...they were not. Being stationed in the Midwest for 5 years coquis are nothing compared Cicaidas. 

We needed a pack and play and he had it all set up with a small mattress inside (which I am now buying for my pack and play at home). 

The only issue we had was connecting to the WiFi. It would work sometimes and then other times go out, but it wasn’t a big deal as we were on vacation and trying to stay off of electronics anyway. 

The place was clean and very kid friendly! I would highly recommend to anyone with children!
Very good communication with David, a well equipped house, a lot of information on possible outings.
Very comfortable space with a cabin vibe appropriate to the area. The owner provides helpful, accurate information on the area. Recommended!

David provides a lot of information about the area. The place has a lot of space and is quiet. For those looking for excitement we did feel a 5.3 earthquake and several smaller ones. Not much to see currently in Volcano but the Island and the area (Hilo) have a lot to offer, so definitely worth a visit.

Clean, quiet, conveniently located very close to Volcano National Park which was the entire reason for our trip.  Park was closed, so be sure to check before you go.  We did the Lava Boat Tour out of Hilo, which is just 40 minutes away.  The town of Volcano is quaint.  There are a couple of locations for food, plus the Volcano winery.  And if you are lucky like we were you'll get to feel the volcano being restless and work in an earthquake.  Host was good about communicating with us.

We had an amazing time at David's place!  
Despite the closure of Volcano National Park, there's still plenty to see and experience. 
Just an hour drive there's  Kalapana where we were walking on lava fields and  saw the red illuminated skies at night. (due to the ongoing lava flows)
Black Sand Beach near Punalu'u was amazing, we saw lots of turtles lying in the sand.
Also Green Sand Beach, which ist 90 minutes away is worth a visit.
But the most impressive thing was living near an active Volcano, we could feel the Earthquakes but at the same time felt very secure. (The Volcano is being monitored, so no need to worry!)
The house was very clean, quiet and private. The Kitchen was fully equipped, everything was sparkling clean. 
David is very knowledgeable about the region and Volcano NP and was happy to share his knowhow with us.  
We would definitively return.

What a great find!! 
The host (David)  is very pleasant & welcoming. He has added information boards, books, maps, etc. to make your visit special. 
He knows so much about the area and the home is a great location with parking  (Bonus!)! 
The information / home description  provided are all accurate. 
We hope to stay here again,  if this place is available for your requested dates, don’t hesitate, it won’t last! 
Thank!
David is truly an amazing host.  His place is clean and organized. It has many many thoughtful touches. I can't tell you how pleased I am with my stay.
David was a great host. The Ohana was clean, quiet and comfortable.

We enjoyed the stay and our great first experience through Airbnb. Definitely recommend this place.
Thanks,
Aravind.
호스트의 세심한 배려와 안내가 돋보이는 곳이며 산장 같은 분위기입니다

This was a great place located just a few short minutes from Volcano National Park.  The neighborhood is quiet and located  in the fern forest. The place was sparkling clean , beds we're so comfy, and the original and the decor gave a perfect ambiance for hikers to relax after a long day at the park.  Our host was polite and responsive.  He even left us really great recommendations on what to do in the area, including maps and restaurant guides.  There was also a great kitchen with lots of quality cookware, so we were able to make a nice dinner and play some board games.    This will certainly be our go-to spot when we come back to the area next year!

I very much enjoyed my stay at David's place. He had the most updated info for vocalno national park (handwritten comments on maps on whiteboard!!). Great proximity to the park entrance and nearby restaurants. Checkin and checkout processes were easy. Highly recommend stay at the ohana!
Roomy basic accommodations in a good location.
We had wonderful time in Volcano house. David provided very very useful information for Volcano park. My family  experienced awesome trekking and waching amazing scene. I hope to revisit the house.
Everything was great. Really cool place. Really well equipped. Wished we could of stayed longer. Great place to stay for longer. Perfect location for exploring the Volcano National Park.

David’s place is awesome! I have a family of 6, three adult children, a 7 year-old grandson, my wife and I was very comfortable  in the space. I had absolutely no physical contact with David but that’s exactly what we like. As locals to the island we really don’t need a big fuss, just tell us how to get in and we are good. The living space was clean and stocked with the fresh towels, linens, and kitchenware except the rice pot. We really enjoyed our time there and feel it was worth the money.

This place is immaculate, modern, stylish, and beautiful. The owners have done a wonderful job with their space, and we were amazed by its cleanliness, decor, style, and amenities. They have really set the bar high for future visits at other places! Thanks, David!

The house is perfectly located to visit the volcano, very convenient and fully equipped with plenty of games and toys for children. It is a great place to stay 1 or 2 nights to see the volcano. Unfortunately, most of the trails were close during our stay.
super clean and complete
Perfect Volcano Guest house to call home
Fantastic amenities and David left us great suggestions for things to do and see in the area!

The ohana was exactly as described, well-stocked with everything we needed and very comfortable to boot. We (my sister and I) were there for only one night and came in late, but David's directions were perfect (the rock wall confirms that you are at the right place) and the ohana was a cinch to find, even after dark on a very dark street! Easy entrance to a warm inviting room with a comfy sofa, a desk to set up your laptop, a large dining table, a very nice kitchen area with all of the appliances that you'll need and that all-essential item (for us, anyway) of coffee for the morning. This would be an ideal place for a family with young children, as there's a high chair and children's books, dvds, toys and games - dvds and games for adults as well. We instantly felt at home. The ohana worked for us very well with the two queen beds, but it's suitable for really any kind of group up to 5. The bathroom is well-stocked and there are plenty of towels; the temperature in the ohana was perfect for sleeping with the warm comforters on the beds.  There was a very useful book with menus of all of the local restaurants; the only one we had time to try was the Tuk Tuk Thai truck which was very good. We also went to the Volcano Winery and had a great time chatting with the staff plus trying their excellent wines ($5 for a flight of 7 wines, generously poured tastings). Our favorite was the pinot noir, but enjoyed all of them. A few minutes to the national park and David has the latest info on what trails are currently open, which was very helpful; note that at this time, most of the trails are NOT open. Lastly, when I had a last-minute semi-emergency back home and needed to call a number of people about the issue, my sister messaged David and he responded immediately and generously, allowing us to check out a half hour late. Excellent choice!

David’s Ohana was amazing! Better than any hotel I have ever been too! The beds were super comfy with the best comforters ever which is good for a cold night in volcano! They have everything you need in the kitchen even baby amenities like a high chair, sippy cups etc. They have movies, toys and bird games. My family and I really enjoyed uno. And for people who want to adventure they have really good tips on what to do there in Volcanoes National park and even information on what’s going on with the volcano! I Really recommend this place!
Beds were wicked comfortable!  Just the right space for our family while visiting the park.  The kids games were awesome and we had a lot of fun playing!
The house is cleaning and warm. We like here!

Our stay with David was outstanding.  Accurate description,  close proximity to Volcanoes National Park. Everything needed was supplied... tips for visiting the park, plenty of linens,  kitchen tools, & fresh drinking water. David was quick to respond & very hospitable. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Perfectly located, just off the main road that leads to the Volcano. Extremely organized with a full kitchen setup and coffee and tea ready to go. Nice blackout curtains in the bedroom if you want to sleep late. Tons of guidance on where to go and sightsee on the east side of the island.

We loved this place! Beds, linens and pillows were very comfortable. Excellent set up with private bed room and pull-out couch in the living room. The maps of Volcanoes National Park and information about things to do in the park was VERY helpful (much more than "standard" information), as well as great information on restaurants and hours of operation in town. Very nice selection of games and movies - highly recommend watching the video about volcanic activity 2004-2017, and wish we could have stayed longer to enjoy more games and movies.
Nice and clean place !

The place is very close to the Volcano National Park, which is fantastic.  Note that there are basically no grocery stores in or near the park (very different from Kona or Hilo) - wish we had taken this into consideration! Host is on premise in a neighboring house, so we just ran over to ask where salt and pepper were. Although there is one bedroom, the five of us slept just fine on two beds and one couch. No washer/drier. Thoughtful touches such as specialty lotions and a variety of teas.  I particularly enjoyed the passion fruit tea. Can't beat the location!
位置非常的棒,是一个林间小屋,距离火山公园五分钟的车程,晚上睡觉十分的惬意还能听到虫鸣和鸟叫｡为小朋友准备了很多玩具,孩子非常的开心设施非常的便利,周围有几家餐厅,但是没有超市,需要开车过去｡可惜的是我们去的时候没有熔岩喷发,但是火山公园也是很难忘的旅程｡

Tout était parfait, le cadre très calme, l'emplacement par rapport au parc, les installations et tout le confort dans l'ohana, les indications utiles préparées par David.
Franchement parfait. Je recommande vivement
很好｡

Great location, very close to volcano park. The house was clean but a little bit small for 5 people. David also provided his tour guide in house and hard copy maps, really helpful for those who are unfamiliar with volcano park.

Our stay at David’s place was great! Comfy and roomy, with a bunch of great info about the place and the area. We especially appreciated the whiteboard with information on what to do at Volcanoes National Park - with many closures there, it was great knowing what was open and worth spending our time on. Would definitely stay here again.

Great location very close to Volcano National Park, house is as described but better! Lots of thoughtful touches throughout. We appreciated having coffee, a well laid out kitchen w dishes and plates , nice body lotion etc!
nice cozy and clean

Amazing place, good location.
Good tips for travel around

It is the most quiet place I've never been to in any airbnb rentals. All our guests enjoyed the stay.  The place is very thoughtfully arranged for real laptop friendly desk and an alarm clock (seriously, a traveler needs to know the time too!). Tea, regular coffee and even decaffeinated! The dining table is large and has more than enough chairs for 6 guests as posted in the description.  It is too bad we couldn't stay longer due to the closure of the volcano site when we booked it so we didn't plan to stay longer than we would like.  Also, Dave kept up to date for the latest development of the volcano park and suggestion for visit during our short stay.

If you are going to Volcano National Park and are doing the long drive from Kona, this is an excellent place to stay. We saw all the sights in the park in one full day. We were very tired so having a place to stay was a must. Driving back to Kona tired and at night was not a good idea. This place fit our needs perfectly. The host has a book with restaurant suggestions which we used to find a place to eat. Once back the beds were comfortable and cozy. The place is very clean and roomy. My wife liked the decor. Everything in the guest house is very well organized and the host’s tips on how to see the sights in the park are excellent. The price is quite reasonable. The next day we drove back to Kona through Hilo and Highway 19 and got to see that very lush and green side of the island.

Clean, friendly, super communication. The place is very quiet. Drink water is provided. 
Comprehensive information about the visiting sites and good places on island too. 
We’re looking forward to coming back

David's place was great! Clean,  cute and even had a Christmas tree with lights on it! He provides up to date information of the area as well as maps, restaurants,  and other fun things to do on the island. He's easy to get in touch with,  communication is clear. It's very kid/ family friendly and a great place to relax after exploring all day.
Good place to stay with family. Clean and convenient.
Cozy house and good location, clean and quiet. We really enjoy our stay in Ohana

The Ohana is very thoughtfully stocked, every detail was clearly laid out. Very clean, and comfy beds. The pullout is very comfortable too. Lots of activities and movies for kids. Responsive host. Very convenient location!
We really loved host’s attention to each and every detail and the way they tried to ensure travelers can have a comfortable stay.
Very good experience in David's house. Recommend 4 to 5 member Family who would like to visit Volcano park!

David’s place was awesome! 

We flew in and had loose plans for the volcano. When we got to David’s Air BnB he had a giant map of the volcano and little hand outs of the surrounding crater. 

Talk about clutch! We quickly made plans for the following day and went straight to bed. 

The AirBnb was clean and cozy. The bed and linens were nice and thick as it was chilly. 

If we have an opportunity to visit again, we would definitely stay at his place!

A last minute, amazing respite from the rain and government shutdown! My husband and I were supposed to be backpacking in Volcano National Park, but due to the shutdown, we had nowhere to go.. on Christmas.. luckily, David saved our day. He has prepared his air B&B to be PERFECT for visitors. Families welcome with toys and movies and dishes, comfortable beds and so much information on the park! Thanks so much!!

Great place, great location, very responsive as host. We all really enjoyed the place. My kids thought it was perfect. Really liked all the information provided on maps and in binder. Will definitely recommend to friends, and hope to have the opportunity to come again.
Good!
Really a super Host!

Mahalo Nui for a wonderful stay at your place! We all wish we had booked your place for a longer period than just that one night. 

We felt at home and taken cared for, and we didn't miss anything. It was wonderful and we will book the same place in the future and recommend it to our friends.
Clean with large space. Helping tips with quick responses.
10/10 would recommend! close to the park, safe, quiet, comfortable... would definitely stay again!

If you are planning to spend at least a day in Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, BOOK THIS PLACE ASAP. It is located mere minutes from the park, and is a perfect home base for anyone looking for a comfy place to crash after spending hours on the trails -- so close, in fact, I came home and napped between hikes. It's also SO MUCH SPACE for the price, with thoughtful and hospitable touches, comfy beds, up-to-date information about goings on in HVNP, and great local restaurant recommendations. I cannot stress enough how lucky I was to snag this place, and how it made my time in Volcano that much more amazing.
Excellent logement :) nous avons particulièrement apprécié l'ambiance chaleureuse de The Ohana et la flexibilité et sympathie de David. Je recommande !
Great location, safe and comfortable! Great family stay. Very comfortable beds and nicely stocked kitchen!
很好,干净温馨周到,孩子为了玩儿房东准备的乐高,晚上都不肯睡觉
Very nice and clean house! Great location and easy to go to the Volcano National Park. David gives us lots of useful information. A NICE EXPERIENCE!

We were quite pleased with this air bnb property which we stayed in for one night.  It's obvious that the host - David -  put alot of thought into what he would need to offer his guests to make them feel like his place was a "home away from home" rather than just a place to stay! Thank you for doing this David! Check in and check out was easy-peazy (because his directions were very clear and accurate).   The place was clean.  It felt safe.   It was easy to find.  It was close to Hilo and the National Volcano Park.  My room mates enjoyed the wifi. The parking spot right outside the door of this private guest house was super handy.  Would we stay there again?  Definitely!
super good location and local stores and restaurants in the neighborhood. would recommend.

David's house is very beautiful, in a very quiet place. It's easy to follow David's directions and signs. According to the advice he gave, the restaurant could be found easily. Thai restaurant is good.
There are a lot of VCDs in the living room, but unfortunately we don't have enough time to enjoy them.
The bed is very comfortable and the bedroom has body lotion.We like it very much.
David is a very warm, careful host.we like it very much here, will definitely recommend to friends
很方便舒服的房子,离火山公园只有几分钟的车程｡房间里各种物品很齐全方便,还有很多给小朋友玩的玩具和影片｡房东还给提供了公园的最新情况,以及周边的餐馆信息,推荐!
We had a wonderful staying at David’s house. It is near to the Volcano Park. David provided us with complete suggestions about this area. We hope we could be here next time. Thank you!
Everything well organized, impressed of cleaness and local tips

This place is very close to the Hawaii Volcano  park entrance. David has excellent recommendations on what to do at the park and where to eat. It is a nice drive from Hilo where you can see waterfalls and go hiking. We had a great time and will stay in this place again.

His place was extremely convenient to visit the Volcano National Park and had everything we needed. The 1 bedroom unit was very spacious and he had a very good direction to his place and a good amount of local information that is helpful for visitors. He was friendly and very quick to response to our inquiries. I would definitely stay there again when we visit the Volcano National Park.
Great host, excellent location, wonderful tips

如果要去火山公園的話非常建議來!
地點佳､價格佳､房東還做了一本筆記包括附近餐廳的菜單都附上了!

乾淨整潔該有的都有,又安全｡
Great place for families and groups! Excellent communication and local tips!

name: Charming apartment with balcony
space: Great apartment of 80 m². Room with balcony, double bedroom with air-conditioning. Large living room with two double sofa-beds and ceiling fan. All reformed.  Cable TV, wireless internet. Ceramic floor clear, clean decor. Modern kitchen with granite countertops, with cooktop, microwave and duplex  refrigerator. Situated very near Rua Dias Ferreira, where is located the gastronomic center of Leblon, with bars and super trendy restaurants like Sushi Leblon, Zuka, Quadrucci, Brigitte, Venga. Close to supermarket, grocery, 5 minutes walk from the beach, easy access to public transport to the main tourist spots and other beaches. Excellent nightlife! Family residential building safely.

reviews.comments: Great apt. very conformtable with all the commodities. great location, host was very helpfull at all time. great experience!!! recommended
Muy buen departamento, la ubicación es excelente y estaba todo tal cual salia publicado. La coordinación con la anfitriona fue buena,.
The best neighborhood in Rio. Great apartment, wonderful host.
The apartment is wonderful and Silvia is a great host!

the location was perfect, half a block from Zona Sul Market and many restaurants and just 4 blocks from Leblon beach. The patio in the apartment was also a big plus! Silvia was very helpful and kind. she let us check out late which was very convenient.
Great place! I recommend it, and I would try to stay there again when i am back in Rio.

O apartamento tem excelente localização e muitos fatores positivos: andar térreo num prédio sem elevador, portaria até 22hrs e após esse horário ficamos com as chaves. Boa segurança. Proximidade de ótimos bares e restaurantes. 

Como pontos negativos destacamos a limpeza que percebia-se precária quando da nossa chegada, e alguns detalhes de manutenção: o ar condicionado não funcionava, nem a cafeteira elétrica. Como o calor era muito intenso o ar fez realmente falta!

No geral a experiência foi boa e o prós bem maiores que os contras. A Sílvia é também uma boa anfitriã. E esperamos voltar em breve.
Apartamento bem localizado e muito confortável, Silvia foi uma excelente anfitriã. Recomendamos muito

We loved Silvia's cosy apartment, especially the charming outdoor terrace. The location was absolutely superb, right in the heart of vibrant Leblon, which offers lots of great restaurants and bars and just a few blocks away from Leblon's nice quiet beach. We had no problems whatsoever, except that we weren't able to have hot showers which wasn't ideal, but nonetheless, we very much enjoyed our stay and would absolutely recommend this great apartment. Many thanks Silvia.

This apartment was perfect for me.  I loved it.  Best parts were sitting on the patio in the morning sun, clean and practical kitchen, bath and bedroom.  The location was stellar.  I walked to the beach daily. Great restaurants, markets and bars nearby.  Silvia was terrific at communicating with me. Sne was responsive and willing to help in any way.  She showed me around the apartment, provided tips, restaurant and bar recommendations, and to not over do it in the caprinas.  She's a doll.

A Silvia é ótima e sempre faz tudo para eu me sentir a vontade!
A descrição do anúncio é igual a realidade e todas as facilidades possíveis.

I had a terrific second stay at Silvia's apartment.  It was very easy to check and out.  Silvia, with Cristina's help, made me feel right at home.  I discovered even more restaurants and bars during my second visit.  Great place.

Overall our stay at Silvia's was great. The apartment's located within a 5 minute walk to many restaurants and bars as well as a 10 minute walk to the beach. The Leblon neighborhood is very safe and the building is also very secure (security guard during the day, tall gate out front, several doors to unlock in order to get into the building). Compared to Ipanema and Copacabana, the neighborhood is quieter and less touristy which made our Rio experience feel more authentic. The only downside is that the apartment is a tight squeeze if you have more than 3-4 people. We had a total of 5 girls and found that the apartment really only slept 4 "comfortably." The bedroom has an AC unit but the main area where the two sofa beds are located only has a fan. We were there during the height of the summer and whoever slept on the couch directly across from the TV had minimal air flow (the fan is directly above the first couch when you enter). While having the patio door opened helped a little, there was not much of a breeze due to the high walls on the patio. I would say that during the cooler months, the apartment sleeps 4 comfortably but during the summer only 3. Other than the air circulation/sleeping arrangement issues I would highly recommend this apartment due to its ideal location. Silvia is also a great host - she was very responsive and was super flexible with our check-in time. Overall we really enjoyed our stay in Rio at Silvia's!

Choosing Silvia's apartment was easy, because it reminded me of those lofts in Europe. It's very well decorated, bright, confortable and had all the amenities necessary for my 3 week stay. 
I travelled by myself from Perth, Australia, after 5 years away from Rio, to visit one of my sons, granddaughter and friends.  Leblon is the perfect place to be for holidays or business, and this apartment is 3 short blocs away from the beach, while supermarket, amazing bakeries, restaurants, "lanchonetes", are just around the corner, 1 to 5 minutes away.  
The one bedroom apartment is exactly how t's described, on the street level of an old building and has a very charming terrace. During the day, there are two nice gentlemen, "porteiros", who take care of the entrance and us :). They keep the building safe and very clean. At night, the residents and I had the appropriate keys to lock the main gate outside and the main building door. Very safe building and apartment. I did not have any issues and all the residents were very kind and polite. Brazilians are amazing people. 
Leblon is also very central, close to Ipanema  and Gávea (both walking distance), Copacabana, Barra da Tijuca, the city and many touristic attractions. 
Silvia was fantastic since the begining. She always answered promply my emails, even with the 11 hours difference between Australia and Brazil. She was at the apartment at my arrival to give me informations, details about internet etc. Superb!
Sheets and towels were changed every week without a problem and I only had a problem with the internet once, which Silvia came to the apartment straight away and we discovered that I had disconected the wrong plug out of the wall. My mistake! 
I will definetly go back to the same place in the near future with my husband and adult son. 
Thank you Silvia. 
Muito obrigada, um beijo e até breve.
Michèle

Apartamento bom, de forma geral, e com localização muito boa.

summary: We have a spare bedroom for rent, in our cozy, beautiful, clean and comfortable two bedroom apartment. It's located right in the  heart of Greenpoint, one of Brooklyn's hottest/coolest neighborhoods at the moment. Please note, we're on the third floor, so if stairs are an issue, keep that in mind. Thanks.

There are great views of both Williamsburg and Manhattan, from the bedroom and living room. PLEASE NOTE: We are on the third floor and it is a walk up, so if stairs are a major issue for you, take that into consideration.

The private bedroom where you'll be staying, the kitchen and all our cooking supplies, plus the bathroom, which is shared with us. We, my girlfriend and I, live in the apartment as well. I work at a private school and she is a graphic designer. You would be staying in our second bedroom. Greenpoint has been o
neighborhood_overview: Greenpoint has been one of Brooklyn's hottest and hippest neighborhood's for a few years now. With the ultra-posh Williamsburg only a few blocks south, you have access to some of the best restaurants, shopping and entertainment that Brooklyn has to offer. There are tons of amazing shops right on Franklin Street and also Manhattan Avenue (the two main thoroughfares of Greenpoint). There are new restaurants and bars all over the place, as well as access to parks, the East River (including the ferry), and public transportation. Manhattan is only a 20 minute subway ride in any direction.
transit: Parking is pretty easy in the neighborhood and there are several bus options and the G and L Trains to get you wherever you need to go!
access: You would have access to the entire apartment. The private bedroom where you'll be staying, the kitchen and all our cooking supplies, plus the bathroom, which is shared with us.
interaction: We, my girlfriend and I, live in the apartment as well. I work at a private school and she is a graphic designer. You would be staying in our second bedroom.
house_rules: No smoking. No additional guests.

reviews.comments: We had a great time staying at  Kris' place! He was a wonderful host and his projector was awesome! My boyfriend and I would definitely stay there again if we ever went back to NY!
Kris and Kristen were great hosts! Very friendly, accommodating and helpful. The listing is close to just about anywhere you'd want to be in Greenpoint, and easily accessible by train.

Magnifique logement bien situé, avec grande chambre, très calme et literie très confortable.
La cuisine est bien équipée et le comptoir convivial pour les repas.
Kris nous a accueilli chaleureusement et a été très flexible sur l'heure d'arrivée et de départ.
Hôte vivement recommandé ! Et quartier à découvrir absolument !

We had a wonderful stay at Kris' place! It was extremely homey, clean, orderly, and inviting. Unfortunately, we did not get a chance to meet Kris and his girlfriend because they were out of town for the weekend. However, they were very easy to reach during our stay, were willing to answer any questions we had, and were accommodating even at a distance! My boyfriend and I fell in love with the Greenpoint area and would love to visit again!

My best friend and I stayed here for the weekend. Kris and Kristen were excellent hosts! Very fast response time, super accomodating and just great people all around. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who needs a place to stay in Williamsburg. Thanks again for opening up your home to us!

I had a great experience staying at Kris' apartment! Kris was quick to respond during the booking and "check in" process which I appreciated, and he and his girlfriend were friendly and nice to be around during my stay. I didn't spend much time in the apartment but the room was exactly as pictured and a perfect place for me to come back and relax. The apartment location is fantastic and I was able to explore a lot of Greenpoint by foot - it's an awesome neighborhood and definitely worth spending some time here!
Kris was very helpful helping me get the key and the apartment is nice and clean and quiet. Bed was very comfortable.
Very awesome experience.

Kris ans Kristen appartment was very well located in Greenpoint. Their street is quiet and the neighborhood felt very peaceful. Communication was very easy with our hosts throughout the weekend and before. The apartment is very clean, and we thought it was decorated with a lot of taste. Thank you again Kris and Kristen!
Listing was accurate.  Quiet street, helpful hosts.

Kris was very responsive and welcoming. The location is 5 minutes walk away from the Greenpoint subway station which was very convenient, and the listing was exactly as shown in the pictures. Very quiet neighborhood and comfy bed.

Kris was a very good host, he and his girlfriend were very helpfull and nice persons. The place was exactly the same as in description, very clean near to subway. Also it was in quiet and lovely neighbourhood. We will definitely recommend this host!
Everything was as advertised and suited us perfectly.

Kris was easy to communicate with and flexible with check-in/check-out time. I felt safe and comfortable. The area is great, a block from the Expo center. I was in town for a conference and it was very convenient. Overall a really great experience.
Kristin & Kris, were so kind and understanding to our situation. I appreciated the continuous communication. Very nice couple and a great place to stay.

This is a really nice room in a really nice apartment in a really nice part of Greenpoint. It's a 15 minutes walk to L train station at Bedford avenue that gets you in no time to Manhattan. So if you want to avoid hustle and bustle of Williamsburg, this is a great alternative. The hosts are great and will make you feel very welcome in their apartment.
Great location, lovely room, comfy bed, and responsive host. But if you have lots of luggage or some health issues, be aware the apartment is 3-flights up.
Kris was a great host!

Pros: Quiet residential street, easy access to nearby shops and subway, clean apartment and comfortable bed, super-friendly hosts.
Cons: none! Would absolutely stay here again.

We had an amazing stay at Kris'. The place was as described, clean and confortable. The neighborhood is great with a lot to do. Kris and his girlfriend are very welcoming and friendly. We definitely recommend this place!
Convenient ! Great neighborhood.
Kris was helpful and cheery. Located in an amazing neighborhood. Apartment was clean, nice, and quiet.

The place was a great location for us as we were going to an event at the expo center just down the road from this location. It was a really nice place to stay but would warn others it is on the 4th floor and not sure if it says that in the description or not while it was not a big deal for me but for some it could be a problem. Great hosts! Although I did not meet Kris, and briefly met Kristen, they were super communicative leading up and throughout our short visit--always a text away. Shower pressure was excellent and although it was a warm spring NY day, the large fan and ability to open the window in our room made for a comfortable sleep.

Kris and Kristen were very communicative hosts and their place is great: clean, bright, modern decoration and nice neighborhood with pretty easy access to Manhattan and most of Brooklyn. The apartment is up three flights so maybe not the best if you have a lot of luggage, but otherwise great!
Thank you for a great stay! Perfect location and room for the night.
Great all around!

his place is in a cool neighborhood with lots of small bars and boutiques.
overall great choice :)

Great room, comfy bed and nice shower. It was a perfect place for just a short stop over. Kris was very helpful and friendly. I'd definitely come again!

tot correcte!
