Smoking inside the apartment is forbidden and pets are not allowed unless specific permission granted by the p

host.host_about: Conocer lugares nuevos es una de mis pasiones y sobretodo hacerlo a mi aire. Por eso en todos mis viajes me alojo en un apartamento. Esta es una de las razones por las que dejé mi trabajo en una importante empresa de servicios empresariales y ahora me dedico a seleccionar apartamentos y gestionarlos en mi ciudad. De esta forma puedo ofrecer a mis huéspedes los apartamentos del estilo que a busco cuando viajo! Espero que os gusten tanto como a mí!

reviews.comments:
Ottimo alloggio situato in una zona residenziale nei pressi di Plaça espanya,
perfetto per famiglie e gruppi di ragazzi.
L'appartamento dista solo cinque minuti dalla metro.
It was fantastic, thank you!

El alojamiento esta bien. El servicio de atención al cliente es muy bueno, están muy pendientes y te ayudan. Además, el piso está limpio y tiene lo necesario para pasar allí unos días. Mi único pero es la comodidad de algunas de las camas.
Location is closed to public transportation.  Very spacious.
Buen piso, muy céntrico y en zona muy cómoda, sobretodo si vas a la Fira

Excelente apartamento en el centro de Barcelona, con fácil acceso a cualquier sitio, y sobre todo a la Fira de Barcelona. Muy confortable. Solo a mejorar la calidad de la wifi, la señal era muy floja.
Apartamento con muy buena ubicación, muy amplio y conforme se muestra en fotos. Muy buenas sugerencias de la persona que nos recibió.

Very good apartment in a excellent location to reach all of Barcelona from the met. The apartment is very clean and is as the pictures describe. There
 is also a very nice tapas  restaurant just below and many small shops within walking distance for groceries. The Wi-Fi is not very strong and could be improved. I would recommend this apartment to those wishing to stay in Barcelona.

Lovely spacious apartment in a fantastic location near to magic fountain and metro.  Supermarkets and bars/ restaurants very near .  Check in and communication great WiFi very slow and not always connectable Not a problem for us but worth noting
casa molto ben collegata e buona ospitalità. ci sono due ventilatori ma non l'aria condizionata.
Todo correcto. Recomendable
saubere, sehr praktische Wohnung mit allem was es braucht. Einzig das wifi hat nicht richtig funktioniert, bzw. nur wenn man 2m davor stand, nicht aber in den Zimmern. Der Rest war perfekt, toll!
Lovely space for a group holiday

Clickandflat a été très souple sur nos horaires d'arrivée. 
Malgré le fait que nous étions attendions depuis 18h pour faire le check in au lieu de 23h comme prévu et qu'ils etaient prévenu depuis le matin, nous avons pu faire le check-in à  21h30  et nous n'avons payé que 20€ de late check-in.

Merci beaucoup !
Bien situé

Thank you 
Everything was superb. Nice flat,good area, David very helpful, answered in all questions very quickly. Strongly recommend for everyone

The location of this apartment is ideal for touring and using public transit.  The apartment decor is nice and the beds are comfortable.  The wifi was unreliable and left us without access to the internet for long periods of time.  We experienced power outages while only using minimal appliances.  There were no dish towels and insufficient toilet paper for our stay.

I would strongly recommend not to book this place to stay. We had a terrible stay. The flat was very cold, and we could not use the electric heaters because the electricity kept turning off. We had to use the stove to boil water as every time we used the kettle, the electricity would turn off. 

The WiFi also does not work. Our devices connect to the WiFi but then it does not work. Every time the electricity turns off, the WiFi turns off and reboots. 

The Host arranged for a technician to visit the property, he confirmed that the appliances in the kitchen were old, and that the electricity is weak so we cannot use all the heaters. 

We were woken up in the morning at 5am due to noise outside the building which we weren’t given prior warning about. It is a real disappointment as we had high hopes for this place. 

There is not enough toilet roll supplied for the trip, so prepare to purchase your own. The window in the shower room was also not opening so the room got very steamy. 

Host is only contactable during hours of working, so any issues after this have to be dealt with following morning.
We could not contact the office too as it was shut. 

I managed to get a partial refund through Airbnb on my stay as it was awful, I wish I had spent my money on booking somewhere else.
Good clean place just outside of Barcelona city center. It is a little ways away from the heart of downtown, but if you don't mind a walk or a taxi ride it's a nice area with lots of restaurants.

name: Nice room with queen sized bed
summary: A lovely room with a queen sized bed, chair, dresser, lamp and closet. This room has AC for the hotter months. Guests are welcome to use the kitchen, living room and study.
space: A lovely, colorful apartment near the Laurier metro  in Montreal. A classic, Montreal building with 2 floors. Lots of original details. Set amidst great shopping and cafes on the Plateau, and only a short distance from downtown. Located 1 minute to the Laurier Metro. You are welcome to use the kitchen. On-site certified Swedish massage therapist with 10 years experience available. Massage Therapy is $60 for a one hour Swedish Massage. Free wifi, shared bathroom, no pets, non-smoking, Friendly. No walk ins. Advanced booking only please.
description: A lovely room with a queen sized bed, chair, dresser, lamp and closet. This room has AC for the hotter months. Guests are welcome to use the kitchen, living room and study. A lovely, colorful apartment near the Laurier metro  in Montreal. A classic, Montreal building with 2 floors. Lots of original details. Set amidst great shopping and cafes on the Plateau, and only a short distance from downtown. Located 1 minute to the Laurier Metro. You are welcome to use the kitchen. On-site certified Swedish massage therapist with 10 years experience available. Massage Therapy is $60 for a one hour Swedish Massage. Free wifi, shared bathroom, no pets, non-smoking, Friendly. No walk ins. Advanced booking only please. Wifi Check in, by chance daily, guests are free to email, text or call me any time if I'm not there. The Plateau neighborhood is great! We are surrounded by lots of great cafes and shopping. Only 1 minute to the metro Laurier. Yes! 1 minute to the metro Laurier.
neighborhood_overview: The Plateau neighborhood is great! We are surrounded by lots of great cafes and shopping. Only 1 minute to the metro Laurier.
transit: Yes! 1 minute to the metro Laurier.
access: Wifi
interaction: Check in, by chance daily, guests are free to email, text or call me any time if I'm not there.
house_rules: Respectful.

host.host_about: Massage therapist, artist, writer, gardener, traveler, filmmaker and B&B Host.

reviews.comments: Jen was very accomodating.  The room was fine, though being an old building you hear any conversations/people there.  Great location though, near the metro, plateau, mile end.  Lots of great restaurants nearby.

Plateau Montreal Artisinal is value for money.  The location is ideal and there is an excellent range of cafes, restaurants and bars handy.  The Metro is close by.  The accommodation was adequate and the breakfast was great.  This accommodation is more in the range of a guest house than a BnB.  
Peter and Jenny
We really enjoyed our stay.  Great location – close to BIXI stand, metro, shops, restaurants and cafes.  Jen is super easy to get along with.

We had a great stay at Jen's place, It was  an old buliding but full of  characteristics, close to METRO, and shops.  The rooms are colorful with comfortable beds. Breakfast was excellent. Jen is very accomodating. i highly recommend Jen's place.

I do not recommend this place. I arrived on a hot day, there was no air condotion, bed much to small for a couple, room is dark and not appealing at all
The room description is definitely deciving
Not worth even to stay even for free!

Check out other places
Best of luck - H.
I stayed in Montreal for one night so my friends and I enjoyed Jen's hospitality!! The breakfast was really good, thanks for everything

This was a cute apartment in a very great location in Montreal.  Jen was a very helpful and generous host.  Breakfast was simple, but very delicious.  My only complaint was that the room is on a fairly busy street and when you have the window open in the morning (which is needed in the summer), it can be very load very early (~6am).  Other than that, it was a great place.

Jen's b&b is a great place to stay, she is very sweet, prepares breakfast with lots of love, the rooms and bathroom are super clean, great location and very independent, it is easy to feel at home.
Also, you should try Jen's massage, she is awesome!
Great location. Nice breakfast. Jen was a pleasant and informative host. I'm very glad I did this for my first trip to Montreal and I would definitely do this again.

Jen is a great host--very accommodating, makes a lovely breakfast with endless cups of coffee and her rooms are all neat and clean. The location is perfect and within walking distance of lots of great food and Montreal sights. Our room had a fan but others might find the lack of air conditioning challenging in the summer. We had a really nice stay.

It was perfect! the house is charming and you feel like in your own home. Jen is very welcoming and her breakfast is delicious. A very great host!
I've already decided to come back.. Thanks Jen!

We booked with Jen pretty last minute and found her to be very cooperative and accommodating. The location is centrally located, right next to a subway stop and near everything Montreal has to offer. Jen made us a delicious bagel breakfast in the morning, and was very flexible with our check-in/check-out time.
The place was great. Jen was very hospitable and we had a really comfortable and fun visit to Montreal

Great place in a really handy location very easy to see the city, on a lovely street full of restaurants and shops. Very nice building with old school charm, very arty feel. Beds where comfortable room was large and airy with huge window. no air con but the fan in the room worked grand. Wifi and free parking was an extra bonus. Breakfast every morning was lovely. If I get back to Montreal I will stay there again.
We were in town just for one night, and Jen's place worked great!  Very easy to arrive, and everyone was very friendly.

Jen was very welcoming and responsive.  She and her friend provided a delicious and substantive breakfast in the morning.  Nice neighborhood right on St. Denis.  Large sunny room with comfy queen mattress. Fun and funky decor, nice little terrace and ktichen.  Couple of things: 1)  there are two bathrooms- one with toilet, the other with sink and bathtub.  The sink drained realy slowly so was a little discouraging.  Shower was fine, water pressure a little low.  2) our room, the Green Room, is right on St. Denis - trucks ROARing woke us early a.m.  3) be sure to take your room key with you when you go to the bathroom, etc, otherwise your door will lock!  Maybe I'm fussier than my younger reviewers, but these are important to note.  Otherwise, a very nice stay with friendly and knowledgable hosts.
Jen was a gracious host and very friendly. The accomodations were more than adequate and breakfasts were yummy.  We even got a free concert in the bargain.

We strongly recommend this location. We would surely stay here again in the future.
NOTE: There are 3 rooms at this location. 2 of them face St Denis, and this is a busy street with traffic noise. The 1 room in the back, away from St Denis, is much quieter. This is our favorite room.
The location, one block from Metro/Laurier is excellent. The building is from 1890, and has a lot of character. There are 2 flights of stairs to get up to the rooms.
Jen is a very welcoming and conscientious host. She went beyond our expectations and helped us with some issues with our room and the AirBNB website. We are most appreciative.
Breakfast was very good.
We stayed here for one week. in 2 of the 3 rooms. (BTW: The beds in these 2 rooms are folders, and are a bit harder than we like.)
This is a fine place to stay. Jen is calm, welcoming, and has a nice sense of humor.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Jen's B&B.  Rooms were airy and clean with a kind of artistic feel that I fell immediately in love with.  B&B is in a great central location, surrounded by many great shops, restaurants, and bars, and near Metro station.  Jen is welcoming, enthusiastic, and warm.  Yummy, filling breakfast was a great start to each morning!

I really enjoyed my stay at Plateau Montreal Artisinal B&B. The room was just right, the bed was very comfortable and the location was excellent with metro and bixie bike options just round the corner. There are some nice little restaurants across the street as well. I slept in each day and Jen and Theresa were very kind about leaving out my breakfast for me. I felt quite at home.

Very well located, one of the best restaurant in town across the street, walking distance to Montreal vibrant life.

Building is old but comfortable, rooms are big (ask for the one on the backside it's very quiet).

Jen has been very arranging, considering my impossible schedule ! Great host !!

Loved the funky charm of this place...the colours, artwork and ideal neighbourhood made for a comfortable stay. Jen was a good host and made me feel welcome.
Tracy

Jen was very accommodating and helpful!  We were delayed by 2 hrs and arrived close to midnight and she waited for us to arrive and was very nice in assisting us in settling in.  The place is located in a fun neighborhood, and right near the Metro.  Highly recommend!
Jen is very friendly and helpful and the place is very laidback, comfortable and well located.
Awesome location! Eclectic house that made us feel like we were living in the heart of Montreal. Great base for explorations. Jen provided great service.

Jen's place is private, clean and very central to everything.
I enjoyed staying here. Jen would come and visit everyday (as she lives a few blocks away) and would have breakfast and fresh fruits for you in the morning. She was also great company and would have a little chat with you :)
I would highly recommend your stay here if you're visiting Montreal.

What an awesome place to stay in Montreal.  So close to Laurier metro station, this bnb is the perfect way to simulate how the locals live in this beautiful city.  Jen was a great host, she pops in everyday to make sure everything is ok in the house and you'll hopefully get to meet some fantastic guests as I did.  If I ever go back to Montreal I will definitely stay her as you feel like you're living in someone's house and the owner isn't home :)

If you are a light sleeper I would strongly recommend asking for the back bedroom or the one in the middle (it doesn't have any windows so if you're a fresh air freak that might be something to take into consideration).  I had the large room at the front and it was massive; I sleep with ear plugs and a couple of nights the traffic kept me awake, but overall I loved staying here 100%.

Direction from the metro - when you get off the tube (if heading north on Montmorency direction) go towards the exit that doesn't have stairs visible.  There'll be an escalator and then a flight of stairs and exit at the Gilford doors.  As you look right this is the bus stop, I think they terminate here and it looks like a dead end street.  There's a street that veers off to the left and at the end there's some traffic lights (you'll walk past some restaurants on the left, a pizza joint on the corner on the right), when you're standing next to the pizza place, cross over the road (across the 4 lanes, not the crossing that flows with the traffic) and the door is basically right there in front of the lights.  There's no sign indicating the name of the bnb, just keep an eye out for the door as it's a bit hard to see at first.  It's in between the shops and I walked past it the first time.

This is a nice place to stay.  Jen was helpful in telling us about places to go for food, music, etc.  It's right on Saint-Denis, a good spot for restaurants and beer.  Accomodations were basic but comfortable.

I had a great stay! The location is excellent near the metro and it is in a really nice area. It was so easy to get around. I loved having so much common space to hang out in and I really like the style of the B&B. There are a lot of neat instruments and art. I also like the make your own breakfast style (she makes sure the kitchen is stocked with nice fruit, bagels, eggs, etc) and having a place to cook if needed. Jen is very welcoming and checks up to make sure all is well. My stay was short, but staying here made my Montreal experience awesome.

Jen went out of her way to ship some things we'd left behind. She's a kind and gracious host, and her place is in a great location.
I'd recommend this place to anyone.

Jen is a very lovely and friendly host. She was easily contacted for questions and recommendations throughout my stay. Her B&B is in an traditional Montreal home and was very charming. The fruits and bagels were a nice and welcome touch! The only minor issue would be the fact that some of the rooms are right on St.Denis--so if you are sensitive to noise (e.g. traffic) you may want to ask for a room at the back or bring ear plugs.

Great place, very cozy and relaxing at a great price. Also it's in a really cool area which was great to explore and very easy to get downtown. Jen is really accommodating and very sweet. Highly recommended!

Jen was a lovely host. She has a very welcoming and easy going personality  and provided helpful  information about the area and places of interest. The apartment is conveniently located; it is close to restaurants & nightlife and also has a  metro line nearby.
There is a shared bathroom but other  house guests staying at the same time as us were very considerate.

Jen has a really cool place that's super easy to find. It has a fantastic old-style charm and the other people that were staying there were very friendly :) I recommend this place for sure, if you want to take the metro, use Laurier station, but for the best restaurants near by, walk in the other direction towards mont royal station :) :)

We had a great stay! The location was perfect for us - a few minutes from the metro, and within 15 mins of our favourite cafes and pubs. I had anticipated that the house may be cold given it was old (and the time of year), but it was nice and toasty. The house is pretty creaky, and there was a fair amount of noise from the street, so if you're a light sleeper it may not be for you.  We didn't find it a problem, and would definitely stay there again.

Jen's Artisinal B&B is an artsy, shabby-chic multi-dwelling home right on Rue St. Denis in Montreal.  As such, it is perfectly situated between the English-speaking/hipster side of town and then French-speaking side of town.  Moreover, the inn is an easy walk to Mont Royal park, old town, and to most of the major attractions in the city center.  For any further out destinations, you will find yourself a mere block away from the Laurier Metro Station. All amenities were provided by Jen, including bagel breakfasts, internet access, bedding, towels and basic toiletries.  Accommodations were perfect.

We arrived at this two-storey residence very easily from the Amtrak station. Jen was home when we arrived to let us in. She showed us around briefly and then let us be to ourselves. Despite sharing the building with other guests, our room was very private. We were very comfortable and the location in the city is very close to restaurants, cafes, and Metro stations and bus lines. We had a great stay! Recommended for either couples or families with children.

Jen runs a very pleasant B&B in a wonderful and conveniently located neighborhood of Montreal. She was very reliable both in her communication before arrival and in setting us up for a lovely stay. We would love to stay again!

I am so happy to have chosen this place. I'm a dj who drove to Montreal from Vermont with a gig that ended at 2am. Jen met me at the B&B at 2am, with keys in hand and a pleasant smile. My room was clean and I feel in love with the Frida Khalo inspired bathroom. super clean and warm during those wintery night. great deal.

Jen's B&B was the perfect place for our first Montreal (and airbnb) experience. From the start Jen was quick to respond and helpful with information.. she is a great host and seems to run the b&b professionally. We had to postpone our plans due to a snowstorm but Jen could accommodate us a day late with no problem, which was much appreciated. The Mile End area was a great location to get a well-rounded idea of the city, we were really happy to have ended up there instead of some other locations we were considering. The house is old but it has tons of charm. We were lucky to have the whole space to ourselves the first night.. after a full day of walking around we made dinner in the kitchen and spent the evening playing with instruments in the living room. The next night there was a full house which got a little noisy due to echoing voices and creaky floors.. but really not a problem. This may be petty to mention but I would recommend bringing your own pillow if you prefer sleeping a little elevated. Overall it was a pleasant, fun and hassle free visit to Montreal, we would definitely stay here again!

Good location in the vibrant neighborhood "Plateau" and vintage spot. Metro station just nearby. Jen is not living in the apartment, so if you need advices for your stay, prepare questions when you meet the first day. The breakfast was very basic. Generally, we promote it for young travelers.

Jen's place was great! The location especially. Everything was right around the corner, just brilliant.
The room was a comfortable and Jen left bagels and cream cheese out each morning for breakfast, YUM!!

Would thoroughly recommend.

Excellent location just a little distance from the metro and walking distance to lots of places on rue St Denis and the Mont Royal. 
Breakfast supplied was very much appreciated and Jen also responded quickly to any requests we made.
This was our first experience with an Airbnb flat and Jen has set a  very high benchmark for any future hosts we use. Thanks Jen
I felt very comfortable in this beautiful space!  The location was convenient in the Plateau.

Jen was very helpful, (especially in figuring out Montreal parking regulations) and the accommodation were in a nice historic building and great location. As mentioned by others the short helpful guide that was left in the room was nice to have too.

Jen is a great host! The B&B was really nice, close to everything: metro, bixi bikes, shops, Miles End, Little Italy, Outrement...Very cool to stay in this authentic place during the week I had a conference in Montreal.

Thank you, Jen, for your opinion about us.
Concerning the pair of trousers, is it possible to get them next saturday, about 1 or 2 pm?

I have problems with my phone web. 
At the moment, we are in Quebec city. May our guess, Anick  Gosselin, phone you tonight.
Many thank
Bernard
I stayed for 3 nights at Jen's place. I felt at home straight away and experienced Jen as flexible and friendly host. So yes, I definitely recomment staying at the B&B!

Jen's place was great!  Very well located in the Plateau and close to a metro station for further city exploration.  Jen welcomed us, took the time to show us around the house and answered all the questions we had.  She also showed us travel books on Montreal and area for guests.  We also appreciated that she gave us directions for a free parking near the house.  That was super helpful!
On the downside of things, a little general cleaning of the place would be useful to make the overall experience an excellent one!

We really enjoyed our stay at Jen's . The flat has character and feels like home. decorated with good taste. The place is ideally located and very close to nice bars and restarants. We appreciated the morning bagels very much ! a very good experience and Jen was perfect with the communication ! we would love to go back !
It was a very quaint place in a great part of town. Nothing bad to say!

Jen was a great host. Super nice, helpful, and gave us a lot of information about Montreal.  The place is in a GREAT location, close to everything. Wifi was great.  I recommend this place if you are on a budget, but looking for easy access to everything Montreal has to offer!

Excellent location!  Lots of great restaurants and shopping nearby.  Just a short walk to the Metro.  Jen was very helpful in terms of navigating the city and public transport.  Overall, great!  Thanks again!

Quirky place in the absolute perfect location. Tons of boutiques along the same street, and walking distance to most places worth seeing. Jen was a genuinely kind host and willing to offer advice on the area. Plus, I met two really awesome travelers at the B&B... seems to be a place that attracts interesting people!

We had a great experience at Jen's B&B!  Went up to Montreal for the jazz festival, and Jen's place was a great deal.  Not expensive, perfectly clean, and above all well-situated in the city (one block from the subway and located in the great Plateau area with lots to do/eat nearby).  The only drawback was that the B&B isn't air-conditioned (same goes for many buildings in Montreal), but it worked fine for us because we got the one room with the AC unit.
Great! Awesome!! Fantastic!!! Very Nice And colourful House in the Place to be.

Jen was an excellent host!  She was very flexible about our late arrival and gave us some great information about the neighborhood and tips for getting around Montreal.  We didn't see her for the rest of the weekend, but she was available via email or phone in case we needed anything.  The room and house were beautiful and we especially enjoyed the delicious Montreal bagels for breakfast.  Thanks Jen!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Plateau Montreal B&B. This is a lovely old apartment – large, bright, full of Quebecois character¬, and very well located just a short walk from the Laurier Metro. The shared bathroom and common areas worked well for me as I enjoyed socializing with the other travellers and felt very safe and comfortable. Our host Jen was welcoming and made sure I had everything I needed. This was my first AirB&B experience, and one I would gladly recommend to others.

Appartement très bien situé dans un quartier très agréable
Confort assez sommaire, bien adapté à  des jeunes
Bon rapport qualité prix
Contact très agréable avec J'en

La chambre est idéalement située, proche du métro, dans un quartier dynamique et très vivant en soirée. La maison est pleine de charme et propre. Nous avons eu un peu l'impression d'être dans une auberge de jeunesse, plusieurs chambres étant louées avec des voisins tous les jours différents. Jen est très sympathique mais n'habite pas sur place, il faut donc l'appeler et lui donner rendez-vous à l'arrivée.

Lieu pittoresque plein de charme et propre. Les propriétaires n'habitent pas sur place mais étaient là pour nous accueillir. 
Plutôt bien situé, seul bémol notre chambre donnait sur la rue St Denis qui reste bruyante la nuit.
This was our first air bnb and Jen was really friendly and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay in Montreal and felt the location was perfect as a base for seeing the city.

Jen's room worked out fine for me.  The location was primo, easy short walk to the Laurier Metro stop and Bixi bikes, on St Denis, close to Mont Royal and St Laurent.  Breakfast was strictly do it yourself:  bagels, cream cheese and orange juice provided.  There was a bathtub which was important to me and which I enjoyed.  An air conditioner and fan kept the room cool.

Jen et son mari ont une maison très charmante et colorée qu'ils vous laissent avec les autres hôtes. Notre chambre était côté rue mais pas bruyante la nuit. 

Une bonne adresse bien située pour visiter Montréal !

Logement bien situé avec le métro au pied de l'immeuble , ou bien on peut rejoindre le centre ville a pied en 25 min. 
Belle appartement coloré et propre.
I felt well attended to, the only down  was the front room close to St Denis was so noisy until at least midnight.

We had to wait 15 minutes to meet Jen for the check-in.  However, she was supremely flexible in the first place, allowing me to set the check-in time and only a day prior to arrival.  The floors squeak quite a lot as do the doors, at least to our room "The Plateau." Its all pretty great after that though.  The room had a working fan AND an air-condition window unit.  The windows are huge and easy to open, good drapes to boot, They were easy to snap open and close.  Easy access to a vegan AND raw food restaurant, 15min walk.  Fully stocked kitchen with tea, fruit, bagels; great bathrooms.  Really would stay here again.  Thank you for the effort Jen!

I enjoyed my stay at Jen's place. Her place is clean, and is located at a convenient place near a metro station.  Jen was also very helpful and accomodating - prior to me arriving, she helped to provide very clear instructions on getting to her place from the airport.  And on the day I left, since I had a late flight, she allowed me to lock my bags away in a spare room so that I could still explore around during the day, which I very much appreciated!
Nice place, great location!

Bon emplacement pour cette petite maison sur deux étages, décoration originale type un peu bohème. Acceuil par Jesse, le compagnon de Jen. Sympathique et cool. Je ne suis resté qu'une nuit. Jesse m'a gentiment proposé de rester le lendemain jusqu'à 14h exceptionnellement, car j'avais passé la nuit à être malade. Attention que j'ai beaucoup apprécié.

Jen's place was perfectly located. Clean, bright and comfortable, I highly recommend this location for anyone travelling through Montreal. Jen was also very accommodating with late arrivals and late check-out time which my travel plans included. two thumbs up!

Jen saved my behind & my kid's! We made a last minute decision to go to Montreal for an event. While there, I sent various inquiries & while most people responded that they needed more advance notice, Jen responded that her place was ready & available! (There are various rooms that are rented.) And the location in Plateau area is fabulous! If you are not looking for the Hilton, then this place is quite comfortable & convenient. And to boot, Jen provides the material to make your own tea, coffee & bagels for breakfast. That was just an added bonus. We will definitely return on future trips!
Comfortable and quiet, we didn't meet Jen but her husband Jesse was very welcoming.  Lovely place for a night and very central.
Jen was a friendly and helpful host, our accommodation was unique and in a great location. We had a wonderful family day weekend in Montreal.

Jen was great at accommodating my partner and I at the last minute,  which was a relief! The place was very colorful and has fun items, like guitars and a ukulele. It was very nice having a kitchen where we could cook. The place is in a great location in Montreal - close to Mt. Royal and directly on a busy street with tons of nice places to eat and yoga studios, etc. The bus station is a 1 minute walk, too! Our only complaint was that the place did not appear to be cleaned very well - if you like things to be really nice and clean, you probably would not want to stay here. The place was well loved, but not in a cleaning sort of way.
Great price for an bed in a great location. The plateau neighbourhood is awesome. If I'm nitpicking, the pillows are flat. The bagels were great, and the apartment had a lot of character.
Thank you Jen! This was the perfect accommodation for my night in Montréal

We had a really nice stay at Jen's place.
This colorfull house is comfortable and perfectly located!
Jen is sympathical and really arranging.

We clearly recomend it!
Jen's house is nice and colorfull, and very well situated to visit Montreal; I would really recommand it !

We spent four days here and everything was great. It's a beautiful old apartment with several bedrooms and a spacious common area downstairs, with a kitchen and living room. Right on St-Denis, it's quick to get on the metro and you're in a great neighbourhood for walking around. Jen's a great host, friendly, and leaves you to your own devices.

Room was clean and tidy. Jen made accommodations without hesitation (thanks for the towels!) Even with a second guest down the hall, the place was quiet and allowed for a lot of privacy. 

Bagels and coffee in the morning was a nice touch. Will stay there again!

This was a clean, lovely room in a great bnb. Really close to the metro and  the best neighbourhoods. Met a few fun people who were also staying here.
Disappointed that I didn't make time to get a massage from Jen, the host.

We really enjoyed our stay at Jen's bnb! The apartment is in a great location, a block from the train station and right near many restaurants and shops. The apartment is very nice and clean, Jen is really helpful and friendly with any questions you might have. We would definitely recommend staying here, it was perfect for our stay in Montreal.

I loved Jen's flat! Very cute and charming. Everywhere you turn there is artwork and adorable knickknacks throughout. The location is great,  its very close to the metro and a plethora of restaurants. Jen is a great host, I would absolutely stay there again!

I really enjoyed staying at Jen's.  The place is very well situated, close to the metro, and the shops and there are very nice bars and restaurants close by.I didn't have much time to see Jen but she was available in case I needed her! I would certainly recommend this address.
Great place.  Very convenient and wonderful overall.  Would stay again for sure.
Nice place to stay and close to everything you need in Montreal. I would come back!
Everything was great at Jen's.  Jen had some good tips for us about Montreal and was very friendly.

Great host and apartment in superb location! Jen was very friendly, the apartment was clean and the fruit and bagels for breakfast were a nice extra touch!

Thanks so much, I'll be back on my next trip!

My friend and I loved staying here. The location is amazing and the vibe is like a cool, eclectic hostel that allows the privacy of your own room. I loved the lending library (with Montreal tour books!) and Jen was nice enough to leave out tea,  Fairmount bagels, and fruit for guests. The only downside for me is that I found the mattress uncomfortable. That being said, I am really picky about sleeping surfaces and generally don't sleep well on any kind of futon mattress. My friend slept just fine and had no complaints.

Jen was an excellent and helpful host! She was very friendly at check-in and offered excellent suggestions for places to eat and things to do around the neighborhood.
 
The location of the Airbnb couldn't have been more perfect, extremely walkable to many restaurants and shops! First time in Montreal, and feel very lucky that friends who had stayed at this location recommended this Airbnb to me. The BIXI bike share system has many docking stations near the Airbnb location, and the Laurier Metro station is just a couple blocks away. The maps and guidebooks in the apartment were great to have as references!

I would describe this property more as a "hostel with delicious bagels" than a "B&B," but that's perfectly ok.  What it does well, it does really well!  We had the room pictured in the airbnb profile and it was nice--a good size, and clean.  The rest of the building is older, a bit shabby, but definitely clean and more than adequate.  There is one bathroom and several other bedrooms that are rented out.  Getting bathroom time and hot water were never a problem, even though others were staying.  The kitchen and other common areas, including back garden balcony, are nice too.

This airbnb stay was a little different in that we didn't interact with the hosts much.  We actually never met Jen.  Instead, her husband Jesse met us and let us into our room.  He was welcoming and showed us around.  There was also a handy welcome sheet in the room with wifi info, restaurant suggestions, etc.  (The pizza restaurant across the street is great!)

The neighborhood is fantastic, and definitely what makes this place such a great deal.  It's very close to the metro, restaurants, and a little grocery store.  If you like walking vacation, you can definitely walk downtown or to the old city from the location.  

It was a good place to stay, and I'd recommend it to others.

Our stay at Jen's was fantastic! The B&B was beautiful and very cool, there was awesome art everywhere in the house! Jen was very accommodating and nice! She also gave us great advice on where to check out some cool bars and an awesome vegan restaurant! We were also close to everything :D Thank you Jen for such a great trip... and the bagels!

The house is located on Rue St. Denis, een busy street with many shops and restaurants. It is also quite close to Laurier metro station.
The house itself looked more like a hostel than a house. It is shabby, needs repair and a good cleaning.

Easy email-contact to Jen and nice welcoming by Jesse. I liked my room for the 2 nights. With my ear plugs I could sleep quite well despite of the traffic noise. Self-service breakfast is o.k. for me. Other people may need a hint at the airbnb-description. All the best, Heribert (Germany)
(Sorry, but my English has got a bit rusty :-)

We had a lovely trip to Montreal while staying with Jen. The B&B is in a wonderful location - close enough to walk downtown, and surrounded by many, many delicious restaurants and bars. We used bixi to get around and there were several stops closeby. The room was a nice size and the bathroom and kitchen were kept clean during our entire stay.

Jen was very nice! The location is fantastic and everything true to the description. I stayed for about a week and it was great to have an apartment-y feeling place rather than a hotel, you can really make yourself at home. The living area is really nice with a sun room and living room, great for reading or making coffee and doing some work in the morning.

Cleanliness-wise it could be a little better - wasn't horrible but the room could have used a dusting, and the closet was slightly musty smelling.

All in all I would recommend it for the location and the bed and breakfast set up - needless to say I ate a lot of bagels!
Nice place, clean and quite

My partner and myself enjoyed staying at Jen's place. She was a good host, she was there and received us warmly when we arrived, giving us plenty of tips from parking to eating out, or visiting places. 
The location itself is great, in the middle of the Plateau with many small cafes, bakeries and nice restaurants around. It's also walking distance to the Mont Royal.
The place it's full of character and despite the room colours didn't look as vibrant as I was expecting from the pictures, it still looks funky and has a nice vibe.
My only issue was the noise from the street plus some noises on the first night, as someone was going in and out from the room next door and the door was banging. However I slept perfectly after wearing some ear plugs, plus I know I'm quite sensitive to noises.

Jen was great she was super accommodating of any changes that I had. The location is in the heart of the city and right around all of the bars, restaurants, and nightlife activities. It is extremely accessible by train to get quickly and easily around the city.

Le point fort de cet appartement est sans aucun doute sa localisation. À deux pas du métro Laurier. À 5 min du croisement St-Denis/Mt-Royal. Il n'y a pas de meilleur endroit pour flâner sur le plateau !

Jen was very welcoming and helpful. We spend a good time there. The apartment was shared with other travelers. We felt like we were in a youth hostel. The apartment is well equipped and we had all we needed. The breakfast is included, that is a good point.

Thanks !
A nice stay. The location is simple, clean and central.
Jen is a very good host, taking her time to show you around the place and answering all your questions. The room is spacious and well located at Rue Saint-Denis. Definitely recommended!

Accueil très chaleureux, Jen vous met tout de suite à l'aise. L'appartement est situé sur le Plateau, près des transports et de divers lieux pour sortir. Je ne suis resté qu'un weekend, mais très bonne expérience à renouveler.

Jen was a great host! She was accommodating of my later arrival time and helped me navigate the streets of Montreal to find parking, which isn't that easy. When I first arrived, she gave me a tour of the lodging, which matched what was described on the listing page, and even had a laminated quick-tips sheet with house rules and some helpful tips for getting around the city. I would be happy to stay here again.

Jen was a great host and flexible with our delayed arrival time. Although we didn't meet her, she was quick to answer the phone when we had questions. The apartment was comfortable and welcoming. The breakfast a really nice touch. I will definately stay here again and recommend it to others who want to be in a great location and a funky clean apartment.
It was a pleasure to stay at Jen's place. She was really helpful and the room was lovely. The house's location was also excellent. 100% recommended.

Fantastic position, close to the station and all amenities. Although the house was lovely, it needed a clean, nothing major just a bit dusty and the bins weren't emptied during our stay. Check in was easy, and Jen was very flexible with our late and changing check in time.
Jen's place was funky, clean and well located. A great spot to stay in Montreal!

Excellent place to stay in Montreal. It is very convenient and close to the metro station to bus station. And also, it is a safe place to stay even thought you come back at midnight from metro. The host is very nice and considerate. I will choose this place when I visit Montreal again.
Jen's B&B was a lovely place to stay! It's in a great location, easy to walk through the Plateau and Mile-End neighbourhoods, and was clean and comfortable.

Dave and I both loved staying at Jen's bed and breakfast. It was exactly what we were looking for. It was so charming and colorful. It was nice having access to the bagels and tea. Jen and her husband were very helpful with finding parking when we arrived so that we could avoid getting parking tickets.

The bed and breakfast was located in a great area - it's an easy walk to plenty of great restaurants and Mont Royal. We walked almost everywhere, but there was a metro stop very close. We would definitely stay here again!

Jen's place is in a great location, very close to public transport, great restaurants and shopping. The house has a lot of character and charm, I recommend sitting on the back balcony with a cup of tea in the afternoon! Our room was a little dusty, but apart from that the place was generally pretty clean and as described in the listing.

Excellent location, great price! Classic old style Montreal apartment, creaking hinges and all. Very laid back, only one other couple staying that weekend. Had the kitchen and back balcony to ourselves when we were there. Food, Bixi Bike rental, Bistro's, depaneurs... all within a block or two. Great if your just looking for a taste of city living.

Jen's place was easy to get to from the Metro, and she was there to greet us when we arrived. She was very friendly and gave us several recommendations for restaurants/pubs in the area. The place itself was funky and quaint. It's definitely an older apartment, but for the price and the location, it's worth it. As a bonus, Jen kept local bagels stocked in the kitchen for breakfast!

She was going out of town the day we arrived, but she was still able to show us around the apartment. The description of the place is accurate, no frills. The neighborhood is THE BEST part about this place.

The only thing that caught us by surprise is that the toilet and the rest of the bathroom are in two different rooms. So at one point I wasn't able to use the bathroom to wash my hands after using the toilet because someone was in there...but that only happened once.

And one thing that was slightly irksome for me personally was one of the pillows that had little support, but I'm also used to thick, fluffy pillows, sometimes stacking one top of the other; so take this part of the review in with a grain of salt.

We were really looking to just crash for the night and take in Montreal as much as we can, so we weren't in the house very much. It was very low-key and enjoyable.

After travelling the world and staying in hostels, the warm thoughtful reception at Jens place was a breathe of fresh air. So obvious that she's an experienced host who is used to dealing with travellers and their needs.  Caring thoughtful host with a well kept room in a fun funky neighborhood with rock bottom prices......what more could i ask for?

10/10 would recommend!
Great place, plenty of character and artsy feel as well as space (rare to find in the plateau), the pictures didn't do the room justice as it was bigger than expected. The location is just amazing being so close to the metro, as well as the plateau being such desirable place to live. Also, the A/C was a godsend on the couple days where it got really hot!
There was an issue with the tub at one point but it was fixed very quickly.
There were a couple other girls renting separate rooms and we all got along and I even ended up making close friends with one!
Jen was just great, she made sure we were comfortable, let us know all the spots nearby, came by to clean and was quick to respond, super accommodating.
Had a wonderful stay! A great, safe place for a single traveler like myself. The location was perfect and the price was very affordable. I highly recommend it for budget solo travelers!
It was nice to stay here for the week, near from subway and restaurants! The host was very nice and my roommate of the week were nice too!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic place. Clean and convenient to all of Williamsburg. My parents actually stayed here and the host was great to them, checking in all the time and making sure they had everything they needed.
Todo perfecto, ningun problema. Departamento muy lindo en una zona muy buena.

everything nice and easy and good neighborhood too.
I enjoyed my trim to NYC.
Thanks!

Great apartment and backyard patio in a great location!!
Walk to anything you could want in Willimsburg or a short subway or uber ride to NYC for everything else. Nicely updated apartment with easy on street parking and wonderful hosts and recommendations. Highly recommend!!

This place was awesome. Huge space in a perfect location close to bars and restaurants etc. The owner was very nice and accommodating. Took me a while to pick out an Air bnb in NYC because they were all too "lived in" this one didnt feel like i was invading somebody's home. Kind of like a two story hotel- i loved it. Also great backyard
Everything was wonderful! Sal was very easy to work with and made sure that we had a great stay. We had a great stay; I'll definitely be back soon!
neighborhood is pleasant and host was excellent

Great place for NY trip. Subway nearby. The host is on every call, very helpful. There was a plumbing problem during our stay, fixed immidetly by Sal. 
Definitly can recomend the place

The hosting was taken care of by Luis, who was fantastic and went out of his way to make me feel welcome.  He was terrific.  

Neighborhood was good and the L train was easy to get to and the place was super clean.

The apartment is on the ground floor it's a 2BR-1B with a living room kitchen combo. One bedroom downstairs. It was very comfortable, newly remodeled, modern and Luis is a jewel (he even went so far as to go get us some canoli and sfoglitella from the best Italian bakery in Williamsbug when my Italian wife asked him about them). Fairly close to the L & M subway lines. Maybe 10 minutes to Union Square hub in Manhattan. 

Highly recommended.

We had a great stay! The host was very flexible about check-in and check-out time, and made it clear he was available if we needed anything (we didn't.) Location was perfect, 5 minutes to L train into Manhattan, but on a quiet street. Spacious enough to sleep four friends very comfortably (two beds + two futon-style couches). We really enjoyed sitting out on the back patio as well.

Sal was most helpful and reafy to help with anything.  The apartment is in a super location close to all Williamsburg smenities and the L line. I would recommrnd jt to anyone and would certainly stay there again if I had the chance.

The host was Great! Very helpful, even with my elderly father. My son lives nearby, so I knew it was a great neighborhood! Free bottled water and coffee was nice. Beautiful patio and the apartment was clean, beautifully furnished and so comfortable. I would definitely stay there again!,
Really good experience. We didn't spend much time hanging out in the apartment (though the patio was tempting) but it was close to friends, train, and plenty of good food. Will certainly book again!

We arrived late at night, but Louis was waiting for us. He even showed us a place to buy dinner, although it was after midnight.
The neighbourhood is great and you can be in Manhattan in 20 minutes.
The appartemt was really nice and suited us well (2 adults and 2 teenagers). Louis was only a phone call away if we had questions and he popped by a few times to chek on us.
Would definitely stay again.

Le duplex est parfaitement situé dans Brooklyn, à 5 minutes à pied du métro et du centre de Williamsburg, quartier le plus en vogue de Brooklyn. L'appartment n'est qu'à 15 minutes en métro du cœur de Manhattan.
Nous remercions tout particulièrement Luis pour son accueil et ses conseils.
Sal was an excellent host. The apartment was really great and also he was really responsive and accommodating!

We had a great time staying here. Host was waiting for us upon arrival. Super friendly guy, real NYer. Apartment was spotless when we arrived and had everything you would need. Truth be told the pictures on the site don't do it justice. Great location walking distance to nice bars, restaurants etc. I'll be staying here next time i'm back in NY for sure. 10/10

Sal was great! I booked his place to house two trainees coming in to nyc from las vegas for work and he was super helpful with meeting up with them to get the keys to the place. The apartment was great, located in a safe part of williamsburg, very convenient to trains, restaurant and bars! He checked in with the two ladies during their stay to ensure that everything was going well. I would recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a friendly host and a nice place to stay in williamsburg brooklyn!
We had a brief stay at this apartment and it was great! Super central location and Sal made check in a breeze. Will definitely be staying here next time in town.

We were four adults and we stayed 10 days at Sal's place. It's a really nice place to stay, clean, quiet, a nice terrace and really close to subway and shops, bars etc. Sal is very reactive and friendly. I highly recommend this appartment in Brooklyn !

Sal is a great host. He did everything to accommodate our needs and timings and suggested great restaurants and bars in the area. I would recommend staying at his place which is not only clean and comfortable but also spacious for 4-6 people.

Thanks Sal! We had a great time

What you see in pictures is what you get in person. It's a very nice, clean, and well-kept place. It was perfect for our party of 4 travelers. The location is really good - in the heart of Williamsburg. We had no problems getting to the Subway. We actually drove and parked our car, and Sal gave us suggestions that made it all work out. I'd recommend this place and Sal to anyone.

Four of us had a great stay in the up and coming Williamsburg. There are a number of great bars and restaurants all within walking distance. There are also dry cleaners, laundrettes and supermarkets close by which is very handy on long stays.
Sal was a fantastic host with a great sense of humour. He gave us loads of info and history about the area so we didn't waste anytime in finding the best eating places to fill our stomachs! The place itself is spacious, clean and has a wonderful backyard if you want to enjoy the warm weather privately.its exactly abs it looks in the pictures!

The L train, which takes you straight to lower manhattan in 15 mins,is less than a 10min walk away. 

I would strongly recommend staying here if you want to taste the real New York. I'll definitely will be booking again next year!

Great location near G and L train line - 15 minutes to Grand Central Terminal (incl. walking to station). Sal was very friendly and carying - really pleasant stay, enjoyed that so much. Would come again - and hope I will!

Staying at Sal's place was exactly as advertised and more. He was very flexible on check-in and check-out based on our flights and once we arrived, was very helpful with tips on the area we were staying with (restaurants, supermarkets, metro, etc.). The area is really cool and very easy to live in. The flat is perfect. We were 3 people staying there. And we absolutely loved having the outdoor space.
Sal's place is great - I actually found it to be much larger than it appears in photos, and the location simply can't be beat! Overall, a fantastic Airbnb experience. Thanks.
This is a great place to stay! Great location, large rooms and very clean, our host was excellent and was very flexible around check in and check out times!
Great unit. Convenient location. Louis/ Sal was a great host.
Amazing place!

We didn't see Sal, but Luis, who wellcame us like a friend. The house is like the pictures, nice, confortable, the backyard is great. The neighbourhood  is quiet.You can find all you need on Grand street, and the Subway is nearby. This place is perfect to visit New York. It's really pleasant to come back in a such quiet place after a long walk in Manhattan. Thank you Luis, we want to thank Niegel too who called a cab for us to leave at time,  and thank you to Victor Emmanuel, who drive us to the Airport, our long talk was very nice. We recommend this address for sure.

My boyfriend and I had a great stay at Luis's place. It was convenient to the L train, and had great access to shops and restaurants, but is set aside on a quiet street. Access to the outdoor patio gave a sense of privacy and an escape from the busy city! Luis was a super host. Friendly, helpful, and available to us, though not over present. The apartment is clean and has more space than the pictures seem to reflect. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
The place was perfect! My friends that was invited over was all amazed and very pleased. Great location too. Definitely would use this place again in the near future.

Very roomy, great location away from the hassles of Manhattan, very responsive host, well equipped, comfortable beds.  Very easy access to subways, restaurants, and supermarkets.  Sal is very accommodating and flexible.

The place was great! It was spacious, clean, modern and has a sweet outdoor patio. It was close to many restaurants and to the train. The host was really friendly  and was flexible with check out time!

We stayed at Sals place for 9 days. We were greeted and made to feel right at home by Louis, The place was exactly as seen in airbnb. Although pictures don't do it justice. There were 4 adults and we all had plenty of space. We had an amazing time and had everything we needed for a brilliant stay in NYC. The subway is 5 mins walk and 25 minutes to Times Square. Leafy suburban quiet street , friendly neighbours and plenty of amenities nearby. If you are up to it you can even use citibikes from the end of the road and ride across the Brooklyn Bridge into Manhattan. Cycle paths all the way. Checkin/checkout times were extremely flexible which really helped us as we arrived at 8am and didn't leave until 11pm but our host was fabulous and was waiting when we arrived and allowed us to stay later on the day we went home. All in all 10/10

It was great to stay at Sal's place. Clean rooms, linens, easy to use shower and good bath tub. We had to check in after midnight, but he was very kind to guide us on the phone. There is a laundromat open til 10pm in the same block. I'd stay here again for next visit.
Awesome experience!! In an awesome part of Brooklyn, very walkable to anything you will need.  Sal is super friendly and definitely does whatever he can to give you your best experience.
Great location and awesome accommodations.

Sal's place was perfect for our group of 5. We were in town for a wedding and needed a place to settle in for the weekend. The bed's were comfortable, the apartment was spacious and clean and we had everything we needed (lots of clean towels, toiletries,etc). Luis was super helpful and friendly and available for any questions. The location is great, close to restaurants and nightlife. Would definitely stay again!
The entire experience was top notch. Excellent service and a clean space. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a good spot to jump off from into Brooklyn and NYC.
Sal's place was close to nice restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Close to the subway, but a quieter neighborhood compared to Manhattan. Host was very helpful.
Great place to stay!
Lovely apartment, lovely location, lovely host
Host was very responsive.  Very comfortable place to stay.  Outdoor patio was geat surprise.

I was in town with two other friends for a wedding in Brooklyn. Sal’s place was exactly as described and pictured. The place was clean and very convenient for all the events we needed to get to throughout the weekend. Highly recommend Sal as a host!

Sal's apartment is a great place to base yourself for a New York break. It is very clean, comfortable and pretty spacious. We had a great stay there. Great location and Sal/Louie really flexible and responsive in terms of meeting your needs. Lots of places close by for breakfast etc and a great walk or easy ride into central NY. Only slight issue was the loud heating early in the morning, but it's just the system. Would recommend.

Sal’s place was amazing it wasn’t far from the party scene in Brooklyn and was in a decent neighborhood. The heat got out of hand at night but opening the windows and having a fan in the bedroom surely helped. Sal had great communication and was patient with me when it came time for check in due to New York traffic! I️ give this spot 2 thumbs up!
Excelentes anfitriones en un lugar super ubicado, ideal para familias.
A wonderful place to call home for the weekend. It’s a very convenient and safe location and the host was extremely accommodating. I would highly recommend this Airbnb to other travelers!

Communication was excellent. We were met at the door and Sal (Luis) showed us around. The kitchen is stocked (sugar, coffee, some spices) and the refrigerator had almond milk and pasteles (a sort of Puerto Rican tamale). He made suggestions about local food--especially the very inexpensive and killer roasted chicken just around the corner. Also local are 2 big grocery stores and small stores featuring liquor, fruit, etc. The apartment is a short 5-6 blocks from the subway. We love the area. It's still the yet-to-be entirely gentrified end of Williamsburg, which means that the original neighborhood is still present while a few lovely coffee places are now available. Great new theatre in the other end of Williamsburg. For us--very exciting area. One future consideration is that the L subway will soon be out of commission for renovations, so if you don't have a car, you would need good bus directions. One other thought: the 2nd bedroom is downstairs with no window.

Quite spacious, very convenient location, close to tubes. We had some issues with the heating (way too hot!) due to old building but overall very pleasant stay. Sal/Luis were lovely and gave a lot of tips for restaurant around.

Sal's place was phenomenal. The location was great and everything you need is located within a few blocks. The best part of the rental was the owner. He is a really cool, knowledgeable, and down to earth guy who is actually from the neighborhood. If this listing is open grab it as quick as possible he will be a power renter soon. A++++ will stay here anytime I'm in Brooklyn.
Apartment was perfect for family stay..clean, spacious and close to transportation
The location was fantastic. A bunch of bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. Would highly recommend staying here!
Great location and much larger space than expected! Beautiful outdoor patio as well
Nice place!  It is a short walk to Wiliamsburg (about 10-15 minutes).

We booked last minute and Lewis was so responsive and accommodating! The place was clean, and the L train into the city is just a few blocks away. We enjoyed sitting on the patio and planning our trip. We would definitely stay here again!
This place is awesome!! I would definitely stay again. Perfect location, great hosts, super clean and new! Can't wait until the next trip! Highly recommended

My friends and I had a fantastic stay here! Luis was a wonderful host and told us of some great spots to visit, eat and hangout at. The subway is less than a 10 minute walk and everything you need is close by. 
The apartment is clean and has a great outdoor patio in the back. 
Would definitely come back if we visit again!
We had a really nice time at Sal's place - the neighborhood was great and he had wonderful recommendations - we loved Gimme Coffee!
All is exactly what you see: a clean and attractive place close to the L train.
This place is absolutely phenomenal!! The patio is fabulous and the rooms are spacious and clean. No hot tub, but instead a Jacuzzi tub. This place is 10 out of 10.
Loved everything about this place! Would highly recommend!
Stayed at this place again for a similar work trip. Everything about the second stay was equally as good as the first. I highly recommend!

Decent place overall with cleanliness and . Just a little bit of frustration with the lack of privacy. We understand the concern for potential issues for other guests misusing the apartment, but it is another thing to constantly check on what we were doing.  The interference definitely made an impact on what was supposed to be a spot for us just to sleep in.
A nice place to base our stay while exploring NYC. Great location close to coffee shops, grocers, restaurants and the subway. Thanks to Sal and Louis for your hospitality.

Great location within a walking distance to many restaurants. 

We were met at the apartment by our host and shown how everything works. It was a hot day and we appreciated that he turned on the air before we arrived. 

There is an enclosed backyard with comfortable seating which we enjoyed in the mornings while making our plans for the day. 

Would definitely stay again when back in Brooklyn.

We had a wonderful stay at Sal’s place! We were greeted by Luis upon arrival and he showed us all around the house and even offered local tips about the neighborhood. Luis was extremely welcoming and great with communication! The house was sparkling clean and very well kept. The fridge was stocked with water, iced tea, beers, and various extras, along with plenty of coffee and tea. Everything was in working condition and beds were comfortable. Altogether, my family had another fun stay in Brooklyn while at Sal’s house. It’s within walking distance to all our favorite places in Williamsburg and Bushwick.
Great place! Great communication! Spacious and great location! Would definitely stay again!

Luis met us late in the evening as our flight was delayed. He showed us everything, gave us some local places to have a coffee or buy some food. 
The flat is clean, well equipped and very well located. Less than 10 minutes walk from the subway and then 3 stops to Union Square. We appreciated it a lot to leave crazy Manhattan in the evening and enjoy the quiet but lively Williamsburg area. 
We definitely  recommend Luis’ place.

We were five friends living in this lovely appartment for one week. There were all the things we needed, several subwaystops in walking distanse and the store was just around the corner. The appartment was clean, and we used the backyard quite a lot to eat breakfast. We recommend the place and would love to come back one day
Thanks!
Great place, great location.
Great hosts!
great spot neaet the train in Brooklyn.

Our stay was excellent. The space was sparkling clean, private and safe. There was ample room and privacy for three adults (one married couple, one single person). Louis, who met us for an earlier than expected check-in, showed us the space, gave us tips for the neighborhood and offered any assistance we needed - if we needed it. Otherwise, we had the apartment to ourselves. We would completely recommend this space! Thank you so much.

Great place! 
Enjoy everyone!

It's a nice apartment and the location is also good. Right into the lively Williamsburg. It was also clean and we had a lot of space. In the beginning Sal responded really quickly, but as the trip got closer he wasn't communicating very well. That's the only remark I have
We has a great time in Williamsburg, lots of great places to eat and drink nearby.
A great place to stay in Brooklyn! Easy access to the subway. Great restaurants nearby as well.
Really nice place, just a short subway ride from Bedford Avenue in Williamsburg and from Manhattan

I can’t recommend this place enough!  Perfect safe location to walk to restaurants, coffee shops and subway station to tour NYC!  Sal and members of his family live & grew up in this neighborhood and are always available if you need anything!  They are all very helpful and truly make you feel like this is your home away from home. Totally clean and updated space with a nice backyard to enjoy a glass of wine at the end of a great day!  I can’t say enough good things about Sal’s hospitality, location or his awesome home!  Thanks Sal — we’ll be back!!
appartement nickel pour 4 personnes  avec lit 2 places pr tt le monde

Williamsburg is a great location. The place is clean and has most everything you might need. A solid option. They are doing work on the nearby L train in 2018/2019, so research stoppages if you are counting on that transportation.

This place was brilliant for our first trip to New York. We had great suggestions for local food and drink places from the host. The pace was very clean and the Beds were very comfortable. There is not a door separating the downstairs bedroom but this was not a problem for our group. A few helpful drink and food items left by the host made things easy when we arrived. Also appreciate being allowed to leave bags on the last day. Close to transport links also.
Super nice guy! Very helpful, responded on time to any questions we had and the apt is great-- we were four people and all slept very comfortably. Would defanately rent from him again.
Excellent host. Effortless check-in/check-out experience. Above and beyond expectations. Great neighborhood tips. Convenient to subway. Will return.
Sal’s place was very clean and convenient to restaurants and the grocery store. Check in and check out was a breeze. I would recommend staying here.
Sal’s place was great. It is a short walk from the L train making it easy to get anywhere you want. The apartment was very clean!
Clean and comfy.

Good location, clean, Tony greeted us very friendly. A few small additions would benefit future visitors; lamps in all areas not just overhead lights, shampoo, ability to regulate baseboard heating otherwise, all good!

name: Cozy and modern Lapa-studio
summary: Studio in modernized building with games room, gym, computer room, ballroom and rooftop pool. The studio with modern, cheerful decor, with light vintage feel is divided into bedroom and living room with kitchen.
space: Split air conditioning and all household items. Located near Arcos da Lapa and Rua do Lavradio, the most bohemian place in Rio de Janeiro. Close to numerous museums, art galleries, show houses, restaurants and bars. Located in the famous Lapa district of Rio de Janeiro, Flat Viva Lapa offers an outdoor pool and a gym. This property is located 1 km from Largo da Carioca subway station and 2 km from the Sambódromo, one of the attractions in the carnival. The building has a contemporary design, a TV and air conditioning, split. There is a terrace, an equipped kitchen, a dining area and living room. The private bathroom has a hot shower. You will enjoy the view of the city. In the Building you have a sauna, hot tub and barbecue, as well as other facilities such as meeting rooms, a common lounge and a games room are offered. There is also a bar and a snack bar on site. The flat is 5 minutes' walk from shops, restaurants and bars. Flamengo Beach and Maracanã Stadium are 6 km away. You will b
