You will enjoy the view of the city. In the Building you have a sauna, hot tub and barbecue, as well as other facilities such as meeting rooms, a
neighborhood_overview: The nearby cultural centers need to be visited. Do not miss Rio's newest museum: the MAR, the Imperial Palace where you can listen to good music in its graceful bistro, the cultural centers of the Bank of Brazil and Post Office and the museum of modern art. Usually they all have great exhibits, mostly for free. The night of Lapa is vibrant, lively. That's where the locals have fun. In the surroundings of the apartment there are more than ten nightclubs and places where you can listen and dance to typical Brazilian music. Traditional bars and restaurants are within walking distance of the apartment. Santa Tereza, nearby neighborhood is worth a visit. The staircase of the artist Seleron, also deserves to be visited. You can frequent the night life and come back safe walking home.
notes: Situado en el famoso barrio de Lapa, en Río de Janeiro, el plano Viva Lapa ofrece una piscina al aire libre y un gimnasio. Este establecimiento cuenta con Wi-Fi y completa se encuentra la propiedad es de 1 km de la estación de metro Largo da Carioca y 2 km del Sambódromo, una de las atracciones de la feria. El edificio cuenta con un diseño contemporáneo, TV y aire acondicionado split. Hay una terraza, una cocina, un comedor y sala de estar. El baño privado tiene una ducha de agua caliente. Usted puede disfrutar de la vista de la ciudad. En el edificio que dispone de sauna, bañera de hidromasaje y bañera de barbacoa, y otras comodidades como salas de reuniones, un salón de uso común y una sala de juegos se ofrecen. Además, hay un bar y un snack bar en el lugar. El piso es de 5 minutos de las tiendas de senderismo, restaurantes y bares. La playa de Flamengo y el estadio Maracaná son 6 km de distancia. Usted será 2.7km del aeropuerto Santos Dumont ya 18 del aeropuerto de Galeao.
transit: Easy access to all the city, several lines of bus and taxi circulate in the street Gomes Freire, with access to all the city. At 30 minutes from Copacabana, Ipanema, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, 20 minutes from Corcovado and Sugar Loaf and 30 minutes from the international airport (by taxi). Metro station about 20 minutes walk. About 3 minutes from the famous street of Lavradio and several nightclubs, restaurants and bars. Bakery, pharmacy and supermarket less than 1 minute walk. The most bohemian place in Rio de Janeiro. Several museums and cultural center within a 20 minute walk. Bus lines circulate in Gomes Freire to many places in the city, including Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon. Taxis are not expensive and they circulate all the time in the area. About 500 meters from Cinelândia subway station.
access: Guests will have access to all the facilities of the building.
interaction: Guests can contact the owner anytime they need it via phone, Whatsaap or email. The owner will not be present during the stay of the guest, leaving him very at ease.
house_rules: Cinco passos para ser um ótimo hóspede e ganhar uma excelente avaliação! : 1) Não é permitido a entrada de pessoas que não estejam registradas.  2) Não é permitido barulho,  respeite as regras do condomínio.  3) Não é permitido a presença de animais.  4) If you break glasses and/or plates, you replace it, please..... 5) Não é permitido fumar dentro do apartamento, nem mesmo na janela, ótima oportunidade para ficar ao ar livre! 6) Não deixe as luzes acessas, nem o ar condicionado ligado ao sair. O ambiente e eu agradecemos! 7) Não leve as toalhas de banho para a praia, se ficarem manchadas com protetor solar terei que solicitar a sua reposição. All over, please leave it in a shape you would like to find!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Moro no Rio de Janeiro, nascida em Salvador. Resolvi alugar este apartamento,  principalmente por que gosto muito de viajar e quando viajo, prefiro alugar um espaço para ficar. Alugar um apartamento em outra cidade, outro país, além de ser mais barato do que hotel, possibilita uma maior interação com os moradores locais e um maior conhecimento sobre o seu modo de vida. Como são os supermercados e as padarias, o que vendem ali ? qual é o dia a dia da população?  Além disto não há horário para o café da manhã e posso fazer um lanche ou almoço se não quiser ir a um restaurante.
Procuro trazer as minhas experiências de hospedagem para o meu apartamento, pois quero que o hóspede se sinta confortável, em casa.
Além de gostar muito de viajar, adoro ler e ouvir música e pretendo com o dinheiro que ganho hospedando, poder me hospedar mais pelo mundo a fora.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: What a great appartement in the most vivid neighbourhood of Rio de Janeiro. The appartment was clean and had everything I needed and more! Rio Scenarium just around the corner, so If you like samba and dancing, this is the pace to be. And Dejanira was a great host.

O estúdio é muito bem localizado, com mercado, padaria, bares e restaurantes próximos. O estúdio é exatamente como nas fotos e é bem equipado, com louças, cafeteira, torradeira, etc. O prédio é muito seguro e possui uma infra muito boa. Não cheguei a conhecer Dejanira pessoalmente, mas ela foi muito atenciosa conosco. Recomendo!
Apartamento muito confortável e bem localizado! Foi perfeito para a nossa estadia! A Dejanira nos deixou super a vontade e não deixou nada a desejar! Voltaremos mais vezes com certeza!

Tudo conforme descrito, apto bem localizado, Dejanira sempre pronta para nos atender, uma Brahma na geladeira de boas vindas, enfim foi uma experiência excelente em minha primeira viagem via Airbnb. Abraço e muito obrigado Dejanira.

When i came at the adres the doorman gave me the keys. The appartment is in the middle of Lapa on a perfect location!! Bars and restaurants are just around the corner. The appartment was so nice with everything you need. A small kitchen, fridge, nice hot shower, good bed, television. And the gym and sauna down and pool on the rooftop made it all perfect. Come back for sure!! Love this city and place to stay:) thanks!!

El departamento está muy bueno, corresponde exactamente a las fotografías.
Está ubicado exactamente en la movida de Río. Esta inmerso en pleno centro de Río. Al lado de Lapa, muy cerca de barrio Santa Teresa. La calle del edificio es dónde pasan ómnibus y taxis. 
Esta a un par de cuadras de estación del tren subterráneo.
La comunicación con la conserjería del edificio es muy buena y tratan de ayudar ante cualquier problema.
Very nice apartment, with a pool and steam rroom available, dejinara was very helpful. Lapa is the place to be if you like to party. Highly recommended

I really had great time in Dejanira's place. The location is perfect, close to everything I needed to do and lovely atmosphere during the June's Lapa parties. The place corresponds to the pictures and Dejanira is always ready to reply to any questions. I would love to stay there again!

I highly appreciated safety of the place: secure entry and someone at the reception 24 hours. 
The place was extremely clean and had most of the necessary appliances with exception of an iron. Yet the apartment complex has laundry services.
There were some issues with internet (36 hours or so) but that was not Dejanira's fault, rather local provider's.

Dejanira was very responsive.
TLDR: if you want to stay in that part of the city, I strongly recommend considering that apartment.

Our time in Rio staying at Dejanira's apartment was fantastic, I personally don't think that the photos do the property justice and feel that in person the property is actually bigger! The facilities were fantastic and we enjoyed using the pool (which is also a lot bigger in person) which has stunning views over Rio, including Christ the Redeemer on Corcovado mountain. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and learnt our faces immediately so we had no problem at all gaining access to the very secure apartment (the staff buzz you in the gates via CCTV). The neighbourhood is more downtown Rio and if you like a good night out it will be perfect for you. We didn't feel that the neighbourhood was the safest of areas in Rio, but then again anywhere in Rio during the night isn't the safest place to be. The noise from the street at night was sometimes a little loud especially on Fridays and Saturdays which are extremely busy times in Lapa however we understand that this noise is unavoidable and inevitable. It must also be taken into consideration that we were in Rio for the busiest two weeks of the year, during the 2016 Olympics, a time when at night there were hundreds of thousands of tourists on the streets as well as the locals! Despite this as soon as we entered the double electronic gated apartment block we felt completely at ease and safe and during or time in Rio we spent one of the day's exploring Lapa, admiring its arches and the colourful artwork and graffiti that the locality had to offer. The apartment was perfect for us, size, location, accessibility were all excellent. Our neighbours were very friendly and helpful and would always say "good morning" and "good evening" in the elevator throughout the day. There was a very convenient supermarket just 1 minutes  walk from the apartment and the kitchen had everything you could possible need. If however you prefer to eat out, Lapa has many excellent bars and restaurants and so does Copacabana and Ipanena if you want to travel a little further away. The shower was particularly excellent-hot water was always in abundance. This apartment had everything we wanted and we couldn't have asked for a better place to stay during our time spent in Rio De Janeiro for the Olympics. If and when we ever return to Rio Dejanira's apartment is the only option for us and we would love to stay there again.
Excelente! Tudo conforme o combinado! Retorno garantido!

Gostamos muito do apartamento, as fotos são exatamente como ele é. A Dejanira foi muito atenciosa, simpática, antes, durante e após a nossa viagem. O apt é excelente tem tudo que se precisa, me senti em casa. É bem localizado, fácil acesso a tudo. Recomendo sem dúvidas. Obrigada até a próxima.
the place is really amazing, everything in the building, services and the apto are great.

My experience at Dejanira's flat was very good. The apartment itself is spacious, clean, with all the facilities that you might need, like AC, WiFi, Fan etc. The Building is very good located, close to Lapa, with a lot of restaurants, bars, pubs. Metro Station is about 15 mins walk (Cinelandia). Dejanira was attentive and made sure that everything was ok. I can just recommend her and her apartment.
Dejanira fue una excelente host, siempre muy atenta

El departamento es excelente, muy confortable, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. El barrio es muy típico de Río, muy bohemio, mucho movimiento nocturno. Bien conectado con el resto de la ciudad y cómodo en cuanto a servicios y abastecimiento diarios. 
La pileta es muy cómoda, la gente del edificio muy cordial y amable. Dejanira sumamente atenta, contesta en seguida los mensajes y es muy clara y cálida.
Un gusto alojarse acá, lo recomendaría siempre. Imperdible.

O apartamento é fiel as fotos. Muito confortável, bonito e tudo funciona. Tivemos acesso a piscina, o que foi muito bom para os momentos em que não queríamos andar pela cidade. Bem localizado, não tivemos dificuldade para ir a lugar algum. Os funcionários do prédio são muito educados e solicitos e aproveitamos muito a Lapa a pé, sempre nos sentindo seguros. Obrigada Dejanira!
Great place to stay!! Has everything you need and it's close to everything. It's thee perfect place to stay in Rio

Adoramos o apartamento da Dejanira. Eu e minha namorada ficamos lá por 6 dias, e saímos encantados. O apartamento é bem localizado, fica próximo a pontos turísticos da cidade, no centro da Lapa, próximo a bares e ao mesmo tempo um prédio seguro. E a anfitriã é bastante solícita, acessível. O apartamento estava limpo e organizado. Só elogios ao apartamento da Dejanira. Não vemos a hora de voltar.

Stay at Dejanira's place was the best stay in Airbnb for me. With a decent price you'll get everything. A modern and clean apartment with a very good air-conditioning, sauna, 24h gym and the most welcoming host.

If one thing should be said about the apartment it is that in the weekends it can get a bit noisy, but that is what you should expect when staying in Lapa.

Highly recommend this stay!
Amei!!! Ambiente tranquilo, aconchegante e bem (Website hidden by Airbnb) recomendo

The stay at Dejanira's appartement was absolutely delightful. Although I didn't meet the host in person, she was very nice, available and accommodating all throughout the reservation, and also caring when need be. It was a pleasure communicating with her! 
The place was clean and modern, cozy and perfect for two people to stay comfortably. It is right in the center, close to everything and very lively, as much in the day as it is at night. It made our stay very pleasant and practical.
The residence is safe and well cared for. 
Would recommend 100% for any kind of stay in the beautiful Rio!

Apartamento super bem equipado, limpo, confortável e aconchegante, eu e minha esposa conseguimos tanto descansar quanto curtir o RJ, me senti muito bem com tudo, sem falar na comunicação que foi ótima sempre que precisamos! A Lapa é um bairro bem movimentado com diversos bares e restaurantes e perto do centro, onde íamos a pé. Com certeza voltaremos em breve para uma nova confortável estadia!

The apartment was great. Very safe and secure building with friendly staff at reception . There was steam room/ gym/ swimming pool/ bar which were all added extras in making a great stay. Dejanira was really easy to contact and made arrangements for us to check in early on arrival. She kept in contact with us throughout the stay and even advised us of demonstrations in the area and to be careful which was kind. Overall very comfortable and enjoyable place to stay.
Great apartment in an amazing location. The host was very nice. Would highly recommend

name: 2 BR Oceanview - Great Location!
summary: Location, location, location... This is a great 2 bed, 2 bath condo is within walking distance to fabulous restaurants, all kinds of shopping, and even the grocery store.  Simply walk across the street to the beach for swimming, surfing & kayaking.
space: This two bedroom, two bathroom condo is located in Kihei Parkshore.  The complex has 16 units, some owner occupied, some rentals.  The condo has everything you need to enjoy island living including air conditioners in each bedroom and in the living room, comfortable beds and couches.  The kitchen is small but well equipped with the basics to cook a meal.  The lanai has an electric BBQ and is just steps from the gated pool. The condo offers beach chairs, umbrella, boogie boards and other miscellaneous beach toys.  There is also  a cooler to take to the beach or day trips around the island.

Simply walk across the street to the beach for swimming, surfing & kayaking. This two bedroom, two bathroom condo is located in Kihei Parkshore. neighborhood_overview: Kihei Parkshore is located directly across from a great surfing beach.  There are several spots to rent gear and even take lessons.  A block away are several restaurants, bars and shopping.  The grocery store is just one block further.  Kalama Park is also across the street and offers horseshoes,  a playground, tennis courts, basketball courts, baseball and soccer fields.  There are also many spots to BBQ and picnic tables to enjoy your meal.
notes: Tax ID #W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: While renting a car is recommended, the bus is close by and easily accessible.  In addition to the major car rental companies, we have several local companies that offer older model cars at discounted rates.
access: The condo has a key-less entry door lock.  You simply type in your unique door code and the door will unlock.  No keys to loose!
interaction: I live in the complex and am available to help with any problems or questions about the complex or activities on Maui.
house_rules: There is no smoking in the complex.  Guests are required to go to the front sidewalk if they wish to smoke.  Pool hours are from 8 am to 9 pm.  Pets are not allowed.  Quiet hours are from 9 pm to 8 am.  The bedrooms are located near the parking area so please be as quiet as possible so as not to disturb other occupants.

reviews.comments:
The perfect spot for a surfer to land as The Cove is directly across the street and checking the surf from the room with a cup of coffee was the early morning ritual :) Awesome backyard with pool and shower area. A most enjoyable walk to great food like Kihei Cafe for breaky and South Maui Fish Company Food Truck for the best fish tacos. 

Comfortable beds with plenty of pillows, lots of beach necessities in unit, and easy parking make this a perfect spot for families or a couple like us. 

Jennifer was easy to work with and very responsive and accommodating! Will be back for sure!

Jennifer was available and helpful. She did what she said she'd do. The space is in one of the best spots in Kihei! Couldn't get any better as far as location goes..if you're wanting to enjoy sunsets on the ocean, a little pool right outside your door, walking to the ocean, surfing, great food, and the beauty of this area, this spot is an affordable little gem.

A perfect location! And we walk to Breck café in. Best fraannd❤️ A perfect location! And we walk to Kihei café every morning. Best breakfast ever! The condo was great for us. Cute and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again.

Jennifer was a great, accommodating host.  She assisted with early check-in since nobody was staying the evening before!  She also allowed us to have our privacy, though remained in close contact via text throughout my 4-day stay.  She does live above the apartment (a separate entrance entirely) so it's possible to have her help easily.

I was pleased with the location directly across the street from the water (not a swimming beach but a couple-minute drive to several great sandy beaches).  Fine food options nearby.  I recommend Joy's Place around the corner for smoothies or an acai bowl.  And I recommend the awesome poke truck two blocks over for great fish!

Jennifer's place was perfect for my family vacation.  This 2BR with pool and yard is nice, and across the road from a local surf spot.  We rented longboards one day and SUPs from the surf shop next door.  The patio was quite enjoyable to eat our meals.  She has a well stocked kitchen.  Jennifer was responsive to my questions, and was helpful suggesting a late night restaurant, Zippy's, for our evening arrival.
The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Overall, Jennifer was a good host.  She responded to everything and does actually live close by (a good thing too, because the door code wasn't working when we arrived, but it was quickly addressed).  She was also helpful in giving us a bit of extra time for check-out.

Just to say a couple things about the actual condo, the pictures do portray it in the best possible light.  Nothing deceptive, but there are elements that could use updating that are not shown.  The bathrooms need some TLC and there are lots of wires and cords everywhere (especially the bedrooms).  Everything else was clean and safe.  The kitchen is up-to-date with every appliance you should need, including a blender and toaster.  There is a newer washer and dryer right in the unit, which is very convenient.  We didn't use the TVs, but there are 3 of them - one in the main living room and one in each bedroom.  Parking was very convenient - a reserved spot that's just steps away from the ground level entrance (the condo is on the ground level and doesn't have any stairs).  There are several beach accessories waiting as well - a cooler, beach chairs and boogie boards are there for your use, along with plenty of beach towels.  There are 3 AC units and all of them worked, but they are noisy.

The noise level outside was generally good.  There were a few inconsiderate very early morning departures from other units, but nothing major.  The park across the road closes at 8pm, so there was no late-night noise to speak of.

The location in general is great.  The park across the road is not a swimming beach (no sand, too many rocks), but it's very popular for surfing and paddleboarding lessons.  There are several sandy beaches just a short drive (or healthy walk) away.  Kihei in general is a great spot to stay, as it's near several  great beaches (Big Beach in Makena is epic) and is central to a lot of things you'll want to see - the upscale Wailea area is just a short drive away and several other destinations are easily driveable from Kihei.  There are lots of food choices close by and many of them offer some of the best value you'll find in Maui.  There's also 2 supermarkets right down the road (and Foodland is open until 1am).

To summarize, the condo was more "rustic" than we were expecting, but I will say that in the area, you'd likely have to pay a bit more for something more updated that has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
Wonderful host great location

Jennifer's place has everything you need in the perfect location. It was my first time in Maui, & I absolutely enjoyed it. Jennifer's place was literally right across the street from Kalama Beach Park & a very short walk (~10 min.) from Charley Young Beach. Her place is very centrally located in Kihei: directly next to the surf/paddleboard rental, 5 min. walking distance from a shopping village, & in the middle of the island, which is nice if you plan on doing the drives to Mt. Haleakala or the Road to Hana. Safeway is a short ~5 min. drive & Costco & the airport are a ~30 minute drive away. Her place has everything you need: kitchen, washer/dryer, beach towels/chairs, nice outdoor patio with a nice, small pool. I highly recommend her place if you want a quiet, quaint, peaceful place to relax where everything you need is a short distance away. Jennifer was also very prompt in her responses and very easy to get a hold of. Thanks again for everything, Jennifer!!! My family & I loved everything about our stay at your place.

We had a fabulous stay. The condo is in a great location with amazing view of sunset across the road, which you can enjoy from the pool and short 10 min walk to a very nice beach. The apartment is spacious and kitchen was well equipped. Jennifer was a very nice host! We will definitely stay again.

This condo is in a great place in Kihei next to great beaches, shopping, restaurants and a grocery store. Jennifer was an outstanding host and worked diligently to help solve some credit card issues prevent us from booking. Compared to other condos in this area this is a great deal even if it is a tad dated. We would highly recommend this place to anyone staying in the kehei area of Maui!
We loved this location, close to several beautiful beaches, shops and farmers market.  Jennifer was always available to answer questions and concerns.  House is well equipped for our family of five.

This condo is in the perfect location and has a lot of space for the price. Loved having two bedrooms and 1 1/2 baths. The pool area is beautiful and you are right across the street from the ocean. The condo is slightly outdated, but it doesn’t affect the overall experience of being in Maui. Washing machine and dryer were a huge plus.
Awesome location. Very easy and straight forward checkin please process. The host was very easy to communicate and always respond very quickly.
Everything was as expected. Pool was quite small but who needs that when you have wonderful beaches close by. Great place to stay overall!
Great location, amenities, and responsiveness by the host. Whether you want to explore or relax, you have it all available here.
Nice, clean and well stocked place. GREAT LOCATION.

name: Fabulous occasion orange
summary: You are in the epicenter of Porto's life! Monuments as Clerigos Tower, Eifell bridge "D. Luis" and Ribeira, the riverside, S. Bento train station, Restaurants, shops,cafés...everything is just around the corner.
description: You are in the epicenter of Porto's life! Monuments as Clerigos Tower, Eifell bridge "D. Luis" and Ribeira, the riverside, S. Bento train station, Restaurants, shops,cafés...everything is just around the corner. Always there for you!! Está no coração do Porto.  Perto de tudo para visitar.  Estação de metro SÃO BENTO, autocarros, estação de comboios SÃO BENTO tudo a 40 metros de distância do apartamento.
neighborhood_overview: Está no coração do Porto.  Perto de tudo para visitar.  Estação de metro SÃO BENTO, autocarros, estação de comboios SÃO BENTO tudo a 40 metros de distância do apartamento.
interaction: Always there for you!!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Passamos uma agradável noite no studio de Dulce, equipado com o indispensável para curtas estadias. A cama, cujo acesso se dá por meio de uma escada, é bastante confortável. A localização é excelente e central. Dulce foi muito simpática e nos acolheu muito bem. Recomendamos!

Dulce was picking us up at the corner of the street. The apartment is in a very central area close to the city center and close to the river. Everything was clean and nice. It is a charming place to stay.
Great place, right in the centre. Had a great time

It is what it is!! A FABULOUS occasion! The situation is ideal. . Dulce is very nice and always answers promptly to questions and/or other needs.. The place is sooo charming!  You cannot have a better location: everything is around you! And the appartement so clean, intimate and simple.. and the price! Just too right.. thank you SO much to offer this nice appartement to people who travels this must see area!  

We wish to come back another time! 

Marie & Billy

Dulce est vraiment une hôte géniale. Malgré un retard d'avion de plus de 9h, elle nous a attendus. Très gentille, arrangeante et disponible, tout s'est très bien passé ! L'appartement est propre et fonctionnel pour passer un long week-end. Également très bien situé, nous avons pu tout faire à pieds, notamment le soir où les bars sont proches. Je recommande vivement Duce et son joli appartement ! En espérant revenir avec le soleil !

Dulce est une hôte au TOP. L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel, très bien situé, nous avons tout visité a pieds il est vraiment au centre de tout, notamment pour les sorties le soir. Je recommande à 1 000% l’appartement en espérant  y retourner prochainement.

Nous avons passés 4 jours magnifiques à Porto dans un logement très agréable : propre et bien équipé .
L'accueil à été parfait , Dulce est sympathique et avenante, elle nous a bien guidé. 
Elle parle bien le français et nous a renseigné sur les adresses utiles : alimentation, métro. ...
첫 에어비앤비 이용 숙소였는데 정말 좋았어요! 집은 한국의 복층원룸식이고 침대가 복층에 있어서 예상과 조금 다르긴했지만, 깔끔했고 두명이 쓰는데는 부족함이 없었습니다. 가장 좋았던건 위치! 상벤토역 바로 앞이라고 해도 될 정도에요. 그리고 호스트도 정말 친절하고 좋았습니다. 포르투에 다시 방문한다면 같은 곳으로 가고 싶어요!

Beautiful studio! Everything was perfect I felt like I didn't want to leave the house lol. Thank you Dulce for being so helpful with all the useful information you have given. Will surely come back to stay there again if I'm back to Porto. Love from Malaysia, June.

Das Apartment liegt mitten in Portos Altstadt und ist somit der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um Porto zu erkunden! Es war super sauber und alles entspricht den Bildern. Ein Parkhaus befindet sich nur 20m entfernt und kostet 15€/ 24h. Dulce ist sehr freundlich und wir waren sehr zufrieden mit unserem Aufenthalt!

LOOK NO where else!
Dulce place is superb, actual look BETTER then pictures and very clean and well equip.  Location is superb, just 300 meters from San Bentos station, and I literally walk everywhere and did not use any public transport at all and all attraction is less then 700meters from her place, shoping, restaurants and bars below her place but yet NOT noisy at night.  Can't find better place to stay in Porto.   

Dulce is swift in respond and met me in arrival despite delay of 2 hours and gave orientation of her place.  She also as assisted to book me a taxi at 4:30am to airport for my early flight.

Highly recommend for you to stay at Dulce place! You will not regret :) enjoy beautiful PORTO!
Dulce was an excellent and accommodating host. The apartment is in the best, most central location and is very sweet. Thanks for a great few days in Porto!

Reçus par Dulce avec un large sourire et un français parfait. ..disponible et présente pour nous conseiller sur les visites .l'appartement est très agréable et très bien placé, les photos
et description sont à l'identique. Je recommanderais cette adresse à tous mes amis...
시내 한 가운데에 위치한 집이라 어디로든 접근성이 참 좋았습니다. 걸어서 강까지도 금방이구요. 호스트인 Dulce도 친절하고 도움이 많이 되었습니다. 깔끔한 복층 구조라서 숙박하는 내내 즐거웠습니다. 다음에 포르투에 온다면 또다시 이 곳에 묵고 싶어요.
Hermosisimo apartamento no hay mejor ubicación, Dulce muy amable y cordial.

Logement parfait, très beau et propre. Localisation parfaite, proche de tout les lieux à visiter. Dulce à été très disponible répondant à tous messages et nous a même conseillée quelques coins sympa en français parfait. 
Une bonne adresse où nous retournerons sans hésitation.
The apartment is in the very center of the city. Very comfortable and cosy, there's everything you could need, close to the subway. But it's very noisy there. That's the only disadvantage
The apartment was perfect for our needs. Brilliant central location, very clean, well equipped. Dulce was very welcoming and gave us some good tips on places to eat locally.

Dulce nous a accueillis d'une manière parfaite.
L'appartement est magnifique. Exactement comme sur les photos. Très propre. Petit mais cosy et rien ne manque. Avec (Website hidden by Airbnb) situation parfaite ! plein de petits restos, bistrots, pâtisseries, boutiques. La gare à 2 pas...
Seul bémol : le bruit. 
 Nous devions repartir très tôt le matin. Dulce s'est occupée de réserver notre taxi.

Nous avons séjourné une nuit dans ce magnigique petit appartement sur un coin de rue très touristique. C'était très propre et très lumineux. Le lit en mezzanine était confortable. Dulce a été facile à rejoindre et était au rendez-vous pour nous remettre la clé. C'est très bien situé pour visiter Porto à pied. Attention au stationnement qui peut revenir cher si vous ne chercher pas bien. Lors de notre séjour, il y a eu beaucoup de bruit dans la rue la nuit et tôt le matin mais étant une personne qui a le sommeil facile, cela ne m'a pas trop gêné. Je recommande ce petit appartement

Amazing!!! Dulce was a lovely host who was always quick to respond to emails, met us around 10pm, gave us some tips about the beautiful Porto, and answered all of our questions. The flat was exactly as described and had more than what we needed and was spotless. The location was so perfect - walking distance to shops, great restaurants, port wine tasting, and breathtaking scenery. If we are ever back in Porto, we will definitely stay at Dulce's flat!! We highly recommend it! 
I wish we were able to give more than 5 stars...

Alles war gut, die Wohnung ist genau so wie beschrieben. Von hier ist man schnell an allen hotspots der Stadt. Der Bahnhof ist gleich um die Ecke und man kann Ausflüge ins Umland unternehmen. Sehr empfehlenswert.
Dulces apartment was situated very good in Porto center.All monuments in walking distance.We enjoyed our stay very much.
Dulce was really friendly and helpful. The place is so central! Really good place to stay if you want to explore Porto.

Excelente ubicación. Buena vista. Muy limpio. Equipado con todo lo básico. Muy buen trato de la anfitriona. Fue mi error no fijarme que decía "Dormitorios: 0", o sea que lo que hay es una cama en un entrepiso de techo bajo, al que se sube por escalera. Y atención: no está el número de puerta, es el primer edificio de apartamentos del lado de los números pares. Pasamos muy bien en el apartamento y en esta hermosa ciudad.

Отличное расположение квартиры. Центральнее не бывает. Всё, буквально, в двух-трех шагах. Дульсе очень позитивный, веселый человек. Связались с ней по Ватсаппу  за пару дней до поездки, она постоянно была на связи. Приехали чуть раньше оговоренного, хозяйка нас уже ждала в квартире. Всё необходимое для полноценного отдыха в квартире есть. Ну, может за исключением мыла))) Не критично, но пришлось покупать на месте. А в остальном всё прошло великолепно! Старинное здание, красивейший город, прекрасная страна.

Dulce was great, she allowed us to leave our baggages in the flat before 14:00, because we arrived to Oporto really soon. 

The apartment was really clean, beautifull and in a very centric location, only 1 min walking from Sao Bento station.

Dulce was really available in every moment when we had doubts about the apartment or about Porto.

We totally recommend to book Dulce´s flat!
The apartment is in a fabulous location, right in the center of town and 1 minute from Sao Bento train station. The room is comfortable and clean.

Dulce ist eine sehr nette und freundliche Gastgeberin. Als wir auf der Suche nach dem Eingang waren, stand sie bereits oben am Fenster und hat uns den Eingang gezeigt. Es ging weiter mit einem freundlichem Empfang und einem Gespräch über die Wohnung sowie Porto. Sie bot zudem an, dass wir uns jederzeit bei ihr melden können wenn wir Fragen haben oder wenn es uns an etwas fehlt. Es war also alles super!

Die Lage der Wohnung ist super, wenn man die historische Altstadt von Porto erkunden will. Direkt am Bahnhof Sao Bento, dem großen zentralen Platz von Porto und 5 Minuten Fußweg zum Rio Doro und der Ribera. In unmittelbarer Nähe befindet sich auch ein kleiner Supermarkt sowie einige Cafés. Auf Grund der belebten Lage und einer Ampel mit Tonsignal in direkter Nachbarschaft, waren wir aber sehr froh Ohrenstöpsel für die Nacht zu haben. Ist natürlich jedem selber überlassen und Geschmacksache, aber uns hat es geholfen.

Die Unterkunft war genau so wie sie auf den Bildern beschrieben ist. Alles ist sauber und ordentlich. Wir würden die Unterkunft jederzeit wieder beziehen. Es hat uns sehr gut gefallen und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

It was a very nice little flat ,very good location , great modern and new furnitures , good smell in the apartement, extra clean!!!
easy to reach almost everything by foot .
Very much recommended, it was a pleasure to stay there.
Appartement très bien placé pour découvrir le centre ville de Porto.

Dulce's place was in a great location in the city center, walkable to restaurants, shops and the metro. It was clean and Dulce was very communicative.

The space is very small but functional if you don't plan on spending much time in the flat in Porto. 

Because of it's central location, bring earplugs! The streets are very loud and don't quiet in the early morning hours or night.

Très bon accueil de dulce.Emplacement exceptionnel au coeur de la ville. Proche de toutes les lieux incontournables. 
Logement très lumineux, très bonne literie. Au coeur de la ville donc un peu bruyant. Petit bémol sur le chauffage en hiver.
Bilan très positif.

Dulce is a very lovely and welcoming host! The apartment was perfect, beautiful and in the middle of the center. So you always have everything you need. Metro, supermarket, Cafés, restaurants, etc. Just get inspired by the charm!

L'appartamento era confortevole e situato al centro di Porto. Perfetto per ogni tipo di spostamento e adatto a visitare la città. Dulce é stata con noi molto disponibile e ci ha aiutato quando ne avevamo bisogno!!!

The apartment is really close to the Sao Bento metro station and the Sao Bento train station so finding the apartment was not a problem at all. All the tourist places are within the walking distance from the apartment so we did not had to use public transportation while in Porto. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed including towels, electronic burner, and portable heaters. The only minor problem we had is that the apartment was a little bit chilly so I suggest bringing warm pajamas when you are staying during winter.

사진과 정확히 일치하는 공간입니다. 조금 더 밝고 깨끗한 느낌입니다.
무엇보다 위치가 너무 좋아요. 포르투에 거점을 잡고 근교 여행하기에 최고입니다. 또 포르투가 워낙 작다보니까 도보로 왔다갔다하면서 숙소에 들러서 용무도 보고 쉬었다 나가기도해서 아주 편했어요.
바로 근처에 미니마켓과 야채가게도 있어서 매일 저녁 이용했네요.
여자 혼자 8박했는데 위험한 느낌은 받지 못했습니다.
겨울 여행시에 난방은 간이 난방기라는 점 참고하시고, 대신 온수는 정말 정말 잘나옵니다!
저는 비수기 겨울여행이라 소음의 불편함은 별로 없었어요. 다른 후기보고 준비해간 귀마개는 사용하지 않았습니다.
가격대비 가치가 좋습니다!
Todo muy bien y muy bien situado el apartamento

Tout était très bien.
Un appart idéalement placé dans le coeur historique de Porto.
Je conseille vivement

Жильё расположено в самом центре Порту. Все очень близко, хороший район. Рядом супермаркеты, кофейни, рестораны. Главный вокзал Порту в 3-5 минутах ходьбы, буквально за углом (шума от вокзала не слышно). Все очень понравилось, Dulce очень доброжелательная хозяйка, встретила нас у апартаментов и объяснила как добраться к ближайшим достопримечательностям, ответила на все вопросы. Большое спасибо! Обязательно остановимся в этом жильё по прибытии в Порту снова.

Super flat on a cornerbuilding, in the middle of the city. 
With a balcony right in the main walkingstreet down to the ribeira. 
Well equiped and clean, just a bit noisy during rush-hour, but what else can you expect in the middle of the city. 
Proper 5 star rating, I would definetly go back!:) 
Thank you Dulce, 
Greetings from Luxembourg, 
Philippe

Joli appartement idéalement situé ! Tout est à proximité. Un peu bruyant la nuit (centre ville oblige...). Manquerait une cafetière (il y a tout de même une bouilloire et du thé à disposition). Mais sinon rien à redire! 
Et une hôte adorable et très ponctuelle ! Séjour parfait.

L'avantage du logement est qu'il est en plein centre, donc tout peux se faire à pied ou en métro (à 50m), Dulce nous a bien expliqué le trajet de l'aéroport à l'appartement. Cependant la ponctualité n'était pas parfaite, nous avons du attendre devant le logement pendant 40min et celui-ci n'était pas prêt, non pas que cela nous dérange mais prévenir aurait été la moindre des choses. Concernant le logement il était parfait pour 5jours, mais il ne faut pas avoir envie de cuisiner (il manquait des ustensiles quotidiens - torchons, économes, verres etc). Nous sommes globalement satisfait du logement tout de même.

L'appartamento si trova in pieno centro, quindi molto comodo, ma il rumore in strada di auto e persone è molto forte quindi portatevi dei tappi per le orecchie se soffrite di sonno leggero. Abbiamo comunque trovato l'appartamento pulito e in ordine e la comunicazione con Dulce è stata veloce e immediata. Wifi velocissimo.

Dulce was a great host, communicated swiftly and promptly.
The flat is in an amazing location, everything is in walking distance.
The flat was very clean, included many things and when we arrived in February it already had a heater as well.

I dont think there would be any better flat to stay at in Porto for two people.

The apartment is very nice situated in the middle of Porto. A wonderful place to discover the city. Metro and trainstation Sao Bento are just around the corner. 
Planning a trip to Porto, book this apartment, you won't regret it. And for the noisiness: yes you are in the middle of the center, so you hear traffic and people talking, but it was never to much, or to long. If you close the window shields is is good enough.
Dulce, thanks for your hospitality !

Super studio 
Hyper centre très agréable 
Avons passé un super séjour

Fantastic location. Everything within walking distance. Dulce was quick to answer any emails and very helpful. Place was clean , bed was comfortable, water was hot instantly. Note that bed is in loft with a steep ladder so people with mobility issues would not be comfortable here. If you are a light sleeper then bring earplugs because it is noisy with cars and trucks and people. No complimentary coffee or coffee maker but there is a kettle and hot plate.
Casa perfetta in posizione centrale in Porto. Vicina a tutti i punti di interesse, facilmente raggiungibili a piedi.

Appartement identique aux photos idéalement situé dans la ville. Un beau pied à terre. Dulce a été disponible et accueillante. Nous n'avons pas du tout été gênés mais si vous êtes sensibles au bruit, nous conseillons des boules quies car il y a toujours du passage dans la rue. Seule mauvaise surprise non écrite dans les conditions générales : un seul rouleau de papier toilette est prévu dans l'appartement aussi il est peut être préférable d'en amener un...

Parfait pour un petit weekend découverte de cette magnifique ville. 
Appartement idéalement situé pour tout faire à pied ! 
Je recommande vraiment !!

The appartment is perfectly located to explore the city. Expect some noise at night during week-ends though. 
The host was very nice, although quite busy.

Charmant petit appartement, fonctionnel et idealement placé aux portes de la vieille ville. Le quartier est vivant et forcément un peu bruyant depuis l'appartement. Pour finir, Dulce est une adorable hôtesse qui saura vous conseiller pour rende votre séjour optimal. Nous y avons passé un séjour très agréable !

J'ai réservé ce logement pour faire un cadeau à des proches qui au retour étaient ravis. Ravis de la situation, de la proximité du centre du logement et des conditions d'accueil.
Nous y retournerons mon épouse et moi dans un futur proche. Merci Dulce
Le logement est tres bien placé et l'hote tres sympatique.

여자 2명, 3박 했습니다
이 숙소의 가장 큰 장점은 위치! 위치가 좋아서 관광하다가 중간에 숙소 가볍게 들릴 수 있어서 정말 편했어요
하지만 중심가에 위치해서 밤에도 새벽에도 시끄러워요. 창문 닫아도 소리는 고스란히 들리더라구요
위치 이외의 장점은 딱히 없어요
3박이었는데 휴지 한 개, 수건 각자 한 장만 주시고 더 필요한건 알아서 해결하라고 하셨어요
헤어 드라이기는 첫 날에 쓰다가 타는 냄새가 심하게 나더니 저절로 작동을 멈춰서 다신 안 썼구요
옷장이 없어서 옷을 걸 수가 없었어요
침대 이외에 쓸만한 시설이 없었습니다
딱히 다시 가고 싶은 숙소는 아니네요
Appartamento in posizione strategica per visitare le bellezze cittadine. La dimensione è perfetta per una coppia, attrezzato e pulito. Ottima esperienza!
Emplacement exceptionnel.  Appartement coquet et chaleureux.

Excelente ubicación para recorrer a pie la ciudad, cercana a conecciones y fácil para ir al aeropuerto. Veníamos de coimbra y quedamos a una cuadra de la estación de tren. Estaban arreglando un edificio cercano, por lo que había ruido en las mañanas, pero totalmente solucionable con tapones de oídos. Lo recomendamos.
Everything was perfect!
Great location (a bit loud on weekends due to it being above a busy area).

The apartment is located in a great area with many bars and a small supermarket (mini preco) close by. It might get a little louder due to the bars in der street which are literally right in front of the apartment but since we knew that beforehand and and have deep sleeps this wasn't a problem. Everything is within walking distance and the apartment was clean, well decorated and cozy. Please note that the bed is a loft bunk and that you have to climb up a ladder, however it is huge and very comfy. Check out the location before you go on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps as there was no number on the outside of the house and it thus might be confusing at first. Other than that we did not habe any problems. The communication with dulce in advance was great and she was even nicer in person. Would definitely book when we are in Porto again!

Wahnsinnig schönes Appartement, welches zentral in Porto liegt. Wir waren 2 Tage dort und alles sieht genausp wie auf den Fotos aus. Dulce konnte uns gute Essenstipps geben und war jederzeit erreichbar. Es hat alles super geklappt und ich kann die Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen!
Appartement idéalement situé! Très propre, agréable et bien équipé pour un court séjour. Manquerait peut être une cafetière et un deuxième rouleau de papier toilette...
Leuk schattig appartement voor twee, op een top locatie! Midden in het bruisende leven van Porto.

Location is perfect, streetnoise but no problem for us.
Nice little studio for max. 2 people

The apartment is right next to Sao bento train station, situated in a very central place around many bars and restaurants. Note you may be able to hear noise at night, but the central location cannot be beat! The location is also very walkable and is not far from the river. The place is very spacious and clean. We loved the balcony overlooking some restaurants and the big windows. Thank you Dulce for a great stay!

The apartment is right next to the station and is so central. It's so easy to get to. Communication with Dulce was great. The apartment was amazing, really clean and the loft was awesome. Would really recommend staying here when traveling to Porto.

vanuit Lissabon in een studentikoos air B en B , hebben wij Dulce's apartment ervaren als een verademing , de inrichting is geweldig en de locatie is ook super , vanuit dit appartement kun je eenvoudig alles plannen wat je wenst te zien in Porto .
dichtbij de prachtige culturele beziendwaardigheden, de VVV om de hoek en ook de haven met de prachtige ijzeren brug op loop afstand . beslist voor herhaling vatbaar

Great little apartment in the perfect location close to major station and walking distance to major sights and the water. The apartment is on a busy street and can be noisy with the Windows open and this was an issue for us when it was very hot and we were unable to close them as there are heaters but no fan. The host was very informative about the area and did her best to help with any requests that we had.

Dulce's apartment is perfectly located in central Porto. Walkable distance to all major sites and attractions, and the apartment is in the vicinity of many great restaurants, cafes and wine bars! We arrived earlier than intended and this was no issue to Dulce. We loved this apartment and Porto!

Apartamento bem central como descrito, próximo a tudo. Sentimos a necessidade de um local apropriado para secagem das toalhas.
Por ser um bairro bem central, o barulho da rua entrava no apartamento por volta das 07h da manhã e findava após a meia noite.

Location très sympa et surtout emplacement idéal pour visiter Porto à pied.
Bonne communication avec Dulce qui est disponible pour ses hôtes.
Seul bémol, la rue est bruyante et le logement mal insonorisé, mais vu que nous étions au courant, nous avons anticipé et tout c'est très bien passé.
Je recommande vivement ce logement!

Dulce est une personne accueillante, sympathique et disponible. 
Appartement situé en plein centre, emplacement vraiment idéal pour découvrir Porto à pied de jour comme de nuit. (Environnement un peu bruyant, mais on le sait avant d’arriver grâce aux précédents commentaires). 
L’appartement de Dulce est très bien équipé, très propre, et vraiment très bien agencé. 
Si je dois retourner sur Porto, alors je retournerais chez Dulce sans hésiter !

Thank you so much !
The apartment is located in the heart of the city. All sights in walking distance.
The apartment is clean and cozy. Dulce is a very pleasant person , she met us and told us everything.
This place has an excellent location. Close to all amenities and a train station with taxis ever present. It s a short walk to the river bank too. As central as it gets!
We had a great stay in Porto. The apartment is so central and surprisingly quiet at night. Perfect for our needs!
Appartamento in posizione strategica, in centro; pulito e luminoso.

A cosy and clean loft in the perfect location in Porto. It was exactly as described and we had no issues communicating with the host. Note that the kitchen is quite small and not very comfortable for a lot of cooking, and the apartment may get noisy at night due to the central location.

Lovely  small apartment  close to the station and very central for nightlife and the river  and the high bridge. Small supermarket and laundrette close by if you need it. Great for people watching . Lots of building work going on up the street as Porto is being regenerated - noise did not bother us and it was interesting seeing the beautiful buildings being rebuilt.  The steps to the bed were easy to manage- even after a few drinks!

Das Apartment war einfach toll. Die Lage ist perfekt und alles ist fußläufig erreichbar. Nur die Parksituation ist auf Grund der zentralen Lage katastrophal und oft sehr teuer. Wenn also kein Auto benötigt wird kann man getrost drauf verzichten. Das Apartment selbst war sauber, gemütlich und hatte eine tolle Größe. Für die Nachtstunden empfehle ich Oropax.

El apartamento tiene una ubicación excelente, en el centro de Porto.  El aparcamiento es muy complicado por la zona, pero hay un parking justo al lado en el cual te cobran 23euros por dejar el coche un día entero. Sin duda un apartamento para disfrutar del corazón de Porto y de sus callejuelas.
Location is Perfect, picture are realistic and the place is very clean.

Un sitio muy acogedor, una zona muy viva y cerca de todo, y luego que hablar de dulce, una gran persona que te presta atención de manera rápida, y se preocupa de que todo esté bien, fue mi primera experiencia y e quedado encantado.... Dispuesto a repetir

Nuestra estadía en la casa de Dulce fue muy buena. La ubicación del apartamento es inmejorable. Puede ser un poco ruidosa algunas noches, dentro de lo esperable por donde está ubicado. Claramente se compensa con la comodidad de estar ubicado en pleno centro. Gracias Dulce!
It was just great! Thanks again!

Dulce's apartment couldn't be in a better location! It is in the heart of Porto walkable to everything. Easy to get to from the airport by the metro system! Very clean and she was easy to communicate with (quick to respond to any questions I had). Thanks Dulce!
Das Appartement ist sehr zentral gelegen und sehr schön eingerichtet. Der Check in war unkompliziert und schnell. Ich würde beim nächsten Aufenthalt definitiv wieder hier her kommen.
Perfect location & great place
It is a nice place
Great. Just loved it!!!

Petit appartement très bien situé dans le centre. Impeccable niveau propreté et literie confortable. Équipement en cuisine un peu léger, en même temps quand on va à Porto, il y a de quoi faire en ville.
Super emplacement pour ce loft très mimi

Notre hôte était présente à notre arrivée et nous a très bien accueilli. L'appartement est propre et très bien placé pour visiter Porto. Du fait de sa situation, la rue est un peu bruyante (comme nous l'avons lu dans d'autres commentaires) mais cela ne nous a pas empêché de bien dormir. Nous sommes restés 3 nuits sur place et notre seul regret a été de ne pas avoir encore prolongé le séjour dans cette belle ville.

Dulce’s place was perfect! My cousin and I stayed for a few days and we really enjoyed. Place was in the middle of the city and close to everything, including the train station. 
Everything was nice and clean! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a nice place to stay in the heart of Porto.

Nothing compares to the location of this cozy space. Below there is a chocolate shop with one of the world's tastiest chocolates. All the scenic attractions are nearby and the wine cellars are a short, but beautiful, walk across the bridge.

Cute little loft studio in the perfect location to explore Porto. The apartment is just a block from the São Bento station and many of Porto's sites are within walking distance. The space is a little small, perfect for a single traveler but doable for a couple. I loved it. Dulce was fantastic and responded to any message I sent her within minutes.
It was a nice apartment in the centre of Oporto. It is a little bit noisy though and there was a very annoying street light with a repetitive noise!
A small studio for single traveler or couple. But it's kinda cold in winter.

The little flat is perfect for a couple exploring town. Being there in January, I can imagine how nice it is in the Summer. It's location couldn't be better and even though it's compact, the amenities are great. We made good use of the little kitchen and felt like locals for the few nights we were there. There was some noise from outside at night, but to be expected staying so central. The only thing it's missing is a sofa!
Apartamento muy acogedor y ubicación inmejorable, además Dulce es muy atenta y rápida en sus respuestas. Lo recomiendo!

Location is great - really close to the main railway station and metro station, and a short walk from the waterfront and bridge (upper and lower).  Cafes just outside to satisfy your morning Nata cravings.  

A bit cold to being with but after firing up both space heaters for a couple of hours, the bed area (which is nearer the ceiling) was cosy enough.  You need to be steady on your feet to get in and out of bed - the ladder is quite steep and high, but there are handrails.  Also bring earplugs!  It's single-glazed and right next to a busy street with construction currently.

The best thing about this apartment is the location! It is central to everything in Porto and it was amazing. I loved the area and I made the right choice in staying here to best experience Porto. 

The flat overall was very nice for one person. It is small but I didn't mind as much since I was out and about in Porto for most of my time. 

Dulce was an amazing host! She is quick to respond to any message and was super helpful and gave me a lot of tips on things to do.
Good value for money. Central location and quick response.

L appartamento è un monolocale soppalcato ma è perfetto per una (Website hidden by Airbnb) letto anche se posto direttamente sul soppalco è molto confortevole e la zona living col bagno è luminosa e funzionale.
Si sentono un pó troppo i rumori dalla (Website hidden by Airbnb) è più che sopportabile :)
La posizione è grandiosa! Super centrale.. tutte le attrazioni principali sono raggiungibili a piedi...Pulizia al top...Dulce è stata sempre rapida e esaustiva nelle risposte...ottimo host. Super consigliato!
The apartment in Porto is wonderful. Small, but very cosy. Everything you need is available. The apartment is situated in the centre. Anyway we had a wonderful time.
Amei o lugar, bastante confortável, limpo e acolhedor. Respostas rápidas e perfeita localização.

Dulce was a great host I can highly recommend her apartment to everyone who’d like to stay only a few steps away from all the lively part of Porto and would like to enjoy this vibrant city at its best! Small but tidy and nice apartment in the very centre.
Perfect location, easy communication, and a very comfy bed. Would happily stay at Dulce's again!
Apparemment en plein centre de porto, à côté de l’an gare et des métros. Brouillant le soir mais emplacement idéal. Nous avons passés un super séjour chez Dulce !
Great location with modern home design
Tutto perfetto in particolare la location: molto vicino a tutto per visitare Porto a piedi. Ideale!

Logement superbe, en plein cœur de Porto, à deux pas de la gare, et très proche de la Ribeira et de tous les lieux touristiques. Nous avons tout fait à pieds. 
Logement très propre avec toutes les commodités nécessaires (shampoing, gel douche, sèche-cheveux, thé, café...). Ménage fait et changement des serviettes de toilette au milieu de notre séjour de 5 jours (plutôt très appréciable)! 
Nous recommandons et nous ne manquerons pas de revenir lors d'un prochain séjour à Porto.
Seul petit bémol, être au cœur de la ville apporte du bruit qui peut être gênant pour ceux qui ont le sommeil léger.

We loved this space - I didn't think it was too small (the bed is in a loft which is nice to give a little separation.  It is in a great location and you can walk everywhere.  If we ever get back to Porto (which we loved), we we stay here again.
Прекрасная квартира с очень хорошим местом расположения. Отзывчивая хозяйка. Всё очень понравилось. Спасибо!
Perfect location and great apartment! We will definitely come back!
Nice and cosy appartement in the city centre!!
War alles super! :-)

Fijn verblijf, alles wat je nodig hebt voor een city trip! Midden in de stad, dit maakt het wel wat gehorig (aanrader: oordoppen zijn gewenst). Alles op loopafstand. Dulce is makkelijk te bereiken voor vragen, was snel ter plekken.
Schoon, handdoeken aanwezig, op 50 meter afstand van metro station Sao Bento.
L’appartement est très bien placé, en plein centre, proche de tout (gare, resto, supermarché ...). Propre et bien rangé. Le quartier est bien vivant. Par contre, la nuit c’est un petit peu bruyant

Gostamos muito do studio da Dulce, limpo e super aconchegante!
Ambiente de muito bom gosto e inteligente em distribuição e arquitetura.

Perto de tudo: frutaria, mini mercado dia, estação de metrô São Bento, igrejas, com estacionamento ao lado, restaurantes, Rio Douro, do outro lado Mercado Municipal com almoço delicioso, doces e gelados de Portugal etc
Sentimos falta de uma TV, nada que tenha atrapalhado.
Recomendo.

Sehr nettes Apartment. Klein aber fein. Man hat alles was man braucht während eines City-Trips in der Stadt. Super zentrale Lage, alles zu Fuß erreichbar. 
Einziger Nachteil, der Lärm. Sonst alles super.
Cet appartement est parfait pour un séjour à deux au cœur de Porto !

This couldn't be a better Airbnb for our stay - first of all the apartment is incredibly stylish and on spot clean. The location is perfect, in the core of historical Porto, walking distance to pretty much everything downtown wise, plus near metro and buses to other locations. Dulce was always very communicative and the check in process is pretty simple - you just message her as soon as you get to the door and she'll be there in 2 minutes. We got there before check in time, but we could put our bags inside the apartment, go explore for a while and come back after 2pm. 

Dulce, thank you so much for everything, your apartment made our stay SO much better :) see you next time!

Filipa x
Perfect location in the midle of the city

Great location for a stay in Porto! 
The place is very cute, as the photos suggest. It is central so some noise at night will happen which is normal. 

Our only small concern was the railing to the upper level. One side was broken when we got there, so hopefully its fixed now.
Conforme

Très très bien placé dans la ville, on peut accéder à pas mal de choses à pieds (restaus, bars, le pont, le bord du fleuve...). Appartement minimaliste, très propre et il y a même une femme de menage qui est venue une fois pour un séjour de 6 nuits. Si vous êtes sensible du dos pour dormir par contre, étant donné que le lit se trouve sur une mezzanine haute et qu’il n’y a pas de sommier et juste un matelas, ça fait mal au dos, surtout après 6  nuits. Et si vous êtes très sensible au bruit, les rues en dessous sont très animées dès 9h environ, avec les voitures, les klaxons, les gens et surtout une personne qui joue un super orgue de barbarie tout les jours, toute la journée et qui, en plus, a un coq avec, qui fait cocorico souvent ahah (présent en tout cas au même endroit pendant tout notre séjour).

Very stylish place and very central. There’s big windows that overlook very busy streets. Noise wasn’t an issue for us, but you do have to remember to close the blinds before you get changed otherwise the people on the street will get an eyeful. There’s one little aircon/fan available for use, which meant that it had to be carried up and down the ladder if you needed it in different parts of the place. Also, I had mentioned to Dulce that the shower-head falls off when you use the shower and she said she’d fix it but that didn’t happen while we were there. 
Dulce made check-in very easy and the place is in a good location.

Dulce's place was lovely.  A small but stylish apartment with everything you need for a short stay.  Perfect location and very clean.  Window shutters blocked out street noise at night which was excellent.  Would recommend.

Assolutamente consigliato per chi va a Porto. La posizione è supercentrale, si raggiunge tutto senza mai dover prendere i mezzi pubblici. Accogliente, trendy, si affaccia su una via piena di locali e molto animata. Ottima la comunicazione.
The apartment is right on the center of Porto, unbeatable situation. We went everywhere by walking. Everything was fine, but it hasn’t kitchen (just a microwave and a toaster).
We had a lovely stay. This apartment is located in the city centre of the beautiful Porto.
The apartment is lovely and super clean. It is situated in the heart of Porto! Everything is withing walking distance. We had a really great time. Totally recommend! :-)

Location is perfect and so is the size for a couple. One tip: this place can get very loud as it’s on the first floor on one of the busiest pedestrian streets in the city. Closing the windows isn’t an option in the summer due to heat.
Un apartamento precioso tal como se anuncia.  Cómodo y acogedor.  Cerca de todos los lugares turísticos.   Para repetir y recomendar. Dulce muy amable siempre pendiente.

Ambiente confortevole per chi cerca un alloggio strategico nel centro della città di Porto. Da qui, infatti, puoi visitare i principali monumenti della città senza grandi spostamenti.
La casa è piccola ma con dettagli raffinati e ricercati, e si presenta esattamente per come appare in foto. L'unica pecca (ma nulla di grave) è la mancanza di un fornello (anche se ci sono un microonde e un bollitore), e le ante della doccia non si chiudevano bene. Per il resto tutto perfetto. 
Dulce è stata molto gentile e cordiale e parla inglese fluentemente.
Consigliato!
Great location and a beautiful apartment! The bed was very comfortable and we slept very well. Very clean, nice shower, and excellent communication. Thank you so much!
Very clean, check in was a breeze, and location is perfect within walking distance to everything! It is a cute small space, but it is well laid out so it doesn't feel small.
Amazing location and beautifully decorated. Had a great stay.

Die kleine Wohnung liegt sehr zentral in Porto, nahe am Bahnhof und an der Metro. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen. 
Das einzige Manko war die Lautstärke nachts durch den Verkehr. Mit Ohrenstöpsel war das aber kein Problem mehr. 
Daumen hoch!
Great place, right downtown in the city centre of Porto! Quick walk down to the water. Many restaurants and cafes all around.We had a really great time. Totally recommend!!

Die Unterkunft hat eine sehr gute Lage, alles ist fußläufig erreichbar. Die Wohnung ist süß und für einen Städtetrip ideal. Der Kontakt mit Dulce war unkompliziert. Uns hat es sehr gut gefallen und wir würden wiederkommen!!
Die Unterkunft hat genau das eingehalten was versprochen wurde. Die Lage ist super , nur etwas laut. Ansonsten alles top!!!
Fantastic location , very clean and tidy .
Beautiful place, perfect location! Would definitely stay again!

hôte en retard et presse d en finir, il loue et c est tout, pas d aide à la visite, venant de quitter un hôte à Lisbonne super réactif qui a passé une heure à nous expliquer sa ville, la transition a été rude, emplacement de premier choix, tout est à proximité, mais énormément bruyant, en plus l appartement est mal isolé, et un coup de peinture ds la salle de bain ne serait pas de trop

Je vous conseille vivement ce petit appartement très confortable au centre de Porto. Il est très bien équipé ce qui est pratique quand on prend l'avion avec un bagage à main. Il est arrangé avec goût avec des petites touches d'attention. Au niveau propreté : impeccable. C'était juste un moment magique en amoureux. Merci Dulce qui parle français, nous reviendrons!

Une hôte à votre écoute, un appartement propre et très bien placé au centre ville.
A recommander pour qui veut visiter Porto.
Attention à la lumière dans l'escalier
Perfect ! Ideally situated in Porto, cute flat, very clean.

Dulce’s place is perfect if you want to explore Porto for the first time. It’s located right in the very centre and surrounded by many great cafes, restaurants and wine bars. The studio is very small but cosy and has absolutely everything you might need on your stay. The bed is on the mezzanine level but the stair leading to it is surprisingly comfortable and easy to use even in th middle of the night. Our flight was delayed on the way to Porto but Dulce kindly waited for us and explained how everything works at the check in.

Nice apartment in central location!
Check-in/out were smooth

This is a very special Porto apartment. Location is absolutely perfect. Porto is a wonderfully charming city and our apartment just added to the magic. Dulce was lovely—we actually got a wee sick from food poisoning and she was so kind to make sure to check in with her—I highly recommend! Make sure to indulge in the chocolate shop below, plus there is the most spectacular little speciality port shop across the street. Enjoy!

Appartement idéalement situé en plein cœur de Porto et à coté de la station de métro Sao Bento (gare). Super propre, lumineux, agréable. Seul petit bémol le bruit comme indiqué dans l'annonce. Je recommande volontiers !!

Dulce’s place is clean, well maintained and centrally located. We didn’t have to use public transport to get anywhere within Porto. The apartment was spotless. There are lot of food options nearby. Most of the tourist attractions are walking distance from here. 
Would highly recommend renting this apartment.
sem dúvida uma excelente opção. ótima localização.
Stunning apartment and great central location! Would defiantly stay again if in Porto!
Parfait ! Nous recommandons
다 좋은데 좀 추워용
Een perfecte kleine studio midden in het oude centrum van Porto. Voorzien van een klein keukentje, badkamer met wc, hoogslaper en woonkamer. Wij waren hier in het weekend van 19 januari 2019.

Lindo apartamento, com ótima localização e perfeita comunicação. Restaurantes, metrô, pubs e mercados próximos ao apartamento e o preço muito bom pela área e pela estrutura oferecida. Obrigada a Dulce pela hospitalidade.

The place is great! The location even better. Although it might get a little noisy sometimes you are IN THE MIDDLE of the city center. Everything is around the corner. For us it was actually nice to have the noise around. We woke up to live music and fell asleep with the buzz of the city. It was really lovely to spend a long weekend here.

name: Cute apt in artist's home
summary: We are renting a private basement apartment in our home. The apartment space is totally private, nothing shared. It has a separate bedroom, bathroom and kitchenette with mini fridge and coffee maker (there is no stove for cooking).  You will have use of a hair dryer. There are small windows in the bedroom and kitchenette area. The bathroom and kitchenette are all newly built. Full size bed sleeps 2 people. We cannot accommodate more than 2 people, sorry!
space: Our basement room with private bathroom and kitchenette is located in our home where we reside upstairs. There are custom-made artistic details throughout the apartment, including beautiful steel banister, thick maple wood bench, sculptural metal table and unique sculpture throughout. Interesting concave yellow bathroom tiles light up the bathroom. Bushwick is a vibrant community with lots of restaurants, bars, art galleries, cafes and street art. We are renting a private basement apartment in our home. The apartment has a separate bedroom, private bathroom and kitchenette with mini fridge and coffee maker (there is no stove for cooking).  You will have use of a hair dryer. There are small windows in the bedroom and kitchenette area. The bathroom and kitchenette are all newly built. Full size bed sleeps 2 people. We cannot accommodate more than 2 people, sorry!  This is a great place to stay if you're looking for grass-roots art and music and cool places off the beaten track. You will
description: We are renting a private basement apartment in our home. The apartment space is totally private, nothing shared. It has a separate bedroom, bathroom and kitchenette with mini fridge and coffee maker (there is no stove for cooking).  You will have use of a hair dryer. There are small windows in the bedroom and kitchenette area. The bathroom and kitchenette are all newly built. Full size bed sleeps 2 people. We cannot accommodate more than 2 people, sorry! Our basement room with private bathroom and kitchenette is located in our home where we reside upstairs. There are custom-made artistic details throughout the apartment, including beautiful steel banister, thick maple wood bench, sculptural metal table and unique sculpture throughout. Interesting concave yellow bathroom tiles light up the bathroom. Bushwick is a vibrant community with lots of restaurants, bars, art galleries, cafes and street art. We are renting a private basement apartment in our home. The apartment has a separate bed
transit: Our house is a 7 min walk to the L train (Jefferson St stop); 15min train ride to Manhattan (East Village and Union Square.) We are also a 5 min walk to the M train (Central Ave stop); 15min train ride to Manhattan (Lower East Side, Soho, West Village, Midtown.) Also 5min ride on either train to Bedford Ave in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. NYC subways run 24hrs/day. The B60 bus stop is directly in front of the house which takes you straight to south Williamsburg. We are happy to provide you with directions and recommendations. You will be provided with a map of our favorite places within walking distance.
access: Travels access the space through a wonder contemporary art gallery called Gallery Petite. Enter through a beautiful metal and glass storefront made by the host and walk by ultra progressive art on the walls to the door that goes down to the basement apartment.
interaction: I live and work only a block away so I am almost always immediately available to meet your needs. I live upstairs in the building adjacent to the gallery spaces and my sculpture studio is a short block away.
house_rules: No smoking inside; please smoke outside only. Check in before 10pm. Try to be quiet with the front doors. Ask before using the laundry machines and plan to provide your own detergent. Separate recycling from your trash: paper and cardboard are separate from plastic, glass and metal. We appreciate if you take your trash outside in the bins provided. Please do have packages or mail sent to our house. Enjoy your stay!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: While my wife Silvia and I have managed our airbnb rentals for several years together, I will now be the main contact in order to give her a break. So here is a little about me. I'm a metal sculptor, assemblage artist with a degree in Biochemistry, I love to make art, surf and play with my two young kids, eat good food and travel. But now that I'm a Dad, I don't  travel as much, so I let we the travelers come to me. The kids and I love going to the beach at Rockaway, art openings and going to cafes. You might spot my kids and I racing down the sidewalks in Bushwick on our skateboards.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was nice and clean.  It was nice to have a little more space to settle into since we were staying for five days.  Silvia was very helpful and able to recommend great places to eat and visit.  The location is great as it is in a fun neighborhood and an easy ride to the city.

Silvia was a great host.  She provides a map of the Bushwick area and is very knowledgeable concerning the neighborhood.  She's always around in case of emergencies but leaves you alone to do your thing.  Would rent again.

We had a great time in New York.  Thanks for putting us up Sylvia!  The apartment is cute, and as advertised and access to the L and JMZ was very convenient.  Sylvia provided us a great map of local things to do--we only wish we had more time to enjoy everything.  Tea each night, a little light reading from "Broken Land" and the comfortable accommodations were the perfect respite after long days of sightseeing. We'd stay there again!

We stayed six nights and I would not choose it again. The apartment really is in the basement, it is pretty dark, you never know what the weather is like until you leave the house, the concrete floors make the apartment uncomfortable (bring slippers), there is no closet to hang-up your clothes and I found the place smaller than it appears on the pictures. We did not enjoy staying there. Silvia is very nice and helpful.

The accommodation was exactly as described. Really conveniently located to several different subways line stations which makes getting around really easy. Bushwick is a really interesting and safe place that Sylvia is lucky enough to call home and that my partner and I were lucky to call home for just over 2 weeks. There were hangers for coats etc and a large chest of drawers for other clothes. The place was really well heated. Sylvia & Ty were extremely helpful and gave us an insight into the local happenings. We would definitely stay here again.
We enjoyed our stay very much. Silvia was very responsive and helpful, the bed was comfy. Thanks!

We had a great time in Silvia's cute basement apartment.  The space is small but cozy, and the neighborhood is colorful and convenient to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Silvia provided us with a map of restaurants, shops and art galleries in the neighborhood, and she even gave us directions over the phone when we got lost trying to find the Brooklyn Flea.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay with Silvia again.

We stayed at Silvia's place for a weekend, she was very kind and responsive. The basement is cute and has a character. We didn't spend much time exploring the area, but there are plenty of choices for food and drinks and Silvia has prepared a list of them.  
Thank you Silvia.

I had a Wonderful stay!!!
Very sweet people who I like alot!!!
This was a great way to have meet 2 wonderful new friends!!
Thanks again!!!
Crews

Staying with Silvia was very nice.  I felt quite comfortable and safe.  The apartment was very clean and nicely furnished.  We didn't have a chance to spend time with Silvia and her husband, but they were very welcoming and Silvia gave us lots of tips for things to do in the area.  I would stay there again for sure.

My girlfriend and I had a very pleasant stay at Silvia's.  All of my expectations were met or exceeded.

She was friendly and helpful - available if we needed anything but also gave us privacy.  

The place was cozy and clean.  There was no air conditioning downstairs, but there are windows near the ceiling that can be opened for fresh air. 

I would definitely consider staying with Silvia again.  Thank you!

Silvia was very nice, as was her apartment. I will say that Bushwick has an edgy-ness that was a bit surprising at first but when you look a little closer there is a lot to love. I had an amazing time in the area and Sivila's apt was very central.

Thank you Silvia!

Keith

Just one word to describe my bnb experience with Silvia: Easy! From the beginning, she was available and friendly. The place is fairly close to Manhattan (15min metro distance) and safer than it looks at the first sight. I have slept like a baby. I would have liked to stay longer. Thanks Silvia!
I truly ejoyed my stay. Silvia gave me my privacy and the apt was well kept. If I had to come back I would not mind staying there. I recommend her.
We had a great stay at Silvia's! She's a gracious host, and the place was clean and cozy, thanks!

Hi, I stayed at Silvia's place in Brooklyn, it was great. I had never done a airbnb stay before and the place met all our needs. The water pipes were a tad loud at night, but I am a light sleeper. She also has a very cute daughter. Thanks Silvia! I will be sure to stay again next time.

Cosy, comfortable and convenient. The place is small, but private and quiet (well, very little street noise but bring earplugs if you're a light sleeper because of the pipes). Close to both the L and the M so very easy to get in or out of midtown or downtown Manhattan, or hipster Williamsburg, etc. A very good find, and we're thankful to Silvia for hosting us!

This basement apartment is exactly as it appears in the pictures. The place was clean and private with fully functioning facilities. Silvia was a great host to me and my boyfriend and was available before and during our stay to answer any questions or concerns. She was really helpful getting us acquainted with the area and provided a map of all the nearby restaurants and attractions. I highly recommend this place for a single person or a couple who seeks an affordable, private place in a cool, diverse, Brooklyn neighborhood.

Silvia was a gracious host, very easy to work with.  The apartment was clean and private. The hot shower was a blessing after long days of trekking around Manhattan and Brooklyn.  The only problem we had was with the neighborhood.  We heard a terrible street fight late on Saturday night, and we didn't feel very comfortable exploring the area during the day.  Other than that, I would recommend Silvia's place if you are looking to stay around the Brooklyn area.
Great place in a very convenient location. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Particularly pleasant on really hot days because it stays very cool. Hope to stay again next time I am in Brooklyn.

The Apt was really pretty and nicely decorated. It is well located on the L train. You can travel easily to BK or to Manhattan. The neighborhood was safe.
The only thing is the noise at night, from the street . Lively neighborhood!

The host was very helpful and nice. 
I recommend this apt if you want a cool place to stay in.

This was our first Airbnb experience for my wife and I.  We enjoyed our four night stay at Silvia's apartment in Bushwick, Brooklyn.  Silvia was truly a great host!  She responded very fast on all of our text messages, and she gave us plenty amount of tea and coffee when we asked.  The room was very cute and clean, good size for two people.

Perhaps the only problem we had was the neighborhood. It was a bit sketchy and we didn't feel too comfortable when we got off the subway station.  But we didn't encounter any troubles so I think it's safer than it appears!

Silvia gave us the list of local cafe and restaurants, so I strongly recommend to try one of them if you have some free times.  We tried her favorite Italian pizza place, and they had one of the best pizza we've ever had!!!  Thank you Silvia for hosting us wonderful time!
Great host, very centric location, nicely decorated apartment.

We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment. Silvia is a really nice host, she prepared the map of the area with things to see and do around which was very helpful. We have visited some of her recommended places and really enjoyed. The flat is cosy and comfortable. I would definitely go back again.

Two months later and I'm still thinking about what an amazing time we had in Brooklyn.  Silvia’s apartment is located in an upcoming neighbourhood near 2 subway stops which go directly into the city.  Add to this the fact that there is one of the best restaurants in the city nearby (Roberta’s (Website hidden by Airbnb) and you have yourself a winner.  You can’t beat the price and you can’t beat the hospitality.  We drove to NYC from Nova Scotia, and we were worried about street parking while we were there but once we arrived it was no problem finding a spot (right across the street from the apt.) and the neighbourhood was very safe.  Just be aware most spots have a 2 hour window twice a week when you have to move for street parking and you’ll be fine.
