Estadia perfeita! Os quartos são bem confortáveis e todos os ambientes uma delícia de ficar. O Edson é um cara muito atencioso que nos ajudou muito em toda a estadia. Adorei e possivelmente voltarei outras vezes!
Todo bastante bien !!
This a a very beautiful home. Edson was very welcoming, accommodating, and friendly. If you stay in Rio I would highly suggest staying here.
Casal muito solícito. Nos sentimos super a vontade. Super indicamos o local. Bonito, aconchegante e de ótima localização.
Espaço acolhedor, muito bem localizado e com anfitriões atenciosos. Recomendo
Espaço realmente incrível, Edson muito atencioso, a localização é ótima pra quem quer conhecer tanto o centro como as praias do Rio.
Lugar Perfeito, Nota 1.000 em tudo!!!
Es un lugar muy acogedor, tranquilo, pero sobretodo es muy limpio. Lo mejor de todo es que es muy central.

The Laranjeirais St is a safe area and convinient. There are supermarkets, drugstores and restaurants nearby. It's very close to the Corcovado's tram station so it's a very easy access to the Christ statue. It's also 15mins walk to the nearest metro station (largo do machado). The house itself is very spacious and clean. we're greeted by Edson, he's very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended!
The place is central, clean and everything is functioning perfectly. Edson the owner is often there to talk and to take good care of the place. We really recommend the place.

O que dizer desta casa maravilhosa, em que fomos muito bem recebidos, Edson, é sensacional, discreto, mais sempre presente e preocupado, me senti realmente em casa, o espaço da cozinha, os utensílios enfim, Obrigado Edson pela recepção perfeito.

A casa é linda, bem equipada e confortável, a localização é ótima, a parada de ônibus fica bem próxima, e temos acesso à diversos pontos da cidade de lá, o metrô também fica à 20 min (andando tranquilamente) de distância, mas de bike é 5 min, pegar um uber também é válido e bem barato. O bairro é super tranquilo, bem seguro e movimentado mesmo a noite, não tivemos problemas em voltar tarde pra casa. 
O anfitrião Edson foi super simpático e atencioso, a estadia foi ótima e a vontade era de nem voltar pra casa! Pretendemos voltar com certeza! Adoramos tudo, muito obrigada!

Foi muito bom! O lugar é perfeito! Limpo, organizado, lindo (eu realmente adorei a casa) e bem localizado. Tem muita coisa por perto e é bem fácil ir para outros cantos. Na cozinha tinha tudo que precisei e o quarto é bem confortável.

Perfect place for rest and families. Very central to all the main points of Rio. Pretty easy to take transportation from there to anywhere.
Edson is very gentle and the house has all the appliances. You will love it.

O espaço é excelente, tudo muito bem organizado. A localização da casa é ótima, com mercados, padarias e bares por todo lado! 
Voltarei com certeza!

Excelente alojamiento y sobre todo lo que fue Edson en su atención. Lamentablemente me robaron mis pertenencias en la playa y él se comportó como un hermano ayudandome a solucionar todo. Llamar a las tarjetas y todo lo demás. Un lugar excelente! la casa es divina y el barrio nos encantó ! Obrigado Rafaela y Edson
Espaço bucólico e aconchegante em meio ao agito da cidade. Fácil acesso por metrô e ônibus. Muito próximo ao Cristo redentor.
Excelente lugar 100% recomendable todo muy limpio habitaciones espaciosas todo relativamente cerca Edson siempre muy atento todo ordenado excelente lugar!!

La casa es mi linda y amplia. Tiene de todo, así que uno se siente como en casa.  Mi cuarto era muy cómodo y limpio, el jardín  muy bonito y un buen sitio para tomar un café. Cerca a los lugares turísticos y a las paradas del onibus.
Sehr gut gelegene Unterkunft, mit angepasstem Preis!
A casa é super fofinha e a localização é excelente! Recomendo muito!
Grata Surpresa. Ambiente maravilhoso com detalhes pensados para nós atender melhor.  Espaço aconchegante e ótima decoração. Nada a criticar, adoramos cada detalhe.
Espaço super confortável e limpo, e os anfitriões tem ótimas dicas para nos dar. Super voltarei.
Rafaela e Edson, obrigado pela estádia amei voltarei mais vezes com certeza MELHOR Natal no Rio Casa sensacional incrível
Muy bueno!

Passamos uma semana no Rio e não poderíamos ter escolhido um local melhor! Fomos muito bem atendidos desde a reserva, sendo tiradas todas as nossas dúvidas rapidamente pela Rafaela, e não foi diferente durante nossa estadia, o Edson um excelente anfitrião! As instalações estão numa ótima localização, perto de tudo, nos deslocamos de metrô e Uber com facilidade. A casa tem um clima muito especial, super organizada e limpa, nos sentimos muito bem e já estamos indicando para todos os amigos. Voltaremos com certeza!
A casa é bem equipada, linda e a localização é ótima. Adoramos e se possível voltaremos mais vezes.

A casa de Rafaela e Edson é incrível! Foi uma das melhores experiencia da 
nossa viagem... Muito bonita, charmosa, aconchegante, limpa, com todas as comodidades possíveis para se sentir a vontade, realmente em casa! Além de estar localizada em um bairro tranquilo e que gosto bastante. Mercados, farmácias, bares, restaurantes, linhas de ônibus e estação de metrô tudo bem pertinho. Fácil acesso a praias e pontos turísticos da cidade. Edson foi quem nos recebeu, e nos mostrou muito solícito. Sempre à disposição, nos deu dicas e tirou todas nossas dúvidas. Rafaela mesmo não estando lá presencialmente, nos mandou mensagem para certificar se estava tudo ok e que estava à nossa disposição para qualquer coisa. Muito atenciosos ♥

Uma ótima casa, com uma boa localização, e que complementa e torna a viagem muito melhor. Os anfitriões são muito solícitos, a casa tem tudo que é necessário, e mais um (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza é um lugar que recomendarei.

Very cosy bedroom in a beautiful apartment, the kitchen is well equiped which will allow you to cook what you wish. The whole neighborhood of Laranjeiras is really nice to walk around. There are some nice bars and restaurants just accross the street. Edson and Rafaela are very welcoming and are always ready to help. A must go in Rio!

Muito bem localizado, organizado, atendimento ótimo e casa super completa.
Super recomendo! Voltaremos com certeza!
Super recomendo!!! O bairro é ideal para turistas, uma vez que fica perto da maioria dos pontos turísticos. Sem contar que a casa é muito aconchegante.

La ubicación del hospedaje es excelente y la atención de Edson es buenísimo.
Me encanto todo.
Mi estadía fueron 10 días.
grazie!!

Rafaela e Edson são excelentes anfitriões, demonstram todo um cuidado com os hóspedes, dando-lhes orientações importantes quanto à cidade e redondezas do espaço. Casa super charmosa, com uma atmosfera convidativa. Destaque para o muro verde que nos abraça e tranquiliza, para a decoração esmerada. Recomendo!
Excelente Local, muito bem preparado para receber qualquer um, além do atendimento de ponta que a Rafaela e o Edson puderam proporcionar, adorei!!!

A acomodação de Rafaela é de fato muito agradável, tem um toque de cuidado e capricho em todo canto. A casa tb é muito bem localizada, próxima à rua principal do bairro, logo na esquina tem uma padaria ótima, pontos de ônibus, restaurantes, etc. É uma casa segura, num bairro seguro. O quarto é bem limpinho com os lençóis cheirosos.
Nuestra primera experiencia en la app. Dejó la vara demasiado alta :)
Tout était parfait ! L’appartement et la chambres sont supers, l’accueil aussi et l’emplacement de même ! Allez y sans hésiter !

El alojamiento de Rafaela es increíble. El espacio es amplio, muy seguro,  y en una muy buena ubicación para moverse en Rio. La casa cuenta con todo lo necesario para hacer de tu estadía un momento increíble. Todo impecable, y los anfitriones siempre atentos a ayudar en todo lo que necesitáramos. Llegar después de un largo día a la casa era un premio!!!! La ducha, la comidad, la habitación perfecta.
Nice and cheap place, well located in Rio. Rafaela was always reactive and made our stay there easy. I recommend ;)

Excelente lugar. Muy tranquilo, todo limpio, todas las atracciones quedaban a 30 min en auto. Tiene todos los servicios necesarios para alojar, baños, lavandería, cocina totalmente equipada, secador de pelo ❤ Me encantó. Gracias por todo!!
O Edson que nos recebeu é um ótimo anfitrião, sempre disponível. A localização é muito boa e a casa é bastante (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza contribui para tornar a viagem perfeita.
La casa es hermosa, está en una ubicación estratégica a todos los sitios turísticos y tanto Rafaela como Edson, están 100% pendientes a cualquier inquietud. Totalmente recomendado!
Melhor hospedagem do Rio... lugar fantástico

Everything was super okay . Edson and Rafaela are very helpful and nice . The house is located near corcovado and in a nice neighborhood (there is a bakery just 3 minutes walk from their house) . They are very available on (Hidden by Airbnb)  . I recommend to book here !
Ótima hospedagem, fomos muito bem recebidos. Localização boa e ótimas (Website hidden by Airbnb) toda certeza recomendo.

El alojamiento estuvo más que bien. Edson fue muy amable, nos recibió y nos dio todas las indicaciones para la estadía. Es una casa grande, central, fresca y tiene todo para sentirse como en casa. El barrio es seguro y central. Hay panaderias, kazetas, supermercados y bares cerca. En la esquina pasan varias rutas de buses que te llevan a los lugares turísticos. Sin duda, muy recomendable para hospedarse en Rio.
Everything was super ok as usual (it’s the second time we book a room at Rafaela and Edson’s house. They are very helpful and available I recommend this place
Espaço muito agradável e de fácil acesso! Uma experiência de lar, me senti muito casa. Ótimo  :)

Estamos muy agradecidos a Edson y Rafaela por su atncion y buena onda! Siempre al tanto de todo.  La casa es comoda y muy hermosa, sin duda volveriemos a hospedarnos alli.  Tienen todo los servicios y cerca de locales gastronomicos, bares y paderias; Podes caminar hasta el subte (unos 10 minutos) o tomar cualquier bondi. Recomiendo la estadia! Saludos!

The place is really sweet and in a perfect location. The hospitality was awesome, Edson answered to every question we had right away! Also, the free water in the kitchen saved our lifes! We really enjoyed our stay, we felt comfortable and safe!
Buenísimo! Siempre hubo mucha privacidad, todo limpio y muy linda casa

O espaço é confortável e tem tudo que é preciso pra uma boa hospedagem. Rafaela e Edson foram atenciosos e estavam a disposição pra qualquer dúvida a respeito do (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza me hospedaria novamente.

Ótimo lugar , fica perto de tudo a casa é incrível bonita estilosa bem aconchegante não tem o que reclama, Edson e Rafaela sempre disposto a qualquer hora a ajudar 
Estão de parabéns a experiência foi incrível

name: Conveniently Located, Sunny Brooklyn Heights!
summary: Perfect for visiting family stays. Monthly sublets available. Can comfortably accommodate couples and single people. Very convenient to subways (one black away) and Montague Street shopping. Walk to end of block and stroll along the promenade. No pets !
space: Coming to NYC For A Visit? Lovely one bedroom close to Montague Street shopping, one-stop from Manhattan (nearby trains 2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, E, F, N, R) and walking distance to Atlantic Street and Carroll Gardens. Pre-War building with high ceilings, lots of light, eat-in kitchen. Perfect for week long visit with family.
description: Perfect for visiting family stays. Monthly sublets available. Can comfortably accommodate couples and single people. Very convenient to subways (one black away) and Montague Street shopping. Walk to end of block and stroll along the promenade. No pets ! Coming to NYC For A Visit? Lovely one bedroom close to Montague Street shopping, one-stop from Manhattan (nearby trains 2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, E, F, N, R) and walking distance to Atlantic Street and Carroll Gardens. Pre-War building with high ceilings, lots of light, eat-in kitchen. Perfect for week long visit with family. Everything in the apt - wireless, eat in kitchen, a couple drawers and closet space. Only if they need something to make their stay more comfortable. Otherwise, I'm hands-off. Quiet, beautiful, charming, and walking distance to the Brooklyn Bridge, the promenade, DUMBO, Cobble Hill and Carroll Gardens restaurants. Easy access to downtown Manhattan Brooklyn Heights is a perfect place to arrive at after a long day of NYC tou
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, beautiful, charming, and walking distance to the Brooklyn Bridge, the promenade, DUMBO, Cobble Hill and Carroll Gardens restaurants. Easy access to downtown Manhattan Brooklyn Heights is a perfect place to arrive at after a long day of NYC tourist attractions or visits with family.
transit: One block away at Borough Hall, Jay Street/Metrotech and High Street stations you will find the 2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, E, F, N, R trains.
access: Everything in the apt - wireless, eat in kitchen, a couple drawers and closet space.
interaction: Only if they need something to make their stay more comfortable. Otherwise, I'm hands-off.
house_rules: Please respect my neighbors and try to be quiet after 10pm as they have small children. Please respect my space. Otherwise, its a great neighborhood, and beautiful building, enjoy !

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: photographer / artist

reviews.comments:
Really beautiful apartment with stunning views of the city. The place was immaculate, brand new, felt barely touched. Loved being by the water. We were only a few blocks from the L train, which is one stop from the city making it pretty convenient - though we ended up cabbing it most of the time. 
Willy, the host, was great, very easy to communicate with and everything was super smooth. No complaints. Hope to stay there again sometime. If you are a TV junky, do be aware there isn't one in the apartment, but we spied one in the common area you may be able to take advantage of.
Overall, 5 stars without a doubt!

We loved our stay in Brooklyn. 
The location could not have been better...
 contrast the quietness of this East River highrise  and then, within a few minutes  walk to the subway, we were in  Manhattan!!
The view from  the 14th floor was magnificent.
The place was neat and clean, fresh and new.
State of the art modern minimalism.
The door men were very nice and welcoming.
Great neighborhood, great building, airy and light decor, and all just a short walk away from the promenade!  Willy is a blessing....thank you for providing an accomodation so close to family!!

Willy is a wonderful host. Very helpful and flexible. Place is just great - very bright, clean room with calm, diffused light coming from big windows (so many of them!). Superb neighbourhood. Thank you Willy once more!

I would highly recommend all those reading this review to book this apartment. My girlfriend and I had a fantastic stay in Willy's apartment and we wish we could return.

We booked this place almost last minute as I had to move to New York to start a job and look at apartments. We're glad we went with this one. It is half a block away from the R and only a few blocks from basically every other subway line worth having in Brooklyn. We could be in Manhattan in a minute's notice. 

It is only a few blocks away from Montague St, the short shopping street in the middle of Brooklyn Heights, and a little farther away from Court St, the main shopping street this side of the Gowanus Canal. In short, the location is ideal. Don't pass this place up.

The apartment itself is spacious and light. The main room/bed room has two windows on three of its four walls and is constantly filled with light. The girl who lives there is a photographer, and it is obvious that she cares about the quality of the light in the room. To top it off, the apartment is appropriately accented with a few mirrors, which brightens the space even more. The bed, with its foam and vinyl mattress, is an absolute pleasure to sleep on. 

Those who come to New York fearing about grime and pests need not be afraid of this apartment. It is kept immaculately clean, and we stayed there ten days without seeing even a single fly. 

Sheets and towels are provided, as well as a mostly empty closet and lots of reading material. The internet in the apartment has its ups and downs, but is mostly and unfortunately fairly slow.

Again, you would be a fool to pass this place up, especially at this price.

Nice, clean and quiet apartment in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in NY. Lots of natural light and windows in the room.
Very convenient access to trains/Manhattan and very close to the Promenade.

Willy was extremely accommodating despite last minute changes on my part due to travel problems and I would happily recommend her place.

Great location in downtown Brooklyn.  2 minutes from several Subway lines to Manhattan and close to shops, restaurants etc.  HUGE private studio apartment that is very bright and open.  

Would recommend any couple of individual to stay here.
Lovely appartment, very clean, excellent location, safe street, close to subway and easy to get to Manhattan, also accomodating host.

Willy was great, and always available! The place is FULL of light, great location and super close to the metro. It was my first time to NY and it was a great experience. I highly recommend staying at her apartment and would love to stay there again! Thanks Willy!

Willy is adorable, she was attentive and we received it in good humor and kindness.
She did everything to make us comfortable and we lacked nothing. She contacted us several times.
The apartment is beautiful, very bright and clean.
I recommend this great apartment.
It is very very good, all the subways in range.
The area is very good, the street is very pretty and the people of Brooklyn Heights are very nice.

I recommend this apartment, we definitely go back!

We loved the light airy feel to the apartment, and the neighborhood is beautiful and quiet.  It was close to everything, even Starbucks a block away!  Everything was sufficient for the time we were there.  If you stay longer than a week, you may need a few more amenities in the kitchen...but for our 5 days, it was fine, as we were out every day.  The bed was very comfortable, with views to roof gardens.

I will definitely go back!  Thanks Willy!
Great location that was super convenient to everywhere you need to go. Would definitely stay here again!
Excelente apartamento, bairro muito bonito. Tivemos uma maravilhosa estadia. A Willamain foi muito atenciosa. Gostamos de tudo. Obrigada.

First of all, we loved the neighborhood.  It was very close to several subway lines and shops, not to mention the river, from which there is such a beautiful view.  

Second, the apartment is a lovely alternative to getting a hotel.  While there were a couple of quirks, they weren't substantial in any way and the price was more than 50% less than nearby hotels.  The lighting in the place is stunning and the building tends to be very quiet.  Getting the keys was not a problem.  We had a bit of trouble getting in to the building a couple of times, but that was resolved with the help of a friendly neighbor who was our designated contact since the host is away.  The door to the apartment was a difficult to unlock as well, but that may have been my error.

Overall, I would very highly recommend staying at Willy's place.  It's comfortable, inexpensive, especially compared to other nearby options, and charming.  We would like to come back soon!
Nice appartment, clean, plenty of light. Highly recommended. Excellent neighbourhood, near to subways,shops, supermarket. Thank you for giving the place to all my family!
Willy's apartment is phenomenal -- the location can't be beat (heart of Brooklyn Heights), the space is charming, and Willy's a wonderful host. Highly recommended!
Lovely apartment just as we had hoped.  Great location.
Great Host!!, Always in comunication.  We loved the apt, the building and the neighborhood. Was a great experience and a great trip.

I spent a delightful week at Willy's hideaway apartment. I call it hideaway because the apt. faces the back of the building and you hear nothing except birds chirping, no street noise. The apartment is very small: essentially the large, airy and lovely bedroom you see in the photo and then a tiny kitchen and bathroom. But it is the perfect setup and the PERFECT location if you want to be in the heart of Brooklyn Heights. There is a desk in the bedroom and an Internet connection (not perfect, but mostly worked) so I was able to get some work done too.  Willy was delightful to interact with - accommodating and prompt. After exchanging mobile numbers, we were able to text back and forth, which is very efficient. The bathroom sink turned out to be completely clogged but Willy got a plumber to fix it the next day. She met the plumber there and dealt with the situation, so it was no trouble at all for us. Definitely recommend.
Nice apartment, Great location. Good host. Would return.

This apartment is lovely. Huge windows with white cotton curtains allow for an airiness and beautiful light throughout the day. Because it is  at the back of the building it is delightfully peaceful. The kitchen and bathroom are small but clean and work well.  The Nespresso machine was a little joy. And it is very hard to beat the location;  a wonderful old Brownstone on a tree lined street right in downtown Brooklyn Heights. It was great.
Clean, comfortable with great light. Excellent location. Willy was an accessible and responsive host.

Willamain put in a brand new airco for me to conquer the scorching NYC heat! Beautiful building in a gorgeous and pleasant neighbourhood. Huge bedroom. Every subway line on the planet around the corner. Looking forward to coming back!
A delightful sunny and clean apartment that is on a fabulous street in the Heights. Willy is a great communicator and quick to respond to any queries.
Great apartment in a great location.  I really enjoyed my stay here.

Although we had a slight mixup with scheduling and locations, Willy totally made it right and I had a good experience still.

Definitely recommend working with her, she is great!
Beautyful small apartment in a quiet neigbourhood. We had everything we needed for our one week stay there.

Loved the location. The apartment is very sunny and comfortable. Kitchen has a table and is convenient.  Could have had more towels, but would rent again our next trip to NY. The host was very accommodating with arrivals and departures.

Willamain is sweet, responsible and unobtrusive.  The location is outstanding, and the neighborhood is ideal.  My one caveat is it felt VERY much like we were staying in someone's home to the point where there was literally zero space in the closets or bathroom cabinets for any of our stuff, as all of her belongings were there. I might suggest her putting in some kind of guests only storage if possible. The other caveat is the necessity to keep a very low profile while staying there (dont talk with the neighbors) which suggests that her renting her space may be somewhat undercover.  However, the place was clean, light and airy and very restful for sleeping. So on balance, storage aside, a very nice place to stay from convenience to beautiful views from the promenade.

Prompt communication with the owner, an absolutely GORGEOUS  Historic Building in Brooklyn Heights, EXCELLENT LOCATION! near everything you might need.
Clean, big windows...etc etc...
RECOMMENDED!

Claudia Rey
good hostess! everything was perfect!
Really nice apartment and neighborhood. Friendly host.

Great location, pretty apartment, but some minor bumps along the way. Overall, we had a great stay and always feel like it's a huge step up from a hotel. However, I felt like the host was sending mixed signals about welcoming children and price, which left a slightly bad taste in my mouth and the apartment is missing some appliances (toaster, microwave) and storage space, which would have been nice. On the whole though, it is a great apartment in an amazing location. The host was very friendly and easy to work with and the positives way outweighed the negatives.
great location near a wonderful health food store and henry street close walk and just a clean great space
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had a really nice week in Brooklyn Heights staying at Willy's comfy apartment. She has been a great host and have accommodated with everything I needed during my stay. I'm looking forward to my next trip here and would definitely stay in her place again!
Great place, clean, quiet, central in Brooklyn Heights with easy access to major subway lines leading into Manhattan. Short walk to great restaurants and bars on Atlantic. Would stay here again.
A clean and quiet apartment in a great location.  Lulu was a good host.

A really lovely place. The windows must be some seventeen feet high and the walls are a beautiful cloudy blue. Willy is a conscientious an accommodating host, who has arranged the key drop-off etc. very conveniently. Highly recommended.
perfect stay and lulu was super helpful. all went really smoothly.

This was my first air b n b experience and it was the best! Seamless. The apartment was very nice and clean and QUIET. Brooklyn Heights is my favorite neighborhood in NYC and this spot is located in the heart of it. It's so convenient to trains and shopping and restaurants. LuLu is a great host! I highly recommend this place. I would totally stay here again when I'm back in town for business / vacation to see friends.

We really enjoyed our stay at Lulu"s.  The apartment met our needs for our visit.  It was very clean and organized. It is located in Brooklyn but very easy to get into from Manhattan from the location.  We would definitely stay there again.

Lulu's apartment is charming, nicely decorated and convenient. It is right at the heart of beautiful brooklyn heights and close to everything. Lulu was very nice and accommodating. She was available every time we had a question and was flexible and helpful when our check-in time changed. Thanks so much! We would love to come back!

Our host was very pleasant, and met us after arranging a time to pick up the keys.  The apartment was clean, and airy, but it does not appear to have A/C.  This might be a problem for some in the summer.  For us it wasn't since it was early spring, and still quite cool outside.  Guests should realize that they have to keep quiet after 7 PM, or some of the neighbors below might complain.  We were not loud at all, but were very careful about this.  The apartment is small, and there is no TV.  If this is important to you, you should know this.  WiFi internet is available.

We really enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn.  Lulu was accessible and her apartment was in a great location and it was very comfortable.  We really enjoyed ourselves.  I would suggest the unit to anyone interested in staying in a safe, quiet and clean location in Brooklyn, NY with good access to subways.
Host was very nice. Neighborhood was beautiful.

Willy's place is a clean (very), sunny, comfortable, charming apartment on a great block in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in the city.  In a quiet building on a quiet block, this is the perfect place to stay while visiting the city - with huge windows, a nice breeze and plenty of surf magazines.  Close to everything and blocks away from the promenade and the new Brooklyn Bridge park, stay at Willy's place if you can.

Nice small older apartment.  Host responsive, and quickly installed A/C, as well as providing extra towels.  Need to be discreet in relation to other building tenants not a big burden, and I believe a universal factor now when renting in NYC.

Thanks for a great stay in Brooklyn Heights!  The apartment, though a bit smaller then the pictures indicate, was clean, comfortable and in a great location.  The neighborhood was quintessentially Brooklyn - a quiet tree-lined street with churches and brownstones.  We felt absolutely safe at all times and noise was never an issue, even as a neighborhood festival was in full swing out front.  The apartment is an easy walk from the 2, 3 and R lines, with one-stop trips into Manhattan.  The neighborhood itself, though, had plenty to offer: two short blocks to shops, restaurants, bakeries and cafes - and the promenade with amazing views of the skyline.  Willy was outstanding with communication and helpful in getting us acclimated to the neighborhood with restaurant recommendations.  Highly recommend a stay in her wonderful apartment.

Our host LuLu was very helpful and responded quickly to our messages. The apt was very comfortable and was what we had expected. The apt is very quiet and the general neighborhood was ideal for walking  and had many shops and restaurants within easy distance. I do recommend this apt.
Really lovely place! Clean and comfortable. My interactions with Lulu were great and she was very helpful. I would definitely stay there again.

Hi future guests,
My stay on Remsen was (Website hidden by Airbnb) a room full of light and a back yard view of real Brooklyn life surrounding the room on all levels. The Montague shops and access to the subway were perfect.  And at the end of the street, the New York skyline.  You should have seen the fireworks on the 4th of July, with the center Macy's float right there on the Brooklyn 
I was there a whole month...and Willy and I worked well together through several small issues.  She was very courteous, conscientous and she was supportive and accommodating. I know your stay will be a delight.  Susanna
Great one BR place in a really convenient location. Picking up & dropping off the keys was a breeze. Would definitely stay here again.
Beautiful location on tree-lined street in Brooklyn Heights.  Sunny, clean apartment.

LuLu's apartment was lovely - it was in a great location, steps from several trains, with loads of shops/restaurants/bars within a few block radius.  Although it was a hot week, the A/C kept the apartment cool.  The bed was super comfortable, and all-in-all had a great stay.

Neighborhood was great, location close to East river park, Brooklyn bridge and great subway access. Place was smaller than picture makes it look, but clean and perfect for us, two adults and a little girl. Last minute booking caused some confusion, but it worked itself out.

Willy was brilliant, gave clear instructions about where and how to pick up the keys. She responded swiftly to all queries and was generally really helpful. The apartment was beautiful and as a single traveler, I felt really safe both in the apartment and in the neighborhood. I will definitely stay here again

A fantastic apartment, excellent location, homey, creative, fun and all around awesome! I would stay there again in a heartbeat! And with an excellent host -- so welcoming and accommodating. A perfect Brooklyn retreat!
Great apartment, very warm and clean. Perfect for a couple or single person.
Great location, well connected. Very nice atmosphere in the apartment. Highly recommended!

Communication and key exchange went very uncomplicated. The apartment was very nice and clean and looked exactly as presented in the picture. We had a nice time and would stay there again for another  trip to New York.

My trip was perfect. Everything was as described and LuLu was super helpful and very responsive to any questions that I had. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location was great and in a safe neighborhood. I slept very well and had everything I needed - it really felt like home. I would definitely stay again and felt like I got a lot for the price.
The reservation was canceled 105 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 105 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

LuLu was a fantastic host! My mother stayed in her apartment while visiting me in Brooklyn, and LuLu was very accommodating, making sure she had everything she needed and felt comfortable in the apartment. She was away but was available if we had any questions. The apartment itself was also wonderful - beautifully decorated, clean and conveniently located in prime Brooklyn Heights. We will definitely be staying here again in the future!

LuLu was very helpful and kept in contact on my day of arrival so that I could collect the keys. Apartment is beautiful and so is the building it is in. Location was perfect for us as it is nice and quiet which is just what you need after a long day walking around the city. Loved that you could walk down to the end of the road and see the amazing skyline.
Would recommend staying here to everyone.

The apartment looks smaller than the main picture suggests, once your suitcases are in the bedroom/living room there isn't much room to move around... Having said that the flat is clean, airy and bright and very quiet. The bed and pillows are also super comfortable. We arrived late on a very hot summer's day and somehow the electric plug for the air conditioning unit was missing! Luckily there was a supermarket around the corner so we had to go and buy a new extension lead in order to be able to sleep. We also had to buy toilet paper and soap as there was hardly any in the flat (for the price I was expecting everything to be included). Lulu provided new supplies to her cleaner later in the week. The bathroom works well and Lulu has great pictures around the place and nice old furniture. We had a great stay beside the rocky start. Leafy streets, very close to the water, nice neighborhood.
Fab apartment, just beautiful. Great location to all of Brooklyn and Manhattan. Host was excellent and great communication

Other than the location...this apartment wasn't in good condition. Issues with plumbing and VERY poor AC. The neighbours informed me that a complaint had been lodged to the local authorities because it is believed she does not have a permit to operate as a bnb. ..which explains why she wrote this email to me:

"The plumbing is old so take care.
Also, important note! Please do not speak to anyone in the building or mention Airb&b. If anyone asks your parents are a friends/relatives. I would appreciate it very much if you could be discreet" ...Red flags went off when I read that, but despite my better judgement I went ahead as I was tired and jet lagged from a long haul flight.

There is no TV and the front door doesn't lock securely and has a huge dent in it as if someone had once kicked the door in.

Her neighbours were always very suspicious of her and told me so. I would advise ANYONE considering this apartment to steer clear...something isn't legal about it.

Great apartment and great host - LuLu was really helpful and couldn't have been more accommodating when it came to checking in and out. The apartment itself is small but not uncomfortably so, and the location is perfect. Only downside was having to leave when our trip came to an end!

Lulu was absolutely wonderful. She helped me get into the apartment around my busy schedule and was super helpful when it came to my "check out" as well. The apartment was just lovely and exactly what was described. So much natural light and I felt right at home. Would have stayed forever if I could! I would 100% recommend the apartment and Lulu as a host. My stay was perfect and I look forward to the opportunity to come back.

Sunny Brooklyn Heights apartment was fantastic.  Lulu was ever the gracious host and I found the apartment clean, spacious, sunny and very close to the subway stops.  I highly recommend Lulu & the space!

Lulu's apartment is conveniently located in beautiful Brooklyn Heights, within two blocks of trains, restaurants, bars, movie theater and the promenade featuring one of the best views in NYC. The apartment is perfectly suited for one, or a couple and she was an excellent host. Very warm and excellent hospitality. I definitely recommend. Thanks Lulu!
Sunny, easy, everything went as smoothly as it can get! And Lulu made this possible! 100% satisfied.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
My parents stayed at LuLu's place for a month this summer.  The location was fantastic and the apartment was really comfortable for them.  I wouldn't hesitate to have them stay there again.
Great apartment, beautiful location, nice communication with LuLu - would recommend this apartment to others for short and long stays.
My mother in-law had a nice stay at Lulu's. Very convenient location. Pleasantly decorated. Lots of light.

I truly enjoyed my stay at Lulu's apartment. It's a beautiful and very comfortable place in a perfect location! I appreciated its proximity to most subway stations and to very nice cafe's and shops. The apartment is spacious, has wonderful light and was super clean. The fact that it's elegantly furnished and decorated is also a plus. Lulu is a wonderful host and very accommodating. She helped make my check-in and check-out very smooth. It was very easy to communicate with her, as she's very quick to respond. All in all I had a pleasant experience and felt like I had a home in the city. I'll be definitely staying there again on my next Brooklyn visit.
LuLu was easy to communicate with to coordinate my co-worker's stay. She had a great apartment with no issues. Would recommend to anyone visiting the city or Brooklyn!
El departamento de Lulu es realmente encantador. Ademas es muy comodo y tiene cerca diversidad de tiendas y lugares para comer. Esta muy bien ubicado. Altamente recomendable.

Sunny and quiet space in lovely Brooklyn Heights. Very convenient to Manhattan  and Williamsburg via subway.

Was also surprised at how large the studio was (for NYC).

The apartment looked bright and charming, and LuLu couldn't have been nicer, but this was one of the worst rental experiences I've ever had. The apartment is literally falling apart (past leaks have left parts of the ceiling hanging down in the bathroom, and have stained the ceiling in the kitchen); the plumbing is old; the upstairs and downstairs tenants could be clearly heard; the subway that runs underneath the building rattled the walls every 5-10 minutes; the heat was intermittent --  the list of grievances could go on, but the final straw came when brown water started pouring out of a rusted pipe in the bedroom ceiling, and began dripping down the walls onto the floor. With no super in sight, and the heat out, and I had no choice but to find a new rental late that night. On the plus side, LuLu was very apologetic, and my money was refunded for the ensuing rental period.

The host is very friendly and timely with communication. She made sure that my mom's stay was comfortable. The home is a bit smaller than in the photos but very charming indeed. Given the harsh winter, it would have been great to have an electrical heater on hand for extra warmth. Contrary to some of the reviews here, we didn't encounter any issues with leakage so whatever the issue was, it has been fixed. For those looking to cook, the kitchen is not equipped with pots, pans, cooking utensils etc. Otherwise, a great stay in the heart of beautiful Brooklyn - just a few minutes' walk to promenade with amazing views and close to main subway lines and tourist areas.

When I arrived, the apartment was clean and bright. The natural light is no joke, so refreshing. The space is very cool and the location is fantastic - near good restaurants and shopping. I had a health issue on my final day and Lulu was completely understanding and worked with my check out restrictions. I’m so appreciative!! Would definitely stay here again.
Cool apto, cozy, nice located. Lulu communicates very well. I recommend.

Bright, sunny, fun little place to stay in Brooklyn.  It was perfect for my husband and I a we visited our daughter who lives in Brooklyn.  I would love to stay here again.  LuLu was very responsive to any questions we had.  I would recommend highly!
The host canceled this reservation 156 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
It’s a beautiful flat in a quiet but super easy to access location. Lulu was a charming host and I couldn’t recommend her home enough.
Everything was great : the neighborhood, easy access to transportations, shops and foods. The apt is lovely, very clean and quiet. I definitely recommend this place!

Buena ubicación en Brooklyn, barrio bonito y bien comunicado aunque no deja de estar a 40 minutos de la mayoría de los puntos turísticos pero el puente está a unos 15. El apartamento es pequeño, bien para una pareja. Decoración coqueta pero el equipamiento está bastante viejo: sábanas, edredón, almohadas y puerta de entrada que casi no cierra. La comunicación con la anfitriona no ha sido todo lo fluida que debería. Me quiso cambiar la reserva varias veces y luego tardaba más de 15 días en responder o directamente no respondía. Creo que debería ser más seria, a veces da la sensación que se desentiende por completo. Además  si te molestan los ruidos, ten en cuenta que el edificio es muy viejo y se oye todo. Los vecinos de arriba nos tuvieron sin dormir por sus continuas fiestas más de una noche pero por lo demás, es un alojamiento correcto teniendo en cuenta que se trata de Nueva York.

name: Luxury Style Space: ideal for short or longterm!
summary: This beautiful space is like a mini-apartment in my apartment. The huge 12'x16' room was converted from my living space using a professional room converter. The bed is topped with memory foam for extra comfort, the windows are huge, couch is comfy. Just a dream of a stay! [FYI: no (further) discounts. I do have a weekly/monthly discount auto-installed for my listing already, so please do not ask]
space: This space is unique because it's so huge. 12 by 16 feet of beautiful space! In NYC that is like a rare unicorn  It's a treat because the large living space was converted -- so it feels like ur living in ur own apartment. I'm right in the heart of Brooklyn and my neighborhood has become very trendy. Anything you can possibly need (food/transport/medical/recreation) is within 2 blocks -- you can't beat the comfort, and also the convenience! I look forward to meeting you!
description: This beautiful space is like a mini-apartment in my apartment. The huge 12'x16' room was converted from my living space using a professional room converter. The bed is topped with memory foam for extra comfort, the windows are huge, couch is comfy. Just a dream of a stay! [FYI: no (further) discounts. I do have a weekly/monthly discount auto-installed for my listing already, so please do not ask] This space is unique because it's so huge. 12 by 16 feet of beautiful space! In NYC that is like a rare unicorn  It's a treat because the large living space was converted -- so it feels like ur living in ur own apartment. I'm right in the heart of Brooklyn and my neighborhood has become very trendy. Anything you can possibly need (food/transport/medical/recreation) is within 2 blocks -- you can't beat the comfort, and also the convenience! I look forward to meeting you! Check-in time is between 1pm - 10pm the day of arrival, and must be confirmed prior to arrival. You will have access to every
neighborhood_overview: My neighborhood is vibrant the location convenient. 10 mins from downtown Brooklyn and 20 minutes from downtown Manhattan. Filled with young and old people of all cultures. There's a huge Jewish and carribean community. That means -- awesome food!  there are many families and young professionals. And my location is ideally located in proximity to any need you may have -- from laundry, grocery, restaurant to pharmaceutical needs, shoe repair, dry cleaning, transportation -- just about anything is within a 2 block radius. I love it here!
notes: Your room is equipped with a smart dvd® -- you can access your own various apps including : Netflix®, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)®, Youtube®, Hulu® and more! Have fun!  Also -- I'm an artist (singer/song-writer) so I love and appreciate creative folks! It's not a prerequisite however
transit: There are 2 buses right outside my window (B43/ B45), there is a taxi stand next door, and the train station is a mere 2 blocks away (the 3 train at KINGSTON avenue).
access: Check-in time is between 1pm - 10pm the day of arrival, and must be confirmed prior to arrival. You will have access to everything in the apartment -- except my bedroom.  Check-out time is 10am on the day of your departure.
interaction: I truly appreciate my privacy..... I typically stay to myself and I like to give my guests as much privacy as possible.... All are welcome, but I do have a preference for people with a similar lifestyle to mine: young artist/creative.
house_rules: CHECK-IN TIME : is anytime between 1pm - 10pm on check-in day, and must be confirmed with me 24 hours  prior to your arrival.  CHECK-OUT TIME : is 10am on check-out day.  Cleanliness : NO SHOES, NO SHOES, NO SHOES!!  (please bring house slippers if necessary, but please do not wear shoes in the house at any point, not “just on ur way out”, not “just on ur way in”, please respect my wishes and do not wear shoes in my home).  I expect my guests to be clean/neat, (especially in the bathroom). Please leave the bathroom tub/sink clean and free of your body hair. Since this is a space where I live as well, please be cognizant of my comfort as well as yours; clean up after yourself. MEN: toilet seats stay DOWN in my household lol. Please be courteous/respectful and keep your room how it was found. NO GARBAGE OR DEBRIS SHOULD BE LEFT BEHIND.   Conduct : guests should mind their noise levels  after 11pm. Cigarette smoking is STRICTLY prohibited. Just don’t do it. Keys: once booking this space,

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Dellasie was a very nice and gracious host. The room was huge, clean, and looked precisely as pictures. Her home was very conveniently located near transportation (train/bus/cabs), food... Anything you might need. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone coming to NYC!"

My stay in the house was perfect. The house was very clean, and comfortable. With so many space. I feel like in home. She was genial. The place was in the middle of Broklyn, so many local stores (food, clothing...) good located to the subway and bus station. I recommend this place to have a good time in NYC.
The space was comfortable, convenient, and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Dellasie was a great host, was friendly and kind, gave us our privacy when needed but was always up for a chat. The flat is very nice, the neighbourhood is nice and lively, it is located very close to transport links, and you can be in Manhattan in 40 mins. A great place for anybody visiting New York! We would definitely stay again

Dellasie is a very prompt, helpful and easy-going host. Everything was set very promptly and prepared for my stay. The underground is cca 3 minutes walk from the apartment. Good choice for a short NYC trip!
Very clean and comfortable space. Separated from the main apartment area by a thick curtain. The apartment is close to the subway and very easy to access by car.

Dellasie was very warm and friendly - I felt very welcome in her home. The room is right in the center of her apartment but she was careful to make me feel like the space was my own private room. The neighborhood is great and one of my favorites in Brooklyn. I felt happy wandering around on foot in the day and the subway station is very close by with useful links. And the bed is SO comfortable!

The bed is in a large space which is on the living room of the apartment. Privacy is provided by large black curtains. Dellasie was really friendly and stayed out of your way. The Kingston metro station is just a couple of blocks away. It was a good deal for a short stay.

I had a very good experience here Dellasie was a good host and very kind. The place was clean and it was nice and quiet but most of all its in the middle of all the best places to go so no where is too far. Thank you Dellasie I would definitely come back.

I loved staying at Dellasie's place! She was very friendly and so helpful with any questions I had to ask. The room was just as described. I was perfectly comfortable the entire time and I felt right at home! I spent one day being lazy in the apartment recovering from my rough travel day and she even brought me a bunch of movies to watch. Great host!
Dellasie was easy to contact. Answered all my questions and welcomed me when I arrived. No complaints. The place was spacious, clean, easily accessable with public transport.
Dellasie made me very welcome.   Convenient location.   Very secure.

I waited a couple of days to write this review, as I want to digest this experience and try to review it as objectively as I can. 

The guest before me needs to check out late so she contacted me the day before I can do the check in between 4PM to 6:30PM. I was enjoying my holiday, I guess I could as the place I stayed before is not far from hers. So I replied yes. Long story short, the following day I got stuck in the traffic and got locked out from the place I stayed before. 

I was late. 

Dellasie was not happy, even I apologized. She won't listen to me explain either, "don't argue!" That's what she said

I didn't see her much during the days I stayed. She did provide me privacy and a big bed. Thanks.

The kitchen sink was always full of dirty dishes, I was not cooking there, just not so pleasant. The neighbour was loud at night, I can hear the TV is on till 2am, but this is New York, which is ok.

Generally it is ok, liveable, have privacy, safe area, loads of good restaurants. The host could be more welcoming, which is kind of her job. Smile once doesn't hurt.

Dellasie was very welcoming when I came to stay at her place. It is a very spacious room, and Dellasie will give you all the privacy you need. The apartment is a bit far away if you look to spend most of your time in Manhattan, but it is easy to access by train. You should check out Dellasie's music, she is a very talented singer and musician!

Dellasie was a terrific host. She was quick to respond to every inquiry. She was enthusiastic and acommodating without being intrusive. Her place was easy to get to (by subway) from Manhattan. Large room, thoughtfully furnished.
Dellasie is a great host, and the space is good as described. The area was a little noisy at night, so if it summer bring your ear plug ;)

The place was easy to find. If you come by car though,  be prepared to look for parking, especially in the evening. The room is indeed very clean and spacious.  However the bed is a bit smaller than shown on the picture. The room is separated by a thick curtain. Don't worry, it will still give you total intimacy. There is a big leather couch and a large table full of magazines; I liked the attention to details.  Dellasie is a very sweet and funny hostess (she's also a great singer!). On the bed was a basket with clean towels and a bottle of water. I thought it was a nice gesture.  I didn't see her a lot but she does respond quickly to her emails. Overall,  it is a very convenient and  safe place. I would recommend this room for a single traveler.

Even though I arrived just before midnight, Dellasie was very welcoming and showed me around the apartment straight away. She made it clear that she was available for help but left me my privacy, which was much appreciated! Good location, only a few minutes to the subway and reasonably close to Manhattan downtown. Really enjoyed my stay here and would definitely recommend!

Dellasie is a wonderful host.
Very pleasant stay. Being an artist myself, it was a bit easy to connect with her and I enjoyed our conversation.
She is extremely accommodating as we arrived a bit late, also that we kept her well informed about our whereabouts and when we would arrive.
There was a bottle of water, fresh towels and a card showing the wifi password by the bed which I thought was a nice touch.
Though I disturbed her in the middle of night when I did not try the door right, after grabbing a pizza in the corner, she and her boyfriend did not mind at all. Good people!

Dellasie is very generous and the space is pretty great - there's a large black curtain that segments the living room so you have your own space. Dellasie leaves you a towel and clear instructions for the wifi etc, and there's a huge fan in place and a place to hang your clothing. The apartment is clean and spacious, though some may find the makeshift bed a little too small. The only bad thing to me was the awful heat!
she was a decent host had all the basics ready and was very helpful

Dellasie was so lovely and the perfect host. I had trouble with my flights from London and kept of being delayed but she was always very quick to respond and had no problem with me arriving at any time. It's great staying with someone who has such a passion for music and she made me feel welcome whilst also leaving me to do my own thing. Only slight downside is no air con but there's a great fan instead.

The room is clean and comfortable, and it is conveniently located with good transportation facilities.
Dellasie is a very kind lady. She prepares water, towel and a tips for customers. I also like the magazines of that month on the teapoy. I had a good time in these days.

I stayed with Della for the Labor Day Weekend and had an amazing time.  From my initial reservation until checkout everything was absolutely flawless. I contacted her and was responded to quickly, which allowed me to quickly plan my visit.  The lines of communication were open and allowed us to coordinate with one another before and during my visit.  We communicated via the AirB&B App and via text message.

Della was exceptionally accommodating to me, and provided me with information on great places to socialize and transportation from her home to the airport following checkout. Della also allowed me to checkout later than the prescribed time to accommodate my activities during my trip.


The home was clean and very comfortable and conveniently located in a neighborhood where everything is within walking distance.  Her home is settled behind a bus stop and about two blocks from the nearest subway station.  I came to play Mas for Labor Day, which occurs on Eastern Parkway and because Della literally lives around the block from the parkway, her home was the perfect choice for me. 


In addition to Della being a super host, she is also a pretty dope individual.  She is unique and has a jovial personality which makes her an ideal host for AirB&B.  I will definitely request her again and lodge with her again.  She is super awesome and I thoroughly enjoyed myself.

Dellasie was a great host! I was an hour late from the original scheduled time I was going to arrive at her place due to transportation conflicts, and she was very understanding. She was very welcoming when I arrived and gave me the whole run through of the place. Throughout my stay she respected my privacy and I had no issues of any kind with her. As for the place it is exactly what you see in the pictures. It's a very nice setup with lots of room. Her apartment is in a great location, it's only a 2 block walk to the nearest subway station. The only flaw with the place is the locks on the doors can be a bit tricky to master, but other than that I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking someplace nice to stay for a reasonable price.
Very friendly host; great stay!

I got a fine reception and instruction on how to use the facilities
the neighborhood was safe enough and acknowledging considering being one of the worlds biggest cities
The Jewish community had a significant feast that had an impact on the neighborhood; closed café s and restaurants, but very interesting.
it was nice for me to mind my own business and come and go as I pleased
It was close to the subway. The bed was a bit small for two people but there was a  comfortable couch available.  Dellasie was friendly and welcoming.  Grocery store near by.
Dellasie is a lovely hostess - she minds your space, is down to earth & easy to talk to.

Dellasie's place is great! It's very close to a subway station (a few blocks), and I didn't need to change trains to get to Manhattan, where I spent most of my time. There a few grocery store close by, and I also found a great place for breakfast (Collina Cuervo), so you will have no problems finding food. The place itself clean and quiet. Dellasie is the nicest person, very open and easy to talk to. I would definitely stay there again!

We had a good stay in Dellassie's home.  We realized right away that the bed was smaller than we had thought.  It would be great for one person but there was no way my husband and I were both going to be able to sleep in it, so I slept on the couch with some blankets that Dellasie provided.  She was very friendly and responsive, and check-in went smoothly.  She left a basket with towels and washcloths, a couple of water bottles, wi-fi instructions, etc., which we really appreciated.  The privacy curtain works well.  There are four locked doors between the outside and her apartment.  The keys worked well and we felt very secure.  The noise level was fine.  It was a short walk to the subway station and there were lots of little markets nearby.  All in all, it was a good value and aside from the size of the bed we had no issues.
Dellasie's place is in a truly diverse and interesting neighborhood. Quiet and comfortable, Dellasie provide a top level of privacy and hospitality
Dellasie was great host. She kept everything simple and straighforward.
Dellasie is a fantastic host, friendly, good sense of humour and helpful. The room is spacious and the flat is clean and well located  by the 3 line. I would definitely stay here again.

Dellasie's place included several amenities, was incredibly clean, and the bed was extremely comfortable. She is very easy to communicate with if you happen to need anything, and offers valuable information about the surrounding area as well upon check-in regarding restaurants, where the nearest train is etc. Thank you again for providing me with a place to stay on such short notice, and being so accommodating. I greatly appreciate it!
Very nice host! Close to subway station, but be careful about late night schedule.
The room is large and good, basically clean. The location is convience, close to everything that we need. The only problem is the noise on Friday night in the neighborhood.

This is the second time that I have stayed with Dellasie and like the last time, I thoroughly enjoyed my time. I was very comfortable in my living space, and had any and everything that I needed at my finger tips.  Dellasie is very kind, considerate and a welcoming host which makes it easy for me to continue booking her home on my visits to the city. She is an outstanding host and her home is perfectly situated within a short walk to virtually any need or desire that a guest may have.  I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and will definitely patronize her home in the future.

The location and value were good for my needs. The space is not private (curtain separates rental space from the rest of the house) but Dellasie and friends were respectful of that and were quiet for the most part. Kitchen is not considered for guest use but bedroom area and bathroom were clean. Sofa and sitting area was comfortable and practical. Access to Wifi & Netflix was a plus.

Dellasie's is kind,place is perfect in the heart of Brooklyn.You got enough space and privacy great value for the money.You're in the middle of Brooklyn so you are everywhere real fast.Recommend for sportive people to rent a bike for more days so you can roll youre ass through town and see the real color full Brooklyn and its diversity such a cool place and nice people and interesting neighborhoods.Its like small manhattan but even cooler.Also subway is around the corner so you are in manhattan or the other boroughs in no time .People go to this place and see it all!!!

Es un lugar espacioso, seguro, cuya anfitriona es agradable y servicial. Queda próximo a medios de transporte, a 15-20 min. de Manhattan por subway, y a 1:15 hora del aeropuerto JFK.
El departamento queda en un primer piso por escaleras, con ventanal a la calle, tenerlo en cuenta por los ruidos del trafico en las mañanas; por las noches es muy tranquilo, se puede dormir. Es un living extra-large que la anfitriona separa del resto del departamento con un cortinado, ideal que fuera de tela más gruesa, de todas maneras el alojado tiene su privacidad y LUGAR, (es mas grande que mi habitacion en BsAs!)
Hay supermercados próximos, y lugares para comer también. Tranquilo el barrio. 
Lo recomiendo para todo aquel que no sea demasiado pretencioso y que quiera descansar en un lugar cómodo.

Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt! Und waren sehr froh nicht direkt in Manhatten zu sein. Hier fuehlt man sich wie ein Einheimischer. Es gibt eine U Bahn direkt in der Nähe die nach Manhatten und alle wichtigen Punkte anfährt,sodass man auch nachts nicht weit laufen muss. Die Wohnung ist sehr geräumig und sauber. Im der Nachbarschaft gab es viele cafes und Restaurants. Mein Tipp für deftige Küche -Soul Food Kitchen - Kommunikation war überhaupt kein Problem.
Stay was great she is helpful and very cool!

lo spazio è sempre molto pulito. E' stato un piacere durante la mia permanenza chiacchierare del più e del meno con Dellasie che è sempre molto gentile e offre parecchi spunti sulle cose interessanti da fare nel suo quartiere e a NY in generale
Very nice place. Dellasie is a charming host.

Stayed with Dellasie in her apartment for 2 weeks stay. Was very friendly and welcoming, and reassured me if I needed anything to just ask.  I would say the apartment was clean and cosy. The neighbourhood was lively with loads of shops surrounding.. which was perfect.Room is big and spacious

Like one of the other guest that stayed with Dellasie,’ I have left if a few days after my visit to write subjective review

It was my first experience of using Airbnb, the main reason for using the service  was stay somewhere where there would be a friendly face, someone, to get heads up on the local area, instead of being stuck in soulless hotel room.

Unfortunately  it didn't pan out like this! on the whole I didn't feel very welcome, so I spent as much time out of the apartment as possible, I was told off! for leaving the light on the first night and the next day I got told off again! for not putting the toilet seat down!  ( i'm 50 years old man!)

All very petty I know but I had only just arrived and this the only contact I had with Dellasie for the whole visit, 3 days in  I actually checked out the reviews for her place again to see if I had missed something! no breakfast was offerd to me not even a cup of coffee she did't even say goodbye when I left sadly.

Anyway, it doesn't give me any pleasure having to write a native review but I feel I most be honest for other people thinking of staying Dellasie.

On the plues side NY is Amazing!!
Great hosts, great location. Would highly recommend. Thanks guys!
cattivi odori quando l'host cucinava, letto orribile che non mi ha permesso di dormire per 6 giorni di seguito..

J’ai passé trois semaines magnifiques dans cette ville et l’appartement situé a 3 minutes des commerces, bar, restaurants et metro à faciliter mon voyage. Car je pouvais séparer ma journée en deux parties en rentrant à l’appartement un moment. L’accueil était très bon je me suis tout de suite sentie a l’aise comme a la maison. L’ambiance populaire et multiculturelle du quartier m’as également plus j’y ai fait quelques rencontres sympa

I’m so happy with my stay with Dellasie in Crown Heights. She was warm, friendly and accommodating, and made my stay feel homey and comfortable. I fell in love with the area and discovered so many fantastic little spots that I may not have discovered staying in other neighbourhoods. Really recommend

Staying at Dellasie's place was an absolute breeze. From the moment I checked in she was very helpful and hospitable in showing me the space and things I needed to know; even had snacks awaiting me upon my arrival. Would highly recommend staying at her place; I would again.
Dellasie was a wonderful and lovely host- had a basket of goodies waiting for me which was great since I was a hungry traveler!

My stay at Dellasie's Airbnb was one of the best experiences I've had thus far. I was in town for work and needed a quality place to stay that was reasonably priced, easily accessible and most importantly relaxing, and Dellasie provided a room that met my needs. The room was spacious , clean, and peaceful. The bed was comfortable and she went above and beyond to ensure that the room was filled with adequate storage and extras( sheets, towels , blankets, snacks, cups and bowls) without the room feeling cluttered. The blackout curtains do a great job at creating a mutually private space, while aiding to the calm atmosphere she has created . 
Upon arrival she gave a tour and thoroughly explained the nuances of her place, in the room she left detailed instructions on how to make my stay comfortable for all involved. As a host she is very gracious , highly communicative and detail oriented, I had a great time interacting with her a few times during my stay and I will definitely book this room again on my next trip to Brooklyn !

Dieses Apartment kann ich jedem empfehlen der new york von seiner wahren Seite kennen lernen möchte. Es ist super einfach den Touristen Kram zu machen aber auch so, dass wenn man es möchte, das wahre new york sowie die Menschen kennen lernen kann. Die Nachbarschaft ist bunt gemixt und sehr freundlich. Die Gastgeberin ist sehr freundlich und offen und lässt einem die Privatsphäre. Ich würde dieses Angebot wieder wahrnehmen wenn ich nach new york fahren würde.

Dellasie is a very gracious host. For me, it was perfect, as I needed a place to lay my head after busy days in the city. Lots of neighborhood flavor. Two blocks from the subway, and a grocery store, healthy grill/smoothie store and small eateries on the way.

Dellasie was a phenomenal host! She was very helpful in explaining the nearby restaurants and convenience stores. She had great energy and responded very quickly to any questions I had. Her place was very cozy and well kept. I would definitely recommend her to any travelers!
It was a good stay at Dellasie's place. She is a great host
Dellasie’s space is tidy, neat, quiet and conveniently located, and an incredible value. Great for a short term stay for anyone visiting relatives in the area or in town for business.
El cuarto es muy cómodo y la ubicación a dos cuadras de la estación Kingston es muy buena.
Great place, great host..highly recommended!

Dellasie’s place is like home away from home. Really appreciated her knowledge and advise of the city. Dellasie is very down to earth and sweet! The cleanliness...  great. The area she’s located in I found to be very quiet. Oh and the snacks and Netflix was probably my fave. My overall first time experience was great!
Great place! Right in the middle of great spots to visit in Brooklyn and privacy is well-respected!
Good value 4 money. Nice place 2 stay in Brooklyn.

Dellasie’s made brooklyn feel like home! I feel like she invited me into her space with open arms. Communicatin was easy, and the location is very convenient. She's such a grounded person, and overall one of the nicest people I have met. The space is pretty big, and you definitely have more than enough privacy. I would recommend this place to anyone! My stay was amazingly refreshing, i'd come back time and time again. Thank you for being the best host (:
Convenient, Dellasie is a great host, but the bed wasn't very comfortable.

I loved staying at Dellasie’s place. The room is large and super comfortable, with lots of privacy. Dellasie was warm and welcoming. And the neighborhood is great, with easy access to awesome Crown Heights venues and a quick three block walk to the subway. I would definitely stay at Dellasie’s place again.
We had the most amazing time, Dellasie is an amazing host and I would definitely recommend it to anyone staying in the city! Super convenient location and a super comfy place ❤️
Dellasie's place is great. Very close to the subway, and coffee shops and small bites are near.
The place was enough, just enough. Unfortunaly my feeling was that there's no a hospitality approach. You are just another one renting a space to spare.

What a great experience it was to stay with Dellasie! The room is a great size for one or two people. The room space was clean and comfortable. Plus netflix access on the TV for nights in! :) It was very close to the 3 train which made my stay very convenient whenever I needed to head to the city. Dellasie was very responsive to any questions I had during my stay. I highly recommend staying at Dellasie’s place!
Dellasie reply very quickly and she is really kind.

The space was well worth the price of the reservation. Everything was clear to understand and open. There were a lot of great restaurants minutes away from Dellasies apartment. The bed was really uncomfortable + hard to rest on, but everything else was pretty up to standard.

it was our first experience at an Airbnb, and we weren't sure what to expect.  Dellasie kept in touch with us before we arrived, and informed us she wouldn't be able to be there, but a realtor named Tony would be.  he was a fantastic, polite and respectful host.  The place was very clean, and we had plenty of room to ourselves. bed was surprisingly comfortable as well!!  

Overall a great experience.  Loved the neighborhood, plenty of local good food nearby!

thanks for making our stay a great one!

I had a really really lovely stay at Delassies!! The room is cosy and spacious and really private! It’s like you have your own little apartment in NYC! 
Delassie makes sure she gives you a warm welcome and is such a sweetheart!! fast in contact and up for a chat but if you’d rather have a little time for yourself it’s all good! The space is super clean and everything you need is there! 
The bed is a bit small, no problem for me, but if you’re tall it might not be that comfortable but there’s always the big comfy couch so options enough! 
The shower is really nice and hot! (or cold whatever you like!)
The subway is nearby and easy to find and takes you everywhere easily, it might take a little time to go all the way to uptown manhattan but hey, you’re in New York it doesn’t really matter! ;) 
Super chill neighbourhood where you can eat and get your groceries when needed! 
I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and when I visit New York I will definitely stay here again!!!! :)

name: Quarto próximo ao Estádio Olímpico

reviews.comments: Il nostro soggiorno è stato molto bello, lei è stata molto disponibile. L'appartamento era molto pulito e in una posizione abbastanza centrale (a una quindicina di minuti dalla rambla a piedi). Ottimo!

Ottima posizione e in una zona tranquilla e sicura. Molto vicino alla metro e a tante attrazioni turistiche che si possono raggiungere facilmente a piedi (massimo 25 minuti). Ho davvero apprezzato la pulizia degli spazi! Ottimo in tutto!
Zona tranquila. Muy bien comunicada. Nos movimos caminando a todos lados.

name: BEST REVIEWS*BEST MALLS*SAFE STAY*DIMSUM*CWB*MTR
summary: Location is OUTSTANDING as MTR Causeway BAY is within 1 min walk. You are in the very heart of a fancy busy shopping attractive Causeway Bay. There can be few homes as beautiful and practical as this one, from the  interior of the reception and 3 bedrooms and 2 pretty bathrooms. Ideal for Families --- within a stroll to Victoria Park with swimming pool, the very best spot for brand shopping, and thousands of food stalls, international restaurants, cafes, and bars are in the immediate area.
