neighborhood_overview: This enigmatic city of skyscrapers, ancient traditions and heavenly food will fascinate, whether it's your first visit or your 50th. Culture Beyond the glass and steel of Hong Kong’s commercial persona, the city also boasts a vibrant cultural scene that features the eclectic influences of its Chinese roots, colonial connections and a wondrous pool of homegrown talent. Here, you’re just as likely to find yourself applauding at Asia’s top film festival as joining in dawn taichi or reading the couplets of a local poet to the drumbeat of a dragon boat. Culture could also mean indie music under the stars, a classy art walk, your first Cantonese opera – not to mention the exhibitions and events staged year-round at the many museums and concert halls. Why I Love Hong Kong I love Hong Kong because it has a complexity that eludes definition, sometimes even by its own people. I can be soul-searching near the Chinese border, lunching with Sikhs at a Sikh temple, splurging on a set of kitchen kniv
notes: Please note that not every neighbor is happy about the New Sharing Economy. If we want them to understand the 21st century :-) we should respect normal house rules like:  -no party after 10pm -be quiet in the staircase/hallway -don't ring at neighbours bell because you cannot find the key in your handbag -don't throw things out of the window Although the apartment is on a very high standard and equipped like a serviced apartment - I am still a private host but not a Hotel with fully employed staff and a front desk. Me and my team are always happy to assist - but if can take time to follow your not urgent request (like 1 more towel). Well, in case that shiny Hotel style entrances and hallways are more important to you than an airbnb Hong Kong LOCAL apartment in a Hong Kong usual residential style apartment - you might want to look elsewhere. There is 24/7 video surveillance and the lifts are operating 24/7.  Just keep in mind it's NOT a new building but the building and environment is a
transit: HOW TO GET TO CAUSEWAY BAY: By Public transport: MTR: Island Line: Tin Hau and Causeway Bay stations Tram: To Kennedy Town, Happy Valley, or Whitty Street BY BUS: New World First Bus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Citybus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) BY MINIBUS: Green minibus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Red minibus: Sai Wan - Causeway Bay, Causeway Bay - Shau Kei Wan, Temple Hill (Tsz Wan Shan)
access: The entire apartment with all amenities is accessible for my guests. All closets are empty but full of hangers, you will find toiletries and hair dryers in the bathrooms. the kitchen is fully equipped with pots, pans, china, glasses and cutlery. Basics like tea, coffee, water, milk, and capsules for the Nespresso Machine are provided to make sure your arrival will be relaxed. Detergents for washing machine and dish washer are provided for a stay of 3 nights. My stand-by guest manager will happily provide more supplies on request for small additional costs.
interaction: I will respond to your questions within very short notice. My reservation team is online 24/7 and will always be able to assist in case I wouldn't be online.  I am online while using the following tools: airbnb thread, e-mail, phone, we chat, viber, line etc. Let me know your preferred communication tool.
house_rules: Early check-in and late check-out is possible for an additional fee. Please ask. Please guys... no party without acknowledgment and confirmation, no smoking but only on the balcony/ garden, no drugs, eg. Besides the risk of losing your deposit (apartment gets checked after your check out) it would be sad to lose the apartment due to inappropriate behavior. Again - please use your common sense. Although my apartment is well designed and complete - I want to set a clear expectation!    -streets in the area might be dirty -the area might be crowded -integrated into the residential building are shops and restaurants - complaints about smell of food in that building area wont be accepted. (my apartment is on the 4th floor and higher - you wont smell anything from a restaurant on ground floor).  - In HK its allowed to start refurbishments at any time without informing neighbors. Any noise complaints based on neighbors work in their apartment adjacent wont be accepted.)  - In case a lift woul

host.host_about: The world is my home.... always looking for fresh ideas and working with locals in countries all over the world.

reviews.comments: Susan and her team are fabulous.  They received us at the apartment and explained how everything worked.  The location is unbeatable.  We had a really good time.

The apartment is very near the Metro system and plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. Very good service from manager on arrival and also from the staff at entrance to the building during our stay. The apartment itself is in our view somewhat smaller than it appears on the photos - the sofa pictured accommodates no more than 2 persons of european size.

My wife and our 2 children stayed in the apartment for a week. It was perfect for us. Great location very close to MTR and in the middle of busy Causeway Bay. Wjile the apartment was small by western standards it was good for us and gave everybody their own space. A much better option than a hotel. The fridge and small kitchen were functional and allowed us to prepare small snacks and breakfast if we wanted. Let's face it you will be mainly eating out in HK. All communication with Susann, Joanna & Szilvi was prompt, professional and helpful. We would recommend highly.
Perfect apartment in the Center of Honkong island, we enjoyed our stay for 4 days and I can recommend 100%. The service prior arriving is well organized. I plan to come again for the next exhibition.

Everything went well from the beginning. We got picked up by the driver and arrived safely at the apartment. The host was awesome and she kept our luggages after we checked out which, I am extremely grateful. The apartment was typical HK, small, cosy, efficient use of space and in a perfect location. Only downside is there isn't a safe deposit as advertised but didn't bother me much.  Would recommend as well as return again!

Our trip to Hong Kong could not have been a better experience and many of those thanks were due to the hospitality of Susann and her team. There were four of us arriving throughout different points of the night and having an apartment with an electronic code vice keys was extremely helpful. The apartment was clean, and the beds were very soft. This was my third stay in HK and in comparison to the other apartments this was slightly bigger than average. Located in Causeway Bay, there are tons of shops around and you are easily within walking distance to michelin star rated dim sum (at which we ate at twice in four days). Susann and Alessandra were extremely thorough, with an extensive helpbook provided to cover all your needs from dry cleaning to police to food. I highly recommend staying at this location, as everyone involved was extremely communicative and helpful! I would definitely stay here again, as I plan on continuing to visit my favorite city throughout Asia.

The overall experience was great. Susann was very communicative and supportive of our requests.  Via who was our local point of contact was also very welcoming and helpful.  The apartment is a good size by Hong Kong standards.  It had all the amenities as described and I appreciated that a blender was added to the kitchen appliances.  The location is very convenient to local shopping and MTR.   

The only challenge was that the bedrooms have very poor curtain blinds that dont block the light so there is no let up from the lights from the next door buildings and the 6am sunrise.

thanks again for a wonderful stay!
My friends and I had a fantastic time at Susann's place. The location is incredible and the apartment was comfortable to fit three adults. I would highly recommend this place!

The response from the host especially prior to check in is very prompt and very accommodating with our requests. Perfect apartment for a family holiday in Hong Kong. Location is excellent, close to the MTR, shops and restaurants. The concierge/pick up services I think is just as good as major hotels. The security of the flat is also very good and certainly felt very safe. The flat was well appointed and Via, our local contact was very helpful and accommodating. All in all, a great experience!

We stayed 3 nights at POSHandGO apartment and  the location was great. Walking distance to mall, shop, eateries, bus stop, MTR station, etc. The apartment building was next to Cafe de Coral and Food Republic; so nothing to worry when it came to meal time. The host was very courteous. Overall, we had a wonderful holiday experience =)

We had an amazing time at Susan place. We were picked up promptly from Airport. Via was very helpful. She even provided us a baby stroller than we needed for a few days. The apartment was cozy. The best thing about this place is location. Just 1 min to MTR and Hysan Place Mall..

Susann is the best host! Love her!she haves me much help ,and she is so nice .the house is very beautiful more than the picture ,room is very clean ,and the bed is very comfortable,very quite,we sleep very well all the night ,downstairs has much more delicious restaurants ,great location!I will be here when I next time come to hong kong !susann and via makes us so warm and welcomed !

absoluly highly recommend! First, great location: expecially for family trip. very near MTR and all the best shopping area in HK. Second, check in & out are both convenient, Via is helpful and also Susanna, sweet host they are. come to pick up us with the heavy luggage. Finally, the apartment is useful as HK size is always cozy but, here, totally enough space for us (three adults and two kids). we will definely come back again for such family trip.

The space in HK is limited, but Susann's kindness and hospitality is unlimited . She's the best host and her apartment is very nice. It is a harbor for us while we stayed in HK. She always understand our difficulties and offered her help immediately. 
Thank you Susann. Just like my daughter said, we like you and your apartment.

Affordable rates. Conveniently located in front of Hysan Place. Where Times Square is also of walking distance. The apartment is nice and clean. Complete with kitchen utensils. A/C works great. The only problem is that the toilets were too small; some of the faucets were broken and the doorknobs of the bedrooms could not be locked.
房子的地理位置很好,房子很干净,三个房间装修都不错｡
房子很好很干净

This is my first experience with Airbnb and it was wonderful. Suzann is very helpful right from the beginning｡The apartment was nice and comfort as pictured , location is the best, right at the center of causeway bay.
nice apartment!great location!everything is perfect, but the washing room is small. I love the apartment!
It was a very good location for traveler. And Susan is really nice and have very good introduction of her house. Great experience.

Appartement tres bien situe, propre, bien equipe, rien a dire........
Super en general

Great apartment in a fabulous location - MTR right next door, a million places to eat, shop and explore right at our doorstep. Apartment well equipped and perfect for our needs. Good communication with host and great apartment manual with heaps of information. Thank you very much for having us, we would certainly recommend your apartment to others.

Pros: Location, space, beds were comfortable, ample kitchen utensils and equipment. Nice big tv. Hosts were great as they constantly kept in touch and made sure everything was smooth right up to arrival. Susann and Via were also easily contactable. They were also very kind to provide a cot and high chair for my toddler.
Cons: Cleanliness as the toilets had smell and mold; Floors had hair and dust. Furniture like the glass tables should be changed especially if guests had young kids.
A great location in Hong Kong.  The airport pick up was an added bonus!
Great location...good value
ที่พักเดินทางสะดวก ใกล้ MRT และแหล่งชอปปิ้ง ที่พักดีงามคะ

Clean and beautiful interior design.
The host is very kind and helpful for staying in the apartment. Quick response for our questions and detailed explanations about apartment. Easy to get the subway station.
If I have chance to visit Hong Kong again, I would chose this apartment again.
Thank you!!

Complimentary Airport Pick-Up is the bonus & reason for me to book this apartment. The location is considered strategic, which located in Causeway Bay & opposite Hysan Place. You can take the MTR at the basement floor of Hysan Place. SOGO & Times Square are within walking distance. 3 rooms, 3 double beds, 1 sofa in the living room, which maximum can fit 7 people. 2 small washrooms. Not very spacious but for the house in Hong Kong, I think you cannot expect it will be very big. Late check-out will need to pay an additional fee of HKD100 per hour so that we had to drag our luggage around until our boarding time at night, which makes our trip even tiring. Some hosts will allow us to put our luggage at their place and collect it when we are heading to the airport, so it will be easier for the traveller whose flight is at night time.

location of the flat was great. right in the heart of causeway bay. flat is quite spacious for hongkong standard :D
susann is very helpful and responsive.
flat was well equipped and clean.
the only down side was the ACs in all rooms were very loud. had to use earplugs to sleep

住这个公寓简直就是噩梦｡房间的实际样子和看到图片的差别很大｡公寓整体很小,卫生间和房间都比图片小很多,住5个人,非常的拥挤｡房子很旧很脏,有很多 (Hidden by Airbnb) 还有蟑螂｡有一个小房间的窗户打开外面是非常脏的画面,而且房间早上有很大很大的油烟味道,可能对面是别人家的厨房｡入住期间基本没有睡｡非常难受｡总而言之,这是我用airbnb定房间以来最差的一次,特别特别糟糕｡但是这些不满仅仅是针对这个房子｡房东SusanC还是非常好的 给我提供了很多的帮助｡房子的位置非常好,在时代广场和sogo的中间
Great location! Pics were accurate and communication was easy. Will definitely stay again! Thank you!
Very clear comms and reactive response from Susann, apartment is centrally located - ideal for a short stay to enjoy Causeway bay shopping area.

The place is very conveniently located, security is good and real quiet even though it is in an busy area. However, lack of space for luggages and the poor drainage in the shower stalls should require immediate attention.
Fast response. Susan and her team is kind person. Overall nice... thanks once again

2018.02.07~09일(2일, 8명)동안 숙박했습니다.
숙소 위치는 센트럴로 바로 갈 수 있는 지하철역에서 매우 가깝습니다.
그리고 숙소 근처에 식당(맥도날드 및 로컬푸드 등)이 많고, 숙소는 매우 안전합니다.
화장실 및 샤워시설이 두개로 충분했습니다.
 "Kris " 및 "Susann"이 숙소 주변 안내 및 숙소 내 시설 활용방법에 대해 매우 잘 설명해 줬습니다.
다시 홍콩을 방문한다면, 이 숙소를 가장먼저 고려할 것입니다.

Very nice, cute and clean place! The location is super convenience. Close to subway, shopping and many choices for food. The building has 24 hours security. Susann and Kris are very friendly and helpful! We enjoy the staying very much!

With 200 sqft and good design you will feel like home. It's located in a walk up building (2nd floor), right in the center of TST, less than 2min by walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★

neighborhood_overview: 10 Best reasons why you want to book my studio! 1/ My colorful studio is well located in the center of the Tsim Sha Tsui- Amazing place for dinning local food and western food. There is so many shops, so you can go shopping for 1 day there. 2/ My studio is just 2/3 minutes by walk to the METRO station Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) 3/ Quick access from Hong Kong airport by airport bus ( the bus stop is few minutes from my studio), Airport express or taxi. 4/ 12 minutes away from Hong Kong Island, Central, Causeway Bay, Wanchai.. 5/ My studio is near all the famous restaurants! Different kind, so everyone can find happiness! Local food, vietnam food, thai food, foreigner food, Chinese food! :-p It makes me hungry now.. 6/ You want to visit Hong Kong, my studio is in middle of it! Everything is not far! 7/ Don't worry about transportation! My studio is near the Metro station, go everywhere from this station! You can take bus also or mini bus, you prefer Taxi? No problem, there are there, just downs
notes: Official check in time is 2 pm, check out time is 10 am. If you need to check-in late or check-out early, please inform me ahead of time. If needed, I will give you different options for luggage storage near my building. In the apartment, you will find clean towels, universal adapter, hair dryer, kettle, plates, cups, cutlery. For toiletries, I provide shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper. However, travelers are require to bring along their own toothbrush and tooth paste.
transit: Is it your first time in Hong Kong? Check my address on internet, and you will see it's the best location for tourist and for local people! Transportation is amazing, easy and cheap. Taxi 24hours. If you have any questions, let me know, i will be very happy to give you awnswers :)
access: *Comfy double size bed for (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) *High speed Free Wi-Fi *Big 37" TV *1 Small Fridge *1 small Table *1 Air conditioner for hot summer *1 private Bathroom and toilet *Clean Towels *Shower Gel *Shampoo *MicroWave I don't have washing machine but the laundry shop is near my studio, about 2 mins.
interaction: We can communicate through Airbnb, if you need information, you can contact me. If you book my studio, i will send you an email with all the information you need to know, and contact information.
house_rules: . Earliest Check in time is 2 pm and latest Check out time is 10 am, not negotiable due to cleaning schedule. If needed, I will let you know all luggage storage options near my building. . Remember that you are staying in someone’s home, not hotel, so please take care of the apartment as it was your own apartment. . Be respectful of the place and quiet as I let my own apartment to travelers when I’m away, and I don’t want to have any trouble with neighborhood. . If smoking, please open windows, or turn on ventilation in the bathroom. . For shower, water heater, need to turn ON red button at entrance of the bathroom, then wait 10 min before shower. . Leave dehumidifier ON as often as you can, to avoid humidity in the apartment. . ALWAYS close the entrance gate door of the studio. . TURN OFF AIR CONDITION and LIGHTS EACH TIME YOU LEAVE THE APARTMENT.

host.host_about:
Hello i'm Hester, i'm from Hong Kong, I love my country and i hope you will like it!

I listed my studio in Airbnb cause i'm not often in Hong Kong as i work as an translator assistant, i have to travel in different place in the world. 

I love to travel, my favorite destination is Italy, I've been to Rome, Milan.. I love the food there.
I also often go to Singapore, i also live there, few weeks a month, it's amazing there..

reviews.comments: 房东很nice,屋子很舒服,交通位置非常便利｡

Amazing room in the center of Hong Kong. It was perfect for my stay. Hester and her friends were very responsive. I had issues entering the room at first, and Hester immediately took care of it. I'll choose this place again on my next visit.
第一次体验民宿感觉非常棒,房间也很好,很干净整洁,就是稍微小了点,不过性价比还是很高,位置去哪里都很方便
是来到香港之前做的最好的准备之一!很棒的体验!房子地段很好,就在尖沙咀的闹市里,是很有香港味道的地方,房间很干净,很新,各种设备也都很齐全,周围吃的东西也很多,茶餐厅,小吃,离便利店隔地铁都不远!房东人也很nice,帮了我们很多!下次还有机会来香港还会来这里!

It's a small but clean and comfortable studio. Convenient to public transportation and easy access to local restaurants. The owner gave us clean instructions to get here and replied quickly on any question. But if you have big luggage, it's a bit different to climb the narrow stairs as there is no elevator.

Very good communication and directions.
Bed so comfy after a long flight as was good hot shower.
Apartment air conditioned if needed, and quiet.
Enjoyed exploring the area very much, big variety of shops, cafes and walks etc.

Very central location easy to get to by A21 bus from the airport, stop at Kimberley rd. Place is small, Hong Kong standards, very clean, good shower and large flat screen. I definitly recommend this place.

This is a wonderful experiences stayed at here! Hosted made everything simple and easy to do and respond very fast!highly recommended
Room was clean, located at the heart of TST, just nice for 2pax.
地点还蛮容易找的,而且也很方便,在尖沙驵的闹市里,楼下就有很多茶餐厅,商店等｡房间虽然麻雀虽小但五脏俱全而且很干净,就只是冲凉房的花洒坏了,须要用手握着｡退房时间还真的太早了,而且还蛮准时的｡｡嘻嘻｡｡｡整体上其实还蛮不错的,会推荐给朋友｡｡
Studio agréable, propre et fonctionnel. Bonne communication avec notre hôte.
The directions and information to our room was very accurate and we were kept informed the whole time.

It was a great stay! The room is very nice and clean.  Small size but the space is comfortable and enough for 2 persons. The location of the spartment is highlight, super easy to access to MTR subway, there are many restaurants surrounding and also cosmetic shops. I will stay there again for the next HK trip.
房間很乾淨,而且地理位置也很好,離地鐵走路差不多5分鐘,感謝您的房間讓我們有了一次愉快的香港旅行體驗!

Location and price made this the ideal spot. We were able to get to all the tourist stops and hidden gems within minutes. The MRT is around the corner making transportation a breeze. Rooms small, but it's a room with a bed so what else do you need?

If you're on a budget and are looking for a "local" feel in the heart of Hong Kong, this is it.
The room is awesome with simple but beautiful inhouse design and the bed is fragrant. I am also really appreciate with self check-in. I have a good day here :D
Nice place , excellent location , clean and tidy. Will visit again.
Hester's place is clean and tidy. Good location.

We had a nice stay at Hester's.
The apartment is exactly as described and the self check-in and out is really convenient.
Hester's room is so nice and comfortable. It does looks the same as the photos. Im sure i will come again!:)
房间很干净,地方也很好,附近有很多吃的,离维多利亚港很近,交通很便利｡
A cozy confortable house. In a great location. Good communication.
地段很方便,周边吃的购物的一应俱全｡闹中取静的一间房,但实际没图片看上去大,收拾还比较干净,床太软了,睡的人一身酸痛,淋浴喷头只能手持用
在香港算是性价比很不错的了｡又在尖沙嘴这么繁华的地段,去哪里都方便,很不错｡
很棒的体验 各项功能都很齐全 房间也不小 房东很友善
Really great little place, top location and the self-check in arrangement was really convenient. Would definitely recommend this studio.
Nice person
Small place located near everything that you need. Would recommend if traveling on a budget.
Very clean and suitable apartment for a few days in Hong Kong.  Excellent location.  Communication throughout the stay was quick and easy.

Things I loved in Hester's place:
- room is well maintained and clean
- looks exactly how it is shown in the picture
- microwave, personal ref and other kitchen equipments were available
- there are 4 pillows...yey!
- location is great...just a few minutes walk to the mtr station, bus stop, restaurants, shopping malls...I can go on and list all the places near the studio
- self check-in is great!
- area is very quiet and not too crowded
- very detailed instructions (w/ pictures) re directions and how to get to the place were provided

The communication pace over the messenger and (Hidden by Airbnb) was great. A thunderstorm got us stuck at the airport for an extra day, and Nico& Hester were very responsive online. Upon arrival we were disoriented because the picture of the entrance of the building was outdated - the instructions guide referred to an hairdresser that does not exist, which was replaced by some other business. How could the host miss this major turn around if they live there? The studio is super super small, perhaps this is the HK standard. The studio was clean, but the stairs going up up were dusty old, dirty, dark and narrow. The street stinks like garbage, because there are lots of restaurants. The kitchinette was equipded with the bare minimum: no sharp knife, no bowls, no cutting board; only one cup of water, 2 small mugs, 4 plates and some spoons, forks and blunt knifes. The water boiler was burned, fortunately we had a microwave and a rice cooker machine. No closet or wall hangers to hang clothes or jackets. The entrance of the studio is on a narrow hallway that is pilled up with stuff under plastic bags. Next time I´ll try to look for a residential area in HK, rather than commercial to avoid the stink. Or I´ll stay in Macau where one can find cheap 5-star hotels with big luxurious rooms, and take the fast ferry to visit HK. Comparatively, it seems that HK offers low value for your money, unless I didn´t look hard enough.

The best thing about this place is its location. Although the building entrance and stairs looked sketchy, we found that the place was actually safe and most importantly very convenient for going around. It also had a lot of stores/stalls surrounding the place where you can buy snacks and shop for unbranded clothes at a cheap price.

The room itself, although not big, was good enough for us (2 girls). We didn't exactly pack light, but all our things fit fine in the place. It was also very very clean and well-maintained with comfy sheets and pillows - making up for the rather average bed. 

Everything worked fine as well - the AC was really good/cold, heater and refrigerator worked fine, and the internet connection was good. It would have been more convenient though if more trash bins were provided. 

Nicolas was nice and took care of everything during our stay, from check in to check out and a couple of inquiries/requests. Hester, although responsive wasn't very helpful, so Nicolas is the go-to. 

Tl, dr: For its price (in comparison to hotels) and accessible location, this place is perfectly fine and comfortable enough.
Good location to MTR and lots of desserts and cha can ting. Cosy place for two. Host is fast in response. Overall good stay in Hong Kong.
The check-in and check-out process was very smooth and the location is fantastic. The host was helpful with our questions about a taxi to the airport.

The place is very convenient to Mtr, bus stop and food establishments. The room is very clean and cozy. Also, the host is very accommodating to all my queries. I highly recommend this place for people who wants to stay in Tsim Sha Tsui at a very affordable rate. I will definitely stay here when I visit Hong Kong again.
The room is very comfortable.  They even have microwave oven. Public corridor inside the room can save luggage.  It was a nice experience.
非常棒的一次体验,来香港第一次住民宿,Hester家交通非常方便,地铁巴士站都很近,下楼就有好多小吃,下次来还会住^_^

Apartment is in a great location. It is a very nice room and perfect for a short break. I was provided with a lot of information before I came which helped me when getting to the apartment but also around the local area. 
I would stay again!

Great central location, clean small studio, air con, wi fi and fridge fantastic. Close to MTR - so made accessing public transport easy. It is located on the second floor and no lift so therefore having large suitcases can be a hassle. For the price and location and your not looking for luxury - this place is perfect.
Muy bonito apartamento, pequeño pero acogedor. Buena ubicación.
Busy neighborhood but close to many of the places we wanted to visit. Room was decorated nicely, in a warm welcoming manner.
面积比较小,但是房间很干净｡

Was given great info from Hester before arriving. Found the apartment easily. Everything in the apt was as per description & photos. MTR station closely. Hau Fook Street is great for places to eat local food.

They do have clear instruction for check in. The room is clean and same as the picture. Near by to shopping area, easy to look for food and beverage.
May consider to stay again if i visit Hong Kong in the future.
Lovely Studio in very good location with a very comfortable bed! I had a very good time.
A very cute and exceedingly comfortable studio. The host was very communicative and gave detailed instructions on finding and entering the room. Would definitely stay again.
很干净很舒服~下次有机会再住的地方
房间很小,但东西齐全,一个人或者两个人住都完全足够｡而且HK交通都很便利,楼下就是很棒的早餐店,如果想去香港做一次短暂旅行这是一个不错的落脚点

The studio is extremely quiet considering its close proximity to the street.    I was able to enjoy my rest while staying there.  The studio is also stocked with many supplies, and it is tidy and clean.
The location and facility is very good! There are many shopping mall and restaurant near the room. Everthing is perfect!
Nice stay. No hiccups on checking in or condition of the equipments at all. Room is spacious and very clean. Love the mattress firmness. Very happy with my stay!
干净舒服,在尖沙咀附近,交通购物都非常方便｡不过楼层没有电梯,如果要搬运行李可能会有点不便｡
All good!
退房时间是早上的10点钟!10点钟!10点钟!并且没有商量!10点必须离开!请考虑清楚再定!不然也许你才刚刚起床就要推着行李箱灰溜溜的走了｡洗澡的花洒是坏的,必须拿在手上洗,没有淋浴｡热水大概只能供应五分钟,再洗水就不热了｡适合夏天和不怕冷的人｡但是房间清洁不错,整体风格是宜家风｡地理位置也还不错,吃喝玩乐都很方便!房东回复也迅速!适合行李不多,自由行的朋友!
Very straightforward, and very cozy place in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui. Hester and Nicolas took very good care to make sure I was comfortable.
For our last few nights in Hong Kong we stayed at Hester's place. It looks exactly as described. It's located right in Tsim Sha Tsui, MTR and food just minutes away. Thanks for letting us stay :)

地理位置:在闹市区,交通方便,地铁公交不行2,3分钟就到了｡餐厅购物很方便,周边都是商区,下楼就能觅食,有一家甜品店和日式餐厅半夜12点都有人排队｡
卫生环境:公寓很干净,虽然小小的,但是给人感觉很舒服｡公寓应该是一套房子分割成了4个房间,有点吵,但是在可以接受范围内｡
沟通:房间的电视,因为我们一开始没找到那个隐蔽的开关,无法使用,所以跟房东沟通了下,房东一开始就让我们跟她的朋友沟通,电视问题沟通时,房东的朋友显得有点不耐烦,后来房东的朋友找了另一个人过来解决问题,最终还是帮忙解决了问题｡

The studio is in good condition and comfortable but can be quite small especially for those travelling in a pair. The location is superb and easily accessible from TST MTR (exit A2). My only constructive feedback is perhaps the host should extend the check-out time to 12pm instead of 10am.

The place was modern and clean with Hester even providing bath towels. Microwave was also convenient for heating up takeaways. The room is spacious by HK standards.

There isn't much insulation in the walls though so you might wake up if you're a light sleeper as some of the guests in adjacent rooms return to their rooms or use the bathroom.

Great little studio in good location on Kowloon side. Good communication beforehand and easy instructions to find the place. Accurate description and the place is all you need if on a stopover in HK. There were 2 of us staying and the size of the place was fine for us. Towels, hairdryer, plug adapter all available.

Hester's apartment is situated at a very ideal location where there are various nice food around. The apartment is very cosy for 1-2 person and as there is no lift, may have to climb a few stairs up. Transportation around is very convenient as well. Overall a good experience!

Hester's studio is exactly as described. It's very clean, modern and surprisingly quiet despite being centrally located. 
The location is prefect. It's close to TST MTR station and you can easily walk to the Star ferry terminal and get across to Hong Kong Island. It's also close to lots of great shops and restaurants.
The self check in system was easy and straightforward. Nick was helpful and readily contactable.
I'd highly recommend this studio for business or pleasure in HK!
位置便捷､功能齐全｡入住和退房可以自助完成｡性价比高｡
位置非常方便~去尖沙咀哪里都很方便~就是房间很小~床还是沙发床~稍稍有些美中不足~其余都很赞
The studio was very nice and proper with a perfectly convenient location. Had a short yet comfortable stay. Plus Hester and Nicolas were really kind and helpful. Thank you for your host:)

Hester's place was clean, convenient, and the photos are an accurate representation of the property. The check-in instructions were very clear and the location is a short walk to the MTR and shopping. There is a 7-11 around the corner for things I forgot, like a big bottle of water and toothpaste. I had a great time, thank you!

the room is clean and the location is very convient. The design of the house is very good that it feels like home. we can easily relax their. A good room for two people stay. instruction given is very clear.
Really had a great time staying here as it's so convenient to get around and feeling what it is like to explore in good depth. Would def come back for future visits!
前面虽有些插曲,但是入住后不错,尤其是地理位置极为方便

This place is great for any traveler looking to be in a central location with easy access to transit, restaurants, shopping, and nightlife. Hester is very accommodating and instructions are very clear. Overall a great place at a great price!
The apartment is very nice. The room is clean and tidy. A nice stay.
The room is relatively spacious given the perfect location. Super clean and cozy. Hosts are approachable and informative. Suggest changing the check in and check out time to be more convenient.

It was perfect for our one night stop over in Hong Kong, arriving after 10pm. Hester's directions on getting to the accommodation was very clear. Only a few mins walk from the bus stop from the airport. Neat and adequate for short stay.
性价比真的很高｡是个难得的房源｡很安全,楼下就是小吃一条街,还有很多慕名而来排队吃特色菜的游客,总之越夜越多人,圣诞节期间房间价格略微上调了,平时预定还能便宜,总之还会再来的,地理位置绝了!离哪儿都近!
Perfect base for a short stay in Hong Kong. Hester communicated with me throughout and was easy to contact. Perfect location close to the MTR and easy to get to from the airport.
Host responded quickly and was easy to communicate with. Location was great with food and shops just outside the door. Great stay for the price.
很不错的studio位置很好 附近逛街购物美食地铁应有尽有 房间干净整洁 房东给的指示也很明显 入住简单 下次还会选择这里 谢谢房东
位置非常好,出入也十分方便｡房间虽不大,但是在香港这个价位已经是超值!非常推荐2人入住!
很溫馨的地方

Perfect location for a stay in the center of TST. Communication with Hester for check-in and check-out was easy and seamless. I would be happy to recommend to friends and book again for another trip to Hong Kong!
位置好｡但我觉得入住体验很一般,因为香港交通很方便,没必要住在尖沙咀,第一次来不知道,小公寓很窄,洗澡的热水器和其他地方的用法都不同,也没有使用说明,厕纸也少得可怜｡睡觉的床质量感觉不好,翻个身就嘎吱响,床也比较窄,两个人睡被子很小｡冰箱和微波炉感觉很鸡肋｡
위치가 굉장히 좋음.
It's cozy more than I expected.

Parfaitement placé pour découvrir le quartier de Kowloon (marchés, parc...). 
Ruelle calme, proximité des restaurants et boutiques (7 eleven), métro à 5 minutes à pieds, laverie automatique à 15 minutes à pieds.

Hester's place is gorgeous and clean. Her house manual is impeccable - the best I've ever seen; check in was a breeze. The airport train makes for a very quick commute for travelers, and her neighborhood is full of delicious restaurants (I ate at an incredible Japanese place a few doors down) and shops. I highly recommend this property.

This place was great to stay in and the location was perfect. Lots of great restaurants & shopping nearby. 
The hot water system only allows for 1-2 minutes of hot water which was not ideal for us. 
The house manual stated that if anyone asks what you're doing there do not tell them you're from Airbnb. This did not make us feel comfortable about the stay. 
We would be likely to stay again though as the price was great & the location was good.  
The space is quite small but was fine for the 2 of us.

the location is really convenient

Clean, cosy apartment with amazing location.  Fuss-free check in process.  5 minutes walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR A2 exit, great eateries just downstairs, and Langham place a short walk away.  When leaving, we took A21 airport bus from the Airport bus stop about 10 minutes walk away.
地理位置還不錯,房間小了點但整潔乾淨｡廚房是用不到啦⋯不過蠻喜歡房間的,覺得可愛｡問題是上三樓只有一個窄窄的樓梯,要是行李很重的話會累死｡然後淋浴的水幾分鐘就再也沒熱過不知道為什麼
room is very good place

Dats a nice place

Great  room.

Really enjoyed our stay at Hester's place in TST.  Really convenient location close to TST MRT station with plenty of food and shopping options close by.  Typical HK efficiency unit.  Very cozy.  Would recommend to anyone for a short stay!
Great place!

Hester got in touch really quickly when my husband and I booked her place. And the point person she used for our stay was reliable and followed up with us regularly. We didn't get the feeling of staying in someone else's home, which is one of the things we enjoy about Airbnb, but Hester's place was in an interesting neighborhood, true to photos/representation, and had everything we needed for our stay.
很迷你很可爱｡交通很方便,地铁很近｡

Hester's place is small and cute, just like in the photos, and just enough for a short stay.  One small tip: Follow Hester's instructions in the listing for hot water in the shower...turn the heater on 10 mins before using and you'll have enough hot water to shower. Thanks again Hester!
A very convenient and comfortable studio. Communication with host was also great. My girlfriend and I had a wondeful time exploring HK!

Great location and quite place. 
Less than five mins to the Tsim Sha Tsui metro station.

This is a great option for people who travel with 1 or 2. Even it is small but everything you need is provided. I surly will come bk again next time :) thank you!

D.
Great place, conveniently located. Smooth check in and check out and accurate information/description provided.
Great location and beautiful studio. Very comfortable  =)
Location and everything is great. Only sofa bed need to improve

Great stay at a central location and communication with host was easy. Streets are bustling during day and night but the apartment itself is very quiet and clean but small by some western standards however normal size for the area. Adequate size for 2 adults. Has airconditioning. Area is populated by mainly locals so great way to try some local food. Also felt safe. Around 5 min walk to closest metro station.  Would stay again.

위치가 침사추이 중심가에 있어 아주 만족 했습니다. 주변에 상점, 음식점 등이 밀집해 있어 편리 했으며, 홍콩 방문 시 필수 코스인 하버시티 까지도 도보로 이동하는데 무리가 없습니다.
수건, 화장지, 샴푸, 바디워시는 구비되어 있으나 슬리퍼는 따로 준비가 되어 있지 않기 때문에 준비해 가시는 것이 좋을 듯 싶네요..

Nice and clean place. Mins to tst stn, eateries, shopping. Bus A21 from airport

Central quiet and clean unit. Excellent and professional communication throughout. 2 doors of security plus CCTV means it was very secure, though Hong Kong does feel very safe anyway. Happily recommend this place for others
A nice stay!
Excellent location and has easy access to shops and food, highly recommended for people traveling in pairs.

Awesome accommodation! Highly recommended in HK!
Everything went perfectly well and smooth!
房子很好找到,靠近尖沙咀地铁站,出行也方便!房间内设备齐全,除了没有浴室拖鞋之外｡
Location was convenient in the heart of town, suitable for 1-2 travelers who are willing to share a queen size bed together.

The location is terrific. It is surrounded by tons of restaurants and shops, and very close to the subway. The room is small but cozy.

We have spent 2days here. It's really a nice place!!very comfortable and very convenient for shopping !It's also very safe!!

Lovely cozy studio apartment in Tsim Sha Tsui in a excellent location (only 5 minutes walk from the MTR). I loved the cute interior especially the One Day picture! The bed was super comfortable! I slept  very well. The host communicated very well and quickly and gave very good explanations for the check in and check out procedures, so everything went smoothly :) The only thing I didn't like was not having a shower head holder so it made showering more difficult. Overall I really enjoyed my stay!
Very Nice
尖沙咀N2口出来走差不多3分钟就能到,非常近｡房东直接告知入住方法,很简单方便｡房间很干净,空间对于两个人来说够了｡周边吃的购物的地方也很多｡总体完全满足我的需求｡
地理位置棒,去哪都很方便,充了八达通发现基本上要去的地方走一会儿就到了!而且楼下超多小吃
great place!clean!nice location!the host respond quick and friendly!
Good location,nice service,cozy room,cold air conditioning. A nice accommodation which I would recommend to my friends :)
设施很齐全,走前才看见冰箱⋯⋯
出租房地点在尖沙咀闹市区,交通非常方便,房间干净,设施齐全,生活方便,就是房间小了一点,下午两点才能入住,第二天上午十点就必须离开,又没有行李存放的地方,拖着行李逛街很尴尬｡
住宿地点离地铁站很近,走过去大概五分钟就能到了,去哪里都很方便｡周围也有很多小吃｡非常棒的体验!
位置真的超级棒,楼下就是金英药房和龙城药房还有卓悦｡步行十分钟差不多能到海港城,中港城｡房间里设备也比较齐全,有微波炉,冰箱｡就是没有电梯,而且房间有点小｡
房间适合二人住但是电视打不开看
房间有点小,还是很干净的,只是对于旅游的人来说,厨房一般没有必要,然后房东经常联系不上,不能给我们提供帮助
不错
性价比超高的,离尖沙咀地铁很近,房间也整洁干净,带独立卫生间,必须五星好评,下次来香港还选择这里
还不错
交通便利,购物方便,sasa 卓悦金英大药房龙城大药房楼下附近都有,离DFS和海港城也不远｡
一般
位置特别好｡周围就有很多的店,靠近地铁站,711,atm机,药妆店｡虽然有点小,但两个人还可以｡
Hester place is awesome. Near to mtr and clean. I like her place a lot and we enjoyed our stay there. Two thumbs up!!

地段确实很好找,但是之前看房费里收了清洁费的,以为会每天来打扫,结果没有,房间里只有两根浴巾,对于我们住几天的人来说,这个确实不太便利｡淋浴的喷头没办法挂,只能自己手拿着洗,很不方便｡床单上很容易沾上灰尘,看着就很脏｡可能是香港地段的原因,房间确实很小｡整个体验不太好｡考虑到一次性支付了全部房费,换地方也比较麻烦而没换｡下午两点才能入住,但退房的时候要求我们10点就要退房｡本来香港的夜生活很丰富,导致早上根本没有休息好,就要起来退房｡一般都是12点退房比较合适 ｡
It could have been better if the check out time is not 10am.
Convenient for you to have a tour of shopping and gourmet. And the night
어지간한 곳은 도보로 다닐수 있을정도로 위치가 좋고 주변에 상점들도 위치해 있어 굉장히 편합니다
房间的位置非常非常好 可以说是旅行的黄金地段｡不仅楼下有sasa 卓悦 7/11 lush 等这样的商店 走去海港城和DFS也非常的方便｡房间的热水也很好 洗澡非常方便｡虽然没有拖鞋牙刷等(我住过的有些房子是配备的)但是楼下sasa购买旅行装也很方便 ｡美中不足的就是隔音不好 每天10-12h隔壁清扫房间总是很吵｡
很棒的旅行,房间超级温馨｡离澳洲牛奶公司和庙街都很近｡按照地图去找完全找得到,住的这条街有好多好吃的,不过要小心感觉药店什么的还是很贵...购买的时候药比价哦

Stayed for 2 nights, location is awesome, the space is much larger than most other airbnb we booked in hong kong, internet is good without data cap, notice some paint peeling at the ceiling (just appearance), only issue we have on the 1st day was with the toilet flush where the toilet bowl water builds up, we contacted the host and got an instant reply, with the use of a pump, after which everything is sorted. Value for money and good location. Thumbs up

Place was what we expected. Definitely very convenient, close to mtr and lots of restaurants right downstairs. Theres hot water but have to hold the showerhead therefore less time to use hot water. Overall, it was not bad.
非常非常小｡啥也放不下｡但是地理位置优越｡

The little studio was surprisingly quiet given that the entrance of the building was on a very busy street with a lot going on. This little spot was in a great part of town, easily accessible by train and bus to and from the airport and very utilitarian for us who just needed a place to spend the night while on a long layover on our way to another destination. The apartment is very small and would have been tight for us otherwise. I recommend anyone staying there to pay attention to the directions given as without them it would be very confusing to find and access the apartment. The communication was also very good and helpful.
good
Decent apartment on a very busy street. Close to everything. The room was as described. I had a good stay.
没有洗漱和拖鞋

Location was spot on. Environment was wonderful. Everything is walking distance. Food was just steps away. Cleanliness means everything to me and it was awesome. Some spots on the wall but u won’t notice it. Dessert store downstairs was amazing. I will be back definitely. For those coming to HK. I suggest to hit the race course. It was a unforgettable memory.
great host, quick response. the location is strategic, takes around 5min to the nearest mtr station.
위치가 정말 좋아요. 유명한 먹을거리, 볼 거리 근처에 다 모여있어서 검색해서 나오는 왠만한 것들 금방 갈수 있어요. 난방이 없어서 이불 밖은 좀 추웠는데 이불 속은 괜찮았고, 세면도구는 제꺼 썼어요. 실내화랑 욕실화가 없다 그래서 가져가서 썼구요. 전자렌지랑 포트있어서 커피랑 음식 잘 먹었어요
交通方便 吃饭购物方便 房间小但干净舒适
一次非常不错的住宿体验
Very kind and hostful . The place is very convenient to anywhere

위치 좋음
가격대비 시설 좋음
깨끗한 편
2박 했는데 타월은 1인당 1장만 줌(더 달라고 했으나 안준다고 함)
방음 전혀 안됨(옆방 중국인들때문에 2일간 괴로웠음)
房间虽然很小但是很温馨,
嗯在尖沙咀,很熱鬧,附近的藥妝店和便利店都蠻多的,很方便｡熱水比較冷,可能是調節的問題,但應該設置簡單點!沒有牙刷和拖鞋,還好之前看到評論自己有帶著,以前都是住酒店,這次也算是體驗了住宅的感受了
房间隔音不好,隔壁开微波炉加热､说话的声音都能听到

Pictures of apartment are accurate and it was very clean. Comfortable bed and pillows. Apartment is centrally located in Kowloon and a couple minute walk to the TST metro station. Easy access to the island. Good value.

Super convenient location.  Very close to public transport, restaurants and shopping centres. Communication was superb for ease of checking in. Quite a small space but that is to be expected in Hong Kong. Thanks for a comfortable stay Hester!

Hester was a very engaging host and answered every one of our questions. Her apartment is cozy and suits the atmosphere of its location. Outside, its bustling with people, in the centre of Tsim Sha Tsui, a quick walk to the station and a convenient area for a bus ride to and from the airport. There are a couple of stairs that you need to walk through, but with all the excitement on the streets its and easy couple of steps. Hester provided us clear instructions and was a very welcoming host.
挺好的
隔音效果太差太差,隔壁房说话走路都听的很清楚,卫生不够好､多灰尘､步行去海港城20分钟左右去维多利亚港30分钟､总之来说就是有点远

Hester gave great, detailed instructions on location and transportation from the airport to the apartment. Her residence is literally 5 minutes from the train station by foot. She's also just a short walk (no more than 15 minutes) from the museums. There are so many great places to eat as well as little shops around, that you never have to really search hard for a place for breakfast or any other quick bite. Hester was very responsive to messages and very helpful. I visited with my 10 year old son and the size of the apartment was good for the two of us. If we ever make it back to Hong Kong I will definitely pick Hester's apartment again.
房间显得很温馨,色彩搭配挺喜欢的,地理位置优越,和图片没有差别,性比价很高,旁边就是金英大药房,很方便

숙소 위치는 너무도 맘에들었습니다. 침사추이 중심부에 위치해있어 도보로 5분 이내면 가능하고, 밤에 생각보다 시끄럽지도않았어요. 다만 2인이 4일을 머무는데 수건이2장뿐이 제공되지 않은점은 불편하고 방이 너무좁아 캐리어 두대 펴놓으니 이동할수있는 공간이 협소했습니다. 청소상태는 그닥 깨끗하지않아서(바닥에 머리카락, 티비선반쪽 먼지들...) 저희는 후기 모두 읽어보고 일회용 슬리퍼를 사갔어요 ! 방에 거울이 하나도없어서 머리말릴때 화장할때는 개인용 거울을 사용하셔야해요..쇼핑하고 캐리어 무거워졌는데 집이3층인데 엘레베이터가 없어요 !! 죽을뻔 ㅠㅠ 짐만 맡기면 되는데 그것도 불가능하다하여 어렵게 캐리어 보관라커를 찾아서 맡겼어요 다른 호스트들은 짐보관은 그냥 해주던데....이점도 좀 불편했던듯.. 그래도 뭐 힘든 여정이었으나 위치가 너무도 좋아 만족하고 잘 머물다 갑니다
Appartement très bien situé, calme, bonne literie. Idéal pour visiter Hong Kong. Communication très facile Avec Hester. Je recommande
Hester’s place is lovely, clean and most importantly, very convenient. High recommend if you value location the most.

It's a really nice place to stay. Just a few minutes walk to MTR Station and/or Bus Station.. it's in the middle of a crowded area but also so quite in the room so you can sleep just right..
The host will really responsive and helpful to guide you within the check in and check out time. The room is just as i imagine from the picture, its clean and everything is work properly. 
I really enjoyed my stay here.. really recommend for a couple traveler.
很不错的,值得推荐

I love the location, best location to stay, nice person and quick response for hester.  Some advice for hester, maybe try to renovate the craked wall because it looks dirty and makes dirt. But overall i love ur studio.

Way too expensive for what it is.
Very very small... very wet and the painting is falling from the wall with lots of traces of moisture. Toilets were broken and left open, in generall, not very clean. not many basics equipments : no glass, nothing to hang on a vest, the shower is indescriptible... lots of noise due to the 3 other rooms just next door, wifi doesnt work so well....
I wont never come again !
Beside that, location is good.
침사추이역 근처에 위치하며 엄청 핫한 거리에 집이 있음. 집을 찾기가 조금 힘들긴한데 위치가 미쳤음. 수건을 하나밖에 안줘서 좀 불편하긴 했으나 잘 쉬다 갑니당
Fantastic location, close to MTR. Comfy apartment. Great trip.

Very convenient location; the apartment is just a few mins of walk to the TsT MTR station with lots of shops & eateries everywhere. You can still find food down the road even at 11pm!

The space is definitely value for money by HK standards - it's comfortable for 2 persons to stay with walking space around. However, there's something to take note on...the WiFi can be rather unstable at night.

The location is good and there’s very little street noise. However, the room wasn’t very clean and during my stay the toilet was broken (cistern lid sitting off on the window sill, flush was broken, and is made a lot of noise all night) which I wasn’t warned about. Sadly, that badly affected my stay.
地點很好,房間偏小,地毯有點髒,花灑沒地方掛洗澡洗得不舒服,隔音蠻差的｡
地理位置好好,就係尖沙咀站.附近都有幾個大型shopping mall (^▽^)
Hesters place is nice and cozy and in a great location. its a little tight but otherwise a nice place to stay
太小了,我在铜锣湾住的酒店环境比这好多了,还没400块,这里装修环境都不怎么样,以为是独立公寓,其实一个小房间,门也好挤,要侧身才能出最外面的门,而且过道堆满东西｡拖箱子走都不好走!

Very convenient place to stay for exploring Tsim Tsa Shui & surrounding areas. Lots of great food close by & close to metro to quickly access other parts of HK. Apartment is very small but fine for 1 or 2 people, especially if you just need somewhere to crash at end of day.... if you need to store baggage nearby before or after, Best Western turned out to be the easiest option for us - 30hkd per bag per day.
非常方便!房间虽小但是很舒适!
Great location and great value for you money!
Hester’s place was extremely cozy and comfortable. Great location and within three minutes walk to the nearest MTR station. Highly recommended.
It's a solid place in a great location, may seem small but it's a lot bigger than the private hostel rooms you can get in Chungking or Mirador mansions at a good price.
Was exactly what the pictures show. This was a cozy room right in the middle of a very busy and lively neighborhood. Great restaurants on the same street. Walking distance to the MTR.
Nice apartment, amazing location and great host! I totally recommend Hester's place for your stay in Hong Kong.
The location is great with many food around but is slightly hard to find if u don’t know hk well.  The place is very clean and comfortable.  The host is nice and responds quickly.

Just as described. Really convenient location, a few minutes to the train station, a lot of good local food, dessert places, and malls. AC was on point since it was super humid and hot in HK during my visit and surprisingly quiet given it is in the middle of the city.

Our stay was just lovely. Having previously stayed in some guest houses in the area for a similar price this was a wonderful upgrade. We had a kitchenette, lighting from outdoors, privacy, and a wonderful location.  My daughter and I stayed for four days and it was perfect for our purposes. Check in was easy. We were just around the corner from the subway station. The bed was comfortable. I would definitely stay here again. Excellent host.
位置极佳,交通便利,适合购物｡
房间位置极好, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都十分方便｡缺点是比较小,但有冰箱和微波炉｡卫生情况可谓完美｡房东人不错｡

Hester is a really great host! She is so responsive! The location is super good and it’s almost at the heart of TST. The room is big enough to have the largest luggage open. Amenities is good enough but personally I prefer bring my own stuff.

Thanks Hester for being such a good host and guide in HK. Even though she didn’t come in person, but her instructions were clear with some tips. Had a good stay, very good location to travel around since TST is basically one of the main street to be. Most importantly, her replies are very prompt, which enable me to get the details i want. Great host!
Great place to stay, awesome location in the center of TST

벌레 없습니다. 5일 숙박 수건 6장 줬습니다.
와이파이 느립니다. 방음이 잘 안됩니다

Hester's place is situated in a really great location in Tsim Sha Tsui. Restaurants, MTR station, convenient stores and shopping malls are within 5 minutes proximity. The unit is not big but it is standard for all units in Hong Kong.
房子非常棒,位置也很方便,周围购物的也很多,Hester也提供了很多有用的信息,非常满意❤❤❤❤❤
洗漱用品自带,别的都好｡wifi好像没有｡｡｡
Great place, nice location. Very accessible to almost everything- mtr, bus stations, shopping centers, restaurants just in front of the place. Comfy bed and linens. Hassle-free communication.
挺好的,位置很不错｡下次来w香港我还会住在这里｡fang jg房间比一般的香港酒店da fum大

Hester’s place is the best for Hong Kong standard. It is located near to TST station about 3 minutes walk. Downstairs there’s a lot of shops just in walking distance.
It was a pleasant stay here in hong kong
Great host! Thank You!
Nice location. Convenient and near to the MRT.
Great spot. Close to public transport and well connected. Self check in is perfect and host is accomodating and responsive. Air con needs some fixing
Nice place near lots of popular areas including public transportation, restaurants, and attractions.
房間環境優美,二人世界之選
Loved the place. The location is great and you have buzzing street right below. The room is amazing too. Spacious room and bathroom by HK standards.

A nice little place in a great location! The street it’s on has so much good food and it’s a super close walk to everything! Hester put a lot of thought into decorating the place to make it feel like home. Note that there’s no elevator but walking two floors up isn’t bad. If you are traveling with a lot of suitcases it might get a bit crammed but it’s workable. It was plenty of space between my fiancé and I. Shower was nice and hot, and the AC really cold. Definitely great value for Hong Kong.
Very cute convenient place, we wanted to stay for longer!

Great little space in TST! Very conveniently located with respect to the metro system, many fantastic tourist sites / restaurants within a stop or two either north or south on the system. Also walking distance from the water/promenade and the ferry which can take you across the island for effectively and quickly.
尖沙咀中心位置｡交通方便｡附近吃的選擇特別多｡不錯的經歷

We enjoyed our stay at Hester's place.  HK is known for its tiny & cramped spaces but Hester's place has enough space that my 1 yr old baby was able to move around. The bathroom has also enough space which I really like.  There are restaurants and hole in the walls nearby. Bus stops and MTR are just a walking distance. Hester is also accomodating to all my queries. I highly recommend her place!
It was great staying at Hesters place.

위치는 정말 좋았고 호스트의 안내도 부담스러울정도로 정확하고 충분했습니다. 덕분에 체크인도
아주 수월하게 했구요. 근데 방에 들어가니 사진과 좀 다르더군요. 우선 들어서자마자 방안에 머리카락이 눈에 띄었습니다. 제가 체크인을 밤 9시쯤 굉장히 늦게 했고 호스트도 그것을 알고 있음에도 불구하고 청소를 한건지 만건지 군데군데 몇가닥의 머리카락을 발견할 수 있었고 사진상으로 매력적으로 보였던 노란색 작은 소파는 얼룩이 너무 크게 있어서 앉을 생각조차 못했습니다. (사진빨 심합니다) 우연히 소파를 볼때마다 더러워서 기분이 안좋더라구요. 호스트는 계속 충분한 정보를 주면서 동시에 체크아웃을 여러번 물었는데 그 이유가 청소를 해야한다고 하는데 그 조그만 방을 그정도 청소할거면서 왜 그리 체크아웃을 10시에 닥달했는지 좀 이해가 안갔어요. 그리고 세면대에 물이 찬물만 나옵니다. 샤워기 물은 다행인지 불편한건지 보일러를 켜고 10분기다리면 그나마 따뜻한 물이 나오는데 세면대를 쓰는 사람은 찬물만 나와서 무지 불편하더군요. 그리고 여자인 제가 사용하기에도 세면대도 작고 바로 위에 수납장이 붙어있어서 제대로 얼굴을 씻을 수가 없었어요 제대로 씻을라치면 수납장에 머리가 부딪쳐서요 그래서 밖이랑 팔꿈치까지 물 줄줄 흘리며 불편하게 세수했네요. 다음엔 돈 더주고 다른 숙소에 머물고 싶습니다.

Hesters place is in a great location.  If you follow the instructions you will have no problems. Jump into the heart of Kowloon at Hesters beautiful apartment. Everything is  on your doorstep.  It's an unbeatable location but nice and quiet.
总体来说还是非常不错的,地理位置超好,装修干净整齐,价钱合理,只是被褥有些潮…
Very convenient location. Compact apartment very close to everything.

A good well located place for a short stay (might be difficult if you have large heavy luggage as difficult to get it up and in). Neighbourhood is full of places to drink bubble tea and sweet treats. Eating places are close by and area has convenience stores at hand. (I would try and get access to an octopus cash/travel card as it makes getting around easier).

- good location 
- the apartments a bit dirty
- good WiFi 
- quick response from host
Very good location, easy access to amenities plus very good shops and restaurants around!

Petit logement calme bien que situé dans une rue animée, à 5 minutes à pied de la station de métro de Tsim Sha Shui (situation idéale) . Equipé avec juste ce qu'il faut pour un court séjour d'une ou deux personnes qui souhaitent découvrir Hong-Kong et ne rentrent que pour dormir. Restos bons et pas chers au pied de l'immeuble . Hester n'oublie rien, toutes les informations utiles à une bonne installation vous seront données à temps (options d'itinéraires depuis l'aéroport, checkin etc.). Nous avons apprécié notre séjour chez Hester et nous recommandons son logement aux couples et aux personnes seules qui souhaitent découvrir la ville.
Nice host. Speedy replies. Very clear check in instructions and great location!

The apartment was very dirty—stained sheets, stained walls, a giant dead cockroach in the hallway. The shower head was broken, the internet didn’t work, and Hester never responded to my messages. A frustrating experience all around :(

Hester's apartment is in the best location of TST... with only 2-3 min from MTR Exit B2.
Eateries, restaurants and convenient stores are all around.
Just a quick note... you need to climb up 5 flights of stairs to the apartment. Due to space constraint, there is only a small space for 2 small luggages or a 1 luggage.
However, it is very confortable for myself and I will stay at her apartment again.
Perfect location and great communication!
Perfect location and easy access to the MTR
lovely house
good experience

Pequeñito como todos los alojamientos en Hong Kong, el espacio está bien distribuido, es cómodo, limpio, fácil de encontrar y muy bien localizado.  Comparado con otro alojamiento similar en la misma zona, está muy bien, y el precio genial!
편리한 위치를 통해 침사추이에서 여러곳을 이동할때 좋았으며 가격대비 시설도 깔끔합니다. 예쁘고 아름다운방과는 조금 거리가 있으니 가성비와 위치를 더 고려하신다면 추천드립니다.

For the price, this apartment is a decent stay in Hong Kong. The location is amazing and is close to many food and public transport options. Be aware there is no lift so you must carry your bags up 4 flights of narrow stairs to get to the apartment.

The shower in our stay left much to be desired. Hot water was a serious issue as it would only last 2-3 minutes before needing 10-15 minutes to heat up again. Also the shower head needs to be held by hand and cannot be hung anywhere. This is not so much of a problem for a single person stay, but for a couple (or more) these are both factors to consider before booking.
Location is excellent in relation to great selections of restaurants around and convenience to public transportation.

Thanks a lot Hester for being a great host. I have a pleasant stay in Hong Kong. There's no lift in the apartment. So, be ready for that especially when u travel with baby stroller. But, Hester has told me before. The studio is in 2nd floor and I'm ok with that since the price is meet my budget. Ha ha ha
非常棒,,位置很好,但要仔细阅读房东的开锁指南啊
nice and helpful host

overall good experience , however due to the partition of the rooms, you can hear the opening/closing of doors from other rooms very clearly. Prepare to carry your luggage up the stairs as there is no lift to the unit.
생각보다...
还行,床很软很舒服楼下吃喝买东西很方便,就是隔音有点不太好!

Hester was a responsive and professional host.  The apartment is exactly as shown and described in the pictures in a pretty active and well located part of Kowloon.  Easy access by foot to get everywhere as well as to Central and the airport. Detailed communication from Hester helped as well.
房间真的十分舒适,大小两人住刚刚好,装修风格也非常温馨,房东姐姐还给准备有大陆的转换插排,可以说是很贴心了,交通也十分便利,楼下就是金英药妆,步行一两百米就有龙城大药房､卓越､Sasa､Nike､the One,楼下还有肥仔,步行到地铁站､海港城都不远｡下次来还会住这里的嘻嘻

When I first arrived with my boyfriend we were a bit nervous of the location as it was definitely more of an old building and it did not have an elevator. I wished there were more comments on the stairs so I could have been more prepared for it. We had 4 suitcases since we were traveling to other places as well, so this was a bit tough for us to lug everything upstairs. The place was definitely small so our 4 suitcases didn’t give us much room to walk around. The pictures were exactly how the place looked. The white bedsheets did have some stains which was a little gross but we managed to get through it. Downstairs has a tattoo shop as well. 

The location was hands down the best part. I think it definitely makes up for the cons that I have mentioned. There are food shops everywhere. You can find a breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert places all on that same block. This area is definitely a busy area so during rush hour is hard to get around by taxi. MTR is only about 5 min walk so it is very convenient. 

Overall, I will definitely recommend this place. Hester was very quick with her responses whenever I had questions.

Hester’s place was exactly as described in the pictures :) The place is located near MRT station so you’d get around easily anywhere. Also, Hester was very quick to respond to our messages and always providing informations as detailed as possible! Would recommend this place for sure.

Hester's apartment is perfectly located for those who are more into going out and exploring than staying in and relaxing. The proximity to transit, shopping, and all kinds of wonderful food made our stay totally worthwhile.

name: Inner City Terrace - 2 rooms 2 beds - 4 ppl.
summary: Our home is located in Darlington, a small niche suburb of Sydney with a relaxed, friendly and safe atmosphere. We are located a 10 min walk to Broadway, Glebe, Newtown, The University, surrounded by fantastic restaurants, cafes, pubs, markets and public transport. It is a 20 min walk to the city centre.
space: Our house is a classic 110 year old renovated inner city terrace with original timber floorboards, fireplaces and high ceilings. We have kept the rustic charm to the front section of the house, with the kitchen and bathrooms being renewed.  Our kitchen is well equipped with a gas stove, appliances and utensils. We also have a pantry of cooking essentials, an assortment of teas and Italian ground coffee.  There are two rooms with this listing in our 110 year old renovated inner city terrace. The room is on the second level and contains a new double bed with advanced comfort and support, double wardrobe with polished original timber floors. The second room is the attic on the third floor and has skylights with views over the suburb and contains a new double bed with advanced comfort and support, and a comfortable chair to relax in the morning sun. There is no door to the attic space however the room is still private.  The attic room may not be suitable for: Really tall people (pitched ro

We are located a 10 min walk to Broadway, Glebe, Newtown, The University, surrounded by fantastic restaurants, cafes, pubs, markets and public transport. It is a 20 min walk to the city centre. Our house is a classic 110 year old renovated inner city terrace with original timber floorboards, fireplaces and high ceilings. We have kept the rustic charm to the front section of the house, with the kitchen and bathrooms being renewed.  Our kitchen is well equipped with a gas stove, appliances and utensils. We also have a pantry of cooking essentials, an assortment of teas and Italian ground coffee.  There are two rooms with this listing in our 110 year old renovated inner city terrace. The room is on the second level and contains a new double bed with advanced comfort and support, double wardrobe with polished original timber floors. The second room is the attic on the third floor
neighborhood_overview: Darlington is a small inner city suburb of Sydney surrounded by many trendy suburbs like Surry Hills, Glebe and Newtown, all with a great mix of shops, cafes, restaurants, bars and people. We are within a 15 min walk to the below; Arts: Seymour Centre and the Carriageworks, performing arts theatres,  Attractions: Chinatown, Darling Harbour, Fish Markets, QVB. Markets: Eveleigh farmers markets, funky Glebe markets and Paddys, Food: @ Glebe, Newtown and Surry Hills. Pubs: Ask for a list.... how much time do you have? Shopping: Broadway, Central Park University: University of Sydney & UTS.  The city is a pleasant 30 min walk or easily accessible by public transport.
notes: There are detailed instructions on how to arrive to our house by various methods once you have booked. We also would consider people looking for long term stays or WHV, please send me an email with the details.
transit: •Darlington is approximately 2 klm's to the centre of the city. •3.8 klm's to Circular Quay and Sydney Harbour. •A 5-10 min walk to Redfern or 15-20 min walk to Central train station. •There are buses to the city 5 min's away at Broadway. •Sydney airport is  9 klm's. •There is off street parking or a parking station at the end of the street. •There are two shopping centres (Broadway & Central park) and another supermarket (Spar Redfern) all within a 10 min walk for any grocery or shopping needs.
access: Please enjoy all areas of the house, relax on the lounge, turn on the TV or radio, enjoy a book or magazine from the bookshelf, prepare a delicious meal in the kitchen, there is also a tranquil garden to relax in out the backyard. * CHECK IN/OUT: We are flexible with guests arrival and departure times. Guests can arrive in the morning to leave luggage, or welcome to leave luggage for the day if they have an afternoon/evening departure.
interaction: We have a good knowledge of restaurants, bars and clubs, tourist attractions and sights to see in Sydney and other parts of Australia. There are maps of Sydney and Australia and guidebooks on the bookshelf. We are happy to assist with information or let you explore on your own.
house_rules: We enjoy sharing our home with you and other Airbnb guests, please be considerate, enjoy the house, treat it with respect and apply some common sense! We are relaxed and easy going, we do not have rules or a curfew, however from our hosting experience we have generated some simple guidelines; •	Please ensure the house is locked for everyone's safety and security when you leave.  •	If you cook or use things in the kitchen place it in the dishwasher, and if you make a mess please clean it up. •	Please be considerate when using the bathroom, and be thoughtful for the next person to use it.  •	Please hang wet towels behind the door or on the rack provided. •	We enjoy cooking and are happy to share what we have in the fridge or pantry, but please do not freeload, for longer stays please be thoughtful by replacing or buying your own products. •	We appreciate that people enjoy their own space, may be tired after a long day or have limited/basic English. This is our home, please be courteous t

host.host_about:
Hey I'm Jason. I enjoy travelling, photography and beer!

We have had a little girl!
Our calender will be closed for a while. If you are a repeat guest send me a message and we might be able to open the calender for you.

I spent many years living in England, Ireland and Italy; and have travelled to Andorra, Austria, Bali, Belgium, Bulgaria, France, Germany, Hungary, Malaysia, Portugal, Romania, Singapore, Spain, Switzerland, Thailand & Vietnam. 

My partner Luana is from Verona, Italy. 

We started hosting in Oct 2015 and enjoy meeting people from around the world and listening to stories about their country and travels.

We have a good knowledge of Sydney (sights, attractions, shopping, beaches, day treks, restaurants, pubs & night clubs) and various places around Australia.

reviews.comments:
My production company booked Jason's home to shoot the second series of our online show, A Shared House and we had an incredible time.

In the months leading up to our booking Jason made himself available to assist us with any questions or queries we had about our time in the house.

Jason was flexible with our schedule and did everything he could to make our stay as perfect and problem free as it could be.
The home is immaculately kept and in great condition.  Close to public transport and near by shops. 

By the end of the two weeks, Jason's home felt like home to our cast and crew. Both Jason and his partner are so welcoming and accomodating - We have now become great friends!!
It was a great time as the host was really kind and helpful. My two boys loved there, they wanted to stay longer but we had to go. Thank you Jason, we hope your always happy. Bye~
house is so so so…lovely and Jason and his wife are friendly!

reviews.comments: I had an awesome stay at this property. The host were very professional and the condo is amazing. The property is accessible to shopping, restaurants and a beautiful beach. I had an awesome experience from beginning to end. Mahalo!!!!!

Staying here at Palms Weilea 905, was a great. We would definitely stay again. The condo is very central to Kihei and its resturants, shopping and night life. The condo itself was very comfortable for relaxing and cooking. The management company was very easy to get a hold of if we had any questions and exceptional with thier responses.

Great location in the building, easy from parking lot to access, clean and well quipped kitchen.
We were able to use all beach chairs, umbrella and boards.
Thank you so much! we will recommend all our friends.
AMAZING! This condo was beautiful, clean, and in a prime location.  It is located right next to a main highway so getting anywhere on the island is a breeze.
This is a fantastic condo.  It is just as beautiful as described.  It has everything you need for a great vacation in the best part of  Maui.  Can’t wait to go back.

A beautify property, newly remodeled, well equiped kitchen for those who like to cook.  Beautiful master suite with large walk in shower, new washer/dryer, lanai off the living room and master bedroom, with barbeque grill, and bananna tree in the back year.  Very clean and very well maintained.  Highly recommend.
Great place to stay for the week

The Palms at Wailea is a great place to stay if you are looking to avoid expensive hotels.  Wailea is the best part of Maui to stay in.  It feels the most exclusive and least touristy and is fairly central to everything.  Unit 905 was spotless upon our arrival and very well equipped for our family of 4.  We enjoyed the amenities that were provided, and the beds were comfortable.  The property is very well maintained and the pool is fantastic.  You are less than a 4-5 minute drive to the beach.  If you didn't have chairs or coolers to carry it would be an easy walk.  We would definitely stay here again.

This condo is very conveniently located just a short drive to shops (Shops at Wailea), groceries (Safeway), several beaches and many tourist attractions (snorkeling, Haleakala Crater).  

The condo was very nicely appointed and appeared as advertised on AirBnB. Booking and dealing with the contract was very easy and check in was a breeze with us picking our own access code in advance as we arrived late in the evening.  We had a message from PMI checking in with us the first day to ensure everything was okay and we were all settled in.   I sent one message while I was there and got a very quick response.

The condo is VERY spacious and nicely decorated.  We really loved this unit because it felt very private.  It is located away from the main entrance and we very rarely saw or heard other people in the units – even when we were sitting out on the patio. This unit is on the ground floor and I was initially worried about noise from above, but we never heard a peep the entire week.  The patio was very peaceful.

The beds were very comfortable, the linens were high quality, and the furnishings were very nice.  There were extra pillows and blankets available. Having the air conditioning was definitely a plus as some of our days were very hot and humid.  It made sleeping very comfortable!  Ceiling fans also helped a lot.

There are some good basics in the condo to get you started (hotel sized shampoo, conditioner, soap – hair dryer – laundry detergent).  Having some basics in the pantry and fridge was very helpful (seasonings, foil, plastic wrap, paper towel, etc.).

You really don’t want for anything in this unit. I would highly recommend it to anyone and wouldn't hesitate to book it again.
x
Great condo, excellent communication!
This condo was very comfortable and clean!! I would definitely stay here again!!!
Condo was beautiful and my family was very pleased. Open floor plan was nice and had everything we could need in condo for beach days.

Great Location with short drives to access all of south Maui's best beaches(and what awesome beaches they are!). Great food around the location as well, yelp it ;). The place was clean, stylish and looks even better in person. I wouldn't hesitate to book this place again, loved it!

Wonderful vacation space. Fully equipped kitchen, beach items, and a full sized new washer and dryer. This was our first vacationing as a family through air bnb. This place exceeded our expectations. We were happy to have avoided the crowded hotels.
Great place

Nice clean unit in a great area of Maui.  There are a lot of really nice beaches within a short drive.  It was great to have boogie boards and beach chairs provided with the condo.  Also, having a grill was perfect for BBQ’s.

The only small nit was that there was just one small bar of soap and shampoo provided with each bathroom.  Not that big of a deal if you come prepared.

name: Kowloon Mongkok 1812 Twin Room A, near station
summary: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day.
space: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day. Please feel free to ask for if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go. Public Transportation  Mongkok railway station, bus stops are nearby, you can go anywhere easily. Getting here from Airport:  Airport Bus (recommended): Take A21 bus, get off at Nathan Road, our place is opposite to the bus stop. Railway: take airport express to Tsing Yi Station, then take Hong Kong Line to Lai King Station, then take Central line to Mongkok Station. The nearest exit is E1 Exit. *photos are references, room decoration will be a bit different, but generally similar. And all the facilities are the same.
