neighborhood_overview: Mong Kok is one of Hong Kong's liveliest districts and includes popular markets, shopping streets, stalls and malls. The neon-bathed historic streets that wind through one of the densest parts of the world are worth visiting.  The neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kong’s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware. ･Sai Yeung Choi Street sells electronics, cosmetics and clothes. ･Shantung Street and Dundas Street are where you can pick up the latest Japanese and Western fashion and accessories. ･Langham Place is one of the many malls where you can do your Mong Kok shopping in air-conditioned comfort.
transit: The nearest railway station is Mongkok station (3 mins walk). And there are lots of bus routes running near my place. (Airport bus to Airport is just downstairs of my place). You can go anywhere in Hong Kong easily.
interaction: Please feel free to ask if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go.
house_rules: Please keep quiet after 11pm. Thanks

host.host_about:
I am from Hong Kong, I love travelling to explore something new. I am a web-editor of a women website in HK, i also have a personal blog, and i love to share my travel experience with my readers and friends.

as a host, i have private rooms to rent (where in Mongkok), and i am familiar with food & beverage & beauty products, please feel free to contact me for suggestions on dining and shopping. hope that i can help u to enjoy more during ur stay in Hong Kong. =)

reviews.comments: athena is a good, sweet and very helpful host. I had a change of plan of 4 times, but she was all patience with me and even help me to get a additional room at the very last min, given me a list of eatery and shopping guide, and even help me book a place for resturant. despite she wasnt ard when i checked in, she even left a gift. The room is as what shown in the picture. Location was ard a 5min walk to MRT and very convience with lots of eatery right behind. The staff there is also helpful and much more polite than those hkg hotel that i had stayed previously. Must say i had a very good stay at athena place. my 1st choice for my next hkg trip.

Our experience overall was great. the host was so kind, generous and hospitable. We love our room so much.. very clean and cozy, and most importantly very affordable.Everything was there: free personal care supplies, hot and cold shower, etc. Moreover, the place is very strategic; its along the business district and near MTR stations. I love to go back there very very soon. So those who planned to go to hongkong please try this place and I am pretty sure you wont regret it.

Direction to our room was clear. Mr. Keith is very helpful. Answer all of our calls even at wee hours. Never had a problem. Linens are crisp and clean. I asked for another pillow and he gave me for no extra charge. The room was small though but clean. I would recommend this place for back packers.

Athena was very helpful as she provided us various information that makes our trip to HongKong wonderful. Although the room is quite small, it is very clean and it is located near the MTR so its very convient. Overall, it is really a nice place to stay at if you are looking for a budget place to stay.

Our experience was good as Mr Yiu and Ms Luk were excellent in facilitating our check in and answered all our queries during our stay. They even provided us with a local SIM card and ended our trip with a sure win lucky draw prize!
The room was small but cosy and clean. Shampoo, shower gel and toothbrush with toothpaste are provided. Towels are available on request. 
The location is right in the middle of Nathan Road. You can choose to walk to either Mongkok and Ya Mau Tei MTR and both are just a 5-7 mins walk away.
Overall, a good convenient place to stay for short trips.

We knew our 3 nights stay got off to good start with warm welcome from Mr Yiu :) Very near to Mong Kok MRT station which is made it very convenient for us to explore Hong Kong. Room fitted the description listings and daily room service in tidying up our room was definitely a plus point. Ms Lok and Mr Yiu also are very helpful in accommodating our request for our early check out. Will recommend this place to our friends and we will be back to stay at this place again if we visit Hong Kong again.

Yes! The room did look like from the pictures- the beds came in single twin beds, and even the comforter sets, the bedsheets were exactly like in the picture too! (even the curtains). 

I've to commend the room's cleanliness. One of the first few things that I noticed about the room when I stepped in was its clean floor- spick and span, I did not spot clumps of hair or the floor being covered in dust- that was one of the strengths of the room. 

Secondly, the toilet's floor was clean and there was no hair lying about the floor, or murky stains spotted about the toilet (not that I dared inspect every corner dilligently- but I stepped into the toilet barefooted, assured that it was clean)

They only provide basic body foam and shampoo, which are put into wall dispensers. I found the body soap to suffice but the shampoo was abit drying and so you might want to bring your own shampoo perhaps. 

Cleanliness-wise, I give the sleeping area room + the toilets a 3.5 / 5 stars as I did not spot any dirt that irked me, the floors were clean enough to walk barefoot and they looked without dust. 
Perhaps, the only area which I did not walk barefoot much on was the doorway area as we were wearing shoes in and walking on it, during our first day. 

Space-wise, it may be small, but mangeable for 2 people. I would say that it is just nice- roomy for 1 pax but just nice- slightly tight (depending on how spacey a room you are used to) for 2 people. Hong Kong is known for small room sizes though, so I thought this small room space is common.
The toilet is quite small though, and the places to hang your clothes/towels might not be as luxurious as hotels but we managed alright ultimately. There's not much space to move in the toilet. But its cleanliness and the reasonable price topped the space constraints! Bedroom wise , space is alright for 2 people.

Perhaps, the room window was the only difficult thing managing as it was abit hard closing it and some slight dust.

Towels and linen smelt fresh! Bedsheets felt clean!
You need to request for towels. 
Host was very obliging, VERY, in answering all my many questions! I emailed her TONS. 
Keith & Joey were on duty when we were there and both are helpful, obliging people. Joey was very friendly and helped us to check which Karaoke places were cheap and the night bus to the airport! Their guesthouse is quite systematic I feel, with either Keith or Joey(lu xiao jie) on duty at different times of the day and they give you the number to call them with a phone hung outside the reception door. 
Keith answered any questions we had too! 
They even provided us a SIM card with internet!
THANK YOU Athena, Keith&Joey! 
For this price&cleanliness, it's worth.

3박4일 일정 중 첫날을 제외한 이틀을 머물렀으며,
첫날 묵었던 숙소와 비교하자면
창문이 있어 답답하지 않았고,
전체적으로 깔끔하고 깨끗했음. 그리고 첫날 숙소에 없던 헤어드라이기, 콘센트변환기 등이 잘 구비되어있음.
난방, 에어컨도 양호함.

以香港寸土寸金來說這間價錢小而美
雖然不像五星旅館雄偉壯觀
但是對於想要深入了解香港的自由行旅客
想把錢花在香港美食和文化而非交通的話
這間旅館是不錯的選擇!
離旺角地鐵站非常近周遭生活機能很完美

房東非常熱心
有有疑問在詢問都可以迅速地得到解答
房東在各方面的協助都非常細心仔細
這次因為遇到中秋連續假期所以問了一些當地特別活動消息
房間也快速的把相關資料給我們參考
就連在一開始check in的時候還借我們一本很有內容､非廣告類別､台灣出版的香港旅遊書說可以從裡面找到更多訊息

房間內乾淨且安靜
清潔人員也很和善
就算到了需要提早check out也不需要擔心不方便找房東

真的非常推薦!
房间比较小,打开箱子就比较麻烦了,不过基本设施都挺齐全的,挺干净的｡
很適合背包客自助旅行,地理位置很好,房東人也很好｡

Nice atomosphere, good location.
Communication has something bad..
But I really enjoyed at here.

Thank-you very much for receptionist and all staffs:)

Athena is very nice. She will give you all informations u need.
The place is very easy to find and very close to everything.
Rooms are very clear and comfortable. Just need hear plugs if ur neighbors talk to much.
I definitely recommend this place.
地点非常方便,姐姐人也特别nice,我们不懂的地方,都很有耐心帮我们解决｡房间非常好,东西非常全,又很干净,下次来还会住在这里｡
每次来香港必须要住的地方~性价比超高~

nice staff
close shopping area

우선 예상했던 대로 숙소는 매우 비좁았습니다 하지만 그 점 빼고는 그외 불편한 점이
하나도 없었습니다 꽤 청결한 편이었고 불편사항이 생겼을때 호스트를 호출하면 바로 와서 해결해주었습니다 위치는 mtr역과 도보7분정도 거리였고 근처 번화가에 위치해 있어 편리했습니다
房间干净,地理位置很好,买了很多东西随时可以放回去,附近环境也很安全!重点是老板人也很好
small but has everything that you need. stratehic location. highly recommended
This guest house offered a clean & comfortable room with window, cold a/c & no bugs. The 10sqft toilet requires getting used to but I expected something very basic in HK. Stay was good.

very friendly host and super awesome location. minutes walk to Mong Kok station and to some of the most happening places around. room is very clean as well despite a bit small, but it is definitely no problem for a short holiday stay. 

highly recommended and will definitely come back again

Clean place and has all the essentials for backpackers. Wifi is fast. Lots of restaurants nearby with the Ladies Market being 300 meters away on the other side of Nathan Road. Lots of money exchange stalls and Mongkok MTR Station exits are quite close. Make sure to ask Athena which exit you should take for closer access to the building. Very close to the A21 (Airport Bus) Bus Stop. And its close to Langham Place!
住的地方交通很方便,离旺角地铁站很近,但是房间确实挺小的,不过对于香港来说也可以理解｡比较不能接受的是房间的灯盖会发出劈劈啪啪的声音,第一天晚上下雨水滴滴在窗外空调外机上声音太大了吵得一晚上没睡好,隔音效果也很差,早上隔壁进出门关门声特别大｡总的来说,前台陆先生和姚小姐人都很好很热心,但是客观居住体验不是很好｡
就在旺角地铁站E1出口附近,非常方便,买东西下楼转一圈就买齐了｡房间麻雀虽小五脏俱全,而且很干净｡前台的陆小姐也非常热心亲切｡

Great place for the price! Was easy to find and you are surrounded by lots of places to eat and shop! The place was very clean and they even give u fresh towels every day! We even arrived early and they let us check in right away!
If you want to check out Mongkok, this is the place to be. Everything is close right and centered.

Die Unterkunft liegt sehr günstig in der Nähe der U-Bahn. Das Zimmer ist klein aber für ein paar Tage ausreichend. Täglich wurde sauber gemacht und die Handtücher gewechselt. Der Check-In war unkompliziert. Bei meinem Eintreffen war die Rezeption nicht besetzt. Neben der Tür ist aber ein Telefon und ein Zettel mit einer Kontaktnummer. Innerhalb von ca. 5 Minuten ist ein Mitarbeiter gekommen und ich konnte einchecken. Beim Einchecken wurde nach einer Kaution von 20€ gefragt. Das hatte ich in der Beschreibung nicht gelesen und sollte berücksichtigt werden. Da ich vor 9:30 wieder abreiste brauchte ich die Kaution nicht hinterlegen, da erst ab dieser Uhrzeit ein Mitarbeiter vor Ort gewesen wäre. Bei offenem Fenster schlafen ist aufgrund der Straßengeräuche nicht möglich dank Klimaanlage aber auch kein Problem. Für die Lage ist der Geräuschpegel auch ziemlich erträglich. Ich habe einen relative leichten Schlaf und keine großen Probleme. Wenn man keinen großen Ansprüche stellt kann ich die Unterkunft empfehlen und würde sie bei meinem nächsten Besuch wieder in Betracht ziehen.

숙소가 매우 매우 비좁았어요
캐리어를 펼칠공간도 마땅치않음
그거빼곤 그럭저럭 괜찮아요
交通很方便,也很安全,房东很热情!值得选择

The room is in a guest house which is not clear from the material on line. It is also very small and clinical. Having said that it was spotlessly clean and everything was provided as described and needed. It is also very well located for buses to the airport , the MTR and local shops and restaurants

Very good hospitality, I get to ask all kind of questions and they still try their best to answer them. They even help us arrange for laundry, save us some time to look for one. The room is clean and all basic amenity is there. Location is good. Will definitely stay there again.

Thank you for helping us throughout our stay in HK, the place is clean but comfy and quiet. Ms. Athena and Mr. Yiu were hospitable, answered all our queries and gave us every details for our journey especially for helping us getting our tix for Disneyland even in a short time notice. Will definitely go back to your place once we have holidays again in Hong Kong.
Small place but clean and accessible to all public transportation.

Our stay with Man Ching Athena’s place was totally awesome and the location is superb.
The host is very responsive. Super comfortable and homely feel in this small room. 
I would definitely recommend this place for other travelers. Thanks.
设施非常齐全,非常干净,每天会有人来专门打扫｡位置也很好,在旺角商区,出门就有地铁和大商场｡下回再来香港还住这里!
就在彌敦道隔壁的新興大廈上邊24樓,交通便利,左右均有地鐵站｡前臺服務人員熱心,在香港玩的比較開心｡
位置很棒,搭地鐵很便利｡房間也很乾淨,如果可以有個小折桌可以放食物或是雜物就更棒了!!房東人也很好^^
房东人超级热情,而且态度特别好｡住的房屋也是干净和整洁｡下次还会继续住这里｡nice
服务态度真的很好,我们上午8点到的,东西放在过道就出去了,前台上班了之后直接把东西放进了房间,晚上10点过回去,还有人送房卡来,还一一跟我们说清楚房间里的设施,态度很好,房间很干净,白天还会收拾房间,推荐
clean and convenient ☺️

Unser Aufenthalt war super! Das Zimmer ist zwar sehr klein, aber das ist in ganz Hong Kong der Fall, und es war gar kein Problem seine Koffer unter dem Bett zu verstauen (es gibt keinen Schrank, darüber  sollte man sich bewusst sein). Wir hatten jeden Tag neue Handtücher und auch mehrmals die Woche neue Bettwäsche, was mich sehr positiv überrascht hat. Der check- In und check-out waren problemlos, und auch eine Verlängerung des Aufenthalts war super unkompliziert. Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Die Lage war meines Erachtens perfekt. Mong Kok ist der etwas chinesischere Teil Hong Kongs, man kann Street food entdecken, shoppen gehen, und es gibt vielerlei Restaurants. Jedes Wochenende kommen die Hong Konter auf die Straße und singen, es gibt auf jeden Fall viel zu entdecken!  Die Metro war sehr nah, und man ist in windeseile in Central oder TST.  Besonders entzückend ist, dass ums Eck ein Fruchtstand ist, wo wir jeden morgen frische Fruchtshakes getrunken haben. Ich würde diese Unterkunft jedem empfehlen, der sein Geld lieber für andere Dinge ausgeben möchte, das locale Hong Konger Leben kennen lernen will, und würde auf jeden Fall wieder die Unterkunft von Man Ching Athena wählen!
不错,物业保安24小时有人

ﾏﾈｰｼﾞｬｰのﾕｳさんは､気さくで
明るく､ﾊｷﾊｷしていて英語も広東語も話せない私をたすけてくれました｡
お部屋も綺麗で､とても静かでした｡
また利用したいです｡

The place is clean and tidy but the only thing is the bad odor the first day we checked in. We leave the window open and the exhaust fan on for awhile and the smell slowly gone. Overall, the room is good enough for two people and happy with the stay. The location is very convenient as 6 mins walk to the Mongkok station and around the area has various restaurant and shopping malls. The location is very close to the Ladies market too. 

I am happy with the stay at the guesthouse. Definitely will come back next time when visit Hong Kong again.
房东人非常好 耐心地给我带路 介绍房间用具设施 房间也很干净 一应俱全 只是两个人住稍稍有些小 其他都很好 离朗豪坊也非常近 出行方便
在寸土寸金的香港,这样的房源算可以的了
性价比比较高,地理位置也很好,房东人也很好

日本人の皆様にもｵｽｽﾒです｡
<立地>
旺角駅より本当にすぐです｡大通り沿いなので分かりやすいですが､入り口に迷った時すぐにﾒｯｾｰｼﾞで対応して頂きました｡繁華街なので､うるさいかと思いきや24階なのでほぼ影響なく｡私の宿泊時は､他宿泊客の出入りの音等も気になりませんでした｡ｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰもすぐに来ます｡
周りはｺﾝﾋﾞﾆ､ｽｰﾊﾟｰ､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝの山(笑)絶対に不便は無いです｡
<清潔さ>
香港に慣れて無い方は建物に入った瞬間｢え｡｡｣となるかも知れませんが､施設内は清潔に内装されています｡おそらく戸惑うのはﾄｲﾚのすぐ前でｼｬﾜｰを浴びる事かと思います｡この部分気になる方はｵｽｽﾒ出来ません｡
<設備>
ｸｰﾗｰ効きます｡ｼｬﾜｰのお湯もちゃんと熱いです｡ﾃﾚﾋﾞ､ｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰ､ﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｿｰﾌﾟ､ﾄｲﾚｯﾄﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰ､電子ｹﾄﾙ､ｺｯﾌﾟ2個､ｺﾝｾﾝﾄ用ｿｹｯﾄ2個､歯ﾌﾞﾗｼ､ﾊﾝｶﾞｰ完備です｡寝るだけの私には十分でした｡
<ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝｶｳﾝﾀｰ>
各言語の注意書き､説明書が有ります｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ時に200香港ﾄﾞﾙをﾛﾋﾞｰに預ける必要が有りますので現金用意して下さい｡あとは凄く丁寧に説明､対応して下さいます｡
日本語話せる方もいらっしゃるので､英語､中国語等出来ない場合はその旨先に伝えておく方が良いと思います｡
<気になる部分>
歯ﾌﾞﾗｼの質があまり良くない｡繊維?が抜けて歯に挟まります(笑)
自前を用意するか､近くで購入されても良いかも知れません｡
_/_/お2人の場合､部屋にもよると思いますが､ｽｰﾂｹｰｽ全開で荷物整理する程のｽﾍﾟｰｽは無いかも知れません｡私はﾎﾞｽﾄﾝﾊﾞｯｸ1個だけだったので何も不便無かったです_/_/部屋によってはｸｰﾗｰの風が直に当たるので風邪注意!_/_/網戸は無いので､窓開けっぱなしはｵｽｽﾒ出来ません｡ｶｰﾃﾝはちゃんと遮光します｡_/_/ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄが早めです｡朝9:30まで｡
*荷物はﾛﾋﾞｰで預かってくれますので､ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ後も手荷物で香港観光可能です!

_/_/以上､簡単ですが日本人旅行客にもｵｽｽﾒ出来ますので是非ご利用されたら良いかと思います!
整體而言還算不錯
房间干净,周边各种设施很全也很繁华,地点非常好找,楼下保安负责,酒店工作人员热心周到,满意!
房源真的很好呀 刚开始做好了会很小的准备 结果比想象中大很多 也没那么挤 反正很推荐 在旺角 位置也很好找~ 下次去香港还会入住 真滴很方便
Perfect place to stay for a short trip. The staff was very helpful and very accommodating. The room was clean and exactly what we needed. They spoke very good English. I recommend this place for sure
房间很干净 离地铁口也不远 房东很热情

They were very kind and  always responded quickly. They tried to do their best to let us stay one more day when our flight was canceled due to the typhoon. Although the building looked old but the room was clean enough. Easy to access from the Mong Kok MTR station. There are a number of food stores and a big mall. Convenient for tourists!
Friendly and response quickly., They were really nice to us and tried to do their best to
挺好的,性价比高
The location is pretty near MTR. Place is easy to locate. Room has huge windows which brings in lots of sunlight. The room is clean.
房间很好,位置很好,离朗豪坊很近,老板娘人也很有耐心,体验不错~
地理位置非常好,房间也比我想的大一点,房东特别热情,很喜欢香港了
房东回复很及时,还会根据行程给建议,虽然房间真的挺小的,但很干净整洁,晚上睡觉一点也不吵,交通很便利,附近购物和吃都很方便,比起尖沙咀那边体验感好太多了,下次去还会订这家｡
人很好,价格实惠,交通便利
位置离旺角地铁站很近,房间也有窗户,就是卫生间太小,洗完澡整个卫生间湿漉漉,不过估计香港都这样｡性价比还是ok的｡
总体来说很舒适,下次来还会选择入住｡需要提醒一下的是,如果是长发,洗澡需要节水,不然烧一次可能不太够｡
位置特别好  接待员也很热情

Cleanliness is exceptional. They clean the room daily every 2pm. Our unit is small than expected but it is very comfortable. Location is great as it is nearby the airport bus stop (drop off to Mongkok and going back to airport). I would recommend
Great location and convenience, close to bus, train, shops and  restaurants.  Host was very nice and helpful.
房間基本符合預期
Great location! Smaller than I expected (~7ft x 7ft plus a small bathroom) but I had a great time in Hong Kong. Very clean, they replaced towels and sheets every day.
服务太周到了,我们一到就把各项注意的事情都说了一遍,特别细心周到的服务!我觉得地理位置也特别不错,希望大家都可以去选择他们家!
位置易找,出行很方便,地铁和巴士都很近｡房东热情好客,会在入住时贴心介绍好房间的使用设施,并且房间会有员工定时清洁,总之好正｡

Its not a huge apartment, like all HK apartments. Its pretty clean. Very convenient to the Mongkok area. 5mins walk from the MTR. Its my second time staying and I will probably stay again if I'm going HK again.

name: Beyoğlunda Şirin Kullanışlı Stüdyo2
space: Beyoğlun'a 2 dk mesafede, Merkezi lokasyonda, şirin, son derece kullanışlı, her ihtiyacınızı karşılayacak, müthiş bir tarihi stüdyo, (1+0 - 10m2). Bina önden 4 katlı,  arkadan 5 katlı'dır. Stüdyo 2, girişin alt katında, arka tarafın zemin hizasındadır, (Stüdyo, girişin alt katındadır). Minimal kullanım alanı fakat, mutfak ve her türlü mutfak gereci, bir banyo, bir oturma grubu ile  ihtiyacınız olan her şey. Size kalan rezervasyon yapmak ve neredeyse bedava konaklamanın keyfini çıkarmak...
description: Beyoğlun'a 2 dk mesafede, Merkezi lokasyonda, şirin, son derece kullanışlı, her ihtiyacınızı karşılayacak, müthiş bir tarihi stüdyo, (1+0 - 10m2). Bina önden 4 katlı,  arkadan 5 katlı'dır. Stüdyo 2, girişin alt katında, arka tarafın zemin hizasındadır, (Stüdyo, girişin alt katındadır). Minimal kullanım alanı fakat, mutfak ve her türlü mutfak gereci, bir banyo, bir oturma grubu ile  ihtiyacınız olan her şey. Size kalan rezervasyon yapmak ve neredeyse bedava konaklamanın keyfini çıkarmak...

host.host_about:
The spirit of Christmas should not be just for one day but for the whole year! 
Wishing you love, joy and peace the whole year round. 
Merry Christmas and Happy New Years!

İlknur & Bülent

reviews.comments: Ilknur was a great host. We were the first to stay in this room, and so she invited any feedback about it. We had trouble with internet at first, and right away Ilknur adjusted and made sure we had a strong signal. We then had a bit of trouble with the refridgerator in the room, and Ilknur arranged for us to switch rooms. All very minor issues and the host responded right away and very generously took care of us to make sure we had everything we needed. It is a great location, just a short walk from Istiklal, and you have cafes and bakery across the street. It is clean and comfortable. I highly recommend!

What a fantastic find!  The studio is a cozy basement apartment with new furnishings and housewares. We had everything we needed for our 4 day stay. The location was fantastic! It is right down the street from a huge shopping and cafe district with tons of nightlife, but the studio is located just far enough not to pick up any of the noise or chaos.  Our first day (a Sunday) the was a lovely neighborhood market with tons of produce. There is a bakery and grocery store right across the street.  Ilknur was a wonderful hostess! She left us kitchen essentials, even helped us find a scale so we could weigh our baggage for the flight, and was extremely friendly and willing to help us out with anything we needed!  The previous person mentioned problems with the Internet and fridge, but these were resolved by the time we arrived. This is one of the best deals in Istanbul!

I stayed in Ilknur's apartment building in late June/early July, and I would highly recommend staying here!  First, the location - this building is located in a non-touristy neighborhood but is only about a three minute walk to Istiklal Cad, a great pedestrian shopping district with all sorts of restaurants (both delicious Turkish food and more international options).  The walk to Istiklal is a bit steep, but it is so convenient to the apartment.  I was travelling alone and felt safe in this neighborhood (though I didn't go out late at night).  From Istiklal, you can easily take the Tunel and then the tramvay to get to the big tourist sites in Sultanahmet.  
When I arrived, Ilknur upgraded me to another room on the first floor, so I cannot comment on studyo 7 specifically.  However, all the rooms look pretty similar - the building has been recently renovated, so all of the furniture, kitchen, bathroom, etc. is brand new, and everything was extremely clean.  The room was exactly what I wanted when on a trip - small (a studio apartment with combined bed, sitting, and kitchen area), affordable, and everything worked and was clean and comfortable.  The bathroom worked well, and the shower was substantially larger than what you normally find in a Turkish hotel!  The kitchen was stocked with basic cookware and dishes.  On Sunday there was a huge street market around the corner from the apartment, where you can buy delicious produce for very inexpensive prices.  The wireless internet worked well.  There is no air conditioning in the apartment, but Ilknur provided a fan for me when I asked for it, and I was very comfortable with the fan.
Ilknur was very nice and gave good advice about the area.  She really wants her guests to be comfortable and takes their suggestions into account.  I really enjoyed my stay in this apartment and would definitely recommend it to anyone I know travelling to Istanbul!

(transaltion in english below)

Bonjour,

J'ai loué le studio pour 4 jours avec ma copine. Et finalement, nous avons décidé de rester 4 jours supplémentaires : Istanbul est une ville incroyable et nous avions tout le confort possible dans l'appartement loué par Ilknur.
Tous les meubles, la décoration sont quasi-neufs (les ustensiles de cuisine, le lit, la douche). Les murs ont été repeint récemment et le ventilateur a été très apprécié en plein mois de juillet !

Quand nous sommes arrivés dans l'appartement, du café, du thé, et de l'eau en bouteille nous attendais dans les placards, du savon 
dans la salle de bain. De plus, Ilknur nous a donné quelques conseils qui nous ont permis de profiter à 100% d'Istanbul.

C'était un peu comme si on était dans un hôtel, calme, amical situé dans un quartier aussi sympathique que populaire.

Merci Ilknur,
___________________________________________________
Hello,

I booked the studio for 4 days with my girlfriend. And finally we decided to stay 4 days more because Istanbul is an incredible city for sure, but also because we were really confortable in Ilknur's flat.
All the furniture are very recent (the bed, the shower, kitchenwares). Everything was very clean.

When we arrived in the flat, some coffee, tea, water were at our disposal in the cupboards, soap in the bathroom also and Ilknur welcomes us very well by giving us some tips to enjoy our trip in istanbul at 100%.

It sounded a little bit as we were in a friendly and quiet hostel in a popular neighbourhood.

Thank you Ilknur,

The apartment we stayed was small, but sufficient, very well equipped (especially the kitchen) and very clean. The apartment is in a quiet street not far away from Istiklal and many other place that are off the beaten track the regular tourist would take - as a photographer I really enjoyed wandering the streets of Tarlabasi which is not far away. lknur is a very nice and welcoming host, helpful and provides good tips. We had a great stay and we recommend Ilknur as host in istanbul. Thank you very much.

It's the perfect location if you want to visit Istanbul!
You can reach Istanbul main Street in 5 minutes walking, the bus to the airport in within a 10-minute walk.
The apartment is perfect if you travel alone, but it can be a good solution also for a couple. No noise in the area, so you can sleeo very well.
The price for the apartment is very good, and finally is easy and quick to communicate with Ilknur.
I recommend this apartment, absolutely

Stay in Ilknur studio was great. The studio was small but pretty confortable for two people, the bathroom was also good and spacious. The comunication with Ilknur was easy and she provided many informations about Stanbul. The is close to main shopping street. 
I recomend this place!

Ilknur is a great host, really helpfull and giving some good advice about restaurants and things to do in the district. 
we had to change the room, but that wasn't a probleme for us. 
I wrmly recommend Ilknur as host in istanbul.
Thank you.

Ilknur was a caring host, available to answer any questions. We also had the chance to have friends over, no troubles. The room was clean, well equipped and in one of my favourite areas in the city. We found the communication and description to be totally accurate. I would definitely go again!

Nice flat very well located.
The communication was really easy and everything was perfect.

Ilknur is a great host and really goes out of her way for her guests.  The apartment is also a great price in a great location, very close to the prime nightlife area and not far from touristic sights like Hagia Sophia, Galata Bridge, etc.  Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting!

Ilknur was such an amazingly warm and generous host. On arrival, she sat down with us for 10 minutes to explain a little bit about the area, and give us a run down on what was near by. We got some great restaurant recommendations from her! The studio was small but clean, and in a good location in trendy Beyoglu. The apartment block is a 5 min walk to Isitklal Avenue with its shopping, restaurants and bars. You can even walk to Sultanahmet if you're feeling energetic, there's plenty to see along the way. All in all, our stay here helped make our first trip to Istanbul a great one. Would definitely stay here again!

Hi there ! I spent three wonderful days at turkey and part of the reason why I call it wonderful is due to ilknur ! She's a great person , very warm and wonderful host and more importantly has a really cute service apartment. The area is perfect too ( 5 min walk to one of the busiest streets of Istanbul and what fun that street is . Ilknur gave me some really good recommendations too .The room is spacious / clean / new / well equipped so ... No complaint any sort . I was traveling alone but didnt have any issue being safe ! I like how prompt she is with her email right from start to the day I left ! Next time I go to turkey I know where I'm going ! Thanks ilknur .

Ilknur was very friendly and flexible,waited for me 2 hours, gave me good tips to eat cheap and where to go.
The place was cozy, i had all, what i needed.
I would go there again!

Ilknur is a great host and we had a good time at her place! It s central if you want to stay close to Beyoglu and Taksim. 
I would recommend her place for sure!

The appartment is small but everything you need is there. Toilet and shower are clean and good. The bed sleeps well. There is some noise from the streets, but who cares if you are tired from a long day! The apartment is 3 minute walk from Istiklal and easy to find. Good host, thinks with you.
Minor point: no airco,so might be warm in summer.

My boyfriend and I spent a really great week in Istanbul and in the apartment. It is quite small but has everything you need: kitchen, utensils to cook, bathroom, bed, table, and is very well located (close to one of the busiest street of Istanbul). We managed to see a lot just by walking from there. Illknur was nice and helpful: she gave us some advices for good places to eat and to visit. I recommend this place.

We had a beautiful time in Istanbul and it was a pleasure to stay in Ilknur and Bulent 's appartment. It's nice, clean and very cosy!
IIknur can give you a lots of  precious tips and she's very helpful.
Very good idea to stay there to visit Istambul.

I stayed 5 nights at this lovely place. It's located near taksim square and in a few minutes walk you will be in the centre of Istanbul. It's a cozy place, but when Ilknur has space you get a bigger room. My and my friend stayed the first nights in a bigger room and the last three nights in a smaller room. Ilknur is very helpfull and had lots of ideas to do. We didn't met Ilknur but we contacted with the Phone from te lady from the house. The lady is also very nice!!

I'll go back when I visit Istanbul again.

We stayed six nights in Istanbul in this wonderful studio. We were very happy to find it as expected: small but very cosy. We were quite surprised that the pictures show everything as it is, clean, nice and practical. We had a room in the third floor and we didn't hear lot of other renters. The noises from the street near by were quite loud while the windows were open - but that shouldn't be a surprise since it is Istanbul and not some countryside-place. 
The location of the appartments is awesome, in less than five minutres you're in downtown Istanbul. We had a very pleasant stay!

I didn't get the pleasure of meeting İlknur, but I was able to speak with her on the phone upon arrival and she was very sweet in getting us settled in and making sure everything was okay. The house lady who also lives in the apartment building met us at our exact meeting time and showed us up to our apartment. It is a very nice, small, and quaint studio equipped with a kitchen and bathroom like shown in the pictures. The apartment was very close to the main street, Istiklal Caddesi, which was always very lively and full of life during the night. However, we found it to be quite far to walk to many of Istanbul's main sightings, which was not too ideal. We ended up taking a taxi everywhere, which seemed to be more convenient for us since we were only staying there for two days. Other than that, the apartment itself was very clean and accommodating!

Highlights: 3 mins walk to famous Istiklal street (taksim), iknur  (owner) very helpful at everything, complete privacy, extremely good value for money, safe.

Positives: Warm neighborhood, grocery nearby, local hamam nearby, 24*7 taxi available from doorstep, well connected to public transport.

Negatives: 4th floor but no lift, internet little slow for videos streaming, but ok if allowed to buffer-general surfing was smooth.

My recommendation: high. I would give 8/10. Super good.
Nice adress well located close to centrum with plenty of good advices from the owner. We rent the room n°2 a bit small for a couple with a baby.

Ilknur was so pleasant and responsive,  and gave great tips on the area. She arranged a late night taxi for my departure as well. The studio wad clean and ready when I arrived.   The location is great; a 5 minute walk to all of the dining, entertainment,  and shopping.  Very convenient to the Tunel and Sishane transportation as well.  I would definitely stay here again. The money I saved  by staying here wad well spent dining out and enjoying Istanbul.  Thanks again, Ilknur!

First off all Ilknur: very kind person,  helpful, human, very friendly, we had a problem and she did everything possible to let us be happy. She let us feel as part of the family not just a business affair a rarity.
Very close from Istiklal Caddesi and from bus stop to Eminou Fatih  . Located in a quiet area, near a small supermarket and a Sunday market. Apartment very well equipped, very clean and safe. We had water and sweets on our arrival. The kitchen provided with oil salt pepper sugar and a.... wine opener.
The cleaning Lady of Ilknur was very sweet and helpful fantastic. 
 I would definitely recommend the apartment  and their hospitality. Thank you !

I stayed in İlknur's studio for 3 nights. Great location to Taksim square and many restaurants and bars. Apartment was clean and just as described in the photos. İlknur gave me many recommendations and tips which I found very useful. There was a bottle of water and snack for me when I arrived which is very thoughtful since you don't drink the tab water in Turkey. The streets getting to the apartment from Taksim square are uneven and difficult to roll a suitcase down. If you take the bus from the airport to Taksim, I would then recommend taking a taxi to the apartment. It's only a 15 minute walk but to make it easier on yourself, you can take a short taxi ride. :) I had a pleasant experience and would stay with İlknur again!

I had such a great time in Ilknur and Bülent's appartement.... 
it's a small studio but everything is inside (kitchen, bathroom, internet, etc..), the location in Istanbul is really nice, close to the center and main streets. My host were perfect, they did everything for i to feel happy and confortable.... if i come back to Istanbul i will definitly come back there !
Appartement, location, and host: Perfect !!!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for three nights. Communication with Ilknur was great: she responded quickly and was very helpful. The apartment was small but cozy with everything we needed. Located on a busy street but the apartment itself was quiet. Noise was not a problem. Only a 6-8 minute walk from Istiklal Street, the main shopping street of Taksim that leads to the different neighborhoods of Beyoglu. Thanks Ilknur!

Lovely cozy apartment in the historical center of Istanbul. Convenient location and proximity to major dostoprimechatelnastyam makes hotel accommodation İlknur & Bülent unforgettable. Cleanliness and quietness you obespechina. All issues related to the convenience of staying, are resolved quickly and efficiently. All, all, all highly recommend. Very nice host and a lovely atmosphere.

İlknur was very nice and we had a great weekend in the apartment. It is really close to Taksim and walking distance to many other places in Istanbul. Although it was a little small, if you're looking for a place to stay, it works for two people!

I had a great stay at this apartment for 10days. 
It was clean, comfortable and nice location. It has everything you need to stay. 
Ilknur is very kind and helpful. She always responded quickly when I asked. She gave some nice tips & information about Istanbul. That was very helpful! 
If I stay again in Istanbul, I will go to ilknur's studio without any hesitation. 
Thanks Ilknur and Bullent

İlknur was great to communicate with! Very easy. we had no problem finding the apartment and she went out of her way to accommodate us when we didn't have a working phone to call her. It was a very pleasant and comfortable experience, highly recommended!

Small cozy studio with kitchen, bathroom, internet, etc.. Close from Istiklal Caddesi (Taksim). Area is very authentic. Lovely local bazaar in neighbor street on sunday. IIknur is very helpful and quick to communicate. We had a great stay and we recommend Ilknur as host in istanbul. Thank you!

We had a great time at Ilknur's appartment, it was clean and at a very central location in Istanbul. Ilknur is extremely helpful and had some great tips for places to eat and things to see.

Just be aware that when you come walking from Taksim square, the street is on the right side from under the bridge you'll be walking over (there are no street signs there).

Ilknur is a great person who will not only provide you with a pleasant home during visiting Istanbul, but also will help with good advice and quick service by your request. Thank you for everything! :)

This place is perfect for a couple or a single person. The apartment has everything you need, very cozy!
İlknur very attentive hostess, she gave us lots of useful information about restaurants, hammam and even good exchange close to home.
highly recommend this place!

Ilknur was a wonderful host! She gave us some great tips for our stay in Istanbul and provided everything we needed.She always only took a few minutes to reply on airbnb and made everything possible to make our trip as good as possible. The appartment was really nice and clean. Even though the neighbourhood seemed a little shadey at first, we felt safe and comfortable in the appartment.

Very nice and warm studio in a great quarter in Istanbul, everything you need is inside. Ilknur is a great host, she answered so quickly (the week we were there was her wedding, so she answers in every circonstancies!), and gave us nice tips about what to do in the city. Thanks to her, our trip was unforgettable. I warmly recommand this address.

Istanbul is great! And it was a pleasure to stay in Ilknurs Room. We appreciated the conversation with you a lot, Ilknur! The room is rather small, but the space is absolutely sufficient. It was very clean and Taksim is really close! We would definitely book it a second time.
BTW: We forgot two beers in the fridge! We wish the next couple / person a nice evening ;-)

Ilknur is a great host! She has send me a lot of information about the neighborhood and the city in advance, and had some great tips about good restaurants, transport and supermarkets for example. The room was neat and clean, and everything we needed was there. The only thing I could recommend are some earplugs cause the neighborhood was a bit noisy. The positioned in a perfect spot in the city, since it's just next to Istiklal street. I would definitely recommend this room to other people. It's a good price for a good place.

I can highly recommend İlknur&Bülent Işık. 
The apartment was cozy, and the host was very generous and helpful. The location of the apartment is also excellent, being in the modern part of Istanbul but with easy access everywhere else. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here!

My husband and I stayed in studio 2 for 10 days in april. The rooms are very comfortable clean and well appointed. The kitchenette is thoughtfully equipped with all essentials. Illknur is very prompt to reply to communications and helpful with directions and advice on things to do in Istanbul. The apartment is very convenient to Istiklal St and the train network. The walk across the bridge to Sultan Ahmet is only about 20 mins and heaps of interesting things to see on the way. I can recommend this good value accommodation in Istanbul

Nous avons passé 1 semaine superbe a Istanbul. Le logement est très bien situé pour visiter toute la ville, il est sure et propre. Très bon rapport qualité/prix. Le contact avec İlknur est très réactif, en cas de besoin nous pouvons compter dessus. Toutes ses petites adresses et conseils nous ont permit de passer de très bonnes vacances. Merci pour ce séjour.
Merci

Great place to stay in!
Very nice and comftable 
I would stay here again next time I visit :)

It's really small room. But clean and cozy. It's ok, if you don't suggest to spend a lot of time inside. And you have now choice, because outside - Istanbul ;-)
This apartment is right in the center in 10-15 minutes from Taksim square and near night life.
Thank a lot to İlknur - careful and good hostess - for her help in finding place.
It's obligatory to have a good map or navigator, because there is no street name on the wall and it's easy to loose.

Dear friends, I definitely recommend you the host and the apartment. Ilknur is very hospital, he gives very useful tips and advices. Never less the apartment is very tiny but it's location is very good. Everything is clean and comfortable. I guess the apartment is good for those travelers who want to see beautiful city Istanbul, fore those who need apartment for recovery and sleep with good location and good price.

И специально для русскоязычных: квартира уютная, чистая, опрятная, с отличными расположением за суперскую цену. Однозначно, рекомендую.

A great place to stay in Istanbul! The place is nice and clean and in a great location and Ilknur is so amazingly helpful with anything you need. This was my first Airbnb experience and really, I could not have been happier. It just so perfectly met my needs. I would recommend anyone traveling to Istanbul to stay in one of Ilknur's places.

Le logement est dans un quartier bien placé, pas très loin de la place Taksim et de la bouillonnante rue Iskedal. Ilknur nous ne l'avons pas vue, tout s'est fait par mail, texto, c'est toujours plus sympathique quand on voit les personnes mais bon nous avons bien récupéré les clés et Ilknur nous avait envoyé par mail quelques infos sur le quartier : supermarchés à proximité, hammam, marché de légumes etc. 
Concernant le logement quelques bemols : il se situait sous le niveau de la rue, donc autant dire que les fenêtres offrent un paysage plutôt bouché et sur le palier une machine à laver collective (et un sèche-linge) utilisés la nuit peut perturber le sommeil le temps de l'essorage. Sinon, c'est petit mais fonctionnel et à un prix intéressant pour les budgets restreints.

The host was very helpful over the phone when we needed help. The neighborhood is great with lots of food and restaurants at reasonable prices.Mir is close to taksim square. We enjoyed the accommodation.

Ilknur was a great host. She was very helpful and gave us her number if we needed anything while we were there. We asked to leave our bag and she was very kind and allowed us to have a late check out which was very helpful as we were taking a night bus!! 
  The apartment was small, but had everything that we needed to enjoy our stay, wifi, kitchen, hot water, comfy bed, and a fan. It is in a good location close to everything and pretty easy to find. We would stay with her again in this apartment if we visit Istanbul in the future!
Very good experience! The flat is very nice, location easy to find though very close to tarlabaç, which can get a little gloomy at night. Otherwise, I would recommand it!

The apartment is in a great location and very comfortable and cosy. It was perfect for our stay in Istanbul. Ilknur also sent us some excellent information and tips on what to do with our visit which was useful. Thanks for a great stay!

Good location, very convenient. Small but comfortable apartment.
Ilknur was very responsive and helpful throughout the stay!

We had a wonderful time in Istanbul! Ilknur was extremely easy to communicate with, provided us with various recommendations for things to do (and we second her recommendations of the Ciya restaurant in Kadikoy and the Bizim restaurant just down the street -- both were delicious!), and offered us any help that we could possibly need. The apartment is very small and was a bit tight for two people with luggage -- we did, however, know this coming in from the pictures, so it was nothing to complain about. In reality, the apartment looks exactly like the pictures -- you will get precisely what you expect. Ilknur was nice enough to leave us a treat on our arrival, the Internet and television worked perfectly, and the location couldn't be beat! Thank you, Ilknur, for having us at your apartment and for making the check-in and check-out processes so easy!

The description was very accurate. Ilknur allowed us to check in early and check out late, which was very helpful! She was very fast to respond anytime we asked a question.
The location was just as advertised.
Thank you for the great stay!

Small but very functional apartment in a great location. İlknur was the most helpful host I have ever come across on airbnb! Although we never met in-person, she provided lots of invaluable tips about the surrounding area. The apartment itself has everything you need and has been carefully thought out with travellers in mind. It's also very tidy, the wireless internet is fast, the bed is comfy. The only thing stopping this apartment from being perfect was the lack of air-conditioning, but there was a fan provided which helped.

The studio is very well located, close to the center everything is at hand. The neighborhood is safe. Apart from the fact that the studio is really small and in the basement , everything is clean.
As for the host even if we didn't get to meet them, they were very helpful and always responding by mail when we had a question.

This flat is small,but really comfortable. It's like a nest for a couple)We did like it's price and  it's location-it's in the centre of the city.Thanks a lot for maps,good explanations how to go to main sightseeings,an umbrella,late check-out and tasty cakes)
Nice cozy little place on a great location. The hosts were super friendly and helpful. Istanbul is one of the best places in the world to visit and i kindly recommend staying here.

The woman who hosted us on Ilknur's behalf was very lovely. The place is quite small and a bit run down. It should be made more clear that it's a basement apartment as well. We only stayed for one of the two nights we reserved because we wanted a bigger and nicer place for our last two nights in the city. It's right for the price and if you're looking to crash and not spend much time in the place, it's perfectly fine.

We were happy to stay in İlknur&Bülent's flat.  It is small (as expected), but had everything we needed: a comfortable double bed,  a small kitchen area with a fridge, an internet access, a toilet and a shower.  It was clean, it is conveniently located with food shops nearby, but it is bit far from the major tourist center (Blue Mosque, St Sophie church etc.). On Sundays, there is a local market selling variety of goods from food to clothes.  İlknur was very helpful, he sent us the detailed description on how to find the flat and gave us tips about local places and restaurants.  The only downside we could see is that the flat was very warm, but it is a compromise we were prepared to have in the relations to the cost of renting.

IIknur was a wonderful host. We didn't meet her but she arranged everything perfectly & gave us lots of great ideas on what to see & do in Istanbul. 

The flat is just how the photos show, small but great value for where it is. 

The internet worked really well & Ilknur always responded quickly to any questions we had. 

The flat has a fan & you can leave the windows open over night so it stays quite cool at night. 

We really liked the neighbourhood & especially enjoyed the Sunday night market on the next street. 

If you want a convenient base in Istanbul at a really good price id recommend this.

It was great place to stay in short-like trips. We arrived told them when to arrive and there were someone waiting us to be arrived.
If you tell exact time to check-in for them it would be nice.
We enjoyed our stay is Istanbul, room was clean and equipped for all basic needs and there was a small biscuit and WiFi code on the table which made us smile and feel really good.
Location of this place is more than good enough. Because it was 8 minute walk from "Taksim" square which is center of that area. Shops and restaurants nearby is very handy. There was a one more metro station "Sishane" 8 minutes walk away.
Overall this was so great place for that price. If you not willing to spent much more this is a perfect place to stay.

Lovely apartment and great hosts! Ilknur was extremely helpful, providing directions and a list of things to do while in Istanbul. The wifi worked well, and there was a washer and dryer in the hallway outside - just bring your own detergent!

No complaints; very close to Taksim, and from there it's no problem to get where you need to be. Great for one person, might be a bit of a tight fit for two.

Great stay in Istanbul!

It was a great experience for us staying in this studio. We did not meet the host, but she made sure we were happy at her place.
She gave us very helpful tips a few days before the trip. She answered every question we had during the trip, and was always available for any inquiry. The house is as expected small, clean, and had what we needed at a very good price. The neighborhood is quiet, there is a small supermarket close to the studio, and the area is within walking distance from Taksim square(about 10 minutes) and even closer to the famous Istiklal street. Our stay in Istanbul was amazing, also because of the host Ilknur that gave us great suggestions of what to do in Istanbul. I would definitely stay here again, and would recommend it to anyone!
Nice stay in Istanbul. The apartment was cleaned and nice. Very small but close to taksim and Istiklal caddesi. The owner has been amenable and kind. I recommend this place to young people.

We didn't see Ilknur but she was very nice and fast at answering our questions. She did everything to make us feel at home.
The flat is small and cosy, the price and the quality are perfect. This is not my favorite area but we were very close from everything and we could eat more with 'turkish price' and not 'tourist price' so it was good for our finances.
Don't be afraid if the street looks noisy because the flat is very very quiet and we slept very well.
I'll warmly recommend this place to anyone !
Très bon accueil dans ce petit studio très fonctionnel et très bien situé! L'accueil et les conseils de Ilknur sont parfaits! Je recommande ce logement!

The room is very dark, don't expect luxury.

Otherwise everything is OK. Carrefour shop is almost next door, as well as the Sunday market. You don't even need to meet somebody for check-in and check-out.
The room was super clean and warm, it had wi-fi and perfect proximity to Taksim. Exactly what we needed. Thank you!

La casa è molto piccola ma in proporzione al prezzo è una giusta soluzione. La casa è situata vicinissimo alla via principale di taskim ma l interno in cui si trova rimane in una zona diroccata e un po' abbandonata, ma solo per pochi metri.
L'host è comunque gentile e premuroso. 
Quindi se si vuole spendere poco per una visita a Istanbul senza troppe aspettative sul soggiorno è ideale.

We were in this apartment for 5 nights. It is very cozy and it is a quiet area. Good for couples. Just 5 minute walk from Istiklal street and 15 minute walk from Taksim square. It was clean and though we never met the host she gave us some good advices.

Ilknur's place was a nice and comfy studio . It has all required things and it is close to the main attractions . I also really appreciate the suggestions from Ilknur they were awesome specially the Hamami :) . If I come back to Istanbul Ilknur's place would be my first pick

Let me say shortly, simple but suitable for couple. There's all system about heating, shower, cooking, laundary etc. This is a best place if you are couple and thinking about tour to historical places. :)

We had a nice stay at Ilknur's and Bülent's place! Thank you so much, you were really helpful! 
The location is great, very close to the city center and the most popular street in Istanbul - Istiklal caddesi. 
If I got it right it's something like a little private hotel and everything you may need is provided by the hosts whom I unfortunately didn't meet in person. Instead there's a special lady who helps guests check in. Checking-out is also very simple and we had no problems at all. 
The studio looks pretty much like the pictures, the bed is big but old and uncomfortable partly because the linen is also old and scratchy. Otherwise everything was fine. We really liked it there. Thanks!
Ilknur was so kind and helpful! The room is cozy, but it has everything you need to enjoy your time in Istanbul. Taksim is only 10 minutes away.

Le séjour à Istanbul dans cet appartement était juste parfait. j'avais seuleument besoin d'un endroit où dormir près de tout, et je suis bien tombé. J'était dans le centre d'Istanbul près de taksim, à deux pas de Istiklâl Caddessi. l'appartement était propre et chaleureux. 
Je recommende vraiment cet endroit. Je sortais el soir, l'endroit ne craint pas, on ne risque rien si on à 3h du matin en robe hyper courte :)

Our stay at Ilknur's place was amazing, there was nothing to be dissapointed at. The room is in the centre, in the middle of a busy and alive street of Istanbul, meanwhile the room itself is very quiet. 
We were extremely stupid to lock the door with keys inside, making troubles for ourseleves and Ilknur first of all. The problem was solved, but still, don't repeat our problem and pay attantion not to shut the door without keys. 
We didn't meet Ilknur, but even n the phone she was so friendly and extremely helpful. Thank you and sorry again!

The apartment is as it appears. Simple, Clean, and Secure. The apartment is in a great location and is walking distance from major attractions and a cheap taxi ride from the airport.  The apartment is great for one person, but two people may find it cramped. For American travelers one thing to keep in mind is if you do not have an international phone it will be impossible to contact the host once arrived at the airport or at the building to open the door. Before booking make sure that you do not have any reservation request changes because the host was not responsive in terms of accommodating my changes and seemed to avoid the question. Other then the inability to accommodate my revision to my reservation, everything is else was great.

Studio propre comme sur les photos, bien situé à proximité de tout, Ilknur est disponible il nous a donné des conseils sur les lieux, les transports, les prix...
Nous avons passé un agréable sejour du 22 au 29 Mars 2015. Nous sommes très satisfait nous y retournerons sans hésitez !

This apartment is perfectly located and very comfortable. It's an extremely accurate posting. Ilknur was wonderful in offering assistance and the apartment has everything that you could possibly need.

Choosing the apartment of Ilknur was a perfect choice. Cosy room, convinient location, so many attractions in not so far distance. IIknur is a great host, gave us many helpful advices to not miss most interesting highlights of the city. All of this made the trip to Istanbul simply amazing! 10 out of 10! I wish to come back one day. :)

The appartment is very simple, but is still charming in a way. Though it´s definitely not the one for couples: too small. For one person it is totally fine. Important to know, that it´s in the basement, so it is not much light in there. Our bed was broken, but we fixed it. 
Good things: Ilknurs recommendations were VERY helpful! Thanks a lot! And the appartment is PERFECTLY situated, we really appeciated that as well.

L'appartement est petit mais fonctionnel et surtout propre ! Il est bien situé, dans un quartier vivant et proche de lieux sympathiques, idéal pour sortir le soir.
İlknur, l'hôte, s'est rendu très disponible lorsque nous avions besoin d'informations ou d'aides. De plus il nous a fourni tout un tas d'infos sur le quartier et sur Istanbul qui se sont révélées très utiles.
On conseil vivement !

The studio was as described with everything you need (including cookware) in a small but manageable space (we were 2 but are used to sharing a small space). Ilknur provided us with great advice on things to do in Istanbul and responded to all my questions quickly. The location was great and allowed us to explore all over Istanbul for the week we were there. We had a great time, thanks again!

The studio is great, it had everything we needed! :) It is small and cozy studio, it's easy to enjoy it... What was the most important for me, the studio is very near the central city area, Istiklar street (main pedestrain street), so every bar or club is only a walking distance from there... Also, subway station is very near. :)
Ilknur sent me a list of all shops, restaurants, supermarkets nearby, and that was really helpful. I think you cannot get a better deal for this price.
Ilknur was very helpful and always available. The apartment was clean and tidy. It could be a bit too loud because of the heater on the other side of the wall.
We were be easily able to find the location, and the room was cosy and described as it was, and it is very useful for short stays.
Everything went well. I've lived in Istanbul before so I knew what to expect about the area. The store cookies were a nice touch upon arrival.

Ilknur was very flexible and made our stay in Istanbul very enjoyable and easy! We arrived late, so never met her, but she made it easy to find and access the flat with her information. The flat is small and cosy, but well stocked with kitchen supplies and has everything one could want in a small space.  She even provided us a big bottle of water which was great as we arrived so late.  She emailed us some great local information about sights, transport, hammams and places to eat and even booked a fabulous restaurant for us.

The listing was accurate. Response time was prompt.  She was very warm and inviting. The studio had everything you'd need cooking utensils,  cold fridge, dishes, hand and body soap.  It was very close to istiklal Avenue,  metros, taksim square. There are multiple grocery stores within a block. It is also a very quiet neighborhood at night

Petit studio très mignon avec les équipements pour passer un bon séjour. Ce logement correspond à l'annonce et il est situé tout près de la rue commerçante (5mn à pied). Il y a une supérette en bas de la rue, un café, deux petits restaurants dont une lokanta où on y mange bien et avec un bon rapport qualité prix. Ilknur est un très bon hôte, très disponible,  qui prend le soin de nous donner toutes les informations nécessaires sur la ville, les bonnes adresses et les commodités qui sont proches de son logement. Je recommande fortement cet hôte. Merci beaucoup Ilknur (Thank you very much Ilknur)

Квартира действительно маленькая, но достаточно уютная. Для одного человека точно подходит. Находится в 5 минутах ходьбы от популярной улицы Истикляль.
Небольшие минусы, которые не сильно повлияли на мое пребывание:
- пару раз с утра была чуть теплая вода, но мыться все равно можно было;
- кровать в одном месте немного проваливалась, однако я это заметил, только когда сел в это место, а так спать было вполне удобно.
В остальном все было отлично. Вентилятор был очень кстати, поскольку в августе в Стамбуле очень жарко. Также в квартире имелись два комплекта маленького и большого полотенец. В душе было жидкое мыло и шампунь.
Все было как на фото. Кроме, разве что, настольной лампы. Что было не так важно.
Самое главное - полезные советы от хозяина, которые он отправил мне в сообщении. С ними мой отдых в Стамбуле стал намного лучше!
The apartment is very well located, clean and comfy. Very close to Istiklal avenue and Taksim Square. Ilknur is a great host, we didn't meet but she described the address precisely on the phone.
Отличный бюджетный вариант,чтобы переночевать!квартира полностью соответсвует фото,расположение отличное!

The studio is small but with everything.
It's well located, 2 minutes from one of the most important commercial road, full of shops.

Ilknur was  very helpful!
I suggest this place :)

We spent good time in istanbul, very beautiful city. the flat is pretty but little like a room ; the district is old but it's near to taksim, galata and karakoy to take bosphorus ferry. sultanamet is easy to join from the flat because it's direct line of subway from the flat. 
Maybe we will go back to istanbul next year because we loved the city. if we do that think we will go back to illknur flat because it's a good flat for the price of the location!! Friends want to go to istanbul and we will told them to go to ilknur flat!!
And for people who want to make party it's the district to be... 
joker,indigo club, beats club..
Ilknur was very flexible for the hour of check in and check out... thanks for it!
be carefull of what we ear in Europe... we were outside during night and i really felt in security in Istanbul

I stayed here from 14-18 Nov (5D4N). Apartment was a small 1-room unit at a very convenient location (Taksim). Utensils and basic amenities were available. Walking to the nearest metro takes about 10-15 minutes. Unit was generally clean.
Great communication with Ilknur. The space is very nice also. We had a great time. Thanks Ilknur.
Perfect location, just like on the picture, 3 minutes to taksim. Ilknur was helpful. She allowed me to check in early and check out lately. You can cook food. Good wifi.

IIknur was very nice and send me many information about the city and offered me to call him any time, I needed help. The flat was small but nice and had everything one needs and was the same like on the pictures. The only deficit was the bed, which was a little bit broken, but could be fixed quiet fast and easily :) overall for this price a perfect place to stay in Istanbul.
ilknur hanım çok yardımcı oldu istiklal caddesinde galata kulesine çok yakın küçün şirin bi yer herkese tavsiye ederim dairelere ve ilknur hanımın ilgisnden gayet memnun kaldım

Perfect location, apartment is not big but fair enough if you travel alone, or even two people. I have to say the double bed is super comfortable!  I like this place, everything was simply good. Ilknur will make you feel comfortable and try to help you with anything you might need.

We stay for 4 days.The room is small,but cosy and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was everything you need. The  price is good for  private (Website hidden by Airbnb) the landlady We  didn't see,but SMS communication was complete!;)Thanks for everything! Greetings! Hristina&Nikolay
We had a great time in Istanbul and enjoyed the central location of the apartment. The communication was problemless and Ilknur was very helpful. Everything was great.
Ilknur is very kind, and informative. The location of this studio was ideal for me.
Останавливались уже второй раз в этом доме, квартира попалась другая, но она так же соответсвует описанию. Все было комфортно. Хозяин как всегда очень вежлив и гостеприимен.

The host was extremely helpful and flexible. The apartment is as described and a short walk to taksim, istanbul is huge so a good central location made our stay very convenient.
There is a market outside on every sunday, which gives you a great feeling of  the Turkish lifestyle but it does get loud on saturday night/sunday morning when they set up the tents. With that being said, I would definitely stay there again.

I had a wonderful 9 day stay at Ilknur's.  She was very accommodating and helped me orient to the area with suggestions of ways to see more of Istanbul.  Very convenient location with 2 grocery stores 50 meters from the apartment, istiklal street a 5 minute walk and a 10 minute walk to the Metro.  Galata Tower, Tūnel and Karaköy ferry are also very close.  

The apartment is easy to get to from Ataturk by using the Havatas shuttle that drops near to Taksim.

The apartment is small and cozy but was ideal for me since I was traveling alone.  I look forward to staying here again.

Nice place. Very helpful host. Close to main tourists place but the place is quiet. Local bazar on Sunday is awesome. Good value of money. Convenient check-in\out.
We had nice weekends. Thank you so much!

We stayed in Ilknur's studio for 4 nights. Very good communication, we booked last minute and arrived couple of hours later without any trouble. it is easy to find and location is perfectly close to the center, as discribed. Room is like seen on the pictures and has everything you need and more...shampoo, towels, dishes, water, tea, spaghetti, oil, salt etc. Tv has foreign channels and in basement floor there are washing machine and dryer for common use. Street has small shops and farm market once a week. ilknur was kind to offer us bigger room with no extra charge, but we stayed in studio 7 that was smaller but less hot than big upstairs rooms. Rooms have fan but no AC, with sunny weather gets pretty hot.

Small and nice studio in an interesting and amazing neighborhood. We haven't seen Ilknur, but we felt she very present and she has helped us when we have need. Good and cheap apartment to stay some days in a very good city!
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

CLEANLINESS = 3/5 - The place was clean, but being a basement there were some bugs
HOSPITALITY = 1/5 -  We messaged 5 days prior to arrival and received no replies about when we could enter the home. We even messaged the night before, but with no cell phone plan we could not know what the reply was when we arrived at the home. We rang the bell and knocked and eventually someone came, showed us our room, explained the washer and dryer. 
LOCATION = 5/5 - Great neighbourhood, very lively, a 5 minute walk to the main pedestrian strip. You feel like a local when staying in this area. 
WIFI =4/5 - Worked perfect throughout the house 
Come again? = No, this place is really meant for 1 person, with the 2 of us it was really tight. For 1 person, this place is perfect.
Ev ve bina gayet güzel. Mobilyalar eski fakat sorun olmadi bu. Muhit acisindan biraz kötü gözükse de biz sorun yasamadik.
Every thing was great. İlknur is a very kind and helpfull. Thnx for all
All is okey in her flat, she is nice lady you can easily communicate with.

Great little flat located in central downtown Istanbul. About a ten minute walk from Taksim Square, the heart of the city. Shops, groceries, and public transportation are all less than five minutes away.

My girlfriend and I had a pleasant stay at Ilknur's place. The location is great and the privacy of the room too. Even though it was in the basement, it was still a clean non smelling and comfy room.
The only downside that I would point out is the size of the room. For two persons it's very tight to the point you have to move your luggage around depending on what space of the room you're gonna be using.

close to istiklal, economical price, comfortable double size bed, kitchen, mini tv and fridge, bathroom, table and chairs, quiet neighbourhood
free space is enough but not very wide, as far as i remember there was no air conditioner but there were 2 radiators
Orderly and nice studio, comfortable bed and towels provided. Close to Taksim but not on a touristy street (although cars could be heard before closing the window).

My worst AirBnb stay ever. Mould, broken light, leaking shower, very dark apartment. The owner reacts only to the messages he wants. In almost three weeks he wasn't able to fix the broken light or give me a cloth to clean the floor (after the leaking). He promised cleaning once a week. There was one during my 18-day stay. Room completely different than in the picture. He was very upset and unpleasant when I complained about the light and the leaking. Good price, but not worth the trouble.
Her şey fotoğraftaki gibiydi. Küçük bir mekan ancak temel olarak gerekli her şey var.
Very simple place near Taksim...a good deal for a minimalist.

ужасная квартира, сдает агент, хозяйка не говорит по-английски, район трущоб, белье грязное, утром - ремонт дороги, ночью - духота.
Никому не советую.
Lovely spot, convenient travel options for tourist locations. We suffered a little in the summer heat, but the cozy place was great for a couple for a few days.

Минусы:
Так как вариант очень дешевый, многого ожидать не стоит. Комната была грязная: повсюду пыль и грязь, которую, кажется, не убрали еще с прошлых хозяев. 
Комната находится в подвале. Возле двери две стиральные машинки, которые включают и ночью. Звук от них очень мешает спать. 
Хозяина ни разу не видели. Нас встретила работница дома, которая совсем не говорит по-английский и пришлось объясняться жестами.
На кровати не было простыни только наматрасник. Написала об этом хозяину, чтобы принес, но он ответил лишь на последний день моего пребывания. Спала на одеяле и укрывалась своей кофтой. 
Очень темная комната. Утром темно, как ночью, но это не существенный минус.

Плюсы:
Есть все для готовки: кастрюли, сковородка, тарелки, чашки и главное, электрическая плита. В двух шагах есть супермаркеты, где можно дешево закупиться, а напротив простое кафе, где готовят вкусные завтраки.
Цена. За такую комнату и расположение - это лучшая цена для бюджетного туриста.
До всех достопримечательностей можно доехать максимум с двумя пересадками, иногда можно и дойти. Рядом Истикляль, а значит, что вечером будет чем заняться.
комната хорошая. район что надо
Location is perfect very close to taksim..the apartment has everything whatever you want.its basement but no bad smell no insects.and she is very helpful everytime.thank you.

Die einfache Unterkunft erfüllte von Lage und Ausstattung her meinen Ansprüchen für eine Woche. Allerdings nicht meinen hohen Ansprüchen an Sauberkeit.  
Bis auf den elektrischen Türöffner hat jedoch alles soweit reibungslos funktioniert.
Für Menschen die einen privaten Schlafplatz in Taksim brauchen ist die Unterkunft völlig ok.

Highly recommend ! Great location, just 7 mins to reach Istiklal street from the flat by walking. The studio is very small but so sweet for spending the days in the heart of the city. I think it s the best price in this location to stay in a flat.Ilknur is very helpful host, thanks for her to supply what we needed in the flat (Website hidden by Airbnb) Kucuk ve sirin bir studyo olmakla beraber gayet kullanisli ve ihtiyaciniz olabilecek, bir evden beklediginiz herseyin var oldugu bir (Website hidden by Airbnb) lisesine oldukca yakin ve en guzel tarafi evin her daim sicacik olmasiydi.Fiyata gore beklentinizin uzerinde konfora sahip bir yer.Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

Good value. Very basic and small, but has everything you need to come home to at night. Ilknur communicated very promptly and helpfully.

It should be noted that the room is in the basement, and therefore gets little natural light. The building washer and dryer is right outside the apartment door and the windows face the street, so there's some background noise during the day, but not too bad.
Her şey gayet güzeldi. Tekrar deneyim yaşamak isteyebileceğim bir yer.
İlknur Hanım a her şey için teşekkkür ederiz. Özellikle kısa konaklamacılar ve şehirde rahat bir şekilde gezmek isteyenler için tavsiye ederiz.
Just as described. Pleasant stay

İlknur hanımın konukseverliği ve evin temizliği açısından hiçbir sıkıntı yaşamadım. ev kolaylıkla bulabileceğiniz güzel bir lokasyonda.  evde kalma sürem boyunca bir sıkıntıyla karşılaşmadım, o yüzden kalmayı düşünen arkadaşlara tavsiye ederim.

Location is good, but this house is just for a short stay and for a tourist who would go out for a whole day and will come back just to sleep,in that case location and a price is understandable. Otherwise the room is not for leaving. First of all it's in laundry floor, so the noise and smell will be during whole trip. The room is underground, so no light or fresh air, moreover during our trip was some awful smell from outside. The size of room is so small that two adult person hardly can stand there.
Burada ilk konaklamam olmadı ve sonuncusu da olmayacak İlknur hanımın misafiri olmak çok güzel. Merkezi ve çok keyifli daireler kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum. Her şey için çok teşekkürler:)
Gayet temiz ve konuksever bir yerdi.
Все понравилось. Жилье соответствует описанию и соотношению цена-качество. Очень подходит для одного путешественника. Расположение отличное.

It was great to stay at this tiny appartement. With two people it gets crowded easily, but that just add to its charme and cozyness. 
Thanks again! :)
nice

Our stay in this room was very pleasant. The flat is cute, clean, calm and very well located. The contact was nice. I recommand it. 

Nous sommes très content de ce studio : il est certes petit mais largement suffisant pour un couple et pour quelques jours. Il est calme, très bien placé, propre, et fonctionnel. Nous recommandons les yeux fermés.
Ev resimlerdekiyle aynı. Konumu mükemmel.
İlknur hanım ilgiliydi ve sorunsuz bir konaklama oldu . Konum olarak da gayet merkeziydi.

The place is good for a short stay. Small cozy room, pretty clean, walking distance from some of the main attraction and good communication with Ilknur.
I personally didn't like the fact that my room was in the basement, often noise from the washing machines and was losing the phone reception as well

Amazing place! 2 minutes away from Istiklal Street! Close to everything, very fast wifi, and hot water all the time  Would definitely book there whenever I visit Istanbul, and I advise everyone to book it too
Konumu gayet uygun lokasyonda. Konaklama için yeterli ancak evde zaman geçirme amacıyla misafirlik için pek uygun değil
Fijne kamer, tien minuten lopen naar de grote winkelstraat!

Très bon petit studio . 
Le studio est très bien situé , juste à côté de la rue la plus commerçante . 
Les transports en commun ne sont pas loin 
Le seul bémol est la taille du studio , il est très petit, ainsi que la salle de bain.
Sinon les propriétaires ont été à notre service tout au long et facilement contactable. 
La wifi est cependant peu performante.

Comfortable, secure, and inexpensive. Minimal amenities however the necessities are here. (Bathroom, kitchen, WiFi). Nearby local bus station, local eateries and markets, and close to Taksim Square. Would recommend to those looking for a simple accommodation at a great price. Also the hosts are responsive to questions and very helpful.
Keyifli bir alan, ihtiyaçlarınızı karşılıyor

The room is the same with the pictures. The location is in ghetto but It's also close to attractions. We had 2 main problems; there was a washing machine right next to room's corridor and the wifi didn't work. When we wanted to just rest, we had a troubled time because of the endless noises. The wifi didn't work and our phones also couldn't connect(because the room is in basement) so we had no connection for the whole night. I think these should be in the description. In general, the room is good for short travels and the bed was comfortable.

I stayed at Ilknur place for 2 nights.   Ilknur was very helpful in guiding me to reach the place easily. Also it was very easy to communicate with Ilknur and she responded to my queries in very quick and good way. Staying at her apartment was great as place is nice and clean and according to my expectation. Also the location of the place is very good and very close to Taksim Saqure. I would recommend staying at Ilknur place and will stay here again whenever i will visit Istanbul next time. Best wishes Ilknur!
Her yere yakın olması büyük bir artı, çok memnun kaldık.

The place is small but it is very well located, closed to everything and Place Taksim.
Iiknur is available if you need anything !

L’appartamento/stanza è situato in una buona posizione. Purtroppo è particolarmente piccolo quindi non adatto a più di una persona. Il bagno è veramente piccolo. Inoltre, l’appartamento è nel sotterraneo dell’edificio e sull’annuncio non viene specificato. Comunque l’host è stato abbastanza disponibile e ci ha inviato tutte le info precise su come raggiungere il luogo.
Şehrin ta merkezinde mükemmel bir daire. Mutevazı, ama gerekli her şey var ve bu kadar düşük fiyat için süper fırsat. Bütün turistlere tavsiye ederim.
Emplacement parfait, Ilknur était toujours disponible encore avant de mon arrive, m’a indiqué tout ce que je devais faire et comment arriver à l’appartement.
Everything was great. He was always there for all questions. He helped me around the parking lot. The apartment has everything it needs. Great for couples or singles. Each recommendation.
Très bien, comme d'habitude!

relativement déçu par l' insalubrité du logement. Pas d'isolation des fenêtres, on se croyait dehors tout en étant à l'intérieur. Il y avait pas mal d'odeur d'égout venant de la salle de bain. Nous avons même retrouvé un cafard écrasé sous le lit. il y a également la présence de quelques fourmis.

I had an awesome stay in İlknurs "small flat". The studio is like described and very clean. Although Ilknur was not in person there to welcome me there was a very friendly turkish woman who let me in. 
The district where the studio is, is not overcrowded and in the evening quite enough to take a restorative sleep.  The studio might be in a poor quarter of Istanbul but i felt really safe as a Single-traveling-woman. 
I would definetely recommend this flat :)
perfect place for stay. cheap and good ..
Memnun kaldık, teşekkür ederiz.
Really small but in a good location! Expect that the room in the basement!
Son derece temiz
güvenilir temiz ve mutlu bir ortam

Ilknur's studio located near Taksim square and it's very suitable if you arrive from Sabiha Gokçen by shutlle bus. The studio is very clean, compact, you have everything for staying and for cooking also. We stayed at December so central heating and hot water in the studio was appropriate. Bus stop, metro, many sights are very close. Ilknur always connected with us, gave good advices. We also didn't see him, lady met us and have the key. We were very glad to stay in Ilknur's studio and recommend  it.
Great host
the place is nice and the host is very helpful.

Great apartment, was perfect for one person but could accommodate a couple as well. The best was really comfortable as well!! Host communication is great, location is perfect, close to Taksim square, quiet neighborhood and shops nearby. Will definitely stay again, thanks!
My stay was really amazing. the place is very clean and close to Taksim and Istiklal street and I really got the best for my money.
Helpful people.
Kısa süreki Konaklamak için merkezi konumda şirin temiz bir daire. İlknur hanım da gayet ilgili ve yardımseverdir.

name: Casa "Voltaria", o desejo de voltar
summary: Apartamento T3 duplex, com capacidade para 4 pessoas + 1 bebé. Localização excelente para explorar a cidade do Porto e os arredores. Os principais pontos turísticos ficam à distancia de uma agradável caminhada a pé.
space: T3 duplex com todas as comodidades para tornar a sua estada agradável e confortável.  Bom para famílias com crianças. 1 Cama de casal, 1 berço, 1 cama de solteiro e 1 cama de corpo e meio (1 adulto ou 2 crianças pequenas). Cozinha equipada. Detergente da louça (manual e máquina) esfregões e panos incluídos. Máquina de lavar roupa, ferro e tábua de passar. Roupa de cama e casa de banho incluída. Papel higiénico, gel para lavar as mão e gel de banho incluídos. Cadeira de refeições para bebé. Possibilidade de carrinho de bebé (mediante pedido). Tv e internet.
