neighborhood_overview: Zona residencial tranquila. Supermercado, cafés, farmácias, padarias nas proximidades.
notes: O apartamento fica do lado de Gaia, num 1º andar sem elevador.
transit: Facilidade de estacionamento na rua. Os transportes públicos ficam a escassa distancia a pé: autocarros turísticos e públicos 2 minutos / metro 3 minutos / Estação de S. Bento 7 minutos (permite visitar Braga, Guimarães e Aveiro em 1h00). Mas as principais atrações turísticas ficam à distancia de uma agradável caminhada: a Ponte D. Luis e a melhor vista da cidade do Porto ficam a 3 minutos. A Sé Catedral a 5 minutos, a Estação de S. Bentos 7 minutos, a Av. dos Aliados a 8 minutos, a Torre dos Clérigos, as Caves do Vinho do Porto ou a Ribeira a uns meros 10 minutos (distancias a pé), entre muitos outros...

reviews.comments: Très bien accueilli chez Fatima dont l'appartement en duplex est très proche du centre de Porto (pont Eiffel et des caves à vins). Une bouteille de Porto nous attendait dans l'appartement. Place de parking facile dans la rue devant l'appartement. Tickets de métro à recharger mis à disposition.

Sem dúvida que o nome "casa "voltaria"" se aplica! Óptimas condições, óptima localização e a Fátima foi super simpática e prestável. Recomendo a 200%! Até agora a minha melhor experiência Airbnb. Tinha de ser em Portugal :)

Fatima est très agréable ! Dès notre arrivé nous avons été accueilli chaleureusement est avec en prime une bonne bouteille de Porto ainsi que des Pastel Nata. 
L’appartement est très fidèle aux photos est même mieux en vrai. Le quartier est très bien situé proche de toutes les commodités et du métro. 
Séjour super que je recommande. Encore merci à Fatima pour son hospitalité et sa disponibilité. :)

Nous avons été accueillis chaleureusement par Fatima, avec de gentilles attentions. Elle nous a donné toutes les explications nécessaires pour nos déplacements dans Porto et des lieux à visiter.
L'appartement est très bien situé, proche des commerces et des transports publics. Il est conforme aux descriptions et aux photos de l'annonce.
Fatima et son mari ont été très disponibles et réactifs à toutes nos demandes.

Accueil très chaleureux, tout est fait pour se sentir comme à la maison.
Petites attentions comme boisson fraiche, petits gateaux dès notre arrivée.
Conseils pour visiter Porto , brochures et  plans à disposition.
Aide pour traduire des infos du Français en Portugais se qui nous à bien aider 
pendant notre périple au Portugal .

Un grand MERCI à Fatima et Hugo qui nous ont reçu par un accueil chaleureux, très sympathique. Ils ont su faciliter notre séjour.  Leur logement très bien situé,  est agréable, soigné et possède tout le confort. Super prestation que nous recommandons sans hésiter !

Nous venons de passer 5 jours formidables dans l'appartement de Fatima et Hugo. Idéalement situé dans un quartier très calme à 5 minutes à pied du centre-ville de Porto par le pont Dom-Luis, cet appartement est vraiment très sympa (petits-déjeuners sur le balcon tous les matins, chambres spacieuses,...). Fatima et Hugo quant à eux sont des hôtes extrêmement agréables :  ils aiment recevoir, nous accueillent avec tout un tas de délicieuses attentions... et ont toujours cherché à nous rendre le séjour le plus agréable possible.  On s'est véritablement sentis comme chez nous. Tout était parfait!!! Merci encore à vous deux Fatima et Hugo pour votre disponibilité et votre gentillesse.

Fatima et sa famille sont charmants 
Très agréable maison près de tout 
A recommander

Nous avons été accueillis très chaleureusement avec une envie de partager des choses. Fatima est quelqu'un d adorable et plein de bienveillance. Le logement est très agréable,  calme, propre et donne envie de rester plus longtemps. Nous étions avec nos 2 enfants petits et le lieu est parfait pour une famille.
The host canceled this reservation 112 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Spacious, bright, central. AC. Rambla Catalunya
summary: Spacious bright and stylish 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the very central Eixample area, ideal for seeing the whole city. Reception open daily 9AM - 10PM with large terrace for all guests. Wi-Fi, satellite TV and well-equipped kitchen. The apartment is spacious and full of natural light. The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. Modern decor, comfortable furnishings, wooden floor. The living room has 2 balconies onto a lively street. 3 bedrooms look onto an inner terrace.
space: Four-bedroom two-bathroom apartment, ideal for a group of eight people. The master bedroom has a queen-size bed, the other three bedrooms have got two single beds each.  The spacious and bright living room has two balconies that look onto the street. Three bedrooms look onto the inner terrace, one onto the inner courtyard. The decor is modern and comfortable, with wooden flooring. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is also an extra dining area. This luxury apartment is located in the Eixample, near many famous modernista (Catalan Art Nouveau) buildings and close to the charming and historically interesting area of Ciutat Vella. There is free Wi-Fi and TV with international channels. Fresh bed linen and towels are provided. The towels are changed every other day and the sheets every week. The reception desk is open daily from 9 am to 6 pm and our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need.
description: Spacious bright and stylish 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the very central Eixample area, ideal for seeing the whole city. Reception open daily 9AM - 10PM with large terrace for all guests. Wi-Fi, satellite TV and well-equipped kitchen. The apartment is spacious and full of natural light. The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. Modern decor, comfortable furnishings, wooden floor. The living room has 2 balconies onto a lively street. 3 bedrooms look onto an inner terrace. Four-bedroom two-bathroom apartment, ideal for a group of eight people. The master bedroom has a queen-size bed, the other three bedrooms have got two single beds each.  The spacious and bright living room has two balconies that look onto the street. Three bedrooms look onto the inner terrace, one onto the inner courtyard. The decor is modern and comfortable, with wooden flooring. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is also an extra dining area. This luxury apartment is located in the Eixample, near many famo
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample is the Catalan Art Nouveau centre of the city. The area was built in the late 19th and early 20th century and the architecture of the neigbourhood is stunning, with some real gems to explore. A few steps from your apartment you’ll be able to feast your eyes on amazing buildings such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the lesser-known but stunning Casa Amatller. The area is one of the cultural and shopping heart of the city. You’ll find designer stores and high street brands next to all sorts of great restaurants and bars. A short walk (5 minutes) will get you to the bustling old city, where you’ll have another great selection of shops, markets, museums, art galleries, restaurants and bars to choose from. The area boasts great transport links and you’ll be able to get to all ends of the city in a few minutes by underground, overground, bus and taxi.
notes: City tax is not included (2,48€ per person per night) and is payable upon arrival. HUTB-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)B
transit: Passeig de Gràcia: overground trains to Figueras, Girona, France, airport T2 etc. Metro lines L2, L3 and L4. Plaça Catalunya: overground trains to Sitges etc.  Buses: there are dozens of buses that stop nearby. You can easily get a bus from Plaça Catalunya to the beach, for example. Aerobus: the airport bus runs every few minutes throughout the day and leaves from Plaça Catalunya.
access: The reception desk at the building just across the road is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM. For arrivals later than 10 PM an automated check-in system is available. Check-in is from 2 PM. Check-out is by 11 AM. Lockers are available for earlier arrivals or later departures.
interaction: The reception desk at the building just across the road is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM and our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need.  Outside these times a member of staff is always on call for any emergencies and you will have their direct line.

host.host_about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.comments: The place is absolutely amazing. It was very spacious and it was in the perfect location to everything. Wouldn't have wanted to stay anywhere else.
This place was so amazing! Superb location and was very big, spacious and beautiful!

Great place for families, big, really spacious. Also for a business group, as it has many places for privacy and group meeting at the living room. Location is extraordinary!! Everything you can need is in less than 100 meters. Great hospitality.

This is an amazing apartment.  Spacious, clean and tidy and most importantly to us, very quiet considering it is in one of the busiest areas.  Two minutes walk from the metro station that goes to the airport.  Lockers for left luggage.  What more could you wish for.

summary: Localizada em bairro nobre do Rio de Janeiro, totalmente mobiliada, com sauna, em um condomínio contando com diversas facilidades (piscina, academia, portaria...), disponível pela primeira vez para locação. TUDO NOVO. Super caprichado!
space: O espaço é lindo, pois alem de todo o capricho na decoração, moveis, utensilios, roupas de cama e banho, o espaço é super seguro, com guarita de segurança e ainda dispõe de ampla area de lazer. É perto do Shopping Rio Design Barra e do Barra Shopping (10 min), poucos minutos do Outback. E 14 km do RIR.

neighborhood_overview: O local é super calmo e gostoso. Muito seguro. Possui guarita de segurança. Fica a 10 min dos shoppings Rio Design Barra e Barra Shopping. 5 min do restaurante Outback.  Ha pontos de onibus perto. Servico constante de taxi e uber. Caso a opção seja vir de carro temos garagem coberta.  Ficar dentro do condominio também é delicioso, pois tem ampla area de lazer com piscinas, sauna, academia, quadras, churrasqueira, salao de festa.
notes: É necessario me enviar com antecedencia para liberacao na guarita de seguranca do condominio o nome completo, numero da RG, CPF, data de nascimento de todos os ocupantes.  Se vierem com veiculo precisa enviar tambem, placa, cor, modelo e Marca.
transit: Poderão vir de carro e estacionar dentro do condominio em garagem coberta pela qual eu forneço o cartão de acesso.  Ha facilidade também de taxi e uber. Ainda poderão vir de transporte publico.

name: MODERN CONDO WITH VIEW - GRIFFIN
summary: Enjoy your stay in Montreal by relaxing in this brand new condo with a lot of great amenities in the building :) You will love the view, the balcony, and the free coffee/tea in the morning ! Feel free to borrow a travel guide and go explore the city!
space: The living area is a big open space with a kitchen counter that allows you to discuss when preparing the dinner. If the weather is nice ou will enjoy the balcony and its stunning view in the evening. If you want to chill out you have access to a large screen TV with Netflix, or you can put your music on the speakers in the living room.
description: Enjoy your stay in Montreal by relaxing in this brand new condo with a lot of great amenities in the building :) You will love the view, the balcony, and the free coffee/tea in the morning ! Feel free to borrow a travel guide and go explore the city! The living area is a big open space with a kitchen counter that allows you to discuss when preparing the dinner. If the weather is nice ou will enjoy the balcony and its stunning view in the evening. If you want to chill out you have access to a large screen TV with Netflix, or you can put your music on the speakers in the living room. You will have access to the building amenities which are a common room with a pool table and sofas, a gym, and if you are lucky the SPA will reopen by the time you arrive (currently under renovation) and you will be able to swim in the indoor pool, use the jacuzzi or the hammam. During your stay, you can reach us by phone for any question Griffintown is a former industrial district of the hearth of Montreal
neighborhood_overview: Griffintown is a former industrial district of the hearth of Montreal where old factories are now renovated to be beautiful housing buildings. The neighborhood has a lot of great restaurants, cafes and clubs, and it is perfectly located, a few minutes away from downtown, old town, old port and the Lachine canal.
notes: Parking is often available on the street or you can have a guaranteed spot right across the street on the Vinci Parking (not free)  Feel free to use the kitchen amenities, the basic products like seasoning, and the tea, coffee and sugar that are made available for you. And if you are here to visit the city you can borrow the travel guides and bring them with you during the day as long as you don't forget to put it back ;)
transit: Bonaventure station on the orange line is 5 min walk, or you can walk 1 block and catch a bus to downtown or old port.
access: You will have access to the building amenities which are a common room with a pool table and sofas, a gym, and if you are lucky the SPA will reopen by the time you arrive (currently under renovation) and you will be able to swim in the indoor pool, use the jacuzzi or the hammam.
interaction: During your stay, you can reach us by phone for any question
house_rules: - Please leave the place clean after you, do your dishes.  - No guests or animals are allowed (max 3 p. in th condo and the common areas) - No smoking - Do not be too loud

reviews.comments: My sister and I just got home from an amazing weekend away in Montreal! This was the first time we used airbnb and Manon was a wonderful host. She was prompt to answer any questions we had. The condo was spotless and beautiful and looked just as the picture described. The neighbourhood was lovely. Was only abou a 7 minute drive to downtown and we used uber! It was a locked and secure building. We have only amazing things to say about our stay and the host. Thank you again Manon!

name: 18C.  NICE AND COZY 2 BEDROOMS. PERFECT LOCATION!
summary: NICE AND COZY APARTMENT WITH 2 BEDROOMS ON A TOP FLOOR. LOCATED ON ST-LAURENT BOULEVARD. WALKING DISTANCE TO MANY GOOD RESTAURANTS, BARS, SHOPPING AND OTHER SERVICES.
space: The apartment is cozy on a 3rd floor (top) - super clean  - 2 bedrooms with 2 real beds - washer and dryer  - dishwasher  - coffee maker  - Well equipped kitchen with an open space with the living room. - bed sheets, blankets, duvet covers, pillows, towels included! - you will find other amenities such as a first aid kit, AC in common area, iron, iron board, micro-wave, toaster, kettle, hair dryer, q-tips, body wash, shampoo, detergent.
description: NICE AND COZY APARTMENT WITH 2 BEDROOMS ON A TOP FLOOR. LOCATED ON ST-LAURENT BOULEVARD. WALKING DISTANCE TO MANY GOOD RESTAURANTS, BARS, SHOPPING AND OTHER SERVICES. The apartment is cozy on a 3rd floor (top) - super clean  - 2 bedrooms with 2 real beds - washer and dryer  - dishwasher  - coffee maker  - Well equipped kitchen with an open space with the living room. - bed sheets, blankets, duvet covers, pillows, towels included! - you will find other amenities such as a first aid kit, AC in common area, iron, iron board, micro-wave, toaster, kettle, hair dryer, q-tips, body wash, shampoo, detergent. Make yourself at home! You are welcome to use any appliances and all the essentials in the apartment - Wifi and also an Apple TV I'm always on my phone and I check my account religiously. Feel free to contact me for anything, I live near by and will be more then happy to help. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION... The apartment is on St-Laurent boulevard, one of the most lively and vibrant stree
neighborhood_overview: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION... The apartment is on St-Laurent boulevard, one of the most lively and vibrant street in Montreal. Walking distance to many good restaurants, coffee shops, bars, clubs, shopping and services. 15-20 mins walk to Downtown.
notes: No elevator in the building
transit: -The metro Mont-Royal is about a 12 minutes walk.  -There is a taxi stand on the corner.  -You can rent a ''BIXI'' bicycle on the corner.   -Most of the main attractions are walking distance!
access: Make yourself at home! You are welcome to use any appliances and all the essentials in the apartment - Wifi and also an Apple TV
interaction: I'm always on my phone and I check my account religiously. Feel free to contact me for anything, I live near by and will be more then happy to help.
house_rules: #1 - Enjoy your stay and make every moment count! -  Check-in is at 3 pm local time. If the apartment is ready earlier, I’ll let you know. Check-out is at 11AM, but I’d be happy to extend it as long as I don’t have a cleaning scheduled. Just ask:) - Please be respectful - No smoking inside the apartment, you will find a can with sand on the balcony.  - Please remove your shoes when you get in the house. - No loud parties or excessive noise, we don't want to have problems with the neighbours.  - Please do not leave dirty dishes in the sink to add to the normal cleaning of the apartment. There's a dishwasher and also you will find little pack of dishwasher detergent under the sink! - Extra will be charged for any damage, excessive cleaning or unauthorized late check-out.   - Don't forget rule #1. Thank you in advance!

reviews.comments: Everything was very smooth, as accurate as the pictures. Antoine was available to answer questions before we arrive to Montreal. The apartment was comfortable, great location ( full of restaurants, shops, etc.) and had all items to make you feel like home, the free coffee was an extra touch

Very easy to get to, and in a great location. Antoine was a great host, making sure we had everything we needed even though he wasn't in town. When the air conditioner stopped working, a replacement was promptly brought in. The apartment itself was very clean when we arrived.

The apartment is very well situated. Close to many restaurants, bars, Mont Royal, cafes and pharma prix . Antoine was a lovely and accommodating host, I would certainly recommend him. He responded to messages quickly, was very flexible with check out times and the place is very accurately described in the listing. Thank you Antoine!
Every was good and match the description! Antoine was super accommodating.

Wonderful spot in an awesome area. Lots to do. Antoine was very accomodating and always tthere to answer questions.  Clean spot. Stored out luggage for us the day we checked out until we had to go to the airport.

It was great staying at Antoine's place for the week we were there. The location is good -- a bit far from the metro system, but we happened to stay during the week of Mural making it a really busy and exciting street to stay on. The space itself was decent with three rooms, one bath, and a kitchen. There is no sofa and the air conditioning was limited to the heat pump in the kitchen, but overall a great bang for your buck and a pleasant stay. Antoine was very pleasant, responsive, helpful, and accommodating.

Spent 4 days at Antoine's place and it was great! Close to some really good restaurants such as Schwartz, Romados, and patati patata. Antoine was great with keeping the lines of communication open. the only that's really missing is a couch in the common area.

Great location! Right in the heart of the action and close to everything else. The apt was a good size, nice and clean, with everything we needed. Antoine was very fast to reply to any questions I had about the booking. Very happy with this spot and would definitely recommend staying here.

Our stay was fantastic. The location was absolutely perfect with everything being a short walk away. The appartment was clean and was quite spacious for our group of 5. The neighbourhood is just wonderful and we would definately come back again.

Good stay at Antoine's place. The apartment is very well located close to a lot of the best restaurants and bars in Montreal and walking distance to many sights. Perfect place and well priced for those who need 3 bedrooms and plan to mostly use the apartment for sleeping. As stated in the description, there isn't a living room but there is a large tv and table with chairs in the kitchen area. Air conditioning only in the kitchen but will partially cool bedrooms if you leave all doors open (there are fans in each room, two rooms have windows that open, one just a skylight). Antoine is very helpful, we needed a parking spot for the weekend and he let us take the one he was in (free Friday-Sunday).

Place was exactly like the photos.  Location was very convenient.  The most important thing for my family and I was that the apartment was clean.  I didn't meet Antoine but he left a detail message of how to get into the apartment.  A very good first experience with Airbnb.

Bonus: Netflix was available

Perfect neighborhood and easy to get around from there using subways/cabs. Also had a lockbox for the keys which made it really easy for us to get in and out when we weren't together. By a ton of restaurants and shops, can't really go wrong. Prompt communication and he was normally in the area if we had real pressing issues.

Very good location and a was cozy apt. In the very surprising hot days at Montreal the aircon at the kitchen was not sufficient to cool the whole apt. Antoine was a very good host quickly helping on any issue. I'd surely recommend. Don't miss the all-you-can-eat No1 Sushi close by...

It's not exactly luxurious, but that's OK. The beds were fine, the WiFi was good, and the location is perfect. The front door opens right out onto St. Laurent, and you can walk to Schwartz's and all kinds of bars in minutes. The only strange thing to note is that the toilet is oddly close to an angled wall, so you can't really sit with your legs straight. All in all, if you're just looking for somewhere to come back and crash after a night of drinking, this place fits the bill.

Antoine is a good communicator, and will address your questions. Convenient location and 2 decent sized rooms, the 3rd is a bit squished and lacks natural light. The air conditioner in the kitchen works well and if you leave the bedroom doors open it helps a lot for hot nights. Fine for a short stay and if you are there to only tour the town, but no sofa or anything to chill out on.

Great location in the bustling heart of the Plateau. Three bedroom set-up very convenient. Blvd Saint-Laurent vibrant and full of bars and restaurant that are especially lively on weekend. Perfect communication with Antoine
Great location. The lockbox containing the keys were very helpful for our large group. The apartment was clean and tidy, basic, but exactly what we needed.

This apartment is very conveniently located - a five minute walk to the base of Mont-Royal, thirty-five minute stroll to the river, you'll be surrounded by shops and cafes of every sort, and the residents of Montreal struck me as pleasant, patient, and engaging.

Our host immediately responded to any question or request and could not have been more helpful.

The stairway is a bit of a chore to negotiate and there is a bar below that caters to enthusiastic sports fans so if the game goes late you can hear their responses to great plays and bad calls.

The kitchen area functions well, there is a good shower, and having a washer and dryer unit is great!

I personally find the gray paint in the stairway and the white walls of the all the rooms drab and boring, but that seems to be the norm for rental real estate. All in all the apartment served me well and our host was a charm.

Antoines place was lovely, very clean and cozy. 10 minute walk to the Plateau, so very close to shops and restaurants. We got comfortable quite quick, perfect for a small group of friends or multiple family members. My friends and I had a wonderful stay!
Great location, Pereira very flexible and accommodated us well on arrival, great spot to have a group
舒适的三居室,三个人出差,所以选了这家里工作地点比较近的公寓,离超市和各种餐厅也不远,位置极佳｡厨房用具,洗衣机和烘干机等各项设备很全,WiFi也很快,从出差角度来讲性价比很不错｡美中不足的是可能因为是老房子,地板稍微有些倾斜了,如果对这方面特别在意的话不建议预订,除此之外都很好,尤其是钥匙盒很方便,这样多人出行的时候大家可以单独行动｡
Great place, great location, great space , the place is must recommended if you wanna explore the nightlife
He was very helpful! Easy to contact.
Absolutely PERFECT... can not say enough good things about it...  we will be back!!!

From booking to check in to check out, this airbnb experience was seamless. Host is friendly and accommodating, thoughtfully and proactively kept in touch prior to check in. The place itself is amazing...we couldn't believe how close it was to everything. Clean, bright and spacious. Will definitely stay here again!
Can't beat the location. Easy access downtown and the host is very easy going and easy to reach. Lots of restaurants right next to the apartment.
Location could not be any better. Place is simple, but functional and clean, and the price very reasonable. Would definitely book again next time.
The apartment was very clean and has a great location!
Nice location. A bit noisy. The place was not as clean as I expected.

Antoine's apartment is the perfect place to stay if you are traveling in a larger group and looking to check out Montreal. It is very centrally located in the Plateau neighborhood and also very close to Parc du Mont Royal. I would 100% stay here again if traveling to Montreal.  It was exactly as advertised.
Very clean and great location - wonderful experience overall!
Great space

This is located right in the heart of st Laurent.  Amazing location..   Better than expected.  Easy access to everything you need.  Antoine was a great host.  Only downfall would be that the building and floor in the unit are not level and very uneven.  Be careful walking up the stairs!  Overall it was great.  I would definitely recommend and stay here again!

Great 3 bedrooms really well placed. Host was really responsive and answered to all our requests promptly.
I recommend this apartment and would come back with no hesitation!
Just as described! Clean and great location.

The location is great and within walking distance shops and restaurants. A large apartment, easily big enough for 6 adults. Kitchen could use a little upgrade and some comfortable seating in living area would also help. A great functional base for people who intend to be out exploring a lot, not so great for spending a night in.

A terrific place for seeing a lot of Montreal. Really close and accessible to Mont Royal for walks, close to tons of neat restaurants both on St. Laurent and surrounding neighbourhoods. Walkable to downtown or Vieux Montreal if your game, or there is a Bixi bike rental right behind. 

We stayed there with 3 kids and 2 adults and there was lots of space and the amenities were just what we needed. 

Just a heads up if you are mobility limited, it's two flights of stairs up and no elevator. Wasn't an issue for us but could be for others.

This is a great value and it's accurate based on the description. The location is convenient and we received two sets of keys which made a huge difference. The appliances were a bonus as well as the balcony. Definitely enough space for 6 of us. Highly recommended!
Amazing location!  Has everything you need for a fun getaway w/ friends.
Nice little apartment. Approx 30 mins walk from Montreal centre. Lovely bars/restaurants nearby.
Perfect for a little weekend getaway with a few friends. Centrally located. Good price. Couldn't ask for much more.
Près de tout
很好

Excellent accommodations with a great and very responsive host. Very clean and spacious accommodations, everything you could ask for at a wonderful price! 

Will definitely stay here again.
Nice flat in a trendy neighbourhood.

Great bang for your buck. Very close to great food spots. Easy check in and check out. Everything we needed in terms of essentials (shampoo, plates,forks, spoons, cups) all ready to be used. Great place, would be more than happy to come again.
There is a good location, but if you are with kids or elder people, sit on a 2nd floor with really small stairs. so if you have big/heavy luggage its difficult to climb
perfect as a home-base for exploring montreal. washer+dryer in the room was a huge bonus.
Great place for a weekend in Montreal.
Excellent location close to downtown Montreal!
Nice and convenient place! There are some restaurants and stores near the house.
Awesome location! I would highly recommend it!
Logement très bien situé. Par contre la cuisine n'était pas très propre. Il manquait une éponge. De plus les voisins de pallier étaient très bruyant.
Cet appartement est correct, il est bien situé dans Montréal.

What a fantastic spot! Bright and clean..... and close to everything. The kitchen was nicely stocked with everything you need to cool a meal. The beds were comfortable and even though the windows face the street you don’t hear a sound! Right in the middle of everything - great neighbourhood.  Lots of options for a late night Sunday dinner.... and great coffee shops too. Check in and out was very easy!

This place at Le Plateau is perfect. Close from bus and metro. Near from a supermarket, liquor store  and so many other stuff.  So walkable.  
Sparkling clean and really good space for 4 people. 
I would definitely book again!  And pretty soon I hope cuz I've really loved Montreal.
Great place in an awesome location!

Amazing location!!!! Comfy beds!! Fully stocked kitchen!! It was a very nice place. The only issue we faced was the floor was slanted, which really isn’t much of a problem but it caught us off guard. Other than that everything was perfect and exactly as described.

Antoine’s unit on St. Laurent Boulevard is perfect if you’re traveling with a friend, with two bedrooms and a nice little room with a sofa, as well as an Apple TV and a kitchen with a washer and dryer included. It also has a small balcony around back that faces adjacent units’ balconies.

Antoine ensured a clean apartment, and allowed us to not only check in very early but also allowed us to stay a little later than check out. His responses were prompt and courteous. A great room for exploring Montreal or just spending a week. Restaurants and bars are within minutes of walking, and the famous Schwartz smoked meat is just a block or so away. 

Overall great location, great host and a great price! What more could you ask for?
The place was perfect, and the location was a great suprise since we paid so little i didnt expect to be on such a bussiling road! Thanks so much to antoine for everything.

Very nice apartment with a lot of light and a little terrace. Great location but a lot of noise during the night. Antoine was answering very quickly and handled a problem with the back door very quickly too! There is no condiments, it is something to note before coming  We had a very nice stay!

L'appartement est très bien situé et à proximité de tout. Nous avons tout fait à pied toute la fin de semaine. Par contre, je conseille de vous apporter des bouchons pour dormir puisque les chambres sont du côté de la rue et la proximité des bars font en sorte qu'il y a beaucoup de bruits la nuit.
Sinon tout était parfait, je recommande cet appartement.
Great place, clean and comfortable. Quick responses from the host. And the location can't be beat! Perfect :)
Il est inadmissible que ce logement soit sur le site AIRBNB !!!!
Great location! Host was very helpful with check-in! Amazing trip!
Was really good
Great, spacious apartment on top floor with lots of light and two decent-sized bedrooms. Lively location, perfect for exploring the mountain & Plateau on foot.

The apartment is simple and ok. But, we don’t like the location. Maybe it is good for young people, but not suitable for family. There is a busy street in front of the apartment, and many bars on the street open the entire night. You could hear a lot of noises from cars, people hanging out late in the bars. Hard to sleep all the night. The neighbors are most likely young people, keeping making noise and party until late night...

fantastic location, right next to great restaurants and vintage shops. easy to walk to just about everything. post was very responsive, and check in / check out was a breeze. the apartment itself is minimally furnished, but has all the essentials, which was more than adequate for us. the main living room area is well air-conditioned, unfortunately the bedrooms were not, leaving them feeling stuffy, especially when the doors are closed. each of the rooms did have a fan inside of them, but barely felt cool directly pointing the fan at us. one particular note that people should be aware of is having to walk up two flights of narrow stairs to get to the apartment. overall though, great value for the location.
Great location, near many restaurants and bars. Host was very helpful and responded quickly. Great job.
Great location.
Great location, lots going on around to check out. Very easy check-in, and the place was spacious and very clean.

The apartment is just as depicted in the photos and the description.  It was spotlessly clean.  I love the location right on St. Laurent Blvd.:  Convenient to restaurants, small grocery stores and the bus (#55) that runs to downtown.  Also, a taxi stand is less than half a block away, so getting back to the airport is no problem at all.  The host was super responsible and helpful.
Nota bene, any traveler with mobility issues:  The staircase to this third floor apartment is steep with very narrow steps, quite manageable for the healthy and agile among us...  However, if you are unsteady on your feet for any reason, consider one of Gestion88’s other offerings in the neighborhood.
The apartment was clean and well equipped. The location is awesome, near tons of bars and restaurants. Quite noisy at night as the windows face the very busy St-Laurent street.
Clean space on lovely Saint Laurent street. Wonderful location! Thanks for hosting us.

Propre, facile d’arriver. Pour les très grands, les pieds de lits peuvent gêner. L’air climatisé ne se rend pas vraiment aux chambres mais au moins la nôtre avait une fan. Éclairage intense et froid. Super emplacement du logement. Pensez à emmener un cache-yeux pour dormir si la lumière vous dérange car l’une des fenêtres est intérieure et donne sur les escaliers qui sont constamment éclairés.
Great location. Lots of great shops and restaurants. The street was pedestrian only during our stay! Great vibe. Plus, there is a secret bar close by...
Nice spot, good location, super clean.
The airbnb was clean, comfortable, affordable, and in a great location. Walkable to Old Montreal and very close to restaurants, shops, bars, etc. I would stay here again.
The apartment is so comfortable and clean with a good location, the bus stop is near there. We've had a good time in Montreal.
The location could not be better. Place is larger than expected. Antoine is a very responsive host.
Stay here, I did and I loved it!
Great location and the check in was very easy. Apartment a little run down but no major problems. Would stay there again.

Great location, apt needs a few things like lamps in bedrooms, curtains and tv in a rm where it can be watched in comfort.  Pls add the sweep to the door so there is no gap to let cold air and mice in.
C'est bien et propre! L'emplacement est idéal pour faire des activités.
Nice place, have everything u need, good location..all very good

Amazing place and price for the location. Super cute set up with lots of room(kitchen, dining, living). It came with all the amenities you need. The host was really generous with letting us check in early and late when needed.
The location is amazing. Close to many great restaurants, bars and a 25 minute walk to the artes place. The apartment is clean and as pictured. Host is very responsive too. Would recommend to others!

Muy buena ubicación 
Gracias
Clean apartment in a very convenient location!
The place was very clean and bigger than what's shown on the pictures. It's in a great location if your into the nightlife, all the bars were located on the block. Enjoyed my stay in Montreal.
The place is bigger than what it looks. It was very clean. We had more amenities than I expected. Check-in was very simple. Location is perfect. Amazing Airbnb would definitely stay again!
Very nice place in a great location! Thanks!

name: Sunny Courtyard Apartment - Sydney
summary: Waterloo apartment located 4kms from Sydney's CBD and 10-15 minutes by taxi from Sydney airport. Direct bus route to CBD and Eastern Suburbs beaches. 10 mins walk to Green Square Train Station and Airport Line. Perfect for city getaways and exploring the City.  Walking distance to Allianz Stadium and SCG for sporting, concerts and other events (1.5kms). Lots of cafes and restaurants surrounding the complex plus a Coles. 10 mins walk to trendy Surry Hills and East Village Zetland.
space: Sunny 1 bedroom apartment, great outdoor space with seating and BBQ, Foxtel, fully air-conditioned and serviced.  Queen size bed for guests. Awesome space for weekends and exploring all that Sydney has to offer.
description: Waterloo apartment located 4kms from Sydney's CBD and 10-15 minutes by taxi from Sydney airport. Direct bus route to CBD and Eastern Suburbs beaches. 10 mins walk to Green Square Train Station and Airport Line. Perfect for city getaways and exploring the City.  Walking distance to Allianz Stadium and SCG for sporting, concerts and other events (1.5kms). Lots of cafes and restaurants surrounding the complex plus a Coles. 10 mins walk to trendy Surry Hills and East Village Zetland. Sunny 1 bedroom apartment, great outdoor space with seating and BBQ, Foxtel, fully air-conditioned and serviced.  Queen size bed for guests. Awesome space for weekends and exploring all that Sydney has to offer. Guests will enjoy full access to the apartment and recreational facilities - including gym, pool and spa. Free parking onsite - with prior notice. Guests will enjoy their stay without interruption - but we can be available for any questions or local tips. We love Waterloo because it's so close to the C
neighborhood_overview: We love Waterloo because it's so close to the CBD and it's one of Sydney's most dog-friendly neighbourhoods! Walking distance to Surry Hills and flanked by several transport options, Waterloo is the ideal location for exploring Sydney.
notes: The apartment is part of an every day living complex so please respect the comfort of our neighbours by keeping noise to a respectable level.  Thanks.
transit: Transport options include bus (stop across the road) and train (Green Square station is 10 minutes stroll). Taxi and Uber also regularly available.
access: Guests will enjoy full access to the apartment and recreational facilities - including gym, pool and spa. Free parking onsite - with prior notice.
interaction: Guests will enjoy their stay without interruption - but we can be available for any questions or local tips.

host.host_about: Corporate Travller

name: 2 BR Queen Size Sunny - Nolita
summary: Beautiful 2br Queen beds in the heart of NYC! Exposed brick, granite counters, hardwood floors, tile kitchen and bath, tons of sunlight and literally close to everything - Nolita is easily the best NYC experience possible!
space: 4 people sleep comfortably in 2 quiet queen size bedrooms in the heart of New York City.
description: Beautiful 2br Queen beds in the heart of NYC! Exposed brick, granite counters, hardwood floors, tile kitchen and bath, tons of sunlight and literally close to everything - Nolita is easily the best NYC experience possible! 4 people sleep comfortably in 2 quiet queen size bedrooms in the heart of New York City. Concierge Service! You will have exclusive access to our very own concierge services. John-Paul is your dedicated New York City concierge with over 10 years of experience and will help you with tickets to shows, restaurant reservations, museums, tour packages, and anything you can possibly imagine while you stay here in the greatest city in the world! His excellent services are included in your rate at no extra cost whatsoever. Details upon arrival. *Air conditioning  *Fresh linens and towels  *Fully equipped kitchen  *Coffee maker *Free Wifi  *TV  *Close to all subway stations  *Hair Dryer  *Iron and Ironing Board The apartment is right next door to beautiful Old St. Patrick's C
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right next door to beautiful Old St. Patrick's Cathedral and perfectly situated with access to ALL subway lines making it easy to get anywhere in this fabulous city. Supermarkets & Whole Foods nearby as well as cafes and other places to eat and drink. Literally right above Emporio which is a Michelin rated restaurant.
transit: Very easy access to almost all subways
access: Concierge Service! You will have exclusive access to our very own concierge services. John-Paul is your dedicated New York City concierge with over 10 years of experience and will help you with tickets to shows, restaurant reservations, museums, tour packages, and anything you can possibly imagine while you stay here in the greatest city in the world! His excellent services are included in your rate at no extra cost whatsoever. Details upon arrival. *Air conditioning  *Fresh linens and towels  *Fully equipped kitchen  *Coffee maker *Free Wifi  *TV  *Close to all subway stations  *Hair Dryer  *Iron and Ironing Board
house_rules: Quiet after 11p - no pets - smoking outdoors

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: My name is Brendan. I am an artist and a musician. I own my own digital display advertising company. And I love to share my beautiful NYC apartment with cool people!

reviews.comments: A colleague and I stayed for two weeks and the apartment worked wonderfully for us. Nicely located and Brendan made everything very easy.

The apartment is fantastic - a wonderful location with great bars and restaurants on the doorstep, it looks great and has everything we needed including 2 proper double BRs. Brendan was a brilliant host - very quick at replying to any question we had and really helpful. A great experience all round.

BEST NYC HOLIDAY EVER!!! We stayed in Brendan flat for 5 days at the end of March and cannot fault our host or his flat. From the moment we made the booking, Brendan has been unbelievably helpful pointing us in the right direction to make the most of our time in NYC. His warm and well appointed apartment is perfectly located, you could not ask for a more eclectic mix of restaurants, bars, bakeries and shops. Cherry on the cake there are 3 subway stations minutes away in case you are not an uber traveller. 5 star experience all- round.
Lovely apartment in a great location! Brendan was very helpful and flexible throughout. Highly recommended!

Brendan was a great host!  He was very accommodating, and responded very quickly by text.  We met Brendan in the restaurant on the ground floor of his apartment, and walked us through everything.  The size of the apartment was perfect for our group of two couples with two small babies.  Of note, his place is a third floor walkup, which didn't bother us but could be an issue for others.
The location couldn't be better - in the heart of the village...wonderful shops, restaurants, coffee shop across the street, minutes away from Little Italy and Chinatown, and two blocks from the subway station.  We are already talking about when we will be returning for our next NYC visit.
Great flat, superb location and Brendan was very helpful. Can thoroughly recommend!
The aparment was great and the location was very good also. It was clean and everything worked. I definetely recommend it.

This is a great apartment in a great location! It is a perfect home base to explore all of NYC. Brendan is a wonderful host and flexible even when our schedule changed. I will book again when I return.

Brendan est un hôte attentionné qui s'assure que tout soit bien prêt pour accueillir ses invités. Toujours disponible et prompt à répondre aux questions, c'était un stress en moins que de préparer le voyage et d'arriver à New York pour 10 jours.
Son appartement est vraiment confortable, bien équipé et vraiment bien situé dans Nolita, un quartier de Manhattan fourmillant d'activité le soir et donc propice aux sorties. L'appartement est d'ailleurs situé juste au dessus d'un excellent restaurant : L'Emporio.
Je recommande vivement !

Brendan was super accommodating and a very helpful host. Even before arriving, he was very responsive and helpful when we had any questions about the place. His place is very nice and clean, and close to many subway stations. There are a ton of good cafes, bars, and restaurants close by as well. We would definitely book again with Brendan if we do come back to New York again.

Brendan was the perfect host!  His apartment was exactly as pictured.  It was large (by NYC standards), clean and very comfortable.  He was quick to respond to all communications.  He was also friendly and flexible.  I would stay there again if I find myself in NYC in the future!
Brendam nos ofreció su casa como si fuéramos amigos y nos hizo sentir como en casa. Un buen anfitrión!!
Really dice location, matching the expectations. A lot of nice restaurants around with the subway just around the corner,

As advertised - great neighborhood, very central to all points in the city. The apartment was clean, the meet-up was easy, the owner professional. The apartment is located on the 4th floor of a walk-up, which is pretty normal for nyc. Just something to be aware of in the event that you aren't comfortable with stairs for any reason.

We loved staying at Brendan's place in Nolita.   The neighborhood is terrific - we enjoyed the cupcake bakery, wine bar, and hipster coffee shop right on our block!  The apartment worked out great, no complaints, Brendan made the check in/out process smooth. We would definitely rent this apartment again.

We truly had amazing time in New York during stay in Brendan's apartment. Location was perfect. Everything was as advertised. Unfortunately we were not able to meet Brendan in person but he was in contact with us through airbnb so everything went smoothly. All in all if we go back we would choose again Brendan's apartment. Great experience all together :)
great location! we loved the neighborhood, excellent place for visit NY, clean and beautiful apartment. Brendan was very helpful and easy to locate when we needed. Highly recommended.
Stor fleksibilitet i forhold til ind og udtjekning
Appartement bien et confortable, bien situé à manathan dans un quartier bien sympa, métro à proximité... À recommander

We had a great stay at Brendan's apartment. It's a roomy apartment and looks just like the pictures. We loved the neighborhood, very cute with lots of little shops and no trouble catching cabs or walking to the subway. Brendan was very courteous, met us outside and was available and easy to communicate with throughout our stay. The apartment was clean and well kept. The only thing I would say is that remember that it is up three flights of stairs. Some of the people I went with hadn't read the listing well and were surprised, but it didn't bother me. Thank you so much Brendan!

We had a great time staying in Brendan's apartment. location is perfect and he was flexible with picking up the key. 
Apartment was clean And has  air conditioning which we really needed in warm and humid NY.
Only min was that there were only 4 towels for 4 persons for a stay of 5 days and that is not enough, same goes for glasses only 4!

Nice apartment.
Great location.
Close to restaurants, and the subway.
Brendan was very friendly.
He offered to store our luggage the day we checked out, witch gave us 1 extra day in NYC :o)

Brendan is a very helpfull host, présent at 2 AM to open the door and sent the postcards ! the flat is very well located in NY, Nolita is the place to be but it is noisy and one bedroom has no blinds and we were 3 but There were 2 chairs.

L'appartement est idéalement situé au cœur de Nolita, quartier très vivant et très sympathique.
Nous avons apprécié les deux chambres séparées parfaites pour 4 adultes.

Brendan is a fantastic host. He was quite accommodating and flexible around checking in and out. The apartment itself was in a charming area with easily accessible transprotation, was clean and quite sizeable for NYC standards. I would definitely recommend it to any groups traveling through the city.
The apartment was perfect and Brendan was a great host - very responsive and organised. Thanks, we had a great time!

Great location, very cute place, nicely decorated.  Typical New York walk up.  We were moving my son into NYU and had a lot of luggage.  Walking up three flights of stairs was a bit of a challenge but once in the place, it's very comfortable and well appointed.  Would have been fine if we didn't have so much baggage.  Brenden is a good host and had left helpful instructions.

Wir haben dieses Appartment im trendigen Stadtteil Nolita für uns als Familie (2 Erwachsene, 2 Teenager) für 3 Nächte gemietet. Die Gegend ist toll. Restaurants, Bars und Shops - alles in der Nähe. Brendan hat uns einen Late-Arrival sowie Late-Checkout möglich gemacht, so dass wir sehr viel von unserem Aufenthalt hatten. Die Wohnung ist aufgrund der 2 Schlafzimmer sehr gut für 4 Personen geeignet. Brendan hat immer sofort auf Anfragen reagiert und auch unser in der Wohnung vergessenes Handy an zentraler Stelle hinterlegt, so dass wir es wieder abholen konnten. Es war sehr warm in NYC, aber die Klimaanlage hat sehr gut funktioniert. Die zentrale Lage bedingt allerdings auch, dass das Schlafzimmer zur Straße nicht ganz ruhig ist. Aber dafür ist man schließlich auch in Manhattan.

Brendan was an amazing host and had the whole apartment set up before we arrived. I flew in on a redeye and Brendan had the keys ready for me to pickup. The apartment is roomy by NYC standards and there was more than enough room for 4 of us. Nolita is an amazing neighborhood with enough restaurants and bars to visit for a year; plenty of shopping too. The apartment is located on a quiet enough street with central access to 6 and B,D,F,M trains

The apartment is located in a busy and vibrant part of Little Italy and is close to a number of the subway lines. The apartment itself has enough room to use as a place to crash of a night but you fill find that you don't end up spending much time there with everything that is on offer on your doorstep.

In a city where shoe-box hotel rooms are the norm, this place was a nice fit for my work colleague and myself for three days. The apartment is clean, beds and couch are comfortable and having a kitchen is nice even if we didn't use it during our stay. 
Brendan greeted us and walked us up to the flat, and was great at communicating to set up our check-in and stay.  Being on the Lower East Side, right next to Little Italy, it was a short commute downtown, and easily accessible to take the subway to Midtown. Would recommend and stay again.

Our host was responsive and helpful. The apartment was exactly as described! Plenty of room for 4 adults, full bath, clean linens, comfortable beds. Air conditioning in both bedrooms made for a great night's sleep. The best part for us was location, Location, LOCATION! This apartment is in a fantastic neighborhood with restaurants and shopping. But it's access to everywhere from Brooklyn to Soho to nearby subways that can take you where ever you need to go; made it perfect. We'll definitely stay here again!
Perfect location and lovely little flat! We'll sure be back!!

We have enjoyed our 2 weeks stay at Brendan’s place a lot. He is a good host and keeps his promises.
Nolita is a great neighbourhood close to Chinatown and Little Italy with lots of coffee bars, cafes, restaurants, supermarket and metro line at walking distance.
The apartment offers not  a lot of  space in the living room and kitchen for 4 persons but do not forget that you are in New York City. There is television set available which is great in case of a rainy day and the 2 bedrooms give enough room for 4 persons. In summer time the aircondition offers a great welcome when it is getting too hot inside and the wifi connection works perfect.
His place we can recommend strongly to anyone who plans to visit New York.

Great stay at Brendan's place in Nolita. Great location, very clean, and place looks exactly like the pictures. Bars, restaurants, and coffee all just steps away. Fantastic Italian restaurant a few floors below the apartment. 4 male adults in one place for 3 nights and it was perfect for NYC standards. Brendan was always very responsive and also accommodated our odd check in/check out times. Subway near by. Couldn't hear other neighbors, and though there was construction going on outside, the noise from that was only during the day. I would use his place again no question.
Service was prompt and the apartment was fantastic!  Location was key.  Would stay again.  Thanks Brendan!
We had a lot of fun in NYC, cause his apt is amazing ,comfortable and more convenient for traffic. We will have his apt and be his guest again without any question.

Nice flat! The nolita hood is one of the best place to stay and to visit NYC! A lot of restaurants bars surrounded by subway stops...a perfect place. Brendan was here for the check in and stay flexible for the check out time! He answered us in a quick manner to all of our questions or requests. So if you r 4 peoples looking for a great stay in NYC i have to recommend you to get in touch with him!

Apartamento aconsejable, en el centro de la ciudad, cerca de la zona financiera de Manhattan. Quzá un poco pequeño, pero teniendo en cuenta que solo era para dormir y poco más, cumple su función a la perfección, el trato con Brendan fue perfecto, incluso nos permitió dejar las maletas en otro apartamento el día que dejamos el piso.

Muy recomendable para visitar la ciudad, muy bien ubicado.

We had a great time at Brendan's 2 bedroom apartment. He was very accommodating to our party. When we arrived a few hours before check in, and he allowed us to temporarily store our bags so we could get our vacation started. And, he helped us store our bags on the way out if the city too.
 The place is in my favorite part of New York, with tons of restaurants, bars and shopping nearby. I would defiantly stay there again.

Muy buena descripción de lo céntrico y de la organización del departamento. Tuvimos todas las facilidades por parte de Brendan.
El ambiente de los vecinos, y la buena localización del departamento nos ayudó a poder conocer muy bien la ciudad de New York.

Brendans' apartment is great! Located in one of the most interesting neighbourhoods in Manhattan with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants nearby. In addition to this, there is a very good subway connection within 5min walking distance.

We've been there for a week with four people and the apartment was big enough for us!

Great stay, totally recommend it!

Brendan has a very nice apt. within a wonderful neighbourhood. You are very close to everything. The rooms look like displayed at the pictures and the apt. has everything you need for the day. The wifi is pretty good. We have been there with two couples and are completely satisfied.

Tip to travellers: If you get to nyc the first time you can use the free wifi in the subway to contact brendan.
Great experience. Fantastic location and clean space.
Great staying in the best area. Brendan is super nice and flexibable!
Apt was great, Brendan made it easy and was flexible on check in/out times. I would definitely stay there again. Awesome location!

Brendan was great with communication and responded promptly to all questions and messages. We got to NY early, so Brendan allowed us to store our bags at his place until the apartment was ready, and even gave us some tips on great restaurants. Cafe Habana is awesome! He even let us have a late check out. The apartment was clean, spacious, and best of all, quiet. Everything we needed was there and the location cannot be beat! Would definitely recommend!

Four of our friends stayed in Brendan's apartment during Christmas. The apartment is very true to its pictures, clean and comfortable and the neighborhood is great with so many nice restaurants and shops. I would totally recommend this apartment.
Great apartment in a great neighborhood, really close to the subway, chinatown and little italy.  Can't go wrong!

We much appreciated the contact with Brendan right from the start. He was very easy to communicate with. The appartment was terrific and the location excellent. We had splendid days in NY, and I could well imagine returning to this flat on my next visit.

Super appartement! Comme dans la description. On a passé un super moment là-bas. Un point de départ de très bonne qualité pour sillonner New York.

Brendan nous a donné les clés et nous a dit ''Vous êtes chez vous''! Juste parfait et réactif par texto.  

Merci Brendan

Brendan was a terrific host from start to finish.  He was quick to reply,  very accommodating and helpful.  The description was spot on (clean and comfortable) and the location was terrific for our needs.

Brendan's apartment was exactly as pictured. Clean, warm and cozy. The beds were comfortable and the neighborhood was filled with wonderful little cafes and restaurants. Very convenient location. We'd stay here again!

Estuvimos 6 noches en el apartamento de Brendan, el fue muy puntual, siempre dispuesto a apoyar pero respetando privacidad, el apartamento esta muy bien ubicado, dos o tres estaciones del tren muy cercanas, todo de acuerdo a fotos y descripción, muchas gracias Brendan, durante nuestra estancia nos sentimos mas Neoyorkinos que turistas.
The place was clean and conveniently located to lots of good food options nearby.

Brendan was responsive, when i landed early in JFK and reached the apartment before checkin time, Brendan was kind enough to let me leave my luggage with him. The apartment itself is very clean and is in a wonderful location.. this is probably my go to location in Nolita, so look forward to booking again the next time I am in NYC
Brendan was great!  He met me @ midnight to let me in!

It went okay when we stayed in Brendan's apartment. Brendan is a very kind host. However, At the first night, we didn't get hot water and it was repaired till next day's afternoon. Brendan said it was rare though. Before I booked the apt, it said the check out time was flexible. But at the night before we checked out, we were told we had to leave by noon. Maybe I didn't get the definition about flexible check out time. I think that's my fault. Just wanna let the other people who want to stay in the place double check the time with the host even before you book it. Anyway, the staying in NYC was fine. Hope you guys can enjoy the city.

Brendan was a very responsive and attentive host.  He allowed me and my friends to keep our bags at his place until the apartment was ready and answered texts and questions in a super timely manner.  The apt was very clean and comfortable. Gorgeous neighborhood and felt like I was in good hands.  Would definitely stay with Brendan again.

Brendan was a great host. He was very responsive and everything in the apartment matched exactly. Awesome location close to great restaurants and bars. Would definitely consider it for the next time we visit NYC.

The stay here was excellent! A colleague and I needed a place while on business in the city. Brendan was very accommodating with getting us the keys and working with our schedules. The place was clean and spacious by NYC standards. And the price was phenomenal for a two bedroom! Great location too. Checkout was a breeze.

Nolita is one of the best areas in Manhattan. It is close to everything- walking distance to many special places. But still an original area. The houses are low, the restaurants and bars intimate and the people nice. Brendans place is right in the center of everything and when you are "home", you´ve got everything you need: a nice kitchen/living room and two VERY  separate bedrooms. You can stay here with snoring friends, and don´t be disturbed. It is on the 4th floor and the only thing I missed was a lift. There is a very nice restaurant and a cool bar in the same building. Both worth a visit.

Best location in NYC! Nolita is so trendy and relaxed at the same time in a combined urban coolness :-) We loved our stay in Brendan's apparent were we felt very welcome. Very nice that the two bedrooms are separated by the living room making them both private. The beds a so comfy - real nice after a long flight :-) Btw: The Italian restaurant downstairs (Emporio) is quite good.

Brendan was an incredible host. I don't think I can fully explain how this past weekend was such a wonderful trip and huge part of that is because of Brendan and this apartment. I have been to NYC a few times before and this was by far the best place I've stayed. He quickly responded to every question we had and truly made us feel welcome. A friend of mine ended up getting to the city earlier than the rest of us and he made sure she had a place to put her bags until we arrived. The apartment became a home away from home and was a perfect location for us for all that we wanted to do. There also were some incredible restaurants and shops in the area if you wanted to go somewhere nearby. I will recommend Brendan's listing to any friend I know coming to NYC.

We had a great stay at Brendan's place. The location is great and Brendan was very helpful in accommodating our early arrival by keeping our luggage with him. The apartment was clean and as pictured. We did not spend a lot of time in it during the day but we slept very well during the two nights we were there. Definitely a place to come back to.

The location for the apartment is perfect. There is a lot of very nice bars and restaurent in the neighbourhood. The condition of the apartment is fine and it was clean. The size of the apartment is perfect for 2 couples. Brendan was very helpful. It was especially nice that the check-in and check-out was flexible.
Great place to stay, Great guy, very helpfull. Everything perfect.
Great time in Brendan flat! The position is very good and the apartment is very nice. Absolutely recommended if you wish to stay in Manhattan!!!
We had a wonderful time and this place was perfect.  Great location and immaculate.  We will definitely try to stay on our next visit to NYC.

We arrived much earlier than we had planned but Brendan graciously let us in to drop our bags while apt. was being prepared for us. The two bedrooms are at opposite ends and both were very clean and comfortable. Great restaurants nearby. This is an amazing location and I would definitely stay again!

Brendan a été très accueillant, disponible et flexible. On a pu laisser nos bagages le temps que l'appartement soit prêt.
L'appartement est conforme à la description, très propre et très bien agencé. Sa situation géographique est un gros plus afin de visiter la ville (très proche du quartier financier, chinois et italien), de plus plusieurs stations de métro sont très proches. 
Mention spéciale au sujet du confort des lits.

Pour résumer : hôte génial, appartement génial, ville géniale.

Brendan was very nice and helpful. We were able to leave baggage with him hours before check in. Apartment very nice, exactly as described in add. 
Neighborhood great, all in walking distance.

Very nice stay in Brendan's appartment in an incredible area of New-York :Near everything and the place to be for entertainment and shopping . 
The appartement is cosy and the two bedrooms very independant and confortable .

The apartment was awesome and suited the 3 of us perfectly. Brendan was friendly & helpful. The location couldn't have been better. We were so central to everywhere. The only downside was the building construction work taking place next door which starts at 7am. Would definitely stay again.

Easy 'hand over' of keys and a comfortable apartment in a great location. 

Thank you Brendan

The location was great. Easy to access the subway. Loved the markets of Chinatown, just blocks South and Little Italy.  Place was small for 2 kids in their early 20's and 2 adults. Very small bathroom.  Be prepared to walk 3 flights of stairs. Brendan was available to us if we needed him.

The location of the apartment is excellent.  It's in the middle of everything or close to subway or walking distance to wherever you need to be in the village.  The location is quiet enough for our babies to sleep and for us to sleep soundly.  

The apartment itself is up 3 flights of stairs which are a little run down.  It was clean (kitchen except stove top had grease which was wiped off easily and bathroom) however the floor was unswept and the sheets had stray hairs on them, maybe from laundromat driers.  The apartment consists of two rooms with the kitchen small living and small bathroom with bath inbetween.

Overall it was a ok stay however cleanliness could be improved.  Thanks!

Brendan was a terrific host! We arrived early so he let us store our bags in his place before the Airbnb was ready. He is great with communicating and was readily available if we had any questions or needed additional supplies (which we did not end up needing). The place itself was very nice. It was in a fantastic location. Very central to everything. I would definitely stay here again!

Great spot to stay so much within walking distance, food, bars, shopping. Subway 5 mins walk and easy to use, maps available and could get to a lot of the well known spots. Once we arrived Brendan very easy to contact & met us with extra supplies, thanks for help with suitcases. Apartment very neat & tidy we didn't spend a lot of time "in" plenty of towels and other buts & pieces. Would definitely recommend. Thanks for a great experience.
Excellent spot, lovely host

Staying at brendans Appartement was awesome ! We stayed there for three nights to see New York City and the location and the neighborhood was perfect to get everywhere very quick and reach great dinner places. Also Brendan was very nice and opened. He gave us a great offer to store our luggage at the last day till the afternoon when we departured from New York. Anytime again!

Brendan did everything possible to make this a good trip for my family.  We had travel problems (thanks Amtrak!) and were thus four hours late, with Brendan waiting to give us keys.  He made sure we were able to get in easily, which was a relief after a LONG train trip with two kids.  The place itself served perfectly as a home base for some quick touring of the city, in a neighborhood filled with good places to eat.  I'd recommend this place to anyone.

Die Kommunikation im Vorfeld und auch bei der Ankunft war perfekt. Er ist sofort gekommen und hat uns die Schlüssel gegeben und uns kurz das Wichtigste erklärt. Wunderbar. Die Wohnung war wie beschrieben: sauber, klein aber sehr schön eingerichtet und für vier Personen vollkommen ausreichend. Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit in New York!

This place was perfect!  My mother, sister, and I were in town for a quick weekend trip.  The place totally suited our needs.  The neighborhood is very quiet, and everyone I interacted with was very nice.  Brendan was a great host and made sure we had everything we needed, very friendly guy who didn't mind getting random text questions:)  Anything you want or need is within a block; Whole Foods is about a 5 minute walk.  I was being adventurous and took the Air Tran and subway and it took me an hour to get there from JFK.  Mom and sister trained to Penn and it was about a 20 minute cab ride from there.  I would totally stay here again!

Brendan was so helpful and his apartment was perfect. Wonderful location and Brendan's restaurant recommendations were all very fantastic. Brendan was very flexible and even let us drop our bags at his apartment before check in. I would highly recommend this place to anyone traveling in a small group or just looking for a fun neighborhood to experience while in NY.  Thank you Brendan for a wonderful time !!

Joli appartement agréable très bien situé dans un quartier sympathique. Stations de métro à proximité. Salle de bain fonctionnelle. La climatisation d'une des chambres est bruyante. C'est une très bonne expérience.

Brendan was on top of the communication with us throughout.  Flat was a bit smaller than what it looked like in the pictures - very narrow but good sized bed rooms.   This place is all about LOCATION.  Nolita is the place to be.  Kitchenette was adequate with basic necessities.   Construction next door was noisy throughout the day during the week, quiet on the weekends.  Looks like construction will continue for several months (large condo project).
Nice area. Good space for 2 couples

I would highly recommend Brendan's place because of its location. Subway stations are really close by as well as must-go chinese restaurants. My family and I were able to go visit places in the morning, come back at noon for a short nap, and continue our visit in the afternoon. BTW, the place is also right next to soho for those who like to shop.

To guest: If you still hesitate, don't please! I took several weeks to choose the place in Manhattan, finally i was lucky to stay here! Brendan is very good host and he love to help the guest as possible as he can. The apartment is very good which locate in the heart of Manhattan, just 2 minutes to every subway station. I want to emphasis one of advantage of the room, the two BR was separated by a living room which keep the privacy, if you stay with your friends, that is really good. 

To Brendan, we had amazing time in NYC, appreciate so much for your place!
Great location and great apartment. Central to subway, restaurants and bars. Brendan was there to greet us and give us helpful tips. Two good sized bedrooms with air con.

Brendan was a great host! We got to New York pretty early in the morning and he let us leave our bags in the apartment while it was finishing being cleaned. We really enjoyed where the apartment was located and it was close to a lot of sight-seeing and the subway. The space was a nice size and the beds were very comfortable. I would definitely suggest staying here while in New York!
Great, comfortable place in a vibrant location of Manhattan. As advertised- would highly recommend.

Everything went great during our stay here. Arrived to a clean apartment. Brendan was quick to get us inside and give us the tour and let us know how to get in and out of the location. He checked in during out stay to make sure we had everything we needed. 

It's close to several popular dining spots and also close to other excellent choices you may not be aware of. Also, very quick to subways to get around town.

Brendan was also helpful in giving us some additional ideas on things to check out while in town. 

Overall, this made my first visit to NYC a very good experience. Thanks!
Brendan was great! very friendly and accommodating.  The apartment was in a great location and surrounded by great restaurants.

Brendan was incredibly responsive and supportive. He catered to all our needs incl. storage of our luggage even many hours after check-out. His place is perfectly located in Nolita very close to a number of cool bars, restaurants and nice shops. Current construction works in the backyard made it a bit noisy but the flat with its two full-blown bed-rooms can generally be highly recommended for a stay in the heart of Manhattan.
Great place and host.

The neighbourhood was awesome. We were in the Center of all of the areas of New York that we wanted to visit. Greenwich village, east village, soho, little Italy, were all within walking distance.  If we wanted to go anywhere else in New York, the subway was very easy to use and stations were only a few blocks away. The apartment was nice and we were able to stay with another married couple comfortably. Great experience!

Brendan var en god og opmærksom vært og bor lige om hjørnet. Han var  hurtig til at svare og gav gode anvisninger/forslag. Det var et fedt område med alt hvad vi havde brug for -  subway, spisesteder og shopping- puha dyrt :-)
Appartement trés bien placé dans le quartier que nous souhaitions. Bon acceuil.

Brendan was a wonderful host! Our flight arrived early in the morning and he let us keep our bags at his apt until our rental was ready. He also hauled one of our heaviest bags over while we were out to lunch at a wonderful Italian eatery that he recommended in the neighborhood. The apt was exactly as pictured and was clean and had all the amenities we needed. He was quick to respond to any questions via text. 
We all really enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back to Brendan's place!

L'appartement était parfaitement situé dans un quartier riche en bonnes adresses, petits commerces et restaurants. Plusieurs stations / lignes de métro à proximité vous permettent de vous rendre n'importe où en ville. L'appartement était très propre et meublé avec goût. Les lits confortables. Un seul bémol : dans une des chambres, le chauffage était très bruyant.
This place was great! Walking distance to East Village, Lower East Side, Little Italy, Chinatown and more. Would stay here again!

Party of 4, stayed for 3 nights. Great apartment, exactly as described. Comfy beds. Lovely location in lower manhattan, just a couple of blocks across from Broadway. 10-15 min subway ride uptown to Times Square, Bryant Park etc from Prince St or Spring St stations. Very small bathroom but wasn't a problem at all. 3 flights of stairs and no elevator which I struggled with being pregnant but I was also aware of this before our stay. Very cosy apartment, we spent very little time here as we were out and about. Would be a squeeze to all watch Tv or eat in the apartment but I doubt many people would be doing that anyway if visiting on a city break. Wasn't an issue for us as we always ate out. I would definitely recommend this apartment. Brendan was really friendly and easy to contact, fast to respond.
Brendan was an excellent host who was very quick when answering sms. The place was tidy with two proper bedrooms. The neighborhood was perfect with lots of restaurants and small shops.

Brendan was extremely responsive both before and during our stay. His place is in a perfect location- near the Kool areas like Soho and the Village but also near multiple subway stations to help you get around. I think you get a much more authentic NYC experience staying here than in a hotel. Beds are comfortable-- and just a great place!

Good location, good assistence, little bathroom, 
A little difficult to have dinner for 4 people in the dining room

Our train arrived at Penn Station at 8:45 AM.  Our room wasn't going to be free until about 2 PM, which is totally reasonable.  We were worried about what to do with all our suitcases, but Brendan allowed us to store them at his personal residence, a short walk from the rental.  That saved us a lot of money and time, and freed us up to get out and tour the city.  On our departure day, he again let us store our baggage at his place after checkout.  We toured the Met, then went and got dinner in Little Italy, which is just a couple blocks from Brendan's place.  Everything was just super convenient and easy to work with.  Brendan is cheerful, helpful, easy-going.  The room was clean and comfortable, and plenty spacious.  Highly recommended for a great experience in NYC!

Brendan was a great host! His apartment was clean and well kept. He was very accommodating and helpful during our stay. His place is close to a subway stop which was very convenient. Overall a great experience and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again!

Fantastic location in the heart of Nolita, close to Little Italy and Chinatown and so many great restaurants, bars and boutiques. An easy walk to the Spring St subway.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

We stayed for 4 nights at Brendan's place. Everything was nice and ready at our arrival, Brendan was available, quick to answer and very helpful. We loved the charm of the place (the red brick on the wall), the proximity of the subway stations, supermarkets. You can easily do some shopping in Soho or go to Little Italy or Chinatown, it is right around the corner ! The WiFi is good and you can cook your own food if you want. Will do again !

The apartment is fantastic, everything is exactly as shown in the pictures. The neighbourhood has many great places to eat and metro stops are close by (3 min walk). Brendan is a wonderful host, he is always available and very personable. I would happily stay here again during my next visit to New York!

The apartment was just what we needed.  Brendan was helpful in answering our questions.  The description of the apartment accurate. It was clean  Close to subways for easy transportation .  We would definitely stay here again.

Absolutely loved our stay at Brendan's place in New York. Brendan was friendly and greeted us as soon as we arrived and gave us a brief tour with a guide to the area. 

The apartment itself was very clean and well furnished. The two bedrooms, kitchen and bathroom had everything you would need and our stay was extremely comfortable. 

The best part was the location, with loads of shops and places to eat within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again the next time I visit New York.

We loved the location of Brendan's place and I'd be happy to stay there during another trip. The photos give a very accurate representation of the apartment. It is up 3 flights of narrow stairs in sort of dirty hallways but it wasn't a problem at all. The apartment is upstairs above a restaurant that looked nice and did a brisk business although we didn't end up eating there. The neighborhood was great - it is a residential street with cute boutiques and eateries. We walked to STOMP (had great Risotto dinner beforehand) and to 911 Memorials and to the Brooklyn Bridge and NYU - all within 1/2 hour walk. Little Italy and Chinatown are within a few blocks. Whole Foods is 3 blocks away and Dean & Deluca the opposite direction and a CVS is a block away so food and incidentals are easily taken care of. There was construction next door so that noise was present from about 8 a.m. onward but not a problem for us.
