Several metro lines are available within about 3-5 blocks - getting home after seeing Broadway shows was easy. Yelp gives 4.5 stars to many of the local eateries so lots of choice. We had a car and had reserved a spot at a garage on-line beforehand. Access was very easy from coming in via Holland Tunnel. 

We stayed in the winter and the apartment has steam heating (which seems typical for the area) so apartment was quite warm - we had to ditch our sweaters when in the apartment. The place is very narrow and the bathroom was tiny. We were a family of 4 with 2 big teen boys and apartment worked fine for us but we didn't try to eat anything other than breakfast or snacks in the apartment - there are only 2 stools in the kitchen. We wanted to use our AppleTV but the TV is an older model without HDMI. It is large and there is cable. We appreciated that there was a closet with plenty of hangers in each bedroom as well as plenty of drawer space so we could stash our clothes away and not have to live out of a suitcase. The kitchen was well stocked with miscellaneous spices, coffee, tea and such. 

Brendan was very responsive to communications and happy to accommodate us with storing our bags when we arrived early before the apartment had been cleaned. We didn't need any help during out stay but definitely felt that Brendan would have been there to help us out if we needed recommendations etc. Overall we would highly recommend this apartment.
Great place, even better location. Lots is great places to eat and drink nearby. Easy walk to Chinatown, Little Italy and a Whole Foods Market right down the street.
It was nice staying here! Thank you, we had great time exploring New York City.
Perfect place to explore Manhattan and great communication with the host.
Brendan was a great host. His home was clean and in a great location. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Location was perfect  close to great restaurants and shopping 
Friendly people all around.
Absolutely perfect location for a fun vacation!
Great spot!

Appart sympa bien placé 
Seul bémol le bruit du chauffage et la chaleur dans l'appartement (nécessité d'ouvrir les fenêtres pour dormir)

Really brilliantly located appartment - for bars, restaurants and shopping! Small apartment but perfect for a city break or work. Do note you have to climb three flights of quite steep stairs! It's a bit noisy - but that's because it's in a fun, bustling neighbourhood. Brendan was a great host - even coming round at 11pm to bring electric heaters when the heating broke due to works next door.

Brendan's place is in the perfect location, in addition to being very clean and comfortable. My friends and I greatly appreciated the flexibility with check in and check out times. I would highly recommend staying here, and would love to return in the future.
Great apartment, great location. We'll definitely be back.

Brendan is nice. Always available and with a quick response eventhough he was out of the city. Communication was fluid and he is really understanding. 
We went in a family trip for five days. With two teens, no babies.
The apartment is placed in a nice and trendy neighborhood with many restaurants and small lovely shops around. Subway is really close to the apartment. We didn't took any taxi because we didn't need it. 
The weather was really cold at those days at NY but  Brendan's apartment has a very good heating. The street is quite by night. We slept very well. At the date we were there, was a construction at the corner but they started to work around 8am, at that time we were already awake to see the city. Beds are really comfortable and bedrooms are not connected, are in the oposite side of the apartment, good point. Kitchen is practical and sitting room has a big size TV, and the sofa is comfortable, from my point of view, a bit small for 4 adults.
Building has no elevator. For us it wasn't a problem. The stairs of the portal and the common areas need a bit cleaning. 
To resume, Brendan is fully trustworthy. The most important point to me. The apartment is really well placed and connected, and all of this compensate the very small issues it has.
Perfect location. Great apartment.
Great location and well appointed!

Brendan may not want to hear this, but this is a great apartment for families.  It's a quick walk to Little Italy for gelato and Chinatown for stuff we don't need. The kids loved both. Great restaurants nearby where the staff were lovely to us even though Yelp proclaimed them to not be "kid friendly" (we ate early). 

Two large comfortable bedrooms/beds separated by the kitchen, bath, and living room.  The apartment and rooms were clutter free, so there were lots of places for my kids to put (and hide their things).  A bathtub for the kids was a huge plus. Clean and plenty of room. Brendan is responsive and had great restaurant recs.  It's a walk-up but my kids were champs about it.
Brendan had wonderful communication and the check-in and check-out process was very smooth. Everything was perfect and the location was very near where I needed to be.
Brendan's place is in a great location for a visit to NYC. He was easy to coordinate with, and the apartment was perfect for our needs.

The apartment is exactly as pictured. Enough storage for clothes so you don't need to live out of your suitcase. Three of us stayed in the apartment for a week and it was very comfortable and there was everything we could need. Some great restaurants within walking distance and a restaurant just downstairs which had nice food and great service or you could just have a drink. SoHo, Little Italy, Chinatown all within walking distance. Some great shopping too. Brendan was great with communication and responded almost immediately each time we needed to contact him. We also arrived late at night (1.30am to be exact) and Brendan made it easy for us to check-in. We had a great stay and I don't hesitate in recommending Brendan's place.
It was good to stay there.
Be aware of the bed bugs. The place is in great location and spacious, but the bed wasn't clean and the hygiene was also quite bad.

Brendan's place is so nice! It couldn't have been better for 4 of us ladies traveling to NY for classes at the Deva Academy which was a few blocks away! Nolita is the best neighborhood filled with tons of great food, bars, boutiques and easy to get anywhere. I would definitely recommend this home!
Great apartment for two couples. Good location and neighbourhood. I recommend.

Highly responsive host. Perfect location if you want to be in the bustle of Soho (which we did). Near subways and the New Museum, too. It is up three flights of stairs, which was not a problem for us but might be a factor for some people. We would choose to stay here again.
Completely met expectations.  Recommend the apartment.

Amazing location! Though the place is in the heart of Soho, the building is quiet and there's not too much street noise. Check in was a breeze, Brendan communicates super fast and accommodated our early arrival.

Great place to be in NY and to discover the city. It is very easy to start the trips around NY by tube or just walk around for shopping, having lunch or an drink. We loved it! We spend 4 days with two adults and two teenager at Brendans place. Everything worked out fine. Brendan is very kind and helpful. Thank you Brendan!  We would come again:-))

Brendan was very great with communicating and he was available to answer all our questions.  
The place is exactly as described.  If you are a light sleeper I would suggest the back room since you can hear all the street noise from the front bedroom.  The apartment had everything we needed and was in a great location.  
I would definitely stay at Brendan's place again.

Hands down, Brendan was the best host by far. If you are lucky enough to score his place, you will be inundated with options for food, drinks, dessert, and have the ultimate luxury in accessing the subway because of its fantastic location. He was an absolute pleasure to deal with and was very accessible for anything we needed. He also put us in touch with a friend who was a concierge so we could ask any questions about what to see and do. The Airbnb made our trip one of the best ever!

Brendan was very accommodating, we were able to have an early check in and a late check out. 
Apartment is very central and in an excellent location, beside nice restaurants and shops. Apartment is spacious for NYC, with 2 good sized bedrooms and a nice living area with a full kitchen. We were a family of 4 and stayed for 6 nights and would recommend this apartment

Location location location. If you want to know what it feels like living downtown, stay here. Nolita is close to everything and a subway away from everything. We barely used the apartment - just to rest and sleep. A/c units in the bedrooms worked well. 

Our favorite neighborhood eateries - officina Latina, cafe habana, the coffee place across the street (forgetting the name), the bar downstairs (not emporio, the other tiny one). A tiny bit more of a walk - Balthazar, Bens famous pizza for a quick slice, Lupa, and Rauols.  

Didn't meet Brendan, our host, yet he ensured we received the key and had what we needed. Almost immediately would respond to our messages, which was really nice.
Brendan's space is exactly as pictured. In a great neighbourhood with lots to see and do.
Great

Brendan's apartment si exactly as shown in the pictures.
The key delivery was seamless, without any inconvenience.
The location is perfect, the neighborhood is very trendy and walking- Distance to Soho, Village, Greenwich.
Brendon was very accomodating and the communication with him was easy and fluid.
I recommend Brandan' apartment.
I loved the place and location. Would stay here again.

I had a great stay at what I would consider the perfect location and in the best place I needed to stay for my first visit to New York City. 

I rented Brendan's place for five days and was more than satisfied. Bathroom was clean, Kitchen had all the necessary appliances needed for cooking, and the place was in a great location for transportation and dinning out.

To give some perspective on size: We had one person in each of the two bed rooms, one on an air mattress and shared one bathroom but still felt like everyone had enough space and privacy to enjoy our stay when we needed to sleep or eat.

Brendan was a great host. He maintained a lot of clear, respectful and responsive communication for my entire stay. 

I would absolutely recommend his place to others and I will certainly consider staying here again if I find myself back in New York City.

Thanks again Brendan.
Loved the place, the low key atmosphere the location was convenient to everything and parking was awesome. Brendan was very helpful as well as a great communicator through out.
The location was great
Great place, 10/10. Great location. Safe neighbourhood, great places that eat and easy transport. Would recommend without hesitation. Thanks.
Best location in town

We had a great stay in Nolita at Brendan's apartment. It is in such an excellent location. Plenty of towels, blankets and the A/C was a nice addition. May not be the best for those of you who aren't a fan on climbing steps to the third floor. Not a problem for us, just an FYI! Brendan was great to communicate with and would definitely recommend.
This is my second stay at Brendon's place- I love the central location and the great vibe of the Nolita- Soho area. Lots of interesting bars and restaurants close by. Would definitely recommend.

Cet appartement est parfaitement situé, à distance de marche de presque tout! C'était propre et fonctionnel. Il est situé au 3e étage toutefois et il n'y a pas d'ascenseur donc pas idéal pour les gens moins en forme, ce qui n'était toutefois pas notre cas, donc ce ne fut pas un problème pour nous. Brendan avait laissé des indications claires, et était disponible au besoin. Le restaurant Emporio situé tout juste en bas de l'appartement était une très belle découverte...absolument délicieux!! Pour le stationnement, il y a quelques stationnements publics aux alentours, dont certains qu'on peut même réserver et payer à l'avance. Laissez votre voiture bien stationnée durant votre séjour, et privilégiez la marche, le métro ou le taxi, car la circulation à NY est difficile en voiture!
Bref, je recommande cet appartement sans hésiter, surtout que les logements à deux chambres sont plutôt rares (ou très chers)... 
Merci Brendan!
Great location! It has some noise in r/w building right next to it is under construction. Otherwise, size/age of apartment as expected for NY

Brendan’s place is a real NYC experience and he was so great to work with.  Being in Little Italy was a great way to spend our time with deli’s, restaurants and shops so close.  We would recommend it to all.

We loved staying at Brendan's place and will definitely choose to stay here again next time we're in NYC! The house is perfectly situated in Nolita/SoHo, among fantastic restaurants and shopping, and close to subway stations. The apartment is small, but beautifully kept - everything was clean, the kitchen and bathroom were stocked, beds were comfortable, and the TV was an added bonus. Just beware the apartment a walk-up and three stories up, so you'll have to carry any luggage up and down stairs. We enjoyed our stay immensely and definitely recommend it for your next trip!
Brendan's apartment is great! Perfect location and super clean. And our stay was made 1000x better because Brendan was kind enough to accommodate our weird check-in and check-out logistics.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Brendan

Everything you need in this space efficient New York apartment. Great neighbourhood and much less street traffic than in many other parts of Manhattan. Brendan always answered our inquiries quickly and politely. A reliable host that only wants the best for his guests.
We had a great time in NYC which was aided by Brendan’s centrally located apartment. Flexible check-in, good communication, and no surprises. Recommended.

Can't ask for a better location. This is a city apartment so if you are a light sleeper choose the bedroom on the right. Brendan responded quickly and accommodated our check-in times! Would definitely stay again!

Accurate description. 10/10 location. Hip neighborhood. Well equipped apt. Spacious beds. Tiny bathroom tho + noisy neighboors above. Loud noises from streets + restaurant backyards - no problem for us as we were all sleeping tight. Can get cold during fall/winter.

Couldn‘t be more happy with the perfect communication and location of the apt!

Great place in a great location, quiet neighborhood with everything in walking distance, it was perfect for the 4 of us who stayed there.  Brendan was very quick in his responses back to us from all of our questions!

Great place to stay in manhattan, area is fantastic so you can explore on foot and there are loads of restaurants nearby. Slightly unusual heating system that can be a little noisy but you get used to it - and the apartment is up three flights of stairs so you’ve got to carry your suitcases up! Brendan is really easily contactable and very helpful. We had a great stay, thanks Brendan!
Great location! Nice apartment and good attention from the landlord. Only cleaningness and tidiness could be better. It’s fine though I think sheets should be ironed and have no stains of bleach...
Exactly as advertised.  Great location in Nolita.  Host is quick to respond.  Good experience.
Nice big apartment with perfect location. Comfortable beds and tidy kitchen and bathroom. Easy communication with host. Warm despite freezing temperatures outside.

Brendan was a terrific host.  The apartment is centrally located and there are tons of great restaurants and shopping nearby.  Bedrooms at opposite ends of the apartment are great for privacy.  The building is quiet, I got great sleep while we were there.  I am glad I stayed at Brendan's place, it was everything I expected.

Brendan's place is great - well stocked with what you need (shampoo, bandaides, etc...), perfect location, clean -and above all else if you there's something you need Brendan is on top of it, he's a great guy :)

Great Apartment, cozy and very warm.Very very clean and in a great location near to restaurants, bars and near to mid town manhattan. Brendan was very kind and help us a lot with our check out. Only issue if you go winter there is a little bit annoying noise from the radiators but the apartment was very very hot for the cold nights with -8C degrees. For sure I will choose this apartment next time to NY.

Kurz zu der Reise Gruppe - eine Frau, zwei Männer
Die Wohnung war super. Die Aufteilung, mit den beiden Schlafzimmern auf der jeweils entgegen gelegenen Seite des Wohn-/Gemeinschaftsraums war für unser Gruppe perfekt. Genügend Privatsphäre.
Das Bad war gut ausgestattet.
Die Küche hatte alles was man braucht (keine Spülmaschine). Bisschen mehr Besteck wäre gut gewesen hat aber vollkommen gereicht.
Als Unterkunft, für uns als verwöhnte Deutsche, sehr zufriedenstellend.

Der größte Pluspunkt allerdings war die Lage. Ein kleiner Lebensmittelladen die Straße runter (aber nicht günstig – an der 33rd Straße ist ein Target wo man alles nötige bekommt) und die U-Bahn Stationen Spring Street, Lafayette oder Bowery Station.
Spring und Bowery waren unsere ansicht nach die wichtigsten. Von Spring Street aus mit der Linie 6 entweder nach Norden zur 33rd Street (nahe Empire State Building), 42nd (Grend Central), 59th (Stück östlich vom Central Park) oder mit der Linie 4 nach Süden Fulton Street raus und man ist nahe World Trade Center.
Bowery perfekt für die An- und Abreise. Die Linie J und Z verbinden diese mit der Airtrain (Linie Rot) mit dem Flughafen JFK (Fahrzeit insgesamt rund 1:30 Stunde). Ihr braucht eine Metro Card (7 Tage 33 USD und ein Ticket für die Airtrain 5 USD) die ihr dort am Automaten lösen könnt. Eine Karte kann für beides genutzt werden.

Als Alternative zum Hotel definitiv empfehlenswert. Als Gastgeber, war Brandan ebenfalls sehr zuvorkommend.

-----

Briefly to the travel group - one woman, two men
The apartment was great. The layout, with the two bedrooms on the opposite side of the living room/common room, was perfect for our group. Enough privacy.
The bathroom was well equipped.
The kitchen had everything you need (no dishwasher). A little more cutlery would have been good but was quite all right.
As accommodation, for us as spoiled Germans, very satisfactory.

The biggest advantage, however, was the location. A small grocery store down the street (but not cheap - at 33rd Street is a Target where you can get everything you need) and the subway stations Spring Street, Lafayette or Bowery Station.
Spring and Bowery were the most important ones from our point of view. From Spring Street, take Line 6 either north to 33rd Street (near Empire State Building), 42nd (Grend Central), 59th (east of Central Park) or Line 4 south to Fulton Street and you are close to World Trade Center.
Bowery perfect for arrival and departure. The J and Z lines connect them with the Airtrain (line red) and the JFK airport (travel time about 1:30 hours). You need a Metro Card (7 days 33 USD and a ticket for the Airtrain 5 USD) which you can buy there at the vending machine. A card can be used for both.

Definitely recommended as an alternative to the hotel. As a host, Brandan was also very thoughtful.

Translated with (Website hidden by Airbnb)

I was here with my boyfriend, my sister and her husband. It is perfect for two couples. This part of Manhattan is great and we felt safe all the time. The apartment was clean and well equipped. Few subway stations are just few minutes walking from the apartment. The location is perfect! Everything is so close with subway and even by walking distance. Brendan is great host. He was very helpful and he approved late check out beacuse of our evening flight. We are very grateful and we definitely recommend this place!
Awesome place, great host, cute apartment, and lovely neighborhood!

Great location. Very nice Apartment. Absolutely more then we had expected for the price. Nice neighborhood. Everything you need is in walking distance (Whole Foods, CVS, lot‘s of cool Bars & Restaurants). 
Brendan was a great Host! Fast answers, great tips for things to see and do in the area. We had some problems with our flights, both on arrival and departure and Brendan was a great help and very flexible with the check-in and check-out.

We  highly recommend his place and would absolutely  stay again at Brendans Apartment

Un excellent accueil ! Très très réactif et très arrangeant pour l’heure du Check in et Check lit! 
Je vois elle recommande vivement ! 
Brendan est une personne au top ! 
A faire et refaire ! Réservez ! n’hésitez plus !
It was such an amazing stay!!!

The flat is very well equipped and the location is perfect (in a nice neighborhood with everything you need in walking distance).
Just the communication could have been faster, but I guess time zone differences can explain some of it.

What an amazing location. Right in the heart of restaurants, bars, shopping and so close the subway. The place was three flights up, which was fine, and it was relatively spacious and very clean.  Bathroom was tight, but the bedrooms were plenty big, and both had windows that could open! We had a great time, would definitely return.
Great place!  Very close to subways so easy to go anywhere. Great little coffee shop on the corner. Brendan is quick to answer and very helpful. Highly recommend!!

We had an excellent stay at Brendan's place. The apartment looks exactly as portrayed in the pictures. Its key strength is its location right in the middle of Nolita which is close to Soho, The Village, Little Italy and we even walked uptown!
You need to take into account that the apartment is on the 4th floor with no elevator. Also, we came to eat out so had no problem (Try the Italian which is right in the same building! by the entrance), if more than two want to eat  in the apartment - it could become a challenge as there is no space for that. As I said, when you visit NYC and you have a café two steps away and lots of restaurants all around, that should not be the issue. 
Brendan is an excellent communicator in the sense that he reacts immediately to anything you asked (before and during our stay) and doesn't nag at all!
Thanks for a great time in NYC!
Excellent location. Walking distance to Tribeca FF venues and a plethora of food. Cozy and comfy apartment. Couldn't have asked for better for our business trip.

Appartement sympa et confortable, dans un quartier très intéressant du point de vue de la localisation comme des nombreux commerces qu'on peut y trouver. Station de métro proche. Brendan a été très réactif et arrangeant. Bref, c'était top !
Brendan's place was clean, cozy, and in a fantastic location. A+
Appartement sympa et confortable dans un quartier top. Plusieurs lignes de métro à proximité et très bonne communication avec Brendan.  Nous recommandons et nous reviendrions avec plaisir!

Brendan est un hôte très accueillant et disponible pour toutes questions . Nous avons adoré le quartier avec ses petites boutiques et ses délicieux restaurants et son métro à proximité . 
L’appartement était très propre et la literie de super qualité , nous avons adoré séjourné dans l’appartement typique New yorkais de Brendan avec nos amis !
Brendans place was exactly what we needed and in the perfect spot for a great time in Nolita. Communication was great!
100 points. We would come back. Thank you Brendan.
Very Nice. Stairs not a nuisance. Very nice shops close by. CVS close walk. Felt safe the whole time. Would definitely stay here again.

We loved your flat Brendan - it was so nice to come back to after a busy day out. The location is superb and we couldn’t recommend it highly enough. 
Would definitely come back if ever lucky enough to visit New York again.

Fantastic apartment in a great neighbourhood. Checkin and checkout were easy and Brendan's communication was excellent. Apartment has loads of room and was very pleasant to stay in. Location couldn't have been better - Nolita is ideal for getting the subway to pretty much anywhere, and very walkable to lots of Manhattan. We enjoyed lots of Brendan's restaurant tips as well. Would definitely stay here again!

A great apartment in a great location. It is compact but felt spacious for 3 people, I'm sure it would for 4 too. Very easy to pick up the keys. Brendan checked in to see if everything was ok, which was nice. He also left milk etc in the fridge for us on arrival. The air con worked really well (much needed in July!) but was a bit noisy at times. Apart from that, a great stay.
Great place in a great location.

Brendan place is exactly as you can see it in the picture. It's nice, cosy and it look like a classic NY apartment.  It makes you feel living not as a tourist in NY.

We found all the ncecessary, to make coffee or cook something.

The place was clean and it's situated in a perfect location. Between Soho and Nolita. Just 10 minutes walking to the supermarket (Whole Food market) and very closed to different subway. 

I reccomend Brendan's place!

If I have to recriminate something: just the noice of the air conditioning. But if you are tired after a long walk around NY it won't bother you!
Perfect location to visit NY. Local Area very friendly with lot of restaurant and bar.

Brendan is a great host! Really interested in your comfort and does his best. Location is just perfect - everything you need is so close and is very comfortable for using public transportation. The place also is quiet and safe - exactly what you need after a busy day.

Excelente ubicacion, cómodo, práctico y una excelente relacion precio-calidad-ubicacion.
Muy recomendable si te gusta vivir en esta zona de NY. Volveremos!

Location location location. I doubt there is a better area to stay in Manhatten. Close to everything we walked everywhere and didnt use any public transport. food and drink options right outside your door are numerous and all of great quality. The Fiat cafe serves up great italian food and the Thai next door was fantastic. Parisi bakery over the road has probably the best sandwiches ive ever eaten, you have to try 'The Dennis', amazing! Great coffee for Gimme Coffee directly opposite the apartment. 
Great to see hardly any chains mostly all independants both shops and eateries, SOHO is just round the corner for upscale shopping and all the usual suspects are there. 

The apartment is a great size and very clean and functional, there was only 2 of us but 4 could stay comfortably. Everything you need for your stay is in the apartment. We really enjoyed our stay and wouldnt hesitate to stay again on future trips.
Nice location, close to beautiful Soho
Brendan's place is the perfect location in Soho! You are at the intersection of several subway lines - everything is so easy to get to from there! Would definitely stay again.
the location its awesome!!!

Apartment is in an excellent location. Very stylish area with lots of bars and restaurants and quick access to the subway. We had a friend visit who lives in NY and she was stunned at how big the apartment was. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.

Great location. Everything at your feet. The Emporio Restaurant downstairs has the best Italian food we have ever eaten!

However the property didn’t meet our expectations, not even down to the basic standards.

Perfect location for exploring lower Manhattan. Centrally located and a great restaurant just downstairs. The apartment itself was perfect for our family of 4 (we have a 1 and a 4 year old and everyone slept well). The walk up isn’t hard, but the stairs are a bit steeper than usual.
PRIME location. Such a fun area, tons of restaurants, one of the bedrooms doesn't face the street so it's pretty quiet. I'd stay here again.

Brendan's place was the perfect solution for us! I was traveling with my family and we had a great stay. 
The two rooms are spacious and the house is perfect for 4 people. The bathroom is small but if you know NY its just normal :) 
The house its just like in the photos,  it's a warm place and very functional. 
The location is just PERFECT to explore the city. I know NY pretty well and really wanted to stay in this area, You can walk to a lot of great places and have different metro lines close by to move all around. Lots of good restaurants, bars and shops. Best choice!
Brendan is always reachable and ready to help. The house has everything you need and the kitchen is perfect for good breakfast to start your day.
I would definitely stay here again next time and suggest to others!

Nice apartment, best location!!! Very close to numerous subway stations / lines
For sure deserves a second stay!!!
The host was very kind and reachable by messages
Very nice Check-in / checkout system
This apartment is a no brainer!!

perfectly located and charming 2 bedrooms flat! perfect for a family up to 2 children and top for 2 couples or friends. All kind of facilities, transports, shops and of course bar and restaurants down the building... Brendan is also very reactive if needed...
Great location.
Close to China town. We can get grocery and make dinner. Awesome

I’m a local resident who needed a place for my family and myself to stay while our place was having work done. His space (and its location) were very good and matched the depiction. Brendan was a very helpful and accommodating host. Thank you.
Brendan’s apartment is comfy and most importantly, he is responsive and the apartment is in a GREAT location.
We enjoyed to stay at Brendan's place. The location is amazing and the apartment is very cute!

This place is cozy, great location—groceries, whole food market are close, easy to go everywhere and many good restaurants near by. 
We spent almost a month and nothing was inconvinient, very quiet neighborhood but also middle of the soho. I just liked this place so much it’s like home home :)

name: O charme de estar em frente à praia
summary: Apart-hotel em frente a praia. Aconchegante e com um espetacular amanhecer e entardecer. Varanda ampla para poder realizar as refeições aproveitando a vista da praia e das piscinas. Lindo! Pertinho das melhores praias do Rio de Janeiro, shopping, cinemas, excelentes restaurantes e barzinhos.
space: Aconchegante, em frente à praia e inteirinho pra vc aproveitar dias incríveis. Você, separado da praia apenas por uma ciclovia. Desça do apto e esteja na areia da praia.
description: Apart-hotel em frente a praia. Aconchegante e com um espetacular amanhecer e entardecer. Varanda ampla para poder realizar as refeições aproveitando a vista da praia e das piscinas. Lindo! Pertinho das melhores praias do Rio de Janeiro, shopping, cinemas, excelentes restaurantes e barzinhos. Aconchegante, em frente à praia e inteirinho pra vc aproveitar dias incríveis. Você, separado da praia apenas por uma ciclovia. Desça do apto e esteja na areia da praia. Praia, academia, piscina externa e interna(quente), restaurante dentro do prédio, sauna, garagem privativa, internet no apartamento, TV a cabo. Sempre que for solicitado, deixando-os à vontade para realizar contato quando precisarem. Para quem ama praia como eu, viver em frente ao mar é a chance de acordar a cada dia mais feliz. Ponto de ônibus na porta do prédio. Táxis executivos ou comuns podendo ser solicitados na recepção. BRT a menos de 2km. Estação do metrô a 20 minutos podendo te levar para todos os lugares onde o metrô Rio
neighborhood_overview: Para quem ama praia como eu, viver em frente ao mar é a chance de acordar a cada dia mais feliz.
transit: Ponto de ônibus na porta do prédio. Táxis executivos ou comuns podendo ser solicitados na recepção. BRT a menos de 2km. Estação do metrô a 20 minutos podendo te levar para todos os lugares onde o metrô Rio acessa.
access: Praia, academia, piscina externa e interna(quente), restaurante dentro do prédio, sauna, garagem privativa, internet no apartamento, TV a cabo.
interaction: Sempre que for solicitado, deixando-os à vontade para realizar contato quando precisarem.
house_rules: Respeitem as regras do Apart. Após as 22h não é permitido barulho com risco de multas previstas nas regras do condomínio, além disso durante o tempo restante respeite o seu vizinho, ele também poderá estar de férias e querendo descansar. É permitido fumar nas áreas abertas do prédio. Utilizem o ar-condicionado com consciência ecológica, desligando-o sempre que não estiverem no imóvel. Mantenha o imóvel sempre limpo e cuide dos móveis e demais utensílios com cuidado. Esta é também a minha casa e gostaria que tudo fosse cuidado com carinho. Não é permitido exceder o número de 4 pessoas no apartamento, sendo 2 adultos e 2 crianças. Quaisquer multa geradas pelos hóspedes no período de sua permanência devido ao não cumprimento das normas internas do condomínio, deverá ser paga antes do check-out.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Brasileiro, Publicitário, Diretor de Arte, apaixonado por viagens e gastronomia.

reviews.comments: Foram dias maravilhosos. O apartamento é muito aconchegante, com uma vista espetacular e uma localização incrível. super recomendamos para quem quer descansar e curtir uma boa praia.

Excelente departamento en uno de los mejores condominios de Recreio. 
Ubicado literalmente frente a la playa. 
Apartamento cómodo, con un balcon precioso, amplio,  con vista increible y frontal al mar.  Equipado con muy buen gusto y detalles que lo destacan,  con todo lo necesario y más para tener una estadía muy placentera.
Los servicios del condominio excelentes, sobre todo el mantenimiento de la pileta.
Cercano a locales comerciales como minisupermercado, farmacia y otras tiendas.
El anfitrión super hospitalario, siempre en contacto y brindando  información. 
Super recomendable. 
Gracias Alexandre!!!!

name: Colourful apt in Plateau/Mile End
summary: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name. NOTE: The bedroom sleeps 2 (double bed) and the living room can sleep another 2 (queen-size air mattress).
space: The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors and lots of natural light. The kitchen is large and sunny, with a table seating 6. It is fully equipped (fridge, stove, oven, toaster oven, blender, hand blender, mixer, etc.), and has all the spices and basics you would need to make a home-cooked meal, should that be your preference. Off the kitchen in the rear of the apartment, you’ll find one of the two patios, where you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.  The living room is warm and inviting, with super comfy couches, a TV and DVD player, and a door leading to the front balcony. The bedroom is large and sleeps two in the double bed, and there’s room for a Pack ‘n Play, for those with little ones. There is also a queen-size air mattress, which can be used in the living room to sleep two more. (If you would like the air mattress set up for your arrival, please let me know in advance.) The apartment includes a washer and dryer, hair dryer, linens (towels and sheets), WiFi internet, A/C
description: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name. NOTE: The bedroom sleeps 2 (double bed) and the living room can sleep another 2 (queen-size air mattress). The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors and lots of natural light. The kitchen is large and sunny, with a table seating 6. It is fully equipped (fridge, stove, oven, toaster oven, blender, hand blender, mixer, etc.), and has all the spices and basics you would need to make a home-cooked meal, should that be your preference. Off the kitchen in the rear of the apartment, you’ll find one of the two patios, where you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.  The living room is warm and inviting, w
neighborhood_overview: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name.
notes: Check In Check in time is 3 pm. Early check in will need to be arranged in advance. Check Out Check out time is 11 am. Should you wish to stay beyond 11 am, please arrange this in advance. Windows and Doors Please note that not all windows in the house have screens. For fresh air, please only open the windows that have screens in order to avoid an invasion of insects. Please make sure all windows and doors are locked upon checkout. Air Mattress If you would like the air mattress set up before your arrival, please let me know. If you would like the living room clear, feel free to set it up yourself. It is quite easy as the air pump does all the work for you!
transit: The apartment is a block away from the intersection of two main streets, Mont-Royal Ave and St Laurent Blvd. Wander east, and within minutes you hit St. Denis, another great street for window-shopping or people-watching. To the north, you have the trendy Mile End with its main streets, Laurier, Fairmount, St-Viateur, and Bernard. Walk west and you can venture to Parc Avenue and the Mountain (Mont Royal). And, if you like discovering a city by walking, you can enjoy the Quartier des Spectacles to the south (where all of the festivals are held), Parc La Fontaine (to the south east), Outremont (to the north and west of Mile End), and Little Italy and the Jean Talon Market (north of Mile End). Should you prefer using public transit, Laurier and Mount Royal metro stations (both on the orange line) are each about an 7-10 minute walk. Once on the metro, you can be in Old Montreal or downtown within 10-15 minutes. There are also buses traveling east-west on Mont-Royal Ave, north on St-Laurent
access: You will have access to the entire apartment except for a closet in the bedroom and a spare room with my personal effects. In lieu of the closet, you can use the dresser and a rolling garment rack.
interaction: While it is unlikely that I will be able to greet you personally, you will be given my phone number and e-mail address. As well, you will have the contact information for the cleaner and my neighbours, who will be able to answer your questions or help out in case of an emergency.
house_rules: * Make sure to lock the door as you leave the house either using the top or bottom locks. It DOES NOT lock on its own. Before leaving the apartment during check-out, make sure that you have taken all of your belongings. Please leave the keys on the kitchen table and lock the door from the inside, using the lock on the door handle. * There is no smoking in the apartment, but you can smoke on the front and back balcony. * Please leave your shoes on the shoe rack near the front door. * When showering, please open the bathroom window. * Children should be supervised at all times. * Please do not take any cutlery, utensils, or other kitchen items of any kind. * Please, do not damage the walls or windows, or make changes or additions to the premises, including changing or installing new locks.  * Please do not allow unauthorized persons onto the premises. * Please leave the local town guides for the next visitors.

host.host_about: I am a single mother of two.  I love to travel and have been many places, using airbnb and other sites.  I also used to have an airbnb listing.

reviews.comments: Great price and location! I was in contact with Libby (Toby's sister). She was very attentive and replied quickly to any questions I had. My friend slept in the bed and I asked to use the queen size air mattress (took less than 5 min to inflate with the provided electric device), but I ended up sleeping on the couch - it was super comfy (at least for my 5'4 height). Great experience here.

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme au descriptif. Il n'y manque vraiment rien. Libby, en l'absence de Toby a tout prévu pour que l'on se sente chez soi, jusqu'à la brosse à dent, au cas où on l'aurait oubliée. Parfaitement situé pour avoir tout à portée de main (commerces, restaurants, transports) dans mon quartier préféré. Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Libby et Toby mais la documentation était extrêmement précise et Libby était particulièrement réactive lors de nos échanges. J'y retournerai les yeux fermés et peut-être rencontrerai-je filles ?

Comfortable apartment in a fabulous neighborhood!  My husband and I loved staying here, walking and riding bikes in the neighborhood, and the convenient location. The apt. is close to shops, cafes and restaurants, Bixi bike stands, the park, main streets, and metro station. 

We did not get to meet the host but she communicated via email and text, arranged for a smooth arrival, and left lots of information about Montreal. There were maps, brochures, etc. for us to peruse. 

She even left some fruit and treats in the freezer for us to make us feel welcome and we enjoyed pretending we were locals by "living" in her apt. 

Good space, comfortable bed and couch, and outside balcony to sit on made the apt. perfect. 

We plan to return to Montreal as it is probably our favorite city and we would definitely choose to stay here again.

I had great communication with Libby. Good, clear information and smooth check-in arrangements. The apartment is cozy and comfortable and feels very homey. It's in a great area of Montreal and even though there are many wonderful restaurants, the kitchen is well equipped for making a family dinner. Thanks Libby, we had a great time.
11/10! Perfectly located (try Lili.co for brunch, Guillame for croissants and Green Panther if you're veggie!!) and super cute and cosy. Libby is a super host, absolutely recommend!!

Libby was great at communicating with us prior to and during the reservation. While she wasn't present in the apartment, she made herself available through phone and text, and left plenty of information in the apartment itself, including lots of tourist info, which was very helpful!

The colorful apartment is located in a really great neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars, and stuff going on, all within walking distance to the building. It was also easily accessible to the metro, which made getting around the city a breeze.

The apartment itself is charming, and like the listing says, very colorful and with decorations from all over the world! Overall, it's a great place to stay and you won't be let down!

I dealt with Libby who was great. Very nice and welcoming. Their cleaner Rose waited an hour to welcome me as I was delayed in a nasty ice storm.  Thank her again for me Libby. The apartment is very nice clean and comfortable. The Plateau neighborhood is great with all the eateries cafes  shops and bars. Had a great time!

Cozy and bright apartment in the best neighbourhood in Montreal!
Bigger than expected with lots of light and nice well equipped kitchen.
Apartment feels very much like home.
Absolutely recommend, Libby is a great host!
She has everything that guests might need in the apartment including tourist guides, washer/dryer and coffee.
10/10

Toby was an amazing host. Very kind and thoughtful.
Her place is perfectly located, clean, and with many little details to make your stay perfect. Definitely recommended +++

My husband, 11 year old son and I had a great stay at Toby and her sister Libby's place. The apartment is as advertised--very sweet with two small balconies, a full service kitchen (including spices), and an air-conditioner, as some of the stand-outs (and the latter was very helpful in July). The thing is that you won't want to spend that much time there because the neighborhood is amazing--which was also accurately advertised. We walked or took the metro everywhere and never used our car (we lucked out and found a parking spot right after the street had been cleaned and all the other cars had to move). There are so many great restaurants, cafes and boutiques nearby, and also a sweet park right at the top of the street. We walked to Mont Royal (and then walked to the top for an amazing view), and walked to the Metro stop to get to downtown (for free concerts at the Jazz Festival), the old port, and the Jean Talon market. Also, Libby was very helpful and available via email (and if my phone worked, I assume text as well); has lots of maps and brochures in the apartment for you to look at and use; and her housecleaner, who met us and gave us the keys, was lovely and full of tips about the city. We can't wait to come back and explore more!
Best location and most gracious host I have ever had!

We love Mile End, so this was a perfect location for us. The apartment was bright, charming, and completely comfortable. Nice bed, cute kitchen with everything you need. Toby and her sister Libby were very responsive and  communicative. Great place to stay.

Libby was very available and helpful thoughtout our entire stay. Her apartment is very cosy and perfectly located in the best neighborhood of Montreal, the kitchen is fully equipped with every you might need and the bed is comfortable. 
I would definitely recommend! 
Thanks again Libby.

Toby and Libby's place was perfect for our long weekend in Montreal. They were extremely kind, thoughtful and accommodating. When we got delayed at the border and arrived much later than expected, they were very helpful to find a way to check us in. The place is very comfortable, has all what you need (well-equipped kitchen, washer, coffee machine, etc ), is well-located and definitely makes you feel like home. I absolutely recommend it!!

The perfect place to visit Montreal! Lovely, fully equipped, amazingly located apartment with a great and supportive host that leaves nothing to be desired! The place lies in the heart of the “Le Plateau / Mile End” neighbourhood(s); A great vibe, access to a supreme number of cute café's and unique bars, really great food, supermarkets, bakeries and anything you could possibly need…in a short walking distance. It’s minutes away from the Mont-Royal Metro station which in turn gets you to Old Town and Downtown in 5-10 minutes. Libby (Toby’s sister) and Hannah (who basically runs the place in Toby’s absence) went above and beyond what should be expected from an AirBnB host. Very nice and helpful…thank you so much! L'endroit idéal pour explorer Montréal et profiter du large choix de magasins, bars et de restaurants qu'offre le quartier du Plateau Mont-Royal/Mile End. Tout comme promis et décrit.
We had a great stay here. Toby, Libby, and Hannah were helpful, clear, and responsive throughout. The apartment was very comfortable and well-located.
Great apartment and location and all communication was easy and smooth.
Great place to stay if you want to check out Montreal!

This is a great spot to stay and feel like you're living in the city.  The location is convenient even for a longer-term stay (nearby groceries, etc.), and the host is very kind and communicative– would recommend!

C’est la première fois que nous prenons un airbnb  et Libby etais super nous avons eux la chances de la rencontrer elle nous a donner de bons conseils!

L’appartement est parfaitement bien équiper agencée ! Nous etions 4, 2 adulte 1 enfant et un bébé ! Libby esr tres bien équiper pour des adultes comme pour des enfants ! Son lit parapluie nous a beaucoup servi! 

Son appartement ne manque vraiment de rien! Il est très bien situer au centre de tout! 2 arrêt de bus son proche de chez elle. Vraiment foncez y les yeux fermer ! L’appartement étais très propre .

Libby étais très disponible à chaque question elle repondais rapidement malgré quelle n’étais pas au pays , très sérieuse!

Appartement sympa bien équipé, proche des commodités (commerces, bars, restos) et calme.
nous avons apprécié la disponibilité de Toby et Libby.

Très bon rapport qualité prix, emplacement idéal pour visiter Montréal !
Je recommande +++
Appartement très bien situé, dans un quartier calme, pas loin du métro et de nombreux commerces. Très bon accueil. Idéal pour deux personnes.

Absolutely great location, couldn’t have worked out better for us. The space is great and Libby was a wonderful host. Whenever we had issues she was quick to respond and resolve them. I would highly recommend!
joli appartement, bien situé sur le plateau mont royale et du métro Parfait avec un enfant de 2 ans.

name: Au cœur de la Petite Patrie
summary: Logement de 3chambres pouvant accueillir jusqu'à 6 personnes. Cuisine rénovée et complètement équipée. Wi-fi et cable. Près du cinéma beaubien et du parc Molson, au cœur d'un quartier vivant de Montreal et près d'un métro. Il me fera plaisir de vous suggérer des endroits à découvrir dans le quartier.
space: Rénové avec goût et cachet, ce logement à aire ouverte vous offre comfort et utilité. Rangement pour visiteurs, choix de DVD, WI-FI disponible et possibilité d'accès à NETFLIX. Une grande cour est disponible aux visiteurs ainsi qu'une laveuse et sécheuse. Cuisine équipée d'un lave-vaisselle et d'un micro-ondes en plus de tout les électroménagers de bases. Ambiance chaleureuse garantie. Chambre1 = 1 lit Queen avec matelas TempurPedic Chambre2 = 1 lit double ( en hauteur) avec divan lit 1 place Chambre3= 1 lit simple
description: Logement de 3chambres pouvant accueillir jusqu'à 6 personnes. Cuisine rénovée et complètement équipée. Wi-fi et cable. Près du cinéma beaubien et du parc Molson, au cœur d'un quartier vivant de Montreal et près d'un métro. Il me fera plaisir de vous suggérer des endroits à découvrir dans le quartier. Rénové avec goût et cachet, ce logement à aire ouverte vous offre comfort et utilité. Rangement pour visiteurs, choix de DVD, WI-FI disponible et possibilité d'accès à NETFLIX. neighborhood_overview: Mon logement se trouve dans un quartier en grande expansion. Plusieurs cafés, restaurants et boutiques à quelques minutes de marche. La société des alcool du Quebec (SAQ) à un coin de rue et plusieurs épiceries fines disponibles aussi. Un beau parc et un cinéma indépendant à quelques minutes à pied. Près de la plaza St- Hubert et de deux métro. Vous êtes certains de vivre le vrai Montréal.
transit: A 10 minutes de marche des Metro Beaubien et Fabre, l'autobus 18 à un coin de rue vous emmène au métro beaubien, il passe aux 5 à 10 minutes, l'autobus 45 vous dépose au métro Fabre ou Papineau. Les horaires sont disponibles sur: STM.com
interaction: Il me fera plaisir de vous rencontrer si je suis en ville au moment de votre visite, il y aura toujours la possibilité de communiquer par téléphone et courriel si je suis à l'extérieure.
house_rules: Non fumeur, respectueux des lieux et des objets.

host.host_about: Je suis entrepreneure et mère de deux enfants. J'adore voyager et découvrir le monde et toutes ses saveurs. Je suis mariée depuis 9 ans avec un cubain, nous parlons espagnol et français. Nous voyageons le plus souvent possible et nous aimons vivre auprès des gens du pays visité plutôt que dans des hôtels. Nous sommes toujours respectueux de notre environnement. Au plaisir!

reviews.comments: What you see is what you get.  The place was very clean and no problem with parking.  It's fully furnished especially the kitchen. The neighbourhood is peaceful.  Zoe was very prompt in answering my questions and very accommodating.  Check in and out was a breeze with no hassles. I have marked this place as one of my fav and would rent it again.

Really nice place to stay, very modern and clean. We stayed with 4 adults and it was perfect. It is a bit further out of town, yet metro is nearby (10 min walk) and the area has a few nice restaurants and cafes. Highly recommended.

Great apartment in a very good location.  Zoé home is well equipped with lots of amenities and very comfortable. It is close to good restaurants and cafés, grocery stores and convenience stores. Parking was easy and the metro is a 10-15 minute walk.  Zoé is a great host and very quick to respond to any questions.  Check-in and check-out is very convenient. A great place to stay in Montreal.

Zoe was very nice and very responsive to any questions I had. The place was very modern, comfortable, and clean. I am a big clean freak so this place made me very comfortable in the cleanliness aspect. The only thing that was just a little frustrating at times was the lack of AC. Some rooms (at the front) were very hot if the doors were closed come morning time. However, seeing as most of us were out (not home) doing activities during the hot days, the nights were cool enough to open the windows, and Zoe provided a few fans, so it was manageable. Other than that, I highly recommend this place. Clean, comfortable, modernized, close to bus stops and subways, bike rental access across the street, not too far from downtown, and lots of restaurants and cafes in the area.
Simplement parfait! Propreté ,emplacement et communication étaient au rendez-vous!
Bel appart dans un beau quartier­. Et on est bien accueilli.
Zoé a été très réactive et accueillante. Très bel appartement et bien situé. Expérience à renouveler ! Je recommande.
Lovely place with a large living/dining/kitchen area. Easy on street parking a bonus.
Fantastic host, great apartment.

Logements très bien situé dans un quartier agréable.  Le métro est cependant un peu loin.
Hôte sympathique et discrète.

Zoe was very nice and was pretty quick with fixing the unfortunate leak that was caused from the neighbors upstairs. But be aware there is NO WORKING A/C, there are only a few fans. My friend was bitten by bed bugs in the smallest room. Also expect to not have any cups available. Don't even bother with finding parking. The location was not bad.
Je vous le recommande!!! Très confortable et super bien placé!!!
Appartement très bien, comme à la maison, on s'y sent bien. Zoé est tres accueillante et à l'écoute. Appartement bien situé. (Bus, metro, dépanneurs...)

name: Direct Oceanfront - Unit 149

neighborhood_overview: Escape to paradise with a beautiful beachfront tropical resort set on 6 acres with lush landscaped gardens, swaying palm trees, all sitting on the beachfront. Enjoy the three-story plantation style resort to soak up the sunshine on the beach or the beach side outdoor pool and hot tub while you sip on your favorite tropical drink from the poolside bar, or take advantage of the ocean side grills for an evening barbecue. Located on a sandy beach with breathtaking views of the blue Pacific Ocean and year-round cool trade winds. Accommodations include spacious air conditioned rooms with a private lanai with ocean or exotic tropical garden views. Walk to the popular Coconut Marketplace with dozens of boutique shops and restaurants. Located on the East-side just 7 miles north of the airport that is convenient for trips north, south, and west on the island. Renting from a privately managed unit gives you all the advantages for less the cost.
notes: Tax ID (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Car recommended
access: Enjoy the beach side pool, BBQs and free lobby WiFi.  The laundry facility on campus is for a different program, but there are laundry facilities 2 blocks away.
interaction: On island contact is available for all your communications once on island.  Any questions before we are glad to assist.
house_rules: Hawaiian law is all buildings and lanai are non smoking.  There are designated smoking areas on property. Islander on the Beach 	- Complimentary parking 	- No resort fee when staying with us 	- 2 pool towels included  	- 4 Hand/Wash/Bath Towels 	- Front desk services a different program, but you do pick up your parking pass there - only 	- Cleaning Fee is a Clean Out Fee.  Additional services can be purchased directly from housekeeping 	- The unit is provided with starter amounts of shampoo, soap, and toilet paper 	- You are responsible for your Toilet Paper, Paper Towels, Soaps and Shampoo 	 Driving direction and your access will be sent 5 days prior to arrival with your entry instructions.  If you don`t receive it, check your spam folder.  It will be coming from Info@hulanow and is sent automatically from the system.  The instructions will provide a lock box code - you will go directly to the unit and let yourself in. Your contact is Val (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Housekeeping N

host.host_about:
Hula Now is a Marketing and Reservation Company for Kauai Oceanfront Vacation Properties.

Office is open Pacific Coast Time ONLY

reviews.comments:
Location is wonderful! Steps to the beach. Ocean view. Walking distance to some restaurants. 
Especially for the price, i would probably stay again. We don't stay in the room much on vacations .... but i did wish the bed was bigger.
A few more beach towels, better microwave and a bit better on dusting the fixtures would be my suggestions.

Over all happy with our stay
Very nice location, beach right outside the Lanai

The location is absolutely stunning. The beach is right out the door and there often was very few people around. The resort staff were friendly. The condo was as pictured. Wifi didn't work most of the time I was there - I feel like perhaps it was shared with other units which wasn't great. I'm glad I didn't have to work while there.
Great location right on the ocean. Well stocked kitchenette and lots of beach supplies provided. Close to town with lots of stores and restaurants. Great place for the price.

Great location! This unit is right across the street from the market and many restaurant options are also within walking distance. You can literally watch the sunrise from your lanai here, so that can't be beat! It was nice to watch the waves  any time of day but you wouldn't want to swim at this beach.
The bed was really soft when we first sat on it but surprisingly comfortable, the pillows were lovely. There are a few beach things available that were a nice touch (possibly left by other travelers) - chairs, a football, some snorkel gear.
A few negatives - it is written in the welcome binder that you can't turn the A/C below 70 or the fridge below the midpoint or they will stop working. That was a bit frustrating. There was an odd smell in the bathroom - it may have just been that the shower curtain needed to be replaced.
We didn't end up cooking here at all as we had planned to, there were no basics like oil or salt & pepper provided and we didn't want to buy them for just a few days' stay. Plus with just the one tiny sink it seemed like a big hassle. Luckily there are lots of other options nearby.

This is a very comfortable space and very clean.  The location is incredible.  Ground floor exit from the patio leads you just steps away from the sand.  It is centrally located which makes getting to the north shore or Poipu very doable.  Check in was a breeze and there were absolutely no complaints.

If you're looking at staying here, you're doing it for the location, which is great. Literally steps from the water in Kapa'a. 

However, everything else is no frills and somewhat barebones. This location is best used as a base of operations to sleep at while you go do activities during the day. There is no cleaning service, no restocking of towels or toiletries, the bathtub plug is broken, the complimentary snorkeling equipment mask is broken (it is just complementary though). The WiFi signal is so poor it keeps dropping and its faster to just use your cell service.

However, its nearly on the beach, you can see the water from your sliding glass door and you'll hear the waves as you sleep.

Great location for a short stay on Kauai. It is on the east side, central to the north and south shores and was a great value considering how pricey hotels can be on Kauai. There is a small shopping center amongst the resort area and our unit had a view of the beach from the lanai. Check-in/check-out was seamless and there wasn't much communication with hosts but that's how I like it so it worked for us. The room has all the basic amenities and more, including snorkel gear, a body board, beach towels, and kitchenware. Wi-fi was a little spotty and I lost reception in our suite's bathroom. Would stay here again!
You can’t beat the location. The studio was clean and an ok size. The hot tub and pol was a nice touch after long days exploring!!
Great location, central to the areas we wanted to visit. Easy to find and comfortable safe location.

Place was ok, a little bit under maintained and the beach chairs were totally rusty. Bedsheets and blankets a bit too old. No pam was provided and Internet didn't work for a day. Other than that, the stay was pleasant.
Location was great if staying on the west side of the island. Perfect beach front location too, about 10 steps and you’re on the sand. Quiet, clean and perfect place to sleep.

The room is as described, but because it is managed by a property management company, it lacks the personal touches that we experienced at another unit in the same complex. 

Best feature is that it has an ocean view and is steps from the beach. They were also very responsive when the WiFi password they emailed us didn’t work. 
However, bed was too soft for my liking, and there was a funny smell in the room.
Beach access was really close. Plus you can watch the sunrise right from your balcony.
The view of the beach was amazing.  The area was convenient to airport and Lawai beach.
You won’t regret staying here! Excellent location just steps from the beach. The unit is larger than expected based on the pictures. Cold air conditioning as well. Would happily stay again

Wir waren für eine Woche auf Kauai und haben uns in dieser Unterkunft sehr wohl gefühlt. Das Abholen des Parkausweises an der Rezeption und das Erhalten des Schlüssels über den Schlüssel Safe war problemlos und ging einfach. Auch war unsere Wohnung schon über 2 Stunden früher fertig als ursprünglich geplant und wir können unser Zimmer früher beziehen. Die Anlage an sich mit Pool ist sehr ruhig und schön. Das Einkaufszentrum direkt gegenüber hat viele gute Möglichkeiten einkaufen zu gehen, ohne ein Auto benutzen zu müssen.
Wie beschrieben lag die Einheit im Erdgeschoss mit direktem Blick zum Meer. Wir haben das sehr genossen, weil man einfach die Balkontür aufmachen und direkt mit wenigen Schritten bis zum Strand gehen konnte. Schwimmen war hier super. Während die meisten Strände auf Hawaii aufgrund der Riffe fürs Schwimmen eher schwierig sind, konnten wir vor dem Restaurant circa 30 m rechts von unserem Hotel völlig frei von Riff und Steinen super gut im Wasser schwimmen. Über das Hotel gibt es kostenfrei Sonnenliegen, die man sich überall hin schieben kann wo man möchte. Dass wir in unserer Wohnung zusätzlich noch zwei kleine Strandstühle zur Verfügung hatten fanden wir super. Auch Handtücher für Bad und Strand waren mehr als ausreichend verfügbar. Für Unternehmungen auf Kauai liegt Kapaa besonders gut. Sowohl in den Norden als auch in den Süden sind alle Sehenswürdigkeiten in Kürze erreichbar. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen auf jeden Fall gerne wieder.
Loved the location! Perfect beach sunrise view every morning. Spacious, clean room. Truly enjoyed our stay.

The room was great, the location even better.  There was all kinds of kitchen supplies left over or provided but toilet paper seemed minimal.  Snorkeling gear, chairs and umbrellas provided which was a really nice touch. Easy check in, everything nearby.  A really great stay.  We stay here every time we visit family in Kauai. Highly recommend.

name: great Terrace&lift city center
summary: Bright, calm, quiet, comfortable, terrace, balcony gas heater, air conditioning, hot water, elevator, our dream, Heritage, walking distance to most important hot spots. Pedestrian streets, lively squares, modernism, Gaudi.....
space: Excellent location!!The apartment is situated at the neighborhood of Gracia.  Barcelona’s One of the best and typical Quartiers. Is like a village inside Barcelona and only 2 minutes’ walk from Paseo de Gracia.  The atmosphere made by Pedestrian Street, plenty of art galleries ,squares, shops, bars, restaurants, terraces where people gather to drink a coffee or a glass of wine… makes this quartier magical and relaxing.     High and wood ceilings make the apartment beautiful. It has a spacious a terrace and a balcony, living room with balcony, two bedrooms with double bed with access to the terrace, large kitchen and bathroom, with basin and shower. The kitchen is fully equipped: oven, refrigerator, microwave, toaster, kettle, coffee maker and a dishwasher. Washing machine is available too. It has gas hot water and gas heating.  In the living room there is a plasma TV, hairdryer in the bathroom, Iron.   You can easily reach all the sights of the city on foot or by metro line 3 Fontana o
