transit: buses and metros around the house !!! metro diagonal y fontana also metro gracia buses to move around the city.
access: wifi Air conditioned heater  complete kitchen with oven, dish washing machine terrace cloth washing machine... balcony
interaction: If you want to interact are more than welcome going out and doing local plans...
house_rules: no parties allowed. please leave rubbish on rubbish been at the street. keep house as it was yours. Enjoy and have fun ;-) parking has a cost of 18 euros per day  Please take note that that late check in fees apply: 20 h, 20 EUR 22 h, 30 EUR 24 h, 35 EUR

host.host_about:
I'm Corius, traveller, friendly, sportive...
My best destination ever Papua
I like ride horses, sailing,running,skiing,scuba dive...

reviews.comments:
Patricia is very easy to communicate and a helpfull host!
The appartment is in a perfect area, quite and safe but very nice and easy to get everywere. We stayed 4 days and had all we need.
If its hot its great to have the little Terrace.
We recommend to take bikes, its real fun.
Thank you Patricia Jeanette and Nils

Patricia was a wonderful and very helpful host, she showed us where to go for groceries and good food and helped us book taxi's when the language barrier became a problem!

The apartment itself was beautiful, very centrally located, well kept and clean. We had plenty of space and the apartment had two terraces and a lovely kitchen.

Gracia is a beautiful part of Barcelona, thank you for making our stay so lovely!

Divya and Yvette
Quartere fantastico, Casa accogliente, tutti molto disponibili.

My wife and I stayed at Patricia's apartment in Gracia with our 9 months old son and we had a fantastic stay. 

Gracia is our new favourite area of Barcelona and the apartment is close to everything. We especially enjoyed the fantastic sushi place right next door that allows you to do take away which is perfect whenn travelling with a small child and the city square just 30 meters away. 

Patricia is a fabulous host and she even provided us with a baby cot and a baby chair for our son, so we didnt have to worry about that. That made the trip a lot more relaxing. 

If you plan to do more cooking, the kitchen could need a bit more equipment and we could for example only find 2 wine glasses and a limited number of kitchen utensils, but we nevertheless managed. 

All in all we really enjoyed our stay and we recommend Patricia as a great host. 

Best, Thomas, Mette and Theodor.

Hemos estado muy agusto en este piso! Estamos muy gratamente sorprendidos!
El barrio no puede tener mas encanto, centrico, con mucha vidilla, cerca de todo, en fin ideal para unos dias en barcelona. 
El piso es muy mono pero ademas muy muy comodo. 
Los anfitriones un encanto que se han volcado con nosotros 
Yo les doy un 10!

I stayed with my family (husband and daughter) in Patricia' apartment.  We were specifically looking for a quiet place not far from the center.  And we realized that it was quite difficult to find such place in Barcelona.  But Patricia's apartment was exactly what we were looking for.  It's located in Gracia disctrict which is 5 minutes walk from Passage de Gracia (one of the main streets of Barcelona which brings you to the Cataloniya square).  But at the same time it's a district where local people leave and it has a charm old Barcelona - historical buildings, nice cosy squares full of life, plenty of food shops and even market with fresh sea food, vegetables and Spanish specialities.  This is exactly the place where you can feel the real, not turistic Barcelona.  We felt very comfortable and safe there.  The apartment is simple but has everything you need - 2 big comfortable bads, kitchen with oven, microwave and all the necessary utensils.  There is also washing machine but we did not use it.  In one of sleeping rooms there is a small cosy balcony where you can enjoy your glass of wine or breakfest.  Due to the fact that both sleeping-rooms windows looks to the patio, it's absolutely quiet at night.  And you can only hear a sound of old clock which goes from the clocktower on the neighboring square which is the main square of Gracia district.  That gives you a wonderfull feeling of being in another century.  So, we got all we have expected and even more:).  And Patricia was also great as host.  We had only one problem with wi-fi in the first day which she fixed immediately that day.  It was very easy and comfortable for us to communicate with Patricia.  So, we would recommend her appartment to those who want to enjoy real Barcelona in a comfortable and quiet way:).

Patricia was a great communicator - no waiting for answers - everything went smoothly. Unit was clean and had plenty of room - we loved its location very close to a beautiful old square full of locals - lucky enough to see one of their traditional parades. It was a metro ride away from the Gothic and Born areas of Barcelona - very easy to get to these places. Not far from Gaudi's Cathedral. We liked the fact we were away from the crowds of tourists. Streets around are narrow and quiet. Unit was very good value.

What an amazing stay we had at Patricia's charming little aptt! It was clean, with all the amenities. It was just as mentioned in the listing. She welcomed us and also gave us some useful tips to navigate Barcelona. The Kabuki Sushi restt right below the Aptt was recommended by her and it was absolutely amazing. It was a safe and in one of the most desirable neighborhood's (Garcia) of Barcelona. Supermarket and a few bars were all within walking distance.
We loved both Patricia and her apartment. We could not have been better cared for and will definitely use them again next time!
Patricia and her friend were very cooperative and helpfull. the flat was really nice and clean - a good place to explore barcelona. we had a good time and can recommend this place.

I stayed with my mum there, and Patricias flat was perfect for us two! She gave us a lot of informations and even recommended us her favourite restaurants - so kind and helpful! 
The appartment was clean and in a lovely neighbourhood, I'd love to come back!

My parents and I had a really lovely stay at Patricia's apartment. It is in a fantastic neighborhood in Barcelona, far from tourists and very local but still relatively close to everything we wanted to do. There is a great market right nearby and a lovely square with a few nice cafés and a dynamite charcuteria. The apartment itself is very comfortable, with a nice terrace. Be aware that the lift is up a few steps from the entrance. 

Patricia was great to work with as well. We didn't meet her (her boyfriend let us in), but she was ready and happy to accommodate a short-notice extra person who almost joined us there.

We had a great stay at Patricia's flat! It was very comfortable for 4 people. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen wad very well-equipped for people who like to cook, like me! We really loved sitting on the terrace in the morning to drink our coffee. The place wad also really clean and it wad nice to have the option of air conditioning or windows open, as it can sometimes be very hot in Barcelona at night. Patricia was very welcoming and offered to order a taxi to pick us up at the airport. I love the neighborhood of Gracia. There are many interesting shops, restaurants and bars, not to mention 4 plaças and 2 great food markets. It is a quick metro ride to the rest of the city, but with a lot to offer in itself! To sum up, a perfectly located place to explore Barcelona! I recommend anyone to stay here.
Patricia and Jorge are extremely accommodating and helpful. We enjoyed every minute of our stay. The apartment is very comfortable and has everything you need. I highly recommend!

Patricia was lovely and friendly over email and then meeting her. The apartment is a lovely, spacious place to stay in the best area. A square with restaurants, ham and cheese delis, bakery and markets right on your doorstep! Would definitely stay there again

Patricia was a wonderful host.  Our flight had arrived way earlier than the scheduled check in time. And she was more than accommodating to letting us check in sooner. She was very helpful with tips and a map ready for us to go explore the town! The flat is exactly as pictured and described! She came in with new linens and glassware.
Super clean  and in a great location. Neighborhood was nice. It was great to get an authentic feel of a real Barcelona neighborhood away from all the tourist stuff.
Very nice appartement. Many thanks, Patricia!

I enjoyed life in Varcelona.  Nice clean place with children. You can use free wifi and clean kitchen. Traffic is also good and you can find many nice restaurant.  George and Patricia are very kind and helpful^^.

The flat was as described and comfortable. Patricia was very kind and accommodating. She went out of her way to help us. We did have some trouble with the washing machine not working properly but she rushed over quickly to help us resolve the problem.
Barrio Gracia was everthing we thought it would be and some.......great address,walking distance from the mayor attractions in Barcelona!!! Supermarkets are nearby and also good Restaurants.

Patricia was very nice . The appartement is well located in gracia area . Clean and well furnished .
I do recommand this place .
Perfect !
The neighbourhood was not too loud, a few restaurants, the description of the apartment is detailed and correct. It is a really nice and clean flat.

Jorge and Patricia were wonderful! Very accommodating and helpful in every way :) The place was fantastic and Graciá was amazing. The recommendations they gave us for food and sights were spot on. We had such an amazing holiday and I would highly recommend this place!

Patricia made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived, nicely introducing us to the neighbourhood, as well as the fantastic apartment - which was well appointed, clean and exactly what we were hoping for.

The apartment itself is set in a lovely area of town, readily accessible on foot to almost anywhere you would want to go - the weather was lovely so we walked everywhere.

We would love to return to Barcelona, and would definitely look to stay here again!

I had a wonderful experience in the flat.  George picked me up from the airport (additional, quite reasonable fee) and brought me to the apartment (pointing out places of interest along the way) and made a recommendation for a place to have dinner.  Flat was quite convenient to everywhere I wanted to go (approximately 15-20 minute walk to most places).

Patricia & Jorge were great hosts and very accommodating as my friend and I had an early check-in and late check-out.  The listing is very well appointed and has all the comforts of a home away from home. The location is in the heart of Gracia next to one of the best public squares (Plaça de vila de Gracia). We would highly recommend a long weekend or extended stay here!

Another winner from AirBnB. 

A friend of mine used another website to book a fairly awful apartment in Barcelona. Around 2am on the second night we couldn't take it and made an "instant booking" with Patricia. She was out of the city, and didn't see my message until early morning. Still, Patricia was able to contact me and arrange for us to check in early. She made sure we knew all the necessary information and made it clear I could contact her at anytime if I needed to.

The apartment itself is somewhat nicer than the pictures show. The terrace off the large bedroom is great for relaxing and having breakfast, the front is nice to look into the street and feel the vibe. There were towels for each of us and soap in the bathroom and kitchen. It is very bright, the air conditioning works great, and the bathroom and kitchen are all in excellent order. We found the beds to be very comfortable as well. The location is really nice. We rented bikes and used them all the time, so I can't really comment on the public transportation access. There is an elevator which is really small, but very handy for luggage hauling. 

All in all just a fantastic experience. I will be staying here again on future trips and I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Barcelona.
Lovely apartment, in a great area! Patricia was very helpful!

Perfect location in the Gracia district od Barcelona. Safe, clean, all the right amenities. So many shops close by- from premium to cute little boutiques. Some of the best restaurants in the city are a quick walk away. Patricia was very quick to respond. While I didn't get to meet her, I met Joe who let us in. Thanks Patricia!

Patricia was a helpful host who offered a variety of services to make our Barcelona trip more enjoyable. We took her up on the airport pickup, which allowed us to get the keys quickly without risking any taxi or public transport mishaps, and got some good tips about the local neighborhood. The place was exactly as pictured and even has a (micro) elevator in the building! Great restaurants and shops are conveniently around the corner, and the place is only around some €10-15 taxi ride away from the beach! Check out Gaudi's Park (Park Guell) as well, a great day trip that's really close to the apartment.
Patricia was a great host  and gave us lots of help to appreciate Barcelona and the Gracia area which was tranquil and fascinating

This was a very nice place to stay in Barcelona. The location is a perfect spot in Gracia which is also my favorite neighborhood.

Patricia was very welcoming and accommodating. I made a last minute booking after my trip got extended and she went out of her way to make it work out for me.

The place itself is very comfortable and has everything that one needs for an enjoyable stay.

The apartment is great and Patricia was the perfect hostess. The apartment is very cosy and spacious, and its location in Gracia is super, with nice restaurants and bars close by. Patricia is super nice, she made us feel very welcome and provided lots of helpful information. I will highly recommend this apartment if you want an easy and enjoyable stay in Barcelona!

The flat was lovely. Very clean and comfortable. On a quiet street in a great part of Barcelona. Not too touristy with lots of shops and restaurants to explore. Also a really nice market nearby. The flat was easy to get to and from anywhere in Barcelona.

Patricia was very friendly and welcoming and gave us lots of tips about local restaurants. Would definitely consider staying at her flat again.

El piso es muy confortable, estaba muy limpio y es acogedor. Está muy bien equipado además. La localización es óptima. El  barrio de Gracia sn una zona ideal para gozar Barcelona. Total que estuvimos encantados de pasar unos días allí.

Although it was well situated, and Patricia was nice, we were disappointed by the apartment. 
It is a good size apartment for 3 adults, or two adults and two children (we were 2 with 3 children which was ok for 5 nights). 
It is situated in Gracia, in a very nice part of Barcelona, some minutes ago from tube station Diagonal which is perfect. 
Patricia gave us some tips regarding the surroundings and helped us to book a taxi for our departure. 


Regarding the apartment, it was not worth what we paid: 
- the shower curtain was broken and left on the floor when we arrived. The bathroom is not as "new" as said in some comments...
- the kitchen was poorly equipped for 4 people
- the bed in which our 2 eldest children slept was a good size for 2 but the blanket and the pillows were from another age. The pillows were so much old and dirty, they were almost brown, which is unacceptable when you know the price of a pillow at Ik*a.  The blanket and the sheets were for a single bed.
We found a sheet that had not been washed, hopefully, we asked for cleaned sheet and Patricia left it in the apartment while we were out. 
- hopefully, our bed was comfortable. But before coming in her apartment, I had asked Patricia if there were black curtains to the windows and she had answered yes, which was right, but only in one of the 2 bedrooms and in the leaving room.

Conclusion: very good situation but the flat really needs to be refurbished. At this price, the hotel is more competitive.
位置还算可以,步行到名牌街10分钟,楼下就有一家味道不错的日本料理,晚上去的稍晚就得等位排队｡只是房子比较旧,卫生间有难闻的味道,我们自己跑超市买的除味剂,但是房间比较干净｡房东很热情,让旅行路上的人觉得温暖!
Bardzo przyjemne mieszkanie! Właściciele sympatyczni i szybki kontakt! Polecam
Very good apartment, close to everything. Patricia is an incredibly good host and very nice person.

Patricia's place is wonderful and she was very helpful and accommodating.  She gave us recommendations for local restaurants, shopping and help getting around.  This appears to be a rental, but personally I think it's a bit creepy staying in someone's home so this is what I was looking for.  Complete kitchen, nice bath and she includes the essentials.  I think the only thing we had to buy other than food was some more toilet paper.   Patricia responds to emails promptly and was very friendly.  The highest complement I can give is that I will definitely stay here next time I am in Barcelona.   There is a really popular and excellent sushi restaurant right next door and a great square half a block away with coffee shops and restaurants.  We made our own coffee every morning but went to the bakery right across the street for fresh Pa (bread) and Croissants.

I cannot say enough good things about Gracia.  If you want to hang out with tourists and junk shops, stay near the Ramblas or in the Barri Gotic.    If you want to stay with the locals, in a central location, Gracia is the neighborhood.  At the local market, which is 3 blocks away, we were consistently the only tourists there as opposed to the famous La Boqueria which is crawling with them and does not have the neighborhood vibe.  Same for the restaurants and bars in Gracia:  mostly locals and all excellent.  Buses aren't right outside your door, but an easy walk to Diagonal from where you can go anywhere.  Between the Citymapper app and (Hidden by Airbnb) maps the extensive bus system is easy to use.

If you just want to hit museums and sights and want to be able to get a taxi or metro right out your front door, there are probably better places to stay.  But I am telling you, you will miss what Barcelona is really about.
Nice apartment with a perfect location! Patricia was very helpful and recommended us a lot of nice restaurants.
Patricia was more than a great host, she was very helpful and contactable when needed! Wouldn't have asked for a better trip - thanks Patricia :)

We stayed at this apartment for a month in May and overall it was a disappointing experience. Firstly the apartment looks better in the photos than it actually is. Secondly we had problems with various aspects of the apartment ; the TV ( replaced after a week which was fine ) , the oven ( never fixed despite repeated requests ) and the bathroom ( a horrible smell acknowledged by the owners but once again nothing done to rectify the issue. However the most frustrating part was the lack of response to our texts or emails from the owners. In the end we gave up expecting a reply from them. A very poor effort in light of the fact this is the minimum you would expect and also surprising in light of previous reviews. Finally and perhaps not surprising the driver the owner organised to take us to the airport never turned up.  The only positive was the area which was lovely ; great bars, restaurants , shops and squares all very close by.
It was a great stay at Patricia's apartment! It was perfect walking distance to major Gaudi sights and very close to great tapas and cafe shops. Thank you!

We were made to feel very welcome and Patricia answered emails and questions promptly and met us in person and told us about restaurants and supermarkets in the area which was very helpful-  the apartment is well equipped and spotlessly clean, and in a perfect location! we could walk easily to the metro which took us all over the city, and local bars and restaurants were walking distance and all very good. A lot of places are walking distance -we walked to Parc Guell and to the Gothic Quarter, and found our way round easily enough-We had a great time!

Patricia welcomed us warmly and showed us the apartment, and told us a bit about the area, too. The apartment is clean, compact, and cozy. The bed is comfortable. The apartment opens at the front (LR) to the street, and at the back (BDRs) to a shared courtyard area (with other buildings). There were a couple of minor things which needed repairs (burnt-out light bulbs, e.g.) and replenishment (detergent, coffee), but I assume those things have been taken care of by now. I noticed that another reviewer had remarked on a bad smell from the bathroom. Seems to be a municipal issue; I advise keeping ALL drains firmly plugged when not using. Now, the location: fantastic (if "lively": even ordinary conversation levels ricochet off the building walls). Great proximity to everything (transit, sites), very walkable (shops), amenities galore.

The place is big, clean, and well equipped. Whatever else you need can come from the many near by stores. I was greeted kindly and on time.

Very nice central location, near a few metro lines. You can also rent bikes in many places. Between the two, you can get anywhere fast and cheap.
Nice flat, centrally located - nur not noisy, pleasingly furbished. Patricia is very welcoming. Thanks for having us!

The apartment is nice, situated in a lively neighbourhood with a lot of restaurants and shops nearby. We loved to buy bread at the bakery right across the street and some lovely ham and cheese at the charcuteria and have breakfast at the balcony.

Patricia was waiting me in the apartment as prior agreed, she was very helpful to explain everything about the apartment and the surrounding. The apartment itself was nice, though it looks bit better on the pictures than in reality. The air-condition is only in the living room, which is not a problem if you leave the doors open to the bedroom. One big plus is the balcony. Overall good experience

Patricia's place in Gracia is wonderful. Perfectly located near a bakery, lovely small plaza and plenty of cafes and a few small bars. We arrived a bit early but Patricia was extremely helpful in letting arrive early and organising to have the flat cleaned while we were out. Would definitely recommend!
I just came back with 2 best friends- The place was great, everything was great! The location, the balcony, the beds.. Very clean and very nice hosts. I will Definitely go back!!! :)

Nice apartment with great location!
Loved the area.

We had a great stay at Patricia's apartment. She was very proactive in making sure our arrival went smoothly and responsive to our questions before and after booking. 

The apartment is very nice and clean, exactly as expected from the photos. And we loved the neighborhood. There's a little plaza at the end of the block with several cafes that we spent a lot of time at. And in general, the location is a great jumping off point for exploring the city.

j'ai été déçue de la prestation. le tarif n'est pas en rapport avec.
Je continue à faire confiance à airbnb néanmoins.

Le quartier de Gracia est très sympa, surtout au moment du 15 aout, c'est la Festa Major de Gracia, les rues sont animées et les gens très chaleureux. L'appartement est agréable, cependant le salon sur rue peut être bruyant le soir (beaucoup de touristes) et le matin ( ramassage poubelles, travaux etc.). L'accueil n'était pas vraiment agréable, 15 euros à payer par heure de retard, or nous étions coincés dans les embouteillages! Nous n'avons pas vu Patricia, nous l'avons eue au téléphone seulement, nous avons été reçus par Miguel, qui nous a demandé 15 euros pour le retard. Nous avons eu le sentiment d'un vrai buisness, le propriétaire a plusieurs appart que Patricia gère et loue cher aux touristes. C'est plus rentable que de louer à l'année à des espagnols! Le parking est payant en plus, 18 euros par jour, alors que l'annonce propose un parking gratuit. Bref, c'est bien si vous avez de l'argent à dépenser, sinon vous pouvez trouver plus sympa et moins buisness ailleurs dans barcelone.

The place is very nicely located and clean. We were lucky to have a warm welcome as there were lots of festivities going on in neighbourhood.

Patricia was not able to open door for us, but she arranged somebody to take care of this in her place. Although communicating with him was a bit difficult (due to our lack of Spanish) we managed.

We were allowed to leave the apartment without check by Patricia, which was very convenient as we had a very early flight. Overall good experience and pleasant stay!

Estuvimos muy a gusto en la casa. La descripción era correcta: Es una casa muy bien equipada y cómoda. Tenía de todo y en buenas condiciones. El barrio muy bonito y bien situado.  Patricia ha sido muy amable, nos ha ayudado en todo lo que hemos necesitado (y no solo en lo relacionado con la casa) . En definitiva, nos volvemos muy contentas y con la idea de volver algún día. Gracias Patricia ¡ Hasta la próxima!
Our hosts were exceptionally helpful and gracious with their time. The space was perfect and the neighborhood was one of our favorites during our stay.
Great location and nice place. We arrived early then expected. And, we run into the previous guests.

Great experience in Barcelona! The apartment is in a great neighborhood, every daily necessity (grocery, market, restaurants) is within a very short walk. Access to the popular sites is an average of 20 minutes from "home". Would go again in a heartbeat.

It has been an amazinng week end for the four of us. Patricia insured us with an incredible stay experience. She really took care of us and recommended us with all type of perfect places to explore the city in the most authentic way.
Hope to do it again!

The hospitality of Patricia and her husband was terrific and welcome after a long trip. We were almost a day late due to weather issues and they were extremely accommodating. It was easy to keep in touch and let them know about our delays.

We loved the neighborhood. It is not in a high traffic tourist area, has the charm of an historic part of the city and all of the necessary conveniences nearby. It also is safe and easy to get around and there are many lovely restaurants and bakeries nearby.The space is as described and a good example of a traditional Barcelona apartment in a charming older building. The facilities were clean and the linens fresh.

Hello All ;-) I have no words to describe my experience, perhaps PERFECT is not enough. The area is really nice and quiet, Gracia barrio have an special Catalan flavour, you can do what ever you need walking, there are many options in terms of Restaurants, Shops etc. The department  is PERFECT for a Family of 4/5 members, as well as  just to spend a few days working.

We had a great stay in Patricia's apartment. It is well appointed and perfectly situated for walking the Gracia area and Las Ramblas to the harbor. Very safe and clean area and quiet at night. The two balconies were also a treat. Lots of restaurants and markets in the immediate area for easy shopping. A very nice square just down the block for relaxing over a coffee or vino. Patricia stopped by to offer sight seeing suggestions...very helpful.

I was able to book this apartment on very short notice (mid-week), and still Patricia's husband met me at the appointed time, and showed me around the place. I had just finished walking the Camino de Santiago before visiting Barcelona, and it turns out he had done it many years ago himself, so we started talking about our experiences. He was very friendly and it was a good chat. The place itself was spacious for the money, charming, comfortable and VERY close to an old-town plaza in Garcia -- as well as all the shopping on the main streets. Also, Gaudi's La Pedrera is walking distance away. Traveling alone, it was more space than I needed, but a far better deal than the hotels! Also, the wi-fi was smokin' fast, so I was able to take care of some business on my iPhone using that. Plus, with the Smart TV and the bluetooth keyboard, it was like having a computer internet terminal at your disposal. I appreciated that since I was traveling without a computer or tablet. Very happy with my time there.

My family and I stayed at Patricia's for five nights.  Her and George treated us extremely well upon our arrival.  They even arranged to have a taxi pick us up at the airport and took us to the front door.  We even enjoyed a lunch with them as we arrived early and were waiting on the previous guests to vacate the apartment.  They are wonderful people and gave lots of ideas on things to do and see.  The apartment was well appointed and we cooked several meals there.  The clothes washer was nice to have.  The location is in a nice neighborhood with a bakery and food market very close.  There's a clock in the nearby square that can be heard ringing in the morning and evenings but can be enjoyable.  I would definitely stay there again when I return to Barcelona.
Wir waren sehr zufrieden. Freundlicher Empfang, zentrale Lage, hervorragende Kommunikation. Empfehlenswert
Absolutely loved the neighbourhood! The apartment was great, very clean and comfortable. Patricia gave us very thorough and helpful instructions. Would stay again!

Nette kleine Wohnung in guter Lage. Sehr nette Gastgeberin. Wohnung ist gut ausgestattet. Kleines Schlafzimmer mit einem sehr bequemen Bett. Bäcker direkt gegenüber und Supermärkte in der Nähe. 
Direkt am Place Villa Gracia

Io e mio marito siamo stati ospiti da Patricia per 3 notti. Appartamento confortevole, molto grande, bagno in discrete condizioni. Abbiamo potuto parcheggiare la nostra auto in un parcheggio vicino. Il quartiere in cui si trova la casa è molto piacevole e tutto da scoprire. Abbiamo girato Barcellona affittando delle bici vicino a casa. Molto divertente!
The apartment was very nice and spacious. Patricia was very helpful.

Overall we had a good experience staying in Patricia's flat. Location of the flat is great, although it is very central right next to busy square, it is quiet inside and we were able to have good nights sleep - even with small children! Few downsides include very small lift (of course, appreciate the fact there is one!), however it's just for one person. If like me you have 2 small kids and a bag on a shoulder you won't be able to fit inside. Also it's way too small for buggy. There is no window in the bath which is very bad for overall ventilation of the flat. There is a sewage smell outside, but that seems to be a wider problem in Barcelona. Having said all that, the flat has all the amenities needed; the host was very nice and provided us with the cot for the baby. Although a bit of tlc and maintenance is needed, the flat is spacious and clean. In the end, nice stay. Thank you!
Everything was ok, thx.
Apartment was great, exactly as I expected and Patricia was very helpful and responsive leading up to our arrival.  Great experience.

Gracia was our favorite neighborhood in Barcelona and this apartment was the perfect place to stay.  Everything was very comfortable and Patricia was a great host even welcoming us very late at night after our plane was delayed.  Strongly recommend.

Patricia and her husband were great hosts. Checking in was easy even though we arrived a bit after the set time. The apartment is cozy ad the location is just amazing right in the heart of Gracia, a lively neighborhood. We traveled with grandma, a 7yr old and 9month old baby and the apartment was really quiet at night even with the buzziling outside on the weekend. The main plaza is just around the corner with great cafes and restaurant until well late into the night. Easy to walk to just anywhere as the Paseo de Gracia is two blocca away with high end stores and cafes. I loved our stay at an affordable price. The flat is clean and well stocked with all you will need for your stay.

We loved our stay in Patricia's place! The apartment is beautiful, clean, and homely. The balconies out the front and back are great to sit on and relax in the sun and there's a sweet view out the front onto a quintessential pretty Barcelona street. We had all we needed - towels, some toiletries, kitchen utensils etc. The beds are also very comfortable! Patricia and Kumar were both organised and friendly in providing information and welcoming us to the flat. 

The apartment is in an amazing part of town close to many bars, tapas places, the lovely Placa del Sol, and Park Guell - it's also an easy walk down into the Gothic Quarter. 

Highly recommend this place for a stay in Barcelona! It's perfect!

Patricia made it easy to check in. There was someone waiting to show us around and they were really really helpful. They gave me loads of really useful information about the Gracia and Barcelona in general. We felt immediately very comfortable.

My mom and I had such a great and relaxing two nights at Patricia's place. I had come from Menorca where my luggage was lost for days and Patricia was so helpful in assisting me with working with the airport and getting the bags delivered to Barcelona. Due to the bags we also were late to our check in and she and Kumar were so gracious. 
The flat is beautiful and feels like home, love the neighborhood Gracia! So central to everything yet feels like a small neighborhood. Having two balconies was a treat and the amenities such as the washer really came in hand. Would definitely recommend!
it was a pleasant stay with the apartment in Barcelona. The location is nice and the apartment is neat :) very nice restaurants around and bakery shops

El departamento es cómodo y está ubicado en una zona muy agradable e interesante, segura y cerca de los lugares de interés. 
Patricia y Kumar fueron atentos y prestos a ayudar desde antes de llegar. Muy ejecutivos.
Muy recomendable. 
Muchas gracias Patricia.

Très bel appartement, très bien situé, très grand...
Très bon accueil.
Que du positif.
Je le recommande .
Si je reviens à Barcelone j'y retournerai sans hésiter.
The apt is in perfect location, in middle of Garcia nice place to stay
L'appartement est situé dans un quartier super sympa avec petits commerces et restaurants et tout proche du centre
Patricia was responsive to our initial questions and email communication and the gentleman waiting for us at the flat was also very nice.
Super appartement que ce soit au niveau de la propreté ou de l'emplacement ! Je recommande sans hésitation !

Very good stay! Good location near enough to the metro to get you to the city center or to the beach, and really close to shops and other places to eat. Apartment itself was very clean and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Only complaint is the door to get into the building was sometimes difficult to open but that was a minor inconvenience  and didn't affect the pleasantness of our stay.
Lindo departamento con todas las comodidades! Buena ubicación! Tuvimos una linda experiencia

Perfectly located, comfortable flat just off lovely square in Gracia neighbourhood, good  for public transport and sights and quiet at night. Patricia was very responsive, checking in and out was a breeze. Narrow staircase and small lift makes getting large suitcases to third floor a little awkward, but doable. We were with 3 adolescent children and the space was fine. Private small balcony out back nice touch for parents to have some alone time. Small  supermercado next door for supplies. Highly recommend

There was nobody to greet us when we arrived, and we were only advised that day that there was a big fiesta going on in the area, so it was very noisy at night on both nights of our stay.  And we would have preferred to stay somewhere quieter.  Live bands very close to the accommodation playing until at least 2am, fireworks going off frightening the baby.  Normally this would be an excellent place to stay as it was close to everything.  And the apartment was big and roomy and had all the amenities we needed.

We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment, which is in Vila de Gracia. The private small balcony in one of the rooms was nice. The supermarket just next door was very convenient. Very nice restaurants and bakery shops within 2-minute walking distance from the house (don't miss the Las Euras Restaurant). However, there is one thing you need to be aware of if you have a car, and that's the festival time; during this period most of the alleys towards the house are closed and so, you won’t be able to drive up to the apartment’s entrance. That's what happened to us, and we weren’t informed ahead of the time that there was going to be a festival in the neighborhood. We ended up looking for a public parking for about an hour. Patricia was helpful in guiding us to a nearby parking when we called her and explained the situation, but had we known about the festival, we would have saved time and energy.

This is the place to stay in Barcelona. Amazing, amazing, amazing!!! The apartment is in a perfect location. The apartment is classic and beautiful and has two balconies to enjoy the ambiance. If you are considering this apartment, look no further.

Appartement spacieux et confortable. Propre. On nous a mis à disposition un lit bébé.  L'appartement est bien situé dans Barcelone avec une grande place animée et nombreux restaurants à proximité. Pas de nuisances sonores. Le tarif du parking à 18 euros 50 ne s'applique que sur demande (sinon 25 euros par jour) et si on y laisse la voiture à la journée.

Great location!  Walking distance to the things we wanted to do.  Lots of great restaurants nearby.  

Place itself was clean, spacious, and AC worked well.

From the first moment I reached out to Patricia, she was very helpful in providing the information i needed to make this booking.  Everything that she mentioned in her description of the flat was as you see in the photographs.    And of course, the Gracia district is a wonderful neighborhood to stay in as well... a little bit out of the fray found in the Gothic quarter, but close enough to have access to any/all of the sites, sounds - and wonderful restaurants.

Good to be allowed in early, although we had no phone number or information on which bell to press. The apartment is in a terrific position near to a lovely square, is relatively spacious and has a well equipped kitchen. The bathroom is fine, with a powerful shower. However, the photos are deceptive, and there has been little recent maintenance. The blind in the second bedroom - not the one pictured - was ripped and the mechanism was broken, so it was not possible to raise it, making the room always dark. The window itself, which can be accessed from the balcony, has no handle or lock, a clear security hazard. There is only one bedside lamp in the main bedroom, not two as pictured, and it didn't work - neither did the one in the second bedroom. The wall lights in the living area would not work, the uplighter had no bulb, a kitchen wall light has no shade and the extractor in the bathroom does not function. The air conditioning in the living area is efficient, but there is none in either bedroom. The second bedroom has no mirror. All of which is a shame, as this is potentially an excellent place to stay in Barcelona.

Patricia was a fantastic host.  She helped us when we needed her assistance. The flat was just as pictured with multiple views from the balconies.  The place was clean and very spacious.  The location was within walking distance to many local restaurants and shops.  Also within a 15 minute walking distance was Gaudi's Casa Mila, a great bonus for us Gaudi fans.  We recommend her place to anyone who is staying in Barcelona.

Greeting with Kumar is smooth, he was in the flat waiting when I arrived. The location is superb, quiet and local area,Japanese restaurant and a small supermarket just downstairs. Room is clean and the shower is good. If the host, Patricia would respond to the message more often, it would make a perfect stay.

Sejour magique! Patricia est très chaleureuse et disponible.l'appartement est idealement plaçé, proche des commerces et ideale pour decouvrir Barcelone a pied! Appartement propre et bien agençé, petite rue piétone et balcon pour en profiter. Je vous le recommande chaudement et merci a toi Patricia pour ta gentillesse a bientot
Great experience. Excellent apartment and location. Very easy check in.

The apartment is in a charming neighborhood, opens to a narrow street and very close to cafes, restaurants, pastry shops, groceries. It is away from the tourist hustle and bustle, so you can feel what it would  be like to actually live in Barcelona. The bedroom has a small terrace, where we sat and enjoyed our morning coffee, with the neighborhood spread before us. 
You can hear the life of Barcelona easily in the living room. I personally love this. But it is something to be aware of. The elevator is small, reflective of the time of the build. 
It was easy to find the apartment, Patricia was available by phone and we were greeted by an assistant who was very welcoming, helped us with our luggage and provided all answers to our questions.

The location is fantastic, delightful apartment, comfy beds and great kitchen facilities. The square close by is delightful, with great cafes and shops.  Easy to get cabs.  Two balconies, one opens to a beautiful historic street.

What a great location! Live like a local in this lovely and well kept apartment. The apartment is excellent and everything you need, from supermarkets, to pharmacies and train stations are all close by. Patricia is very helpful and responsive. Highly recommended.
Una gran situació en la ciudad y el apartamento genial.

Patricia nous a facilité l'arrivée dans son appartement et notre départ, en nous permettant d'y entreposer nos bagages après l'heure officielle  mentionnée dans sa description. 2 jeux de clés sont à disposition, facilitant ainsi les déplacements.
Toutefois, l'appartement est trop peu lumineux, et trop mal insonorisé. Des problèmes de fermeture et d'isolation de fenêtre d'une chambre nous ont privés de l'utilisation de celle-ci.

The apartment is very spacious, offering two different balconies to enjoy. The pictures offer a very accurate depiction of the unit. What I enjoyed the most; however, was the area that the Airbnb unit was. It is very close walking distance to many restaurants and cafes but far enough from the major tourist hubs to get a more local vibe to your stay. 

Like some of the other reviews, there seems to be quite a lot of street noise that you can hear from the unit during the night so if you are a light sleeper that may be an issue. Another thing, the bathroom ventilation isn't the best (there is none) and the bathtub really badly needed some Draino. The tub did not drain that well so when we shower, there would be at least 1-2 inches of water that would gather. Because it drains so slow, the tub would get that nasty layer of soap scum. We had to shower, turning the water on and off during our shower along with rinsing the tub after each person which was inconvenient. 

Overall, we really enjoyed the unit and the location. It was perfect for what we were looking for during our stay. The reason my rating for this place is mediocre is the host. 

Patricia seemed to be great prior to booking. She responded very quickly and answered the questions directed at her. However come closer to the day of our check-in, she wasn't responsive at all. Information such as check-in procedures or parking accommodation (she list parking on site as a feature) should be pretty standard. However come 1-2 days before my check-in when I was messaging about how to check-in she was not responsive. When you are traveling a good 24 hours to get there, worrying about figuring out how to meet your host to get into your Airbnb unit was the last thing you would want to worry about. But that isn't even the worst of it. My major complaint is that when we messaged her about one of the balcony doors not working, she responded immediately and sent someone to fix it. However, our other messages about where we can park our rental car were blatantly ignored. This just makes me think she only responds to things that's imperative to her and not her guests. And still to this day, all our messages went without responses. Pretty much the worst host experience, ever.
El apartamento es muy bonito y lindo, situado en un buen barrio y sobretodo cercano a los transpotes publicos

El apartamento está super bien ubicado en el corazòn del barrio de Gracia, es muy lindo el barrio y cerca de todo! El departamento es luminoso espacioso y muy cómodo! Jorge nos ayudo con todas las valijas y además fueron muy flexibles con el horario de check in y check out! Sin dudas recomendaré el lugar ;)
Great big apartment that does everything you need for an apartment in the great Gracia neighbourhood.
Lovely place. Great location. Wonderful host.

The property was very nice. Excellent location with all the amenities. We were late in arriving but Patricia had arranged for someone to be present with the keys. We had an excellent stay and I would certainly recommend the property to someone travelling to Barcelona.
Good location, nice apartment!

LOCATION
Fantastic. Right in the heart of Gracia - a former village outside of Barcelona now incorporated. 
Restaurants, Bars, shops...you'll find it all at an arms length. 
The area to us was very cozy and lovely. We would return here to feel home again any time. 

PLACE
We stayed over New Years Evening so we pie a hefty premium. For that price we would definitely not stay here again. The apartment does the trick: roof over your head, beds, kitchen and bathroom. But above that it lacks charm, love for detail and is apparently run by a company as opposed to a host - like so many in Spain and Portugal. 
NOTE
The stair case is steep, twisted and narrow. If you are with a baby - like us - this was a bit of a hassle. If you have disabilities you should not rely on the elevator. It broke down on us. So maybe choose a differing apartment. 

So in a nutshell:
It houses you but that's about it. All is clean and essential necessities are all met but really that's it.

Patricia est facilement joignable et répond toujours très rapidement aux message. 

Son ami nous a accueilli à Barcelone pour la remise des clés malgré notre retard à l'heure du RDV un 1er janvier. Nous nous en excusons encore. 

L'appartement était très bien situé et correspond au photo et à la description.   

Il y avait juste un petit problème avec la fenêtre d'une chambre qui ne se fermer bien mais à part cela tout était parfais. (Il manquait juste une couverture pour une 5e personne, mais l'appartement est très bien chauffé).

Ayant oublié un sac en quittant l'appartement Patricia est restée disponible pour nous aider à le retrouver. Merci beaucoup 

De plus Patricia parle français et anglais, ce qui est assez pratique quand on ne parle pas espagnol. 

Je recommande cet appartement.
Great location, nice part of the City, A good size apartment for two.
great location and cosy

Everything was perfect! The Appartement looks great, was clean, warm and cozy (we stayed there in january with our baby). The kitchen was well equiped and the communication was as well fast and very friendly. I absolutly recommend this Appartement!
Muy bien comunicada. Bien equipada, hemos pasado buena estancia
Ottima location

Lovely stay in Barcelona. The location is great. Generally all that you need is included. Patricia and Kumar had promptly fulfiled all requests and were kind. The parking is pricey in this area. I really recommend not travel by car.
Enjoyed my stay. Very handy to everything, quiet but close to the square and other amenities. I would stay here again.

I would like to say thanks for everything. 
We have arrived to the appartment and found Kumar waiting for us, he helped us with our bags and he offered some information as well as advices on the area and the city in general. 
The place it self is very clean and organized, the apprtment is equipped with almost all what you need. 
The location is great close to the metro and also to shops, bars, restaurants. The area is livley and full of things to enjoy. In the living room you can hear some of the street noise -but it was fine- once you are in the bedrooms you hear nothing anymore. 
We were there with our daughter (less than two years old) and everything was fine. 
The elvator was a bit small but it didn't really effect us much. 
I would strongly recomend this place if you are looking for a clean and organized stay also in a great location.

Muy buena ubicacion! Check in y check out facil. El departamento esta en un 2 piso con un balcon al frente muy lindo y otro balcon al contrafrente donde en un cuarto encontramos un lavarropas muy bueno y un tender super practico.
La casa esta equipada con todo lo necesario.
Puntos a Reveer, cambiaria los juegos de sabanas, acolchados y las cortinas que ya estan muy viejas.
Al igual que el cubre sillon y los almoadones del living 
Volveria!
Saludos
Quiet, comfortable and perfect for my one-night stay. Thanks for hosting!

If you want to stay in Vila de Gràcia then this location is perfect. Bedrooms are on the side of the flat that is away from the street so it's relatively quiet for sleeping. Also the beds and pillows were very comfortable--much beyond what I would normally expect! This was a good place and I would stay here again.
2nd floor aptment, narrow staircase, nice living room space (though the sofa is a sofa bed). Most importantly, lots of great places within walking distance-- make sure to explore!
It's amazing, clean, cozy apartment like home. With all necessary equipment. Perfect location! My highly recommendations to stay in this place.

The flat is nice and clean as advertised, though impersonal (as i's run as a business...). The communication with Patricia was very good and easy. About the location, the district of Graciais great, little streets and beautiful squares, plenty of bars/restaurants around. The side of the 2 bedrooms is quiet, but some -damn-  church bells ring every morning frequently between 7h and 12h! The neighbours are pretty unfriendly.The window of the small bedroom was impossible to open, and the window shade almost brocken (too old...), but Patricia told me it will be fixed upon our departure!

Patricia's place is located centrally and conveniently near Metro station and Diagonal. It is easy to get taxis from, and has stores nearby. 
We enjoyed our stay. The kitchen needs small repairs.
location is perfect! parkring is located around the corner, but it's not free. I recommend this apartment.
We spent a really good stay at Patricia's. The flat is located in Gracia, a famous neighborhood in Bcn. Very clean and similar to what is described on the ad. We strongly recommend it.

The apartment was a wonderful part of our trip to Barcelona that we called home for a week. They say location, location, location is everything and this was true with this apartment. Perfectly situated neat the Plaza de Garcia, walkable to everything from a market downstairs, to pizza, sushi, bakeries, coffee all less than a block from the apartment's main entry. The availability to find an adult beverage never lets you down in Spain and this location didn't either as there are a dozen places within a block to get a beer or wine. The nearby plaza is a block away where one can eat, drink or just relax on a bench and watch the locals enjoy the town square and bell clock tower. We walked a lot during our stay to get to know the city better. We would walk 3-5 miles away to get to popular areas like Las Ramblas, Park Guell, Camp Nou but only because we chose to. Other times we would just walk a very short distance to the end of the street to catch a cab or walk 2 blocks to get on to the public metro system which is a real value and easy to use to get anywhere in the city. The apartment comes with everything you need, air conditioning, full kitchen, clothes washer, two balconies, dining table and living room. Definitely very roomy for just one couple as we did but could comfortably fit a smaller family of 4 or 5. The bedrooms were on the quiet side of the apartment so that was an added bonus as it is common to hear the locals walking in the streets at all time of the night from their night out and expressing their happiness to all to hear but from the bedrooms, we didn't hear anything. Patricia was very accommodating and has excellent communication prior to our arrival. I wouldn't change a thing if given another opportunity to return. Thanks Patricia!
Excellent location and great value!
Muy bien ubicado, el piso muy bien, muy amables y atentos y todo preparado para tener una buena estancia a un precio muy adecuado. Repetiremos seguro.

Patricia has a lovely and clean place and the location is just wonderful!

We had a tricky start getting into the apartment. This meant that my friend and I had around a 30 minute wait. It's a shame that it was grey and cold which only made the wait that more painful.

After the booking was made, I called Patricia several times and unfortunately communication wasn't as responsive as I'd expect it would be for a listing that is avaliable as an instant booking.

Nevertheless, once we got in the apartment was lovely and we enjoyed our short stay.
Good

We were two couples in Spain for two weeks and this was our 4th and final Airbnb apartment. The previous apartments and hosts were great! This stay was quite the opposite!  I messaged Patricia over 10 days before check in and again two days before, and she had not responded to either messages. This was through Airbnb. I then reached out to Airbnb for help, they too could not get ahold of her. They suggested we find alternative lodging to ensure we had a place to stay in Barcelona because we couldn't confirm with Patricia. So, we spent half the day of our vacation time doing so, which was no easy task since this was now two days before check in, in Barcelona! We finally had to have our host call her for us to see if he could get her.......and he did! He confirmed everything and we checked in.
The apartment was in a great location, however, the state of it was not! The towels were stained and the shower curtain smelled bad which made the bathroom smell too! As a result, we ended up washing the shower curtain. The bathtub was not draining so we were taking showers in standing water. Also, the kitchen was not cleaned properly. We even saw a few roaches in the kitchen. All of this we were okay with, however, there is only one thing we had the hardest time with. In the apartment description, it states "Air conditioning" what it does not state is that it is only in the living area!  Even with the bedroom doors open, we had a hard time sleeping. Even if we had ceiling fans that would have helped. We paid good money for this apartment and we did not feel that it was up to par! Check in was with someone else, so we didn't even meet Patricia. She didn't even apologize for not responding to my messages. Overall, not a pleasant experience at all!
我觉得这里很方便,而且很干净,但是整个楼是比较老的,房间一面还是有些老旧的感觉,但是地理位置确实很棒的!

Patricia's apartment is in a terrific location.  .5 from several metro stations and
Walking distance to fabulous shopping and dining on Passeig de Gracia.  There is a quaint square 50yards away from apartment along with fresh fruit and vegetable store around the corner.  There is a small grocery store literally 25 ft from apartment and a larger one across Square.  Kibuki Japanese Restaurant was excellent.  Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Excellent area, lovely apartment. Problems with communication. Although I did book at the last minute I felt like a bit of a nuisance. This is a shame, had I got replies to some or all of my messages I would've overlooked the other minor problems.

Patricia es excelente anfitriona, siempre dispuesta ayudar y complacer los clientes. Fuimos a quedarnos dos dias en Barcelona, pasamos muchos contratiempos antes de llegar porque nuestro vuelo se atrasó y luego perdidos una maleta lo que hizo que llegaramos bien tarde al apartamento, ella siempre fue considerada y nos espero hasta tarde para recibirnos. Sus apartamentos son super comodos y ofrecen al cliente lo básico para que no pases necesidades y estan muy bien hubicados.  Patricia nos dio muchas sugerencias las cuales fueron bien acertiva. La recomiendo al 100%
Check in was organized and easy. Location is perfect. Everything just as advertised. Thanks!
Things were nicely equipped but it wasn't clean enough. In general it was okay.
Great flat, flexible check in hours ans help from professionals

Patricia's apartment is in a terrific upper middle class neighborhood - Gràcia. We loved wandering from square to square in the neighborhood - sampling fabulous food and excellent gelato! It is walking distance to lots of shopping and dining. 

There is a fabulous bakery for breakfast croissants and pastries straight out of the oven - about a block and a half away on the main street. You can visit a pretty big fresh fruit, vegetable and seafood market (Mercat de l'Abaceria) about 6 blocks away where the locals shop. There is a small grocery store two doors away from apartment and a larger one across Square. Kibuki Japanese restaurant's sushi was excellent. 

One of our favorite spots for lunch was La Vietnamita. 3 blocks away - fantastic flavors. I can't stop thinking about it - even a couple weeks later. 

The apartment is a third floor apartment (2nd floor for Europeans) with a small elevator if needed. There was lots of closet space. It was very nice to have a good washing machine stocked with laundry detergent and a drying rack at the end of our trip. The shower worked great. The air conditioner is in the living room and is very quiet, but it cooled the whole apartment including the bedrooms quite well. 

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and have already recommended this apartment to some friends who are traveling to Barcelona next week. Just print out a map before you leave - to show your taxi driver. Our taxi driver from the airport claimed (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps couldn't find it - (not true by the way).

.The apartment is in a great location with a lot of restaurants around. The rooms are old and the bed sheets are not very clean, communication on checking in is not very clear and we have to go back and forth on the check in time. (After all that we still have to wait downstairs for 20 mins to get the key. ) Overall experience is okay considering the location.
Tolle Wohnung zu einem super Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis! Es wurde an alles gedacht, sogar ein Babybett gibt es. Die Kommunikation und Check-In waren super schnell und unkompliziert.

The apartment was in a lovely area, with shops and lively squares. It was well equipped and air-conditioned. When the hot water did not work, Patricia was reachable and had the problem fixed quickly. Overall, it was a very nice stay.
Location and amenities were spot on. Would stay here again.

Good location , very lovely host.
Perfect .
Séjour parfait appartement super hote tres sympa je recommande fortement cet appartement

Logement dans un quartier vivant et typique, tout à côté et très bien servis en transport en commun.
Le logement est parfait pour quelques jours mais pas forcément conforme à la "beauté" des photos. 
Terrasse avec table accessible par une des 2 chambres (pas toujours pratiques).

From my point of view this apartment is overrated. And also overpriced (nightly rate 200€+). There is no free parking. 

The location is nice but the beach is somehow more far away. In the end we had much better airbnbs.

We left home for 1 day all out and someone enter the house and stole my money from my bag, seems like a lot of people have keys copies
I did not got 1€ compensation and help, just Patricia was with me during this day with the police and so on but no financial compensation
I feel sorry about people acting like that reall,
Don't stay at this place, be safe guys and enjoy your vacation don't let irresponsible people spoil it
Great area with tons going on and easy to get to other parts of town as well...
Excellent location, beautiful apartment. High recommended to any traveller visiting Barcelona.

Place was excellent, Kumar was excellent. Were very friendly and accommodating about allowing my fiance and I to drop off bags a few hours before our actual check in. We only had this apartment the final night of our week stay in Barcelona but wished we could have had it for the rest of the week as well. The apartment itself was spacious, clean, full of character and convenient to a lot of action. However, it's also in the heart of Gracia and thus outside a lot of the more touristy craziness of Barri Gotic and the like. Patricia was responsive and friendly and Kumar, who helped settle us in, was very friendly. Thanks!
The appartment was comfortable and very nicely placed in the heart og La Gracia - excellent location!

Es un lugar con muy buena ubicación, cercano a una plaza, restaurantes y servicios.
Un espacio adecuado para descansar y salir a conocer.
Muy buena comunicación con Patricia. Responde de forma inmediata los mensajes.
Gracia on ihana alue ja kämppä tosi kivalla paikalla.

Patricia's flat provided us with 4 comfortable nights with everything we needed to enjoy our stay in Barcelona. It felt safe and secure and was really well situated with local amenities, and we enjoyed the space in the evenings too.

Good location but the apartment is in worse condition than photos may lead you to believe. 
Walls are not clean, bed sheets were old and used up. 
Problems with sewage smell in the bathroom and hallways. 

When we arrived, there was some cleaning product left in the toilet (dark brown/Black stains - supposedly it’s organic, but the host forgot to flush it down). Very unpleasant surprise since we didn’t know what it is and the smell was pretty bad. 

Overall not the smoothest stay and not the nicest host.
L'appartement est très propre. Patricia est une personne très accueillante. Le quartier est très sympa. A recommander, rien a redire !

Appartement propre et cosy, situé à quelques minutes du métro le plus proche, serviettes et draps à notre disposition, équipé également de lit à mémoire de forme, appartement agréable. Patricia nous a très bien accueilli et nous avons eu également un tarif préférentiel pour le parking situé à 2 pas de l l'appartement.
Zentrale und dennoch ruhige Lage. Zu Fuss die wichtigsten Sehenswürdigkeiten in ca. 20' erreichbar. Wir genossen die Unterkunft und den Aufenthalt.

We loved our stay in Gracia and Patricia's apartment is a great home base to explore the city. If you're planning to explore most of touristy BCN (Barri Gotic, etc), know that it's about a 25-min walk from the apartment. We loved walking, but some may prefer a taxi or metro. The apartment itself is slightly less modern than it appeared in the pictures, and some amenities were missing on our stay (TV, some light bulbs, broken coffee pot) but we made do. The only issue we had was with some bathroom cleanliness -- a good deep clean should do the trick. Other than that, we thought this space was a great value and we'd be happy to book it again. And Patricia was very communicative and helpful before our arrival. As for the neighborhood, Gracia is terrific, and far less touristed than other neighborhoods. Lots of cute squares, a great bakery directly across from the apartment (Forn Goya), and plenty of good cafes. Check out Carrer de Verdi for lots of great restaurants at night, and the closest Gaudi house (Casa Vicens) was turned into a museum only in Nov 2017.
Great apartment in a very good location. Highly recommend
Todo perfecto, 100% recomendable.
Appartement propre a proximité des grands boulevards. Je conseil pour tout le monde. On est a 30min des ramblas.

We had a lovely stay in Patricia's apartment! The apartment is very cozy, clean and quiet and has everything you need. The kitchen is fully furnished and it even has a dish washer and a washing machine. We stayed there one week with our baby and were very satisfied. The apartment was warm enough (we stayed there in February) and we even had a baby bed! We also loved the neighbourhood! The apartment is situated in Gracia, a beautiful part of Barcelona, with many shops, cafes and restaurants. Just around the corner is a small square with authentic shops and cafes and we usually started or ended our day there :) Patricia is very kind, she promptly answered all our questions and was always there to help. Next time we come to Barcelona, we would love to stay in her apartment again!

There had been some misunderstanding between the office and our booking but Patricia was nice enough to help us settle it by calling Airbnb and even offered us another flat to stay in. There was a big conference in the city and most of the places are booked so luckily she had something for us. She’s warm and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended. Place has neighboring restaurants and bakeries. Shopping is 3-5min walk.

El sitio y la anfitriona, muy bueno ^^

Repetiré!
Muy bonito y muy bien ubicado . Me volvería a quedar 100%

L'appartement est vraiment très chouette, spacieux, super bien situé en plein centre de Gracia et agréable à vivre. Patricia est adorable et disponible, pleine de bons conseils (épicerie, charcuterie, bus à prendre pour rejoindre tel ou tel endroit,...). Nous conseillons vivement cet appartement ! Merci

If the three most important things in a property are "location location location", then Patricia's flat scores highly.

It's bang in the middle of Gracia, a cute 'alternative' kind of neighbourhood just north of the city centre with a vibe a bit like parts of Brooklyn or East London - full of arty shops and bars and people - yet close enough to reach all the regular sights quickly by Metro and fairly quickly on foot (it's about 45 minutes down to the bottom of the Ramblas). 

The flat itself is in a small sidestreet off a lovely little square (Placa de la Vila de Gracia) ringed by restaurants and cafes with outdoor seating, with a great bakery right opposite, and near to countless other restaurants, bars, cafesm shops and galleries, as well as two different markets with a five-minute walk.

Those less mobile than us might find the narrow, steep and slippery stone staircase a little hard to navigate, especiallly with suitcases (though there is a tiny lift), and the bedrooms are strictly for sleeping, being very small. But there's a decent sized living room (with TV, if required) and a small but perfectly good kitchen, plus a little terrace off one of the bedrooms with a washing machine and line.

Only complaints - an excessive cleaning charge of £45 for a two-night/one-day stay (making a 65% surcharge when you add in the mysterious AirBnB 'service fee') and there was no lightbulb in either of the bedside lights (and we couldn't find a spare anywhere). 

It would also be nice if Patricia would recommend some of the nice places to eat and drink, since local knowledge is always a bonus; she did mention one tapas restaurant (La Pepita) which was great, and recommended a good nearby wine merchant (Enterwine) when asked. We found another (Antunez) on our own, which was even better. Excellent coffee too in a cafe in the Placa (Nabucco Tiramisu).

Overall, it's a lovely place to stay away from the noise, traffic, tourist crowds, high prices and pickpockets of downtown Barcelona. I would definitely go back.

TC
Thank you Patricia

The Apartment is absolutely fine and looks like it's on the pictures. It’s perfect located in the best area of Gracia. since I arrived early it was even possible to get an earlier check in. All over all everything was nice and I would take the Apartment again.

The location and neighborhood is wonderful- it is easy to get to the major sites but it is less touristy than other areas - a real neighborhood. Lots of food shopping options and Gracias place is wonderful people watching. The apartment is nice and the Terrance and front balcony let in a lot of air. How vet when we stayed there, here was a terrible chemical odor coming from the bathroom - we could never figure out exactly where. It smelled like either drain cleaner or rat poison and made me nauseous. The owner was not helpful and ignored my next email saying the odor was still there.even after 2 days and much airing out. We had to sleep with all of the windows open which was fine because we had perfect weather but it would have been awful if he hadn’t been able to do that. I would not recommend because of this. I usually give glowing recommendations and am a regular Airbnb user so this is disappointing. This area is great so don’t hesitate to look for other options nearby. I hope the owner gets this fixed and becomes more responsive because this is a consistent issue in the reviews. The apartment itself is nice and big.

Patricia’s place was perfect for my father and I during our stay visiting family in Barcelona. The location was perfect, and we had a really easy time getting around. Patricia was very helpful and responsive when we asked to extend our stay!
Good location, lots of restaurants around.
The host canceled this reservation 239 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excellent location - some great local shops and very good places to eat.   Cot bed supplied on request.  Facilities available for self-catering if required.  The lift is small but one person can fit in with luggage.  The apartment is quiet, no noise from the street below, but in the morning you might be woken by the nearby church bells (some people will like this).  Host Patricia was very responsive and flexible.  Some minor issues with lamp bulbs that need replacing but otherwise the apartment was in good condition and very clean.  Overall a really good stay and we would use it again in future.
L'alloggio è molto carino e accogliente come dalle foto, ma per quanto riguarda il check in é stato un po' confusionario.
Everything was great!
Nice place in a nice location. Only one AC in the whole apartment but can open the front and back doors for air flow if it's not the dead of summer.
PERFECT, PERFECT, PERFECT.

It is a nice apartment but looks nicer in the photos. The main problem we had was that the lift is minuscule! I chose this listing especially for the lift as we were coming with our baby and the buggy etc. We were unable to use the lift for anything except me and the baby so my partner had to carry the buggy up and down the stairs every time we went out. 

The area is great and we did enjoy our stay it just made everything a bit more difficult than we were hoping! 

We also had trouble contacting Patricia. I had to ring her in the end and we waited for 10 mins outside the apartment before being let in.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Big, cozy, beautiful space in a fantastic location. The bed was so comfortable and we loved having drinks on the back patio in the evening. Very nice stay, we had a really good time. Patricia was very helpful the whole way through. Really enjoyable!

There are tons of parking stations very close by.
Muy lindo apartamento en una zona también muy linda de Barcelona! Muy equipado y Patricia me brindó la mejor atención. Volvería. Muchas gracias!

My experience with Patricia and her brother Javier was the best AirBnB experience I have had. I travel internationally quite a bit and have never had the response, care, concern, or availability be as thorough as it was. The location is pure magic and we spent our evenings in the square while my youngest played footy with local kids and I enjoyed the calm and music and food and drinks. If you are looking for a place to stay in Barcelona—I PROMISE you that you will be happy here. I hope yo come back someday!! Thank you Javier!

name: Spacious bedroom with a trundle bed in Botafogo
summary: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities.
space: Nowadays houses in major cities are uncommon, so consider my home as a very special place. It is one-storey and lies in a very private village with 24-hour security. A perfect place to rest after a day of discoveries!

Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities. The house is located in a privileged area, we're very close to Copacabana, Ipanema, Gávea, Lapa and downtown Rio. The House is a haven of comfort and tranquility after a full day.
notes: The house has 3 bedrooms.  We have 2 bedrooms to receive guests. This listing is about the blue bedroom that has a trundle bed, a desk, a chair, wooden wardrobes, a chest of drawers and a ceiling fan. The wifi is free for the guests' use. As for September/2016 the bedroom will have air conditioning. From Monday to Friday my father stays in the house. He works out all day, so you'll just see him in the morning and at night.  On the weekends I stay in the house.
transit: Subway just over 10 minutes away, providing access to areas such as Lapa, Largo do Machado, Catete and many other places. Buses at all times in front of the house will take you to the beach in just 10 minutes. Walk to the pond as a morning activity or in the evening.

house_rules: Espero que você se sinta à vontade como se estivesse em sua casa. Desta mesma forma desejo que os hóspedes sejam cuidadosos e zelosos para com o uso da casa. Respeitem a convivência harmoniosa entre os vizinhos. Não leve pra dormir em casa outras pessoas que não forem as combinadas. Use com consciência a água e a energia elétrica.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá!!
Seja bem vindo!
Eu adoro conhecer novas pessoas, compartilhar ensinamentos e pontos de vista. 
Amo a natureza, respirar um puro ar e me sentir conectada a energia da terra.
Me sinto muito feliz em receber convidados simpáticos que desejam experimentar ótimos momentos no Rio e desfrutar das alegrias e belezas deste lugar que eu tanto amo.
Botafogo é um bairro  onde a vida histórica e contemporânea convivem com charme a harmonia. Rodeado por montanhas e ruas arborizadas, viver em  Botafogo tem custo mais baixo que os outros bairros da zona sul, aqui é repleto de restaurantes, bares, feiras, museus e eventos culturais que acontecem com muita frequência, o bairro fica a poucos minutos do centro do Rio e dos principais pontos turísticos. A vila onde a casa está localizada foi construída há quase 100 anos, tem muitas árvores que recebem a visita de adoráveis animais da Mata Atlântica.
  A poucos minutos de caminhada  você encontrará a "Praia de Botafogo" que compõem uma das vistas mais incríveis do Rio, se preferir pegue o caminho oposto e dê um pulinho na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, de lá aproveite pra curtir o por do sol no Arpoador.
  Durante muito anos o Rio de Janeiro foi a capital do Brasil, então imagine passear entre as centenárias ruas de paralelepípedos do Centro do Rio, rodeado por prédios memoráveis de  belíssima arquitetura do século 19. 
  O bairro da Urca, onde abriga o bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, está a menos de 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
  O Cristo Redentor  pode ser visto da janela  e você pode chegar a subida do Morro do Corcovado em apenas 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
 Será um prazer compartilhar todas as dicas e lugares especiais que conheci ao longo dos meus anos de vida nesta cidade maravilhosa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Fue una experiencia increible, Ana siempre se comporto amable, disponible, siempre ayudando a facilitar mi viaje, aconsejando como llegar a lugares a los cuales queria visitar.

El lugar para dormir es super comodo, super limpio y super tranquilo, buena onda. 

Estoy muy feliz de haber quedado en esta casa.

Muchas gracias.

Fui muito bem atendido pela Ana Rita e muito bem recepcionado pelo Sr. Mauro. A residência fica em um condomínio muito bem localizado, o quarto é limpo, espaçoso e confortável, além de ser bem silencioso. O bairro é muito bom, tem metrô próximo e conta com comércio bem diversificado. Recomendo!

Simplesmente me senti em casa! A Ana é uma pessoa agradabilíssima e como anfitriã, se mostrou sempre prestativa e com ótimas dicas sobre o Rio. A casa é um charme e o bairro de Botafogo muito tranquilo e cheio de natureza. Tem uma visão privilegiada do Cristo Redentor. Quanto a segurança, me senti muito segura ao andar pelas ruas do bairro. O comércio também é muito diversificado e atende as necessidades de um "viajante". Foi uma experiência ímpar e espero podê-la repetir, uma próxima vez, com mais tempo para aproveitar tudo o que o Rio tem à oferecer!!!

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Ana Rita's apartment for ten days during the Olympics, and it was definitely the best Airbnb experience we ever had.

The flat is very well located, Botafogo metro station is about 10/15 minuts walking. The area is full of markets, bars and restaurants, and above all is very safe.
The apartment was perfectly clean at our arrival, and the room equipped with a double bed, a big drawers and a closet.
Ana Rita (and her father too) was friendly and very helpful since the beginning of our stay. During our vacation in Rio we lost our credit cards, and her help was fundamental to get them back. She also suggested us a lot of good places to eat :)
We could use the kitchen and also do the laundry, which was quite necessary since our stay was long.

I can certainly recommend Ana Rita and her flat, you will have a great stay there!

Iza nos acompañó en cada uno de nuestros días de estancia,muy afectuosamente nos ayudaba con cualquier duda que teníamos. Ana Rita fue muy amable y cortez.el barrio nos pareció muy seguro aunque un poco alejado de las playas.

name: Cottage in Bondi/Tamarama
summary: Enjoy this gorgeous little cottage, right near bondi and tamarama beach, shops, cafes and more. Fully equipped kitchen. Super comfy king sized bed. Pull out sofa (if needed), bathroom with full sized bath and laundry. Beautiful private courtyard.

name: Apartamento Centro histórico
summary: A Casa do Cristelo é o resultado do restauro de um andar num edifício (exclusivo) do final do séc. XIX, oferecendo as comodidades necessárias para uma estadia plena. Inserida numa zona privilegiada com proximidade a várias atracções como o rio, museus, igrejas e monumentos. Dispôe de um quarto com duas camas individuais e caso seja necessário , até um máximo de 4 hóspedes, há duas camas desmontáveis prontas a instalar. Dispomos também de berço para bebés. Zona com estacionamento público.
description: A Casa do Cristelo é o resultado do restauro de um andar num edifício (exclusivo) do final do séc. XIX, oferecendo as comodidades necessárias para uma estadia plena. Inserida numa zona privilegiada com proximidade a várias atracções como o rio, museus, igrejas e monumentos. Dispôe de um quarto com duas camas individuais e caso seja necessário , até um máximo de 4 hóspedes, há duas camas desmontáveis prontas a instalar. Dispomos também de berço para bebés. Zona com estacionamento público. O apartamento situa-se numa zona sossegada, Em Massarelos antigo bairro de pescadores e dos mais antigos do Porto. Para quem aprecia alguma tranquilidade e ao mesmo tempo estar à distância a pé do rebuliço da baixa da cidade este é o local perfeito. A proximidade do rio pode servir para vários passeios tendo este como referência: as marginais nos dois sentidos são excelentes pontos de partida para uma boa visão geral. A facilidade de acesso à boa gastronomia portuense é um ponto a ter em conta nesta lo

reviews.comments:
Die Wohnung war einwandfrei. Alles ist sehr neu und frisch renoviert. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt!
Francisco hat uns eine super Beschreibung gemacht, wie wir vom Flughafen zu der Wohnung kommen und wir haben es auf Anhieb gefunden. Zur Begrüßung gab es ein paar Flaschen Wasser und Obst. Das war wirklich toll. Dann hat er sich sehr viel Zeit genommen und alle Fragen zu Porto beantwortet und uns Tipps für die Stadt gegeben.
Die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig, es gibt ein paar kleine Cafes und Restaurants, ein Supermarkt ist auch in der Nähe. Und die Wohnung liegt gleich am Fluss, was sehr schön ist.
Bei der Abreise lief auch alles perfekt. Francisco war sehr flexibel was An- und Abreise betrifft.
Definitiv eine Weiterempfehlung!

Rustige wat verlaten straatje. Wel op loop afstand naar het centrum(1-1,5 km). Je zit overal toch heel dichtbij. leuk restaurantje om de hoek. Het appartement heeft alles wat je nodig hebt en Francisco is heel behulpzaam en vriendelijk.

Our stay in the apartment was very lovely and Francisco was very nice and welcoming. The location of the apartment is amazing and very close to the center of the city. Francisco, himself was very accommodating and accessible if you needed anything. 
I would highly recommend anyone to stay there should they stay in Porto. :)

Francesco hat uns freundlich empfangen und gab umfangreiche Informationen über Porto und Umgebung. Das Haus liegt in einer engen Gasse in zweiter Reihe zur Hafenpromenade. die Wohnung liegt im ersten Stock, ist neu renoviert und sehr großzügig. Die Luft ist etwas muffig. Der Standort optimal und etwas abseits vom Touristentrubel. Das Tapas Restaurant gleich um die Ecke mit Blick auf den Douro ist absolut zu empfehlen. Uns hat es insgesamt gut gefallen.

I spent one week at Francisco' house and I had a very good experience. The house has a lot of space to relax and it is well equipped.  
Francisco was a great host. The communication was very easy and he attended to all my requests. 
I would definitely recommend his house to my friends.
